call night even morn were first day 1 6 god said let there be firmament midst water let it divid water water 1 7 god made firmament divid water which were firmament water which were firmament it wa so 1 8 god call firmament heaven even morn were second day 1 9 god said let water heaven be gather togeth unto one place let dri land appear it wa so 1 10 god call dri land earth gather togeth water call he sea god saw that it wa good 1 11 god said let earth bring forth grass herb yield seed fruit tree yield fruit hi kind whose seed is itself earth it wa so 1 12 earth brought forth grass herb yield seed hi kind tree yield fruit whose seed wa itself hi kind god saw that it wa good 1 13 even morn were third day 1 14 god said let there be light firmament heaven divid day night let them be sign season day year 1 15 let them be light firmament heaven give light earth it wa so 1 16 god made two great light greater light rule day lesser light rule night he made star also 1 17 god set them firmament heaven give light earth 1 18 rule day night divid light dark god saw that it wa good 1 19 even morn were fourth day 1 20 god said let water bring forth abundantli move creatur that hath life fowl that may fli earth open firmament heaven 1 21 god creat great whale everi live creatur that moveth which water brought forth abundantli their kind everi wing fowl hi kind god saw that it wa good kind it wa so 1 25 god made beast earth hi kind cattl their kind everi thing that creepeth earth hi kind god saw that it wa good 1 26 god said let us make man our imag our like let them have dominion fish sea fowl air cattl all earth everi creep thing that creepeth earth 1 27 so god creat man hi own imag imag god creat he him male femal creat he them 1 28 god bless them god said unto them be fruit multipli replenish earth subdu it have dominion fish sea fowl air everi live thing that moveth earth 1 29 god said behold i have given you everi herb bear seed which is face all earth everi tree which is fruit tree yield seed you it shall be meat 1 30 everi beast earth everi fowl air everi thing that creepeth earth wherein there is life i have given everi green herb meat it wa so 1 31 god saw everi thing that he had made behold it wa veri good even morn were sixth day 2 1 thu heaven earth were finish all host them 2 2 seventh day god end hi work which he had made he rest seventh day all hi work which he had made 2 3 god bless seventh day sanctifi it becaus that it he had rest all hi work which god creat made 2 4 these are gener heaven earth when they were creat day that lord god made earth heaven 2 5 everi plant field it wa earth everi herb field it grew lord god had not caus it rain earth there wa not man till ground 2 6 but there went mist earth water whole face ground 2 7 lord god form man dust ground breath hi nostril breath life man becam live soul 2 8 lord god plant garden eastward eden there he put man whom he had form 2 9 ground made lord god grow everi tree that is pleasant sight good food tree life also midst garden tree knowledg good evil 2 10 river went eden water garden thenc it wa part becam four head 2 11 name first is pison that is it which compasseth whole land havilah where there is gold 2 12 gold that land is good there is bdellium onyx stone 2 13 name second river is gihon same is it that compasseth whole land ethiopia 2 14 name third river is hiddekel that is it which goeth east assyria fourth river is euphrat 2 15 lord god took man put him garden eden dress it keep it 2 16 lord god command man say everi tree garden thou mayest freeli eat 2 17 but tree knowledg good evil thou shalt not eat it day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt sure die 2 18 lord god said it is not good that man should be alon i will make him help meet him 2 19 ground lord god form everi beast field everi fowl air brought them unto adam see what he would call them whatsoev adam call everi live creatur that wa name thereof 2 20 adam gave name all cattl fowl air everi beast field but adam there wa not found help meet him 2 21 lord god caus deep sleep fall adam he slept he took one hi rib close flesh instead thereof 2 22 rib which lord god had taken man made he woman brought her unto man 2 23 adam said thi is now bone my bone flesh my flesh she shall be call woman becaus she wa taken man 2 24 therefor shall man leav hi father hi mother shall cleav unto hi wife they shall be one flesh 2 25 they were both nake man hi wife were not asham 3 1 now serpent wa more subtil than ani beast field which lord god had made he said unto woman yea hath god said ye shall not eat everi tree garden 3 2 woman said unto serpent we may eat fruit tree garden 3 3 but fruit tree which is midst garden god hath said ye shall not eat it neither shall ye touch it lest ye die 3 4 serpent said unto woman ye shall not sure die 3 5 god doth know that day ye eat thereof then your eye shall be open ye shall be as god know good evil 3 6 when woman saw that tree wa good food that it wa pleasant eye tree be desir make one wise she took fruit thereof did eat gave also unto her husband her he did eat 3 7 eye them both were open they knew that they were nake they sew fig leav togeth made themselv apron 3 8 they heard voic lord god walk garden cool day adam hi wife hid themselv presenc lord god tree garden 3 9 lord god call unto adam said unto him where art thou 3 10 he said i heard thi voic garden i wa afraid becaus i wa nake i hid myself 3 11 he said who told thee that thou wast nake hast thou eaten tree whereof i command thee that thou shouldest not eat 3 12 man said woman whom thou gavest be me she gave me tree i did eat 3 13 lord god said unto woman what is thi that thou hast done woman said serpent beguil me i did eat 3 14 lord god said unto serpent becaus thou hast done thi thou art curs all cattl everi beast field thi belli shalt thou go dust shalt thou eat all day thi life 3 15 i will put enmiti thee woman thi seed her seed it shall bruis thi head thou shalt bruis hi heel 3 16 unto woman he said i will greatli multipli thi sorrow thi concept sorrow thou shalt bring forth children thi desir shall be thi husband he shall rule thee thorn also thistl shall it bring forth thee thou shalt eat herb field 3 19 sweat thi face shalt thou eat bread till thou return unto ground it wast thou taken dust thou art unto dust shalt thou return flame sword which turn everi way keep way tree life 4 1 adam knew eve hi wife she conceiv bare cain said i have gotten man lord 4 2 she again bare hi brother abel abel wa keeper sheep but cain wa tiller ground 4 3 process time it came pass that cain brought fruit ground offer unto lord 4 4 abel he also brought firstl hi flock fat thereof lord had respect unto abel hi offer 4 5 but unto cain hi offer he had not respect cain wa veri wroth hi counten fell 4 6 lord said unto cain whi art thou wroth whi is thi counten fallen 4 7 if thou doest well shalt thou not be accept if thou doest not well sin lieth door unto thee shall be hi desir thou shalt rule him 4 8 cain talk abel hi brother it came pass when they were field that cain rose against abel hi brother slew him 4 9 lord said unto cain where is abel thi brother he said i know not am i my brother s keeper 4 10 he said what hast thou done voic thi brother s blood crieth unto me ground 4 11 now art thou curs earth which hath open her mouth receiv thi brother s blood thi hand 4 12 when thou tillest ground it shall not henceforth yield unto thee her strength fugit vagabond shalt thou be earth 4 13 cain said unto lord my punish is their nation 10 32 these are famili son noah their gener their nation these were nation divid earth flood 11 1 whole earth wa one languag one speech 11 2 it came pass as they journey east that they found plain land shinar they dwelt there 11 3 they said one anoth go let us make brick burn them thoroughli they had brick stone slime had they morter 11 4 they said go let us build us citi tower whose top may reach unto heaven let us make us name lest we be scatter abroad face whole earth 11 5 lord came down see citi tower which children men build 11 6 lord said behold peopl is one they have all one languag thi they begin do now noth will be restrain them which they have imagin do 11 7 go let us go down there confound their languag that they may not understand one anoth s speech 11 8 so lord scatter them abroad thenc face all earth they left off build citi 11 9 therefor is name it call babel becaus lord did there confound languag all earth thenc did lord scatter them abroad face all earth 11 10 these are gener shem shem wa hundr year old begat arphaxad two year flood 11 11 shem live he begat arphaxad five hundr year begat son daughter 11 12 arphaxad live five thirti year begat countri thi kindr thi father s hous unto land that i will shew thee 12 2 i will make thee great nation i will bless thee make thi name great thou shalt be bless 12 3 i will bless them that bless thee curs him that curseth thee thee shall all famili earth be bless 12 4 so abram depart as lord had spoken unto him lot went him abram wa seventi five year old when he depart haran 12 5 abram took sarai plain moreh canaanit wa then land 12 7 lord appear unto abram said unto thi seed will i give thi land there build he altar unto lord who appear unto him 12 8 he remov thenc unto mountain east bethel pitch hi tent have bethel west hai east there he build altar unto lord call name lord 12 9 abram journey go still south 12 10 there wa famin land abram went down egypt sojourn there famin wa grievou land 12 11 it came pass when he wa come near enter egypt that he said unto sarai hi wife behold now i know that thou art fair woman look 12 12 therefor it shall come pass when egyptian shall see thee that they shall say thi is hi wife they will kill me but they will save thee aliv 12 13 say i pray thee thou art my sister that it may be well me thi sake my soul shall live becaus thee 12 14 it came pass that when abram wa come egypt egyptian beheld woman that she wa veri fair 12 15 princ also pharaoh saw her commend her pharaoh woman wa taken pharaoh s hous 12 16 he entreat abram well her sake he had sheep oxen he ass menserv maidserv she ass camel 12 17 lord plagu pharaoh hi hous great plagu becaus sarai abram s wife 12 18 pharaoh call abram said what is thi that thou hast done unto me whi didst thou not tell me that she wa thi wife 12 19 whi saidst thou she is my sister so i might have taken her me wife now therefor behold thi wife take her go thi way 12 20 pharaoh command hi men concern him they sent him away hi wife all that he had 13 1 abram went egypt he hi wife all that he had lot him south 13 2 abram wa veri rich cattl silver gold 13 3 he went hi journey south even bethel unto place where hi tent had been begin bethel hai 13 4 unto place altar which he had made there first there abram call name lord 13 5 lot also which went abram had flock herd tent 13 6 land wa not abl bear them that they might dwell togeth their substanc wa great so that they could not dwell togeth 13 7 there wa strife herdmen abram s cattl herdmen lot s cattl canaanit perizzit dwell then land 13 8 abram said unto lot let there be no strife i pray thee me thee my herdmen thi herdmen we be brethren 13 9 is not whole land thee separ thyself i pray thee me if thou wilt take left hand then i will go right or if thou depart right hand then i will go left 13 10 lot lift hi eye beheld all plain jordan that it wa well water everi where lord destroy sodom gomorrah even as garden lord like land egypt as thou comest unto zoar 13 11 then lot chose him all plain jordan lot journey east they separ themselv one other 13 12 abram dwell land canaan lot dwell citi plain pitch hi tent sodom 13 13 but men sodom were wick sinner lord exceedingli 13 14 lord said unto abram that lot wa separ him lift now thine eye look place where thou art northward southward eastward westward 13 15 all land which thou seest thee will i give it thi seed ever 13 16 i will make thi seed as dust earth so that if man can number dust earth then shall thi seed also be number 13 17 aris walk land length it breadth it i will give it unto thee 13 18 then abram remov hi tent came dwelt plain mamr which is hebron built there altar unto lord 14 1 it came pass day amraphel king shinar arioch king ellasar chedorlaom king elam tidal king nation 14 2 that these made war bera king sodom birsha king gomorrah shinab king admah shemeb king zeboiim king bela which is zoar 14 3 all these were join togeth vale siddim which is salt sea 14 4 twelv year they serv chedorlaom thirteenth year they rebel 14 5 fourteenth year came chedorlaom king that were him smote rephaim ashteroth karnaim zuzim ham emin shaveh kiriathaim 14 6 horit their mount seir unto elparan which is wilder 14 7 they return came enmishpat which is kadesh smote all countri amalekit also amorit that dwelt hazezontamar 14 8 there went king sodom king gomorrah king admah king zeboiim king bela same is zoar they join battl them vale siddim 14 9 chedorlaom king elam tidal king nation amraphel king shinar arioch king ellasar four king five 14 10 vale siddim wa full slimepit king sodom gomorrah fled fell there they that remain fled mountain 14 11 they took all good sodom gomorrah all their victual went their way 14 12 they took lot abram s brother s son who dwelt sodom hi good depart 14 13 there came one that had escap told abram hebrew he dwelt plain mamr amorit brother eshcol brother aner these were confeder abram 14 14 when abram heard that hi brother wa taken captiv he arm hi train servant born hi own hous three hundr eighteen pursu them unto dan 14 15 he divid himself against them he hi servant night smote them pursu them unto hobah which is left hand damascu 14 16 he brought back all good also brought again hi brother lot hi good women also peopl 14 17 king sodom went meet him hi return slaughter chedorlaom king that were him valley shaveh which is king s dale 14 18 melchizedek king salem brought forth bread wine he wa priest most high god 14 19 he bless him said bless be abram most high god possessor heaven earth 14 20 bless be most high god which hath deliv thine enemi thi hand he gave him tith all 14 21 king sodom said unto abram give me person take good thyself 14 22 abram said king sodom i have lift mine hand unto lord most high god possessor heaven earth 14 23 that i will not take thread even shoelatchet that i will not take ani thing that is thine lest thou shouldest say i have made abram rich 14 24 save onli that which young men have eaten portion men which went me aner eshcol mamr let them take their portion 15 1 these thing word lord came unto abram vision say fear not abram i am thi shield thi exceed great reward 15 2 abram said lord god what wilt thou give me see i go childless steward my hous is thi eliez damascu 15 3 abram said behold me thou hast given no seed lo one born my hous is mine heir 15 4 behold word lord came unto him say thi shall not be thine heir but he that shall come forth thine own bowel shall be thine heir 15 5 he brought him forth abroad said look now heaven tell star if thou be abl number them he said unto him so shall thi seed be 15 6 he believ lord he count it him righteous 15 7 he said unto him i am lord that brought thee ur chalde give thee thi land inherit it 15 8 he said lord god wherebi shall i know that i shall inherit it 15 9 he said unto him take me heifer three year old she goat three year old ram three year old turtledov young pigeon 15 10 he took unto him all these divid them midst laid each piec one against anoth but bird divid he not 15 11 when fowl came down carcas abram drove them away 15 12 when sun wa go down deep sleep fell abram lo horror great dark fell him 15 13 he said unto abram know sureti that thi seed shall be stranger land that is not their shall serv them they shall afflict them four hundr year 15 14 also that nation whom they shall serv will i judg afterward shall they come great substanc 15 15 thou shalt go thi father peac thou shalt be buri good old age 15 16 but fourth gener they shall come hither again iniqu amorit is not yet full 15 17 it came pass that when sun went down it wa dark behold smoke furnac burn lamp that pass those piec 15 18 same day lord made coven abram say unto thi seed have i given thi land river egypt unto great river river euphrat 15 19 kenit kenizzit kadmonit 15 20 hittit perizzit rephaim 15 21 amorit canaanit girgashit jebusit 16 1 now sarai abram s wife bare him no children she had handmaid egyptian whose name wa hagar 16 2 sarai said unto abram behold now lord hath restrain me bear i pray thee go unto my maid it may be that i may obtain children her abram hearken voic sarai 16 3 sarai abram s wife took hagar her maid egyptian abram had dwelt ten year land canaan gave her her husband abram be hi wife 16 4 he went unto hagar she conceiv when she saw that she had conceiv her mistress wa despis her eye 16 5 sarai said unto abram my wrong be thee i have given my maid thi bosom when she saw that she had conceiv i wa despis her eye lord judg me thee 16 6 but abram said unto sarai behold thi maid is thine hand do her as it pleaseth thee when sarai dealt hardli her she fled her face 16 7 angel lord found her fountain water wilder fountain way shur 16 8 he said hagar sarai s maid whenc camest thou whither wilt thou go she said i flee face my mistress sarai 16 9 angel lord said unto her return thi mistress submit thyself her hand 16 10 angel lord said unto her i will multipli thi seed exceedingli that it shall not be number multitud 16 11 angel lord said unto her behold thou art child shalt bear son shalt call hi name ishmael becaus lord hath heard thi afflict 16 12 he will be wild man hi hand will be against everi man everi man s hand against him he shall dwell presenc all hi brethren 16 13 she call name lord that spake unto her thou god seest me she said have i also here look him that seeth me 16 14 wherefor well wa call beerlahairoi behold it is kadesh bere 16 15 hagar bare abram son abram call hi son s name which hagar bare ishmael 16 16 abram wa fourscor six year old when hagar bare ishmael abram 17 1 when abram wa nineti year old nine lord appear abram said unto him i am almighti god walk me be thou perfect 17 2 i will make my coven me thee will multipli thee exceedingli 17 3 abram fell hi face god talk him say 17 4 as me behold my coven is thee thou shalt be father mani nation 17 5 neither shall thi name ani more be call abram but thi name shall be abraham father mani nation have i made thee 17 6 i will make thee exceed fruit i will make nation thee king shall come thee 17 7 i will establish my coven me thee thi seed thee their gener everlast coven be god unto thee thi seed thee 17 8 i will give unto thee thi seed thee land wherein thou art stranger all land canaan everlast possess i will be their god 17 9 god said unto abraham thou shalt keep my coven therefor thou thi seed thee their gener 17 10 thi is my coven which ye shall keep me you thi seed thee everi man child you shall be circumcis 17 11 ye shall circumcis flesh your foreskin it shall be token coven betwixt me you 17 12 he that is eight day old shall be circumcis you everi man child your gener he that is born hous or bought money ani stranger which is not thi seed 17 13 he that is born thi hous he that is bought thi money must need be circumcis my coven shall be your flesh everlast coven 17 14 uncircumcis man child whose flesh hi foreskin is not circumcis that soul shall be cut off hi peopl he hath broken my coven 17 15 god said unto abraham as sarai thi wife thou shalt not call her name sarai but sarah shall her name be 17 16 i will bless her give thee son also her yea i will bless her she shall be mother nation king peopl shall be her 17 17 then abraham fell hi face laugh said hi heart shall child be born unto him that is hundr year old shall sarah that is nineti year old bear 17 18 abraham said unto god o that ishmael might live thee 17 19 god said sarah thi wife shall bear thee son inde thou shalt call hi name isaac i will establish my coven him everlast coven hi seed him 17 20 as ishmael i have heard thee behold i have bless him will make him fruit will multipli him exceedingli twelv princ shall he beget i will make him great nation 17 21 but my coven will i establish isaac which sarah shall bear unto thee thi set time next year 17 22 he left off talk him god went abraham 17 23 abraham took ishmael hi son all that were born hi hous all that were bought hi money everi male men abraham s hous circumcis flesh their foreskin selfsam day as god had said unto him 17 24 abraham wa nineti year old nine when he wa circumcis flesh hi foreskin 17 25 ishmael hi son wa thirteen year old when he wa circumcis flesh hi foreskin 17 26 selfsam day wa abraham circumcis ishmael hi son 17 27 all men hi hous born hous bought money stranger were circumcis him 18 1 lord appear unto him plain mamr he sat tent door heat day 18 2 he lift hi eye look lo three men stood him when he saw them he ran meet them tent door bow himself ground 18 3 said my lord if now i have found favour thi sight pass not away i pray thee thi servant 18 4 let littl water i pray you be fetch wash your feet rest yourselv tree 18 5 i will fetch morsel bread comfort ye your heart that ye shall pass therefor are ye come your servant they said so do as thou hast said 18 6 abraham hasten tent unto sarah said make readi quickli three measur fine meal knead it make cake hearth 18 7 abraham ran unto herd fetcht calf tender good gave it unto young man he hast dress it 18 8 he took butter milk calf which he had dress set it them he stood them tree they did eat 18 9 they said unto him where is sarah thi wife he said behold tent 18 10 he said i will certainli return unto thee accord time life lo sarah thi wife shall have son sarah heard it tent door which wa behind him 18 11 now abraham sarah were old well stricken age it ceas be sarah manner women 18 12 therefor sarah laugh herself say i am wax old shall i have pleasur my lord be old also 18 13 lord said unto abraham wherefor did sarah laugh say shall i sureti bear child which am old 18 14 is ani thing too hard lord time appoint i will return unto thee accord time life sarah shall have son 18 15 then sarah deni say i laugh not she wa afraid he said nay but thou didst laugh 18 16 men rose thenc look sodom abraham went them bring them way 18 17 lord said shall i hide abraham that thing which i do 18 18 see that abraham shall sure becom great mighti nation all nation earth shall be bless him 18 19 i know him that he will command hi children hi household him they shall keep way lord do justic judgment that lord may bring abraham that which he hath spoken him 18 20 lord said becaus cri sodom gomorrah is great becaus their sin is veri grievou 18 21 i will go down now see they have done altogeth accord cri it which is come unto me if not i will know 18 22 men turn their face thenc went sodom but abraham stood yet lord 18 23 abraham drew near said wilt thou also destroy righteou wick 18 24 peradventur there be fifti righteou citi wilt thou also destroy not spare place fifti righteou that are therein 18 25 that be far thee do thi manner slay righteou wick that righteou should be as wick that be far thee shall not judg all earth do right 18 26 lord said if i find sodom fifti righteou citi then i will spare all place their sake 18 27 abraham answer said behold now i have taken me speak unto lord which am but dust ash 18 28 peradventur there shall lack five fifti righteou wilt thou destroy all citi lack five he said if i find there forti five i will not destroy it 18 29 he spake unto him yet again said peradventur there shall be forti found there he said i will not do it forti s sake 18 30 he said unto him oh let not lord be angri i will speak peradventur there shall thirti be found there he said i will not do it if i find thirti there 18 31 he said behold now i have taken me speak unto lord peradventur there shall be twenti found there he said i will not destroy it twenti s sake 18 32 he said oh let not lord be angri i will speak yet but thi onc peradventur ten shall be found there he said i will not destroy it ten s sake 18 33 lord went hi way as soon as he had left commun abraham abraham return unto hi place 19 1 there came two angel sodom even lot sat gate sodom lot see them rose meet them he bow himself hi face ground 19 2 he said behold now my lord turn i pray you your servant s hous tarri all night wash your feet ye shall rise earli go your way they said nay but we will abid street all night 19 3 he press them greatli they turn unto him enter hi hous he made them feast did bake unleaven bread they did eat 19 4 but they lay down men citi even men sodom compass hous round both old young all peopl everi quarter 19 5 19 9 they said stand back they said again thi one fellow came sojourn he will need be judg now will we deal wors thee than them they press sore man even lot came near break door 19 10 but men put forth their hand pull lot hous them shut door 19 11 they smote men that were door hous blind both small great so that they weari themselv find door 19 12 men said unto lot hast thou here ani besid son law thi son thi daughter whatsoev thou hast citi bring them thi place 19 13 we will destroy thi place becaus cri them is waxen great face lord lord hath sent us destroy it 19 14 lot went spake unto hi daughter which are here lest thou be consum iniqu citi 19 16 while he linger men laid hold hi hand hand hi wife hand hi two daughter lord be merci unto him they brought him forth set him citi 19 17 it came pass when they had brought them forth abroad that he said escap thi life look not behind thee neither stay thou all plain escap mountain lest thou be consum 19 18 lot said unto them oh not so my shekel weight two bracelet her hand ten shekel weight gold 24 23 said whose daughter art thou tell me i pray thee is there room thi father s hous us lodg 24 24 she said unto him i am daughter bethuel wa laban laban ran unto man unto well 24 30 it came pass when he saw ear bracelet hi sister s hand when he heard word rebekah hi sister say thu spake man unto me that he came unto man behold he stood stand well water it shall come pass that when virgin cometh forth draw water i say her give me i pray thee littl water thi pitcher drink 24 44 she say me both drink thou i will also draw thi camel let same be woman whom lord hath appoint my master s son 24 45 i had done speak mine heart behold rebekah came forth her pitcher her shoulder she went down unto well drew water i said unto her let me proceedeth lord we cannot speak unto thee bad or good 24 51 behold rebekah is thee take her go let her be thi master s son s wife as lord hath spoken 24 52 it came pass that when abraham s servant drink he men that were him tarri all night they rose morn he said send me away unto my master 24 55 her brother her mother said let damsel abid us few day least ten that she shall go 24 56 he said unto them hinder me not see lord hath prosper my way send me away that i may go my master 24 57 they said we will call damsel enquir her mouth 24 58 they call rebekah said unto her wilt thou go thi man she said i will go 24 59 they sent away rebekah their sister her nurs abraham s servant hi men 24 60 they bless rebekah said unto her thou art our sister be thou mother thousand million let thi seed possess gate those which hate them 24 61 rebekah aros her damsel they rode camel follow man servant took rebekah went hi way 24 62 isaac came way well lahairoi he dwelt south countri 24 63 isaac went medit field eventid he lift hi eye saw behold camel were come 24 64 rebekah lift her eye when she saw isaac she light off camel 24 65 she had said unto servant what man is thi that walketh field meet us servant had said it is my master therefor she took vail cover herself 24 66 servant told isaac all thing that he had done 24 67 isaac brought her hi mother sarah s tent took rebekah she becam took hi two wive hi two womenserv hi eleven son pass ford jabbok 32 23 he took them sent them brook sent that he had 32 24 jacob wa left alon there wrestl man him break day 32 25 when he saw that he what is thi name he said jacob 32 28 he said thi name shall be call no more jacob but israel as princ hast thou power god men hast prevail 32 29 jacob ask him said tell me i pray thee thi name he said wherefor is it that thou dost ask my name he bless him there 32 30 jacob call name place peniel i have seen god face face my life is preserv 32 31 as he pass penuel sun rose him he halt hi thigh 32 32 therefor children israel eat not sinew which shrank which is hollow thigh unto thi day becaus he touch hollow jacob s thigh sinew that shrank 33 1 jacob lift hi eye look behold esau came him four hundr men he divid children unto leah unto rachel unto two handmaid 33 2 he put handmaid their children foremost leah her children rachel joseph hindermost 33 3 he pass them bow himself ground seven time he came near hi brother 33 4 esau ran meet him embrac him fell hi neck kiss him they wept 33 5 he lift hi eye saw women children said who are those thee he said children which god hath gracious given thi servant 33 6 then handmaiden came near they their children they bow themselv 33 7 leah also her children came near bow themselv came joseph near rachel they bow themselv 33 8 he said what meanest thou all thi drove which i met he said these are find grace sight my lord 33 9 esau said i have enough my brother keep that thou hast unto thyself 33 10 jacob said nay i pray thee if now i have found grace thi sight then receiv my present my hand therefor i have seen thi face as though i had seen face god thou wast pleas me 33 11 take i pray thee my bless that is brought thee becaus god hath dealt gracious me becaus i have enough he urg him he took it 33 12 he said let us take our journey let us go i will go thee 33 13 he said unto him my lord knoweth that children are tender flock herd young are me if men should overdr them one day all flock will die 33 14 let my lord i pray thee pass hi servant i will lead softli accord as cattl that goeth me children be abl endur i come unto my lord unto seir 33 15 esau said let me now leav thee some folk that are me he said what needeth it let me find grace sight my lord 33 16 so esau return that day hi way unto seir 33 17 jacob journey succoth built him hous made booth hi cattl therefor name place is call succoth 33 18 jacob came shalem citi shechem which is land canaan when he came padanaram pitch hi tent citi 33 19 he bought parcel field where he had spread hi tent hand children hamor shechem s father hundr piec money 33 20 he erect there altar call it eleloheisrael 34 1 dinah daughter leah which she bare unto jacob went shechem went unto jacob commun him 34 7 son jacob came field when they heard it men were griev they were veri wroth becaus he had wrought folli israel lie jacob s daughter which thing ought not be done 34 8 hamor commun them say soul my son shechem longeth your daughter i pray you give her him wife 34 9 make ye marriag us give your daughter unto us take our daughter unto you 34 10 ye shall dwell us land shall be you dwell trade ye therein get you possess therein 34 11 shechem said unto her father unto her brethren let me find grace your eye what ye shall say unto me i will give 34 12 ask me never so much dowri gift i will give accord as ye shall say unto me but give me damsel wife 34 13 son jacob answer shechem hamor hi father deceit said becaus he had defil dinah their sister 34 14 they said unto them we cannot do thi thing give our sister one that is uncircumcis that were reproach unto us 34 15 but thi will we consent unto you if ye will be as we be that everi male you be circumcis 34 16 then will we give our daughter unto you we will take your daughter us we will dwell you we will becom one peopl 34 17 but if ye will not hearken unto us be circumcis then will we take our daughter we will be gone 34 18 their word pleas hamor shechem hamor s son 34 19 young man defer not do thing becaus he had delight jacob s daughter he wa more honour than all hous hi father 34 20 hamor shechem hi son came unto gate their citi commun men their citi say 34 21 these men are peaceabl us therefor let them dwell land trade therein land behold it is larg enough them let us take their substanc everi beast their be our onli let us consent unto them they will dwell us 34 24 unto hamor unto shechem hi son hearken all that went gate hi citi everi male wa circumcis all that went gate hi brethren lad wa son bilhah son zilpah hi father s wive joseph brought unto hi father their evil report 37 3 now israel love joseph more than all hi children becaus he wa son hi old age he made him coat mani colour 37 4 when hi brethren saw that their father love him more than all hi brethren they hate him could not speak peaceabl unto him 37 5 joseph dream dream he told it hi brethren they hate him yet more 37 6 he said unto them hear i pray you thi dream which i have dream 37 7 behold we were bind sheav field lo my sheaf aros also stood upright behold your sheav stood round made obeis my sheaf 37 8 hi brethren said him shalt thou inde reign us or shalt thou inde have dominion us they hate him yet more hi dream hi word 37 9 he dream yet anoth dream told it hi brethren said behold i have dream dream more behold sun moon eleven star made obeis me 37 10 he told it hi father hi brethren hi father rebuk him said unto him what is thi dream that thou hast dream shall i thi mother thi brethren inde come bow down ourselv thee earth 37 11 hi brethren envi him but hi father observ say 37 12 hi brethren went feed their father s flock shechem 37 13 israel said unto joseph do not thi brethren feed flock shechem come i will send thee unto them he said him here am i 37 14 he said him go i pray thee see it be well thi brethren well flock bring me word again so he sent him vale hebron he came shechem 37 15 certain man found him behold he wa wander field man ask him say what seekest thou 37 16 he said i seek my brethren tell me i pray thee where they feed their flock 37 17 man said they are depart henc i heard them say let us go dothan joseph went hi brethren found them dothan 37 18 when they saw him afar off even he came near unto them they conspir against him slay him 37 19 heard it he deliv him their hand said let us not kill him 37 22 reuben said unto them shed no blood but cast him thi pit that is wilder lay no hand him that he might rid him their hand deliv him hi father again 37 23 it came pass when joseph wa come unto hi brethren that they stript joseph hi coat hi coat mani colour that wa him 37 24 they took him cast him pit pit wa empti there wa no water it 37 25 they sat down eat bread they lift their eye look behold compani ishmeelit came gilead their camel bear spiceri balm myrrh go carri it down egypt 37 26 judah said unto hi brethren what profit is said child is not i whither shall i go 37 31 they took joseph s coat kill kid goat dip coat blood 37 32 they sent coat mani colour they brought it their father said thi have we found know now it be her 38 3 she conceiv bare son he call hi name er 38 4 she conceiv again bare son she call hi name onan 38 5 she yet again conceiv bare son call hi name shelah he wa chezib when she bare him 38 6 judah also men place said that there wa no harlot thi place 38 23 judah said let her take it her lest we be shame behold i sent thi kid thou hast not found her 38 24 it came pass three month that it wa told third day thi do live i fear god 42 19 if ye be true men let one your brethren be bound hous your prison go ye carri corn famin your hous 42 20 but bring your youngest brother unto me so shall your word be verifi ye shall not die they did so 42 21 they said one anoth we are verili guilti concern our brother that we saw anguish hi soul when he besought us we would not hear therefor is thi distress come us 42 22 reuben answer them say spake i not unto you say do not sin against child ye would not hear therefor behold also hi blood is requir 42 23 they knew not that joseph understood them he spake unto them interpret 42 24 he turn himself them wept return them again commun them took them simeon bound him their eye 42 25 then joseph command fill their sack corn restor everi man s money hi sack give them provis way thu did he unto them 42 26 they lade their ass corn depart thenc 42 27 as one them open hi sack give hi ass provend inn he espi hi money behold it wa hi sack s mouth 42 28 he said unto hi brethren my money is restor lo it is even my sack their heart fail them they were afraid say one anoth what is thi that god hath done unto us 42 29 they came unto jacob their father unto land canaan told him all that befel unto them say 42 30 man who is lord land spake roughli us took us spi countri 42 31 we said unto him we are true men we are no spi 42 32 we be twelv brethren son our father one is not youngest is thi day our father land canaan 42 33 man lord countri said unto us herebi shall i know that ye are true men leav one your brethren here me take food famin your household be gone 42 34 bring your youngest brother unto me then shall i know that ye are no spi but that ye are true men so will i deliv you your brother ye shall traffick land 42 35 it came pass as they empti their sack that behold everi man s bundl money wa hi sack when both they their father saw bundl money they were afraid 42 36 jacob their father said unto them me have ye bereav my children joseph is not simeon is not ye will take benjamin away all these thing are against me 42 37 reuben spake unto hi father say slay my two son if i bring him not thee deliv him my hand i will bring him thee again 42 38 he said my son shall not go down you hi brother is dead he is left alon if mischief befal him way which ye go then shall ye bring down my gray hair sorrow grave 43 1 famin wa sore land 43 2 it came pass when they had eaten corn which they had brought egypt their father said unto them go again buy us littl food 43 3 judah spake unto him say man did solemnli protest unto us say ye shall not see my face your brother be you 43 4 if thou wilt send our brother us we will go down buy thee food 43 5 but if thou wilt not send him we will not go down man said unto us ye shall not see my face your brother be you 43 6 israel said wherefor dealt ye so ill me as tell man ye had yet brother 43 7 they said man ask us straitli our state our kindr say is your father yet aliv have ye anoth brother we told him accord tenor these word could we certainli know that he would say bring your brother down 43 8 judah said unto israel hi father send lad me we will aris go that we may live not die both we thou also our littl one 43 9 i will be sureti him my hand shalt thou requir him if i bring him not unto thee set him thee then let me bear blame ever 43 10 we had linger sure now we had return thi second time 43 11 their father israel said unto them if it must be so now do thi take best fruit land your vessel carri down man present littl balm littl honey spice myrrh nut almond 43 12 take doubl money your hand money that wa brought again mouth your sack carri it again your hand peradventur it wa oversight 43 13 take also your brother aris go again unto man 43 14 god almighti give you merci man that he may send away your other brother benjamin if i be bereav my children i am bereav 43 15 men took that present they took doubl money their hand benjamin rose went down egypt stood joseph 43 16 when joseph saw benjamin them he said ruler hi hous bring these men home slay make readi these men shall dine me noon 43 17 man did as joseph bade man brought men joseph s hous 43 18 men were afraid becaus they were brought joseph s hous they said becaus money that wa return our sack first time are we brought that he may seek occas against us fall us take us bondmen our ass 43 19 they came near steward joseph s hous they commun him door hous 43 20 said o sir we came inde down first time buy food 43 21 it came pass when we came inn that we open our sack behold everi man s money wa mouth hi sack our money full weight we have brought it again our hand 43 22 other money have we brought down our hand buy food we cannot tell who put our money our sack 43 23 he said peac be you fear not your god god your father hath given you treasur your sack i had your money he brought simeon unto them 43 24 man brought men joseph s hous gave them water they wash their feet he gave their ass provend 43 25 they made readi present against joseph came noon they heard that they should eat bread there 43 26 when joseph came home they brought him present which wa their hand hous bow themselv him earth 43 27 he ask them their welfar said is your father well old man whom ye spake is he yet aliv 43 28 they answer thi servant our father is good health he is yet aliv they bow down their head made obeis 43 29 he lift hi eye saw hi brother benjamin hi mother s son said is thi your younger brother whom ye spake unto me he said god be graciou unto thee my son 43 30 joseph made hast hi bowel did yearn hi brother he sought where weep he enter hi chamber wept there 43 31 he wash hi face went refrain himself said set bread 43 32 they set him himself them themselv egyptian which did eat him themselv becaus egyptian might not eat bread hebrew that is abomin unto egyptian 43 33 they sat him firstborn accord hi birthright youngest accord hi youth men marvel one anoth 43 34 he took sent mess unto them him but benjamin s mess wa five time so much as ani their they drank were merri him 44 1 he command steward hi hous say fill men s sack food as much as they can carri put everi man s money hi sack s mouth 44 2 put my cup silver cup sack s mouth youngest hi corn money he did accord word that joseph had spoken 44 3 as soon as morn wa light men were sent away they their ass 44 4 when they were gone citi not yet far off joseph said unto hi steward follow men when thou dost overtak them say unto them wherefor have ye reward evil good 44 5 is not thi it which my lord drinketh wherebi inde he divineth ye have done evil so do 44 6 he overtook them he spake unto them these same word 44 7 they said unto him wherefor saith my lord these word god forbid that thi servant should do accord thi thing 44 8 behold money which we found our sack mouth we brought again unto thee land canaan how then should we steal thi lord s hous silver or gold 44 9 whomsoev thi servant it be found both let him die we also will be my lord s bondmen 44 10 he said now also let it be accord unto your word he whom it is found shall be my servant ye shall be blameless 44 11 then they speedili took down everi man hi sack ground open everi man hi sack 44 12 he search began eldest left youngest cup wa found benjamin s sack 44 13 then they rent their cloth lade everi man hi ass return citi 44 14 judah hi brethren came joseph s hous he wa yet there they fell him ground 44 15 joseph said unto them what deed is thi that ye have done wot ye not that such man as i can certainli divin 44 16 judah said what shall we say unto my lord what shall we speak or how shall we clear ourselv god hath found iniqu thi servant behold we are my lord s servant both we he also whom cup is found 44 17 he said god forbid that i should do so but man whose hand cup is found he shall be my servant as you get you peac unto your father 44 18 then judah came near unto him said oh my lord let thi servant i pray thee speak word my lord s ear let not thine anger burn against thi servant thou art even as pharaoh 44 19 my lord ask hi servant say have ye father or brother 44 20 we said unto my lord we have father old man child hi old age littl one hi brother is dead he alon is left hi mother hi father loveth him 44 21 thou saidst unto thi servant bring him down unto me that i may set mine eye him 44 22 we said unto my lord lad cannot leav hi father if he should leav hi father hi father would die 44 23 thou saidst unto thi servant your youngest brother come down you ye shall see my face no more 44 24 it came pass when we came unto thi servant my father we told him word my lord 44 25 our father said go again buy us littl food 44 26 we said we cannot go down if our youngest brother be us then will we go down we may not see man s face our youngest brother be us 44 27 thi servant my father said unto us ye know that my wife bare me two son 44 28 one went me i said sure he is torn piec i saw him not 44 29 if ye take thi also me mischief befal him ye shall bring down my gray hair sorrow grave 44 30 now therefor when i come thi servant my father lad be not us see that hi life is bound lad s life 44 31 it shall come pass when he seeth that lad is not us that he will die thi servant shall bring down gray hair thi servant our father sorrow grave 44 32 thi servant becam sureti lad unto my father say if i bring him not unto thee then i shall bear blame my father ever 44 33 now therefor i pray thee let thi servant abid instead lad bondman my lord let lad go hi brethren 44 34 how shall i go my father lad be not me lest peradventur i see evil that shall come my father 45 1 then joseph could not refrain himself all them that stood him he cri caus everi man go me there stood no man him while joseph made himself known unto hi brethren 45 2 he wept aloud egyptian hous pharaoh heard 45 3 joseph said unto hi brethren i am joseph doth my father yet live hi brethren could not answer him they were troubl hi presenc 45 4 joseph said unto hi brethren come near me i pray you they came near he said i am joseph your brother whom ye sold egypt 45 5 now therefor be not griev nor angri yourselv that ye sold me hither god did send me you preserv life 45 6 these two year hath famin been land yet there are five year which there shall neither be ear nor harvest 45 7 god sent me you preserv you poster earth save your live great deliver 45 8 so now it wa not you that sent me hither but god he hath made me father pharaoh lord all hi hous ruler all land egypt 45 9 hast ye go my father say unto him thu saith thi son joseph god hath made me lord all egypt come down unto me tarri not 45 10 thou shalt dwell land goshen thou shalt be near unto me thou thi children thi children s children thi flock thi herd all that thou hast 45 11 there will i nourish thee yet there are five year famin lest thou thi household all that thou hast come poverti 45 12 behold your eye see eye my brother benjamin that it is my mouth that speaketh unto you 45 13 ye shall tell my father all my glori egypt all that ye have seen ye shall hast bring down my father hither 45 14 he fell hi brother benjamin s neck wept benjamin wept hi neck 45 15 moreov he kiss all hi brethren wept them that hi brethren talk him 45 16 fame thereof wa heard pharaoh s hous say joseph s brethren are come it pleas pharaoh well hi servant 45 17 pharaoh said unto joseph say unto thi brethren thi do ye lade your beast go get you unto land canaan 45 18 take your father your household come unto me i will give you good land egypt ye shall eat fat land 45 19 now thou art command thi do ye take you wagon land egypt your littl one your wive bring your father come 45 20 also regard not your stuff good all land egypt is your 45 21 children israel did so joseph gave them wagon accord command pharaoh gave them provis way 45 22 all them he gave each man chang raiment but benjamin he gave three hundr piec silver five chang raiment 45 23 hi father he sent thi manner ten ass laden good thing egypt ten she ass laden corn bread meat hi father way 45 24 so he sent hi brethren away they depart he said unto them see that ye fall not way 45 25 they went egypt came land canaan unto jacob their father 45 26 told him say joseph is yet aliv he is governor all land egypt jacob s heart faint he believ them not 45 27 they told him all word joseph which he had said unto them when he saw wagon which joseph had sent carri him spirit jacob their father reviv 45 28 israel said it is enough joseph my son is yet aliv i will go see him i dinah all soul hi son hi daughter were thirti three 46 16 son gad ziphion haggi shuni ezbon eri arodi are 46 17 son asher jimnah ishuah isui beriah serah their sister son beriah heber malchiel 46 18 which asenath daughter potipherah priest bare unto him 46 21 son benjamin were belah becher ashbel gera naaman ehi rosh muppim huppim ard 46 22 these are son rachel which were born jacob all soul were threescor ten 46 28 he sent judah him unto joseph direct hi face unto goshen they came land goshen 46 29 joseph made readi hi chariot went meet israel hi father goshen present himself unto him he fell hi neck wept hi neck good while 46 30 israel said unto joseph now let me die i have seen thi face becaus thou art yet aliv 46 31 joseph said unto hi brethren unto hi father s hous i will go shew pharaoh say unto him my brethren my father s hous which were land canaan are come unto me 46 32 men are shepherd their trade hath been feed cattl they have brought their flock their herd all that they have 46 33 it shall come pass when pharaoh shall call you shall say what is your occup 46 34 that ye shall say thi servant trade hath been cattl our youth even now both we also our father that ye may dwell land goshen everi shepherd is abomin unto egyptian 47 1 then joseph came told pharaoh said my father my brethren their flock their herd all that they have are come land canaan behold they are land goshen 47 2 he took some hi brethren even five men present them unto pharaoh 47 3 pharaoh said unto hi brethren what is your occup they said unto pharaoh thi servant are shepherd both we also our father 47 4 they said morev unto pharaoh sojourn land are we come thi servant have no pastur their flock famin is sore land canaan now therefor we pray thee let thi servant dwell land goshen 47 5 pharaoh spake unto joseph say thi father thi brethren are come unto thee 47 6 land egypt is thee best land make thi father brethren dwell land goshen let them dwell if thou knowest ani men activ them then make them ruler my cattl 47 7 joseph brought jacob hi father set him pharaoh jacob bless pharaoh 47 8 pharaoh said unto jacob how old art thou 47 9 jacob said unto pharaoh day year my pilgrimag are hundr thirti year few evil have day year my life been have not attain unto day year life my father day their pilgrimag 47 10 jacob bless pharaoh went pharaoh 47 11 joseph place hi father hi brethren gave them possess land egypt best land land rames as pharaoh had command 47 12 joseph nourish hi father hi brethren all hi father s household bread accord their famili 47 13 there wa no bread all land famin wa veri sore so that land egypt all land canaan faint reason famin 47 14 joseph gather all money that wa found land egypt land canaan corn which they bought joseph brought money pharaoh s hous 47 15 when money fail land egypt land canaan all egyptian came unto joseph said give us bread whi should we die thi presenc money faileth 47 16 joseph said give your cattl i will give you your cattl if money fail 47 17 they brought their cattl unto joseph joseph gave them bread exchang hors flock cattl herd ass he fed them bread all their cattl that year 47 18 when that year wa end they came unto him second year said unto him we will not hide it my lord how that our money is spent my lord also hath our herd cattl there is not ought left sight my lord but our bodi our land 47 19 wherefor shall we die thine eye both we our land buy us our land bread we our land will be servant unto pharaoh give us seed that we may live not die that land be not desol 47 20 joseph bought all land egypt pharaoh egyptian sold everi man hi field becaus famin prevail them so land becam pharaoh s 47 21 as peopl he remov them citi one end border egypt even other end thereof 47 22 onli land priest bought he not priest had portion assign them pharaoh did eat their portion which pharaoh gave them wherefor they sold not their land 47 23 then joseph said unto peopl behold i have bought you thi day your land pharaoh lo here is seed you ye shall sow land 47 24 it shall come pass increas that ye shall give fifth part unto pharaoh four part shall be your own seed field your food them your household food your littl one 47 25 they said thou hast save our live let us find grace sight my lord we will be pharaoh s servant 47 26 joseph made it law land egypt unto thi day that pharaoh should have fifth part land priest onli which becam not pharaoh s 47 27 israel dwelt land egypt countri goshen they had possess therein grew multipli exceedingli 47 28 jacob live land egypt seventeen year so whole age jacob wa hundr forti seven year 47 29 time drew nigh that israel must die he call hi son joseph said unto him if now i have found grace thi sight put i pray thee thi hand my thigh deal kindli truli me buri me not i pray thee egypt 47 30 but i will lie my father thou shalt carri me egypt buri me their buryingplac he said i will do as thou hast said 47 31 he said swear unto me he sware unto him israel bow himself bed s head 48 1 it came pass these thing that one told joseph behold thi father is sick he took him hi two son manasseh ephraim 48 2 one told jacob said behold thi son joseph cometh unto thee israel strengthen himself sat bed 48 3 jacob said unto joseph god almighti appear unto me luz land canaan bless me 48 4 said unto me behold i will make thee fruit multipli thee i will make thee multitud peopl will give thi land thi seed thee everlast possess 48 5 now thi two son ephraim manasseh which were born unto thee land egypt i came unto thee egypt are mine as reuben simeon they shall be mine 48 6 thi issu which thou begettest them shall be thine shall be call name their brethren their inherit 48 7 as me when i came padan rachel die me land canaan way when yet there wa but littl way come unto ephrath i buri her there way ephrath same is bethlehem 48 8 israel beheld joseph s son said who are these 48 9 joseph said unto hi father they are my son whom god hath given me thi place he said bring them i pray thee unto me i will bless them 48 10 now eye israel were dim age so that he could not see he brought them near unto him he kiss them embrac them 48 11 hi hand wittingli manasseh wa firstborn 48 15 he bless joseph said god whom my father abraham isaac did walk god which fed me all my life long unto thi day 48 16 angel which redeem me all evil bless lad let my name be name them name my father abraham isaac let them grow multitud midst earth 48 17 when joseph saw that hi father laid hi right hand head ephraim it displeas him he held hi father s hand remov it ephraim s head unto manasseh s head 48 18 joseph said unto hi father not so my father thi is firstborn put thi right hand hi head 48 19 hi father refus said i know it my son i know it he also shall becom peopl he also shall be great but truli hi younger brother shall be greater than he hi seed shall becom multitud nation 48 20 he bless them that day say thee shall israel bless say god honour be not thou unit their anger they slew man their selfwil they dig down wall 49 7 curs be their anger it wa fierc their wrath it wa cruel i will divid them jacob scatter them israel 49 8 judah thou art he whom thi brethren shall prais thi hand shall be neck thine enemi thi father s children shall bow down thee 49 9 judah is lion s whelp prey my son thou art gone he stoop down he couch as lion as old lion who shall rous him 49 10 sceptr shall not depart judah nor lawgiv hi feet shiloh come unto him shall gather peopl be 49 11 bind hi foal unto vine hi ass s colt unto choic vine he wash hi garment wine hi cloth blood grape 49 12 hi eye shall be red wine hi teeth white milk 49 13 zebulun shall dwell haven sea he shall be haven ship hi border shall be unto zidon 49 14 issachar is strong ass couch down two burden 49 15 he saw that rest wa good land that it wa pleasant bow hi shoulder bear becam servant unto tribut 49 16 dan shall judg hi peopl as one tribe israel 49 17 dan hi bread shall be fat he shall yield royal dainti 49 21 naphtali is hind let loos he giveth goodli word 49 22 joseph is fruit bough even fruit bough well whose branch run wall 49 23 archer have sore that wa separ hi brethren 49 27 benjamin shall ravin as wolf morn he shall devour prey night he shall divid spoil 49 28 all these are twelv tribe israel thi is it that their father spake unto them thought evil against me but god meant it unto good bring pass as it is thi day save much peopl aliv 50 21 now therefor fear ye not i will nourish you your littl one he comfort them spake kindli unto bone henc 50 26 so joseph die be hundr ten year old they embalm him he wa put coffin egypt second book mose call exodu 1 1 now these are name children israel which came egypt everi man hi household came jacob 1 2 reuben simeon levi judah 1 3 issachar zebulun benjamin 1 4 dan naphtali gad asher 1 5 all soul that came loin jacob were seventi soul joseph wa egypt alreadi 1 6 joseph die all hi brethren all that gener 1 7 children israel were fruit increas abundantli multipli wax exceed mighti land wa fill them 1 8 now there aros new king egypt which knew not joseph 1 9 he said unto hi peopl behold peopl children israel are more mightier than we 1 10 come let us deal wise them lest they multipli it come pass that when there falleth ani war they join also unto our enemi fight against us so get them land 1 11 therefor they did set them taskmast afflict them their burden they built pharaoh treasur citi pithom raams 1 12 but more they afflict them more they multipli grew they were griev becaus children israel 1 13 egyptian made children israel serv rigour 1 14 they made their live bitter hard bondag morter brick all manner servic field all their servic wherein they made them serv wa rigour 1 15 king egypt spake hebrew midwiv which name one wa shiphrah name other puah 1 16 he said when ye do offic midwif hebrew women see them stool if it be son then ye shall kill him but if it be daughter then she shall live 1 17 but midwiv fear god did not as king egypt command them but save men children aliv 1 18 king egypt call midwiv said unto them whi have ye done thi thing have save men children aliv 1 19 midwiv said unto pharaoh becaus hebrew women are not as egyptian women they are live are deliv ere midwiv come unto them 1 20 therefor god dealt well midwiv peopl multipli wax veri mighti 1 21 it came pass becaus midwiv fear god that he made them hous 1 22 pharaoh charg all hi peopl say everi son that is born ye shall cast river everi daughter ye shall save aliv 2 1 there went man hous levi took wife daughter levi 2 2 woman conceiv bare son when she saw him that he wa goodli child she hid him three month 2 3 when she could not longer hide him she took him ark bulrush daub it slime pitch put child therein she laid it flag river s brink 2 4 hi sister stood afar off wit what would be done him 2 5 daughter pharaoh came down wash herself river her maiden walk river s side when she saw ark flag she sent her maid fetch it 2 6 when she had open it she saw child behold babe wept she had compass him said thi is one hebrew children 2 7 then said hi sister pharaoh s daughter shall i go call thee nurs hebrew women that she may nurs child thee 2 8 pharaoh s daughter said her go maid went call child s mother 2 9 pharaoh s daughter said unto her take thi child away nurs it me i will give thee thi wage woman took child nurs it 2 10 child grew she brought him unto pharaoh s daughter he becam her son she call hi name mose she said becaus i drew him water 2 11 it came pass those day when mose wa grown that he went unto hi brethren look their burden he spi egyptian smite hebrew one hi brethren 2 12 he look thi way that way when he saw that there wa no man he slew egyptian hid him sand 2 13 when he went second day behold two men hebrew strove togeth he said him that did wrong wherefor smitest thou thi fellow 2 14 he said who made thee princ judg us intendest thou kill me as thou killedst egyptian mose fear said sure thi thing is known 2 15 now when pharaoh heard thi thing he sought slay mose but mose fled face pharaoh dwelt land midian he sat down well 2 16 now priest midian had seven daughter they came drew water fill trough water their father s flock 2 17 shepherd came drove them away but mose stood help them water their flock 2 18 when they came reuel their father he said how is it that ye are come so soon day 2 19 they said egyptian deliv us hand shepherd also drew water enough us water flock 2 20 he said unto hi daughter where is he whi is it that ye have left man call him that he may eat bread 2 21 mose wa content dwell man he gave mose zipporah hi daughter 2 22 she bare him son he call hi name gershom he said i have been stranger strang land 2 23 it came pass process time that king egypt die children israel sigh reason bondag they cri their cri came unto god reason bondag 2 24 god heard their groan god rememb hi coven abraham isaac jacob 2 25 god look children israel god had respect unto them 3 1 now mose kept flock jethro hi father law priest midian he led flock backsid desert came mountain god even horeb 3 2 angel lord appear unto him flame fire midst bush he look behold bush burn fire bush wa not consum 3 3 mose said i will now turn asid see thi great sight whi bush is not burnt 3 4 when lord saw that he turn asid see god call unto him midst bush said mose mose he said here am i 3 5 he said draw not nigh hither put off thi shoe off thi feet place whereon thou standest is holi ground 3 6 moreov he said i am god thi father god abraham god isaac god jacob mose hid hi face he wa afraid look god 3 7 lord said i have sure seen afflict my peopl which are egypt have heard their cri reason their taskmast i know idl therefor they cri say let us go sacrific our god 5 9 let there more work be laid men that they may labour therein let them not regard vain word 5 10 taskmast peopl went their offic they spake peopl say thu saith pharaoh i will not give you straw 5 11 go ye get you straw where ye can find it yet not ought your work shall be diminish 5 12 so peopl were scatter abroad all land egypt gather requir they spoil egyptian 12 37 children israel journey rames succoth six hundr thousand foot that were men besid children 12 38 mix multitud went also them flock herd even veri much cattl 12 39 they who dwelt egypt wa four hundr thirti year 12 41 it came pass end four hundr thirti year even selfsam day it came pass that all host lord went land egypt 12 42 it is night be much observ unto lord servant that is bought money when thou hast circumcis him then shall he eat thereof 12 45 foreign hire servant shall not eat thereof 12 46 one hous shall it be eaten thou shalt not carri forth ought flesh abroad hous neither shall ye break bone thereof 12 47 all congreg israel shall keep it 12 48 when stranger shall sojourn thee will keep passov lord let all hi male be circumcis then let him come near keep it he shall be as one that is born land no uncircumcis person shall eat thereof 12 49 one law shall be him that is homeborn unto stranger that sojourneth you 12 50 thu did all children israel as lord command mose aaron so did they 12 51 it came pass selfsam day that lord did bring children israel land egypt their armi 13 1 lord spake unto mose say 13 2 sanctifi unto me all firstborn whatsoev openeth womb children israel both man beast it is mine 13 3 mose said unto peopl rememb thi day which ye came egypt hous bondag strength hand lord brought you thi place there shall no leaven bread be eaten 13 4 thi day came ye month abib 13 5 it shall be when lord shall bring thee land canaanit hittit amorit hivit jebusit which he sware unto thi father give thee land flow milk honey that thou shalt keep thi servic thi month 13 6 seven day thou shalt eat unleaven bread seventh day shall be feast lord 13 7 unleaven bread shall be eaten seven day there shall no leaven bread be seen thee neither shall there be leaven seen thee all thi quarter 13 8 thou shalt shew thi son that day say thi is done becaus that which lord did unto me when i came forth egypt 13 9 it shall be sign unto thee thine hand memori thine eye that lord s law may be thi mouth strong hand hath lord brought thee egypt 13 10 thou shalt therefor keep thi ordin hi season year year 13 11 it shall be when lord shall be lord s 13 13 everi firstl ass thou shalt redeem lamb if thou wilt not redeem it then thou shalt break hi neck all firstborn man thi children shalt thou redeem 13 14 it shall be when thi son asketh thee time come say what is thi that thou shalt say unto him strength hand lord brought us egypt hous bondag 13 15 it came pass when pharaoh would hardli let us go that lord slew all firstborn land egypt both firstborn man firstborn beast therefor i sacrific lord all that openeth matrix be male but all firstborn my children i redeem 13 16 it shall be token thine hand frontlet thine eye strength hand lord brought us forth egypt 13 17 it came pass when pharaoh had let peopl go that god led them not way land philistin although that wa near god said lest peradventur peopl repent when they see war they return egypt 13 18 but god led peopl way wilder red sea children israel went har land egypt 13 19 mose took bone joseph him he had straitli sworn children israel say god will sure visit you ye shall carri my bone away henc you 13 20 they took their journey succoth encamp etham edg wilder 13 21 lord went them day pillar cloud lead them way night pillar fire give them light go day night 13 neighbour s 20 18 all peopl saw thunder lightn nois trumpet mountain smoke when peopl saw it they remov stood afar off 20 19 they said unto mose speak thou us we will hear but let not god speak us lest we die 20 20 mose said unto peopl fear not god is come prove you that hi fear may be your face that ye sin not 20 21 peopl stood afar off mose drew near unto thick dark where god wa 20 22 lord said unto mose thu thou shalt say unto children israel ye have seen that i have talk you heaven 20 23 ye shall not make me god silver neither shall ye make unto you god gold 20 24 altar earth thou which thou shalt set them 21 2 if thou buy hebrew servant six year he shall serv seventh he shall go free noth 21 3 if he came himself he shall go himself if he were marri then hi wife shall go him 21 4 if hi master have given him wife she have born him son or daughter wife her children shall be her master s he shall go himself 21 5 if servant shall plainli say i love my master my wife my children i will not go free 21 6 then hi master shall bring him unto judg he shall also bring him door or unto door post hi master shall bore hi ear aul he shall serv him ever 21 7 if man sell hi daughter be maidserv she shall not go as menserv do 21 8 if she pleas not her master who hath betroth her himself then shall he let her be redeem sell her unto strang nation he shall have no power see he hath dealt deceit her 21 9 if he have betroth her unto hi son he shall deal her manner daughter 21 10 if he take him anoth wife her food her raiment her duti marriag shall he not diminish 21 11 if he do not these three unto her then shall she go free money 21 12 he that smiteth man so that he die shall be sure put death 21 13 if man lie not wait but god deliv him hi hand then i will appoint thee place whither he shall flee 21 14 but if man come presumptu hi neighbour slay him guil thou shalt take him mine altar that he may die 21 15 he that smiteth hi father or hi mother shall be sure put death 21 16 he that stealeth man selleth him or if he be found hi hand he shall sure be put death 21 17 he that curseth hi father or hi mother shall sure be put death 21 18 if men strive togeth one smite anoth stone or hi fist he die not but keepeth hi bed 21 19 if he rise again walk abroad hi staff then shall he that smote him be quit onli he shall pay loss hi time shall caus him be thoroughli heal 21 20 if man smite hi servant or hi maid rod he die hi hand he shall be sure punish 21 21 notwithstand if he continu day or two he shall not be punish he is hi money 21 22 if men strive hurt woman child so that her fruit depart her yet no mischief follow he shall be sure punish accord as woman s husband will lay him he shall pay as judg determin 21 23 if ani mischief follow then thou shalt give life life 21 24 eye eye tooth tooth hand hand foot foot 21 25 burn burn wound wound stripe stripe 21 26 if man smite eye hi servant or eye hi maid that it perish he shall let him go free hi eye s sake 21 27 if he smite hi manserv s tooth or hi maidserv s tooth he shall let him go free hi tooth s sake 21 28 if ox gore man or woman that they die then ox shall be sure stone hi flesh shall not be eaten but owner ox shall be quit 21 29 but if ox were wont push hi horn time past it hath been testifi hi owner he hath not kept him but that he hath kill man or woman ox shall be stone hi owner also shall be put death 21 30 if there be laid him sum money then he shall give ransom hi life whatsoev is laid him 21 31 he have gore son or have gore daughter accord thi judgment shall it be done unto him 21 32 if ox shall push manserv or maidserv he shall give unto their master thirti shekel silver ox shall be stone 21 33 if man shall open pit or if man shall dig pit not cover it ox or ass fall therein 21 34 owner pit shall make it good give money unto owner them dead beast shall be hi 21 35 if one man s ox hurt anoth s that he die then they shall sell live ox divid money it dead ox also they shall divid 21 36 or if it be known that ox hath use push time past hi owner hath not kept him he shall sure pay ox ox dead shall be hi own 22 1 if man shall steal ox or sheep kill it or sell it he shall restor five oxen ox four sheep sheep 22 2 if thief be found break be smitten that he die there shall no blood be shed him 22 3 if sun be risen him there shall be blood shed him he should make full restitut if he have noth then he shall be sold hi theft 22 4 if theft be certainli found hi hand aliv it be ox or ass or sheep he shall restor doubl 22 5 if man shall caus field or vineyard be eaten shall put hi beast shall feed anoth man s field best hi own field best hi own vineyard shall he make restitut 22 6 if fire break catch thorn so that stack corn or stand corn or field be consum therewith he that kindl fire shall sure make restitut 22 7 if man shall deliv unto hi neighbour money or stuff keep it be stolen man s hous if thief be found let him pay doubl 22 8 if thief be not found then master hous shall be brought unto judg see he have put hi hand unto hi neighbour s good 22 9 all manner trespass it be ox ass sheep raiment or ani manner lost thing which anoth challengeth be hi caus both parti shall come judg whom judg shall condemn he shall pay doubl unto hi neighbour 22 10 if man deliv unto hi neighbour ass or ox or sheep or ani beast keep it die or be hurt or driven away no man see it 22 11 then shall oath lord be them both that he hath not put hi hand unto hi neighbour s good owner it shall accept thereof he shall not make it good 22 12 if it be stolen him he shall make restitut unto owner thereof 22 13 if it be torn piec then let him bring it wit he shall not make good that which wa torn 22 14 if man borrow ought hi neighbour it be hurt or die owner thereof be not it he shall sure make it good 22 15 but if owner thereof be it he shall not make it good if it be hire thing it came hi hire 22 16 if man entic maid that is not betroth lie her he shall sure endow her be hi wife 22 17 if her father utterli refus give her unto him he shall pay money accord dowri virgin 22 18 thou shalt not suffer witch live 22 19 whosoev lieth beast shall sure be put death 22 20 he that sacrificeth unto ani god save unto lord onli he shall be utterli destroy 22 21 thou shalt neither vex stranger nor oppress him ye were stranger land egypt 22 22 ye shall not afflict ani widow or fatherless child 22 23 if thou afflict them ani wise they cri all unto me i will sure hear their cri 22 24 my wrath shall wax hot i will kill you sword your wive shall be widow your children fatherless 22 25 if thou lend money ani my peopl that is poor thee thou shalt not be him as usur neither shalt thou lay him usuri 22 26 if thou all take thi neighbour raiment pledg thou shalt deliv it unto him that sun goeth down 22 27 that is hi cover onli it is hi raiment hi skin wherein shall he sleep it shall come pass when he crieth unto me that i will hear i am graciou 22 28 thou shalt not revil god nor curs ruler thi peopl 22 29 thou shalt not delay offer first thi ripe fruit thi liquor firstborn thi son shalt thou give unto me 22 30 likewis shalt thou do thine oxen thi sheep seven day it shall be hi dam eighth day thou shalt give it me 22 31 ye shall be holi men unto me neither shall ye eat ani flesh that is torn beast field ye shall cast it dog 23 1 thou shalt not rais fals report put not thine hand wick be unright wit 23 2 thou shalt not follow multitud do evil neither shalt thou speak caus declin mani wrest judgment 23 3 neither shalt thou counten poor man hi caus 23 4 if thou meet thine enemi s ox or hi ass go astray thou shalt sure bring it back him again 23 5 if thou see ass him that hateth thee lie hi burden wouldest forbear help him thou shalt sure help him 23 6 thou shalt not wrest judgment thi poor hi caus 23 7 keep thee far fals matter innoc righteou slay thou not i will not justifi wick 23 8 thou shalt take no gift gift blindeth wise perverteth word righteou 23 9 also thou shalt not oppress stranger ye know heart stranger see ye were stranger land egypt 23 10 six year thou shalt sow thi land shalt gather fruit thereof 23 11 but seventh year thou shalt let it rest lie still that poor thi peopl may eat what they leav beast field shall eat like manner thou shalt deal thi vineyard thi oliveyard 23 12 six day thou shalt do thi work seventh day thou shalt rest that thine ox thine ass may rest son thi handmaid stranger may be refresh 23 13 all thing that i have said unto you be circumspect make no mention name other god neither let it be heard thi mouth 23 14 three time thou shalt keep feast unto me year 23 15 thou shalt keep feast unleaven bread thou shalt eat unleaven bread seven day as i command thee time appoint month abib it thou camest egypt none shall appear me empti 23 16 feast harvest firstfruit thi labour which thou hast sown field feast ingath which is end year when thou hast gather thi labour field 23 17 three time year all thi male shall appear lord god 23 18 thou shalt not offer blood my sacrific leaven bread neither shall fat my sacrific remain morn 23 19 first firstfruit thi land thou shalt bring hous lord thi god thou shalt not seeth kid hi mother s milk 23 20 behold i send angel thee keep thee way bring thee place which i have prepar 23 21 bewar him obey hi voic provok him not he will not pardon your transgress my name is him 23 22 but if thou shalt inde obey hi voic do all that i speak then i will be enemi unto thine enemi adversari unto thine adversari 23 23 mine angel shall go thee bring thee unto amorit hittit perizzit canaanit hivit jebusit i will cut them off 23 24 thou shalt not bow down their god nor serv them nor do their work but thou shalt utterli overthrow them quit break down their imag 23 25 ye shall serv lord your god he shall bless thi bread thi water i will take sick away midst thee 23 26 there shall noth cast their young nor be barren thi land number thi day i will fulfil 23 27 i will send my fear thee will destroy all peopl whom thou shalt come i will make all thine enemi turn their back unto thee 23 28 i will send hornet thee which shall drive hivit canaanit hittit thee 23 29 i will not drive them thee one year lest land becom desol beast field multipli against thee 23 30 littl littl i will drive them thee thou be increas god 23 33 they shall not dwell thi land lest they make thee sin against me if thou serv their god it will sure be snare unto thee 24 1 he said unto mose come unto lord thou aaron nadab abihu seventi elder israel worship ye afar off 24 2 mose alon shall come near lord but they shall not come nigh neither shall peopl go him 24 3 mose came told peopl all word lord all judgment all peopl answer one voic said all word which lord hath said will we do 24 4 mose wrote all word lord rose earli morn build altar hill twelv pillar accord twelv tribe israel 24 5 he sent young men children israel which stood door tabernacl lord talk mose 33 10 all peopl saw cloudi pillar stand tabernacl door all peopl rose worship everi man hi tent door 33 11 lord spake unto mose face face as man speaketh unto hi friend he turn again camp but hi servant joshua son nun young man depart not tabernacl 33 12 mose said unto lord see thou sayest unto me bring thi peopl thou hast not let me know whom thou wilt send me yet thou hast said i know thee name thou hast also found grace my sight 33 13 now therefor i pray thee if i have found grace thi sight shew me now thi way that i may know thee that i may find grace thi sight consid that thi nation is thi peopl 33 14 he said my presenc shall go thee i will give thee rest 33 15 he said unto him if thi presenc go not me carri us not henc 33 16 wherein shall it be known here that i thi peopl have found grace thi sight is it not that thou goest us so shall we be separ i thi peopl all peopl that are face earth 33 17 lord said unto mose i will do thi thing also that thou hast spoken thou hast found grace my sight i know thee name 33 18 he said i beseech thee shew me thi glori 33 19 he said i will make all my good pass thee i will proclaim name lord thee will be graciou whom i will be graciou will shew merci whom i will shew merci 33 20 he said thou canst not see my face there shall no man see me live 33 21 lord said behold there is place me thou shalt stand rock 33 22 it shall come pass while my glori passeth that i will put thee clift rock will cover thee my hand while i pass 33 23 i will take away mine hand thou shalt see my back part but my face shall not be seen 34 1 lord said unto mose hew thee two tabl stone like unto first i will write these tabl word that were first tabl which thou brakest 34 2 be readi morn come morn unto mount sinai present thyself there me top mount 34 3 no man shall come thee neither let ani man be seen all mount neither let flock nor herd feed that mount 34 4 he hew two tabl stone like unto first mose rose earli morn went unto mount sinai as lord had command him took hi hand two tabl stone 34 5 lord descend cloud stood him there proclaim name lord 34 6 lord pass him proclaim lord lord god merci graciou longsuff abund good truth 34 7 keep merci thousand forgiv iniqu transgress sin that will no mean clear guilti visit iniqu father children children s children unto third fourth gener 34 8 mose made hast bow hi head earth worship 34 9 he said if now i have found grace thi sight o lord let my lord i pray thee go us it is stiffneck peopl pardon our iniqu our sin take us thine inherit 34 10 he said behold i make coven all thi peopl i will do marvel such as have not been done all earth nor ani nation all peopl which thou art shall see work lord it is terribl thing that i will do thee 34 11 observ thou that which i command thee thi day behold i drive thee amorit canaanit hittit perizzit hivit jebusit 34 12 take heed thyself lest thou make coven inhabit land whither thou goest lest it be snare midst thee 34 13 but ye shall destroy their altar break their imag cut down their grove 34 14 thou shalt worship no other god lord whose name is jealou is jealou god 34 15 lest thou make coven inhabit land they go whore their god do sacrific unto their god one call thee thou eat hi sacrific 34 16 thou take their daughter unto thi son their daughter go whore their god make thi son go whore their god
