that openeth matrix is mine everi firstl thi cattl ox or sheep that is male 34 20 but firstl ass thou shalt redeem lamb if thou redeem him not then shalt thou break hi neck all firstborn thi son thou shalt redeem none shall appear me empti 34 21 six day thou shalt work but seventh day thou shalt rest ear time harvest thou shalt rest 34 22 thou shalt observ feast week firstfruit wheat harvest feast face shone while he talk him 34 30 when aaron all children israel saw mose behold skin hi face shone they were afraid come nigh him 34 31 mose call unto them aaron all ruler congreg return unto him lord priest shall make aton hi sin that he hath commit it shall be forgiven him 5 1 if soul sin hear voic swear is wit he hath seen or known it if he do not utter it then he shall bear hi iniqu 5 2 or if soul touch ani unclean thing it be carcas unclean beast or carcas unclean cattl or carcas unclean creep thing if it be hidden him he also shall be unclean guilti 5 3 or if he touch unclean man whatsoev unclean it be that man shall be defil withal it be hid him when he knoweth it then he shall be guilti 5 4 or if soul swear pronounc hi lip do evil or do good whatsoev it be that man shall pronounc oath it be hid him when he knoweth it then he shall be guilti one these 5 5 it shall be when he shall be guilti one these thing that he shall confess that he hath sin that thing 5 6 he shall bring hi trespass offer unto lord hi sin which he hath sin femal flock lamb or kid goat sin offer priest shall make aton him concern hi sin 5 7 if he be not abl bring lamb then he shall bring hi trespass which he hath commit two turtledov or two young pigeon unto lord one sin offer other burnt offer 5 8 he shall bring them unto priest who shall offer that which is sin offer first wring off hi head hi neck but shall not divid it asund 5 9 he shall sprinkl blood sin offer side altar rest blood shall be wrung bottom altar it is sin offer 5 10 he shall offer second burnt offer accord manner priest shall make aton him hi sin which he hath sin it shall be forgiven him 5 11 but if he be not abl bring two turtledov or two young pigeon then he that sin shall bring hi offer tenth part ephah fine flour sin offer he shall put no oil it neither shall he put ani frankincens thereon it is sin offer 5 12 then shall he bring it priest priest shall take hi hand it even memori thereof burn it lord spake unto mose say 5 15 if soul commit trespass sin ignor holi thing lord then he shall bring hi trespass unto lord ram blemish flock thi estim shekel silver shekel sanctuari trespass offer 5 16 he shall make amend harm that he hath done holi thing shall add fifth part thereto give it unto priest priest shall make aton him ram trespass offer it shall be forgiven him 5 17 if soul sin commit ani these thing which are forbidden be done command lord though he wist it not yet is he guilti shall bear hi iniqu 5 18 he shall bring ram blemish flock thi estim trespass offer unto priest priest shall make aton him concern hi ignor wherein he er wist it not it shall be forgiven him 5 19 it is trespass offer he hath certainli trespass against lord 6 1 lord spake unto mose say 6 2 if soul sin commit trespass against lord lie unto hi neighbour that which wa deliv him keep or fellowship or thing taken away violenc or hath deceiv hi neighbour 6 3 or have found that which wa lost lieth concern it sweareth fals ani all these that man doeth sin therein 6 4 then it shall be becaus he hath sin is guilti that he shall restor that which he took violent away or thing which he hath deceit gotten or that which wa deliv him keep or lost thing which he found 6 5 or all that which he hath sworn fals he shall even restor it princip shall add fifth part more thereto give it unto him whom it appertaineth day hi trespass offer 6 6 he shall bring hi trespass offer unto lord ram blemish flock thi estim trespass offer unto priest 6 7 priest shall make aton him lord it shall be forgiven him ani thing all that he hath done trespass therein 6 8 lord spake unto mose say 6 9 command aaron hi son say thi is law burnt offer it is burnt offer becaus burn altar all night unto morn fire altar shall be burn it 6 10 priest shall put hi linen garment hi linen breech shall he put hi flesh take ash which fire hath consum burnt offer altar he shall put them besid altar 6 11 he shall put off hi garment put other garment carri forth ash camp unto clean place 6 12 fire altar shall be burn it it shall not be put priest shall burn wood it everi morn lay burnt offer order it he shall burn thereon fat peac offer 6 13 fire shall ever be burn altar it shall never go 6 14 thi is law meat offer son aaron shall offer it lord altar 6 15 he shall take it hi hand flour meat offer oil thereof all should it have been accept sight lord 10 20 when mose heard that he wa content 11 1 lord spake unto mose aaron say unto them 11 2 speak unto children israel say these are beast which ye shall eat all beast that are earth 11 3 whatsoev parteth hoof is clovenfoot cheweth cud beast that shall ye eat 11 4 nevertheless these shall ye not eat them that chew cud or them that divid hoof as camel becaus he cheweth cud but divideth not hoof he is unclean unto you 11 5 coney becaus he cheweth cud but divideth not hoof he is unclean unto you 11 6 hare becaus he cheweth cud but divideth not hoof he is unclean unto you 11 7 swine though he divid hoof be clovenfoot yet he cheweth not cud he is unclean you 11 8 their flesh shall ye not eat their carcas shall ye not touch they are unclean you 11 9 these shall ye eat all that are water whatsoev hath fin scale water sea river them shall ye eat 11 10 all that have not fin scale sea river all that move water ani live thing which is water they shall be abomin unto you 11 11 they shall be even abomin unto you ye shall not eat their flesh but ye shall have their carcas abomin 11 12 whatsoev hath no fin nor scale water that shall be abomin unto you 11 13 these are they which ye shall have abomin fowl they shall not be eaten they are abomin eagl ossifrag ospray 11 14 vultur kite hi kind 11 15 everi raven hi kind 11 16 owl night hawk cuckow hawk hi kind 11 17 littl owl cormor great owl 11 18 swan pelican gier eagl 11 19 stork heron her kind lapw bat 11 20 all fowl that creep go all four shall be abomin unto you 11 21 yet these may ye eat everi fli creep thing that goeth all four which have leg their feet leap withal earth 11 22 even these them ye may eat locust hi kind bald locust hi kind beetl hi kind grasshopp hi kind 11 23 but all other fli creep thing which have four feet shall be abomin unto you 11 24 these ye shall be unclean whosoev toucheth carcas them shall be unclean even 11 25 whosoev beareth ought carcas them shall wash hi cloth be unclean even 11 26 carcas everi beast which divideth hoof is not clovenfoot nor cheweth cud are unclean unto you everi one that toucheth them shall be unclean 11 27 whatsoev goeth hi paw all manner beast that go all four those are unclean unto you whoso toucheth their carcas shall be unclean even 11 28 he that beareth carcas them shall wash hi cloth be unclean even they are unclean unto you 11 29 these also shall be unclean unto you creep thing that creep earth weasel mous tortois hi kind 11 30 ferret chameleon lizard snail mole 11 31 these are unclean you all that creep whosoev doth touch them when they be dead shall be unclean even 11 32 whatsoev ani them when they are dead doth fall it shall be unclean it be ani vessel wood or raiment or skin or sack whatsoev vessel it be wherein ani work is done it must be put water it shall be unclean even so it shall be cleans 11 33 everi earthen vessel whereinto ani them falleth whatsoev is it shall be unclean ye shall break it 11 34 all meat which may be eaten that which such water cometh shall be unclean all drink that may be drunk everi such vessel shall be unclean 11 35 everi thing whereupon ani part their carcas falleth shall be unclean it be oven or rang pot they shall be broken down they are unclean shall be unclean unto you 11 36 nevertheless fountain or pit wherein there is plenti water shall be clean but that which toucheth their carcas shall be unclean 11 37 if ani part their carcas fall ani sow seed which is be sown it shall be clean 11 38 but if ani water be put seed ani part their carcas fall thereon it shall be unclean unto you 11 39 if ani beast which ye may eat die he that toucheth carcas thereof shall be unclean even 11 40 he that eateth carcas it shall wash hi cloth be unclean even he also that beareth carcas it shall wash hi cloth be unclean even 11 41 everi creep thing that creepeth earth shall be abomin it shall not be eaten 11 42 whatsoev goeth belli whatsoev goeth all four or whatsoev hath more feet all creep thing that creep earth them ye shall not eat they are abomin 11 43 ye shall not make yourselv abomin ani creep thing that creepeth neither shall ye make yourselv unclean them that ye should be defil therebi 11 44 i am lord your god ye shall therefor sanctifi yourselv ye shall be holi i am holi neither shall ye defil yourselv ani manner creep thing that creepeth earth 11 45 i am lord that bringeth you land egypt be your god ye shall therefor be holi i am holi 11 46 thi is law beast fowl everi live creatur that moveth water everi creatur that creepeth earth 11 47 make differ unclean clean beast that may be eaten beast that may not be eaten 12 1 lord spake unto mose say 12 2 speak unto children israel say if woman have conceiv seed born man child then she shall be unclean seven day accord day separ her infirm shall she be unclean 12 3 eighth day flesh hi foreskin shall be circumcis 12 4 she shall then continu blood her purifi three thirti day she shall touch no hallow thing nor come sanctuari day her purifi be fulfil 12 5 but if she bear maid child then she shall be unclean two week as her separ she shall continu blood her purifi threescor six day 12 6 when day her purifi are fulfil son or daughter she shall bring lamb first year burnt offer young pigeon or turtledov sin offer unto door tabernacl congreg unto priest 12 7 who shall offer it lord make aton her she shall be cleans issu her blood thi is law her that hath born male or femal 12 8 if she be not abl bring lamb then she shall bring two turtl or two young pigeon one burnt offer other sin offer priest shall make aton her she shall be clean 13 1 lord spake unto mose aaron say 13 2 when man shall have skin hi flesh rise scab or bright spot it be skin hi flesh like plagu leprosi then he shall be brought unto aaron priest or unto one hi son priest 13 3 priest shall look plagu skin flesh when hair plagu is turn white plagu sight be deeper than skin hi flesh it is plagu leprosi priest shall look him pronounc him unclean 13 4 if bright spot be white skin hi flesh sight be not deeper than skin hair thereof be not turn white then priest shall shut him that hath plagu seven day 13 5 priest shall look him seventh day behold if plagu hi sight be stay plagu spread not skin then priest shall shut him seven day more 13 6 priest shall look him again seventh day behold if plagu be somewhat dark plagu spread not skin priest shall pronounc him clean it is but scab he shall wash hi cloth be clean 13 7 but if scab spread much abroad skin that he hath been seen priest hi cleans he shall be seen priest again 13 8 if priest see that behold scab spreadeth skin then priest shall pronounc him unclean it is leprosi 13 9 when plagu leprosi is man then he shall be brought unto priest 13 10 priest shall see him behold if rise be white skin it have turn hair white there be quick raw flesh rise 13 11 it is old leprosi skin hi flesh priest shall pronounc him unclean shall not shut him he is unclean 13 12 if leprosi break abroad skin leprosi cover all skin him that hath plagu hi head even hi foot wheresoev priest looketh 13 13 then priest shall consid behold if leprosi have cover all hi flesh he shall pronounc him clean that hath plagu it is all turn white he is clean 13 14 but when raw flesh appeareth him he shall be unclean 13 15 priest shall see raw flesh pronounc him be unclean raw flesh is unclean it is leprosi 13 16 or if raw flesh turn again be chang unto white he shall come unto priest 13 17 priest shall see him behold if plagu be turn white then priest shall pronounc him clean that hath plagu he is clean 13 18 flesh also which even skin thereof wa boil is heal 13 19 place boil there be white rise or bright spot white somewhat reddish it be shew priest 13 20 if when priest seeth it behold it be sight lower than skin hair thereof be turn white priest shall pronounc him unclean it is plagu leprosi broken boil 13 21 but if priest look it behold there be no white hair therein if it be not lower than skin but be somewhat dark then priest shall shut him seven day 13 22 if it spread much abroad skin then priest shall pronounc him unclean it is plagu 13 23 but if bright spot stay hi place spread not it is burn boil priest shall pronounc him clean 13 24 or if there be ani flesh skin whereof there is hot burn quick flesh that burneth have white bright spot somewhat reddish or white 13 25 then priest shall look it behold if hair bright spot be turn white it be sight deeper than skin it is leprosi broken burn wherefor priest shall pronounc him unclean it is plagu leprosi 13 26 but if priest look it behold there be no white hair bright spot it be no lower than other skin but be somewhat dark then priest shall shut him seven day 13 27 priest shall look him seventh day if it be spread much abroad skin then priest shall pronounc him unclean it is plagu leprosi 13 28 if bright spot stay hi place spread not skin but it be somewhat dark it is rise burn priest shall pronounc him clean it is inflamm burn 13 29 if man or woman have plagu head or beard 13 30 then priest shall see plagu behold if it be sight deeper than skin there be it yellow thin hair then priest shall pronounc him unclean it is dri scall even leprosi head or beard 13 31 if priest look plagu scall behold it be not sight deeper than skin that there is no black hair it then priest shall shut him that hath plagu scall seven day 13 32 seventh day priest shall look plagu behold if scall spread not there be it no yellow hair scall be not sight deeper than skin 13 33 he shall be shaven but scall shall he not shave priest shall shut him that hath scall seven day more 13 34 seventh day priest shall look scall behold if scall be not spread skin nor be sight deeper than skin then priest shall pronounc him clean he shall wash hi cloth be clean 13 35 but if scall spread much skin hi cleans 13 36 then priest shall look him behold if scall be spread skin priest shall not seek yellow hair he is unclean 13 37 but if scall be hi sight stay that there is black hair grown therein scall is heal he is clean priest shall pronounc him clean 13 38 if man also or woman have skin their flesh bright spot even white bright spot 13 39 then priest shall look behold if bright spot skin their flesh be darkish white it is freckl spot that groweth skin he is clean 13 40 man whose hair is fallen off hi head he is bald yet is he clean 13 41 he that hath hi hair fallen off part hi head hi face he is forehead bald yet is he clean 13 42 if there be bald head or bald forehead white reddish sore it is leprosi sprung hi bald head or hi bald forehead 13 43 then priest shall look it behold if rise sore be white reddish hi bald head or hi bald forehead as leprosi appeareth skin flesh 13 44 he is leprou man he is unclean priest shall pronounc him utterli unclean hi plagu is hi head 13 45 leper whom plagu is hi cloth shall be rent hi head bare he shall put cover hi upper lip shall cri unclean unclean 13 46 all day wherein plagu shall be him he shall be defil he is unclean he shall dwell alon camp shall hi habit be 13 47 garment also that plagu leprosi is it be woollen garment or linen garment 13 48 it be warp or woof linen or woollen skin or ani thing made skin 13 49 if plagu be greenish or reddish garment or skin either warp or woof or ani thing skin it is plagu leprosi shall be shew unto priest 13 50 priest shall look plagu shut it that hath plagu seven day 13 51 he shall look plagu seventh day if plagu be spread garment either warp or woof or skin or ani work that is made skin plagu is fret leprosi it is unclean 13 52 he shall therefor burn that garment warp or woof woollen or linen or ani thing skin wherein plagu is it is fret leprosi it shall be burnt fire 13 53 if priest shall look behold plagu be not spread garment either warp or woof or ani thing skin 13 54 then priest shall command that they wash thing wherein plagu is he shall shut it seven day more 13 55 priest shall look plagu that it is wash behold if plagu have not chang hi colour plagu be not spread it is unclean thou shalt burn it fire it is fret inward it be bare or 13 56 if priest look behold plagu be somewhat dark wash it then he shall rend it garment or skin or warp or woof 13 57 if it appear still garment either warp or woof or ani thing skin it is spread plagu thou shalt burn that wherein plagu is fire 13 58 garment either warp or woof or whatsoev thing skin it be which thou shalt wash if plagu be depart them then it shall be wash second time shall be clean 13 59 thi is law plagu leprosi garment woollen or linen either warp or woof or ani thing skin pronounc it clean or pronounc it unclean 14 1 lord spake unto mose say him that is be cleans two bird aliv clean cedar wood scarlet hyssop 14 5 priest shall command that one bird be kill earthen vessel run water 14 6 as live bird he shall take it cedar wood scarlet that is be cleans shall wash hi cloth shave off all hi hair wash himself water that he may be clean that he shall come camp shall tarri abroad hi tent seven day 14 9 but it shall be seventh day that spake unto mose unto aaron say 14 34 when ye be come land canaan which i give you possess i put plagu leprosi hous land your possess 14 35 he that owneth hous shall come tell priest say it seemeth me there is as it were plagu hous 14 36 then priest shall command that they empti hous priest go it see plagu that all that is hous be not made unclean afterward priest shall go see hous 14 37 he shall look plagu behold if plagu be wall hous hollow strake greenish or reddish which sight are lower than wall 14 38 then priest shall go hous door hous shut hous seven day 14 39 priest shall come again seventh day shall look behold if plagu be spread wall hous 14 40 then priest shall command that they take away stone which plagu is they shall cast them unclean place citi 14 41 he shall caus hous be scrape round they shall pour dust that they scrape off citi unclean place 14 42 they shall take other stone put them place those stone he shall take other morter shall plaister hous 14 43 if plagu come again break hous that he hath taken away stone he hath scrape hous it is plaister 14 44 then priest shall come look behold if plagu be spread hous it is fret leprosi hous it is unclean 14 45 he shall break down hous stone it timber thereof all morter hous he shall carri them forth citi unclean place 14 46 moreov he that goeth hous all while that it is shut shall be unclean even 14 47 he that lieth hous shall wash hi cloth he that eateth hous shall wash hi cloth 14 48 if priest shall come look it behold plagu hath not spread hous hous wa plaister then priest shall pronounc hous clean becaus plagu is heal 14 49 he shall take cleans hous two bird cedar wood scarlet hyssop 14 50 he shall kill one bird earthen vessel run water 14 51 he shall take cedar wood hyssop scarlet live bird aton hous it shall be clean 14 54 thi is law all manner plagu leprosi scall 14 55 leprosi garment hous 14 56 rise scab bright spot 14 57 teach when it is unclean when it is clean thi is law leprosi 15 1 lord spake unto mose aaron say 15 2 speak unto children israel say unto them when ani man hath run issu hi flesh becaus hi issu he is unclean 15 3 thi shall be hi unclean hi issu hi flesh run hi issu or hi flesh be stop hi issu it is hi unclean 15 4 everi bed whereon he lieth that hath issu is unclean everi thing whereon he sitteth shall be unclean 15 5 whosoev toucheth hi bed shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 6 he that sitteth ani thing whereon he sat that hath issu shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 7 he that toucheth flesh him that hath issu shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 8 if he that hath issu spit him that is clean then he shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 9 what saddl soever he rideth that hath issu shall be unclean 15 10 whosoev toucheth ani thing that wa him shall be unclean even he that beareth ani those thing shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 11 whomsoev he toucheth that hath issu hath not rins hi hand water he shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 12 vessel earth that he toucheth which hath issu shall be broken everi vessel wood shall be rins water 15 13 when he that hath issu is cleans hi issu then he shall number himself seven day hi cleans wash hi cloth bath hi flesh run water shall be clean 15 14 eighth day he shall take him two turtledov or two young pigeon come lord unto door tabernacl congreg give them unto priest 15 15 priest shall offer them one sin offer other burnt offer priest shall make aton him shall be unclean even 15 20 everi thing that she lieth her separ shall be unclean everi thing also that she sitteth shall be unclean 15 21 whosoev toucheth her bed shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 22 whosoev toucheth ani thing that she sat shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 23 if it be her bed or ani thing whereon she sitteth when he toucheth it he shall be unclean even 15 24 if ani man lie her all her flower be him he shall be unclean seven day all bed whereon he lieth shall be unclean 15 25 if woman have issu her blood mani day time her separ or if it run time her separ all day issu her unclean shall be as day her separ she shall be unclean 15 26 everi bed whereon she lieth all day her issu shall be unto her as bed her separ whatsoev she sitteth shall be unclean as unclean her separ 15 27 whosoev toucheth those thing shall be unclean shall wash hi cloth bath himself water be unclean even 15 28 but if she be cleans her issu then she shall number herself seven day that she shall be clean 15 29 eighth day she shall take unto her two turtl or two young pigeon bring them unto priest door tabernacl congreg 15 30 priest shall offer one sin offer other burnt offer priest shall make aton her lord issu her unclean 15 31 thu shall ye separ children israel their unclean that they die not their unclean when they defil my tabernacl that is them 15 32 thi is law him that hath issu him whose seed goeth him is defil therewith 15 33 her that is sick her flower him that hath issu man woman him that lieth her that is unclean 16 1 lord he shall be cut off hi peopl 23 30 whatsoev soul it be that doeth ani work that same day same soul will i destroy hi peopl 23 31 ye shall do no manner work it shall be statut ever your gener all your it shall be aaron s hi son they shall eat it holi place it is most holi unto him offer lord made fire perpetu statut 24 10 son israelitish woman whose father wa egyptian went children israel thi son israelitish woman man israel strove togeth camp 24 11 israelitish woman s son blasphem name lord curs they brought him unto mose hi mother s name wa shelomith daughter dibri tribe dan 24 12 they put him ward that mind lord might be shew them 24 13 lord spake unto mose say 24 14 bring forth him that hath curs camp let all that heard him lay their hand hi head let all congreg stone him 24 15 thou shalt speak unto children israel say whosoev curseth hi god shall bear hi sin 24 16 he that blasphemeth name lord he shall sure be put death all congreg shall certainli stone him as well stranger as he that is born land when he blasphemeth name lord shall be put death 24 17 he that killeth ani man shall sure be put death 24 18 he that killeth beast shall make it good beast beast 24 19 if man caus blemish hi neighbour as he hath done so shall it be done him 24 20 breach breach eye eye tooth tooth as he hath caus blemish man so shall it be done him again 24 21 he that killeth beast he shall restor it he that killeth man he shall be put death 24 22 ye shall have one manner law as well stranger as one your own countri i am lord your god 24 23 mose spake children israel that they should bring forth him that had curs camp stone him stone children israel did as lord command mose 25 1 lord spake unto mose mount sinai say 25 2 speak unto children israel say unto them when ye come land which i give you then shall land keep sabbath unto lord 25 3 six year thou shalt sow thi field six year thou shalt prune thi vineyard gather fruit thereof 25 4 but seventh year shall be sabbath rest unto land sabbath lord thou shalt neither sow thi field nor prune thi vineyard 25 5 that which groweth it own accord thi harvest thou shalt not reap neither gather grape thi vine undress it is year rest unto land 25 6 sabbath land shall be meat you thee thi servant thi maid thi hire servant thi stranger that sojourneth thee 25 7 thi cattl beast that are thi land shall all increas thereof be meat 25 8 thou shalt number seven sabbath year unto thee seven time seven year space seven sabbath year shall be unto thee forti nine year 25 9 then shalt thou caus trumpet jubil sound tenth day seventh month day aton shall ye make trumpet sound all your land 25 10 ye shall hallow fiftieth year proclaim liberti all land unto all inhabit thereof it shall be jubil unto you ye shall return everi man unto hi possess ye shall return everi man unto hi famili 25 11 jubil shall that fiftieth year be unto you ye shall not sow neither reap that which groweth itself it nor gather grape it thi vine undress 25 12 it is jubil it shall be holi unto you ye shall eat increas thereof field 25 13 year thi jubil ye shall return everi man unto hi possess 25 14 if thou sell ought unto thi neighbour or buyest ought thi neighbour hand ye shall not oppress one anoth 25 15 accord number year jubil thou shalt buy thi neighbour accord unto number year fruit he shall sell unto thee 25 16 accord multitud year thou shalt increas price thereof accord few year thou shalt diminish price it accord number year fruit doth he sell unto thee 25 17 ye shall not therefor oppress one anoth but thou shalt fear thi god i am lord your god 25 18 wherefor ye shall do my statut keep my judgment do them ye shall dwell land safeti 25 19 land shall yield her fruit ye shall eat your fill dwell therein safeti 25 20 if ye shall say what shall we eat seventh year behold we shall not sow nor gather our increas 25 21 then i will command my bless you sixth year it shall bring forth fruit three year 25 22 ye shall sow eighth year eat yet old fruit ninth year her fruit come ye shall eat old store 25 23 land shall not be sold ever land is mine ye are stranger sojourn me 25 24 all land your possess ye shall grant redempt land 25 25 if thi brother be waxen poor hath sold away some hi possess if ani hi kin come redeem it then shall he redeem that which hi brother sold 25 26 if man have none redeem it himself be abl redeem it 25 27 then let him count year sale thereof restor overplu unto man whom he sold it that he may return unto hi possess 25 28 but if he be not abl restor it him then that which is sold shall remain hand him that hath bought it year jubil jubil it shall go he shall return unto hi possess 25 29 if man sell dwell hous wall citi then he may redeem it whole year it is sold full year may he redeem it 25 30 if it be not redeem space full year then hous that is wall citi shall be establish ever him that bought it hi gener it shall not go jubil 25 31 but hous villag which have no wall round them shall be count as field countri they may be redeem they shall go jubil 25 32 notwithstand citi levit hous citi their possess may levit redeem ani time 25 33 if man purchas levit then hous that wa sold citi hi possess shall go year jubil hous citi levit are their possess children israel 25 34 but field suburb their citi may not be sold it is their perpetu possess 25 35 if thi brother be waxen poor fallen decay thee then thou shalt reliev him yea though he be stranger or sojourn that he may live thee 25 36 take thou no usuri him or increas but fear thi god that thi brother may live thee 25 37 thou shalt not give him thi money usuri nor lend him thi victual increas 25 38 i am lord your god which brought you forth land egypt give you land canaan be your god 25 39 if thi brother that dwelleth thee be waxen poor be sold unto thee thou shalt not compel him serv as bondserv 25 40 but as hire servant as sojourn he shall be thee shall serv thee unto year jubil 25 41 then shall he depart thee both he hi children him shall return unto hi own famili unto possess hi father shall he return 25 42 they are my servant which i brought forth land egypt they shall not be sold as bondmen 25 43 thou shalt not rule him rigour but shalt fear thi god 25 44 both thi bondmen thi bondmaid which thou shalt have shall be heathen that are round you them shall ye buy bondmen bondmaid 25 45 moreov children stranger that do sojourn you them shall ye buy their famili that are you which they begat your land they shall be your possess 25 46 ye shall take them as inherit your children you inherit them possess they shall be your bondmen ever but your brethren children israel ye shall not rule one anoth rigour 25 47 if sojourn or stranger wax rich thee thi brother that dwelleth him wax poor sell himself unto stranger or sojourn thee or stock stranger s famili 25 48 that he is sold he may be redeem again one hi brethren may redeem him 25 49 either hi uncl or hi uncl s son may redeem him or ani that is nigh kin unto him hi famili may redeem him or if he be abl he may redeem himself 25 50 he shall reckon him that bought him year that he wa sold him unto year jubil price hi sale shall be accord unto number year accord time hire servant shall it be him 25 51 if there be yet mani year behind accord unto them he shall give again price hi redempt money that he wa bought 25 52 if there remain but few year unto year jubil then he shall count him accord unto hi year shall he give him again price hi redempt 25 53 as yearli hire servant shall he be him other shall not rule rigour him thi sight 25 54 if he be not redeem these year then he shall go year jubil both he hi children him 25 55 unto me children israel are servant they are my servant whom i brought forth land egypt i am lord your god 26 1 ye shall make you no idol nor graven imag neither rear you stand imag neither shall ye set ani imag stone your land bow down unto it i am lord your god 26 2 ye shall keep my sabbath rever my sanctuari i am lord 26 3 if ye walk my statut keep my command do them 26 4 then i will give you rain due season land shall yield her increas tree field shall yield their fruit 26 5 your thresh shall reach unto vintag vintag shall reach unto sow time ye shall eat your bread full dwell your land safe 26 6 i will give peac land ye shall lie down none shall make you afraid i will rid evil beast land neither shall sword go your land 26 7 ye shall chase your enemi they shall fall you sword 26 8 five you shall chase hundr hundr you shall put ten thousand flight your enemi shall fall you sword 26 9 i will have respect unto you make you fruit multipli you establish my coven you 26 10 ye shall eat old store bring forth old becaus new 26 11 i set my tabernacl you my soul shall not abhor you 26 12 i will walk you will be your god ye shall be my peopl 26 13 i am lord your god which brought you forth land egypt that ye should not be their bondmen i have broken band your yoke made you go upright 26 14 but if ye will not hearken unto me will not do all these command 26 15 if ye shall despis my statut or if your soul abhor my judgment so that ye will not do all my command but that ye break my coven 26 16 i also will do thi unto you i will even appoint you terror consumpt burn agu that shall consum eye caus sorrow heart ye shall sow your seed vain your enemi shall eat it 26 17 i will set my face against you ye shall be slain your enemi they that hate you shall reign you ye shall flee when none pursueth you 26 18 if ye will not yet all thi hearken unto me then i will punish you seven time more your sin 26 19 i will break pride your power i will make your heaven as iron your earth as brass 26 20 your strength shall be spent vain your land shall not yield her increas neither shall tree land yield their fruit 26 21 if ye walk contrari unto me will not hearken unto me i will bring seven time more plagu you accord your sin 26 22 i will also send wild beast you which shall rob you your children destroy your cattl make you few number your high way shall be desol 26 23 if ye will not be reform me these thing but will walk contrari unto me 26 24 then will i also walk contrari unto you will punish you yet seven time your sin 26 25 i will bring sword you that shall aveng quarrel my coven when ye are gather togeth your citi i will send pestil you ye shall be deliv hand enemi 26 26 when i have broken staff your bread ten women shall bake your bread one oven they shall deliv you your bread again weight ye shall eat not be satisfi 26 27 if ye will not all thi hearken unto me but walk contrari unto me 26 28 then i will walk contrari unto you also furi i even i will chastis you seven time your sin 26 29 ye shall eat flesh your son flesh your daughter shall ye eat 26 30 i will destroy your high place cut down your imag cast your carcas carcas your idol my soul shall abhor you 26 31 i will make your citi wast bring your sanctuari unto desol i will not smell savour your sweet odour 26 32 i will bring land desol your enemi which dwell therein shall be astonish it 26 33 i will scatter you heathen will draw sword you your land shall be desol your citi wast 26 34 then shall land enjoy her sabbath as long as it lieth desol ye be your enemi land even then shall land rest enjoy her sabbath 26 35 as long as it lieth desol it shall rest becaus it did not rest your sabbath when ye dwelt it 26 36 them that are left aliv you i will send faint their heart land their enemi sound shaken leaf shall chase them they shall flee as flee sword they shall fall when none pursueth 26 37 they shall fall one anoth as it were sword when none pursueth ye shall have no power stand your enemi 26 38 ye shall perish heathen land your enemi shall eat you 26 39 they that are left you shall pine away their iniqu your enemi land also iniqu their father shall they pine away them 26 40 if they shall confess their iniqu iniqu their father their trespass which they trespass against me that also they have walk contrari unto me 26 41 that i also have walk contrari unto them have brought them land their enemi if then their uncircumcis heart be humbl they then accept punish their iniqu 26 42 then will i rememb my coven jacob also my coven isaac also my coven abraham will i rememb i will rememb land 26 43 land also shall be left them shall enjoy her sabbath while she lieth desol them they shall accept punish their iniqu becaus even becaus they despis my judgment becaus their soul abhor my statut 26 44 yet all that when they be land their enemi i will not cast them away neither will i abhor them destroy them utterli break my coven them i am lord their god 26 45 but i will their sake rememb coven their ancestor whom i brought forth land egypt sight heathen that i might be their god i am lord 26 46 these are statut judgment law which lord made him children israel mount sinai hand mose 27 1 lord spake unto mose say 27 2 speak unto children israel say unto them when man shall make singular vow person shall be lord thi estim 27 3 thi estim shall be male twenti year old even unto sixti year old even thi estim shall be fifti shekel silver shekel sanctuari 27 4 if it be femal then thi estim shall be thirti shekel 27 5 if it be five year old even unto twenti year old then thi estim shall be male twenti shekel femal ten shekel 27 6 if it be month old even unto five year old then thi estim shall be male five shekel silver femal thi estim shall be three shekel silver 27 7 if it be sixti year old if it be male then thi estim shall be fifteen shekel femal ten shekel 27 8 but if he be poorer than thi estim then he shall present himself priest priest shall valu him accord hi abil that vow shall priest valu him 27 9 if it be beast whereof men bring offer unto lord all that ani man giveth such unto lord shall be holi 27 10 he shall not alter it nor chang it good bad or bad good if he shall all chang beast beast then it exchang thereof shall be holi 27 11 if it be ani unclean beast which they do not offer sacrific unto lord then he shall present beast priest 27 12 priest shall valu it it be good or bad as thou valuest it who art priest so shall it be 27 13 but if he will all redeem it then he shall add fifth part thereof unto thi estim 27 14 when man shall sanctifi hi hous be holi unto lord then priest shall estim it it be good or bad as priest shall estim it so shall it stand 27 15 if he that sanctifi it will redeem hi hous then he shall add fifth part money thi estim unto it it shall be hi 27 16 if man shall sanctifi unto lord some part field hi possess then thi estim shall be accord seed thereof homer barley seed shall be valu fifti shekel silver 27 17 if he sanctifi hi field year jubil accord thi estim it shall stand 27 18 but if he sanctifi hi field jubil then priest shall reckon unto him money accord year that remain even unto year jubil it shall be abat thi estim 27 19 if he that sanctifi field will ani wise redeem it then he shall add fifth part money thi estim unto it it shall be assur him 27 20 if he will not redeem field or if he have sold field anoth man it shall not be redeem ani more 27 21 but field when it goeth jubil shall be holi unto lord as field devot possess thereof shall be priest s 27 22 if man sanctifi unto lord field which he hath bought which is not field hi possess 27 23 then priest shall reckon unto him worth thi estim even unto year jubil he shall give thine estim that day as holi thing unto lord 27 24 year jubil field shall return unto him whom it wa bought even him whom possess land did belong 27 25 all thi estim shall be accord shekel sanctuari twenti gerah shall be shekel 27 26 onli firstl beast which should be lord s firstl no man shall sanctifi it it be ox or sheep it is lord s 27 27 if it be unclean beast then he shall redeem it accord thine estim shall add fifth part it thereto or if it be not redeem then it shall be sold accord thi estim 27 28 notwithstand no devot thing that man shall devot unto lord all that he hath both man beast field hi possess shall be sold or redeem everi devot thing is most holi unto lord 27 29 none devot which shall be devot men shall be redeem but shall sure be put death 27 30 all tith land seed land or fruit tree is lord s it is holi unto lord 27 31 if man will all redeem ought hi tith he shall add thereto fifth part thereof 27 32 concern tith herd or flock even whatsoev passeth rod tenth shall be holi unto lord 27 33 he shall not search it be good or bad neither shall he chang it if he chang it all then both it chang thereof shall be holi it shall not be redeem 27 34 these are command which lord command mose children israel mount sinai fourth book mose call number 1 1 lord spake unto mose tabl shewbread they shall spread cloth blue put thereon dish spoon bowl cover cover withal continu bread shall be thereon 4 8 they shall spread them cloth scarlet cover same cover badger skin shall put stave thereof 4 9 they shall take cloth blue cover candlestick light hi lamp hi tong hi snuffdish all oil vessel thereof wherewith they minist unto it 4 10 they shall put it all vessel thereof cover badger skin shall put it bar 4 11 golden altar they shall spread cloth blue cover it cover badger skin shall put stave thereof 4 12 they shall take all instrument ministri wherewith they minist sanctuari put them cloth blue cover them cover badger skin shall put them bar 4 13 they shall take away ash altar spread purpl cloth thereon 4 14 they shall put it all vessel thereof wherewith they minist it even censer fleshhook shovel bason all vessel altar they shall spread it cover badger skin put stave it 4 15 when aaron hi son have made end cover sanctuari all vessel sanctuari as camp is set forward that son kohath shall come bear it but they shall not touch ani holi thing lest they die these thing are burden son kohath tabernacl congreg 4 16 offic eleazar son aaron priest pertaineth oil light sweet incens daili meat offer anoint oil oversight all tabernacl all that therein is sanctuari vessel thereof 4 17 lord spake unto mose unto aaron say 4 18 cut ye not off tribe famili kohathit levit 4 19 but thu do unto them that they may live not die when they approach unto most holi thing aaron hi son shall go appoint them everi one hi servic hi burden 4 20 but they shall not go see when holi thing are cover lest they die 4 21 lord spake unto mose say 4 22 take also sum son gershon hous their father their famili 4 23 thirti year old upward fifti year old shalt thou number them all that enter perform servic do work tabernacl congreg 4 24 thi is servic famili gershonit serv burden 4 25 they shall bear curtain tabernacl tabernacl congreg hi cover cover badger skin that is it hang door tabernacl congreg 4 26 hang court hang door gate court which is tabernacl altar round their cord all instrument their servic all that is made them so shall they serv 4 27 appoint aaron hi son shall be all servic son gershonit all their burden all their servic ye shall appoint unto them charg all their burden 4 28 thi is servic famili son gershon tabernacl congreg their charg shall be hand ithamar son aaron priest 4 29 as son merari thou shalt number them their famili hous their father 4 30 thirti year old upward even unto fifti year old shalt thou number them everi one that entereth servic do work tabernacl congreg 4 31 thi is charg their burden accord all their servic tabernacl congreg board tabernacl bar thereof pillar thereof socket thereof 4 32 pillar court round their socket their pin their cord all their instrument all their servic name ye shall reckon instrument charg their burden 4 33 thi is servic famili son merari accord all their servic tabernacl lord they were number hand mose everi one accord hi servic accord hi burden thu were they number him as lord command mose 5 1 lord spake unto mose say 5 2 command children israel that they put camp everi leper everi one that hath issu whosoev is defil dead 5 3 both male femal shall ye put camp shall ye put them that they defil not their camp midst whereof i dwell 5 4 children israel did so put them camp as lord spake unto mose so did children israel 5 5 lord spake unto mose say 5 6 speak unto children israel when man or woman shall commit ani sin that men commit do trespass against lord that person be guilti 5 7 then they shall confess their sin which they have done he shall recompens hi trespass princip thereof add unto it fifth part thereof give it unto him against whom he hath trespass 5 8 but if man have no kinsman recompens trespass unto let trespass be recompens unto lord even priest besid ram aton wherebi aton shall be made him 5 9 everi offer all holi thing children israel which they bring unto priest shall be hi 5 10 everi man s hallow thing shall be hi whatsoev ani man giveth priest it shall be hi 5 11 lord spake unto mose say 5 12 speak unto children israel say unto them if ani man s wife go asid commit trespass against him 5 13 man lie her carnal it be hid eye her husband be kept close she be defil there be no wit against her neither she be taken manner 5 14 spirit jealousi come him he be jealou hi wife she be defil or if spirit jealousi come him he be jealou hi wife she be not defil 5 15 then shall man bring hi wife unto priest he shall bring her offer her tenth part ephah barley meal he shall pour no oil it nor put frankincens thereon it is offer jealousi offer memori bring iniqu remembr 5 16 priest shall bring her near set her lord 5 17 priest shall take holi water earthen vessel dust that is floor tabernacl priest shall take put it water 5 18 priest shall set woman lord uncov woman s head put offer memori her hand which is jealousi offer priest shall have hi hand bitter water that causeth curs 5 19 priest shall charg her oath say unto woman if no man have lain thee if thou hast not gone asid unclean anoth instead thi husband be thou free thi bitter water that causeth curs 5 20 but if thou hast gone asid anoth instead thi husband if thou be defil some man have lain thee besid thine husband 5 21 then priest shall charg woman oath curs priest shall say unto woman lord make thee curs oath thi peopl when lord doth make thi thigh rot thi belli swell 5 22 thi water that causeth curs shall go thi bowel make thi belli swell thi thigh rot woman shall say amen amen 5 23 priest shall write these curs book he shall blot them bitter water 5 24 he shall caus woman drink bitter water that causeth curs water that causeth curs shall enter her becom bitter 5 25 then priest shall take jealousi offer woman s hand shall wave offer lord offer it altar 5 26 priest shall take hand offer even memori thereof burn it altar afterward shall caus woman drink water 5 27 when he hath made her drink water then it shall come pass that if she be defil have done trespass against her husband that water that causeth curs shall enter her becom bitter her belli shall swell her thigh shall rot woman shall be curs her peopl 5 28 if woman be not defil but be clean then she shall be free shall conceiv seed 5 29 thi is law jealousi when wife goeth asid anoth instead her husband is defil 5 30 or when spirit jealousi cometh him he be jealou hi wife shall set woman lord priest shall execut her all thi law 5 31 then shall man be guiltless iniqu thi woman shall bear her iniqu 6 1 lord spake unto mose say 6 2 speak unto children israel say unto them when either man or woman shall separ themselv vow vow nazarit separ themselv unto lord 6 3 he shall separ himself wine strong drink shall drink no vinegar wine or vinegar strong drink neither shall he drink ani liquor grape nor eat moist grape or dri 6 4 all day hi separ shall he eat noth that is made vine tree kernel even husk 6 5 all day vow hi separ there shall no razor come hi head day be fulfil which he separateth himself unto lord he shall be holi shall let lock hair hi head grow 6 6 all day that he separateth himself unto lord he shall come no dead bodi 6 7 he shall not make himself unclean hi father or hi mother hi brother or hi sister when they die becaus consecr hi god is hi head 6 8 all day hi separ he is holi unto lord 6 9 if ani man die veri suddenli him he hath defil head hi consecr then he shall shave hi head day hi cleans seventh day shall he shave it 6 10 eighth day he shall bring two turtl or two young pigeon priest door tabernacl congreg 6 11 priest shall offer one sin offer other burnt offer make aton him that he sin dead shall hallow hi head that same day 6 12 he shall consecr unto lord day hi separ shall bring lamb first year trespass offer but day that were shall be lost becaus hi separ wa defil 6 13 thi is law nazarit when day hi separ are fulfil he shall be brought unto door tabernacl congreg 6 14 he shall offer hi offer unto lord one he lamb first year blemish burnt offer one ewe lamb first year blemish sin offer one ram blemish peac offer 6 15 shall get accord vow which he vow so he must do law hi separ 6 22 lord spake unto mose say 6 23 speak unto aaron unto hi son say thi wise ye shall bless children israel say unto them 6 24 lord bless thee keep thee 6 25 lord make hi face shine thee be graciou unto thee 6 26 lord lift hi counten thee give thee peac 6 27 they shall put my name children israel i will bless them 7 1 it came pass day levit touch their charg 9 1 lord spake unto mose wilder sinai first month second year they were come land egypt say 9 2 let children israel also keep passov hi appoint season 9 3 fourteenth day thi month even ye shall keep it hi appoint season accord all rite it accord all ceremoni thereof shall ye keep it 9 4 mose spake unto children israel that they should keep passov 9 5 they kept passov fourteenth day first month even wilder sinai accord all that lord command mose so did children israel 9 6 there were certain men who were defil dead bodi man that they could not keep passov that day they came mose aaron that day 9 7 those men said unto him we are defil dead bodi man wherefor are we kept back that we may not offer offer lord hi appoint season children israel 9 8 mose said unto them stand still i will hear what lord will command concern you 9 9 lord spake unto mose say 9 10 speak unto children israel say if ani man you or your poster shall be unclean reason dead bodi or be journey afar off yet he shall keep passov unto lord 9 11 fourteenth day second month even they shall keep it eat it unleaven bread bitter herb 9 12 they shall leav none it unto morn nor break ani bone it accord all ordin passov they shall keep it 9 13 but man that is clean is not journey forbeareth keep passov even same soul shall be cut off hi peopl becaus he brought not offer lord hi appoint season that man shall bear hi sin 9 14 if stranger shall sojourn you will keep passov unto lord accord ordin passov accord manner thereof so shall he do ye shall have one ordin both stranger him that wa born land 9 15 day that tabernacl wa rear cloud cover tabernacl name tent testimoni even there wa tabernacl as it were appear fire morn 9 16 so it wa alway cloud cover it day appear fire night 9 17 when cloud wa taken tabernacl then that children israel journey place where cloud abod there children israel pitch their tent 9 18 command lord children israel journey command lord they pitch as long as cloud abod tabernacl they rest their tent 9 19 when cloud tarri long tabernacl mani day then children israel kept charg lord journey not 9 20 so it wa when cloud wa few day tabernacl accord command lord they abod their tent accord command lord they journey 9 21 so it wa when cloud abod even unto morn that cloud wa taken morn then they journey it wa day or night that cloud wa taken they journey 9 22 or it were two day or month or year that cloud tarri tabernacl remain thereon children israel abod their tent journey not but when it wa taken they journey 9 23 command lord they rest tent command lord they journey they kept charg lord command lord hand mose 10 1 lord spake unto mose say 10 2 make thee two trumpet silver whole piec shalt thou make them that thou mayest use them call assembl journey camp 10 3 when they shall blow them all assembl shall assembl themselv thee door tabernacl congreg 10 4 if they blow but one trumpet then princ which are head thousand israel shall gather themselv unto thee 10 5 when ye blow alarm then camp that lie east part shall go forward 10 6 when ye blow alarm second time then camp that lie south side shall take their journey they shall blow alarm their journey 10 7 but when congreg is be gather togeth ye shall blow but ye shall not sound alarm 10 8 son aaron priest shall blow trumpet they shall be you ordin ever your gener 10 9 if ye go war your land against enemi that oppresseth you then ye shall blow alarm trumpet ye shall be rememb lord your god ye shall be save your enemi 10 10 also day your glad your solemn day begin your month ye shall blow trumpet your burnt offer sacrific your peac offer that they may be you memori your god i am lord your god 10 11 it came pass twentieth day second month second year that cloud wa taken off tabernacl testimoni 10 12 children israel took their journey wilder sinai cloud rest wilder paran 10 13 they first took their journey accord command lord hand mose 10 14 first place went standard camp children judah accord their armi hi host wa nahshon son amminadab 10 15 host tribe children issachar wa nethaneel son zuar 10 16 host tribe children zebulun wa eliab son helon 10 17 tabernacl wa taken down son gershon son merari set forward bear tabernacl 10 18 standard camp reuben set forward accord their armi hi host wa elizur son shedeur 10 19 host tribe children simeon wa shelumiel son zurishaddai 10 20 host tribe children gad wa eliasaph son deuel 10 21 kohathit set forward bear sanctuari other did set tabernacl against they came 10 22 standard camp children ephraim set forward accord their armi hi host wa elishama son ammihud 10 23 host tribe children manasseh wa gamaliel son pedahzur 10 24 host tribe children benjamin wa abidan son gideoni 10 25 standard camp children dan set forward which wa rereward all camp their host hi host wa ahiez son ammishaddai 10 26 host tribe children asher wa pagiel son ocran 10 27 host tribe children naphtali wa ahira son enan 10 28 thu were journey children israel accord their armi when they set forward 10 29 mose said unto hobab son raguel midianit mose father law we are journey unto place which lord said i will give it you come thou us we will do thee good lord hath spoken good concern israel 10 30 he said unto him i will not go but i will depart mine own land my kindr 10 31 he said leav us not i pray thee forasmuch as thou knowest how we are encamp wilder thou mayest be us instead eye 10 32 it shall be if thou go us yea it shall be that what good lord shall do unto us same will we do unto thee 10 33 they depart mount lord three day journey ark coven lord went them three day journey search rest place them 10 34 cloud lord wa them day when they went camp 10 35 it came pass when ark set forward that mose said rise lord let thine enemi be scatter let them that hate thee flee thee 10 36 when it rest he said return o lord unto mani thousand israel 11 1 when peopl complain it displeas lord lord heard it hi anger wa kindl fire lord burnt them consum them that were uttermost part camp 11 2 peopl cri unto mose when mose pray unto lord fire wa quench 11 3 he call name place taberah becaus fire lord burnt them 11 4 mixt multitud that wa them fell lust children israel also wept again said who shall give us flesh eat 11 5 we rememb fish which we did eat egypt freeli cucumb melon leek onion garlick 11 6 but now our soul is dri away there is noth all besid thi manna our eye 11 7 manna wa as coriand seed colour thereof as colour bdellium 11 8 peopl went gather it ground it mill or beat it mortar bake it pan made cake it tast it wa as tast fresh oil 11 9 when dew fell camp night manna fell it 11 10 then mose heard peopl weep their famili everi man door hi tent anger lord wa kindl greatli mose also wa displeas 11 11 mose said unto lord wherefor hast thou afflict thi servant wherefor have i not found favour thi sight that thou layest burden all thi peopl me 11 12 have i conceiv all thi peopl have i begotten them that thou shouldest say unto me carri them thi bosom as nurs father beareth suck child unto land which thou swarest unto their father 11 13 whenc should i have flesh give unto all thi peopl they weep unto me say give us flesh that we may eat 11 14 i am not abl bear all thi peopl alon becaus it is too heavi me 11 15 if thou deal thu me kill me i pray thee hand if i have found favour thi sight let me not see my wretched 11 16 lord said unto mose gather unto me seventi men elder israel whom thou knowest be elder peopl offic them bring them unto tabernacl congreg that they may stand there thee 11 17 i will come down talk thee there i will take spirit which is thee will put it them they shall bear burden peopl thee that thou bear it not thyself alon 11 18 say thou unto peopl sanctifi yourselv against morrow ye shall eat flesh ye have wept ear lord say who shall give us flesh eat it wa well us egypt therefor lord will give you flesh ye shall eat 11 19 ye shall not eat one day nor two day nor five day neither ten day nor twenti day 11 20 but even whole month it come your nostril it be loathsom unto you becaus that ye have despis lord which is you have wept him say whi came we forth egypt 11 21 mose said peopl whom i am are six hundr thousand footmen thou hast said i will give them flesh that they may eat whole month 11 22 shall flock herd be slain them suffic them or shall all fish sea be gather togeth them suffic them 11 23 lord said unto mose is lord s hand wax short thou shalt see now my word shall come pass unto thee or not 11 24 mose went told peopl word lord gather seventi men elder peopl set them round tabernacl 11 25 lord came down cloud spake unto him took spirit that wa him gave it unto seventi elder it came pass that when spirit rest them they prophesi did not ceas 11 26 but there remain two men camp name one wa eldad name other medad spirit rest them they were them that were written but went not unto tabernacl they prophesi camp 11 27 there ran young man told mose said eldad medad do prophesi camp 11 28 joshua son nun servant mose one hi young men answer said my lord mose forbid them 11 29 mose said unto him enviest thou my sake would god that all lord s peopl were prophet that lord would put hi spirit them 11 30 mose gat him camp he elder israel 11 31 there went forth wind lord brought quail sea let them fall camp as it were day s journey thi side as it were day s journey other side round camp as it were two cubit high face earth 11 32 peopl stood all that day all that night all next day they gather quail he that gather least gather ten homer they spread them all abroad themselv round camp 11 33 while flesh wa yet their teeth ere it wa chew wrath lord wa kindl against peopl lord smote peopl veri great plagu 11 34 he call name that place kibrothhattaavah becaus there they buri peopl that lust 11 35 peopl journey kibrothhattaavah unto hazeroth abod hazeroth 12 1 miriam aaron spake against mose becaus ethiopian woman whom he had marri he had marri ethiopian woman 12 2 they said hath lord inde spoken onli mose hath he not spoken also us lord heard it 12 3 now man mose wa veri meek all men which were face earth 12 4 lord spake suddenli unto mose unto aaron unto miriam come ye three unto tabernacl congreg they three came 12 5 lord came down pillar cloud stood door tabernacl call aaron miriam they both came forth 12 6 he said hear now my word if there be prophet you i lord will make myself known unto him vision will speak unto him dream 12 7 my servant mose is not so who is faith all mine hous 12 8 him will i speak mouth mouth even appar not dark speech similitud lord shall he behold wherefor then were ye not afraid speak against my servant mose 12 9 anger lord wa kindl against them he depart 12 10 cloud depart off tabernacl behold miriam becam leprou white as snow aaron look miriam behold she wa leprou 12 11 aaron said unto mose ala my lord i beseech thee lay not sin us wherein we have done foolishli wherein we have sin 12 12 let her not be as one dead whom flesh is half consum when he cometh hi mother s womb 12 13 mose cri unto lord say heal her now o god i beseech thee 12 14 lord said unto mose if her father had but spit her face should she not be asham seven day let her be shut camp seven day that let her be receiv again 12 15 miriam wa shut camp seven day peopl journey not till miriam wa brought again 12 16 afterward peopl remov hazeroth pitch wilder paran 13 1 lord spake unto mose say 13 2 send thou men that they may search land canaan which i give unto children israel everi tribe their father shall ye send man everi one ruler them 13 3 mose command lord sent them wilder paran all those men were head children israel 13 4 these were their name tribe reuben shammua son zaccur 13 5 tribe simeon shaphat son hori 13 6 tribe judah caleb son jephunneh 13 7 tribe issachar igal son joseph 13 8 tribe ephraim oshea son nun 13 9 tribe benjamin palti son raphu 13 10 tribe zebulun gaddiel son sodi 13 11 tribe joseph name tribe manasseh gaddi son susi 13 12 tribe dan ammiel son gemal 13 13 tribe asher sethur son michael 13 14 tribe naphtali nahbi son vophsi 13 15 tribe gad geuel son machi 13 16 these are name men which mose sent spi land mose call oshea son nun jehoshua 13 17 mose sent them spi land canaan said unto them get you thi way southward go mountain 13 18 see land what it is peopl that dwelleth therein they be strong or weak few or mani 13 19 what land is that they dwell it be good or bad what citi they be that they dwell tent or strong hold 13 20 what land is it be fat or lean there be wood therein or not be ye good courag bring fruit land now time wa time firstrip grape 13 21 so they went search land wilder zin unto rehob as men come hamath 13 22 they ascend south came unto hebron where ahiman sheshai talmai children anak were now hebron wa built seven year zoan egypt 13 23 they came unto brook eshcol cut down thenc branch one cluster grape they bare it two staff they brought pomegran fig 13 24 place wa call brook eshcol becaus cluster grape which children israel cut down thenc 13 25 they return search land forti day 13 26 they went came mose aaron all congreg children israel unto wilder paran kadesh brought back word unto them unto all congreg shew them fruit land 13 27 they told him said we came unto land whither thou sentest us sure it floweth milk honey thi is fruit it 13 28 nevertheless peopl be strong that dwell land citi are wall veri great moreov we saw children anak there 13 29 amalekit dwell land south hittit jebusit amorit dwell mountain canaanit dwell sea coast jordan 13 30 caleb still peopl mose said let us go onc possess it we are well abl overcom it 13 31 but men that went him said we be not abl go against peopl they are stronger than we 13 32 they brought evil report land which they had search unto children israel say land which we have gone search it is land that eateth inhabit thereof all peopl that we saw it are men great statur 13 33 there we saw giant son anak which come giant we were our own sight as grasshopp so we were their sight 14 1 all congreg lift their voic cri peopl wept that night 14 2 all children israel murmur against mose against aaron whole congreg said unto them would god that we had die land egypt or would god we had die thi wilder 14 3 wherefor hath lord brought us unto thi land fall sword that our wive our children should be prey were it not better us return egypt 14 4 they said one anoth let us make captain let us return egypt 14 5 then mose aaron fell their face all assembl congreg children israel 14 6 joshua son nun caleb son jephunneh which were them that search land rent their cloth 14 7 they spake unto all compani children israel say land which we pass search it is exceed good land 14 8 if lord delight us then he will bring us thi land give it us land which floweth milk honey 14 9 onli rebel not ye against lord neither fear ye peopl land they are bread us their defenc is depart them lord is us fear them not 14 10 but all congreg bade stone them stone glori lord appear tabernacl congreg all children israel 14 11 lord said unto mose how long will thi peopl provok me how long will it be ere they believ me all sign which i have shew them 14 12 i will smite them pestil disinherit them will make thee greater nation mightier than they 14 13 mose said unto lord then egyptian shall hear it thou broughtest thi peopl thi might them 14 14 they will tell it inhabit thi land they have heard that thou lord art thi peopl that thou lord art seen face face that thi cloud standeth them that thou goest them day time pillar cloud pillar fire night 14 15 now if thou shalt kill all thi peopl as one man then nation which have heard fame thee will speak say 14 16 becaus lord wa not abl bring thi peopl land which he sware unto them therefor he hath slain them wilder 14 17 now i beseech thee let power my lord be great accord as thou hast spoken say 14 18 lord is longsuff great merci forgiv iniqu transgress no mean clear guilti visit iniqu father children unto third fourth gener 14 19 pardon i beseech thee iniqu thi peopl accord unto great thi merci as thou hast forgiven thi peopl egypt even now 14 20 lord said i have pardon accord thi word 14 21 but as truli as i live all earth shall be fill glori lord 14 22 becaus all those men which have seen my glori my miracl which i did egypt wilder have tempt me now these ten time have not hearken my voic 14 23 sure they shall not see land which i sware unto their father neither shall ani them that provok me see it 14 24 but my servant caleb becaus he had anoth spirit him hath follow me fulli him will i bring land whereinto he went hi seed shall possess it 14 25 now amalekit canaanit dwelt valley tomorrow turn you get you wilder way red sea 14 26 lord spake unto mose unto aaron say 14 27 how long shall i bear thi evil congreg which murmur against me i have heard murmur children israel which they murmur against me 14 28 say unto them as truli as i live saith lord as ye have spoken mine ear so will i do you 14 29 your carcas shall fall thi wilder all that were number you accord your whole number twenti year old upward which have murmur against me 14 30 doubtless ye shall not come land concern which i sware make you dwell therein save caleb son jephunneh joshua son nun 14 31 but your littl one which ye said should be prey them will i bring they shall know land which ye have despis 14 32 but as you your carcas they shall fall thi wilder 14 33 your children shall wander wilder forti year bear your whoredom your carcas be wast wilder 14 34 number day which ye search land even forti day each day year shall ye bear your iniqu even forti year ye shall know my breach promis 14 35 i lord have said i will sure do it unto all thi evil congreg that are gather togeth against me thi wilder they shall be consum there they shall die 14 36 men which mose sent search land who return made all congreg murmur against him bring slander land 14 37 even those men that did bring evil report land die plagu lord 14 38 but joshua son nun caleb son jephunneh which were men that went search land live still 14 39 mose told these say unto all children israel peopl mourn greatli 14 40 they rose earli morn gat them top mountain say lo we be here will go unto place which lord hath promis we have sin 14 41 mose said wherefor now do ye transgress command lord but it shall not prosper 14 42 go not lord is not you that ye be not smitten your enemi 14 43 amalekit canaanit are there you ye shall fall sword becaus ye are turn away lord therefor lord will not be you 14 44 but they presum go unto hill top nevertheless ark coven lord mose depart not camp 14 45 then amalekit came down canaanit which dwelt that hill smote them discomfit them even unto hormah 15 1 lord spake unto mose say 15 2 speak unto children israel say unto them when ye be come land your habit which i give unto you 15 3 will make offer fire unto lord burnt offer or sacrific perform vow or freewil offer or your solemn feast make sweet savour unto lord herd or flock 15 4 then shall he that offereth hi offer unto lord bring meat offer tenth deal flour mingl fourth part hin oil 15 5 fourth part hin wine drink offer shalt thou prepar burnt offer or sacrific one lamb 15 6 or ram thou shalt prepar meat offer two tenth deal flour mingl third part hin oil 15 7 drink offer thou shalt offer third part hin wine sweet savour unto lord 15 8 when thou preparest bullock burnt offer or sacrific perform vow or peac offer unto lord 15 9 then shall he bring bullock meat offer three tenth deal flour mingl half hin oil 15 10 thou shalt bring drink offer half hin wine offer made fire sweet savour unto lord 15 11 thu shall it be done one bullock or one ram or lamb or kid 15 12 accord number that ye shall prepar so shall ye do everi one accord their number 15 13 all that are born countri shall do these thing thi manner offer offer made fire sweet savour unto lord 15 14 if stranger sojourn you or whosoev be you your gener will offer offer made fire sweet savour unto lord as ye do so he shall do 15 15 one ordin shall be both you congreg also stranger that sojourneth you ordin ever your gener as ye are so shall stranger be lord 15 16 one law one manner shall be you stranger that sojourneth you er not observ all these command which lord hath spoken unto mose 15 23 even all that lord hath command you hand mose day that lord command mose henceforward your gener 15 24 then it shall be if ought make aton all congreg children israel it shall be forgiven them it is ignor they shall bring their offer sacrific made fire unto lord their sin offer lord their ignor 15 26 it shall be forgiven all sinneth ignorantli when he sinneth ignor lord make aton him it shall be forgiven him 15 29 ye shall have one law him that sinneth ignor both him that is born children israel stranger that sojourneth them 15 30 but soul that doeth ought presumptu he be born land or stranger same reproacheth lord that soul shall be cut off hi peopl 15 31 becaus he hath despis word lord hath broken hi command that soul shall utterli be cut off hi iniqu shall be him 15 32 while children israel were wilder they found man that gather stick sabbath day 15 33 they that found him gather stick brought him unto mose aaron unto all congreg 15 34 they put him ward becaus it wa not declar what should be done him 15 35 lord said unto mose man shall be sure put death all congreg shall stone him stone camp 15 36 all congreg brought him camp stone him stone he die as lord command mose 15 37 lord spake unto mose say 15 38 speak unto children israel bid them that they make them fring border their garment their gener that they put fring border ribband blue 15 39 it shall be unto you fring that ye may look it rememb all command lord do them that ye seek not your own heart your own eye which ye use go whore 15 40 that ye may rememb do all my command be holi unto your god 15 41 i am lord your god which brought you land egypt be your god i am lord your god 16 1 now korah son izhar son kohath son levi dathan abiram son eliab son peleth son reuben took men 16 2 they rose mose certain children israel two hundr fifti princ assembl famou congreg men renown 16 3 they gather themselv togeth against mose against lord hath sent me do all these work i have not done them mine own mind 16 29 if these men die common death all men or if they be visit visit all men then lord hath not sent me 16 30 but if lord make new thing earth open her mouth swallow them all that appertain unto them they go down quick pit then ye shall understand that these men have provok lord 16 31 it came pass as he had made end speak all offer they were made broad plate cover altar 16 40 be memori unto children israel that no stranger which is not seed aaron come near offer incens lord that he be not as korah as hi compani as lord
