unto eleazar priest that he may bring her forth camp one shall slay her hi face 19 4 eleazar priest shall take her blood hi finger sprinkl her blood directli tabernacl congreg seven time 19 5 one shall burn heifer hi sight her skin her flesh her blood her dung shall he burn 19 6 priest shall take cedar wood hyssop scarlet cast it midst burn heifer 19 7 then priest shall wash hi cloth he shall bath hi flesh water afterward he shall come camp priest shall be unclean even 19 8 he that burneth her shall wash hi cloth water bath hi flesh water shall be unclean even 19 9 man that is clean shall gather ash heifer lay them camp clean place it shall be kept congreg children israel water separ it is purif sin 19 10 he that gathereth ash heifer shall wash hi cloth be unclean even it shall be unto children israel unto stranger that sojourneth them statut ever 19 11 he that toucheth dead bodi ani man shall be unclean seven day 19 12 he shall purifi himself it third day seventh day he shall be clean but if he purifi not himself third day then seventh day he shall not be clean 19 13 whosoev toucheth dead bodi ani man that is dead purifieth not himself defileth tabernacl lord that soul shall be cut off israel becaus water separ wa not sprinkl him he shall be unclean hi unclean is yet him 19 14 thi is law when man dieth tent all that come tent all that is tent shall be unclean seven day 19 15 everi open vessel which hath no cover bound it is unclean 19 16 whosoev toucheth one that is slain sword open field or dead bodi or bone man or grave shall be unclean seven day 19 17 unclean person they shall take ash burnt heifer purif sin run water shall be put thereto vessel 19 18 clean person shall take hyssop dip it water sprinkl it tent all vessel person that were there him that touch bone or one slain or one dead or grave 19 19 clean person shall sprinkl unclean third day seventh day seventh day he shall purifi himself wash hi cloth bath himself water shall be clean even 19 20 but man that shall be unclean shall not purifi himself that soul shall be cut off congreg becaus he hath defil sanctuari lord water separ hath not been sprinkl him he is unclean 19 21 it shall be perpetu statut unto them that he that sprinkleth water separ shall wash hi cloth he that toucheth water separ shall be unclean even 19 22 whatsoev unclean person toucheth shall be unclean soul that toucheth it shall be unclean even 20 1 then came children israel even whole congreg desert zin first month peopl abod kadesh miriam die there wa buri there 20 2 there wa no water congreg they gather themselv togeth against mose against aaron 20 3 peopl chode mose spake say would god that we had die when our brethren die lord 20 4 whi have ye brought congreg lord thi wilder that we our cattl should die there 20 5 wherefor have ye made us come egypt bring us unto thi evil place it is no place seed or fig or vine or pomegran neither is there ani water drink 20 6 mose aaron went presenc assembl unto door tabernacl congreg they fell their face glori lord appear unto them 20 7 lord spake unto mose say 20 8 take rod gather thou assembl togeth thou aaron thi brother speak ye unto rock their eye it shall give forth hi water thou shalt bring forth them water rock so thou shalt give congreg their beast drink 20 9 mose took rod lord as he command him 20 10 mose aaron gather congreg togeth rock he said unto them hear now ye rebel must we fetch you water thi rock 20 11 mose lift hi hand hi rod he smote rock twice water came abundantli congreg drank their beast also 20 12 lord spake unto mose aaron becaus ye believ me not sanctifi me eye children israel therefor ye shall not bring thi congreg land which i have given them 20 13 thi is water meribah becaus children israel strove lord he wa sanctifi them 20 14 mose sent messeng kadesh unto king edom thu saith thi brother israel thou knowest all travail that hath befallen us 20 15 how our father went down egypt we have dwelt egypt long time egyptian vex us our father 20 16 when we cri unto lord he heard our voic sent angel hath brought us forth egypt behold we are kadesh citi uttermost thi border 20 17 let us pass i pray thee thi countri we will not pass field or vineyard neither will we drink water well we will go king s high way we will not turn right hand nor left we have pass thi border 20 18 edom said unto him thou shalt not pass me lest i come against thee sword 20 19 children israel said unto him we will go high way if i my cattl drink thi water then i will pay it i will onli do anyth els go my feet 20 20 he said thou shalt not go edom came against him much peopl strong hand 20 21 thu edom refus give israel passag hi border wherefor israel turn away him 20 22 children israel even whole congreg journey kadesh came unto mount hor 20 23 lord spake unto mose aaron mount hor coast land edom say 20 24 aaron shall be gather unto hi peopl he shall not enter land which i have given unto children israel becaus ye rebel against my word water meribah 20 25 take aaron eleazar hi son bring them unto mount hor 20 26 strip aaron hi garment put them eleazar hi son aaron shall be gather unto hi peopl shall die there 20 27 mose did as lord command they went mount hor sight all congreg 20 28 mose strip aaron hi garment put them eleazar hi son aaron die there top mount mose eleazar came down mount 20 29 when all congreg saw that aaron wa dead they mourn aaron thirti day even all hous israel 21 1 when king arad canaanit which dwelt south heard tell that israel came way spi then he fought against israel took some them prison 21 2 israel vow vow unto lord said if thou wilt inde deliv thi peopl my hand then i will utterli destroy their citi 21 3 lord hearken voic israel deliv canaanit they utterli destroy them their citi he call name place hormah 21 4 they journey mount hor way red sea compass land edom soul peopl wa much discourag becaus way 21 5 peopl spake against god against mose wherefor have ye brought us egypt die wilder there is no bread neither is there ani water our soul loatheth thi light bread 21 6 lord sent fieri serpent peopl they bit peopl much peopl israel die 21 7 therefor peopl came mose said we have sin we have spoken against lord against thee pray unto lord that he take away serpent us mose pray peopl 21 8 lord said unto mose make thee fieri serpent set it pole it shall come pass that everi one that is bitten when he looketh it shall live 21 9 mose made serpent brass put it pole it came pass that if serpent had bitten ani man when he beheld serpent brass he live 21 10 children israel set forward pitch oboth 21 11 they journey oboth pitch ijeabarim wilder which is moab sunris 21 12 thenc they remov pitch valley zare 21 13 thenc they remov pitch other side arnon which is wilder that cometh coast amorit arnon is border moab moab amorit 21 14 wherefor it is said book war lord what he did red sea brook arnon 21 15 stream brook that goeth down dwell ar lieth border moab 21 16 thenc they went beer that is well whereof lord spake unto mose gather peopl togeth i will give them water 21 17 then israel sang thi song spring o well sing ye unto it 21 18 princ dig well nobl peopl dig it direct lawgiv their stave wilder they went mattanah 21 19 mattanah nahaliel nahaliel bamoth 21 20 bamoth valley that is countri moab top pisgah which looketh jeshimon 21 21 israel sent messeng unto sihon king amorit say 21 22 let me pass thi land we will not turn field or vineyard we will not drink water well but we will go king s high way we be past thi border 21 23 sihon would not suffer israel pass hi border but sihon gather all hi peopl togeth went against israel wilder he came jahaz fought against israel 21 24 israel smote him edg sword possess hi land arnon unto jabbok even unto children ammon border children ammon wa strong 21 25 israel took all these citi israel dwelt all citi amorit heshbon all villag thereof 21 26 heshbon wa citi sihon king amorit who had fought against former king moab taken all hi land hi hand even unto arnon 21 27 wherefor they that speak proverb say come heshbon let citi sihon be built prepar 21 28 there is fire gone heshbon flame citi sihon it hath consum ar moab lord high place arnon 21 29 woe thee moab thou art undon o peopl chemosh he hath given hi son that escap hi daughter captiv unto sihon king amorit 21 30 we have shot them heshbon is perish even unto dibon we have laid them wast even unto nophah which reacheth unto medeba 21 31 thu israel dwelt land amorit 21 32 mose sent spi jaazer they took villag thereof drove amorit that were there 21 33 they turn went way bashan og king bashan went against them he all hi peopl battl edrei 21 34 lord said unto mose fear him not i have deliv him thi hand all hi peopl hi land thou shalt do him as thou didst unto sihon king amorit which dwelt heshbon 21 35 so they smote him hi son all hi peopl there wa none left him aliv they possess hi land 22 1 children israel set forward pitch plain moab thi side jordan jericho 22 2 balak son zippor saw all that israel had done amorit 22 3 moab wa sore afraid peopl becaus they were mani moab wa distress becaus children israel 22 4 moab said unto elder midian now shall thi compani lick all that are round us as ox licketh grass field balak son zippor wa king moabit that time 22 5 he sent messeng therefor unto balaam son beor pethor which is river land children hi peopl call him say behold there is peopl come egypt behold they cover face earth they abid against me 22 6 come now therefor i pray thee curs me thi peopl they are too mighti me peradventur i shall prevail that we may smite them that i may drive them land i wot that he whom thou blessest is bless he whom thou cursest is curs 22 7 elder moab elder midian depart reward divin their hand they came unto balaam spake unto him word balak 22 8 he said unto them lodg here thi night i will bring you word again as lord shall speak unto me princ moab abod balaam 22 9 god came unto balaam said what men are these thee 22 10 balaam said unto god balak son zippor king moab hath sent unto me say 22 11 behold there is peopl come egypt which covereth face earth come now curs me them peradventur i shall be abl overcom them drive them 22 12 god said unto balaam thou shalt not go them thou shalt not curs peopl they are bless 22 13 balaam rose morn said unto princ balak get you your land lord refuseth give me leav go you 22 14 princ moab rose they went unto balak said balaam refuseth come us 22 15 balak sent yet again princ more more honour than they 22 16 they came balaam said him thu saith balak son zippor let noth i pray thee hinder thee come unto me 22 17 i will promot thee unto veri great honour i will do whatsoev thou sayest unto me come therefor i pray thee curs me thi peopl 22 18 balaam answer said unto servant balak if balak would give me hi hous full silver gold i cannot go word lord my god do less or more 22 19 now therefor i pray you tarri ye also here thi night that i may know what lord will say unto me more 22 20 god came unto balaam night said unto him if men come call thee rise go them but yet word which i shall say unto thee that shalt thou do 22 21 balaam rose morn saddl hi ass went princ moab 22 22 god s anger wa kindl becaus he went angel lord stood way adversari against him now he wa ride hi ass hi two servant were him 22 23 ass saw angel lord stand way hi sword drawn hi hand ass turn asid way went field balaam smote ass turn her way 22 24 but angel lord stood path vineyard wall be thi side wall that side 22 25 when ass saw angel lord she thrust herself unto wall crush balaam s foot against wall he smote her again 22 26 angel lord went further stood narrow place where wa no way turn either right hand or left 22 27 when ass saw angel lord she fell down balaam balaam s anger wa kindl he smote ass staff 22 28 lord open mouth ass she said unto balaam what have i done unto thee that thou hast smitten me these three time 22 29 balaam said unto ass becaus thou hast mock me i would there were sword mine hand now would i kill thee 22 30 ass said unto balaam am not i thine ass which thou hast ridden ever i wa thine unto thi day wa i ever wont do so unto thee he said nay 22 31 then lord open eye balaam he saw angel lord stand way hi sword drawn hi hand he bow down hi head fell flat hi face 22 32 angel lord said unto him wherefor hast thou smitten thine ass these three time behold i went withstand thee becaus thi way is pervers me 22 33 ass saw me turn me these three time unless she had turn me sure now also i had slain thee save her aliv 22 34 balaam said unto angel lord i have sin i knew not that thou stoodest way against me now therefor if it displeas thee i will get me back again 22 35 angel lord said unto balaam go men but onli word that i shall speak unto thee that thou shalt speak so balaam went princ balak 22 36 when balak heard that balaam wa come he went meet him unto citi moab which is border arnon which is utmost coast 22 37 balak said unto balaam did i not earnestli send unto thee call thee wherefor camest thou not unto me am i not abl inde promot thee honour 22 38 balaam said unto balak lo i am come unto thee have i now ani power all say ani thing word that god putteth my mouth that shall i speak 22 39 balaam went balak they came unto kirjathhuzoth 22 40 balak offer oxen sheep sent balaam princ that were him 22 41 it came pass morrow that balak took balaam brought him high place baal that thenc he might see utmost part peopl 23 1 balaam said unto balak build me here seven altar prepar me here seven oxen seven ram 23 2 balak did as balaam had spoken balak balaam offer everi altar bullock ram 23 3 balaam said unto balak stand thi burnt offer i will go peradventur lord will come meet me whatsoev he sheweth me i will tell thee he went high place 23 4 god met balaam he said unto him i have prepar seven altar i have offer everi altar bullock ram 23 5 lord put word balaam s mouth said return unto balak thu thou shalt speak 23 6 he return unto him lo he stood hi burnt sacrific he all princ moab 23 7 he took hi parabl said balak king moab hath brought me aram mountain east say come curs me jacob come defi israel 23 8 how shall i curs whom god hath not curs or how shall i defi whom lord hath not defi 23 9 top rock i see him hill i behold him lo peopl shall dwell alon shall not be reckon nation 23 10 who can count dust jacob number fourth part israel let me die death righteou let my last end be like hi 23 11 balak said unto balaam what hast thou done unto me i took thee curs mine enemi behold thou hast bless them altogeth 23 12 he answer said must i not take heed speak that which lord hath put my mouth 23 13 balak said unto him come i pray thee me unto anoth place whenc thou mayest see them thou shalt see but utmost part them shalt not see them all curs me them thenc 23 14 he brought him field zophim top pisgah built seven altar offer bullock ram everi altar 23 15 he said unto balak stand here thi burnt offer while i meet lord yonder 23 16 lord met balaam put word hi mouth said go again unto balak say thu 23 17 when he came him behold he stood hi burnt offer princ moab him balak said unto him what hath lord spoken 23 18 he took hi parabl said rise balak hear hearken unto me thou son zippor 23 19 god is not man that he should lie neither son man that he should repent hath he said shall he not do it or hath he spoken shall he not make it good 23 20 behold i have receiv command bless he hath bless i cannot revers it 23 21 he hath not beheld iniqu jacob neither hath he seen pervers israel lord hi god is him shout king is them 23 22 god brought them egypt he hath as it were strength unicorn 23 23 sure there is no enchant against jacob neither is there ani divin against israel accord thi time it shall be said jacob israel what hath god wrought 23 24 behold peopl shall rise as great lion lift himself as young lion he shall not lie down he eat prey drink blood slain 23 25 balak said unto balaam neither curs them all nor bless them all 23 26 but balaam answer said unto balak told not i thee say all that lord speaketh that i must do 23 27 balak said unto balaam come i pray thee i will bring thee unto anoth place peradventur it will pleas god that thou mayest curs me them thenc 23 28 balak brought balaam unto top peor that looketh jeshimon 23 29 balaam said unto balak build me here seven altar prepar me here seven bullock seven ram 23 30 balak did as balaam had said offer bullock ram everi altar 24 1 when balaam saw that it pleas lord bless israel he went not as other time seek enchant but he set hi face wilder 24 2 balaam lift hi eye he saw israel abid hi tent accord their tribe spirit god came him 24 3 he took hi parabl said balaam son beor hath said man whose eye are open hath said 24 4 he hath said which heard word god which saw vision almighti fall tranc but have hi eye open 24 5 how goodli are thi tent o jacob thi tabernacl o israel 24 6 as valley are they spread forth as garden river s side as tree lign alo which lord hath plant as cedar tree besid water 24 7 he shall pour water hi bucket hi seed shall be mani water hi king shall be higher than agag hi kingdom shall be exalt 24 8 god brought him forth egypt he hath as it were strength unicorn he shall eat nation hi enemi shall break their bone pierc them hi arrow 24 9 he couch he lay down as lion as great lion who shall stir him bless is he that blesseth thee curs is he that curseth thee 24 10 balak s anger wa kindl against balaam he smote hi hand togeth balak said unto balaam i call thee curs mine enemi behold thou hast altogeth bless them these three time 24 11 therefor now flee thou thi place i thought promot thee unto great honour but lo lord hath kept thee back honour 24 12 balaam said unto balak spake i not also thi messeng which thou sentest unto me say 24 13 if balak would give me hi hous full silver gold i cannot go command lord do either good or bad mine own mind but what lord saith that will i speak 24 14 now behold i go unto my peopl come therefor i will advertis thee what thi peopl shall do thi peopl latter day 24 15 he took hi parabl said balaam son beor hath said man whose eye are open hath said 24 16 he hath said which heard word god knew knowledg most high which saw vision almighti fall tranc but have hi eye open 24 17 i shall see him but not now i shall behold him but not nigh there shall come star jacob sceptr shall rise israel shall smite corner moab destroy all children sheth 24 18 edom shall be possess seir also shall be possess hi enemi israel shall do valiantli 24 19 jacob shall come he that shall have dominion shall destroy him that remaineth citi 24 20 when he look amalek he took hi parabl said amalek wa first nation but hi latter end shall be that he perish ever 24 21 he look kenit took hi parabl said strong is thi dwellingplac thou puttest thi nest rock 24 22 nevertheless kenit shall be wast asshur shall carri thee away captiv 24 23 he took hi parabl said ala who shall live when god doeth thi 24 24 ship shall come coast chittim shall afflict asshur shall afflict eber he also shall perish ever 24 25 balaam rose went return hi place balak also went hi way 25 1 israel abod shittim peopl began commit whoredom daughter moab 25 2 they call peopl unto sacrific their god peopl did eat bow down their god 25 3 israel join himself unto baalpeor anger lord wa kindl against israel 25 4 lord said unto mose take all head peopl hang them lord against sun that fierc anger lord may be turn away israel 25 5 mose said unto judg israel slay ye everi one hi men that were join unto baalpeor 25 6 behold one children israel came brought unto hi brethren midianitish woman sight mose sight all congreg children israel who were weep door tabernacl congreg 25 7 when phineha son eleazar son aaron priest saw it he rose congreg took javelin hi hand 25 8 he went man israel tent thrust both them man israel woman her belli so plagu wa stay children israel 25 9 those that die plagu were twenti four thousand 25 10 lord spake unto mose say 25 11 unto hi father s brethren 27 11 if hi father have no brethren then ye shall give hi inherit unto hi kinsman that is next him hi famili he shall possess it it shall be unto children israel statut your meat offer your drink offer your peac offer 29 40 mose told children israel accord all that lord command mose 30 1 mose spake unto head tribe concern children israel say thi is thing which lord hath command 30 2 if man vow vow unto lord or swear oath bind hi soul bond he shall not break hi word he shall do accord all that proceedeth hi mouth 30 3 if woman also vow vow unto lord bind herself bond be her father s hous her youth 30 4 her father hear her vow her bond wherewith she hath bound her soul her father shall hold hi peac her then all her vow shall stand everi bond wherewith she hath bound her soul shall stand 30 5 but if her father disallow her day that he heareth not ani her vow or her bond wherewith she hath bound her soul shall stand lord shall forgiv her becaus her father disallow her 30 6 if she had all husband when she vow or utter ought her lip wherewith she bound her soul 30 7 her husband heard it held hi peac her day that he heard it then her vow shall stand her bond wherewith she bound her soul shall stand 30 8 but if her husband disallow her day that he heard it then he shall make her vow which she vow that which she utter her lip wherewith she bound her soul none effect lord shall forgiv her 30 9 but everi vow widow her that is divorc wherewith they have bound their soul shall stand against her 30 10 if she vow her husband s hous or bound her soul bond oath 30 11 her husband heard it held hi peac her disallow her not then all her vow shall stand everi bond wherewith she bound her soul shall stand 30 12 but if her husband hath utterli made them void day he heard them then whatsoev proceed her lip concern her vow or concern bond her soul shall not stand her husband hath made them void lord shall forgiv her 30 13 everi vow everi bind oath afflict soul her husband may establish it or her husband may make it void 30 14 but if her husband altogeth hold hi peac her day day then he establisheth all her vow or all her bond which are her he confirmeth them becaus he held hi peac her day that he heard them 30 15 but if he shall ani way make them void that he hath heard them then he shall bear her iniqu 30 16 these are statut which lord command mose man hi wife father hi daughter be yet her youth her father s hous 31 1 lord spake unto mose say 31 2 aveng children israel midianit afterward shalt thou be gather unto thi peopl 31 3 mose spake unto peopl say arm some yourselv unto war let them go against midianit aveng lord midian 31 4 everi tribe thousand all tribe israel shall ye send war 31 5 so there were deliv thousand israel thousand everi tribe twelv thousand arm war 31 6 mose sent them war thousand everi tribe them phineha son eleazar priest war holi instrument trumpet blow hi hand 31 7 they war against midianit as lord command mose they slew all male 31 8 they slew king midian besid rest them that were slain name evi rekem zur hur reba five king midian balaam also son beor they slew sword 31 9 children israel took all women midian captiv their littl one took spoil all their cattl all their flock all their good 31 10 they burnt all their citi wherein they dwelt all their goodli castl fire 31 11 they took all spoil all prey both men beast 31 12 they brought captiv prey spoil unto mose eleazar priest unto congreg children israel unto camp plain moab which are jordan near jericho 31 13 mose eleazar priest all princ congreg went forth meet them camp 31 14 mose wa wroth offic host captain thousand captain hundr which came battl 31 15 mose said unto them have ye save all women aliv 31 16 behold these caus children israel counsel balaam commit trespass against lord matter peor there wa plagu congreg lord 31 17 now therefor kill everi male littl one kill everi woman that hath known man lie him 31 18 but all women children that have not known man lie him keep aliv yourselv 31 19 do ye abid camp seven day whosoev hath kill ani person whosoev hath touch ani slain purifi both yourselv your captiv third day seventh day 31 20 purifi all your raiment all that is made skin all work goat hair all thing made wood 31 21 eleazar priest said unto men war which went battl thi is ordin law which lord command mose 31 22 onli gold silver brass iron tin lead 31 23 everi thing that may abid fire ye shall make it go fire it shall be clean nevertheless it shall be purifi water separ all that abideth not fire ye shall make go water 31 24 ye shall wash your cloth seventh day ye shall be clean afterward ye shall come camp 31 25 lord spake unto mose say 31 26 take sum prey that wa taken both man beast thou eleazar priest chief father congreg 31 27 divid prey two part them that took war them who went battl all congreg 31 28 levi tribut unto lord men war which went battl one soul five hundr both person beev ass sheep 31 29 take it their half give it unto eleazar priest heav offer lord 31 30 children israel s half thou shalt take one portion fifti person beev ass flock all manner beast give them unto levit which keep charg tabernacl lord 31 31 mose eleazar priest did as lord command mose 31 32 booti be rest prey which men war had caught wa six hundr thousand seventi thousand five thousand sheep 31 33 threescor twelv thousand beev 31 34 threescor one thousand ass 31 35 thirti two thousand person all women that had not known man lie him 31 36 half which wa portion them that went war wa number ass were thirti thousand five hundr which lord s tribut wa threescor one 31 40 person were sixteen thousand which lord s tribut wa thirti two person 31 41 mose gave tribut which wa lord s heav offer unto eleazar priest as lord command mose 31 42 children israel s half which mose divid men that war 31 43 now half that pertain unto congreg wa three hundr thousand thirti thousand seven thousand five hundr sheep 31 44 thirti six thousand beev 31 45 thirti thousand ass five hundr 31 46 sixteen thousand person 31 47 even children israel s half mose took one portion fifti both man beast gave them unto levit which kept charg tabernacl lord as lord command mose 31 48 offic which were thousand host captain thousand captain hundr came near unto mose 31 49 they said unto mose thi servant have taken sum men war which are our charg there lacketh not one man us 31 50 we have therefor brought oblat lord what everi man hath gotten jewel gold chain bracelet ring ear tablet make aton our soul lord 31 51 mose eleazar priest took gold them even all wrought jewel 31 52 all gold offer that they offer lord captain thousand captain hundr wa sixteen thousand seven hundr fifti shekel 31 53 men war had taken spoil everi man himself 31 54 mose eleazar priest took gold captain thousand hundr brought it tabernacl congreg memori children israel lord 32 1 now children reuben children gad had veri great multitud cattl when they saw land jazer land gilead that behold place wa place cattl 32 2 children gad children reuben came spake unto mose eleazar priest unto princ congreg say 32 3 ataroth dibon jazer nimrah heshbon elealeh shebam nebo beon 32 4 even countri which lord smote congreg israel is land cattl thi servant have cattl 32 5 wherefor said they if we have found grace thi sight let thi land be given unto thi servant possess bring us not jordan 32 6 mose said unto children gad children reuben shall your brethren go war shall ye sit here 32 7 wherefor discourag ye heart children israel go land which lord hath given them 32 8 thu did your father when i sent them kadeshbarnea see land 32 9 when they went unto valley eshcol saw land they discourag heart children israel that they should not go land which lord had given them 32 10 lord s anger wa kindl same time he sware say 32 11 sure none men that came egypt twenti year old upward shall see land which i sware unto abraham unto isaac unto jacob becaus they have not wholli follow me 32 12 save caleb son jephunneh kenezit joshua son nun they have wholli follow lord 32 13 lord s anger wa kindl against israel he made them wander wilder forti year all gener that had done evil sight lord wa consum 32 14 behold ye are risen your father stead increas sin men augment yet fierc anger lord israel 32 15 if ye turn away him he will yet again leav them wilder ye shall destroy all thi peopl 32 16 they came near unto him said we will build sheepfold here our cattl citi our littl one 32 17 but we ourselv will go readi arm children israel we have brought them unto their place our littl one shall dwell fenc citi becaus inhabit land 32 18 we will not return unto our hous children israel have inherit everi man hi inherit 32 19 we will not inherit them yonder side jordan or forward becaus our inherit is fallen us thi side jordan eastward 32 20 mose said unto them if ye will do thi thing if ye will go arm lord war 32 21 will go all you arm jordan lord he hath driven hi enemi him 32 22 land be subdu lord then afterward ye shall return be guiltless lord israel thi land shall be your possess lord 32 23 but if ye will not do so behold ye have sin against lord be sure your sin will find you 32 24 build you citi your littl one fold your sheep do that which hath proceed your mouth 32 25 children gad children reuben spake unto mose say thi servant will do as my lord commandeth 32 26 our littl one our wive our flock all our cattl shall be there citi gilead 32 27 but thi servant will pass everi man arm war lord battl as my lord saith 32 28 so concern them mose command eleazar priest joshua son nun chief father tribe children israel 32 29 mose said unto them if children gad children reuben will pass you jordan everi man arm battl lord land shall be subdu you then ye shall give them land gilead possess 32 30 but if they will not pass you arm they shall have possess you land canaan 32 31 children gad children reuben answer say as lord hath said unto thi servant so will we do 32 32 we will pass arm lord land canaan that possess our inherit thi side jordan may be our 32 33 mose gave unto them even their armi hand mose aaron 33 2 mose wrote their go accord their journey command lord these are their journey accord their go 33 3 they depart rames first month fifteenth day first month morrow passov children israel went high hand sight all egyptian 33 4 egyptian buri all their firstborn which lord had smitten them their god also lord execut judgment 33 5 children israel remov rames pitch succoth remov red sea encamp wilder sin 33 12 they took their journey wilder sin encamp dophkah 33 13 they depart dophkah encamp alush 33 14 they remov alush encamp rephidim where wa no water peopl drink 33 old when he die mount hor 33 40 king arad canaanit which dwelt south land canaan heard come children israel 33 41 they depart mount hor pitch zalmonah 33 42 they depart zalmonah pitch punon 33 43 they depart punon pitch oboth 33 44 they depart oboth pitch ijeabarim border moab 33 45 they depart iim pitch dibongad 33 46 they remov dibongad encamp almondiblathaim 33 47 they remov almondiblathaim moab jordan near jericho say 33 51 speak unto children israel say unto them when ye are pass jordan land canaan 33 52 then ye shall drive all inhabit land you destroy all their pictur destroy all their molten imag quit pluck down all their high place 33 53 ye shall dispossess inhabit land dwell therein i have given you land possess it 33 54 ye shall divid land lot inherit your famili more ye shall give more inherit fewer ye shall give less inherit everi man s inherit shall be place where hi lot falleth accord tribe your father ye shall inherit 33 55 but if ye will not drive inhabit land you then it shall come pass that those which ye let remain them shall be prick your eye thorn your side shall vex you land wherein ye dwell 33 56 moreov it shall come pass that i shall do unto you as i thought do unto them 34 1 lord spake unto mose say 34 2 command children israel say unto them when ye come land canaan thi is land that shall fall unto you inherit even land canaan coast thereof 34 3 then your south quarter shall be wilder zin coast edom your south border shall be outmost coast salt sea eastward 34 4 your border shall turn south ascent akrabbim pass zin go forth thereof shall be south kadeshbarnea shall go hazaraddar pass azmon 34 5 border shall fetch compass azmon unto river egypt go it shall be sea 34 6 as western border ye shall even have great sea border thi shall be your west border 34 7 thi shall be your north border great sea ye shall point you mount hor 34 8 mount hor ye shall point your border unto entranc hamath go forth border shall be zedad 34 9 border shall go ziphron go it shall be hazarenan thi shall be your north border 34 10 ye shall point your east border hazarenan shepham 34 11 coast shall go down shepham riblah east side ain border shall descend shall reach unto side sea chinnereth eastward 34 12 border shall go down jordan go it shall be salt sea thi shall be your land coast thereof round 34 13 mose command children israel say thi is land which ye shall inherit lot which lord command give unto nine tribe half tribe 34 14 tribe children reuben accord hous their father tribe children gad accord hous their father have receiv their inherit half tribe manasseh have receiv their inherit 34 15 two tribe half tribe have receiv their inherit thi side jordan near jericho eastward sunris 34 16 lord spake unto mose say 34 17 these are name men which shall divid land unto you eleazar priest joshua son nun 34 18 ye shall take one princ everi tribe divid land inherit 34 19 name men are these tribe judah caleb son jephunneh 34 20 tribe children shelomi 34 28 princ tribe children naphtali pedahel son ammihud 34 29 these are they whom lord command divid inherit unto children israel land canaan 35 1 lord spake unto mose plain moab jordan near jericho say 35 2 command children israel that they give unto levit inherit their possess citi dwell ye shall give also unto levit suburb citi round them 35 3 citi shall they have dwell suburb them shall be their cattl their good all their beast 35 4 suburb citi which ye shall give unto levit shall reach wall citi outward thousand cubit round 35 5 ye shall measur citi east side two thousand cubit south side two thousand cubit west side two thousand cubit north side two thousand cubit citi shall be midst thi shall be them suburb citi 35 6 citi which ye shall give unto levit there shall be six citi refug which ye shall appoint manslay that he may flee thither them ye shall add forti two citi 35 7 so all citi which ye shall give levit shall be forti eight citi them shall ye give their suburb 35 8 citi which ye shall give shall be possess children israel them that have mani ye shall give mani but them that have few ye shall give few everi one shall give hi citi unto levit accord hi inherit which he inheriteth 35 9 lord spake unto mose say 35 10 speak unto children israel say unto them when ye be come jordan land canaan 35 11 then ye shall appoint you citi be citi refug you that slayer may flee thither which killeth ani person unawar 35 12 they shall be unto you citi refug aveng that manslay die not he stand congreg judgment 35 13 these citi which ye shall give six citi shall ye have refug 35 14 ye shall give three citi thi side jordan three citi shall ye give land canaan which shall be citi refug 35 15 these six citi shall be refug both children israel stranger sojourn them that everi one that killeth ani person unawar may flee thither 35 16 if he smite him instrument iron so that he die he is murder murder shall sure be put death 35 17 if he smite him throw stone wherewith he may die he die he is murder murder shall sure be put death 35 18 or if he smite him hand weapon wood wherewith he may die he die he is murder murder shall sure be put death 35 19 reveng blood himself shall slay murder when he meeteth him he shall slay him 35 20 but if he thrust him hatr or hurl him lay wait that he die 35 21 or enmiti smite him hi hand that he die he that smote him shall sure be put death he is murder reveng blood shall slay murder when he meeteth him 35 22 but if he thrust him suddenli enmiti or have cast him ani thing lay wait 35 23 or ani stone wherewith man may die see him not cast it him that he die wa not hi enemi neither sought hi harm 35 24 then congreg shall judg slayer reveng blood accord these judgment 35 25 congreg shall deliv slayer hand reveng blood congreg shall restor him citi hi refug whither he wa fled he shall abid it unto death high priest which wa anoint holi oil 35 26 but if slayer shall ani time come border citi hi refug whither he wa fled 35 27 reveng blood find him border citi hi refug reveng blood kill slayer he shall not be guilti blood 35 28 becaus he should have remain citi hi refug death high priest but death high priest slayer shall return land hi possess 35 29 so these thing shall be statut judgment unto you your gener all your dwell 35 30 whoso killeth ani person murder shall be put death mouth wit but one wit shall not testifi against ani person caus him die 35 31 moreov ye shall take no satisfact life murder which is guilti death but he shall be sure put death 35 32 ye shall take no satisfact him that is fled citi hi refug that he should come again dwell land death priest 35 33 so ye shall not pollut land wherein ye are blood it defileth land land cannot be cleans blood that is shed therein but blood him that shed it 35 34 defil not therefor land which ye shall inhabit wherein i dwell i lord dwell children israel 36 1 chief father famili children gilead son machir son manasseh famili son joseph came near spake mose princ chief father children israel 36 2 they said lord command my lord give land inherit lot children israel my lord wa command lord give inherit zelophehad our brother unto hi daughter 36 3 if they be marri ani son other tribe children israel then shall their inherit be taken inherit our father shall be put inherit tribe whereunto they are receiv so shall it be taken lot our inherit 36 4 when jubil children israel shall be then shall their inherit be put unto inherit tribe whereunto they are receiv so shall their inherit be taken away inherit tribe our father 36 5 mose command children israel accord word lord say tribe son joseph hath said well 36 6 thi is thing which lord doth command concern daughter zelophehad say let them marri whom they think best onli famili tribe their father shall they marri 36 7 so shall not inherit children israel remov tribe tribe everi one children israel shall keep himself inherit tribe hi father 36 8 everi daughter that possesseth inherit ani tribe children israel shall be wife unto one famili tribe her father that children israel may enjoy everi man inherit hi father 36 9 neither shall inherit remov one tribe anoth unto children israel plain moab jordan near jericho fifth book mose call deuteronomi 1 1 these be word which mose spake unto all israel thi side jordan wilder plain against red sea paran tophel laban hazeroth dizahab 1 2 there are eleven day journey horeb way mount seir unto kadeshbarnea 1 3 it came pass fortieth year eleventh month first day month that mose spake unto children israel accord unto all that lord had given him command unto them 1 4 he had slain sihon king amorit which dwelt heshbon og king bashan which dwelt astaroth edrei 1 5 thi side jordan land moab began mose declar thi law say 1 6 lord our god spake unto us horeb say ye have dwelt long enough thi mount 1 7 turn you take your journey go mount amorit unto all place nigh thereunto plain hill vale south sea side land canaanit unto lebanon unto great river river euphrat 1 8 behold i have set land you go possess land which lord sware unto your father abraham isaac jacob give unto them their seed them 1 9 i spake unto you that time say i am not abl bear you myself alon 1 10 lord your god hath multipli you behold ye are thi day as star heaven multitud 1 11 lord god your father make you thousand time so mani more as ye are bless you as he hath promis you 1 12 how can i myself alon bear your cumbranc your burden your strife 1 13 take you wise men understand known your tribe i will make them ruler you 1 14 ye answer me said thing which thou hast spoken is good us do 1 15 so i took chief your tribe wise men known made them head you captain thousand captain hundr captain fifti captain ten offic your tribe 1 16 i charg your judg that time say hear caus your brethren judg righteous everi man hi brother stranger that is him 1 17 ye shall not respect person judgment but ye shall hear small as well as great ye shall not be afraid face man judgment is god s caus that is too hard you bring it unto me i will hear it 1 18 i command you that time all thing which ye should do 1 19 when we depart horeb we went all that great terribl wilder which ye saw way mountain amorit as lord our god command us we came kadeshbarnea 1 20 i said unto you ye are come unto mountain amorit which lord our god doth give unto us 1 21 behold lord thi god hath set land thee go possess it as lord god thi father hath said unto thee fear not neither be discourag 1 22 ye came near unto me everi one you said we will send men us they shall search us land bring us word again what way we must go what citi we shall come 1 23 say pleas me well i took twelv men you one tribe 1 24 they turn went mountain came unto valley eshcol search it 1 25 they took fruit land their hand brought it down unto us brought us word again said it is good land which lord our god doth give us 1 26 notwithstand ye would not go but rebel against command lord your god 1 27 ye murmur your tent said becaus lord hate us he hath brought us forth land egypt deliv us hand amorit destroy us 1 28 whither shall we go our brethren have discourag our heart say peopl is greater taller than we citi are great wall heaven moreov we have seen son anakim there 1 29 then i said unto you dread not neither be afraid them 1 30 lord your god which goeth you he shall fight you accord all that he did you egypt your eye 1 31 wilder where thou hast seen how that lord thi god bare thee as man doth bear hi son all way that ye went ye came thi place 1 32 yet thi thing ye did not believ lord your god 1 33 who went way you search you place pitch your tent fire night shew you what way ye should go cloud day 1 34 lord heard voic your word wa wroth sware say 1 35 sure there shall not one these men thi evil gener see that good land which i sware give unto your father 1 36 save caleb son jephunneh he shall see it him will i give land that he hath trodden hi children becaus he hath wholli follow lord 1 37 also lord wa angri me your sake say thou also shalt not go thither 1 38 but joshua son nun which standeth thee he shall go thither encourag him he shall caus israel inherit it 1 39 moreov your littl one which ye said should be prey your children which that day had no knowledg good evil they shall go thither unto them will i give it they shall possess it 1 40 but as you turn you take your journey wilder way red sea 1 41 then ye answer said unto me we have sin against lord we will go fight accord all that lord our god command us when ye had gird everi man hi weapon war ye were readi go hill 1 42 lord said unto me say unto them go not neither fight i am not you lest ye be smitten your enemi 1 43 so i spake unto you ye would not hear but rebel against command lord went presumptu hill 1 44 amorit which dwelt that mountain came against you chase you as bee do destroy you seir even unto hormah 1 45 ye return wept lord but lord would not hearken your voic nor give ear unto you 1 46 so ye abod kadesh mani day accord unto day that ye abod there 2 1 then we turn took our journey wilder way red sea as lord spake unto me we compass mount seir mani day 2 2 lord spake unto me say 2 3 ye have compass thi mountain long enough turn you northward 2 4 command thou peopl say ye are pass coast your brethren children esau which dwell seir they shall be afraid you take ye good heed unto yourselv therefor 2 5 meddl not them i will not give you their land no not so much as foot breadth becaus i have given mount seir unto esau possess 2 6 ye shall buy meat them money that ye may eat ye shall also buy water them money that ye may drink 2 7 lord thi god hath bless thee all work thi hand he knoweth thi walk thi great wilder these forti year lord thi god hath been thee thou hast lack noth 2 8 when we pass our brethren children esau which dwelt seir way plain elath eziongab we turn pass way wilder moab 2 9 lord said unto me distress not moabit neither contend them battl i will not give thee their land possess becaus i have given ar unto children lot possess 2 10 emim dwelt therein time past peopl great mani tall as anakim 2 11 which also were account giant as anakim but moabit call them emim 2 12 horim also dwelt seir beforetim but children esau succeed them when they had destroy them them dwelt their stead as israel did unto land hi possess which lord gave unto them 2 13 now rise said i get you brook zere we went brook zere 2 14 space which we came kadeshbarnea we were come brook zere wa thirti eight year all gener men war were wast host as lord sware unto them 2 15 inde hand lord wa against them destroy them host they were consum 2 16 so it came pass when all men war were consum dead peopl 2 17 that lord spake unto me say 2 18 thou art pass ar coast moab thi day 2 19 when thou comest nigh against children ammon distress them not nor meddl them i will not give thee land children ammon ani possess becaus i have given it unto children lot possess 2 20 that also wa account land giant giant dwelt therein old time ammonit call them zamzummim 2 21 peopl great mani tall as anakim but lord destroy them them they succeed them dwelt their stead 2 22 as he did children esau which dwelt seir when he destroy horim them they succeed them dwelt their stead even unto thi day 2 23 avim which dwelt hazerim even unto azzah caphtorim which came forth caphtor destroy them dwelt their stead 2 24 rise ye take your journey pass river arnon behold i have given thine hand sihon amorit king heshbon hi land begin possess it contend him battl 2 25 thi day will i begin put dread thee fear thee nation that are whole heaven who shall hear report thee shall trembl be anguish becaus thee 2 26 i sent messeng wilder kedemoth unto sihon king heshbon word peac say 2 27 let me pass thi land i will go high way i will neither turn unto right hand nor left 2 28 thou shalt sell me meat money that i may eat give me water money that i may drink onli i will pass my feet 2 29 as children esau which dwell seir moabit which dwell ar did unto me i shall pass jordan land which lord our god giveth us 2 30 but sihon king heshbon would not let us pass him lord thi god harden hi spirit made hi heart obstin that he might deliv him thi hand as appeareth thi day 2 31 lord said unto me behold i have begun give sihon hi land thee begin possess that thou mayest inherit hi land 2 32 then sihon came against us he all hi peopl fight jahaz 2 33 lord our god deliv him us we smote him hi son all hi peopl 2 34 we took all hi citi that time utterli destroy men women littl one everi citi we left none remain 2 35 onli cattl we took prey unto ourselv spoil citi which we took 2 36 aroer which is brink river arnon citi that is river even unto gilead there wa not one citi too strong us lord our god deliv all unto us 2 37 onli unto land children ammon thou camest not nor unto ani place river jabbok nor unto citi mountain nor unto whatsoev lord our god forbad us 3 1 then we turn went way bashan og king bashan came against us he all hi peopl battl edrei 3 2 lord said unto me fear him not i will deliv him all hi peopl hi land thi hand thou shalt do unto him as thou didst unto sihon king amorit which dwelt heshbon 3 3 so lord our god deliv our hand og also king bashan all hi peopl we smote him none wa left him remain 3 4 we took all hi citi that time there wa not citi which we took not them threescor citi all region argob kingdom og bashan 3 5 all these citi were fenc high wall gate bar besid unwal town great mani 3 6 we utterli destroy them as we did unto sihon king heshbon utterli destroy men women children everi citi 3 7 but all cattl spoil citi we took prey ourselv 3 8 we took that time hand two king amorit land that wa thi side jordan river arnon unto mount hermon 3 9 which hermon sidonian call sirion amorit call it shenir 3 10 all citi plain all gilead all bashan unto salchah edrei citi kingdom og bashan 3 11 onli og king bashan remain remnant giant behold hi bedstead wa bedstead iron is it not rabbath children ammon nine cubit wa length thereof four cubit breadth it cubit man 3 12 thi land which we possess that time aroer which is river arnon half mount gilead citi thereof gave i unto reubenit gadit 3 13 rest gilead all bashan be kingdom og gave i unto half tribe manasseh all region argob all bashan which wa call land giant 3 14 jair son manasseh took all countri argob unto coast geshuri maachathi call them hi own name bashanhavothjair unto thi day 3 15 i gave gilead unto machir 3 16 unto reubenit unto gadit i gave gilead even unto river arnon half valley border even unto river jabbok which is border children ammon 3 17 plain also jordan coast thereof chinnereth even unto sea plain even salt sea ashdothpisgah eastward 3 18 i command you that time say lord your god hath given you thi land possess it ye shall pass arm your brethren children israel all that are meet war 3 19 but your wive your littl one your cattl i know that ye have much cattl shall abid your citi which i have given you 3 20 lord have given rest unto your brethren as well as unto you they also possess land which lord your god hath given them jordan then shall ye return everi man unto hi possess which i have given you 3 21 i command joshua that time say thine eye have seen all that lord your god hath done unto these two king so shall lord do unto all kingdom whither thou passest 3 22 ye shall not fear them lord your god he shall fight you 3 23 i besought lord that time say 3 24 o lord god thou hast begun shew thi servant thi great thi mighti hand what god is there heaven or earth that can do accord thi work accord thi might 3 25 i pray thee let me go see good land that is jordan that goodli mountain lebanon 3 26 but lord wa wroth me your sake would not hear me lord said unto me let it suffic thee speak no more unto me thi matter 3 27 get thee top pisgah lift thine eye westward northward southward eastward behold it thine eye thou shalt not go thi jordan 3 28 but charg joshua encourag him strengthen him he shall go thi peopl he shall caus them inherit land which thou shalt see 3 29 so we abod valley against bethpeor 4 1 now therefor hearken o israel unto statut unto judgment which i teach you do them that ye may live go possess land which lord god your father giveth you 4 2 ye shall not add unto word which i command you neither shall ye diminish ought it that ye may keep command lord your god which i command you 4 3 your eye have seen what lord did becaus baalpeor all men that follow baalpeor lord thi god hath destroy them you 4 4 but ye that did cleav unto lord your god are aliv everi one you thi day 4 5 behold i have taught you statut judgment even as lord my god command me that ye should do so land whither ye go possess it 4 6 keep therefor do them thi is your wisdom your understand sight nation which shall hear all these statut say sure thi great nation is wise understand peopl 4 7 what nation is there so great who hath god so nigh unto them as lord our god is all thing that we call him 4 8 what nation is there so great that hath statut judgment so righteou as all thi law which i set you thi day 4 9 onli take heed thyself keep thi soul dilig lest thou forget thing which thine eye have seen lest they depart thi heart all day thi life but teach them thi son thi son son 4 10 special day that thou stoodest lord thi god horeb when lord said unto me gather me peopl togeth i will make them hear my word that they may learn fear me all day that they shall live earth that they may teach their children 4 11 ye came near stood mountain mountain burn fire unto midst heaven dark cloud thick dark 4 12 lord spake unto you midst fire ye heard voic word but saw no similitud onli ye heard voic 4 13 he declar unto you hi coven which he command you perform even ten command he wrote them two tabl stone 4 14 lord command me that time teach you statut judgment that ye might do them land whither ye go possess it 4 15 take ye therefor good heed unto yourselv ye saw no manner similitud day that lord spake unto you horeb midst fire 4 16 lest ye corrupt yourselv make you graven imag similitud ani figur like male or femal 4 17 like ani beast that is earth like ani wing fowl that flieth air 4 18 like ani thing that creepeth ground like ani fish that is water beneath earth 4 19 lest thou lift thine eye unto heaven when thou seest sun moon star even all host heaven shouldest be driven worship them serv them which lord thi god hath divid unto all nation whole heaven 4 20 but lord hath taken you brought you forth iron furnac even egypt be unto him peopl inherit as ye are thi day 4 21 furthermor lord wa angri me your sake sware that i should not go jordan that i should not go unto that good land which lord thi god giveth thee inherit 4 22 but i must die thi land i must not go jordan but ye shall go possess that good land 4 23 take heed unto yourselv lest ye forget coven lord your god which he made you make you graven imag or like ani thing which lord thi god hath forbidden thee 4 24 lord thi god is consum fire even jealou god 4 25 when thou shalt beget children children s children ye shall have remain long land shall corrupt yourselv make graven imag or like ani thing shall do evil sight lord thi god provok him anger 4 26 i call heaven earth wit against you thi day that ye shall soon utterli perish off land whereunto ye go jordan possess it ye shall not prolong your day it but shall utterli be destroy 4 27 lord shall scatter you nation ye shall be left few number heathen whither lord shall lead you 4 28 there ye shall serv god work men s hand wood stone which neither see nor hear nor eat nor smell 4 29 but if thenc thou shalt seek lord thi god thou shalt find him if thou seek him all thi heart all thi soul 4 30 when thou art tribul all these thing are come thee even latter day if thou turn lord thi god shalt be obedi unto hi voic 4 31 lord thi god is merci god he will not forsak thee neither destroy thee nor forget coven thi father which he sware unto them 4 32 ask now day that are past which were thee day that thee 14 28 end three year thou shalt bring forth all tith thine increas same year shalt lay it thi gate 14 29 levit becaus he hath no part nor inherit thee stranger fatherless widow which are thi gate brother 15 8 but thou shalt open thine hand wide unto him shalt sure lend him suffici hi need that which he wanteth 15 9 bewar that there be not thought thi wick heart say seventh year year releas is shalt build hous thou shalt not dwell therein thou shalt plant vineyard shalt not gather grape thereof 28 31 thine ox shall be slain thine eye thou shalt not eat thereof thine ass shall be violent
