joshua 1 1 now death mose servant lord it came pass that lord spake unto joshua son nun mose minist say 1 2 mose my servant is dead now therefor aris go thi jordan thou all thi peopl unto land which i do give them even children israel 1 3 everi place that sole your foot shall tread that have i given unto you as i said unto mose 1 4 wilder thi lebanon even unto great river river euphrat all land hittit unto great sea go down sun shall be your coast 1 5 there shall not ani man be abl stand thee all day thi life as i wa mose so i will be thee i will not fail thee nor forsak thee 1 6 be strong good courag unto thi peopl shalt thou divid inherit land which i sware unto their father give them 1 7 onli be thou strong veri courag that thou mayest observ do accord all law which mose my servant command thee turn not it right hand or left that thou mayest prosper withersoev thou goest 1 8 thi book law shall not depart thi mouth but thou shalt medit therein day night that thou mayest observ do accord all that is written therein then thou shalt make thi way prosper then thou shalt have good success 1 9 have not i command thee be strong good courag be not afraid neither be thou dismay lord thi god is thee whithersoev thou goest 1 10 then joshua command offic peopl say 1 11 pass host command peopl say prepar you victual three day ye shall pass thi jordan go possess land which lord your god giveth you possess it 1 12 reubenit gadit half tribe manasseh spake joshua say 1 13 rememb word which mose servant lord command you say lord your god hath given you rest hath given you thi land 1 14 your wive your littl one your cattl shall remain land which mose gave you thi side jordan but ye shall pass your brethren arm all mighti men valour help them 1 15 lord have given your brethren rest as he hath given you they also have possess land which lord your god giveth them then ye shall return unto land your possess enjoy it which mose lord s servant gave you thi side jordan sunris 1 16 they answer joshua say all that thou commandest us we will do whithersoev thou sendest us we will go 1 17 accord as we hearken unto mose all thing so will we hearken unto thee onli lord thi god be thee as he wa mose 1 18 whosoev he be that doth rebel against thi command will not hearken unto thi word all that thou commandest him he shall be put death onli be strong good courag 2 1 joshua son nun sent shittim two men spi secretli say go view land even jericho they went came harlot s hous name rahab lodg there 2 2 it wa told king jericho say behold there came men hither night children israel search countri 2 3 king jericho sent unto rahab say bring forth men that are come thee which are enter thine hous they be come search all countri 2 4 woman took two men hid them said thu there came men unto me but i wist not whenc they were 2 5 it came pass time shut gate when it wa dark that men went whither men went i wot not pursu them quickli ye shall overtak them 2 6 but she had brought them roof hous hid them stalk flax which she had laid order roof 2 7 men pursu them way jordan unto ford as soon as they which pursu them were gone they shut gate 2 8 they were laid down she came unto them roof 2 9 she said unto men i know that lord hath given you land that your terror is fallen us that all inhabit land faint becaus you 2 10 we have heard how lord dri water red sea you when ye came egypt what ye did unto two king amorit that were other side jordan sihon og whom ye utterli destroy 2 11 as soon as we had heard these thing our heart did melt neither did there remain ani more courag ani man becaus you lord your god he is god heaven earth beneath 2 12 now therefor i pray you swear unto me lord i have shew you kind that ye will also shew kind unto my father s hous give me true token 2 13 that ye will save aliv my father my mother my brethren my sister all that they have deliv our live death 2 14 men answer her our life your if ye utter not thi our busi it shall be when lord hath given us land that we will deal kindli truli thee 2 15 then she let them down cord window her hous wa town wall she dwelt wall 2 16 she said unto them get you mountain lest pursuer meet you hide yourselv there three day pursuer be return afterward may ye go your way 2 17 men said unto her we will be blameless thi thine oath which thou hast made us swear 2 18 behold when we come land thou shalt bind thi line scarlet thread window which thou didst let us down thou shalt bring thi father thi mother thi brethren all thi father s household home unto thee 2 19 it shall be that whosoev shall go door thi hous street hi blood shall be hi head we will be guiltless whosoev shall be thee hous hi blood shall be our head if ani hand be him 2 20 if thou utter thi our busi then we will be quit thine oath which thou hast made us swear 2 21 she said accord unto your word so be it she sent them away they depart she bound scarlet line window 2 22 they went came unto mountain abod there three day pursuer were return pursuer sought them all way but found them not 2 23 so two men return descend mountain pass came joshua son nun told him all thing that befel them 2 24 they said unto joshua truli lord hath deliv our hand all land even all inhabit countri do faint becaus us 3 1 joshua rose earli morn they remov shittim came jordan he all children israel lodg there they pass 3 2 it came pass three day that offic went host 3 3 they command peopl say when ye see ark coven lord your god priest levit bear it then ye shall remov your place go it 3 4 yet there shall be space you it two thousand cubit measur come not near unto it that ye may know way which ye must go ye have not pass thi way heretofor 3 5 joshua said unto peopl sanctifi yourselv morrow lord will do wonder you 3 6 joshua spake unto priest say take ark coven pass peopl they took ark coven went peopl 3 7 lord said unto joshua thi day will i begin magnifi thee sight all israel that they may know that as i wa mose so i will be thee 3 8 thou shalt command priest that bear ark coven say when ye are come brink water jordan ye shall stand still jordan 3 9 joshua said unto children israel come hither hear word lord your god 3 10 joshua said herebi ye shall know that live god is you that he will fail drive you canaanit hittit hivit perizzit girgashit amorit jebusit 3 11 behold ark coven lord all earth passeth you jordan 3 12 now therefor take you twelv men tribe israel everi tribe man 3 13 it shall come pass as soon as sole feet priest that bear ark lord lord all earth shall rest water jordan that water jordan shall be cut off water that come down they shall stand heap 3 14 it came pass when peopl remov their tent pass jordan priest bear ark coven peopl 3 15 as they that bare ark were come unto jordan feet priest that bare ark were dip brim water jordan overfloweth all hi bank all time harvest 3 16 that water which came down stood rose heap veri far citi adam that is besid zaretan those that came down sea plain even salt sea fail were cut off peopl pass right against jericho 3 17 priest that bare ark coven lord stood firm dri ground midst jordan all israelit pass dri ground all peopl were pass clean jordan 4 1 it came pass when all peopl were clean pass jordan that lord spake unto joshua say 4 2 take you twelv men peopl everi tribe man 4 3 command ye them say take you henc midst jordan place where priest feet stood firm twelv stone ye shall carri them you leav them lodg place where ye shall lodg thi night 4 4 then joshua call twelv men whom he had prepar children israel everi tribe man 4 5 joshua said unto them pass ark lord your god midst jordan take you everi man you stone hi shoulder accord unto number tribe children israel 4 6 that thi may be sign you that when your children ask their father time come say what mean ye these stone 4 7 then ye shall answer them that water jordan were cut off ark coven lord when it pass jordan water jordan were cut off these stone shall be memori unto children israel ever 4 8 children israel did so as joshua command took twelv stone midst jordan as lord spake unto joshua accord number tribe children israel carri them them unto place where they lodg laid them down there 4 9 joshua set twelv stone midst jordan place where feet priest which bare ark coven stood they are there unto thi day 4 10 priest which bare ark stood midst jordan everyth wa finish that lord command joshua speak unto peopl accord all that mose command joshua peopl hast pass 4 11 it came pass when all peopl were clean pass that ark lord pass priest presenc peopl 4 12 children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh pass arm children israel as mose spake unto them 4 13 forti thousand prepar war pass lord unto battl plain jericho 4 14 that day lord magnifi joshua sight all israel they fear him as they fear mose all day hi life 4 15 lord spake unto joshua say 4 16 command priest that bear ark testimoni that they come jordan 4 17 joshua therefor command priest say come ye jordan 4 18 it came pass when priest that bare ark coven lord were come midst jordan sole priest feet were lift unto dri land that water jordan return unto their place flow all hi bank as they did 4 19 peopl came jordan tenth day first month encamp gilgal east border jericho 4 20 those twelv stone which they took jordan did joshua pitch gilgal 4 21 he spake unto children israel say when your children shall ask their father time come say what mean these stone 4 22 then ye shall let your children know say israel came thi jordan dri land 4 23 lord your god dri water jordan you ye were pass as lord your god did red sea which he dri us we were gone 4 24 that all peopl earth might know hand lord that it is mighti that ye might fear lord your god ever 5 1 it came pass when all king amorit which were side jordan westward all king canaanit which were sea heard that lord had dri water jordan children israel we were pass that their heart melt neither wa there spirit them ani more becaus children israel 5 2 that time lord said unto joshua make thee sharp knive circumcis again children israel second time 5 3 joshua made him sharp knive circumcis children israel hill foreskin 5 4 thi is caus whi joshua did circumcis all peopl that came egypt that were male even all men war die wilder way they came egypt 5 5 now all peopl that came were circumcis but all peopl that were born wilder way as they came forth egypt them they had not circumcis 5 6 children israel walk forti year wilder till all peopl that were men war which came egypt were consum becaus they obey not voic lord unto whom lord sware that he would not shew them land which lord sware unto their father that he would give us land that floweth milk honey 5 7 their children whom he rais their stead them joshua circumcis they were uncircumcis becaus they had not circumcis them way 5 8 it came pass when they had done circumcis all peopl that they abod their place camp till they were whole 5 9 lord said unto joshua thi day have i roll away reproach egypt off you wherefor name place is call gilgal unto thi day 5 10 children israel encamp gilgal kept passov fourteenth day month even plain jericho 5 11 they did eat old corn land morrow passov unleaven cake parch corn selfsam day 5 12 manna ceas morrow they had eaten old corn land neither had children israel manna ani more but they did eat fruit land canaan that year 5 13 it came pass when joshua wa jericho that he lift hi eye look behold there stood man against him hi sword drawn hi hand joshua went unto him said unto him art thou us or our adversari 5 14 he said nay but as captain host lord am i now come joshua fell hi face earth did worship said unto him what saith my lord unto hi servant 5 15 captain lord s host said unto joshua loos thi shoe off thi foot place whereon thou standest is holi joshua did so 6 1 now jericho wa straitli shut becaus children israel none went none came 6 2 lord said unto joshua see i have given thine hand jericho king thereof mighti men valour 6 3 ye shall compass citi all ye men war go round citi onc thu shalt thou do six day 6 4 seven priest shall bear ark seven trumpet ram horn seventh day ye shall compass citi seven time priest shall blow trumpet 6 5 it shall come pass that when they make long blast ram s horn when ye hear sound trumpet all peopl shall shout great shout wall citi shall fall down flat peopl shall ascend everi man straight him 6 6 joshua son nun call priest said unto them take ark coven let seven priest bear seven trumpet ram horn ark lord 6 7 he said unto peopl pass compass citi let him that is arm pass ark lord 6 8 it came pass when joshua had spoken unto peopl that seven priest bear seven trumpet ram horn pass lord blew trumpet ark coven lord follow them 6 9 arm men went priest that blew trumpet rereward came ark priest go blow trumpet 6 10 joshua had command peopl say ye shall not shout nor make ani nois your voic neither shall ani word proceed your mouth day i bid you shout then shall ye shout 6 11 so ark lord compass citi go it onc they came camp lodg camp 6 12 joshua rose earli morn priest took ark lord 6 13 seven priest bear seven trumpet ram horn ark lord went continu blew trumpet arm men went them but rereward came ark lord priest go blow trumpet 6 14 second day they compass citi onc return camp so they did six day 6 15 it came pass seventh day that they rose earli dawn day compass citi same manner seven time onli that day they compass citi seven time 6 16 it came pass seventh time when priest blew trumpet joshua said unto peopl shout lord hath given you citi 6 17 citi shall be accurs even it all that are therein lord onli rahab harlot shall live she all that are her hous becaus she hid messeng that we sent 6 18 ye ani wise keep yourselv accurs thing lest ye make yourselv accurs when ye take accurs thing make camp israel curs troubl it 6 19 but all silver gold vessel brass iron are consecr unto lord they shall come treasuri lord 6 20 so peopl shout when priest blew trumpet it came pass when peopl heard sound trumpet peopl shout great shout that wall fell down flat so that peopl went citi everi man straight him they took citi 6 21 they utterli destroy all that wa citi both man woman young old ox sheep ass edg sword 6 22 but joshua had said unto two men that had spi countri go harlot s hous bring thenc woman all that she hath as ye sware unto her 6 23 young men that were spi went brought rahab her father her mother her brethren all that she had they brought all her kindr left them camp israel 6 24 they burnt citi fire all that wa therein onli silver gold vessel brass iron they put treasuri hous lord 6 25 joshua save rahab harlot aliv her father s household all that she had she dwelleth israel even unto thi day becaus she hid messeng which joshua sent spi jericho 6 26 joshua adjur them that time say curs be man lord that riseth buildeth thi citi jericho he shall lay foundat thereof hi firstborn hi youngest son shall he set gate it 6 27 so lord wa joshua hi fame wa nois all countri 7 1 but children israel commit trespass accurs thing achan son carmi son zabdi son zerah tribe judah took accurs thing anger lord wa kindl against children israel 7 2 joshua sent men jericho ai which is besid bethaven east bethel spake unto them say go view countri men went view ai 7 3 they return joshua said unto him let not all peopl go but let two or three thousand men go smite ai make not all peopl labour thither they are but few 7 4 so there went thither peopl three thousand men they fled men ai 7 5 men ai smote them thirti six men they chase them gate even unto shebarim smote them go down wherefor heart peopl melt becam as water 7 6 joshua rent hi cloth fell earth hi face ark lord eventid he elder israel put dust their head 7 7 joshua said ala o lord god wherefor hast thou all brought thi peopl jordan deliv us hand amorit destroy us would god we had been content dwelt other side jordan 7 8 o lord what shall i say when israel turneth their back their enemi 7 9 canaanit all inhabit land shall hear it shall environ us round cut off our name earth what wilt thou do unto thi great name 7 10 lord said unto joshua get thee wherefor liest thou thu thi face 7 11 israel hath sin they have also transgress my coven which i command them they have even taken accurs thing have also stolen dissembl also they have put it even their own stuff 7 12 therefor children israel could not stand their enemi but turn their back their enemi becaus they were accurs neither will i be you ani more ye destroy accurs you 7 13 sanctifi peopl say sanctifi yourselv against morrow thu saith lord god israel there is accurs thing midst thee o israel thou canst not stand thine enemi ye take away accurs thing you 7 14 morn therefor ye shall be brought accord your tribe it shall be that tribe which lord taketh shall come accord famili thereof famili which lord shall take shall come household household which lord shall take shall come man man 7 15 it shall be that he that is taken accurs thing shall be burnt fire he all that he hath becaus he hath transgress coven lord becaus he hath wrought folli israel 7 16 so joshua rose earli morn brought israel their tribe tribe judah wa taken 7 17 he brought famili judah he took famili zarhit he brought famili zarhit man man zabdi wa taken 7 18 he brought hi household man man achan son carmi son zabdi son zerah tribe judah wa taken 7 19 joshua said unto achan my son give i pray thee glori lord god israel make confess unto him tell me now what thou hast done hide it not me 7 20 achan answer joshua said inde i have sin against lord god israel thu thu have i done 7 21 when i saw spoil goodli babylonish garment two hundr shekel silver wedg gold fifti shekel weight then i covet them took them behold they are hid earth midst my tent silver it 7 22 so joshua sent messeng they ran unto tent behold it wa hid hi tent silver it 7 23 they took them midst tent brought them unto joshua unto all children israel laid them lord 7 24 joshua all israel him took achan son zerah silver garment wedg gold hi son hi daughter hi oxen hi ass hi sheep hi tent all that he had they brought them unto valley achor 7 25 joshua said whi hast thou troubl us lord shall troubl thee thi day all israel stone him stone burn them fire they had stone them stone 7 26 they rais him great heap stone unto thi day so lord turn fierc hi anger wherefor name that place wa call valley achor unto thi day 8 1 lord said unto joshua fear not neither be thou dismay take all peopl war thee aris go ai see i have given thi hand king ai hi peopl hi citi hi land 8 2 thou shalt do ai her king as thou didst unto jericho her king onli spoil thereof cattl thereof shall ye take prey unto yourselv lay thee ambush citi behind it 8 3 so joshua aros all peopl war go against ai joshua chose thirti thousand mighti men valour sent them away night 8 4 he command them say behold ye shall lie wait against citi even behind citi go not veri far citi but be ye all readi 8 5 i all peopl that are me will approach unto citi it shall come pass when they come against us as first that we will flee them 8 6 they will come us till we have drawn them citi they will say they flee us as first therefor we will flee them 8 7 then ye shall rise ambush seiz citi lord your god will deliv it your hand 8 8 it shall be when ye have taken citi that ye shall set citi fire accord command lord shall ye do see i have command you 8 9 joshua therefor sent them forth they went lie ambush abod bethel ai west side ai but joshua lodg that night peopl 8 10 joshua rose earli morn number peopl went he elder israel peopl ai 8 11 all peopl even peopl war that were him went drew nigh came citi pitch north side ai now there wa valley them ai 8 12 he took five thousand men set them lie ambush bethel ai west side citi 8 13 when they had set peopl even all host that wa north citi their lier wait west citi joshua went that night midst valley 8 14 it came pass when king ai saw it that they hast rose earli men citi went against israel battl he all hi peopl time appoint plain but he wist not that there were lier ambush against him behind citi 8 15 joshua all israel made as if they were beaten them fled way wilder 8 16 all peopl that were ai were call togeth pursu them they pursu joshua were drawn away citi 8 17 there wa not man left ai or bethel that went not israel they left citi open pursu israel 8 18 lord said unto joshua stretch spear that is thi hand ai i will give it thine hand joshua stretch spear that he had hi hand citi 8 19 ambush aros quickli their place they ran as soon as he had stretch hi hand they enter citi took it hast set citi fire 8 20 when men ai look behind them they saw behold smoke citi ascend heaven they had no power flee thi way or that way peopl that fled wilder turn back pursuer 8 21 when joshua all israel saw that ambush had taken citi that smoke citi ascend then they turn again slew men ai 8 22 other issu citi against them so they were midst israel some thi side some that side they smote them so that they let none them remain or escap 8 23 king ai they took aliv brought him joshua 8 24 it came pass when israel had made end slay all inhabit ai field wilder wherein they chase them when they were all fallen edg sword they were consum that all israelit return unto ai smote it edg sword 8 25 so it wa that all that fell that day both men women were twelv thousand even all men ai 8 26 joshua drew not hi hand back wherewith he stretch spear he had utterli destroy all inhabit ai 8 27 onli cattl spoil that citi israel took prey unto themselv accord unto word lord which he command joshua 8 28 joshua burnt ai made it heap ever even desol unto thi day 8 29 king ai he hang tree eventid as soon as sun wa down joshua command that they should take hi carcas down tree cast it enter gate citi rais thereon great heap stone that remaineth unto thi day 8 30 then joshua built altar unto lord god israel mount ebal 8 31 as mose servant lord command children israel as it is written book law mose altar whole stone which no man hath lift ani iron they offer thereon burnt offer unto lord sacrif peac offer 8 32 he wrote there stone copi law mose which he wrote presenc children israel 8 33 all israel their elder offic their judg stood thi side ark that side priest levit which bare ark coven lord as well stranger as he that wa born them half them against mount gerizim half them against mount ebal as mose servant lord had command that they should bless peopl israel 8 34 afterward he read all word law bless curs accord all that is written book law 8 35 there wa not word all that mose command which joshua read not all congreg israel women littl one stranger that were convers them 9 1 it came pass when all king which were thi side jordan hill valley all coast great sea against lebanon hittit amorit canaanit perizzit hivit jebusit heard thereof 9 2 that they gather themselv togeth fight joshua israel one accord 9 3 when inhabit gibeon heard what joshua had done unto jericho ai 9 4 they did work wilili went made as if they had been ambassador took old sack their ass wine bottl old rent bound 9 5 old shoe clout their feet old garment them all bread their provis wa dri mouldi 9 6 they went joshua unto camp gilgal said unto him men israel we be come far countri now therefor make ye leagu us 9 7 men israel said unto hivit peradventur ye dwell us how shall we make leagu you 9 8 they said unto joshua we are thi servant joshua said unto them who are ye whenc come ye 9 9 they said unto him veri far countri thi servant are come becaus name lord thi god we have heard fame him all that he did egypt 9 10 all that he did two king amorit that were jordan sihon king heshbon og king bashan which wa ashtaroth 9 11 wherefor our elder all inhabit our countri spake us say take victual you journey go meet them say unto them we are your servant therefor now make ye leagu us 9 12 thi our bread we took hot our provis our hous day we came forth go unto you but now behold it is dri it is mouldi 9 13 these bottl wine which we fill were new behold they be rent these our garment our shoe are becom old reason veri long journey 9 14 men took their victual ask not counsel mouth lord 9 15 joshua made peac them made leagu them let them live princ congreg sware unto them 9 16 it came pass end three day they had made leagu them that they heard that they were their neighbour that they dwelt them 9 17 children israel journey came unto their citi third day now their citi were gibeon chephirah beeroth kirjathjearim 9 18 children israel smote them not becaus princ congreg had sworn unto them lord god israel all congreg murmur against princ 9 19 but all princ said unto all congreg we have sworn unto them lord god israel now therefor we may not touch them 9 20 thi we will do them we will even let them live lest wrath be us becaus oath which we sware unto them 9 21 princ said unto them let them live but let them be hewer wood drawer water unto all congreg as princ had promis them 9 22 joshua call them he spake unto them say wherefor have ye beguil us say we are veri far you when ye dwell us 9 23 now therefor ye are curs there shall none you be freed be bondmen hewer wood drawer water hous my god 9 24 they answer joshua said becaus it wa certainli told thi servant how that lord thi god command hi servant mose give you all land destroy all inhabit land you therefor we were sore afraid our live becaus you have done thi thing 9 25 now behold we are thine hand as it seemeth good right unto thee do unto us do 9 26 so did he unto them deliv them hand children israel that they slew them not 9 27 joshua made them that day hewer wood drawer water congreg altar lord even unto thi day place which he should choos 10 1 now it came pass when adonizedec king jerusalem had heard how joshua had taken ai had utterli destroy it as he had done jericho her king so he had done ai her king how inhabit gibeon had made peac israel were them 10 2 that they fear greatli becaus gibeon wa great citi as one royal citi becaus it wa greater than ai all men thereof were mighti 10 3 wherefor adonizedec king jerusalem sent unto hoham king hebron unto piram king jarmuth unto japhia king lachish unto debir king eglon say 10 4 come unto me help me that we may smite gibeon it hath made peac joshua children israel 10 5 therefor five king amorit king jerusalem king hebron king jarmuth king lachish king eglon gather themselv togeth went they all their host encamp gibeon made war against it 10 6 men gibeon sent unto joshua camp gilgal say slack not thi hand thi servant come us quickli save us help us all king amorit that dwell mountain are gather togeth against us 10 7 so joshua ascend gilgal he all peopl war him all mighti men valour 10 8 lord said unto joshua fear them not i have deliv them thine hand there shall not man them stand thee 10 9 joshua therefor came unto them suddenli went gilgal all night 10 10 lord discomfit them israel slew them great slaughter gibeon chase them way that goeth bethhoron smote them azekah unto makkedah 10 11 it came pass as they fled israel were go down bethhoron that lord cast down great stone heaven them unto azekah they die they were more which die hailston than they whom children israel slew sword 10 12 then spake joshua lord day when lord deliv amorit children israel he said sight israel sun stand thou still gibeon thou moon valley ajalon 10 13 sun stood still moon stay peopl had aveng themselv their enemi is not thi written book jasher so sun stood still midst heaven hast not go down whole day 10 14 there wa no day like that it or it that lord hearken unto voic man lord fought israel 10 15 joshua return all israel him unto camp gilgal 10 16 but these five king fled hid themselv cave makkedah 10 17 it wa told joshua say five king are found hid cave makkedah 10 18 joshua said roll great stone mouth cave set men it keep them 10 19 stay ye not but pursu your enemi smite hindmost them suffer them not enter their citi lord your god hath deliv them your hand 10 20 it came pass when joshua children israel had made end slay them veri great slaughter till they were consum that rest which remain them enter fenc citi 10 21 all peopl return camp joshua makkedah peac none move hi tongu against ani children israel 10 22 then said joshua open mouth cave bring those five king unto me cave 10 23 they did so brought forth those five king unto him cave king jerusalem king hebron king jarmuth king lachish king eglon 10 24 it came pass when they brought those king unto joshua that joshua call all men israel said unto captain men war which went him come near put your feet neck these king they came near put their feet neck them 10 25 joshua said unto them fear not nor be dismay be strong good courag thu shall lord do all your enemi against whom ye fight 10 26 afterward joshua smote them slew them hang them five tree they were hang tree even 10 27 it came pass time go down sun that joshua command they took them down off tree cast them cave wherein they had been hid laid great stone cave s mouth which remain thi veri day 10 28 that day joshua took makkedah smote it edg sword king thereof he utterli destroy them all soul that were therein he let none remain he did king makkedah as he did unto king jericho 10 29 then joshua pass makkedah all israel him unto libnah fought against libnah 10 30 lord deliv it also king thereof hand israel he smote it edg sword all soul that were therein he let none remain it but did unto king thereof as he did unto king jericho 10 31 joshua pass libnah all israel him unto lachish encamp against it fought against it 10 32 lord deliv lachish hand israel which took it second day smote it edg sword all soul that were therein accord all that he had done libnah 10 33 then horam king gezer came help lachish joshua smote him hi peopl he had left him none remain 10 34 lachish joshua pass unto eglon all israel him they encamp against it fought against it 10 35 they took it that day smote it edg sword all soul that were therein he utterli destroy that day accord all that he had done lachish 10 36 joshua went eglon all israel him unto hebron they fought against it 10 37 they took it smote it edg sword king thereof all citi thereof all soul that were therein he left none remain accord all that he had done eglon but destroy it utterli all soul that were therein 10 38 joshua return all israel him debir fought against it 10 39 he took it king thereof all citi thereof they smote them edg sword utterli destroy all soul that were therein he left none remain as he had done hebron so he did debir king thereof as he had done also libnah her king 10 40 so joshua smote all countri hill south vale spring all their king he left none remain but utterli destroy all that breath as lord god israel command 10 41 joshua smote them kadeshbarnea even unto gaza all countri goshen even unto gibeon 10 42 all these king their land did joshua take one time becaus lord god israel fought israel 10 43 joshua return all israel him unto camp gilgal 11 1 it came pass when jabin king hazor had heard those thing that he sent jobab king madon king shimron king achshaph 11 2 king that were north mountain plain south chinneroth valley border dor west 11 3 canaanit east west amorit hittit perizzit jebusit mountain hivit hermon land mizpeh 11 4 they went they all their host them much peopl even as sand that is sea shore multitud hors chariot veri mani 11 5 when all these king were met togeth they came pitch togeth water merom fight against israel 11 6 lord said unto joshua be not afraid becaus them morrow thi time will i deliv them all slain israel thou shalt hough their hors burn their chariot fire 11 7 so joshua came all peopl war him against them water merom suddenli they fell them 11 8 lord deliv them hand israel who smote them chase them unto great zidon unto misrephothmaim unto valley mizpeh eastward they smote them they left them none remain 11 9 joshua did unto them as lord bade him he hough their hors burnt their chariot fire 11 10 joshua that time turn back took hazor smote king thereof sword hazor beforetim wa head all those kingdom 11 11 they smote all soul that were therein edg sword utterli destroy them there wa not ani left breath he burnt hazor fire 11 12 all citi those king all king them did joshua take smote them edg sword he utterli destroy them as mose servant lord command 11 13 but as citi that stood still their strength israel burn none them save hazor onli that did joshua burn 11 14 all spoil these citi cattl children israel took prey unto themselv but everi man they smote edg sword they had destroy them neither left they ani breath 11 15 as lord command mose hi servant so did mose command joshua so did joshua he left noth undon all that lord command mose 11 16 so joshua took all that land hill all south countri all land goshen valley plain mountain israel valley same 11 17 even mount halak that goeth seir even unto baalgad valley lebanon mount hermon all their king he took smote them slew them 11 18 joshua made war long time all those king 11 19 there wa not citi that made peac children israel save hivit inhabit gibeon all other they took battl 11 20 it wa lord harden their heart that they should come against israel battl that he might destroy them utterli that they might have no favour but that he might destroy them as lord command mose 11 21 that time came joshua cut off anakim mountain hebron debir anab all mountain judah all mountain israel joshua destroy them utterli their citi 11 22 there wa none anakim left land children israel onli gaza gath ashdod there remain 11 23 so joshua took whole land accord all that lord said unto mose joshua gave it inherit unto israel accord their divis their tribe land rest war 12 1 now these are king land which children israel smote possess their land other side jordan rise sun river arnon unto mount hermon all plain east 12 2 sihon king amorit who dwelt heshbon rule aroer which is bank river arnon middl river half gilead even unto river jabbok which is border children ammon 12 3 plain sea chinneroth east unto sea plain even salt sea east way bethjeshimoth south ashdothpisgah 12 4 coast og king bashan which wa remnant giant that dwelt ashtaroth edrei 12 5 reign mount hermon salcah all bashan unto border geshurit maachathit half gilead border sihon king heshbon 12 6 them did mose servant lord children israel smite mose servant lord gave it possess unto reubenit gadit half tribe manasseh 12 7 these are king countri which joshua children israel smote thi side jordan west baalgad valley lebanon even unto mount halak that goeth seir which joshua gave unto tribe israel possess accord their divis 12 8 mountain valley plain spring wilder south countri hittit amorit canaanit perizzit hivit jebusit 12 9 king jericho one king ai which is besid bethel one 12 10 king jerusalem one king hebron one 12 11 king jarmuth one king lachish one 12 12 king eglon one king gezer one 12 13 king debir one king geder one 12 14 king hormah one king arad one 12 15 king libnah one king adullam one 12 16 king makkedah one king bethel one 12 17 king tappuah one king hepher one 12 18 king aphek one king lasharon one 12 19 king madon one king hazor one 12 20 king shimronmeron one king achshaph one 12 21 king taanach one king megiddo one 12 22 king kedesh one king jokneam carmel one 12 23 king dor coast dor one king nation gilgal one 12 24 king tirzah one all king thirti one 13 1 now joshua wa old stricken year lord said unto him thou art old stricken year there remaineth yet veri much land be possess 13 2 thi is land that yet remaineth all border philistin all geshuri 13 3 sihor which is egypt even unto border ekron northward which is count canaanit five lord philistin gazathit ashdothit eshkalonit gittit ekronit also avit 13 4 south all land canaanit mearah that is besid sidonian unto aphek border amorit 13 5 land giblit all lebanon sunris baalgad mount hermon unto enter hamath 13 6 all inhabit hill countri lebanon unto misrephothmaim all sidonian them will i drive children israel onli divid thou it lot unto israelit inherit as i have command thee 13 7 now therefor divid thi land inherit unto nine tribe half tribe manasseh 13 8 whom reubenit gadit have receiv their inherit which mose gave them jordan eastward even as mose servant lord gave them 13 9 aroer that is bank river arnon citi that is midst river all plain medeba unto dibon 13 10 all citi sihon king amorit which reign heshbon unto border children ammon 13 11 gilead border geshurit maachathit all mount hermon all bashan unto salcah 13 12 all kingdom og bashan which reign ashtaroth edrei who remain remnant giant these did mose smite cast them 13 13 nevertheless children israel expel not geshurit nor maachathit but geshurit maachathit dwell israelit thi day 13 14 onli unto tribe levi he gave none inherit sacrific lord god israel made fire are their inherit as he said unto them 13 15 mose gave unto tribe children reuben inherit accord their famili 13 16 their coast wa aroer that is bank river arnon citi that is midst river all plain medeba 13 17 heshbon all her citi that are plain dibon bamothba bethbaalmeon 13 18 jahaza kedemoth mephaath 13 19 kirjathaim sibmah zarethshahar mount valley 13 20 bethpeor ashdothpisgah bethjeshimoth 13 21 all citi plain all kingdom sihon king amorit which reign heshbon whom mose smote princ midian evi rekem zur hur reba which were duke sihon dwell countri 13 22 balaam also son beor soothsay did children israel slay sword them that were slain them 13 23 border children reuben wa jordan border thereof thi wa inherit children reuben their famili citi villag thereof 13 24 mose gave inherit unto tribe gad even unto children gad accord their famili 13 25 their coast wa jazer all citi gilead half land children ammon unto aroer that is rabbah 13 26 heshbon unto ramathmizpeh betonim mahanaim unto border debir 13 27 valley betharam bethnimrah succoth zaphon rest kingdom sihon king heshbon jordan hi border even unto edg sea chinnereth other side jordan eastward 13 28 thi is inherit children gad their famili citi their villag 13 29 mose gave inherit unto half tribe manasseh thi wa possess half tribe children manasseh their famili 13 30 their coast wa mahanaim all bashan all kingdom og king bashan all town jair which are bashan threescor citi 13 31 half gilead ashtaroth edrei citi kingdom og bashan were pertain unto children machir son manasseh even one half children machir their famili 13 32 these are countri which mose did distribut inherit plain moab other side jordan jericho eastward 13 33 but unto tribe levi mose gave not ani inherit lord god israel wa their inherit as he said unto them 14 1 these are countri which children israel inherit land canaan which eleazar priest joshua son nun head father tribe children israel distribut inherit them 14 2 lot wa their inherit as lord command hand mose nine tribe half tribe 14 3 mose had given inherit two tribe half tribe other side jordan but unto levit he gave none inherit them 14 4 children joseph were two tribe manasseh ephraim therefor they gave no part unto levit land save citi dwell their suburb their cattl their substanc 14 5 as lord command mose so children israel did they divid land 14 6 then children judah came unto joshua gilgal caleb son jephunneh kenezit said unto him thou knowest thing that lord said unto mose man god concern me thee kadeshbarnea 14 7 forti year old wa i when mose servant lord sent me kadeshbarnea espi land i brought him word again as it wa mine heart 14 8 nevertheless my brethren that went me made heart peopl melt but i wholli follow lord my god 14 9 mose sware that day say sure land whereon thi feet have trodden shall be thine inherit thi children s ever becaus thou hast wholli follow lord my god 14 10 now behold lord hath kept me aliv as he said these forti five year even lord spake thi word unto mose while children israel wander wilder now lo i am thi day fourscor five year old 14 11 as yet i am as strong thi day as i wa day that mose sent me as my strength wa then even so is my strength now war both go come 14 12 now therefor give me thi mountain whereof lord spake that day thou heardest that day how anakim were there that citi were great fenc if so be lord will be me then i shall be abl drive them as lord said 14 13 joshua bless him gave unto caleb son jephunneh hebron inherit 14 14 hebron therefor becam inherit caleb son jephunneh kenezit unto thi day becaus that he wholli follow lord god israel 14 15 name hebron wa kirjatharba which arba wa great man anakim land had rest war 15 1 thi then wa lot tribe children judah their famili even border edom wilder zin southward wa uttermost part south coast 15 2 their south border wa shore salt sea bay that looketh southward 15 3 it went south side maalehacrabbim pass zin ascend south side unto kadeshbarnea pass hezron went adar fetch compass karkaa 15 4 thenc it pass azmon went unto river egypt go that coast were sea thi shall be your south coast 15 5 east border wa salt sea even unto end jordan their border north quarter wa bay sea uttermost part jordan 15 6 border went bethhogla pass north betharabah border went stone bohan son reuben 15 7 border went debir valley achor so northward look gilgal that is go adummim which is south side river border pass water enshemesh go thereof were enrogel 15 8 border went valley son hinnom unto south side jebusit same is jerusalem border went top mountain that lieth valley hinnom westward which is end valley giant northward 15 9 border wa drawn top hill unto fountain water nephtoah went citi mount ephron border wa drawn baalah which is kirjathjearim 15 10 border compass baalah westward unto mount seir pass unto side mount jearim which is chesalon north side went down bethshemesh pass timnah 15 11 border went unto side ekron northward border wa drawn shicron pass mount baalah went unto jabneel go border were sea 15 12 west border wa great sea coast thereof thi is coast children judah round accord their famili 15 13 unto caleb son jephunneh he gave part children judah accord command lord joshua even citi arba father anak which citi is hebron 15 14 caleb drove thenc three son anak sheshai ahiman talmai children anak 15 15 he went thenc inhabit debir name debir wa kirjathseph 15 16 caleb said he that smiteth kirjathseph taketh it him will i give achsah my daughter wife 15 17 othniel son kenaz brother caleb took it he gave him achsah hi daughter wife 15 18 it came pass as she came unto him that she move him ask her father field she light off her ass caleb said unto her what wouldest thou 15 19 who answer give me bless thou hast given me south land give me also spring water he gave her upper spring nether spring 15 20 thi is inherit tribe children judah accord their famili 15 21 uttermost citi tribe children judah coast edom border archi ataroth 16 3 goeth down westward coast japhleti unto coast bethhoron nether gezer go thereof are sea 16 4 so children joseph manasseh ephraim took their inherit 16 5 border children east janohah 16 7 it went down janohah ataroth naarath came jericho went jordan 16 8 border went tappuah westward unto river kanah go thereof were sea thi is inherit tribe children ephraim their famili 16 9 separ citi children ephraim were inherit children manasseh all citi their villag 16 10 they drave not canaanit that dwelt gezer but canaanit dwell ephraimit unto thi day serv tribut 17 1 there wa also lot tribe manasseh he wa firstborn joseph wit machir firstborn manasseh father gilead becaus he wa man war therefor he had gilead bashan 17 2 there wa also lot rest children manasseh their famili children abiez children helek children asriel children shechem children hepher children shemida these were male children manasseh son joseph their famili 17 3 but zelophehad son hepher son gilead son machir son manasseh had no son but daughter these are name hi daughter mahlah noah hoglah milcah tirzah 17 4 they came near eleazar priest joshua son nun princ say lord command mose give us inherit our brethren therefor accord command lord he gave them inherit brethren their father 17 5 there fell ten portion manasseh besid land gilead bashan which were other side jordan 17 6 becaus daughter manasseh had inherit hi son rest manasseh s son had land gilead 17 7 coast manasseh wa asher michmethah that lieth shechem border went right hand unto inhabit entappuah 17 8 now manasseh had land tappuah but tappuah border manasseh belong children ephraim 17 9 coast descend unto river kanah southward river these citi ephraim are citi manasseh coast manasseh also wa north side river outgo it were sea 17 10 southward it wa ephraim s northward it wa manasseh s sea is hi border they met togeth asher north issachar east 17 11 manasseh had issachar asher bethshean her town ibleam her town inhabit dor her town inhabit endor her town inhabit taanach her town inhabit megiddo her town even three countri 17 12 yet children manasseh could not drive inhabit those citi but canaanit would dwell that land 17 13 yet it came pass when children israel were waxen strong that they put canaanit tribut but did not utterli drive them 17 14 children joseph spake unto joshua say whi hast thou given me but one lot one portion inherit see i am great peopl forasmuch as lord hath bless me hitherto 17 15 joshua answer them if thou be great peopl then get thee wood countri cut down thyself there land perizzit giant if mount ephraim be too narrow thee 17 16 children joseph said hill is not enough us all canaanit that dwell land valley have chariot iron both they who are bethshean her town they who are valley jezreel 17 17 joshua spake unto hous joseph even ephraim manasseh say thou art great peopl hast great power thou shalt not have one lot onli 17 18 but mountain shall be thine it is wood thou shalt cut it down outgo it shall be thine thou shalt drive canaanit though they have iron chariot though they be strong 18 1 whole congreg children israel assembl togeth shiloh set tabernacl congreg there land wa subdu them 18 2 there remain children israel seven tribe which had not yet receiv their inherit 18 3 joshua said unto children israel how long are ye slack go possess land which lord god your father hath given you 18 4 give you three men each tribe i will send them they shall rise go land describ it accord inherit them they shall come again me 18 5 they shall divid it seven part judah shall abid their coast south hous joseph shall abid their coast north 18 6 ye shall therefor describ land seven part bring descript hither me that i may cast lot you here lord our god 18 7 but levit have no part you priesthood lord is their inherit gad reuben half tribe manasseh have receiv their inherit jordan east which mose servant lord gave them 18 8 men aros went away joshua charg them that went describ land say go walk land describ it come again me that i may here cast lot you lord shiloh 18 9 men went pass land describ it citi seven part book came again joshua host shiloh 18 10 joshua cast lot them shiloh lord there joshua divid land unto children israel accord their divis 18 11 lot tribe children benjamin came accord their famili coast their lot came forth children judah children joseph 18 12 their border north side wa jordan border went side jericho north side went mountain westward go thereof were wilder bethaven 18 13 border went thenc luz which eleazar priest joshua son nun head father tribe children israel divid inherit lot shiloh lord door tabernacl congreg so they made end divid countri 20 1 lord also spake unto joshua say 20 2 speak children israel say appoint you citi refug whereof i spake unto you hand mose 20 3 that slayer that killeth ani person unawar unwittingli may flee thither they shall be your refug aveng blood 20 4 when he that doth flee unto one those citi shall stand enter gate citi shall declar hi caus ear elder that citi they shall take him citi unto them give him place that he may dwell them 20 5 if aveng blood pursu him then they shall not deliv slayer hi hand becaus he smote hi neighbour unwittingli hate him not beforetim 20 6 he shall dwell that citi he stand congreg judgment death high priest that shall be those day then shall slayer return come unto hi own citi unto hi own hous unto citi whenc he fled 20 7 they appoint kedesh galile mount naphtali shechem mount ephraim kirjatharba which is hebron mountain judah 20 8 other side jordan jericho eastward they assign bezer wilder plain tribe reuben ramoth gilead tribe gad golan bashan tribe manasseh 20 9 these were citi appoint all children israel stranger that sojourneth them that whosoev killeth ani person unawar might flee thither not die hand aveng blood he stood congreg 21 1 then came near head father levit unto eleazar priest unto 41 all citi levit possess children israel were forti eight citi their suburb 21 42 these citi were everi one their suburb round them thu were all these citi 21 43 lord gave unto israel all land which he sware give unto their father they possess it dwelt therein 21 44 lord gave them rest round accord all that he sware unto their father there stood not man all their enemi them lord deliv all their enemi their hand 21 45 there fail not ought ani good thing which lord had spoken unto hous israel all came pass 22 1 then joshua call reubenit gadit half tribe manasseh 22 2 said unto them ye have kept all that mose servant lord command you have obey my voic all that i command you 22 3 ye have not left your brethren these mani day unto thi day but have kept charg command lord your god 22 4 now lord your god hath given rest unto your brethren as he promis them therefor now return ye get you unto your tent unto land your possess which mose servant lord gave you other side jordan 22 5 but take dilig heed do command law which mose servant lord charg you love lord your god walk all hi way keep hi command cleav unto him serv him all your heart all your soul 22 6 so joshua bless them sent them away they went unto their tent 22 7 now one half tribe manasseh mose had given possess bashan but unto other half thereof gave joshua their brethren thi side jordan westward when joshua sent them away also unto their tent then he bless them 22 8 he spake unto them say return much rich unto your tent veri much cattl silver gold brass iron veri much raiment divid spoil your enemi your brethren 22 9 children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh return depart children israel shiloh which is land canaan go unto countri gilead land their possess whereof they were possess accord word lord hand mose 22 10 when they came unto border jordan that are land canaan children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh built there altar jordan great altar see 22 11 children israel heard say behold children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh have built altar against land canaan border jordan passag children israel 22 12 when children israel heard it whole congreg children israel gather themselv togeth shiloh go war against them 22 13 children israel sent unto children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh land gilead phineha son eleazar priest 22 14 him ten princ each chief hous princ all tribe israel each one wa head hous their father thousand israel 22 15 they came unto children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh unto land gilead they spake them say 22 16 thu saith whole congreg lord what trespass is thi that ye have commit against god israel turn away thi day follow lord that ye have build you altar that ye might rebel thi day against lord 22 17 is iniqu peor too littl us which we are not cleans thi day although there wa plagu congreg lord 22 18 but that ye must turn away thi day follow lord it will be see ye rebel day against lord that morrow he will be wroth whole congreg israel 22 19 notwithstand if land your possess be unclean then pass ye unto land possess lord wherein lord s tabernacl dwelleth take possess us but rebel not against lord nor rebel against us build you altar besid altar lord our god 22 20 did not achan son zerah commit trespass accurs thing wrath fell all congreg israel that man perish not alon hi iniqu 22 21 then children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh answer said unto head thousand israel 22 22 lord god god lord god god he knoweth israel he shall know if it be rebellion or if transgress against lord save us not thi day 22 23 that we have built us altar turn follow lord or if offer thereon burnt offer or meat offer or if offer peac offer thereon let lord himself requir it 22 24 if we have not rather done it fear thi thing say time come your children might speak unto our children say what have ye do lord god israel 22 25 lord hath made jordan border us you ye children reuben children gad ye have no part lord so shall your children make our children ceas fear lord 22 26 therefor we said let us now prepar build us altar not burnt offer nor sacrific 22 27 but that it may be wit us you our gener us that we might do servic lord him our burnt offer our sacrific our peac offer that your children may not say our children time come ye have no part lord 22 28 therefor said we that it shall be when they should so say us or our gener time come that we may say again behold pattern altar lord which our father made not burnt offer nor sacrific but it is wit us you 22 29 god forbid that we should rebel against lord turn thi day follow lord build altar burnt offer meat offer or sacrific besid altar lord our god that is hi tabernacl 22 30 when phineha priest princ congreg head thousand israel which were him heard word that children reuben children gad children manasseh spake it pleas them 22 31 phineha son eleazar priest said unto children reuben children gad children manasseh thi day we perceiv that lord is us becaus ye have not commit thi trespass against lord now ye have deliv children israel hand lord 22 32 phineha son eleazar priest princ return children reuben children gad land gilead unto land canaan children israel brought them word again 22 33 thing pleas children israel children israel bless god did not intend go against them battl destroy land wherein children reuben gad dwelt 22 34 children reuben children gad call altar ed it shall be wit us that lord is god 23 1 it came pass long time that lord had given rest unto israel all their enemi round that joshua wax old stricken age 23 2 joshua call all israel their elder their head their judg their offic said unto them i am old stricken age 23 3 ye have seen all that lord your god hath done unto all these nation becaus you lord your god is he that hath fought you 23 4 behold i have divid unto you lot these nation that remain be inherit your tribe jordan all nation that i have cut off even unto great sea westward 23 5 lord your god he shall expel them you drive them your sight ye shall possess their land as lord your god hath promis unto you 23 6 be ye therefor veri courag keep do all that is written book law mose that ye turn not asid therefrom right hand or left 23 7 that ye come not these nation these that remain you neither make mention name their god nor caus swear them neither serv them nor bow yourselv unto them 23 8 but cleav unto lord your god as ye have done unto thi day 23 9 lord hath driven you great nation strong but as you no man hath been abl stand you unto thi day 23 10 one man you shall chase thousand lord your god he it is that fighteth you as he hath promis you 23 11 take good heed therefor unto yourselv that ye love lord your god 23 12 els if ye do ani wise go back cleav unto remnant these nation even these that remain you shall make marriag them go unto them they you 23 13 know certainti that lord your god will no more drive ani these nation you but they shall be snare trap unto you scourg your side thorn your eye ye perish off thi good land which lord your god hath given you 23 14 behold thi day i am go way all earth ye know all your heart all your soul that not one thing hath fail all good thing which lord your god spake concern you all are come pass unto you not one thing hath fail thereof 23 15 therefor it shall come pass that as all good thing are come you which lord your god promis you so shall lord bring you all evil thing he have destroy you off thi good land which lord your god hath given you 23 16 when ye have transgress coven lord your god which he command you have gone serv other god bow yourselv them then shall anger lord be kindl against you ye shall perish quickli off good land which he hath given unto you 24 1 joshua gather all tribe israel shechem call elder israel their head their judg their offic they present themselv god 24 2 joshua said unto all peopl thu saith lord god israel your father dwelt other side flood old time even terah father abraham father nachor they serv other god 24 3 i took your father abraham other side flood led him all land canaan multipli hi seed gave him isaac 24 4 i gave unto isaac jacob esau i gave unto esau mount seir possess it but jacob hi children went down egypt 24 5 i sent mose also aaron i plagu egypt accord that which i did them afterward i brought you 24 6 i brought your father egypt ye came unto sea egyptian pursu your father chariot horsemen unto red sea 24 7 when they cri unto lord he put dark you egyptian brought sea them cover them your eye have seen what i have done egypt ye dwelt wilder long season 24 8 i brought you land amorit which dwelt other side jordan they fought you i gave them your hand that ye might possess their land i destroy them you 24 9 then balak son zippor king moab aros war against israel sent call balaam son beor curs you 24 10 but i would not hearken unto balaam therefor he bless you still so i deliv you hi hand 24 11 you went jordan came unto jericho men jericho fought against you amorit perizzit canaanit hittit girgashit hivit jebusit i deliv them your hand 24 12 i sent hornet you which drave them you even two king amorit but not thi sword nor thi bow 24 13 i have given you land which ye did not labour citi which ye built not ye dwell them vineyard oliveyard which ye plant not do ye eat 24 14 now therefor fear lord serv him sincer truth put away god which your father serv other side flood egypt serv ye lord 24 15 if it seem evil unto you serv lord choos you thi day whom ye will serv god which your father serv that were other side flood or god amorit whose land ye dwell but as me my hous we will serv lord 24 16 peopl answer said god forbid that we should forsak lord serv other god 24 17 lord our god he it is that brought us our father land egypt hous bondag which did those great sign our sight preserv us all way wherein we went all peopl whom we pass 24 18 lord drave us all peopl even amorit which dwelt land therefor will we also serv lord he is our god 24 19 joshua said unto peopl ye cannot serv lord he is holi god he is jealou god he will not forgiv your transgress nor your sin 24 20 if ye forsak lord serv strang god then he will turn do you hurt consum you that he hath done you good 24 21 peopl said unto joshua nay but we will serv lord 24 22 joshua said unto peopl ye are wit against yourselv that ye have chosen you lord serv him they said we are wit 24 23 now therefor put away said he strang god which are you inclin your heart unto lord god israel 24 24 peopl said unto joshua lord our god will we serv hi voic will we obey 24 25 so joshua made coven peopl that day set them statut ordin shechem 24 26 joshua wrote these word book law god took great stone set it there oak that wa sanctuari lord 24 27 joshua said unto all peopl behold thi stone shall be wit unto us it hath heard all word lord which he spake unto us it shall be therefor wit unto you lest ye deni your god 24 28 so joshua let peopl depart everi man unto hi inherit 24 29 it came pass these thing that joshua son nun servant lord die be hundr ten year old 24 30 they buri him border hi inherit timnathserah which is mount ephraim north side hill gaash 24 31 israel serv lord all day joshua all day elder that overliv joshua which had known all work lord that he had done israel 24 32 bone joseph which children israel brought egypt buri they shechem parcel ground which jacob bought son hamor father shechem hundr piec silver it becam inherit children joseph 24 33 eleazar son aaron die they buri him hill that pertain phineha hi son which wa given him mount ephraim book judg 1 1 now death joshua it came pass that children israel ask lord say who shall go us against canaanit first fight against them 1 2 lord said judah shall go behold i have deliv land hi hand 1 3 judah said unto simeon hi brother come me my lot that we may fight against canaanit i likewis will go thee thi lot so simeon went him 1 4 judah went lord deliv canaanit perizzit their hand they slew them bezek ten thousand men 1 5 they found adonibezek bezek they fought against him they slew canaanit perizzit 1 6 but adonibezek fled they pursu him caught him cut off hi thumb hi great toe 1 7 adonibezek said threescor ten king have their thumb their great toe cut off gather their meat my tabl as i have done so god hath requit me they brought him jerusalem there he die 1 8 now children judah had fought against jerusalem had taken it smitten it edg sword set citi fire 1 9 afterward children judah went down fight against canaanit that dwelt mountain south valley 1 10 judah went against canaanit that dwelt hebron now name hebron wa kirjatharba they slew sheshai ahiman talmai 1 11 thenc he went against inhabit debir name debir wa kirjathseph 1 12 caleb said he that smiteth kirjathseph taketh it him will i give achsah my daughter wife 1 13 othniel son kenaz caleb s younger brother took it he gave him achsah hi daughter wife 1 14 it came pass when she came him that she move him ask her father field she light off her ass caleb said unto her what wilt thou 1 15 she said unto him give me bless thou hast given me south land give me also spring water caleb gave her upper spring nether spring 1 16 children kenit mose father law went citi palm tree children judah wilder judah which lieth south arad they went dwelt peopl 1 17 judah went simeon hi brother they slew canaanit that inhabit zephath utterli destroy it name citi wa call hormah 1 18 also judah took gaza coast thereof askelon coast thereof ekron coast thereof 1 19 lord wa judah he drave inhabit mountain but could not drive inhabit valley becaus they had chariot iron 1 20 they gave hebron unto caleb as mose said he expel thenc three son anak 1 21 children benjamin did not drive jebusit that inhabit jerusalem but jebusit dwell children benjamin jerusalem unto thi day 1 22 hous joseph they also went against bethel lord wa them 1 23 hous joseph sent descri bethel now name citi wa luz 1 24 spi saw man come forth citi they said unto him shew us we pray thee entranc citi we will shew thee merci 1 25 when he shew them entranc citi they smote citi edg sword but they let go man all hi famili 1 26 man went land hittit built citi call name thereof luz which is name thereof unto thi day 1 27 neither did manasseh drive inhabit bethshean her town nor taanach her town nor inhabit dor her town nor inhabit ibleam her town nor inhabit megiddo her town but canaanit would dwell that land 1 28 it came pass when israel wa strong that they put canaanit tribut did not utterli drive them 1 29 neither did ephraim drive canaanit that dwelt gezer but canaanit dwelt gezer them 1 30 neither did zebulun drive inhabit kitron nor inhabit nahalol but canaanit dwelt them becam tributari 1 31 neither did asher drive inhabit accho nor inhabit zidon nor ahlab nor achzib nor helbah nor aphik nor rehob 1 32 but asherit dwelt canaanit inhabit land they did not drive them 1 33 neither did naphtali drive inhabit bethshemesh nor inhabit bethanath but he dwelt canaanit inhabit land nevertheless inhabit bethshemesh bethanath becam tributari unto them 1 34 amorit forc children dan mountain they would not suffer them come down valley 1 35 but amorit would dwell mount here aijalon shaalbim yet hand hous joseph prevail so that they becam tributari 1 36 coast amorit wa go akrabbim rock upward 2 1 angel lord came gilgal bochim said i made you go egypt have brought you unto land which i sware unto your father i said i will never break my coven you 2 2 ye shall make no leagu inhabit thi land ye shall throw down their altar but ye have not obey my voic whi have ye done thi 2 3 wherefor i also said i will not drive them you but they shall be as thorn your side their god shall be snare unto you 2 4 it came pass when angel lord spake these word unto all children israel that peopl lift their voic wept 2 5 they call name that place bochim they sacrif there unto lord 2 6 when joshua had let peopl go children israel went everi man unto hi inherit possess land 2 7 peopl serv lord all day joshua all day elder that outliv joshua who had seen all great work lord that he did israel 2 8 joshua son nun servant lord die be hundr ten year old 2 9 they buri him border hi inherit timnathher mount ephraim north side hill gaash 2 10 also all that gener were gather unto their father there aros anoth gener them which knew not lord nor yet work which he had done israel 2 11 children israel did evil sight lord serv baalim 2 12 they forsook lord god their father which brought them land egypt follow other god god peopl that were round them bow themselv unto them provok lord anger 2 13 they forsook lord serv baal ashtaroth 2 14 anger lord wa hot against israel he deliv them hand spoiler that spoil them he sold them hand their enemi round so that they could not ani longer stand their enemi 2 15 whithersoev they went hand lord wa against them evil as lord had said as lord had sworn unto them they were greatli distress 2 16 nevertheless lord rais judg which deliv them hand those that spoil them 2 17 yet they would not hearken unto their judg but they went whore other god bow themselv unto them they turn quickli way which their father walk obey command lord but they did not so 2 18 when lord rais them judg then lord wa judg deliv them hand their enemi all day judg it repent lord becaus their groan reason them that oppress them vex them 2 19 it came pass when judg wa dead that they return corrupt themselv more than their father follow other god serv them bow down unto them they ceas not their own do nor their stubborn way 2 20 anger lord wa hot against israel he said becaus that thi peopl hath transgress my coven which i command their father have not hearken unto my voic 2 21 i also will not henceforth drive ani them nation which joshua left when he die 2 22 that them i may prove israel they will keep way lord walk therein as their father did keep it or not 2 23 therefor lord left those nation drive them hastili neither deliv he them hand joshua 3 1 now these are nation which lord left prove israel them even as mani israel as had not known all war canaan 3 2 onli that gener children israel might know teach them war least such as knew noth thereof 3 3 name five lord philistin all canaanit sidonian hivit that dwelt mount lebanon mount baalhermon unto enter hamath 3 4 they were prove israel them know they would hearken unto command lord which he command their father hand mose 3 5 children israel dwelt canaanit hittit prevail against chushanrishathaim 3 11 land had rest forti year othniel son kenaz die 3 12 children israel did evil again sight lord lord strengthen eglon king moab against israel becaus they had done evil sight lord 3 13 he gather unto him children ammon amalek went smote israel possess citi palm tree 3 14 so children israel serv eglon king moab eighteen year 3 15 but when children israel cri unto lord lord rais them deliver ehud son gera benjamit man lefthand him children israel sent present unto eglon king moab 3 16 but ehud made him dagger which had two edg cubit length he did gird it hi raiment hi right thigh 3 17 he brought present unto eglon king moab eglon wa veri fat man 3 18 when he had made end offer present he sent away peopl that bare present 3 19 but he himself turn again quarri that were gilgal said i have secret errand unto thee o king who said keep silenc all that stood him went him 3 20 ehud came unto him he wa sit summer parlour which he had himself alon ehud said i have messag god unto thee he aros hi seat 3 21 ehud put forth hi left hand took dagger hi right thigh thrust it hi belli 3 22 haft also went blade fat close blade so that he could not draw dagger hi belli dirt came 3 23 then ehud went forth porch shut door parlour him lock them 3 24 when he wa gone hi servant came when they saw that behold door parlour were lock they said sure he covereth hi feet hi summer chamber 3 25 they tarri till they were asham behold he open not door parlour therefor they took key open them behold their lord wa fallen down dead earth 3 26 ehud escap while they tarri pass quarri escap unto seirath 3 27 it came pass when he wa come that he blew trumpet mountain ephraim children israel went down him mount he them 3 28 he said unto them follow me lord hath deliv your enemi moabit your hand they went down him took ford jordan moab suffer not man pass 3 29 they slew moab that time ten thousand men all lusti all men valour there escap not man 3 30 so moab wa subdu that day hand israel land had rest fourscor year 3 31 him wa shamgar son anath which slew philistin six hundr men ox goad he also deliv israel 4 1 children israel again did evil sight lord when ehud wa dead 4 2 lord sold them hand jabin king canaan that reign hazor captain whose host wa sisera which dwelt harosheth gentil 4 3 children israel cri unto lord he had nine hundr chariot iron twenti fled away hi feet tent jael wife heber kenit there wa peac jabin king hazor hous heber kenit 4 18 jael went meet sisera said unto him turn my lord turn me fear not when he had turn unto her tent she cover him mantl 4 19 he said unto her give me i pray thee littl water drink i am thirsti she open bottl milk gave him drink cover him 4 20 again he said unto her stand door tent it shall be when ani wa fast asleep weari so he die 4 22 behold as barak pursu sisera jael came meet him said unto him come i will shew thee man whom thou seekest when he came her tent behold sisera lay dead nail wa hi templ 4 23 so god subdu that day jabin king canaan children israel 4 24 hand children israel prosper prevail against jabin king canaan they had destroy jabin king canaan 5 1 then sang deborah barak against sisera 5 21 river kishon swept them away that ancient river river kishon o my soul thou hast trodden down strength 5 22 then were horsehoof broken mean prans prans their mighti one 5 23 curs ye meroz said angel lord curs ye bitterli inhabit thereof becaus they came not help lord help lord against mighti 5 24 bless women shall jael wife heber kenit be bless shall she be women tent 5 25 he chariot 5 29 her wise ladi answer her yea she return answer herself 5 30 have they not sped have they not divid prey everi man damsel or two sisera prey diver colour prey diver colour needlework diver colour needlework both side meet neck them that take spoil 5 31 so let all thine enemi perish o lord but let them that love him be as sun when he goeth forth hi might land had rest forti year 6 1 children israel did evil sight lord lord deliv them hand midian seven year 6 2 hand midian prevail against israel becaus midianit children israel made them den which are mountain cave strong hold 6 3 so it wa when israel had sown that midianit came amalekit children east even they came against them 6 4 they encamp against them destroy increas earth till thou come unto gaza left no susten israel neither sheep nor ox nor ass 6 5 they came their cattl their tent they came as grasshopp multitud both they their camel were number they enter land destroy it 6 6 israel wa greatli impoverish becaus midianit children israel cri unto lord 6 7 it came pass when children israel cri unto lord becaus midianit 6 8 that lord sent prophet unto children israel which said unto them thu saith lord god israel i brought you egypt brought you forth hous bondag 6 9 i deliv you hand egyptian hand all that oppress you drave them you gave you their land 6 10 i said unto you i am lord your god fear not god amorit whose land ye dwell but ye have not obey my voic 6 11 there came angel lord sat oak which wa ophrah that pertain unto joash abiezrit hi son gideon thresh wheat winepress hide it midianit 6 12 angel lord appear unto him said unto him lord is thee thou mighti man valour 6 13 gideon said unto him oh my lord if lord be us whi then is all thi befallen us where be all hi miracl which our father told us say did not lord bring us egypt but now lord hath forsaken us deliv us hand midianit 6 14 lord look him said go thi thi might thou shalt save israel hand midianit have not i sent thee 6 15 he said unto him oh my lord wherewith shall i save israel behold my famili is poor manasseh i am least my father s hous 6 16 lord said unto him sure i will be thee thou shalt smite midianit as one man 6 17 he said unto him if now i have found grace thi sight then shew me sign that thou talkest me 6 18 depart not henc i pray thee i come unto thee bring forth my present set it thee he said i will tarri thou come again 6 19 gideon went made readi kid unleaven cake ephah flour flesh he put basket he put broth pot brought it unto him oak present it 6 20 angel god said unto him take flesh unleaven cake lay them thi rock pour broth he did so 6 21 then angel lord put forth end staff that wa hi hand touch flesh unleaven cake there rose fire rock consum flesh unleaven cake then angel lord depart hi sight 6 22 when gideon perceiv that he wa angel lord gideon said ala o lord god becaus i have seen angel lord face face 6 23 lord said unto him peac be unto thee fear not thou shalt not die 6 24 then gideon built altar there unto lord call it jehovahshalom unto thi day it is yet ophrah abiezrit 6 25 it came pass same night that lord said unto him take thi father s young bullock even second bullock seven year old throw down altar baal that thi father hath cut down grove that is it 6 26 build altar unto lord thi god top thi rock order place take second bullock offer burnt sacrific wood grove which thou shalt cut down 6 27 then gideon took ten men hi servant did as lord had said unto him so it wa becaus he fear hi father s household men citi that he could not do it day that he did it night 6 28 when men citi aros earli morn behold altar baal wa cast down grove wa cut down that wa it second bullock wa offer altar that wa built 6 29 they said one anoth who hath done thi thing when they enquir ask they said gideon son joash hath done thi thing 6 30 then men citi said unto joash bring thi son that he may die becaus he hath cast down altar baal becaus he hath cut down grove that wa it 6 31 joash said unto all that stood against him will ye plead baal will ye save him he that will plead him let him be put death whilst it is yet morn if he be god let him plead himself becaus one hath cast down hi altar 6 32 therefor that day he call him jerubba say let baal plead against him becaus he hath thrown down hi altar 6 33 then all midianit amalekit children east were gather togeth went pitch valley jezreel 6 34 but spirit lord came gideon he blew trumpet abiez wa gather him 6 35 he sent messeng all manasseh who also wa gather him he sent messeng unto asher unto zebulun unto naphtali they came meet them 6 36 gideon said unto god if thou wilt save israel mine hand as thou hast said 6 37 behold i will put fleec wool floor if dew be fleec onli it be dri all earth besid then shall i know that thou wilt save israel mine hand as thou hast said 6 38 it wa so he rose earli morrow thrust fleec togeth wring dew fleec bowl full water 6 39 gideon said unto god let not thine anger be hot against me i will speak but thi onc let me prove i pray thee but thi onc fleec let it now be dri onli fleec all ground let there be dew 6 40 god did so that night it wa dri fleec onli there wa dew all ground 7 1 then jerubba who is gideon all peopl that were him rose earli pitch besid well harod so that host midianit were north side them hill moreh valley 7 2 lord said unto gideon peopl that are thee are too mani me give midianit their hand lest israel vaunt themselv against me say mine own hand hath save me 7 3 now therefor go proclaim ear peopl say whosoev is fear afraid let him return depart earli mount gilead there return peopl twenti two thousand there remain ten thousand 7 4 lord said unto gideon peopl are yet too mani bring them down unto water i will tri them thee there it shall be that whom i say unto thee thi shall go thee same shall go thee whomsoev i say unto thee thi shall not go thee same shall not go 7 5 so he brought down peopl unto water lord said unto gideon everi one that lappeth water hi tongu as dog lappeth him shalt thou set himself likewis everi one that boweth down hi knee drink 7 6 number them that lap put their hand their mouth were three hundr men but all rest peopl bow down their knee drink water 7 7 lord said unto gideon three hundr men that lap will i save you deliv midianit thine hand let all other peopl go everi man unto hi place 7 8 so peopl took victual their hand their trumpet he sent all rest israel everi man unto hi tent retain those three hundr men host midian wa beneath him valley 7 9 it came pass same night that lord said unto him aris get thee down unto host i have deliv it thine hand 7 10 but if thou fear go down go thou phurah thi servant down host 7 11 thou shalt hear what they say afterward shall thine hand be strengthen go down unto host then went he down phurah hi servant unto outsid arm men that were host 7 12 midianit amalekit all children east lay valley like grasshopp multitud their camel were number as sand sea side multitud 7 13 when gideon wa come behold there wa man that told dream unto hi fellow said behold i dream dream lo cake barley bread tumbl host midian came unto tent smote it that it fell overturn it that tent lay 7 14 hi fellow answer said thi is noth els save sword gideon son joash man israel hi hand hath god deliv midian all host 7 15 it wa so when gideon heard tell dream interpret thereof that he worship return host israel said aris lord hath deliv your hand host midian 7 16 he divid three hundr men three compani he put trumpet everi man s hand empti pitcher lamp pitcher 7 17 he said unto them look me do likewis behold when i come outsid camp it shall be that as i do so shall ye do 7 18 when i blow trumpet i all that are me then blow ye trumpet also everi side all camp say sword lord gideon 7 19 so gideon hundr men that were him came unto outsid camp begin middl watch they had but newli set watch they blew trumpet brake pitcher that were their hand 7 20 three compani blew trumpet brake pitcher held lamp their left hand trumpet their right hand blow withal they cri sword lord gideon 7 21 they stood everi man hi place round camp all host ran cri fled 7 22 three hundr blew trumpet lord set everi man s sword against hi fellow even all host host fled bethshittah zererath border abelmeholah unto tabbath 7 23 men israel gather themselv togeth naphtali asher all manasseh pursu midianit 7 24 gideon sent messeng all mount ephraim say come down against midianit take them water unto bethbarah jordan then all men ephraim gather themselv togeth took water unto bethbarah jordan 7 25 they took two princ midianit oreb zeeb they slew oreb rock oreb zeeb they slew winepress zeeb pursu midian brought head oreb zeeb gideon other side jordan 8 1 men ephraim said unto him whi hast thou serv us thu that thou calledst us not when thou wentest fight midianit they did chide him sharpli 8 2 he said unto them what have i done now comparison you is not glean
