grape ephraim better than vintag abiez 8 3 god hath deliv your hand princ midian oreb zeeb what wa i abl do comparison you then their anger wa abat him when he had said that 8 4 gideon came jordan pass he three hundr men that were him faint yet pursu them 8 5 he said unto men succoth give i pray you loav bread unto peopl that follow me they be faint i am pursu zebah zalmunna king midian 8 6 princ succoth said are hand zebah zalmunna now thine hand that we should give bread unto thine armi 8 7 gideon said therefor when lord hath deliv zebah zalmunna mine hand then i will tear your flesh thorn wilder brier 8 8 he went thenc penuel spake unto them likewis men penuel answer him as men succoth had answer him 8 9 he spake also unto men penuel say when i come again peac i will break down thi tower 8 10 now zebah zalmunna were karkor their host them fifteen thousand men all that were left all host children east there fell hundr twenti thousand men that drew sword 8 11 gideon went way them that dwelt tent east nobah jogbehah smote host host wa secur 8 12 when zebah zalmunna fled he pursu them took two king midian zebah zalmunna discomfit all host 8 13 gideon son joash return battl sun wa 8 14 caught young man men succoth enquir him he describ unto him princ succoth elder thereof even threescor seventeen men 8 15 he came unto men succoth said behold zebah zalmunna whom ye did upbraid me say are hand zebah zalmunna now thine hand that we should give bread unto thi men that are weari 8 16 he took elder citi thorn wilder brier them he taught men succoth 8 17 he beat down tower penuel slew men citi 8 18 then said he unto zebah zalmunna what manner men were they whom ye slew tabor they answer as thou art so were they each one resembl children king 8 19 he said they were my brethren even son my mother as lord liveth if ye had save them aliv i would not slay you 8 20 he said unto jether hi firstborn slay them but youth drew not hi sword he fear becaus he wa yet youth 8 21 then zebah zalmunna said rise thou fall us as man is so is hi strength gideon aros slew zebah zalmunna took away ornament that were their camel neck 8 22 then men israel said unto gideon rule thou us both thou thi son thi son s son also thou hast deliv us hand midian 8 23 gideon said unto them i will not rule you neither shall my son rule you lord shall rule you 8 24 gideon said unto them i would desir request you that ye would give me everi man ear hi prey they had golden ear becaus they were ishmaelit 8 25 they answer we will willingli give them they spread garment did cast therein everi man ear hi prey 8 26 weight golden ear that he request wa thousand seven hundr shekel gold besid ornament collar purpl raiment that wa king midian besid chain that were their camel neck 8 27 gideon made ephod thereof put it hi citi even ophrah all israel went thither whore it which thing becam snare unto gideon hi hous 8 28 thu wa midian subdu children israel so that they lift their head no more countri wa quiet forti year day gideon 8 29 jerubba son joash went dwelt hi own hous 8 30 gideon had threescor ten son hi bodi begotten he had mani wive 8 31 hi concubin that wa shechem she also bare him son whose name he call abimelech 8 32 gideon son joash die good old age wa buri sepulchr joash hi father ophrah abiezrit 8 33 it came pass as soon as gideon wa dead that children israel turn again went whore baalim made baalberith their god 8 34 children israel rememb not lord their god who had deliv them hand all their enemi everi side 8 35 neither shew they kind hous jerubba name gideon accord all good which he had shew unto israel 9 1 abimelech son jerubba went shechem unto hi mother s brethren commun them all famili hous hi mother s father say 9 2 speak i pray you ear all men shechem is better you either that all son jerubba which are threescor ten person reign you or that one reign you rememb also that i am your bone your flesh 9 3 hi mother s brethren spake him ear all men shechem all these word their heart inclin follow abimelech they said he is our brother 9 4 they gave him threescor ten piec silver hous baalberith wherewith abimelech hire vain light person which follow him 9 5 he went unto hi father s hous ophrah slew hi brethren son jerubba be threescor ten person one stone notwithstand yet jotham youngest son jerubba wa left he hid himself 9 6 all men shechem gather togeth all hous millo went made abimelech king plain pillar that wa shechem 9 7 when they told it jotham he went stood top mount gerizim lift hi voic cri said unto them hearken unto me ye men shechem that god may hearken unto you 9 8 tree went forth time anoint king them they said unto oliv tree reign thou us 9 9 but oliv tree said unto them should i leav my fat wherewith me they honour god man go be promot tree 9 10 tree said fig tree come thou reign us 9 11 but fig tree said unto them should i forsak my sweet my good fruit go be promot tree 9 12 then said tree unto vine come thou reign us 9 13 vine said unto them should i leav my wine which cheereth god man go be promot tree 9 14 then said all tree unto brambl come thou reign us 9 15 brambl said unto tree if truth ye anoint me king you then come put your trust my shadow if not let fire come brambl devour cedar lebanon 9 16 now therefor if ye have done truli sincer that ye have made abimelech king if ye have dealt well jerubba hi hous have done unto him accord deserv hi hand 9 17 my father fought you adventur hi life far deliv you hand midian 9 18 ye are risen against my father s hous thi day have slain hi son threescor ten person one stone have made abimelech son hi maidserv king men shechem becaus he is your brother 9 19 if ye then have dealt truli sincer jerubba hi hous thi day then rejoic ye abimelech let him also rejoic you 9 20 but if not let fire come abimelech devour men shechem hous millo let fire come men shechem hous millo devour abimelech 9 21 jotham ran away fled went beer dwelt there fear abimelech hi brother 9 22 when abimelech had reign three year israel 9 23 then god sent evil spirit abimelech men shechem men shechem dealt treacher abimelech 9 24 that cruelti done threescor ten son jerubba might come their blood be laid abimelech their brother which slew them men shechem which aid him kill hi brethren 9 25 men shechem set lier wait him top mountain they rob all that came that way them it wa told abimelech 9 26 gaal son ebe came hi brethren went shechem men shechem put their confid him 9 27 they went field gather their vineyard trode grape made merri went hous their god did eat drink curs abimelech 9 28 gaal son ebe said who is abimelech who is shechem that we should serv him is not he son jerubba zebul hi offic serv men hamor father shechem whi should we serv him 9 29 would god thi peopl were my hand then would i remov abimelech he said abimelech increas thine armi come 9 30 when zebul ruler citi heard word gaal son ebe hi anger wa kindl 9 31 he sent messeng unto abimelech privili say behold gaal son ebe hi brethren be come shechem behold they fortifi citi against thee 9 32 now therefor night thou peopl that is thee lie wait field 9 33 it shall be that morn as soon as sun is thou shalt rise earli set citi behold when he peopl that is him come against thee then mayest thou do them as thou shalt find occas 9 34 abimelech rose all peopl that were him night they laid wait against shechem four compani 9 35 gaal son ebe went stood enter gate citi abimelech rose peopl that were him lie wait 9 36 when gaal saw peopl he said zebul behold there come peopl down top mountain zebul said unto him thou seest shadow mountain as if they were men 9 37 gaal spake again said see there come peopl down middl land anoth compani come plain meonenim 9 38 then said zebul unto him where is now thi mouth wherewith thou saidst who is abimelech that we should serv him is not thi peopl that thou hast despis go i pray now fight them 9 39 gaal went men shechem fought abimelech 9 40 abimelech chase him he fled him mani were overthrown wound even unto enter gate 9 41 abimelech dwelt arumah zebul thrust gaal hi brethren that they should not dwell shechem 9 42 it came pass morrow that peopl went field they told abimelech 9 43 he took peopl divid them three compani laid wait field look behold peopl were come forth citi he rose against them smote them 9 44 abimelech compani that wa him rush forward stood enter gate citi two other compani ran all peopl that were field slew them 9 45 abimelech fought against citi all that day he took citi slew peopl that wa therein beat down citi sow it salt 9 46 when all men tower shechem heard that they enter hold hous god berith 9 47 it wa told abimelech that all men tower shechem were gather togeth 9 48 abimelech gat him mount zalmon he all peopl that were him abimelech took axe hi hand cut down bough tree took it laid it hi shoulder said unto peopl that were him what ye have seen me do make hast do as i have done 9 49 all peopl likewis cut down everi man hi bough follow abimelech put them hold set hold fire them so that all men tower shechem die also thousand men women 9 50 then went abimelech thebez encamp against thebez took it 9 51 but there wa strong tower citi thither fled all men women all they citi shut it them gat them top tower 9 52 abimelech came unto tower fought against it went hard unto door tower burn it fire 9 53 certain woman cast piec millston abimelech s head all brake hi skull 9 54 then he call hastili unto young man hi armourbear said unto him draw thi sword slay me that men say not me women slew him hi young man thrust him he die 9 55 when men israel saw that abimelech wa dead they depart everi man unto hi place 9 56 thu god render wicked abimelech which he did unto hi father slay hi seventi brethren 9 57 all evil men shechem did god render their head them came curs jotham son jerubba 10 1 abimelech there aros defend israel tola son puah son dodo man issachar he dwelt shamir mount ephraim 10 2 he judg israel twenti three year die wa buri shamir 10 3 him aros jair gileadit judg israel twenti two year 10 4 he had thirti son that rode thirti ass colt they had thirti citi which are call havothjair unto thi day which are land gilead 10 5 jair die wa buri camon 10 6 children israel did evil again sight lord serv baalim ashtaroth god syria god zidon god moab god children ammon god philistin forsook lord serv not him 10 7 anger lord wa hot against israel he sold them hand philistin hand children ammon 10 8 that year they vex oppress children israel eighteen year all children israel that were other side jordan land amorit which is gilead 10 9 moreov children ammon pass jordan fight also against judah against benjamin against hous ephraim so that israel wa sore distress 10 10 children israel cri unto lord say we have sin against thee both becaus we have forsaken our god also serv baalim 10 11 lord said unto children israel did not i deliv you egyptian amorit children ammon philistin 10 12 zidonian also amalekit maonit did oppress you ye cri me i deliv you their hand 10 13 yet ye have forsaken me serv other god wherefor i will deliv you no more 10 14 go cri unto god which ye have chosen let them deliv you time your tribul 10 15 children israel said unto lord we have sin do thou unto us whatsoev seemeth good unto thee deliv us onli we pray thee thi day 10 16 they put away strang god them serv lord hi soul wa griev miseri israel 10 17 then children ammon were gather togeth encamp gilead children israel assembl themselv togeth encamp mizpeh 10 18 peopl princ gilead said one anoth what man is he that will begin fight against children ammon he shall be head all inhabit gilead 11 1 now jephthah gileadit wa mighti man valour he wa son harlot gilead begat jephthah 11 2 gilead s wife bare him son hi wife s son grew they thrust jephthah said unto him thou shalt not inherit our father s hous thou art son strang woman 11 3 then jephthah fled hi brethren dwelt land tob there were gather vain men jephthah went him 11 4 it came pass process time that children ammon made war against israel 11 5 it wa so that when children ammon made war against israel elder gilead went fetch jephthah land tob 11 6 they said unto jephthah come be our captain that we may fight children ammon 11 7 jephthah said unto elder gilead did not ye hate me expel me my father s hous whi are ye come unto me now when ye are distress 11 8 elder gilead said unto jephthah therefor we turn again thee now that thou mayest go us fight against children ammon be our head all inhabit gilead 11 9 jephthah said unto elder gilead if ye bring me home again fight against children ammon lord deliv them me shall i be your head 11 10 elder gilead said unto jephthah lord be wit us if we do not so accord thi word 11 11 then jephthah went elder gilead peopl made him head captain them jephthah utter all hi word lord mizpeh 11 12 jephthah sent messeng unto king children ammon say what hast thou do me that thou art come against me fight my land 11 13 king children ammon answer unto messeng jephthah becaus israel took away my land when they came egypt arnon even unto jabbok unto jordan now therefor restor those land again peaceabl 11 14 jephthah sent messeng again unto king children ammon 11 15 said unto him thu saith jephthah israel took not away land moab nor land children ammon 11 16 but when israel came egypt walk wilder unto red sea came kadesh 11 17 then israel sent messeng unto king edom say let me i pray thee pass thi land but king edom would not hearken thereto like manner they sent unto king moab but he would not consent israel abod kadesh 11 18 then they went wilder compass land edom land moab came east side land moab pitch other side arnon but came not border moab arnon wa border moab 11 19 israel sent messeng unto sihon king amorit king heshbon israel said unto him let us pass we pray thee thi land my place 11 20 but sihon trust not israel pass hi coast but sihon gather all hi peopl togeth pitch jahaz fought against israel 11 21 lord god israel deliv sihon all hi peopl hand israel they smote them so israel possess all land amorit inhabit that countri 11 22 they possess all coast amorit arnon even unto jabbok wilder even unto jordan 11 23 so now lord god israel hath dispossess amorit hi peopl israel shouldest thou possess it 11 24 wilt not thou possess that which chemosh thi god giveth thee possess so whomsoev lord our god shall drive us them will we possess 11 25 now art thou ani thing better than balak son zippor king moab did he ever strive against israel or did he ever fight against them 11 26 while israel dwelt heshbon her town aroer her town all citi that be coast arnon three hundr year whi therefor did ye not recov them that time 11 27 wherefor i have not sin against thee but thou doest me wrong war against me lord judg be judg thi day children israel children ammon 11 28 howbeit king children ammon hearken not unto word jephthah which he sent him 11 29 then spirit lord came jephthah he pass gilead manasseh pass mizpeh gilead mizpeh gilead he pass unto children ammon 11 30 jephthah vow vow unto lord said if thou shalt fail deliv children ammon mine hand 11 31 then it shall be that whatsoev cometh forth door my hous meet me when i return peac children ammon shall sure be lord s i will offer it burnt offer 11 32 so jephthah pass unto children ammon fight against them lord deliv them hi hand 11 33 he smote them aroer even till thou come minnith even twenti citi unto plain vineyard veri great slaughter thu children ammon were subdu children israel 11 34 jephthah came mizpeh unto hi hous behold hi daughter came meet him timbrel danc she wa hi onli child besid her he had neither son nor daughter 11 35 it came pass when he saw her that he rent hi cloth said ala my daughter thou hast brought me veri low thou art one them that troubl me i have open my mouth unto lord i cannot go back 11 36 she said unto him my father if thou hast open thi mouth unto lord do me accord that which hath proceed thi mouth forasmuch as lord hath taken vengeanc thee thine enemi even children ammon 11 37 she said unto her father let thi thing be done me let me alon two month that i may go down mountain bewail my virgin i my fellow 11 38 he said go he sent her away two month she went her companion bewail her virgin mountain 11 39 it came pass end two month that she return unto her father who did her accord hi vow which he had vow she knew no man it wa custom israel 11 40 that daughter israel went yearli lament daughter jephthah gileadit four day year 12 1 men ephraim gather themselv togeth went northward said unto jephthah wherefor passedst thou fight against children ammon didst not call us go thee we will burn thine hous thee fire 12 2 jephthah said unto them i my peopl were great strife children ammon when i call you ye deliv me not their hand 12 3 when i saw that ye deliv me not i put my life my hand pass against children ammon lord deliv them my hand wherefor then are ye come unto me thi day fight against me 12 4 then jephthah gather togeth all men gilead fought ephraim men gilead smote ephraim becaus they said ye gileadit are fugit ephraim ephraimit manassit 12 5 gileadit took passag jordan ephraimit it wa so that when those ephraimit which were escap said let me go that men gilead said unto him art thou ephraimit if he said nay 12 6 then said they unto him say now shibboleth he said sibboleth he could not frame pronounc it right then they took him slew him passag jordan there fell that time ephraimit forti two thousand 12 7 jephthah judg israel six year then die jephthah gileadit wa buri one citi gilead 12 8 him ibzan bethlehem judg israel 12 9 he had thirti son thirti daughter whom he sent abroad took thirti daughter abroad hi son he judg israel seven year 12 10 then die ibzan wa buri bethlehem 12 11 him elon zebulonit judg israel he judg israel ten year 12 12 elon zebulonit die wa buri aijalon countri zebulun 12 13 him abdon son hillel pirathonit judg israel 12 14 he had forti son thirti nephew that rode threescor ten ass colt he judg israel eight year 12 15 abdon son hillel pirathonit die wa buri pirathon land ephraim mount amalekit 13 1 children israel did evil again sight lord lord deliv them hand philistin forti year 13 2 there wa certain man zorah famili danit whose name wa manoah hi wife wa barren bare not 13 3 angel lord appear unto woman said unto her behold now thou art barren bearest not but thou shalt conceiv bear son 13 4 now therefor bewar i pray thee drink not wine nor strong drink eat not ani unclean thing 13 5 lo thou shalt conceiv bear son no razor shall come hi head child shall be nazarit unto god womb he shall begin deliv israel hand philistin 13 6 then woman came told her husband say man god came unto me hi counten wa like counten angel god veri terribl but i ask him not whenc he wa neither told he me hi name 13 7 but he said unto me behold thou shalt conceiv bear son now drink no wine nor strong drink neither eat ani unclean thing child shall be nazarit god womb day hi death 13 8 then manoah intreat lord said o my lord let man god which thou didst send come again unto us teach us what we shall do unto child that shall be born 13 9 god hearken voic manoah angel god came again unto woman as she sat field but manoah her husband wa not her 13 10 woman made hast ran shew her husband said unto him behold man hath appear unto me that came unto me other day 13 11 manoah aros went hi wife came man said unto him art thou man that spakest unto woman he said i am 13 12 manoah said now let thi word come pass how shall we order child how shall we do unto him 13 13 angel lord said unto manoah all that i said unto woman let her bewar 13 14 she may not eat ani thing that cometh vine neither let her drink wine or strong drink nor eat ani unclean thing all that i command her let her observ 13 15 manoah said unto angel lord i pray thee let us detain thee we shall have made readi kid thee 13 16 angel lord said unto manoah though thou detain me i will not eat thi bread if thou wilt offer burnt offer thou must offer it unto lord manoah knew not that he wa angel lord 13 17 manoah said unto angel lord what is thi name that when thi say come pass we may do thee honour 13 18 angel lord said unto him whi askest thou thu my name see it is secret 13 19 so manoah took kid meat offer offer it rock unto lord angel did wonder manoah hi wife look 13 20 it came pass when flame went heaven off altar that angel lord ascend flame altar manoah hi wife look it fell their face ground 13 21 but angel lord did no more appear manoah hi wife then manoah knew that he wa angel lord 13 22 manoah said unto hi wife we shall sure die becaus we have seen god 13 23 but hi wife said unto him if lord were pleas kill us he would not have receiv burnt offer meat offer our hand neither would he have shew us all these thing nor would as thi time have told us such thing as these 13 24 woman bare son call hi name samson child grew lord bless him 13 25 spirit lord began move him time camp dan zorah eshtaol 14 1 samson went down timnath saw woman timnath daughter philistin 14 2 he came told hi father hi mother said i have seen woman timnath daughter philistin now therefor get her me wife 14 3 then hi father hi mother said unto him is there never woman daughter thi brethren or all my peopl that thou goest take wife uncircumcis philistin samson said unto hi father get her me she pleaseth me well 14 4 but hi father hi mother knew not that it wa lord that he sought occas against philistin that time philistin had dominion israel 14 5 then went samson down hi father hi mother timnath came vineyard timnath behold young lion roar against him 14 6 spirit lord came mightili him he rent him as he would have rent kid he had noth hi hand but he told not hi father or hi mother what he had done 14 7 he went down talk woman she pleas samson well 14 8 time he return take her he turn asid see carcas lion behold there wa swarm bee honey carcas lion 14 9 he took thereof hi hand went eat came hi father mother he gave them they did eat but he told not them that he had taken honey carcas lion 14 10 so hi father went down unto woman samson made there feast so use young men do 14 11 it came pass when they saw him that they brought thirti companion be him 14 12 samson said unto them i will now put forth riddl unto you if ye can certainli declar it me seven day feast find it then i will give you thirti sheet thirti chang garment 14 13 but if ye cannot declar it me then shall ye give me thirti sheet thirti chang garment they said unto him put forth thi riddl that we may hear it 14 14 he said unto them eater came forth meat strong came forth sweet they could not three day expound riddl 14 15 it came pass seventh day that they said unto samson s wife entic thi husband that he may declar unto us riddl lest we burn thee thi father s hous fire have ye call us take that we have is it not so 14 16 samson s wife wept him said thou dost but hate me lovest me not thou hast put forth riddl unto children my peopl hast not told it me he said unto her behold i have not told it my father nor my mother shall i tell it thee 14 17 she wept him seven day while their feast last it came pass seventh day that he told her becaus she lay sore him she told riddl children her peopl 14 18 men citi said unto him seventh day sun went down what is sweeter than honey what is stronger than lion he said unto them if ye had not plow my heifer ye had not found my riddl 14 19 spirit lord came him he went down ashkelon slew thirti men them took their spoil gave chang garment unto them which expound riddl hi anger wa kindl he went hi father s hous 14 20 but samson s wife wa given hi companion whom he had use as hi friend 15 1 but it came pass while time wheat harvest that samson visit hi wife kid he said i will go my wife chamber but her father would not suffer him go 15 2 her father said i verili thought that thou hadst utterli hate her therefor i gave her thi companion is not her younger sister fairer than she take her i pray thee instead her 15 3 samson said concern them now shall i be more blameless than philistin though i do them displeasur 15 4 samson went caught three hundr fox took firebrand turn tail tail put firebrand midst two tail 15 5 when he had set brand fire he let them go stand corn philistin burnt both shock also stand corn vineyard oliv 15 6 then philistin said who hath done thi they answer samson son law timnit becaus he had taken hi wife given her hi companion philistin came burnt her her father fire 15 7 samson said unto them though ye have done thi yet will i be aveng you that i will ceas 15 8 he smote them hip thigh great slaughter he went down dwelt top rock etam 15 9 then philistin went pitch judah spread themselv lehi 15 10 men judah said whi are ye come against us they answer bind samson are we come do him as he hath done us 15 11 then three thousand men judah went top rock etam said samson knowest thou not that philistin are ruler us what is thi that thou hast done unto us he said unto them as they did unto me so have i done unto them 15 12 they said unto him we are come down bind thee that we may deliv thee hand philistin samson said unto them swear unto me that ye will not fall me yourselv 15 13 they spake unto him say no but we will bind thee fast deliv thee their hand but sure we will not kill thee they bound him two new cord brought him rock 15 14 when he came unto lehi philistin shout against him spirit lord came mightili him cord that were hi arm becam as flax that wa burnt fire hi band loos off hi hand 15 15 he found new jawbon ass put forth hi hand took it slew thousand men therewith 15 16 samson said jawbon ass heap heap jaw ass have i slain thousand men 15 17 it came pass when he had made end speak that he cast away jawbon hi hand call that place ramathlehi 15 18 he wa sore athirst call lord said thou hast given thi great deliver hand thi servant now shall i die thirst fall hand uncircumcis 15 19 but god clave hollow place that wa jaw there came water thereout when he had drunk hi spirit came again he reviv wherefor he call name thereof enhakkor which is lehi unto thi day 15 20 he judg israel day philistin twenti year 16 1 then went samson gaza saw there harlot went unto her 16 2 it wa told gazit say samson is come hither they compass him laid wait him all night gate citi were quiet all night say morn when it is day we shall kill him 16 3 samson lay till midnight aros midnight took door gate citi two post went away them bar all put them hi shoulder carri them top hill that is hebron 16 4 it came pass afterward that he love woman valley sorek whose name wa delilah 16 5 lord philistin came unto her said unto her entic him see wherein hi great strength lieth what mean we may prevail against him that we may bind him afflict him we will give thee everi one us eleven hundr piec silver 16 6 delilah said samson tell me i pray thee wherein thi great strength lieth wherewith thou mightest be bound afflict thee 16 7 samson said unto her if they bind me seven green with that were never dri then shall i be weak be as anoth man 16 8 then lord philistin brought her seven green with which had not been dri she bound him them 16 9 now there were men lie wait abid her chamber she said unto him philistin be thee samson he brake with as thread tow is broken when it toucheth fire so hi strength wa not known 16 10 delilah said unto samson behold thou hast mock me told me lie now tell me i pray thee wherewith thou mightest be bound 16 11 he said unto her if they bind me fast new rope that never were occupi then shall i be weak be as anoth man 16 12 delilah therefor took new rope bound him therewith said unto him philistin be thee samson there were lier wait abid chamber he brake them off hi arm like thread 16 13 delilah said unto samson hitherto thou hast mock me told me lie tell me wherewith thou mightest be bound he said unto her if thou weavest seven lock my head web 16 14 she fasten it pin said unto him philistin be thee samson he awak hi sleep went away pin beam web 16 15 she said unto him how canst thou say i love thee when thine heart is not me thou hast mock me these three time hast not told me wherein thi great strength lieth 16 16 it came pass when she press him daili her word urg him so that hi soul wa vex unto death 16 17 that he told her all hi heart said unto her there hath not come razor mine head i have been nazarit unto god my mother s womb if i be shaven then my strength will go me i shall becom weak be like ani other man 16 18 when delilah saw that he had told her all hi heart she sent call lord philistin say come thi onc he hath shew me all hi heart then lord philistin came unto her brought money their hand 16 19 she made him sleep her knee she call man she caus him shave off seven lock hi head she began afflict him hi strength went him 16 20 she said philistin be thee samson he awok hi sleep said i will go as other time shake myself he wist not that lord wa depart him 16 21 but philistin took him put hi eye brought him down gaza bound him fetter brass he did grind prison hous 16 22 howbeit hair hi head began grow again he wa shaven 16 23 then lord philistin gather them togeth offer great sacrific unto dagon their god rejoic they said our god hath deliv samson our enemi our hand 16 24 when peopl saw him they prais their god they said our god hath deliv our hand our enemi destroy our countri which slew mani us 16 25 it came pass when their heart were merri that they said call samson that he may make us sport they call samson prison hous he made them sport they set him pillar 16 26 samson said unto lad that held him hand suffer me that i may feel pillar whereupon hous standeth that i may lean them 16 27 now hous wa full men women all lord philistin were there there were roof three thousand men women that beheld while samson made sport 16 28 samson call unto lord said o lord god rememb me i pray thee strengthen me i pray thee onli thi onc o god that i may be onc aveng philistin my two eye 16 29 samson took hold two middl pillar which hous stood which it wa born one hi right hand other hi left 16 30 samson said let me die philistin he bow himself all hi might hous fell lord all peopl that were therein so dead which he slew hi death were more than they which he slew hi life 16 31 then hi brethren all hous hi father came down took him brought him buri him zorah eshtaol buryingplac manoah hi father he judg israel twenti year 17 1 there wa man mount ephraim whose name wa micah 17 2 he said unto hi mother eleven hundr shekel silver that were taken thee which thou cursedst spakest also mine ear behold silver is me i took it hi mother said bless be thou lord my son 17 3 when he had restor eleven hundr shekel silver hi mother hi mother said i had wholli dedic silver unto lord my hand my son make graven imag molten imag now therefor i will restor it unto thee 17 4 yet he restor money unto hi mother hi mother took two hundr shekel silver gave them founder who made thereof graven imag molten imag they were hous micah 17 5 man micah had hous god made ephod teraphim consecr one hi son who becam hi priest 17 6 those day there wa no king israel but everi man did that which wa right hi own eye 17 7 there wa young man bethlehemjudah famili judah who wa levit he sojourn there 17 8 man depart citi bethlehemjudah sojourn where he could find place he came mount ephraim hous micah as he journey 17 9 micah said unto him whenc comest thou he said unto him i am levit bethlehemjudah i go sojourn where i may find place 17 10 micah said unto him dwell me be unto me father priest i will give thee ten shekel silver year suit apparel thi victual so levit went 17 11 levit wa content dwell man young man wa unto him as one hi son 17 12 micah consecr levit young man becam hi priest wa hous micah 17 13 then said micah now know i that lord will do me good see i have levit my priest 18 1 those day there wa no king israel those day tribe danit sought them inherit dwell unto that day all their inherit had not fallen unto them tribe israel 18 2 children dan sent their famili five men their coast men valour zorah eshtaol spi land search it they said unto them go search land who when they came mount ephraim hous micah they lodg there 18 3 when they were hous micah they knew voic young man levit they turn thither said unto him who brought thee hither what makest thou thi place what hast thou here 18 4 he said unto them thu thu dealeth micah me hath hire me i am hi priest 18 5 they said unto him ask counsel we pray thee god that we may know our way which we go shall be prosper 18 6 priest said unto them go peac lord is your way wherein ye go 18 7 then five men depart came laish saw peopl that were therein how they dwelt careless manner zidonian quiet secur there wa no magistr land that might put them shame ani thing they were far zidonian had no busi ani man 18 8 they came unto their brethren zorah eshtaol their brethren said unto them what say ye 18 9 they said aris that we may go against them we have seen land behold it is veri good are ye still be not sloth go enter possess land 18 10 when ye go ye shall come unto peopl secur larg land god hath given it your hand place where there is no want ani thing that is earth 18 11 there went thenc famili danit zorah eshtaol six hundr men appoint weapon war 18 12 they went pitch kirjathjearim judah wherefor they call that place mahanehdan unto thi day behold it is behind kirjathjearim 18 13 they pass thenc unto mount ephraim came unto hous micah 18 14 then answer five men that went spi countri laish said unto their brethren do ye know that there is these hous ephod teraphim graven imag molten imag now therefor consid what ye have do 18 15 they turn thitherward came hous young man levit even unto hous micah salut him 18 16 six hundr men appoint their weapon war which were children dan stood enter gate 18 17 five men that went spi land went came thither took graven imag ephod teraphim molten imag priest stood enter gate six hundr men that were appoint weapon war 18 18 these went micah s hous fetch carv imag ephod teraphim molten imag then said priest unto them what do ye 18 19 they said unto him hold thi peac lay thine hand thi mouth go us be us father priest is it better thee be priest unto hous one man or that thou be priest unto tribe famili israel 18 20 priest s heart wa glad he took ephod teraphim graven imag went midst peopl 18 21 so they turn depart put littl one cattl carriag them 18 22 when they were good way hous micah men that were hous near micah s hous were gather togeth overtook children dan 18 23 they cri unto children dan they turn their face said unto micah what aileth thee that thou comest such compani 18 24 he said ye have taken away my god which i made priest ye are gone away what have i more what is thi that ye say unto me what aileth thee 18 25 children dan said unto him let not thi voic be heard us lest angri fellow run thee thou lose thi life live thi household 18 26 children dan went their way when micah saw that they were too strong him he turn went back unto hi hous 18 27 they took thing which micah had made priest which he had came unto laish unto peopl that were quiet secur they smote them edg sword burnt citi fire 18 28 there wa no deliver becaus it wa far zidon they had no busi ani man it wa valley that lieth bethrehob they built citi dwelt therein 18 29 they call name citi dan name dan their father who wa born unto israel howbeit name citi wa laish first 18 30 children dan set graven imag jonathan son gershom son manasseh he hi son were priest tribe dan day captiv land 18 31 they set them micah s graven imag which he made all time that hous god wa shiloh 19 1 it came pass those day when there wa no king israel that there wa certain levit sojourn side mount ephraim who took him concubin bethlehemjudah 19 2 hi concubin play whore against him went away him unto her father s hous bethlehemjudah wa there four whole month 19 3 her husband aros went her speak friendli unto her bring her again have hi servant him coupl ass she brought him her father s hous when father damsel saw him he rejoic meet him 19 4 hi father law damsel s father retain him he abod him three day so they did eat drink lodg there 19 5 it came pass fourth day when they aros earli morn that he rose depart damsel s father said unto hi son law comfort thine heart morsel bread afterward go your way 19 6 they sat down did eat drink both them togeth damsel s father had said unto man be content i pray thee tarri all night let thine heart be merri 19 7 when man rose depart hi father law urg him therefor he lodg there again 19 8 he aros earli morn fifth day depart damsel s father said comfort thine heart i pray thee they tarri afternoon they did eat both them 19 9 when man rose depart he hi concubin hi servant hi father law damsel s father said unto him behold now day draweth even i pray you tarri all night behold day groweth end lodg here that thine heart may be merri morrow get you earli your way that thou mayest go home 19 10 but man would not tarri that night but he rose depart came against jebu which is jerusalem there were him two ass saddl hi concubin also wa him 19 11 when they were jebu day wa far spent servant said unto hi master come i pray thee let us turn thi citi jebusit lodg it 19 12 hi master said unto him we will not turn asid hither citi stranger that is not children israel we will pass gibeah 19 13 he said unto hi servant come let us draw near one these place lodg all night gibeah or ramah 19 14 they pass went their way sun went down them when they were gibeah which belongeth benjamin 19 15 they turn asid thither go lodg gibeah when he went he sat him down street citi there wa no man that took them hi hous lodg 19 16 behold there came old man hi work field even which wa also mount ephraim he sojourn gibeah but men place were benjamit 19 17 when he had lift hi eye he saw wayfar man street citi old man said whither goest thou whenc comest thou 19 18 he said unto him we are pass bethlehemjudah side mount ephraim thenc am i i went bethlehemjudah but i am now go hous lord there is no man that receiveth me hous 19 19 yet there is both straw provend our ass there is bread wine also me thi handmaid young man which is thi servant there is no want ani thing 19 20 old man said peac be thee howsoev let all thi want lie me onli lodg not street 19 21 so he brought him hi hous gave provend unto ass they wash their feet did eat drink 19 22 now as they were make their heart merri behold men citi certain son belial beset hous round beat door spake master hous old man say bring forth man that came thine hous that we may know him 19 23 man master hous went unto them said unto them nay my brethren nay i pray you do not so wickedli see that thi man is come mine hous do not thi folli 19 24 behold here is my daughter maiden hi concubin them i will bring now humbl ye them do them what seemeth good unto you but unto thi man do not so vile thing 19 25 but men would not hearken him so man took hi concubin brought her forth unto them they knew her abus her all night morn when day began spring they let her go 19 26 then came woman dawn day fell down door man s hous where her lord wa till it wa light 19 27 her lord rose morn open door hous went go hi way behold woman hi concubin wa fallen down door hous her hand were threshold 19 28 he said unto her let us be go but none answer then man took her ass man rose gat him unto hi place 19 29 when he wa come hi hous he took knife laid hold hi concubin divid her togeth her bone twelv piec sent her all coast israel 19 30 it wa so that all that saw it said there wa no such deed done nor seen day that children israel came land egypt unto thi day consid it take advic speak your mind 20 1 then all children israel went congreg wa gather togeth as one man dan even beersheba land gilead unto lord mizpeh 20 2 chief all peopl even all tribe israel present themselv assembl peopl god four hundr thousand footmen that drew sword 20 3 now children benjamin heard that children israel were gone mizpeh then said children israel tell us how wa thi wicked 20 4 levit husband woman that wa slain answer said i came gibeah that belongeth benjamin i my concubin lodg 20 5 men gibeah rose against me beset hous round me night thought have slain me my concubin have they forc that she is dead 20 6 i took my concubin cut her piec sent her all countri inherit israel they have commit lewd folli israel 20 7 behold ye are all children israel give here your advic counsel 20 8 all peopl aros as one man say we will not ani us go hi tent neither will we ani us turn hi hous 20 9 but now thi shall be thing which we will do gibeah we will go lot against it 20 10 we will take ten men hundr all tribe israel hundr thousand thousand ten thousand fetch victual peopl that they may do when they come gibeah benjamin accord all folli that they have wrought israel 20 11 so all men israel were gather against citi knit togeth as one man 20 12 tribe israel sent men all tribe benjamin say what wicked is thi that is done you 20 13 now therefor deliv us men children belial which are gibeah that we may put them death put away evil israel but children benjamin would not hearken voic their brethren children israel 20 14 but children benjamin gather themselv togeth citi unto gibeah go battl against children israel 20 15 children benjamin were number that time citi twenti six thousand men that drew sword besid inhabit gibeah which were number seven hundr chosen men 20 16 all thi peopl there were seven hundr chosen men lefthand everi one could sling stone hair breadth not miss 20 17 men israel besid benjamin were number four hundr thousand men that drew sword all these were men war 20 18 children israel aros went hous god ask counsel god said which us shall go first battl against children benjamin lord said judah shall go first 20 19 children israel rose morn encamp against gibeah 20 20 men israel went battl against benjamin men israel put themselv array fight against them gibeah 20 21 children benjamin came forth gibeah destroy down ground israelit that day twenti two thousand men 20 22 peopl men israel encourag themselv set their battl again array place where they put themselv array first day 20 23 children israel went wept lord even ask counsel lord say shall i go again battl against children benjamin my brother lord said go against him 20 24 children israel came near against children benjamin second day 20 25 benjamin went forth against them gibeah second day destroy down ground children israel again eighteen thousand men all these drew sword 20 26 then all children israel all peopl went came unto hous god wept sat there lord fast that day even offer burnt offer peac offer lord 20 27 children israel enquir lord ark coven god wa there those day 20 28 phineha son eleazar son aaron stood it those day say shall i yet again go battl against children benjamin my brother or shall i ceas lord said go morrow i will deliv them thine hand 20 29 israel set lier wait round gibeah 20 30 children israel went against children benjamin third day put themselv array against gibeah as other time 20 31 children benjamin went against peopl were drawn away citi they began smite peopl kill as other time highway which one goeth hous god other gibeah field thirti men israel 20 32 children benjamin said they are smitten down us as first but children israel said let us flee draw them citi unto highway 20 33 all men israel rose their place put themselv array baaltamar lier wait israel came forth their place even meadow gibeah 20 34 there came against gibeah ten thousand chosen men all israel battl wa sore but they knew not that evil wa near them 20 35 lord smote benjamin israel children israel destroy benjamit that day twenti five thousand hundr men all these drew sword 20 36 so children benjamin saw that they were smitten men israel gave place benjamit becaus they trust unto lier wait which they had set besid gibeah 20 37 lier wait hast rush gibeah lier wait drew themselv smote all citi edg sword 20 38 now there wa appoint sign men israel lier wait that they should make great flame smoke rise citi 20 39 when men israel retir battl benjamin began smite kill men israel thirti person they said sure they are smitten down us as first battl 20 40 but when flame began aris citi pillar smoke benjamit look behind them behold flame citi ascend heaven 20 41 when men israel turn again men benjamin were amaz they saw that evil wa come them 20 42 therefor they turn their back men israel unto way wilder but battl overtook them them which came citi they destroy midst them 20 43 thu they inclos benjamit round chase them trode them down eas against gibeah sunris 20 44 there fell benjamin eighteen thousand men all these were men valour 20 45 they turn fled wilder unto rock rimmon they glean them highway five thousand men pursu hard them unto gidom slew two thousand men them 20 46 so that all which fell that day benjamin were twenti five thousand men that drew sword all these were men valour 20 47 but six hundr men turn fled wilder unto rock rimmon abod rock rimmon four month 20 48 men israel turn again children benjamin smote them edg sword as well men everi citi as beast all that came hand also they set fire all citi that they came 21 1 now men israel had sworn mizpeh say there shall not ani us give hi daughter unto benjamin wife 21 2 peopl came hous god abod there till even god lift their voic wept sore 21 3 said o lord god israel whi is thi come pass israel that there should be day one tribe lack israel 21 4 it came pass morrow that peopl rose earli built there altar offer burnt offer peac offer 21 5 children israel said who is there all tribe israel that came not congreg unto lord they had made great oath concern him that came not lord mizpeh say he shall sure be put death 21 6 children israel repent them benjamin their brother said there is one tribe cut off israel thi day 21 7 how shall we do wive them that remain see we have sworn lord that we will not give them our daughter wive 21 8 they said what one is there tribe israel that came not mizpeh lord behold there came none camp jabeshgilead assembl 21 9 peopl were number behold there were none inhabit jabeshgilead there 21 10 congreg sent thither twelv thousand men valiantest command them say go smite inhabit jabeshgilead edg sword women children 21 11 thi is thing that ye shall do ye shall utterli destroy everi male everi woman that hath lain man 21 12 they found inhabit jabeshgilead four hundr young virgin that had known no man lie ani male they brought them unto camp shiloh which is land canaan 21 13 whole congreg sent some speak children benjamin that were rock rimmon call peaceabl unto them 21 14 benjamin came again that time they gave them wive which they had save aliv women jabeshgilead yet so they suffic them not 21 15 peopl repent them benjamin becaus that lord had made breach tribe israel 21 16 then elder congreg said how shall we do wive them that remain see women are destroy benjamin 21 17 they said there must be inherit them that be escap benjamin that tribe be not destroy israel 21 18 howbeit we may not give them wive our daughter children israel have sworn say curs be he that giveth wife benjamin 21 19 then they said behold there is feast lord shiloh yearli place which is north side bethel east side highway that goeth bethel shechem south lebonah 21 20 therefor they command children benjamin say go lie wait vineyard 21 21 see behold if daughter shiloh come danc danc then come ye vineyard catch you everi man hi wife daughter shiloh go land benjamin 21 22 it shall be when their father or their brethren come unto us complain that we will say unto them be favour unto them our sake becaus we reserv not each man hi wife war ye did not give unto them thi time that ye should be guilti 21 23 children benjamin did so took them wive accord their number them that danc whom they caught they went return unto their inherit repair citi dwelt them 21 24 children israel depart thenc that time everi man hi tribe hi famili they went thenc everi man hi inherit 21 25 those day there wa no king israel everi man did that which wa right hi own eye book ruth 1 1 now it came pass day when judg rule that there wa famin land certain man bethlehemjudah went sojourn countri moab he hi wife hi two son 1 2 name man wa elimelech name hi wife naomi name hi two son mahlon chilion ephrathit bethlehemjudah they came countri moab continu there 1 3 elimelech naomi s husband die she wa left her two son 1 4 they took them wive women moab name one wa orpah name other ruth they dwell there ten year 1 5 mahlon chilion die also both them woman wa left her two son her husband 1 6 then she aros her daughter law that she might return countri moab she had heard countri moab how that lord had visit hi peopl give them bread 1 7 wherefor she went forth place where she wa her two daughter law her they went way return unto land judah 1 8 naomi said unto her two daughter law go return each her mother s hous lord deal kindli you as ye have dealt dead me 1 9 lord grant you that ye may find rest each you hous her husband then she kiss them they lift their voic wept 1 10 they said unto her sure we will return thee unto thi peopl 1 11 naomi said turn again my daughter whi will ye go me are there yet ani more son my womb that they may be your husband 1 12 turn again my daughter go your way i am too old have husband if i should say i have hope if i should have husband also night should also bear son 1 13 would ye tarri them till they were grown would ye stay them have husband nay my daughter it grieveth me much your sake that hand lord is gone against me 1 14 they lift their voic wept again orpah kiss her mother law but ruth clave unto her 1 15 she said behold thi sister law is gone back unto her peopl unto her god return thou thi sister law 1 16 ruth said intreat me not leav thee or return follow thee whither thou goest i will go where thou lodgest i will lodg thi peopl shall be my peopl thi god my god 1 17 where thou diest will i die there will i be buri lord do so me more also if ought but death part thee me 1 18 when she saw that she wa stedfastli mind go her then she left speak unto her 1 19 so they two went they came bethlehem it came pass when they were come bethlehem that all citi wa move them they said is thi naomi 1 20 she said unto them call me not naomi call me mara almighti hath dealt veri bitterli me 1 21 i went full lord hath brought me home again empti whi then call ye me naomi see lord hath testifi against me almighti hath afflict me 1 22 so naomi return ruth moabitess her daughter law her which return countri moab they came bethlehem begin barley harvest 2 1 naomi had kinsman her husband s mighti man wealth famili elimelech hi name wa boaz 2 2 ruth moabitess said unto naomi let me now go field glean ear corn him whose sight i shall find grace she said unto her go my daughter 2 3 she went came glean field reaper her hap wa light part field belong unto boaz who wa kindr elimelech 2 4 behold boaz came bethlehem said unto reaper lord be you they answer him lord bless thee 2 5 then said boaz unto hi servant that wa set reaper whose damsel is thi 2 6 servant that wa set reaper answer said it is moabitish damsel that came back naomi countri moab 2 7 she said i pray you let me glean gather reaper sheav so she came hath continu even morn now that she tarri littl hous 2 8 then said boaz unto ruth hearest thou not my daughter go not glean anoth field neither go henc but abid here fast my maiden 2 9 let thine eye be field that they do reap go thou them have i not charg young men that they shall not touch thee when thou art athirst go unto vessel drink that which young men have drawn 2 10 then she fell her face bow herself ground said unto him whi have i found grace thine eye that thou shouldest take knowledg me see i am stranger 2 11 boaz answer said unto her it hath fulli been shew me all that thou hast done unto thi mother law death thine husband how thou hast left thi father thi mother land thi nativ art come unto peopl which thou knewest not heretofor 2 12 lord recompens thi work full reward be given thee lord god israel whose wing thou art come trust 2 13 then she said let me find favour thi sight my lord that thou hast comfort me that thou hast spoken friendli unto thine handmaid though i be not like unto one thine handmaiden 2 14 boaz said unto her mealtim come thou hither eat bread dip thi morsel vinegar she sat besid reaper he reach her parch corn she did eat wa suffic left 2 15 when she wa risen glean boaz command hi young men say let her glean even sheav reproach her not 2 16 let fall also some hand purpos her leav them that she may glean them rebuk her not 2 17 so she glean field even beat that she had glean it wa ephah barley 2 18 she took it went citi her mother law saw what she had glean she brought forth gave her that she had reserv she wa suffic 2 19 her mother law said unto her where hast thou glean day where wroughtest thou bless be he that did take knowledg thee she shew her mother law whom she had wrought said man s name whom i wrought day is boaz 2 20 naomi said unto her daughter law bless be he lord who hath not left off hi kind live dead naomi said unto her man is near kin unto us one our next kinsmen 2 21 ruth moabitess said he said unto me also thou shalt keep fast my young men they have end all my harvest 2 22 naomi said unto ruth her daughter law it is good my daughter that thou go hi maiden that they meet thee not ani other field 2 23 so she kept fast maiden boaz glean unto end barley harvest wheat harvest dwelt her mother law 3 1 then naomi her mother law said unto her my daughter shall i not seek rest thee that it may be well thee 3 2 now is not boaz our kindr whose maiden thou wast behold he winnoweth barley night threshingfloor 3 3 wash thyself therefor anoint thee put thi raiment thee get thee down floor but make not thyself known unto man he shall have done eat drink 3 4 it shall be when he lieth down that thou shalt mark place where he shall lie thou shalt go uncov hi feet lay thee down he will tell thee what thou shalt do 3 5 she said unto her all that thou sayest unto me i will do 3 6 she went down unto floor did accord all that her mother law bade her 3 7 when boaz had eaten drunk hi heart wa merri he went lie down end heap corn she came softli uncov hi feet laid her down 3 8 it came pass midnight that man wa afraid turn himself behold woman lay hi feet 3 9 he said who art thou she answer i am ruth thine handmaid spread therefor thi skirt thine handmaid thou art near kinsman 3 10 he said bless be thou lord my daughter thou hast shew more kind latter end than begin inasmuch as thou followedst not young men poor or rich 3 11 now my daughter fear not i will do thee all that thou requirest all citi my peopl doth know that thou art virtuou woman 3 12 now it is true that i am thi near kinsman howbeit there is kinsman nearer than i 3 13 tarri thi night it shall be morn that if he will perform unto thee part kinsman well let him do kinsman s part but if he will not do part kinsman thee then will i do part kinsman thee as lord liveth lie down morn 3 14 she lay hi feet morn she rose one could know anoth he said let it not be known that woman came floor 3 15 also he said bring vail that thou hast thee hold it when she held it he measur six measur barley laid it her she went citi 3 16 when she came her mother law she said who art thou my daughter she told her all that man had done her 3 17 she said these six measur barley gave he me he said me go not empti unto thi mother law 3 18 then said she sit still my daughter thou know how matter will fall man will not be rest he have finish thing thi day 4 1 then went boaz gate sat him down there behold kinsman whom boaz spake came unto whom he said ho such one turn asid sit down here he turn asid sat down 4 2 he took ten men elder citi said sit ye down here they sat down 4 3 he said unto kinsman naomi that is come again countri moab selleth parcel land which wa our brother elimelech s 4 4 i thought advertis thee say buy it inhabit elder my peopl if thou wilt redeem it redeem it but if thou wilt not redeem it then tell me that i may know there is none redeem it besid thee i am thee he said i will redeem it 4 5 then said boaz what day thou buyest field hand naomi thou must buy it also ruth moabitess wife dead rais name dead hi inherit 4 6 kinsman said i cannot redeem it myself lest i mar mine own inherit redeem thou my right thyself i cannot redeem it 4 7 now thi wa manner former time israel concern redeem concern chang confirm all thing man pluck off hi shoe gave it hi neighbour thi wa testimoni israel 4 8 therefor kinsman said unto boaz buy it thee so he drew off hi shoe 4 9 boaz said unto elder unto all peopl ye are wit thi day that i have bought all that wa elimelech s all that wa chilion s mahlon s hand naomi 4 10 moreov ruth moabitess wife mahlon have i purchas be my wife rais name dead hi inherit that name dead be not cut off hi brethren gate hi place ye are wit thi day 4 11 all peopl that were gate elder said we are wit lord make woman that is come thine hous like rachel like leah which two did build hous israel do thou worthili ephratah be famou bethlehem 4 12 let thi hous be like hous pharez whom tamar bare unto judah seed which lord shall give thee thi young woman 4 13 so boaz took ruth she wa hi wife when he went unto her lord gave her concept she bare son 4 14 women said unto naomi bless be lord which hath not left thee thi day kinsman that hi name may be famou israel 4 15 he shall be unto thee restor thi life nourish thine old age thi daughter law which loveth thee which is better thee than seven son hath born him 4 16 naomi took child laid it her bosom becam nurs unto it 4 17 women her neighbour gave it name say there is son born naomi they call hi name obe he is father jess father david 4 18 now these are gener pharez pharez begat hezron 4 19 hezron begat ram ram begat amminadab 4 20 amminadab begat nahshon nahshon begat salmon 4 21 salmon begat boaz boaz begat obe 4 22 obe begat jess jess begat david first book samuel otherwis call first book king 1 1 now there wa certain man ramathaimzophim mount ephraim hi name wa elkanah son jeroham son elihu son tohu son zuph ephrathit 1 2 he had two wive name one wa hannah name other peninnah peninnah had children but hannah had no children 1 3 thi man went hi citi yearli worship sacrific unto lord host shiloh two son eli hophni phineha priest lord were there 1 4 when time wa that elkanah offer he gave peninnah hi wife all her son her daughter portion 1 5 but unto hannah he gave worthi portion he love hannah but lord had shut her womb 1 6 her adversari also provok her sore make her fret becaus lord had shut her womb 1 7 as he did so year year when she went hous lord so she provok her therefor she wept did not eat 1 8 then said elkanah her husband her hannah whi weepest thou whi eatest thou not whi is thi heart griev am not i better thee than ten son 1 9 so hannah rose they had eaten shiloh they had drunk now eli priest sat seat post templ lord 1 10 she wa bitter soul pray unto lord wept sore 1 11 she vow vow said o lord host if thou wilt inde look afflict thine handmaid rememb me not forget thine handmaid but wilt give unto thine handmaid man child then i will give him unto lord all day hi life there shall no razor come hi head 1 12 it came pass as she continu pray lord that eli mark her mouth 1 13 now hannah she spake her heart onli her lip move but her voic wa not heard therefor eli thought she had been drunken 1 14 eli said unto her how long wilt thou be drunken put away thi wine thee 1 15 hannah answer said no my lord i am woman sorrow spirit i have drunk neither wine nor strong drink but have pour my soul lord 1 16 count not thine handmaid daughter belial abund my complaint grief have i spoken hitherto 1 17 then eli answer said go peac god israel grant thee thi petit that thou hast ask him 1 18 she said let thine handmaid find grace thi sight so woman went her way did eat her counten wa no more sad 1 19 they rose morn earli worship lord return came their hous ramah elkanah knew hannah hi wife lord rememb her 1 20 wherefor it came pass when time wa come hannah had conceiv that she bare son call hi name samuel say becaus i have ask him lord 1 21 man elkanah all hi hous went offer unto lord yearli sacrific hi vow 1 22 but hannah went not she said unto her husband i will not go child be wean then i will bring him that he may appear lord there abid ever 1 23 elkanah her husband said unto her do what seemeth thee good tarri thou have wean him onli lord establish hi word so woman abod gave her son suck she wean him 1 24 when she had wean him she took him her three bullock one ephah flour bottl wine brought him unto hous lord shiloh child wa young 1 25 they slew bullock brought child eli 1 26 she said oh my lord as thi soul liveth my lord i am woman that stood thee here pray unto lord 1 27 thi child i pray lord hath given me my petit which i ask him 1 28 therefor also i have lent him lord as long as he liveth he shall be lent lord he worship lord there 2 1 hannah pray said my heart rejoiceth lord mine horn is exalt lord my mouth is enlarg mine enemi becaus i rejoic thi salvat 2 2 there is none holi as lord there is none besid thee neither is there ani rock like our god 2 3 talk no more so exceed proudli let not arrog come your mouth lord is god knowledg him action are weigh 2 4 bow mighti men are broken they that stumbl are gird strength 2 5 they that were full have hire themselv bread they that were hungri ceas so that barren hath born seven she that hath mani children is wax feebl 2 6 lord killeth maketh aliv he bringeth down grave bringeth 2 7 lord maketh poor maketh rich he bringeth low lifteth 2 8 he raiseth poor dust lifteth beggar dunghil set them princ make them inherit throne glori pillar earth are lord s he hath set world them 2 9 he will keep feet hi saint wick shall be silent dark strength shall no man prevail 2 10 adversari lord shall be broken piec heaven shall he thunder them lord shall judg end earth he shall give strength unto hi king exalt horn hi anoint 2 11 elkanah went ramah hi hous child did minist unto lord eli priest 2 12 now son eli were son belial they knew not lord 2 13 priest s custom peopl wa that when ani man offer sacrific priest s servant came while flesh wa seeth fleshhook three teeth hi hand 2 14 he struck it pan or kettl or caldron or pot all that fleshhook brought priest took himself so they did shiloh unto all israelit that came thither 2 15 also they burnt fat priest s servant came said man that sacrif give flesh roast priest he will not have sodden flesh thee but raw 2 16 if ani man said unto him let them not fail burn fat present then take as much as thi soul desireth then he would answer him nay but thou shalt give it me now if not i will take it forc 2 17 wherefor sin young men wa veri great lord men abhor offer lord 2 18 but samuel minist lord be child gird linen ephod 2 19 moreov hi mother made him littl coat brought it him year year when she came her husband offer yearli sacrific 2 20 eli bless elkanah hi wife said lord give thee seed thi woman loan which is lent lord they went unto their own home 2 21 lord visit hannah so that she conceiv bare three son two daughter child samuel grew lord 2 22 now eli wa veri old heard all that hi son did unto all israel how they lay women that assembl door tabernacl congreg 2 23 he said unto them whi do ye such thing i hear your evil deal all thi peopl 2 24 nay my son it is no good report that i hear ye make lord s peopl transgress 2 25 if one man sin against anoth judg shall judg him but if man sin against lord who shall intreat him notwithstand they hearken not unto voic their father becaus lord would slay them 2 26 child samuel grew wa favour both lord also men 2 27 there came man god unto eli said unto him thu saith lord did i plainli appear unto hous thi father when they were egypt pharaoh s hous 2 28 did i choos him all tribe israel be my priest offer mine altar burn incens wear ephod me did i give unto hous thi father all offer made fire children israel 2 29 wherefor kick ye my sacrific mine offer which i have command my habit honourest thi son me make yourselv fat chiefest all offer israel my peopl 2 30 wherefor lord god israel saith i said inde that thi hous hous thi father should walk me ever but now lord saith be it far me them that honour me i will honour they that despis me shall be lightli esteem 2 31 behold day come that i will cut off thine arm arm thi father s hous that there shall not be old man thine hous 2 32 thou shalt see enemi my habit all wealth which god shall give israel there shall not be old man thine hous ever 2 33 man thine whom i shall not cut off mine altar shall be consum thine eye griev thine heart all increas thine hous shall die flower their age 2 34 thi shall be sign unto thee that shall come thi two son hophni phineha one day they shall die both them 2 35 i will rais me faith priest that shall do accord that which is mine heart my mind i will build him sure hous he shall walk mine anoint ever 2 36 it shall come pass that everi one that is left thine hous shall come crouch him piec silver morsel bread shall say put me i pray thee one priest offic that i may eat piec bread 3 1 child samuel minist unto lord eli word lord wa preciou those day there wa no open vision 3 2 it came pass that time when eli wa laid down hi place hi eye began wax dim that he could not see 3 3 ere lamp god went templ lord where ark god wa samuel wa laid down sleep 3 4 that lord call samuel he answer here am i 3 5 he ran unto eli said here am i thou calledst me he said i call not lie down again he went lay down 3 6 lord call yet again samuel samuel aros went eli said here am i thou didst call me he answer i call not my son lie down again 3 7 now samuel did not yet know lord neither wa word lord yet reveal unto him 3 8 lord call samuel again third time he aros went eli said here am i thou didst call me eli perceiv that lord had call child 3 9 therefor eli said unto samuel go lie down it shall be if he call thee that thou shalt say speak lord thi servant heareth so samuel went lay down hi place 3 10 lord came stood call as other time samuel samuel then samuel answer speak thi servant heareth 3 11 lord said samuel behold i will do thing israel which both ear everi one that heareth it shall tingl 3 12 that day i will perform against eli all thing which i have spoken concern hi hous when i begin i will also make end 3 13 i have told him that i will judg hi hous ever iniqu which he knoweth becaus hi son made themselv vile he restrain them not 3 14 therefor i have sworn unto hous eli that iniqu eli s hous shall not be purg sacrific nor offer ever 3 15 samuel lay morn open door hous lord samuel fear shew eli vision 3 16 then eli call samuel said samuel my son he answer here am i 3 17 he said what is thing that lord hath said unto thee i pray thee hide it not me god do so thee more also if thou hide ani thing me all thing that he said unto thee 3 18 samuel told him everi whit hid noth him he said it is lord let him do what seemeth him good 3 19 samuel grew lord wa him did let none hi word fall ground 3 20 all israel dan even beersheba knew that samuel wa establish be prophet lord 3 21 lord appear again shiloh lord reveal himself samuel shiloh word lord 4 1 word samuel came all israel now israel went against philistin battl pitch besid ebenez philistin pitch aphek 4 2 philistin put themselv array against israel when they join battl israel wa smitten philistin they slew armi field four thousand men 4 3 when peopl were come camp elder israel said wherefor hath lord smitten us day philistin let us fetch ark coven lord shiloh unto us that when it cometh us it may save us hand our enemi 4 4 so peopl sent shiloh that they might bring thenc ark coven lord host which dwelleth cherubim two son eli hophni phineha were there ark coven god 4 5 when ark coven lord came camp all israel shout great shout so that earth rang again 4 6 when philistin heard nois shout they said what meaneth nois thi great shout camp hebrew they understood that ark lord wa come camp 4 7 philistin were afraid they said god is come camp they said woe unto us there hath not been such thing heretofor 4 8 woe unto us who shall deliv us hand these mighti god these are god that smote egyptian all plagu wilder 4 9 be strong quit yourselv like men o ye philistin that ye be not servant unto hebrew as they have been you quit yourselv like men fight 4 10 philistin fought israel wa smitten they fled everi man hi tent there wa veri great slaughter there fell israel thirti thousand footmen 4 11 ark god wa taken two son eli hophni phineha were slain 4 12 there ran man benjamin armi came shiloh same day hi cloth rent earth hi head 4 13 when he came lo eli sat seat waysid watch hi heart trembl ark god when man came citi told it all citi cri 4 14 when eli heard nois cri he said what meaneth nois thi tumult man came hastili told eli 4 15 now eli wa nineti eight year old hi eye were dim that he could not see 4 16 man said unto eli i am he that came armi i fled day armi he said what is there done my son 4 17 messeng answer said israel is fled philistin there hath been also great slaughter peopl thi two son also hophni phineha are dead ark god is taken 4 18 it came pass when he made mention ark god that he fell off seat backward side gate hi neck brake he die he wa old man heavi he had judg israel forti year 4 19 hi daughter law phineha wife wa child near be deliv when she heard tide that ark god wa taken that her father law her husband were dead she bow herself travail her pain came her 4 20 time her death women that stood her said unto her fear not thou hast born son but she answer not neither did she regard it 4 21 she name child ichabod say glori is depart israel becaus ark god wa taken becaus her father law her husband 4 22 she said glori is depart israel ark god is taken 5 1 philistin took ark god brought it ebenez unto ashdod 5 2 when philistin took ark god they brought it hous dagon set it dagon 5 3 when they ashdod aros earli morrow behold dagon wa fallen hi face earth ark lord they took dagon set him hi place again 5 4 when they aros earli morrow morn behold dagon wa fallen hi face ground ark lord head dagon both palm hi hand were cut off threshold onli stump dagon wa left him 5 5 therefor neither priest dagon nor ani that come dagon s hous tread threshold dagon ashdod unto thi day 5 6 but hand lord wa heavi them ashdod he destroy them smote them emerod even ashdod coast thereof 5 7 when men ashdod saw that it wa so they said ark god israel shall not abid us hi hand is sore us dagon our god 5 8 they sent therefor gather all lord philistin unto them said what shall we do ark god israel they answer let ark god israel be carri unto gath they carri ark god israel thither 5 9 it wa so that they had carri it hand lord wa against citi veri great destruct he smote men citi both small great they had emerod their secret part 5 10 therefor they sent ark god ekron it came pass as ark god came ekron that ekronit cri say they have brought ark god israel us slay us our peopl 5 11 so they sent gather togeth all lord philistin said send away ark god israel let it go again hi own place that it slay us not our peopl there wa deadli destruct all citi hand god wa veri heavi there 5 12 men that die not were smitten emerod cri citi went heaven 6 1 ark lord wa countri philistin seven month 6 2 philistin call priest divin say what shall we do ark lord tell us wherewith we shall send it hi place 6 3 they said if ye send away ark god israel send it not empti but ani wise return him trespass offer then ye shall be heal it shall be known you whi hi hand is not remov you 6 4 then said they what shall be trespass offer which we shall return him they answer five golden emerod five golden mice accord number lord philistin one plagu wa you all your lord 6 5 wherefor ye shall make imag your emerod imag your mice that mar land ye shall give glori unto god israel peradventur he will lighten hi hand off you off your god off your land 6 6 wherefor then do ye harden your heart as egyptian pharaoh harden their heart when he had wrought wonder them did they not let peopl go they depart 6 7 now therefor make new cart take two milch kine which there hath come no yoke tie kine cart bring their calv home them 6 8 take ark lord lay it cart put jewel gold which ye return him trespass offer coffer side thereof send it away that it may go 6 9 see if it goeth way hi own coast bethshemesh then he hath done us thi great evil but if not then we shall know that it is not hi hand that smote us it wa chanc that happen us 6 10 men did so took two milch kine tie them cart shut their calv home 6 11 they laid ark lord cart coffer mice gold imag their emerod 6 12 kine took straight way way bethshemesh went highway low as they went turn not asid right hand or left lord philistin went them unto border bethshemesh 6 13 they bethshemesh were reap their wheat harvest valley they lift their eye saw ark rejoic see it 6 14 cart came field joshua bethshemit stood there where there wa great stone they clave wood cart offer kine burnt offer unto lord 6 15 levit took down ark lord coffer that wa it wherein jewel gold were put them great stone men bethshemesh offer burnt offer sacrif sacrific same day unto lord 6 16 when five lord philistin had seen it they return ekron same day 6 17 these are golden emerod which philistin return trespass offer unto lord ashdod one gaza one askelon one gath one ekron one 6 18 golden mice accord number all citi philistin belong five lord both fenc citi countri villag even unto great stone abel whereon they set down ark lord which stone remaineth unto thi day field joshua bethshemit 6 19 he smote men bethshemesh becaus they had look ark lord even he smote peopl fifti thousand threescor ten men peopl lament becaus lord had smitten mani peopl great slaughter 6 20 men bethshemesh said who is abl stand thi holi lord god whom shall he go us 6 21 they sent messeng inhabit kirjathjearim say philistin have brought again ark lord come ye down fetch it you 7 1 men kirjathjearim came fetch ark lord brought it hous abinadab hill sanctifi eleazar hi son keep ark lord 7 2 it came pass while ark abod kirjathjearim that time wa long it wa twenti year all hous israel lament lord 7 3 samuel spake unto all hous israel say if ye do return unto lord all your heart then put away strang god ashtaroth you prepar your heart unto lord serv him onli he will deliv you hand philistin 7 4 then children israel did put away baalim ashtaroth serv lord onli 7 5 samuel said gather all israel mizpeh i will pray you unto lord 7 6 they gather togeth mizpeh drew water pour it lord fast that day said there we have sin against lord samuel judg children israel mizpeh 7 7 when philistin heard that children israel were gather togeth mizpeh lord philistin went against israel when children israel heard it they were afraid philistin 7 8 children israel said samuel ceas not cri unto lord our god us that he will save us hand philistin 7 9 samuel took suck lamb offer it burnt offer wholli unto lord samuel cri unto lord israel lord heard him 7 10 as samuel wa offer burnt offer philistin drew near battl against israel but lord thunder great thunder that day philistin discomfit them they were smitten israel 7 11 men israel went mizpeh pursu philistin smote them they came bethcar 7 12 then samuel took stone set it mizpeh shen call name it ebenez say hitherto hath lord help us 7 13 so philistin were subdu they came no more coast israel hand lord wa against philistin all day samuel 7 14 citi which philistin had taken israel were restor israel ekron even unto gath coast thereof did israel deliv hand philistin there wa peac israel amorit 7 15 samuel judg israel all day hi life 7 16 he went year year circuit bethel gilgal mizpeh judg israel all those place 7 17 hi return wa ramah there wa hi hous there he judg israel there he built altar unto lord 8 1 it came pass when samuel wa old that he made hi son judg israel 8 2 now name hi firstborn wa joel name hi second abiah they were judg beersheba 8 3 hi son walk not hi way but turn asid lucr took bribe pervert judgment 8 4 then all elder israel gather themselv togeth came samuel unto ramah 8 5 said unto him behold thou art old thi son walk not thi way now make us king judg us like all nation 8 6 but thing displeas samuel when they said give us king judg us samuel pray unto lord 8 7 lord said unto samuel hearken unto voic peopl all that they say unto thee they have not reject thee but they have reject me that i should not reign them 8 8 accord all work which they have done day that i brought them egypt even unto thi day wherewith they have forsaken me serv other god so do they also unto thee 8 9 now therefor hearken unto their voic howbeit yet protest solemnli unto them shew them manner king that shall reign them 8 10 samuel told all word lord unto peopl that ask him king 8 11 he said thi will be manner king that shall reign you he will take your son appoint them himself hi chariot be hi horsemen some shall run hi chariot 8 12 he will appoint him captain thousand captain fifti will set them ear hi ground reap hi harvest make hi instrument war instrument hi chariot 8 13 he will take your daughter be confectionari be cook be baker 8 14 he will take your field your vineyard your oliveyard even best them give them hi servant 8 15 he will take tenth your seed your vineyard give hi offic hi servant 8 16 he will take your menserv your maidserv your goodliest young men your ass put them hi work 8 17 he will take tenth your sheep ye shall be hi servant 8 18 ye shall cri that day becaus your king which ye shall have chosen you lord will not hear you that day 8 19 nevertheless peopl refus obey voic samuel they said nay but we will have king us 8 20 that we also may be like all nation that our king may judg us go us fight our battl 8 21 samuel heard all word peopl he rehears them ear lord 8 22 lord said samuel hearken unto their voic make them king samuel said unto men israel go ye everi man unto hi citi 9 1 now there wa man benjamin whose name wa kish son abiel son zeror son bechorath son aphiah benjamit mighti man power 9 2 he had son whose name wa saul choic young man goodli there wa not children israel goodlier person than he hi shoulder upward he wa higher than ani peopl 9 3 ass kish saul s father were lost kish said saul hi son take now one servant thee aris go seek ass 9 4 he pass mount ephraim pass land shalisha but they found them not then they pass land shalim there they were not he pass land benjamit but they found them not 9 5 when they were come land zuph saul said hi servant that wa him come let us return lest my father leav care ass take thought us 9 6 he said unto him behold now there is thi citi man god he is honour man all that he saith cometh sure pass now let us go thither peradventur he can shew us our way that we should go 9 7 then said saul hi servant but behold if we go what shall we bring man bread is spent our vessel there is not present bring man god what have we 9 8 servant answer saul again said behold i have here hand fourth part shekel silver that will i give man god tell us our way 9 9 beforetim israel when man went enquir god thu he spake come let us go seer he that is now call prophet wa beforetim call seer 9 10 then said saul hi servant well said come let us go so they went unto
