citi where man god wa 9 11 as they went hill citi they found young maiden go draw water said unto them is seer here 9 12 they answer them said he is behold he is you make hast now he came day citi there is sacrific peopl day high place 9 13 as soon as ye be come citi ye shall straightway find him he go high place eat peopl will not eat he come becaus he doth bless sacrific afterward they eat that be bidden now therefor get you thi time ye shall find him 9 14 they went citi when they were come citi behold samuel came against them go high place 9 15 now lord had told samuel hi ear day saul came say 9 16 morrow thi time i will send thee man land benjamin thou shalt anoint him be captain my peopl israel that he may save my peopl hand philistin i have look my peopl becaus their cri is come unto me 9 17 when samuel saw saul lord said unto him behold man whom i spake thee thi same shall reign my peopl 9 18 then saul drew near samuel gate said tell me i pray thee where seer s hous is 9 19 samuel answer saul said i am seer go me unto high place ye shall eat me day morrow i will let thee go will tell thee all that is thine heart 9 20 as thine ass that were lost three day ago set not thi mind them they are found whom is all desir israel is it not thee all thi father s hous 9 21 saul answer said am not i benjamit smallest tribe israel my famili least all famili tribe benjamin wherefor then speakest thou so me 9 22 samuel took saul hi servant brought them parlour made them sit chiefest place them that were bidden which were thirti person 9 23 samuel said unto cook bring portion which i gave thee which i said unto thee set it thee 9 24 cook took shoulder that which wa it set it saul samuel said behold that which is left set it thee eat unto thi time hath it been kept thee i said i have invit peopl so saul did eat samuel that day 9 25 when they were come down high place citi samuel commun saul top hous 9 26 they aros earli it came pass spring day that samuel call saul top hous say that i may send thee away saul aros they went both them he samuel abroad 9 27 as they were go down end citi samuel said saul bid servant pass us he pass but stand thou still while that i may shew thee word god 10 1 then samuel took vial oil pour it hi head kiss him said is it not becaus lord hath anoint thee be captain hi inherit 10 2 when thou art depart me day then thou shalt find two men rachel s sepulchr border benjamin zelzah they will say unto thee ass which thou wentest seek are found lo thi father hath left care ass sorroweth you say what shall i do my son 10 3 then shalt thou go forward thenc thou shalt come plain tabor there shall meet thee three men go god bethel one carri three kid anoth carri three loav bread anoth carri bottl wine 10 4 they will salut thee give thee two loav bread which thou shalt receiv their hand 10 5 that thou shalt come hill god where is garrison philistin it shall come pass when thou art come thither citi that thou shalt meet compani prophet come down high place psalteri tabret pipe harp them they shall prophesi 10 6 spirit lord will come thee thou shalt prophesi them shalt be turn anoth man 10 7 let it be when these sign are come unto thee that thou do as occas serv thee god is thee 10 8 thou shalt go down me gilgal behold i will come down unto thee offer burnt offer sacrific sacrific peac offer seven day shalt thou tarri till i come thee shew thee what thou shalt do 10 9 it wa so that when he had turn hi back go samuel god gave him anoth heart all those sign came pass that day 10 10 when they came thither hill behold compani prophet met him spirit god came him he prophesi them 10 11 it came pass when all that knew him beforetim saw that behold he prophesi prophet then peopl said one anoth what is thi that is come unto son kish is saul also prophet 10 12 one same place answer said but who is their father therefor it becam proverb is saul also prophet 10 13 when he had made end prophesi he came high place 10 14 saul s uncl said unto him hi servant whither went ye he said seek ass when we saw that they were no where we came samuel 10 15 saul s uncl said tell me i pray thee what samuel said unto you 10 16 saul said unto hi uncl he told us plainli that ass were found but matter kingdom whereof samuel spake he told him not 10 17 samuel call peopl togeth unto lord mizpeh 10 18 said unto children israel thu saith lord god israel i brought israel egypt deliv you hand egyptian hand all kingdom them that oppress you 10 19 ye have thi day reject your god who himself save you all your advers your tribul ye have said unto him nay but set king us now therefor present yourselv lord your tribe your thousand 10 20 when samuel had caus all tribe israel come near tribe benjamin wa taken 10 21 when he had caus tribe benjamin come near their famili famili matri wa taken saul son kish wa taken when they sought him he could not be found 10 22 therefor they enquir lord further if man should yet come thither lord answer behold he hath hid himself stuff 10 23 they ran fetch him thenc when he stood peopl he wa higher than ani peopl hi shoulder upward 10 24 samuel said all peopl see ye him whom lord hath chosen that there is none like him all peopl all peopl shout said god save king 10 25 then samuel told peopl manner kingdom wrote it book laid it lord samuel sent all peopl away everi man hi hous 10 26 saul also went home gibeah there went him band men whose heart god had touch 10 27 but children belial said how shall thi man save us they despis him brought no present but he held hi peac 11 1 then nahash ammonit came encamp against jabeshgilead all men jabesh said unto nahash make coven us we will serv thee 11 2 nahash ammonit answer them thi condit will i make coven you that i may thrust all your right eye lay it reproach all israel 11 3 elder jabesh said unto him give us seven day respit that we may send messeng unto all coast israel then if there be no man save us we will come thee 11 4 then came messeng gibeah saul told tide ear peopl all peopl lift their voic wept 11 5 behold saul came herd field saul said what aileth peopl that they weep they told him tide men jabesh 11 6 spirit god came saul when he heard those tide hi anger wa kindl greatli 11 7 he took yoke oxen hew them piec sent them all coast israel hand messeng say whosoev cometh not forth saul samuel so shall it be done unto hi oxen fear lord fell peopl they came one consent 11 8 when he number them bezek children israel were three hundr thousand men judah thirti thousand 11 9 they said unto messeng that came thu shall ye say unto men jabeshgilead morrow that time sun be hot ye shall have help messeng came shew it men jabesh they were glad 11 10 therefor men jabesh said morrow we will come unto you ye shall do us all that seemeth good unto you 11 11 it wa so morrow that saul put peopl three compani they came midst host morn watch slew ammonit heat day it came pass that they which remain were scatter so that two them were not left togeth 11 12 peopl said unto samuel who is he that said shall saul reign us bring men that we may put them death 11 13 saul said there shall not man be put death thi day day lord hath wrought salvat israel 11 14 then said samuel peopl come let us go gilgal renew kingdom there 11 15 all peopl went gilgal there they made saul king lord gilgal there they sacrif sacrific peac offer lord there saul all men israel rejoic greatli 12 1 samuel said unto all israel behold i have hearken unto your voic all that ye said unto me have made king you 12 2 now behold king walketh you i am old grayhead behold my son are you i have walk you my childhood unto thi day 12 3 behold here i am wit against me lord hi anoint whose ox have i taken or whose ass have i taken or whom have i defraud whom have i oppress or whose hand have i receiv ani bribe blind mine eye therewith i will restor it you 12 4 they said thou hast not defraud us nor oppress us neither hast thou taken ought ani man s hand 12 5 he said unto them lord is wit against you hi anoint is wit thi day that ye have not found ought my hand they answer he is wit 12 6 samuel said unto peopl it is lord that advanc mose aaron that brought your father land egypt 12 7 now therefor stand still that i may reason you lord all righteou act lord which he did you your father 12 8 when jacob wa come egypt your father cri unto lord then lord sent mose aaron which brought forth your father egypt made them dwell thi place 12 9 when they forgat lord their god he sold them hand sisera captain host hazor hand philistin hand king moab they fought against them 12 10 they cri unto lord said we have sin becaus we have forsaken lord have serv baalim ashtaroth but now deliv us hand our enemi we will serv thee 12 11 lord sent jerubba bedan jephthah samuel deliv you hand your enemi everi side ye dwell safe 12 12 when ye saw that nahash king children ammon came against you ye said unto me nay but king shall reign us when lord your god wa your king 12 13 now therefor behold king whom ye have chosen whom ye have desir behold lord hath set king you 12 14 if ye will fear lord serv him obey hi voic not rebel against command lord then shall both ye also king that reigneth you continu follow lord your god 12 15 but if ye will not obey voic lord but rebel against command lord then shall hand lord be against you as it wa against your father 12 16 now therefor stand see thi great thing which lord will do your eye 12 17 is it not wheat harvest day i will call unto lord he shall send thunder rain that ye may perceiv see that your wicked is great which ye have done sight lord ask you king 12 18 so samuel call unto lord lord sent thunder rain that day all peopl greatli fear lord samuel 12 19 all peopl said unto samuel pray thi servant unto lord thi god that we die not we have ad unto all our sin thi evil ask us king 12 20 samuel said unto peopl fear not ye have done all thi wicked yet turn not asid follow lord but serv lord all your heart 12 21 turn ye not asid then should ye go vain thing which cannot profit nor deliv they are vain 12 22 lord will not forsak hi peopl hi great name s sake becaus it hath pleas lord make you hi peopl 12 23 moreov as me god forbid that i should sin against lord ceas pray you but i will teach you good right way 12 24 onli fear lord serv him truth all your heart consid how great thing he hath done you 12 25 but if ye shall still do wickedli ye shall be consum both ye your king 13 1 saul reign one year when he had reign two year israel 13 2 saul chose him three thousand men israel whereof two thousand were saul michmash mount bethel thousand were jonathan gibeah benjamin rest peopl he sent everi man hi tent 13 3 jonathan smote garrison philistin that wa geba philistin heard it saul blew trumpet all land say let hebrew hear 13 4 all israel heard say that saul had smitten garrison philistin that israel also wa had abomin philistin peopl were call togeth saul gilgal 13 5 philistin gather themselv togeth fight israel thirti thousand chariot six thousand horsemen peopl as sand which is sea shore multitud they came pitch michmash eastward bethaven 13 6 when men israel saw that they were strait peopl were distress then peopl did hide themselv cave thicket rock high place pit 13 7 some hebrew went jordan land gad gilead as saul he wa yet gilgal all peopl follow him trembl 13 8 he tarri seven day accord set time that samuel had appoint but samuel came not gilgal peopl were scatter him 13 9 saul said bring hither burnt offer me peac offer he offer burnt offer 13 10 it came pass that as soon as he had made end offer burnt offer behold samuel came saul went meet him that he might salut him 13 11 samuel said what hast thou done saul said becaus i saw that peopl were scatter me that thou camest not day appoint that philistin gather themselv togeth michmash 13 12 therefor said i philistin will come down now me gilgal i have not made supplic unto lord i forc myself therefor offer burnt offer 13 13 samuel said saul thou hast done foolishli thou hast not kept command lord thi god which he command thee now would lord have establish thi kingdom israel ever 13 14 but now thi kingdom shall not continu lord hath sought him man hi own heart lord hath command him be captain hi peopl becaus thou hast not kept that which lord command thee 13 15 samuel aros gat him gilgal unto gibeah benjamin saul number peopl that were present him six hundr men 13 16 saul jonathan hi son peopl that were present them abod gibeah benjamin but philistin encamp michmash 13 17 spoiler came camp philistin three compani one compani turn unto way that leadeth ophrah unto land shual 13 18 anoth compani turn way bethhoron anoth compani turn way border that looketh valley zeboim wilder 13 19 now there wa no smith found all land israel philistin said lest hebrew make them sword or spear 13 20 but all israelit went down philistin sharpen everi man hi share hi coulter hi axe hi mattock 13 21 yet they had file mattock coulter fork axe sharpen goad 13 22 so it came pass day battl that there wa neither sword nor spear found hand ani peopl that were saul jonathan but saul jonathan hi son wa there found 13 23 garrison philistin went passag michmash 14 1 now it came pass day that jonathan son saul said unto young man that bare hi armour come let us go philistin garrison that is other side but he told not hi father 14 2 saul tarri uttermost part gibeah pomegran tree which is migron peopl that were him were six hundr men 14 3 ahiah son ahitub ichabod s brother son phineha son eli lord s priest shiloh wear ephod peopl knew not that jonathan wa gone 14 4 passag which jonathan sought go unto philistin garrison there wa sharp rock one side sharp rock other side name one wa bozez name other seneh 14 5 forefront one wa situat northward against michmash other southward against gibeah 14 6 jonathan said young man that bare hi armour come let us go unto garrison these uncircumcis it may be that lord will work us there is no restraint lord save mani or few 14 7 hi armourbear said unto him do all that is thine heart turn thee behold i am thee accord thi heart 14 8 then said jonathan behold we will pass unto these men we will discov ourselv unto them 14 9 if they say thu unto us tarri we come you then we will stand still our place will not go unto them 14 10 but if they say thu come unto us then we will go lord hath deliv them our hand thi shall be sign unto us 14 11 both them discov themselv unto garrison philistin philistin said behold hebrew come forth hole where they had hid themselv 14 12 men garrison answer jonathan hi armourbear said come us we will shew you thing jonathan said unto hi armourbear come me lord hath deliv them hand israel 14 13 jonathan climb hi hand hi feet hi armourbear him they fell jonathan hi armourbear slew him 14 14 that first slaughter which jonathan hi armourbear made wa twenti men as it were half acr land which yoke oxen might plow 14 15 there wa trembl host field all peopl garrison spoiler they also trembl earth quak so it wa veri great trembl 14 16 watchmen saul gibeah benjamin look behold multitud melt away they went beat down one anoth 14 17 then said saul unto peopl that were him number now see who is gone us when they had number behold jonathan hi armourbear were not there 14 18 saul said unto ahiah bring hither ark god ark god wa that time children israel 14 19 it came pass while saul talk unto priest that nois that wa host philistin went increas saul said unto priest withdraw thine hand 14 20 saul all peopl that were him assembl themselv they came battl behold everi man s sword wa against hi fellow there wa veri great discomfitur 14 21 moreov hebrew that were philistin that time which went them camp countri round even they also turn be israelit that were saul jonathan 14 22 likewis all men israel which had hid themselv mount ephraim when they heard that philistin fled even they also follow hard them battl 14 23 so lord save israel that day battl pass unto bethaven 14 24 men israel were distress that day saul had adjur peopl say curs be man that eateth ani food even that i may be aveng mine enemi so none peopl tast ani food 14 25 all they land came wood there wa honey ground 14 26 when peopl were come wood behold honey drop but no man put hi hand hi mouth peopl fear oath 14 27 but jonathan heard not when hi father charg peopl oath wherefor he put forth end rod that wa hi hand dip it honeycomb put hi hand hi mouth hi eye were enlighten 14 28 then answer one peopl said thi father straitli charg peopl oath say curs be man that eateth ani food thi day peopl were faint 14 29 then said jonathan my father hath troubl land see i pray you how mine eye have been enlighten becaus i tast littl thi honey 14 30 how much more if hapli peopl had eaten freeli day spoil their enemi which they found had there not been now much greater slaughter philistin 14 31 they smote philistin that day michmash aijalon peopl were veri faint 14 32 peopl flew spoil took sheep oxen calv slew them ground peopl did eat them blood 14 33 then they told saul say behold peopl sin against lord that they eat blood he said ye have transgress roll great stone unto me thi day 14 34 saul said dispers yourselv peopl say unto them bring me hither everi man hi ox everi man hi sheep slay them here eat sin not against lord eat blood all peopl brought everi man hi ox him that night slew them there 14 35 saul built altar unto lord same wa first altar that he built unto lord 14 36 saul said let us go down philistin night spoil them morn light let us not leav man them they said do whatsoev seemeth good unto thee then said priest let us draw near hither unto god 14 37 saul ask counsel god shall i go down philistin wilt thou deliv them hand israel but he answer him not that day 14 38 saul said draw ye near hither all chief peopl know see wherein thi sin hath been thi day 14 39 as lord liveth which saveth israel though it be jonathan my son he shall sure die but there wa not man all peopl that answer him 14 40 then said he unto all israel be ye one side i jonathan my son will be other side peopl said unto saul do what seemeth good unto thee 14 41 therefor saul said unto lord god israel give perfect lot saul jonathan were taken but peopl escap 14 42 saul said cast lot me jonathan my son jonathan wa taken 14 43 then saul said jonathan tell me what thou hast done jonathan told him said i did but tast littl honey end rod that wa mine hand lo i must die 14 44 saul answer god do so more also thou shalt sure die jonathan 14 45 peopl said unto saul shall jonathan die who hath wrought thi great salvat israel god forbid as lord liveth there shall not one hair hi head fall ground he hath wrought god thi day so peopl rescu jonathan that he die not 14 46 then saul went follow philistin philistin went their own place 14 47 so saul took kingdom israel fought against all hi enemi everi side against moab against children ammon against edom against king zobah against philistin whithersoev he turn himself he vex them 14 48 he gather host smote amalekit deliv israel hand them that spoil them 14 49 now son saul were jonathan ishui melchishua name hi two daughter were these name firstborn merab name younger michal 14 50 name saul s wife wa ahinoam daughter ahimaaz name captain hi host wa abner son ner saul s uncl 14 51 kish wa father saul ner father abner wa son abiel 14 52 there wa sore war against philistin all day saul when saul saw ani strong man or ani valiant man he took him unto him 15 1 samuel also said unto saul lord sent me anoint thee be king hi peopl israel now therefor hearken thou unto voic word lord 15 2 thu saith lord host i rememb that which amalek did israel how he laid wait him way when he came egypt 15 3 now go smite amalek utterli destroy all that they have spare them not but slay both man woman infant suckl ox sheep camel ass 15 4 saul gather peopl togeth number them telaim two hundr thousand footmen ten thousand men judah 15 5 saul came citi amalek laid wait valley 15 6 saul said unto kenit go depart get you down amalekit lest i destroy you them ye shew kind all children israel when they came egypt so kenit depart amalekit 15 7 saul smote amalekit havilah thou comest shur that is against egypt 15 8 he took agag king amalekit aliv utterli destroy all peopl edg sword 15 9 but saul peopl spare agag best sheep oxen fatl lamb all that wa good would not utterli destroy them but everi thing that wa vile refus that they destroy utterli 15 10 then came word lord unto samuel say 15 11 it repenteth me that i have set saul be king he is turn back follow me hath not perform my command it griev samuel he cri unto lord all night 15 12 when samuel rose earli meet saul morn it wa told samuel say saul came carmel behold he set him place is gone pass gone down gilgal 15 13 samuel came saul saul said unto him bless be thou lord i have perform command lord 15 14 samuel said what meaneth then thi bleat sheep mine ear low oxen which i hear 15 15 saul said they have brought them amalekit peopl spare best sheep oxen sacrific unto lord thi god rest we have utterli destroy 15 16 then samuel said unto saul stay i will tell thee what lord hath said me thi night he said unto him say 15 17 samuel said when thou wast littl thine own sight wast thou not made head tribe israel lord anoint thee king israel 15 18 lord sent thee journey said go utterli destroy sinner amalekit fight against them they be consum 15 19 wherefor then didst thou not obey voic lord but didst fli spoil didst evil sight lord 15 20 saul said unto samuel yea i have obey voic lord have gone way which lord sent me have brought agag king amalek have utterli destroy amalekit 15 21 but peopl took spoil sheep oxen chief thing which should have been utterli destroy sacrific unto lord thi god gilgal 15 22 samuel said hath lord as great delight burnt offer sacrific as obey voic lord behold obey is better than sacrific hearken than fat ram 15 23 rebellion is as sin witchcraft stubborn is as iniqu idolatri becaus thou hast reject word lord he hath also reject thee be king 15 24 saul said unto samuel i have sin i have transgress command lord thi word becaus i fear peopl obey their voic 15 25 now therefor i pray thee pardon my sin turn again me that i may worship lord 15 26 samuel said unto saul i will not return thee thou hast reject word lord lord hath reject thee be king israel 15 27 as samuel turn go away he laid hold skirt hi mantl it rent 15 28 samuel said unto him lord hath rent kingdom israel thee thi day hath given it neighbour thine that is better than thou 15 29 also strength israel will not lie nor repent he is not man that he should repent 15 30 then he said i have sin yet honour me now i pray thee elder my peopl israel turn again me that i may worship lord thi god 15 31 so samuel turn again saul saul worship lord 15 32 then said samuel bring ye hither me agag king amalekit agag came unto him delic agag said sure bitter death is past 15 33 samuel said as sword hath made women childless so shall thi mother be childless women samuel hew agag piec lord gilgal 15 34 then samuel went ramah saul went hi hous gibeah saul 15 35 samuel came no more see saul day hi death nevertheless samuel mourn saul lord repent that he had made saul king israel 16 1 lord said unto samuel how long wilt thou mourn saul see i have reject him reign israel fill thine horn oil go i will send thee jess bethlehemit i have provid me king hi son 16 2 samuel said how can i go if saul hear it he will kill me lord said take heifer thee say i am come sacrific lord 16 3 call jess sacrific i will shew thee what thou shalt do thou shalt anoint unto me him whom i name unto thee 16 4 samuel did that which lord spake came bethlehem elder town trembl hi come said comest thou peaceabl 16 5 he said peaceabl i am come sacrific unto lord sanctifi yourselv come me sacrific he sanctifi jess hi son call them sacrific 16 6 it came pass when they were come that he look eliab said sure lord s anoint is him 16 7 but lord said unto samuel look not hi counten or height hi statur becaus i have refus him lord seeth not as man seeth man looketh outward appear but lord looketh heart 16 8 then jess call abinadab made him pass samuel he said neither hath lord chosen thi 16 9 then jess made shammah pass he said neither hath lord chosen thi 16 10 again jess made seven hi son pass samuel samuel said unto jess lord hath not chosen these 16 11 samuel said unto jess are here all thi children he said there remaineth yet youngest behold he keepeth sheep samuel said unto jess send fetch him we will not sit down till he come hither 16 12 he sent brought him now he wa ruddi withal beauti counten goodli look lord said aris anoint him thi is he 16 13 then samuel took horn oil anoint him midst hi brethren spirit lord came david that day forward so samuel rose went ramah 16 14 but spirit lord depart saul evil spirit lord troubl him 16 15 saul s servant said unto him behold now evil spirit god troubleth thee 16 16 let our lord now command thi servant which are thee seek man who is cun player harp it shall come pass when evil spirit god is thee that he shall play hi hand thou shalt be well 16 17 saul said unto hi servant provid me now man that can play well bring him me 16 18 then answer one servant said behold i have seen son jess bethlehemit that is cun play mighti valiant man man war prudent matter come person lord is him 16 19 wherefor saul sent messeng unto jess said send me david thi son which is sheep 16 20 jess took ass laden bread bottl wine kid sent them david hi son unto saul 16 21 david came saul stood him he love him greatli he becam hi armourbear 16 22 saul sent jess say let david i pray thee stand me he hath found favour my sight 16 23 it came pass when evil spirit god wa saul that david took harp play hi hand so saul wa refresh wa well evil spirit depart him 17 1 now philistin gather togeth their armi battl were gather togeth shochoh which belongeth judah pitch shochoh azekah ephesdammim 17 2 saul men israel were gather togeth pitch valley elah set battl array against philistin 17 3 philistin stood mountain one side israel stood mountain other side there wa valley them 17 4 there went champion camp philistin name goliath gath whose height wa six cubit span 17 5 he had helmet brass hi head he wa arm coat mail weight coat wa five thousand shekel brass 17 6 he had greav brass hi leg target brass hi shoulder 17 7 staff hi spear wa like weaver s beam hi spear s head weigh six hundr shekel iron one bear shield went him 17 8 he stood cri unto armi israel said unto them whi are ye come set your battl array am not i philistin ye servant saul choos you man you let him come down me 17 9 if he be abl fight me kill me then will we be your servant but if i prevail against him kill him then shall ye be our servant serv us 17 10 philistin said i defi armi israel thi day give me man that we may fight togeth 17 11 when saul all israel heard those word philistin they were dismay greatli afraid 17 12 now david wa son that ephrathit bethlehemjudah whose name wa jess he had eight son man went men old man day saul 17 13 three eldest son jess went follow saul battl name hi three son that went battl were eliab firstborn next unto him abinadab third shammah 17 14 david wa youngest three eldest follow saul 17 15 but david went return saul feed hi father s sheep bethlehem 17 16 philistin drew near morn even present himself forti day 17 17 jess said unto david hi son take now thi brethren ephah thi parch corn these ten loav run camp thi brethren 17 18 carri these ten chees unto captain their thousand look how thi brethren fare take their pledg 17 19 now saul they all men israel were valley elah fight philistin 17 20 david rose earli morn left sheep keeper took went as jess had command him he came trench as host wa go forth fight shout battl 17 21 israel philistin had put battl array armi against armi 17 22 david left hi carriag hand keeper carriag ran armi came salut hi brethren 17 23 as he talk them behold there came champion philistin gath goliath name armi philistin spake accord same word david heard them 17 24 all men israel when they saw man fled him were sore afraid 17 25 men israel said have ye seen thi man that is come sure defi israel is he come it shall be that man who killeth him king will enrich him great rich will give him hi daughter make hi father s hous free israel 17 26 david spake men that stood him say what shall be done man that killeth thi philistin taketh away reproach israel who is thi uncircumcis philistin that he should defi armi live god 17 27 peopl answer him thi manner say so shall it be done man that killeth him 17 28 eliab hi eldest brother heard when he spake unto men eliab s anger wa kindl against david he said whi camest thou down hither whom hast thou left those few sheep wilder i know thi pride naughti thine heart thou art come down that thou mightest see battl 17 29 david said what have i now done is there not caus 17 30 he turn him anoth spake same manner peopl answer him again former manner 17 31 when word were heard which david spake they rehears them saul he sent him 17 32 david said saul let no man s heart fail becaus him thi servant will go fight thi philistin 17 33 saul said david thou art not abl go against thi philistin fight him thou art but youth he man war hi youth 17 34 david said unto saul thi servant kept hi father s sheep there came lion bear took lamb flock 17 35 i went him smote him deliv it hi mouth when he aros against me i caught him hi beard smote him slew him 17 36 thi servant slew both lion bear thi uncircumcis philistin shall be as one them see he hath defi armi live god 17 37 david said moreov lord that deliv me paw lion paw bear he will deliv me hand thi philistin saul said unto david go lord be thee 17 38 saul arm david hi armour he put helmet brass hi head also he arm him coat mail 17 39 david gird hi sword hi armour he assay go he had not prove it david said unto saul i cannot go these i have not prove them david put them off him 17 40 he took hi staff hi hand chose him five smooth stone brook put them shepherd s bag which he had even scrip hi sling wa hi hand he drew near philistin 17 41 philistin came drew near unto david man that bare shield went him 17 42 when philistin look saw david he disdain him he wa but youth ruddi fair counten 17 43 philistin said unto david am i dog that thou comest me stave philistin curs david hi god 17 44 philistin said david come me i will give thi flesh unto fowl air beast field 17 45 then said david philistin thou comest me sword spear shield but i come thee name lord host god armi israel whom thou hast defi 17 46 thi day will lord deliv thee mine hand i will smite thee take thine head thee i will give carcas host philistin thi day unto fowl air wild beast earth that all earth may know that there is god israel 17 47 all thi assembl shall know that lord saveth not sword spear battl is lord s he will give you our hand 17 48 it came pass when philistin aros came drew nigh meet david that david hasten ran armi meet philistin 17 49 david put hi hand hi bag took thenc stone slang it smote philistin hi forehead that stone sunk hi forehead he fell hi face earth 17 50 so david prevail philistin sling stone smote philistin slew him but there wa no sword hand david 17 51 therefor david ran stood philistin took hi sword drew it sheath thereof slew him cut off hi head therewith when philistin saw their champion wa dead they fled 17 52 men israel judah aros shout pursu philistin thou come valley gate ekron wound philistin fell down way shaaraim even unto gath unto ekron 17 53 children israel return chase philistin they spoil their tent 17 54 david took head philistin brought it jerusalem but he put hi armour hi tent 17 55 when saul saw david go forth against philistin he said unto abner captain host abner whose son is thi youth abner said as thi soul liveth o king i cannot tell 17 56 king said enquir thou whose son stripl is 17 57 as david return slaughter philistin abner took him brought him saul head philistin hi hand 17 58 saul said him whose son art thou thou young man david answer i am son thi servant jess bethlehemit 18 1 it came pass when he had made end speak unto saul that soul jonathan wa knit soul david jonathan love him as hi own soul 18 2 saul took him that day would let him go no more home hi father s hous 18 3 then jonathan david made coven becaus he love him as hi own soul 18 4 jonathan strip himself robe that wa him gave it david hi garment even hi sword hi bow hi girdl 18 5 david went whithersoev saul sent him behav himself wise saul set him men war he wa accept sight all peopl also sight saul s servant 18 6 it came pass as they came when david wa return slaughter philistin that women came all citi israel sing danc meet king saul tabret joy instrument musick 18 7 women answer one anoth as they play said saul hath slain hi thousand david hi ten thousand 18 8 saul wa veri wroth say displeas him he said they have ascrib unto david ten thousand me they have ascrib but thousand what can he have more but kingdom 18 9 saul eye david that day forward 18 10 it came pass morrow that evil spirit god came saul he prophesi midst hous david play hi hand as other time there wa javelin saul s hand 18 11 saul cast javelin he said i will smite david even wall it david avoid hi presenc twice 18 12 saul wa afraid david becaus lord wa him wa depart saul 18 13 therefor saul remov him him made him hi captain thousand he went came peopl 18 14 david behav himself wise all hi way lord wa him 18 15 wherefor when saul saw that he behav himself veri wise he wa afraid him 18 16 but all israel judah love david becaus he went came them 18 17 saul said david behold my elder daughter merab her will i give thee wife onli be thou valiant me fight lord s battl saul said let not mine hand be him but let hand philistin be him 18 18 david said unto saul who am i what is my life or my father s famili israel that i should be son law king 18 19 but it came pass time when merab saul s daughter should have been given david that she wa given unto adriel meholathit wife 18 20 michal saul s daughter love david they told saul thing pleas him 18 21 saul said i will give him her that she may be snare him that hand philistin may be against him wherefor saul said david thou shalt thi day be my son law one twain 18 22 saul command hi servant say commun david secretli say behold king hath delight thee all hi servant love thee now therefor be king s son law 18 23 saul s servant spake those word ear david david said seemeth it you light thing be king s son law see that i am poor man lightli esteem 18 24 servant saul told him say thi manner spake david 18 25 saul said thu shall ye say david king desireth not ani dowri but hundr foreskin philistin be aveng king s enemi but saul thought make david fall hand philistin 18 26 when hi servant told david these word it pleas david well be king s son law day were not expir 18 27 wherefor david aros went he hi men slew philistin two hundr men david brought their foreskin they gave them full tale king that he might be king s son law saul gave him michal hi daughter wife 18 28 saul saw knew that lord wa david that michal saul s daughter love him 18 29 saul wa yet more afraid david saul becam david s enemi continu 18 30 then princ philistin went forth it came pass they went forth that david behav himself more wise than all servant saul so that hi name wa much set 19 1 saul spake jonathan hi son all hi servant that they should kill david 19 2 but jonathan saul s son delight much david jonathan told david say saul my father seeketh kill thee now therefor i pray thee take heed thyself morn abid secret place hide thyself 19 3 i will go stand besid my father field where thou art i will commun my father thee what i see that i will tell thee 19 4 jonathan spake good david unto saul hi father said unto him let not king sin against hi servant against david becaus he hath not sin against thee becaus hi work have been thee ward veri good 19 5 he did put hi life hi hand slew philistin lord wrought great salvat all israel thou sawest it didst rejoic wherefor then wilt thou sin against innoc blood slay david caus 19 6 saul hearken unto voic jonathan saul sware as lord liveth he shall not be slain 19 7 jonathan call david jonathan shew him all those thing jonathan brought david saul he wa hi presenc as time past 19 8 there wa war again david went fought philistin slew them great slaughter they fled him 19 9 evil spirit lord wa saul as he sat hi hous hi javelin hi hand david play hi hand 19 10 saul sought smite david even wall javelin but he slip away saul s presenc he smote javelin wall david fled escap that night 19 11 saul also sent messeng unto david s hous watch him slay him morn michal david s wife told him say if thou save not thi life night morrow thou shalt be slain 19 12 so michal let david down window he went fled escap 19 13 michal took imag laid it bed put pillow goat hair hi bolster cover it cloth 19 14 when saul sent messeng take david she said he is sick 19 15 saul sent messeng again see david say bring him me bed that i may slay him 19 16 when messeng were come behold there wa imag bed pillow goat hair hi bolster 19 17 saul said unto michal whi hast thou deceiv me so sent away mine enemi that he is escap michal answer saul he said unto me let me go whi should i kill thee 19 18 so david fled escap came samuel ramah told him all that saul had done him he samuel went dwelt naioth 19 19 it wa told saul say behold david is naioth ramah 19 20 saul sent messeng take david when they saw compani prophet prophesi samuel stand as appoint them spirit god wa messeng saul they also prophesi 19 21 when it wa told saul he sent other messeng they prophesi likewis saul sent messeng again third time they prophesi also 19 22 then went he also ramah came great well that is sechu he ask said where are samuel david one said behold they be naioth ramah 19 23 he went thither naioth ramah spirit god wa him also he went prophesi he came naioth ramah 19 24 he strip off hi cloth also prophesi samuel like manner lay down nake all that day all that night wherefor they say is saul also prophet 20 1 david fled naioth ramah came said jonathan what have i done what is mine iniqu what is my sin thi father that he seeketh my life 20 2 he said unto him god forbid thou shalt not die behold my father will do noth either great or small but that he will shew it me whi should my father hide thi thing me it is not so 20 3 david sware moreov said thi father certainli knoweth that i have found grace thine eye he saith let not jonathan know thi lest he be griev but truli as lord liveth as thi soul liveth there is but step me death 20 4 then said jonathan unto david whatsoev thi soul desireth i will even do it thee 20 5 david said unto jonathan behold morrow is new moon i should not fail sit king meat but let me go that i may hide myself field unto third day even 20 6 if thi father all miss me then say david earnestli ask leav me that he might run bethlehem hi citi there is yearli sacrific there all famili 20 7 if he say thu it is well thi servant shall have peac but if he be veri wroth then be sure that evil is determin him 20 8 therefor thou shalt deal kindli thi servant thou hast brought thi servant coven lord thee notwithstand if there be me iniqu slay me thyself whi shouldest thou bring me thi father 20 9 jonathan said far be it thee if i knew certainli that evil were determin my father come thee then would not i tell it thee 20 10 then said david jonathan who shall tell me or what if thi father answer thee roughli 20 11 jonathan said unto david come let us go field they went both them field 20 12 jonathan said unto david o lord god israel when i have sound my father morrow ani time or third day behold if there be good david i then send not unto thee shew it thee 20 13 lord do so much more jonathan but if it pleas my father do thee evil then i will shew it thee send thee away that thou mayest go peac lord be thee as he hath been my father 20 14 thou shalt not onli while yet i live shew me kind lord that i die not 20 15 but also thou shalt not cut off thi kind my hous ever no not when lord hath cut off enemi david everi one face earth 20 16 so jonathan made coven hous david say let lord even requir it hand david s enemi 20 17 jonathan caus david swear again becaus he love him he love him as he love hi own soul 20 18 then jonathan said david morrow is new moon thou shalt be miss becaus thi seat will be empti 20 19 when thou hast stay three day then thou shalt go down quickli come place where thou didst hide thyself when busi wa hand shalt remain stone ezel 20 20 i will shoot three arrow side thereof as though i shot mark 20 21 behold i will send lad say go find arrow if i expressli say unto lad behold arrow are thi side thee take them then come thou there is peac thee no hurt as lord liveth 20 22 but if i say thu unto young man behold arrow are thee go thi way lord hath sent thee away 20 23 as touch matter which thou i have spoken behold lord be thee me ever 20 24 so david hid himself field when new moon wa come king sat him down eat meat 20 25 king sat hi seat as other time even seat wall jonathan aros abner sat saul s side david s place wa empti 20 26 nevertheless saul spake not ani thing that day he thought someth hath befallen him he is not clean sure he is not clean 20 27 it came pass morrow which wa second day month that david s place wa empti saul said unto jonathan hi son wherefor cometh not son jess meat neither yesterday nor day 20 28 jonathan answer saul david earnestli ask leav me go bethlehem 20 29 he said let me go i pray thee our famili hath sacrific citi my brother he hath command me be there now if i have found favour thine eye let me get away i pray thee see my brethren therefor he cometh not unto king s tabl 20 30 then saul s anger wa kindl against jonathan he said unto him thou son pervers rebelli woman do not i know that thou hast chosen son jess thine own confus unto confus thi mother s naked 20 31 as long as son jess liveth ground thou shalt not be establish nor thi kingdom wherefor now send fetch him unto me he shall sure die 20 32 jonathan answer saul hi father said unto him wherefor shall he be slain what hath he done 20 33 saul cast javelin him smite him wherebi jonathan knew that it wa determin hi father slay david 20 34 so jonathan aros tabl fierc anger did eat no meat second day month he wa griev david becaus hi father had done him shame 20 35 it came pass morn that jonathan went field time appoint david littl lad him 20 36 he said unto hi lad run find now arrow which i shoot as lad ran he shot arrow him 20 37 when lad wa come place arrow which jonathan had shot jonathan cri lad said is not arrow thee 20 38 jonathan cri lad make speed hast stay not jonathan s lad gather arrow came hi master 20 39 but lad knew not ani thing onli jonathan david knew matter 20 40 jonathan gave hi artilleri unto hi lad said unto him go carri them citi 20 41 as soon as lad wa gone david aros place south fell hi face ground bow himself three time they kiss one anoth wept one anoth david exceed 20 42 jonathan said david go peac forasmuch as we have sworn both us name lord say lord be me thee my seed thi seed ever he aros depart jonathan went citi 21 1 then came david nob ahimelech priest ahimelech wa afraid meet david said unto him whi art thou alon no man thee 21 2 david said unto ahimelech priest king hath command me busi hath said unto me let no man know ani thing busi whereabout i send thee what i have command thee i have appoint my servant such such place 21 3 now therefor what is thine hand give me five loav bread mine hand or what there is present 21 4 priest answer david said there is no common bread mine hand but there is hallow bread if young men have kept themselv least women 21 5 david answer priest said unto him truth women have been kept us these three day i came vessel young men are holi bread is manner common yea though it were sanctifi thi day vessel 21 6 so priest gave him hallow bread there wa no bread there but shewbread that wa taken lord put hot bread day when it wa taken away 21 7 now certain man servant saul wa there that day detain lord hi name wa doeg edomit chiefest herdmen that belong saul 21 8 david said unto ahimelech is there not here thine hand spear or sword i have neither brought my sword nor my weapon me becaus king s busi requir hast 21 9 priest said sword goliath philistin whom thou slewest valley elah behold it is here wrap cloth behind ephod if thou wilt take that take it there is no other save that here david said there is none like that give it me 21 10 david aros fled that day fear saul went achish king gath 21 11 servant achish said unto him is not thi david king land did they not sing one anoth him danc say saul hath slain hi thousand david hi ten thousand 21 12 david laid these word hi heart wa sore afraid achish king gath 21 13 he chang hi behaviour them feign himself mad their hand scrabbl door gate let hi spittl fall down hi beard 21 14 then said achish unto hi servant lo ye see man is mad wherefor then have ye brought him me 21 15 have i need mad men that ye have brought thi fellow play mad man my presenc shall thi fellow come my hous 22 1 david therefor depart thenc escap cave adullam when hi brethren all hi father s hous heard it they went down thither him 22 2 everi one that wa distress everi one that wa debt everi one that wa discont gather themselv unto him he becam captain them there were him four hundr men 22 3 david went thenc mizpeh moab he said unto king moab let my father my mother i pray thee come forth be you till i know what god will do me 22 4 he brought them king moab they dwelt him all while that david wa hold 22 5 prophet gad said unto david abid not hold depart get thee land judah then david depart came forest hareth 22 6 when saul heard that david wa discov men that were him now saul abod gibeah tree ramah have hi spear hi hand all hi servant were stand him 22 7 then saul said unto hi servant that stood him hear now ye benjamit will son jess give everi one you field vineyard make you all captain thousand captain hundr 22 8 that all you have conspir against me there is none that sheweth me that my son hath made leagu son jess there is none you that is sorri me or sheweth unto me that my son hath stir my servant against me lie wait as thi day 22 9 then answer doeg edomit which wa set servant saul said i saw son jess come nob ahimelech son ahitub 22 10 he enquir lord him gave him victual gave him sword goliath philistin 22 11 then king sent call ahimelech priest son ahitub all hi father s hous priest that were nob they came all them king 22 12 saul said hear now thou son ahitub he answer here i am my lord 22 13 saul said unto him whi have ye conspir against me thou son jess that thou hast given him bread sword hast enquir god him that he should rise against me lie wait as thi day 22 14 then ahimelech answer king said who is so faith all thi servant as david which is king s son law goeth thi bid is honour thine hous 22 15 did i then begin enquir god him be it far me let not king imput ani thing unto hi servant nor all hous my father thi servant knew noth all thi less or more 22 16 king said thou shalt sure die ahimelech thou all thi father s hous 22 17 king said unto footmen that stood him turn slay priest lord becaus their hand also is david becaus they knew when he fled did not shew it me but servant king would not put forth their hand fall priest lord 22 18 king said doeg turn thou fall priest doeg edomit turn he fell priest slew that day fourscor five person that did wear linen ephod 22 19 nob citi priest smote he edg sword both men women children suckl oxen ass sheep edg sword 22 20 one son ahimelech son ahitub name abiathar escap fled david 22 21 abiathar shew david that saul had slain lord s priest 22 22 david said unto abiathar i knew it that day when doeg edomit wa there that he would sure tell saul i have occas death all person thi father s hous 22 23 abid thou me fear not he that seeketh my life seeketh thi life but me thou shalt be safeguard 23 1 then they told david say behold philistin fight against keilah they rob threshingfloor 23 2 therefor david enquir lord say shall i go smite these philistin lord said unto david go smite philistin save keilah 23 3 david s men said unto him behold we be afraid here judah how much more then if we come keilah against armi philistin 23 4 then david enquir lord yet again lord answer him said aris go down keilah i will deliv philistin thine hand 23 5 so david hi men went keilah fought philistin brought away their cattl smote them great slaughter so david save inhabit keilah 23 6 it came pass when abiathar son ahimelech fled david keilah that he came down ephod hi hand 23 7 it wa told saul that david wa come keilah saul said god hath deliv him mine hand he is shut enter town that hath gate bar 23 8 saul call all peopl togeth war go down keilah besieg david hi men 23 9 david knew that saul secretli practis mischief against him he said abiathar priest bring hither ephod 23 10 then said david o lord god israel thi servant hath certainli heard that saul seeketh come keilah destroy citi my sake 23 11 will men keilah deliv me hi hand will saul come down as thi servant hath heard o lord god israel i beseech thee tell thi servant lord said he will come down 23 12 then said david will men keilah deliv me my men hand saul lord said they will deliv thee 23 13 then david hi men which were six hundr aros depart keilah went whithersoev they could go it wa told saul that david wa escap keilah he forbar go forth 23 14 david abod wilder strong hold remain mountain wilder ziph saul sought him everi day but god deliv him not hi hand 23 15 david saw that saul wa come seek hi life david wa wilder ziph wood 23 16 jonathan saul s son aros went david wood strengthen hi hand god 23 17 he said unto him fear not hand saul my father shall not find thee thou shalt be king israel i shall be next unto thee that also saul my father knoweth 23 18 they two made coven lord david abod wood jonathan went hi hous 23 19 then came ziphit saul gibeah say doth not david hide himself us strong hold wood hill hachilah which is south jeshimon 23 20 now therefor o king come down accord all desir thi soul come down our part shall be deliv him king s hand 23 21 saul said bless be ye lord ye have compass me 23 22 go i pray you prepar yet know see hi place where hi haunt is who hath seen him there it is told me that he dealeth veri subtilli 23 23 see therefor take knowledg all lurk place where he hideth himself come ye again me certainti i will go you it shall come pass if he be land that i will search him all thousand judah 23 24 they aros went ziph saul but david hi men were wilder maon plain south jeshimon 23 25 saul also hi men went seek him they told david wherefor he came down rock abod wilder maon when saul heard that he pursu david wilder maon 23 26 saul went thi side mountain david hi men that side mountain david made hast get away fear saul saul hi men compass david hi men round take them 23 27 but there came messeng unto saul say hast thee come philistin have invad land 23 28 wherefor saul return pursu david went against philistin therefor they call that place selahammahlekoth 23 29 david went thenc dwelt strong hold engedi 24 1 it came pass when saul wa return follow philistin that it wa told him say behold david is wilder engedi 24 2 then saul took three thousand chosen men all israel went seek david hi men rock wild goat 24 3 he came sheepcot way where wa cave saul went cover hi feet david hi men remain side cave 24 4 men david said unto him behold day which lord said unto thee behold i will deliv thine enemi thine hand that thou mayest do him as it shall seem good unto thee then david aros cut off skirt saul s robe privili 24 5 it came pass afterward that david s heart smote him becaus he had cut off saul s skirt 24 6 he said unto hi men lord forbid that i should do thi thing unto my master lord s anoint stretch forth mine hand against him see he is anoint lord 24 7 so david stay hi servant these word suffer them not rise against saul but saul rose cave went hi way 24 8 david also aros afterward went cave cri saul say my lord king when saul look behind him david stoop hi face earth bow himself 24 9 david said saul wherefor hearest thou men s word say behold david seeketh thi hurt 24 10 behold thi day thine eye have seen how that lord had deliv thee day mine hand cave some bade me kill thee but mine eye spare thee i said i will not put forth mine hand against my lord he is lord s anoint 24 11 moreov my father see yea see skirt thi robe my hand that i cut off skirt thi robe kill thee not know thou see that there is neither evil nor transgress mine hand i have not sin against thee yet thou huntest my soul take it 24 12 lord judg me thee lord aveng me thee but mine hand shall not be thee 24 13 as saith proverb ancient wicked proceedeth wick but mine hand shall not be thee 24 14 whom is king israel come whom dost thou pursu dead dog flea 24 15 lord therefor be judg judg me thee see plead my caus deliv me thine hand 24 16 it came pass when david had made end speak these word unto saul that saul said is thi thi voic my son david saul lift hi voic wept 24 17 he said david thou art more righteou than i thou hast reward me good wherea i have reward thee evil 24 18 thou hast shew thi day how that thou hast dealt well me forasmuch as when lord had deliv me thine hand thou killedst me not 24 19 if man find hi enemi will he let him go well away wherefor lord reward thee good that thou hast done unto me thi day 24 20 now behold i know well that thou shalt sure be king that kingdom israel shall be establish thine hand 24 21 swear now therefor unto me lord that thou wilt not cut off my seed me that thou wilt not destroy my name my father s hous 24 22 david sware unto saul saul went home but david hi men gat them unto hold 25 1 samuel die all israelit were gather togeth lament him buri him hi hous ramah david aros went down wilder paran 25 2 there wa man maon whose possess were carmel man wa veri great he had three thousand sheep thousand goat he wa shear hi sheep carmel 25 3 now name man wa nabal name hi wife abigail she wa woman good understand beauti counten but man wa churlish evil hi do he wa hous caleb 25 4 david heard wilder that nabal did shear hi sheep 25 5 david sent ten young men david said unto young men get you carmel go nabal greet him my name 25 6 thu shall ye say him that liveth prosper peac be both thee peac be thine hous peac be unto all that thou hast 25 7 now i have heard that thou hast shearer now thi shepherd which were us we hurt them not neither wa there ought miss unto them all while they were carmel 25 8 ask thi young men they will shew thee wherefor let young men find favour thine eye we come good day give i pray thee whatsoev cometh thine hand unto thi servant thi son david 25 9 when david s young men came they spake nabal accord all those word name david ceas 25 10 nabal answer david s servant said who is david who is son jess there be mani servant now day that break away everi man hi master 25 11 shall i then take my bread my water my flesh that i have kill my shearer give it unto men whom i know not whenc they be 25 12 so david s young men turn their way went again came told him all those say 25 13 david said unto hi men gird ye everi man hi sword they gird everi man hi sword david also gird hi sword there went david four hundr men two hundr abod stuff 25 14 but one young men told abigail nabal s wife say behold david sent messeng wilder salut our master he rail them 25 15 but men were veri good unto us we were not hurt neither miss we ani thing as long as we were convers them when we were field 25 16 they were wall unto us both night day all while we were them keep sheep 25 17 now therefor know consid what thou wilt do evil is determin against our master against all hi household he is such son belial that man cannot speak him 25 18 then abigail made hast took two hundr loav two bottl wine five sheep readi dress five measur parch corn hundr cluster raisin two hundr cake fig laid them ass 25 19 she said unto her servant go me behold i come you but she told not her husband nabal 25 20 it wa so as she rode ass that she came down covert hill behold david hi men came down against her she met them 25 21 now david had said sure vain have i kept all that thi fellow hath wilder so that noth wa miss all that pertain unto him he hath requit me evil good 25 22 so more also do god unto enemi david if i leav all that pertain him morn light ani that pisseth against wall 25 23 when abigail saw david she hast light off ass fell david her face bow herself ground 25 24 fell hi feet said me my lord me let thi iniqu be let thine handmaid i pray thee speak thine audienc hear word thine handmaid 25 25 let not my lord i pray thee regard thi man belial even nabal as hi name is so is he nabal is hi name folli is him but i thine handmaid saw not young men my lord whom thou didst send 25 26 now therefor my lord as lord liveth as thi soul liveth see lord hath withholden thee come shed blood aveng thyself thine own hand now let thine enemi they that seek evil my lord be as nabal 25 27 now thi bless which thine handmaid hath brought unto my lord let it even be given unto young men that follow my lord 25 28 i pray thee forgiv trespass thine handmaid lord will certainli make my lord sure hous becaus my lord fighteth battl lord evil hath not been found thee all thi day 25 29 yet man is risen pursu thee seek thi soul but soul my lord shall be bound bundl life lord thi god soul thine enemi them shall he sling as middl sling 25 30 it shall come pass when lord shall have done my lord accord all good that he hath spoken concern thee shall have appoint thee ruler israel 25 31 that thi shall be no grief unto thee nor offenc heart unto my lord either that thou hast shed blood causeless or that my lord hath aveng himself but when lord shall have dealt well my lord then rememb thine handmaid 25 32 david said abigail bless be lord god israel which sent thee thi day meet me 25 33 bless be thi advic bless be thou which hast kept me thi day come shed blood aveng myself mine own hand 25 34 veri deed as lord god israel liveth which hath kept me back hurt thee thou hadst hast come meet me sure there had not been left unto nabal morn light ani that pisseth against wall 25 35 so david receiv her hand that which she had brought him said unto her go peac thine hous see i have hearken thi voic have accept thi person 25 36 abigail came nabal behold he held feast hi hous like feast king nabal s heart wa merri him he wa veri drunken wherefor she told him noth less or more morn light 25 37 but it came pass morn when wine wa gone nabal hi wife had told him these thing that hi heart die him he becam as stone 25 38 it came pass ten day that lord smote nabal that he die 25 39 when david heard that nabal wa dead he said bless be lord that hath plead caus my reproach hand nabal hath kept hi servant evil lord hath return wicked nabal hi own head david sent commun abigail take her him wife 25 40 when servant david were come abigail carmel they spake unto her say david sent us unto thee take thee him wife 25 41 she aros bow herself her face earth said behold let thine handmaid be servant wash feet servant my lord 25 42 abigail hast aros rode ass five damsel her that went her she went messeng david becam hi wife 25 43 david also took ahinoam jezreel they were also both them hi wive 25 44 but saul had given michal hi daughter david s wife phalti son laish which wa gallim 26 1 ziphit came unto saul gibeah say doth not david hide himself hill hachilah which is jeshimon 26 2 then saul aros went down wilder ziph have three thousand chosen men israel him seek david wilder ziph 26 3 saul pitch hill hachilah which is jeshimon way but david abod wilder he saw that saul came him wilder 26 4 david therefor sent spi understood that saul wa come veri deed 26 5 david aros came place where saul had pitch david beheld place where saul lay abner son ner captain hi host saul lay trench peopl pitch round him 26 6 then answer david said ahimelech hittit abishai son zeruiah brother joab say who will go down me saul camp abishai said i will go down thee 26 7 so david abishai came peopl night behold saul lay sleep trench hi spear stuck ground hi bolster but abner peopl lay round him 26 8 then said abishai david god hath deliv thine enemi thine hand thi day now therefor let me smite him i pray thee spear even earth onc i will not smite him second time 26 9 david said abishai destroy him not who can stretch forth hi hand against lord s anoint be guiltless 26 10 david said furthermor as lord liveth lord shall smite him or hi day shall come die or he shall descend battl perish 26 11 lord forbid that i should stretch forth mine hand against lord s anoint but i pray thee take thou now spear that is hi bolster cruse water let us go 26 12 so david took spear cruse water saul s bolster they gat them away no man saw it nor knew it neither awak they were all asleep becaus deep sleep lord wa fallen them 26 13 then david went other side stood top hill afar off great space be them 26 14 david cri peopl abner son ner say answerest thou not abner then abner answer said who art thou that criest king 26 15 david said abner art not thou valiant man who is like thee israel wherefor then hast thou not kept thi lord king there came one peopl destroy king thi lord 26 16 thi thing is not good that thou hast done as lord liveth ye are worthi die becaus ye have not kept your master lord s anoint now see where king s spear is cruse water that wa hi bolster 26 17 saul knew david s voic said is thi thi voic my son david david said it is my voic my lord o king 26 18 he said wherefor doth my lord thu pursu hi servant what have i done or what evil is mine hand 26 19 now therefor i pray thee let my lord king hear word hi servant if lord have stir thee against me let him accept offer but if they be children men curs be they lord they have driven me thi day abid inherit lord say go serv other god 26 20 now therefor let not my blood fall earth face lord king israel is come seek flea as when one doth hunt partridg mountain 26 21 then said saul i have sin return my son david i will no more do thee harm becaus my soul wa preciou thine eye thi day behold i have play fool have er exceedingli 26 22 david answer said behold king s spear let one young men come fetch it 26 23 lord render everi man hi righteous hi faith lord deliv thee my hand day but i would not stretch forth mine hand against lord s anoint 26 24 behold as thi life wa much set thi day mine eye so let my life be much set eye lord let him deliv me all tribul 26 25 then saul said david bless be thou my son david thou shalt both do great thing also shalt still prevail so david went hi way saul return hi place 27 1 david said hi heart i shall now perish one day hand saul there is noth better me than that i should speedili escap land philistin saul shall despair me seek me ani more ani coast israel so shall i escap hi hand 27 2 david aros he pass six hundr men that were him unto achish son maoch king gath 27 3 david dwelt achish gath he hi men everi man hi household even david hi two wive ahinoam jezreelitess abigail carmelitess nabal s wife 27 4 it wa told saul that david wa fled gath he sought no more again him 27 5 david said unto achish if i have now found grace thine eye let them give me place some town countri that i may dwell there whi should thi servant dwell royal citi thee 27 6 then achish gave him ziklag that day wherefor ziklag pertaineth unto king judah unto thi day 27 7 time that david dwelt countri philistin wa full year four month 27 8 david hi men went invad geshurit gezrit amalekit those nation were old inhabit land as thou goest shur even unto land egypt 27 9 david smote land left neither man nor woman aliv took away sheep oxen ass camel apparel return came achish 27 10 achish said whither have ye made road day david said against south judah against south jerahmeelit against south kenit 27 11 david save neither man nor woman aliv bring tide gath say lest they should tell us say so did david so will be hi manner all while he dwelleth countri philistin 27 12 achish believ david say he hath made hi peopl israel utterli abhor him therefor he shall be my servant ever 28 1 it came pass those day that philistin gather their armi togeth warfar fight israel achish said unto david know thou assuredli that thou shalt go me battl thou thi men 28 2 david said achish sure thou shalt know what thi servant can do achish said david therefor will i make thee keeper mine head ever 28 3 now samuel wa dead all israel had lament him buri him ramah even hi own citi saul had put away those that had familiar spirit wizard land 28 4 philistin gather themselv togeth came pitch shunem saul gather all israel togeth they pitch gilboa 28 5 when saul saw host philistin he wa afraid hi heart greatli trembl 28 6 when saul enquir lord lord answer him not neither dream nor urim nor prophet 28 7 then said saul unto hi servant seek me woman that hath familiar spirit that i may go her enquir her hi servant said him behold there is woman that hath familiar spirit endor 28 8 saul disguis himself put other raiment he went two men him they came woman night he said i pray thee divin unto me familiar spirit bring me him whom i shall name unto thee 28 9 woman said unto him behold thou knowest what saul hath done how he hath cut off those that have familiar spirit wizard land wherefor then layest thou snare my life caus me die 28 10 saul sware her lord say as lord liveth there shall no punish happen thee thi thing 28 11 then said woman whom shall i bring unto thee he said bring me samuel 28 12 when woman saw samuel she cri loud voic woman spake saul say whi hast thou deceiv me thou art saul 28 13 king said unto her be not afraid what sawest thou woman said unto saul i saw god ascend earth 28 14 he said unto her what form is he she said old man cometh he is cover mantl saul perceiv that it wa samuel he stoop hi face ground bow himself 28 15 samuel said saul whi hast thou disquiet me bring me saul answer i am sore distress philistin make war against me god is depart me answereth me no more neither prophet nor dream therefor i have call thee that thou mayest make known unto me what i shall do 28 16 then said samuel wherefor then dost thou ask me see lord is depart thee is becom thine enemi 28 17 lord hath done him as he spake me lord hath rent kingdom thine hand given it thi neighbour even david 28 18 becaus thou obeyedst not voic lord nor executedst hi fierc wrath amalek therefor hath lord done thi thing unto thee thi day 28 19 moreov lord will also deliv israel thee hand philistin morrow shalt thou thi son be me lord also shall deliv host israel hand philistin 28 20 then saul fell straightway all earth wa sore afraid becaus word samuel there wa no strength him he had eaten no bread all day nor all night 28 21 woman came unto saul saw that he wa sore troubl said unto him behold thine handmaid hath obey thi voic i have put my life my hand have hearken unto thi word which thou spakest unto me 28 22 now therefor i pray thee hearken thou also unto voic thine handmaid let me set morsel bread thee eat that thou mayest have strength when thou goest thi way 28 23 but he refus said i will not eat but hi servant togeth woman compel him he hearken unto their voic so he aros earth sat bed 28 24 woman had fat calf hous she hast kill it took flour knead it did bake unleaven bread thereof 28 25 she brought it saul hi servant they did eat then they rose went away that night 29 1 now philistin gather togeth all their armi aphek israelit pitch fountain which is jezreel 29 2 lord philistin pass hundr thousand but david hi men pass rereward achish 29 3 then said princ philistin what do these hebrew here achish said unto princ philistin is not thi david servant saul king israel which hath been me these day or these year i have found no fault him he fell unto me unto thi day 29 4 princ philistin were wroth him princ philistin said unto him make thi fellow return that he may go again hi place which thou hast appoint him let him not go down us battl lest battl he be adversari us wherewith should he reconcil himself unto hi master should it not be head these men 29 5 is not thi david whom they sang one anoth danc say saul slew hi thousand david hi ten thousand 29 6 then achish call david said unto him sure as lord liveth thou hast been upright thi go thi come me host is good my sight i have not found evil thee day thi come unto me unto thi day nevertheless lord favour thee not 29 7 wherefor now return go peac that thou displeas not lord philistin 29 8 david said unto achish but what have i done what hast thou found thi servant so long as i have been thee unto thi day that i may not go fight against enemi my lord king 29 9 achish answer said david i know that thou art good my sight as angel god notwithstand princ philistin have said he shall not go us battl 29 10 wherefor now rise earli morn thi master s servant that are come thee as soon as ye be earli morn have light depart 29 11 so david hi men rose earli depart morn return land philistin philistin went jezreel 30 1 it came pass when david hi men were come ziklag third day that amalekit had invad south ziklag smitten ziklag burn it fire 30 2 had taken women captiv that were therein they slew not ani either great or small but carri them away went their way 30 3 so david hi men came citi behold it wa burn fire their wive their son their daughter were taken captiv 30 4 then david peopl that were him lift their voic wept they had no more power weep 30 5 david s two wive were taken captiv ahinoam jezreelitess abigail wife nabal carmelit 30 6 david wa greatli distress peopl spake stone him becaus soul all peopl wa griev everi man hi son hi daughter but david encourag himself lord hi god 30 7 david said abiathar priest ahimelech s son i pray thee bring me hither ephod abiathar brought thither ephod david 30 8 david enquir lord say shall i pursu thi troop shall i overtak them he answer him pursu thou shalt sure overtak them fail recov all 30 9 so david went he six hundr men that were him came brook besor where those that were left behind stay 30 10 but david pursu he four hundr men two hundr abod behind which were so faint that they could not go brook besor 30 11 they found egyptian field brought him david gave him bread he did eat they made him drink water 30 12 they gave him piec cake fig two cluster raisin when he had eaten hi spirit came again him he had eaten no bread nor drunk ani water three day three night 30 13 david said unto him whom belongest thou whenc art thou he said i am young man egypt servant amalekit my master left me becaus three day agon i fell sick 30 14 we made invas south cherethit coast which belongeth judah south caleb we burn ziklag fire 30 15 david said him canst thou bring me down thi compani he said swear unto me god that thou wilt neither kill me nor deliv me hand my master i will bring thee down thi compani 30 16 when he had brought him down behold they were spread abroad all earth eat drink danc becaus all great spoil that they had taken land philistin land judah 30 17 david smote them twilight even unto even next day there escap not man them save four hundr young men which rode camel fled 30 18 david recov all that amalekit had carri away david rescu hi two wive 30 19 there wa noth lack them neither small nor great neither son nor daughter neither spoil nor ani thing that they had taken them david recov all 30 20 david took all flock herd which they drave those other cattl said thi is david s spoil 30 21 david came two hundr men which were so faint that they could not follow david whom they had made also abid brook besor they went forth meet david meet peopl that were him when david came near peopl he salut them 30 22 then answer all wick men men belial those that went david said becaus they went not us we will not give them ought spoil that we have recov save everi man hi wife hi children that they may lead them away depart 30 23 then said david ye shall not do so my brethren that which lord hath given us who hath preserv us deliv compani that came against us our hand 30 24 who will hearken unto you thi matter but as hi part is that goeth down battl so shall hi part be that tarrieth stuff they shall part alik 30 25 it wa so that day forward that he made it statut ordin israel unto thi day 30 26 when david came ziklag he sent spoil unto elder judah even hi friend say behold present you spoil enemi lord 30 27 them which were bethel them which were south ramoth them which were jattir 30 28 them which were aroer them which were siphmoth them which were eshtemoa 30 29 them which were rachal them which were citi jerahmeelit them which were citi kenit 30 30 them which were hormah them which were chorashan them which were athach 30 31 them which were hebron all place where david himself hi men were wont haunt 31 1 now philistin fought against israel men israel fled philistin fell down slain mount gilboa 31 2 philistin follow hard saul hi son philistin slew jonathan abinadab melchishua saul s son 31 3 battl went sore against saul archer hit him he wa sore wound archer 31 4 then said saul unto hi armourbear draw thi sword thrust me therewith lest these uncircumcis come thrust me abus me but hi armourbear would not he wa sore afraid therefor saul took sword fell it 31 5 when hi armourbear saw that saul wa dead he fell likewis hi sword die him 31 6 so saul die hi three son hi armourbear all hi men that same day togeth 31 7 when men israel that were other side valley they that were other side jordan saw that men israel fled that saul hi son were dead they forsook citi fled philistin came dwelt them 31 8 it came pass morrow when philistin came strip slain that they found saul hi three son fallen mount gilboa 31 9 they cut off hi head strip off hi armour sent land philistin round publish it hous their idol peopl 31 10 they put hi armour hous ashtaroth they fasten hi bodi wall bethshan 31 11 when inhabit jabeshgilead heard that which philistin had done saul 31 12 all valiant men aros went all night took bodi saul bodi hi son wall bethshan came jabesh burnt them there 31 13 they took their bone buri them tree jabesh fast seven day second book samuel otherwis call second book king 1 1 now it came pass death saul when david wa return slaughter amalekit david had abod two day ziklag 1 2 it came even pass third day that behold man came camp saul hi cloth rent earth hi head so it wa when he came david that he fell earth did obeis 1 3 david said unto him whenc comest thou he said unto him camp israel am i escap 1 4 david said unto him how went matter i pray thee tell me he answer that peopl are fled battl mani peopl also are fallen dead saul jonathan hi son are dead also 1 5 david said unto young man that told him how knowest thou that saul jonathan hi son be dead 1 6 young man that told him said as i happen chanc mount gilboa behold saul lean hi spear lo chariot horsemen follow hard him 1 7 when he look behind him he saw me call unto me i answer here am i 1 8 he said unto me who art thou i answer him i am amalekit 1 9 he said unto me again stand i pray thee me slay me anguish is come me becaus my life is yet whole me 1 10 so i stood him slew him becaus i wa sure that he could not live that he wa fallen i took crown that wa hi head bracelet that wa hi arm have brought them hither unto my lord 1 11 then david took hold hi cloth rent them likewis all men that were him 1 12 they mourn wept fast even saul jonathan hi son peopl lord hous israel becaus they were fallen sword 1 13 david said unto young man that told him whenc art thou he answer i am son stranger amalekit 1 14 david said unto him how wast thou not afraid stretch forth thine hand destroy lord s anoint 1 15 david call one young men said go near fall him he smote him that he die 1 16 david said unto him thi blood be thi head thi mouth hath testifi against thee say i have slain lord s anoint 1 17 david lament thi lament saul jonathan hi son 1 18 also he bade them teach children judah use bow behold it is written book jasher 1 19 beauti israel is slain thi high place how are mighti fallen 1 20 tell it not gath publish it not street askelon lest daughter philistin rejoic lest daughter uncircumcis triumph 1 21 ye mountain gilboa let there be no dew neither let there be rain you nor field offer there shield mighti is vile cast away shield saul as though he had not been anoint oil 1 22 blood slain fat mighti bow jonathan turn not back sword saul return not empti 1 23 saul jonathan were love pleasant their live their death they were not divid they were swifter than eagl they were stronger than lion 1 24 ye daughter israel weep saul who cloth you scarlet other delight who put ornament gold your apparel 1 25 how are mighti fallen midst battl o jonathan thou wast slain thine high place 1 26 i am distress thee my brother jonathan veri pleasant hast thou been unto me thi love me wa wonder pass love women 1 27 how are mighti fallen weapon war perish 2 1 it came pass thi that david enquir lord say shall i go ani citi judah lord said unto him go david said whither shall i go he said unto hebron 2 2 so david went thither hi two wive also ahinoam jezreelitess abigail nabal s wife carmelit 2 3 hi men that were him did david bring everi man hi household they dwelt citi hebron 2 4 men judah came there they anoint david king hous judah they told david say that men jabeshgilead were they that buri saul 2 5 david sent messeng unto men jabeshgilead said unto them bless be ye lord that ye have shew thi kind unto your lord even unto saul have buri him 2 6 now lord shew kind truth unto you i also will requit you thi kind becaus ye have done thi thing 2 7 therefor now let your hand be strengthen be ye valiant your master saul is dead also hous judah have anoint me king them 2 8 but abner son ner captain saul s host took ishbosheth son saul brought him mahanaim 2 9 made him king gilead ashurit jezreel ephraim benjamin all israel 2 10 ishbosheth saul s son wa forti year old when he began reign israel reign two year but hous judah follow david 2 11 time that david wa king hebron hous judah wa seven year six month 2 12 abner son ner servant ishbosheth son saul went mahanaim gibeon 2 13 joab son zeruiah servant david went met togeth pool gibeon they sat down one one side pool other other side pool 2 14 abner said joab let young men now aris play us joab said let them aris 2 15 then there aros went number twelv benjamin which pertain ishbosheth son saul twelv servant david 2 16 they caught everi one hi fellow head thrust hi sword hi fellow s side so they fell down togeth wherefor that place wa call helkathhazzurim which is gibeon 2 17 there wa veri sore battl that day abner wa beaten men israel servant david 2 18 there were three son zeruiah there joab abishai asahel asahel wa as light foot as wild roe 2 19 asahel pursu abner go he turn not right hand nor left follow abner 2 20 then abner look behind him said art thou asahel he answer i am 2 21 abner said him turn thee asid thi right hand or thi left lay thee hold one young men take thee hi armour but asahel would not turn asid follow him 2 22 abner said again asahel turn thee asid follow me wherefor should i smite thee
