ground how then should i hold my face joab thi brother 2 23 howbeit he refus turn asid wherefor abner hinder end spear smote him fifth rib that spear came behind him he fell down there die same place it came pass that as mani as came place where asahel fell down die stood still 2 24 joab also abishai pursu abner sun went down when they were come hill ammah that lieth giah way wilder gibeon 2 25 children benjamin gather themselv togeth abner becam one troop stood top hill 2 26 then abner call joab said shall sword devour ever knowest thou not that it will be bitter latter end how long shall it be then ere thou bid peopl return follow their brethren 2 27 joab said as god liveth unless thou hadst spoken sure then morn peopl had gone everi one follow hi brother 2 28 so joab blew trumpet all peopl stood still pursu israel no more neither fought they ani more 2 29 abner hi men walk all that night plain pass jordan went all bithron they came mahanaim 2 30 joab return follow abner when he had gather all peopl togeth there lack david s servant nineteen men asahel 2 31 but servant david had smitten benjamin abner s men so that three hundr threescor men die 2 32 they took asahel buri him sepulchr hi father which wa bethlehem joab hi men went all night they came hebron break day 3 1 now there wa long war hous saul hous david but david wax stronger stronger hous saul wax weaker weaker 3 2 unto david were son born hebron hi firstborn wa amnon ahinoam jezreelitess 3 3 hi second chileab abigail wife nabal carmelit third absalom son maacah daughter talmai king geshur 3 4 fourth adonijah son haggith fifth shephatiah son abit 3 5 sixth ithream eglah david s wife these were born david hebron 3 6 it came pass while there wa war hous saul hous david that abner made himself strong hous saul 3 7 saul had concubin whose name wa rizpah daughter aiah ishbosheth said abner wherefor hast thou gone unto my father s concubin 3 8 then wa abner veri wroth word ishbosheth said am i dog s head which against judah do shew kind thi day unto hous saul thi father hi brethren hi friend have not deliv thee hand david that thou chargest me day fault concern thi woman 3 9 so do god abner more also as lord hath sworn david even so i do him 3 10 translat kingdom hous saul set throne david israel judah dan even beersheba 3 11 he could not answer abner word again becaus he fear him 3 12 abner sent messeng david hi behalf say whose is land say also make thi leagu me behold my hand shall be thee bring all israel unto thee 3 13 he said well i will make leagu thee but one thing i requir thee that is thou shalt not see my face thou first bring michal saul s daughter when thou comest see my face 3 14 david sent messeng ishbosheth saul s son say deliv me my wife michal which i espous me hundr foreskin philistin 3 15 ishbosheth sent took her her husband even phaltiel son laish 3 16 her husband went her weep behind her bahurim then said abner unto him go return he return 3 17 abner had commun elder israel say ye sought david time past be king you 3 18 now then do it lord hath spoken david say hand my servant david i will save my peopl israel hand philistin hand all their enemi 3 19 abner also spake ear benjamin abner went also speak ear david hebron all that seem good israel that seem good whole hous benjamin 3 20 so abner came david hebron twenti men him david made abner men that were him feast 3 21 abner said unto david i will aris go will gather all israel unto my lord king that they may make leagu thee that thou mayest reign all that thine heart desireth david sent abner away he went peac 3 22 behold servant david joab came pursu troop brought great spoil them but abner wa not david hebron he had sent him away he wa gone peac 3 23 when joab all host that wa him were come they told joab say abner son ner came king he hath sent him away he is gone peac 3 24 then joab came king said what hast thou done behold abner came unto thee whi is it that thou hast sent him away he is quit gone 3 25 thou knowest abner son ner that he came deceiv thee know thi go thi come know all that thou doest 3 26 when joab wa come david he sent messeng abner which brought him again well sirah but david knew it not 3 27 when abner wa return hebron joab took him asid gate speak him quietli smote him there fifth rib that he die blood asahel hi brother 3 28 afterward when david heard it he said i my kingdom are guiltless lord ever blood abner son ner 3 29 let it rest head joab all hi father s hous let there not fail hous joab one that hath issu or that is leper or that leaneth staff or that falleth sword or that lacketh bread 3 30 so joab abishai hi brother slew abner becaus he had slain their brother asahel gibeon battl 3 31 david said joab all peopl that were him rend your cloth gird you sackcloth mourn abner king david himself follow bier 3 32 they buri abner hebron king lift hi voic wept grave abner all peopl wept 3 33 king lament abner said die abner as fool dieth 3 34 thi hand were not bound nor thi feet put fetter as man falleth wick men so fellest thou all peopl wept again him 3 35 when all peopl came caus david eat meat while it wa yet day david sware say so do god me more also if i tast bread or ought els till sun be down 3 36 all peopl took notic it it pleas them as whatsoev king did pleas all peopl 3 37 all peopl all israel understood that day that it wa not king slay abner son ner 3 38 king said unto hi servant know ye not that there is princ great man fallen thi day israel 3 39 i am thi day weak though anoint king these men son zeruiah be too hard me lord shall reward doer evil accord hi wicked 4 1 when saul s son heard that abner wa dead hebron hi hand were feebl all israelit were troubl 4 2 saul s son had two men that were captain band name one wa baanah name other rechab son rimmon beerothit children benjamin beeroth also wa reckon benjamin 4 3 beerothit fled gittaim were sojourn there thi day 4 4 jonathan saul s son had son that wa lame hi feet he wa five year old when tide came saul jonathan jezreel hi nurs took him fled it came pass as she made hast flee that he fell becam lame hi name wa mephibosheth 4 5 son rimmon beerothit rechab baanah went came heat day hous ishbosheth who lay bed noon 4 6 they came thither midst hous as though they would have fetch wheat they smote him fifth rib rechab baanah hi brother escap 4 7 when they came hous he lay hi bed hi bedchamb they smote him slew him behead him took hi head gat them away plain all night 4 8 they brought head ishbosheth unto david hebron said king behold head ishbosheth son saul thine enemi which sought thi life lord hath aveng my lord king thi day saul hi seed 4 9 david answer rechab baanah hi brother son rimmon beerothit said unto them as lord liveth who hath redeem my soul all advers 4 10 when one told me say behold saul is dead think have brought good tide i took hold him slew him ziklag who thought that i would have given him reward hi tide 4 11 how much more when wick men have slain righteou person hi own hous hi bed shall i not therefor now requir hi blood your hand take you away earth 4 12 david command hi young men they slew them cut off their hand their feet hang them pool hebron but they took head ishbosheth buri it sepulchr abner hebron 5 1 then came all tribe israel david unto hebron spake say behold we are thi bone thi flesh 5 2 also time past when saul wa king us thou wast he that leddest broughtest israel lord said thee thou shalt feed my peopl israel thou shalt be captain israel 5 3 so all elder israel came king hebron king david made leagu them hebron lord they anoint david king israel 5 4 david wa thirti year old when he began reign he reign forti year 5 5 hebron he reign judah seven year six month jerusalem he reign thirti three year all israel judah 5 6 king hi men went jerusalem unto jebusit inhabit land which spake unto david say thou take away blind lame thou shalt not come hither think david cannot come hither 5 7 nevertheless david took strong hold zion same is citi david 5 8 david said that day whosoev getteth gutter smiteth jebusit lame blind that are hate david s soul he shall be chief captain wherefor they said blind lame shall not come hous 5 9 so david dwelt fort call it citi david david built round millo inward 5 10 david went grew great lord god host wa him 5 11 hiram king tyre sent messeng david cedar tree carpent mason they built david hous 5 12 david perceiv that lord had establish him king israel that he had exalt hi kingdom hi peopl israel s sake 5 13 20 david came baalperazim david smote them there said lord hath broken forth mine enemi me as breach water therefor he call name that place baalperazim 5 21 there they left their imag david hi men thi day 6 9 david wa afraid lord that day said how shall ark lord come me 6 10 so david would not remov ark lord unto him citi david but david carri it asid hous obededom gittit 6 11 ark lord continu hous obededom gittit three month lord bless obededom all hi household 6 12 it wa told king david say lord hath bless hous obededom all that pertaineth unto him becaus ark god so david went brought ark god hous obededom citi david glad 6 13 it wa so that when they that bare ark lord had gone six pace he sacrif oxen fatl 6 14 david danc lord all hi might david wa gird linen ephod 6 15 so david all hous israel brought ark lord shout sound trumpet 6 16 as ark lord came citi david michal saul s daughter look window saw king david leap danc lord she despis him her heart 6 17 they brought ark lord set it hi place midst tabernacl that david had pitch it david offer burnt offer peac offer lord 6 18 as soon as david had made end offer burnt offer peac offer he bless peopl name lord host 6 19 he dealt all peopl even whole multitud israel as well women as men everi one cake bread good piec flesh flagon wine so all peopl depart everi one hi hous 6 20 then david return bless hi household michal daughter saul came meet david said how gloriou wa king israel day who uncov himself day eye handmaid hi servant as one vain fellow shamelessli uncovereth himself 6 21 david said unto michal it wa lord which chose me thi father all hi hous appoint me ruler peopl lord israel therefor will i play lord 6 22 i will yet be more vile than thu will be base mine own sight maidserv which thou hast spoken them shall i be had honour 6 23 therefor michal daughter saul had no child unto day her death 7 1 it came pass when king sat hi hous lord had given him rest round all hi enemi 7 2 that king said unto nathan prophet see now i dwell hous cedar but ark god dwelleth curtain 7 3 nathan said king go do all that is thine heart lord is thee 7 4 it came pass that night that word lord came unto nathan say 7 5 go tell my servant david thu saith lord shalt thou build me hous me dwell 7 6 wherea i have not dwelt ani hous time that i brought children israel egypt even thi day but have walk tent tabernacl 7 7 all place wherein i have walk all children israel spake i word ani tribe israel whom i command feed my peopl israel say whi build ye not me hous cedar 7 8 now therefor so shalt thou say unto my servant david thu saith lord host i took thee sheepcot follow sheep be ruler my peopl israel 7 9 i wa thee whithersoev thou wentest have cut off all thine enemi thi sight have made thee great name like unto name great men that are earth 7 10 moreov i will appoint place my peopl israel will plant them that they may dwell place their own move no more neither shall children wicked afflict them ani more as beforetim 7 11 as time that i command judg be my peopl israel have caus thee rest all thine enemi also lord telleth thee that he will make thee hous 7 12 when thi day be fulfil thou shalt shall be my son if he commit iniqu i will chasten him rod men stripe children men 7 15 but my merci shall not depart away him as i took it saul whom i put away thee 7 16 thine hous thi kingdom shall be establish ever thee thi throne shall be establish ever 7 17 accord all these word accord all thi vision so did nathan speak unto david 7 18 then went king david sat lord he said who am i o lord god what is my hous that thou hast brought me hitherto 7 19 thi wa yet small thing thi sight o lord god but thou hast spoken also thi servant s hous great while come is thi manner man o lord god 7 20 what can david say more unto thee thou lord god knowest thi servant 7 21 thi word s sake accord thine own heart hast thou done all these great thing make thi servant know them 7 22 wherefor thou art great o lord god there is none like thee neither is there ani god besid thee accord all that we have heard our ear 7 23 what one nation earth is like thi peopl even like israel whom god went redeem peopl thee 7 28 now o lord god thou art that god thi word be true thou hast promis thi good unto thi servant 7 29 therefor now let it pleas thee bless hous thi servant that it may continu ever thee thou o lord god hast spoken it thi bless let hous thi servant be bless ever 8 1 thi it came pass that david smote philistin subdu them david took methegammah hand philistin 8 2 he smote moab measur them line unto him ziba said unto king jonathan hath yet son which is lame hi feet 9 4 king said unto him where is he ziba said unto king behold he is hous machir son ammiel lodebar 9 5 then king david sent fetch him hous machir son ammiel lodebar 9 6 now when mephibosheth son jonathan son saul wa come unto david he fell hi face did rever david said mephibosheth he answer behold thi servant 9 7 david said unto him fear not i will sure shew thee kind jonathan thi father s sake will restor thee all land saul thi father thou shalt eat bread my tabl continu 9 8 he bow himself said what is thi servant that thou shouldest look such dead dog as i am 9 9 then king call ziba saul s servant said unto him i have given unto thi master s son all that pertain saul all hi hous 9 10 thou therefor thi son thi servant shall till land him thou shalt bring fruit that thi master s son may have food eat but mephibosheth thi master s son shall eat bread alway my tabl now ziba had fifteen son twenti servant 9 11 then said ziba unto king accord all that my lord king hath command hi servant so shall thi servant do as mephibosheth said king he shall eat my tabl as one king s son 9 12 mephibosheth had young son whose name wa micha all that dwelt hous ziba were servant unto mephibosheth 9 13 so mephibosheth dwelt jerusalem he did eat continu king s tabl wa lame both hi feet 10 1 it came pass thi that king children ammon die hanun hi son reign hi stead 10 2 then said david i will shew kind unto hanun son nahash as hi father shew kind unto me david sent comfort him hand hi servant hi father david s servant came land children ammon 10 3 princ children ammon said unto hanun their lord thinkest thou that david doth honour thi father that he hath sent comfort unto thee hath not david rather sent hi servant unto thee search citi spi it overthrow it 10 4 wherefor hanun took david s servant shave off one half their beard cut off their garment middl even their buttock sent them away 10 5 when they told it unto david he sent meet them becaus men were greatli asham king said tarri jericho your beard be grown then return 10 6 when children ammon saw that they stank david children ammon sent hire syrian bethrehob syrian zoba twenti thousand footmen king maacah thousand men ishtob twelv thousand men 10 7 when david heard it he sent joab all host mighti men 10 8 children ammon came put battl array enter gate syrian zoba rehob ishtob maacah were themselv field 10 9 when joab saw that front battl wa against him behind he chose all choic men israel put them array against syrian 10 10 rest peopl he deliv hand abishai hi brother that he might put them array against children ammon 10 11 he said if syrian be too strong me then thou shalt help me but if children ammon be too strong thee then i will come help thee 10 12 be good courag let us play men our peopl citi our god lord do that which seemeth him good 10 13 joab drew nigh peopl that were him unto battl against syrian they fled him 10 14 when children ammon saw that syrian were fled then fled they also abishai enter citi so joab return children ammon came jerusalem 10 15 when syrian saw that they were smitten israel they gather themselv togeth 10 16 hadarez sent brought syrian that were river they came helam shobach captain host hadarez went them 10 17 when it wa told david he gather all israel togeth pass jordan came helam syrian set themselv array against david fought him 10 18 syrian fled israel david slew men seven hundr chariot syrian forti thousand horsemen smote shobach captain their host who die there 10 19 when all king that were servant hadarez saw that they were smitten israel they made peac israel serv them so syrian fear help children ammon ani more 11 1 it came pass year wa expir time when king go forth battl that david sent joab hi servant him all israel they destroy children ammon besieg rabbah but david tarri still jerusalem 11 2 it came pass eveningtid that david aros off hi bed walk roof king s hous roof he saw woman wash herself woman wa veri beauti look 11 3 david sent enquir woman one said is not thi bathsheba daughter eliam wife uriah hittit 11 4 david sent messeng took her she came unto him he lay her she wa purifi her unclean she return unto her hous 11 5 woman conceiv sent told david said i am child 11 6 david sent joab say send me uriah hittit joab sent uriah david 11 7 when uriah wa come unto him david demand him how joab did how peopl did how war prosper 11 8 david said uriah go down thi hous wash thi feet uriah depart king s hous there follow him mess meat king 11 9 but uriah slept door king s hous all servant hi lord went not down hi hous 11 10 when they had told david say uriah went not down unto hi hous david said unto uriah camest thou not thi journey whi then didst thou not go down unto thine hous 11 11 uriah said unto david ark israel judah abid tent my lord joab servant my lord are encamp open field shall i then go mine hous eat drink lie my wife as thou livest as thi soul liveth i will not do thi thing 11 12 david said uriah tarri here day also morrow i will let thee depart so uriah abod jerusalem that day morrow 11 13 when david had call him he did eat drink him he made him drunk even he went lie hi bed servant hi lord but went not down hi hous 11 14 it came pass morn that david wrote letter joab sent it hand uriah 11 15 he wrote letter say set ye uriah forefront hottest battl retir ye him that he may be smitten die 11 16 it came pass when joab observ citi that he assign uriah unto place where he knew that valiant men were 11 17 men citi went fought joab there fell some peopl servant david uriah hittit die also 11 18 then joab sent told david all thing concern war 11 19 charg messeng say when thou hast made end tell matter war unto king 11 20 if so be that king s wrath aris he say unto thee wherefor approach ye so nigh unto citi when ye did fight knew ye not that they would shoot wall 11 21 who smote abimelech son jerubbesheth did not woman cast piec millston him wall that he die thebez whi went ye nigh wall then say thou thi servant uriah hittit is dead also 11 22 so messeng went came shew david all that joab had sent him 11 23 messeng said unto david sure men prevail against us came unto us field we were them even unto enter gate 11 24 shooter shot off wall thi servant some king s servant be dead thi servant uriah hittit is dead also 11 25 then david said unto messeng thu shalt thou say unto joab let not thi thing displeas thee sword devoureth one as well as anoth make thi battl more strong against citi overthrow it encourag thou him 11 26 when wife uriah heard that uriah her husband wa dead she mourn her husband 11 27 when mourn wa past david sent fetch her hi hous she becam hi wife bare him son but thing that david had done displeas lord 12 1 lord sent nathan unto david he came unto him said unto him there were two men one citi one rich other poor 12 2 rich man had exceed mani flock herd 12 3 but poor man had noth save one littl ewe lamb which he had bought nourish it grew togeth him hi children it did eat hi own meat drank hi own cup lay hi bosom wa unto him as daughter 12 4 there came travel unto rich man he spare take hi own flock hi own herd dress wayfar man that wa come unto him but took poor man s lamb dress it man that wa come him 12 5 david s anger wa greatli kindl against man he said nathan as lord liveth man that hath done thi thing shall sure die 12 6 he shall restor lamb fourfold becaus he did thi thing becaus he had no piti 12 7 nathan said david thou art man thu saith lord god israel i anoint thee king israel i deliv thee hand saul 12 8 i gave thee thi master s hous thi master s wive thi bosom gave thee hous israel judah if that had been too littl i would moreov have given unto thee such such thing 12 9 wherefor hast thou despis command lord do evil hi sight thou hast kill uriah hittit sword hast taken hi wife be thi wife hast slain him sword children ammon 12 10 now therefor sword shall never depart thine hous becaus thou hast despis me hast taken wife uriah hittit be thi wife 12 11 thu saith lord behold i will rais evil against thee thine own hous i will take thi wive thine eye give them unto thi neighbour he shall lie thi wive sight thi sun 12 12 thou didst it secretli but i will do thi thing all israel sun 12 13 david said unto nathan i have sin against lord nathan said unto david lord also hath put away thi sin thou shalt not die 12 14 howbeit becaus thi deed thou hast given great occas enemi lord blasphem child also that is born unto thee shall sure die 12 15 nathan depart unto hi hous lord struck child that uriah s wife bare unto david it wa veri sick 12 16 david therefor besought god child david fast went lay all night earth 12 17 elder hi hous aros went him rais him earth but he would not neither did he eat bread them 12 18 it came pass seventh day that child die servant david fear tell him that child wa dead they said behold while child wa yet aliv we spake unto him he would not hearken unto our voic how will he then vex himself if we tell him that child is dead 12 19 but when david saw that hi servant whisper david perceiv that child wa dead therefor david said unto hi servant is child dead they said he is dead 12 20 then david aros earth wash anoint himself chang hi apparel came hous lord worship then he came hi own hous when he requir they set bread him he did eat 12 21 then said hi servant unto him what thing is thi that thou hast done thou didst fast weep child while it wa aliv but when child wa dead thou didst rise eat bread 12 22 he said while child wa yet aliv i fast wept i said who can tell god will be graciou me that child may live 12 23 but now he is dead wherefor should i fast can i bring him back again i shall go him but he shall not return me 12 24 david comfort bathsheba hi wife went unto her lay her she bare son he call hi name solomon lord love him 12 25 he sent hand nathan prophet he call hi name jedidiah becaus lord 12 26 joab fought against rabbah children ammon took royal citi 12 27 joab sent messeng david said i have fought against rabbah have taken citi water 12 28 now therefor gather rest peopl togeth encamp against citi take it lest i take citi it be call my name 12 29 david gather all peopl togeth went rabbah fought against it took it 12 30 he took their king s crown off hi head weight whereof wa talent gold preciou stone it wa set david s head he brought forth spoil citi great abund 12 31 he brought forth peopl that were therein put them saw harrow iron axe iron made them pass brick kiln thu did he unto all citi children ammon so david all peopl return unto jerusalem 13 1 it came pass thi that absalom son david had fair sister whose name wa tamar amnon son david love her 13 2 amnon wa so vex that he fell sick hi sister tamar she wa virgin amnon thought it hard him do anyth her 13 3 but amnon had friend whose name wa jonadab son shimeah david s brother jonadab wa veri subtil man 13 4 he said unto him whi art thou be king s son lean day day wilt thou not tell me amnon said unto him i love tamar my brother absalom s sister 13 5 jonadab said unto him lay thee down thi bed make thyself sick when thi father cometh see thee say unto him i pray thee let my sister tamar come give me meat dress meat my sight that i may see it eat it her hand 13 6 so amnon lay down made himself sick when king wa come see him amnon said unto king i pray thee let tamar my sister come make me coupl cake my sight that i may eat her hand 13 7 then david sent home tamar say go now thi brother amnon s hous dress him meat 13 8 so tamar went her brother amnon s hous he wa laid down she took flour knead it made cake hi sight did bake cake 13 9 she took pan pour them him but he refus eat amnon said have all men me they went everi man him 13 10 amnon said unto tamar bring meat chamber that i may eat thine hand tamar took cake which she had made brought them chamber amnon her brother 13 11 when she had brought them unto him eat he took hold her said unto her come lie me my sister 13 12 she answer him nay my brother do not forc me no such thing ought be done israel do not thou thi folli 13 13 i whither shall i caus my shame go as thee thou shalt be as one fool israel now therefor i pray thee speak unto king he will not withhold me thee 13 14 howbeit he would not hearken unto her voic but be stronger than she forc her lay her 13 15 then amnon hate her exceedingli so that hatr wherewith he hate her wa greater than love wherewith he had love her amnon said unto her aris be gone 13 16 she said unto him there is no caus thi evil send me away is greater than other that thou didst unto me but he would not hearken unto her 13 17 then he call hi servant that minist unto him said put now thi woman me bolt door her 13 18 she had garment diver colour her such robe were king s daughter that were virgin apparel then hi servant brought her bolt door her 13 19 tamar put ash her head rent her garment diver colour that wa her laid her hand her head went cri 13 20 absalom her brother said unto her hath amnon thi brother been thee but hold now thi peac my sister he is thi brother regard not thi thing so tamar remain desol her brother absalom s hous 13 21 but when king david heard all these thing he wa veri wroth 13 22 absalom spake unto hi brother amnon neither good nor bad absalom hate amnon becaus he had forc hi sister tamar 13 23 it came pass two full year that absalom had sheepshear baalhazor which is besid ephraim absalom invit all king s son 13 24 absalom came king said behold now thi servant hath sheepshear let king i beseech thee hi servant go thi servant 13 25 king said absalom nay my son let us not all now go lest we be chargeabl unto thee he press him howbeit he would not go but bless him 13 26 then said absalom if not i pray thee let my brother amnon go us king said unto him whi should he go thee 13 27 but absalom press him that he let amnon all king s son go him 13 28 now absalom had command hi servant say mark ye now when amnon s heart is merri wine when i say unto you smite amnon then kill him fear not have not i command you be courag be valiant 13 29 servant absalom did unto amnon as absalom had command then all king s son aros everi man gat him hi mule fled 13 30 it came pass while they were way that tide came david say absalom hath slain all king s son there is not one them left 13 31 then king aros tare hi garment lay earth all hi servant stood their cloth rent 13 32 jonadab son shimeah david s brother answer said let not my lord suppos that they have slain all young men king s son amnon onli is dead appoint absalom thi hath been determin day that he forc hi sister tamar 13 33 now therefor let not my lord king take thing hi heart think that all king s son are dead amnon onli is dead 13 34 but absalom fled young man that kept watch lift hi eye look behold there came much peopl way hill side behind him 13 35 jonadab said unto king behold king s son come as thi servant said so it is 13 36 it came pass as soon as he had made end speak that behold king s son came lift their voic wept king also all hi servant wept veri sore 13 37 but absalom fled went talmai son ammihud king geshur david mourn hi son everi day 13 38 so absalom fled went geshur wa there three year 13 39 soul king david long go forth unto absalom he wa comfort concern amnon see he wa dead 14 1 now joab son zeruiah perceiv that king s heart wa absalom 14 2 joab sent tekoah fetch thenc wise woman said unto her i pray thee feign thyself be mourner put now mourn apparel anoint not thyself oil but be as woman that had long time mourn dead 14 3 come king speak thi manner unto him so joab put word her mouth 14 4 when woman tekoah spake king she fell her face ground did obeis said help o king 14 5 king said unto her what aileth thee she answer i am inde widow woman mine husband is dead 14 6 thi handmaid had two son they two strove togeth field there wa none part them but one smote other slew him 14 7 behold whole famili is risen against thine handmaid they said deliv him that smote hi brother that we may kill him life hi brother whom he slew we will destroy heir also so they shall quench my coal which is left shall not leav my husband neither name nor remaind earth 14 8 king said unto woman go thine hous i will give charg concern thee 14 9 woman tekoah said unto king my lord o king iniqu be me my father s hous king hi throne be guiltless 14 10 king said whoever saith ought unto thee bring him me he shall not touch thee ani more 14 11 then said she i pray thee let king rememb lord thi god that thou wouldest not suffer reveng blood destroy ani more lest they destroy my son he said as lord liveth there shall not one hair thi son fall earth 14 12 then woman said let thine handmaid i pray thee speak one word unto my lord king he said say 14 13 woman said wherefor then hast thou thought such thing against peopl god king doth speak thi thing as one which is faulti that king doth not fetch home again hi banish 14 14 we must need die are as water spilt ground which cannot be gather again neither doth god respect ani person yet doth he devis mean that hi banish be not expel him 14 15 now therefor that i am come speak thi thing unto my lord king it is becaus peopl have made me afraid thi handmaid said i will now speak unto king it may be that king will perform request hi handmaid 14 16 king will hear deliv hi handmaid hand man that would destroy me my son togeth inherit god 14 17 then thine handmaid said word my lord king shall now be comfort as angel god so is my lord king discern good bad therefor lord thi god will be thee 14 18 then king answer said unto woman hide not me i pray thee thing that i shall ask thee woman said let my lord king now speak 14 19 king said is not hand joab thee all thi woman answer said as thi soul liveth my lord king none can turn right hand or left ought that my lord king hath spoken thi servant joab he bade me he put all these word mouth thine handmaid 14 20 fetch thi form speech hath thi servant joab done thi thing my lord is wise accord wisdom angel god know all thing that are earth 14 21 king said unto joab behold now i have done thi thing go therefor bring young man absalom again 14 22 joab fell ground hi face bow himself thank king joab said day thi servant knoweth that i have found grace thi sight my lord o king that king hath fulfil request hi servant 14 23 so joab aros went geshur brought absalom jerusalem 14 24 king said let him turn hi own hous let him not see my face so absalom return hi own hous saw not king s face 14 25 but all israel there wa none be so much prais as absalom hi beauti sole hi foot even crown hi head there wa no blemish him 14 26 when he poll hi head it wa everi year s end that he poll it becaus hair wa heavi him therefor he poll it he weigh hair hi head two hundr shekel king s weight 14 27 unto absalom there were born three son one daughter whose name wa tamar she wa woman fair counten 14 28 so absalom dwelt two full year jerusalem saw not king s face 14 29 therefor absalom sent joab have sent him king but he would not come him when he sent again second time he would not come 14 30 therefor he said unto hi servant see joab s field is near mine he hath barley there go set it fire absalom s servant set field fire 14 31 then joab aros came absalom unto hi hous said unto him wherefor have thi servant set my field fire 14 32 absalom answer joab behold i sent unto thee say come hither that i may send thee king say wherefor am i come geshur it had been good me have been there still now therefor let me see king s face if there be ani iniqu me let him kill me 14 33 so joab came king told him when he had call absalom he came king bow himself hi face ground king king kiss absalom 15 1 it came pass thi that absalom prepar him chariot hors fifti men run him 15 2 absalom rose earli stood besid way gate it wa so that when ani man that had controversi came king judgment then absalom call unto him said what citi art thou he said thi servant is one tribe israel 15 3 absalom said unto him see thi matter are good right but there is no man deput king hear thee 15 4 absalom said moreov oh that i were made judg land that everi man which hath ani suit or caus might come unto me i would do him justic 15 5 it wa so that when ani man came nigh him do him obeis he put forth hi hand took him kiss him 15 6 thi manner did absalom all israel that came king judgment so absalom stole heart men israel 15 7 it came pass forti year that absalom said unto king i pray thee let me go pay my vow which i have vow unto lord hebron 15 8 thi servant vow vow while i abod geshur syria say if lord shall bring me again inde jerusalem then i will serv lord 15 9 king said unto him go peac so he aros went hebron 15 10 but absalom sent spi all tribe israel say as soon as ye hear sound trumpet then ye shall say absalom reigneth hebron 15 11 absalom went two hundr men jerusalem that were call they went their simplic they knew not ani thing 15 12 absalom sent ahithophel gilonit david s counsellor hi citi even giloh while he offer sacrific conspiraci wa strong peopl increas continu absalom 15 13 there came messeng david say heart men israel are absalom 15 14 david said unto all hi servant that were him jerusalem aris let us flee we shall not els escap absalom make speed depart lest he overtak us suddenli bring evil us smite citi edg sword 15 15 king s servant said unto king behold thi servant are readi do whatsoev my lord king shall appoint 15 16 king went forth all hi household him king left ten women which were concubin keep hous 15 17 king went forth all peopl him tarri place that wa far off 15 18 all hi servant pass besid him all cherethit all pelethit all gittit six hundr men which came him gath pass king 15 19 then said king ittai gittit wherefor goest thou also us return thi place abid king thou art stranger also exil 15 20 wherea thou camest but yesterday should i thi day make thee go down us see i go whither i may return thou take back thi brethren merci truth be thee 15 21 ittai answer king said as lord liveth as my lord king liveth sure what place my lord king shall be death or life even there also will thi servant be 15 22 david said ittai go pass ittai gittit pass all hi men all littl one that were him 15 23 all countri wept loud voic all peopl pass king also himself pass brook kidron all peopl pass way wilder 15 24 lo zadok also all levit were him bear ark coven god they set down ark god abiathar went all peopl had done pass citi 15 25 king said unto zadok carri back ark god citi if i shall find favour eye lord he will bring me again shew me both it hi habit 15 26 but if he thu say i have no delight thee behold here am i let him do me as seemeth good unto him 15 27 king said also unto zadok priest art not thou seer return citi peac your two son you ahimaaz thi son jonathan son abiathar 15 28 see i will tarri plain wilder there come word you certifi me 15 29 zadok therefor abiathar carri ark god again jerusalem they tarri there 15 30 david went ascent mount olivet wept as he went had hi head cover he went barefoot all peopl that wa him cover everi man hi head they went weep as they went 15 31 one told david say ahithophel is conspir absalom david said o lord i pray thee turn counsel ahithophel foolish 15 32 it came pass that when david wa come top mount where he worship god behold hushai archit came meet him hi coat rent earth hi head 15 33 unto whom david said if thou passest me then thou shalt be burden unto me 15 34 but if thou return citi say unto absalom i will be thi servant o king as i have been thi father s servant hitherto so will i now also be thi servant then mayest thou me defeat counsel ahithophel 15 35 hast thou not there thee zadok abiathar priest therefor it shall be that what thing soever thou shalt hear king s hous thou shalt tell it zadok abiathar priest 15 36 behold they have there them their two son ahimaaz zadok s son jonathan abiathar s son them ye shall send unto me everi thing that ye can hear 15 37 so hushai david s friend came citi absalom came jerusalem 16 1 when david wa littl past top hill behold ziba servant mephibosheth met him coupl ass saddl them two hundr loav bread hundr bunch raisin hundr summer fruit bottl wine 16 2 king said unto ziba what meanest thou these ziba said ass be king s household ride bread summer fruit young men eat wine that such as be faint wilder may drink 16 3 king said where is thi master s son ziba said unto king behold he abideth jerusalem he said day shall hous israel restor me kingdom my father 16 4 then said king ziba behold thine are all that pertain unto mephibosheth ziba said i humbl beseech thee that i may find grace thi sight my lord o king 16 5 when king david came bahurim behold thenc came man famili hous saul whose name wa shimei son gera he came forth curs still as he came 16 6 he cast stone david all servant king david all peopl all mighti men were hi right hand hi left 16 7 thu said shimei when he curs come come thou bloodi man thou man belial 16 8 lord hath return thee all blood hous saul whose stead thou hast reign lord hath deliv kingdom hand absalom thi son behold thou art taken thi mischief becaus thou art bloodi man 16 9 then said abishai son zeruiah unto king whi should thi dead dog curs my lord king let me go i pray thee take off hi head 16 10 king said what have i do you ye son zeruiah so let him curs becaus lord hath said unto him curs david who shall then say wherefor hast thou done so 16 11 david said abishai all hi servant behold my son which came forth my bowel seeketh my life how much more now may thi benjamit do it let him alon let him curs lord hath bidden him 16 12 it may be that lord will look mine afflict that lord will requit me good hi curs thi day 16 13 as david hi men went way shimei went hill s side against him curs as he went threw stone him cast dust 16 14 king all peopl that were him came weari refresh themselv there 16 15 absalom all peopl men israel came jerusalem ahithophel him 16 16 it came pass when hushai archit david s friend wa come unto absalom that hushai said unto absalom god save king god save king 16 17 absalom said hushai is thi thi kind thi friend whi wentest thou not thi friend 16 18 hushai said unto absalom nay but whom lord thi peopl all men israel choos hi will i be him will i abid 16 19 again whom should i serv should i not serv presenc hi son as i have serv thi father s presenc so will i be thi presenc 16 20 then said absalom ahithophel give counsel you what we shall do 16 21 ahithophel said unto absalom go unto thi father s concubin which he hath left keep hous all israel shall hear that thou art abhor thi father then shall hand all that are thee be strong 16 22 so they spread absalom tent top hous absalom went unto hi father s concubin sight all israel 16 23 counsel ahithophel which he counsel those day wa as if man had enquir oracl god so wa all counsel ahithophel both david absalom 17 1 moreov ahithophel said unto absalom let me now choos twelv thousand men i will aris pursu david thi night 17 2 i will come him while he is weari weak hand will make him afraid all peopl that are him shall flee i will smite king onli 17 3 i will bring back all peopl unto thee man whom thou seekest is as if all return so all peopl shall be peac 17 4 say pleas absalom well all elder israel 17 5 then said absalom call now hushai archit also let us hear likewis what he saith 17 6 when hushai wa come absalom absalom spake unto him say ahithophel hath spoken thi manner shall we do hi say if not speak thou 17 7 hushai said unto absalom counsel that ahithophel hath given is not good thi time 17 8 said hushai thou knowest thi father hi men that they be mighti men they be chafe their mind as bear rob her whelp field thi father is man war will not lodg peopl 17 9 behold he is hid now some pit or some other place it will come pass when some them be overthrown first that whosoev heareth it will say there is slaughter peopl that follow absalom 17 10 he also that is valiant whose heart is as heart lion shall utterli melt all israel knoweth that thi father is mighti man they which be him are valiant men 17 11 therefor i counsel that all israel be gener gather unto thee dan even beersheba as sand that is sea multitud that thou go battl thine own person 17 12 so shall we come him some place where he shall be found we will light him as dew falleth ground him all men that are him there shall not be left so much as one 17 13 moreov if he be gotten citi then shall all israel bring rope that citi we will draw it river there be not one small stone found there 17 14 absalom all men israel said counsel hushai archit is better than counsel ahithophel lord had appoint defeat good counsel ahithophel intent that lord might bring evil absalom 17 15 then said hushai unto zadok abiathar priest thu thu did ahithophel counsel absalom elder israel thu thu have i counsel 17 16 now therefor send quickli tell david say lodg not thi night plain wilder but speedili pass lest king be swallow all peopl that are him 17 17 now jonathan ahimaaz stay enrogel they might not be seen come citi wench went told them they went told king david 17 18 nevertheless lad saw them told absalom but they went both them away quickli came man s hous bahurim which had well hi court whither they went down 17 19 woman took spread cover well s mouth spread ground corn thereon thing wa not known 17 20 when absalom s servant came woman hous they said where is ahimaaz jonathan woman said unto them they be gone brook water when they had sought could not find them they return jerusalem 17 21 it came pass they were depart that they came well went told king david said unto david aris pass quickli water thu hath ahithophel counsel against you 17 22 then david aros all peopl that were him they pass jordan morn light there lack not one them that wa not gone jordan 17 23 when ahithophel saw that hi counsel wa not follow he saddl hi ass aros gat him home hi hous hi citi put hi household order hang himself die wa buri sepulchr hi father 17 24 then david came mahanaim absalom pass jordan he all men israel him 17 25 absalom made amasa captain host instead joab which amasa wa man s son whose name wa ithra israelit that went abigail daughter nahash sister zeruiah joab s mother 17 26 so israel absalom pitch land gilead 17 27 it came pass when david wa come mahanaim that shobi son nahash rabbah children ammon machir son ammiel lodebar barzillai gileadit rogelim 17 28 brought bed bason earthen vessel wheat barley flour parch corn bean lentil parch puls 17 29 honey butter sheep chees kine david peopl that were him eat they said peopl is hungri weari thirsti wilder 18 1 david number peopl that were him set captain thousand captain hundr them 18 2 david sent forth third part peopl hand joab third part hand abishai son zeruiah joab s brother third part hand ittai gittit king said unto peopl i will sure go forth you myself also 18 3 but peopl answer thou shalt not go forth if we flee away they will not care us neither if half us die will they care us but now thou art worth ten thousand us therefor now it is better that thou succour us citi 18 4 king said unto them what seemeth you best i will do king stood gate side all peopl came hundr thousand 18 5 king command joab abishai ittai say deal gentli my sake young man even absalom all peopl heard when king gave all captain charg concern absalom 18 6 so peopl went field against israel battl wa wood ephraim 18 7 where peopl israel were slain servant david there wa there great slaughter that day twenti thousand men 18 8 battl wa there scatter face all countri wood devour more peopl that day than sword devour 18 9 absalom met servant david absalom rode mule mule went thick bough great oak hi head caught hold oak he wa taken heaven earth mule that wa him went away 18 10 certain man saw it told joab said behold i saw absalom hang oak 18 11 joab said unto man that told him behold thou sawest him whi didst thou not smite him there ground i would have given thee ten shekel silver girdl 18 12 man said unto joab though i should receiv thousand shekel silver mine hand yet would i not put forth mine hand against king s son our hear king charg thee abishai ittai say bewar that none touch young man absalom 18 13 otherwis i should have wrought falsehood against mine own life there is no matter hid king thou thyself wouldest have set thyself against me 18 14 then said joab i may not tarri thu thee he took three dart hi hand thrust them heart absalom while he wa yet aliv midst oak 18 15 ten young men that bare joab s armour compass smote absalom slew him 18 16 joab blew trumpet peopl return pursu israel joab held back peopl 18 17 they took absalom cast him great pit wood laid veri great heap stone him all israel fled everi one hi tent 18 18 now absalom hi lifetim had taken rear himself pillar which is king s dale he said i have no son keep my name remembr he call pillar hi own name it is call unto thi day absalom s place 18 19 then said ahimaaz son zadok let me now run bear king tide how that lord hath aveng him hi enemi 18 20 joab said unto him thou shalt not bear tide thi day but thou shalt bear tide anoth day but thi day thou shalt bear no tide becaus king s son is dead 18 21 then said joab cushi go tell king what thou hast seen cushi bow himself unto joab ran 18 22 then said ahimaaz son zadok yet again joab but howsoev let me i pray thee also run cushi joab said wherefor wilt thou run my son see that thou hast no tide readi 18 23 but howsoev said he let me run he said unto him run then ahimaaz ran way plain overran cushi 18 24 david sat two gate watchman went roof gate unto wall lift hi eye look behold man run alon 18 25 watchman cri told king king said if he be alon there is tide hi mouth he came apac drew near 18 26 watchman saw anoth man run watchman call unto porter said behold anoth man run alon king said he also bringeth tide 18 27 watchman said me thinketh run foremost is like run ahimaaz son zadok king said he is good man cometh good tide 18 28 ahimaaz call said unto king all is well he fell down earth hi face king said bless be lord thi god which hath deliv men that lift their hand against my lord king 18 29 king said is young man absalom safe ahimaaz answer when joab sent king s servant me thi servant i saw great tumult but i knew not what it wa 18 30 king said unto him turn asid stand here he turn asid stood still 18 31 behold cushi came cushi said tide my lord king lord hath aveng thee thi day all them that rose against thee 18 32 king said unto cushi is young man absalom safe cushi answer enemi my lord king all that rise against thee do thee hurt be as that young man is 18 33 king wa much move went chamber gate wept as he went thu he said o my son absalom my son my son absalom would god i had die thee o absalom my son my son 19 1 it wa told joab behold king weepeth mourneth absalom 19 2 victori that day wa turn mourn unto all peopl peopl heard say that day how king wa griev hi son 19 3 peopl gat them stealth that day citi as peopl be asham steal away when they flee battl 19 4 but king cover hi face king cri loud voic o my son absalom o absalom my son my son 19 5 joab came hous king said thou hast shame thi day face all thi servant which thi day have save thi life live thi son thi daughter live thi wive live thi concubin 19 6 that thou lovest thine enemi hatest thi friend thou hast declar thi day that thou regardest neither princ nor servant thi day i perceiv that if absalom had live all we had die thi day then it had pleas thee well 19 7 now therefor aris go forth speak comfort unto thi servant i swear lord if thou go not forth there will not tarri one thee thi night that will be wors unto thee than all evil that befel thee thi youth now 19 8 then king aros sat gate they told unto all peopl say behold king doth sit gate all peopl came king israel had fled everi man hi tent 19 9 all peopl were strife all tribe israel say king save us hand our enemi he deliv us hand philistin now he is fled land absalom 19 10 absalom whom we anoint us is dead battl now therefor whi speak ye not word bring king back 19 11 king david sent zadok abiathar priest say speak unto elder judah say whi are ye last bring king back hi hous see speech all israel is come king even hi hous 19 12 ye are my brethren ye are my bone my flesh wherefor then are ye last bring back king 19 13 say ye amasa art thou not my bone my flesh god do so me more also if thou be not captain host me continu room joab 19 14 he bow heart all men judah even as heart one man so that they sent thi word unto king return thou all thi servant 19 15 so king return came jordan judah came gilgal go meet king conduct king jordan 19 16 shimei son gera benjamit which wa bahurim hast came down men judah meet king david 19 17 there were thousand men benjamin him ziba servant hous saul hi fifteen son hi twenti servant him they went jordan king 19 18 there went ferri boat carri king s household do what he thought good shimei son gera fell down king as he wa come jordan 19 19 said unto king let not my lord imput iniqu unto me neither do thou rememb that which thi servant did pervers day that my lord king went jerusalem that king should take it hi heart 19 20 thi servant doth know that i have sin therefor behold i am come first thi day all hous joseph go down meet my lord king 19 21 but abishai son zeruiah answer said shall not shimei be put death thi becaus he curs lord s anoint 19 22 david said what have i do you ye son zeruiah that ye should thi day be adversari unto me shall there ani man be put death thi day israel do not i know that i am thi day king israel 19 23 therefor king said unto shimei thou shalt not die king sware unto him 19 24 mephibosheth son saul came down meet king had neither dress hi feet nor trim hi beard nor wash hi cloth day king depart day he came again peac 19 25 it came pass when he wa come jerusalem meet king that king said unto him wherefor wentest not thou me mephibosheth 19 26 he answer my lord o king my servant deceiv me thi servant said i will saddl me ass that i may ride thereon go king becaus thi servant is lame 19 27 he hath slander thi servant unto my lord king but my lord king is as angel god do therefor what is good thine eye 19 28 all my father s hous were but dead men my lord king yet didst thou set thi servant them that did eat thine own tabl what right therefor have i yet cri ani more unto king 19 29 king said unto him whi speakest thou ani more thi matter i have said thou ziba divid land 19 30 mephibosheth said unto king yea let him take all forasmuch as my lord king is come again peac unto hi own hous 19 31 barzillai gileadit came down rogelim went jordan king conduct him jordan 19 32 now barzillai wa veri age man even fourscor year old he had provid king susten while he lay mahanaim he wa veri great man 19 33 king said unto barzillai come thou me i will feed thee me jerusalem 19 34 barzillai said unto king how long have i live that i should go king unto jerusalem 19 35 i am thi day fourscor year old can i discern good evil can thi servant tast what i eat or what i drink can i hear ani more voic sing men sing women wherefor then should thi servant be yet burden unto my lord king 19 36 thi servant will go littl way jordan king whi should king recompens it me such reward 19 37 let thi servant i pray thee turn back again that i may die mine own citi be buri grave my father my mother but behold thi servant chimham let him go my lord king do him what shall seem good unto thee 19 38 king answer chimham shall go me i will do him that which shall seem good unto thee whatsoev thou shalt requir me that will i do thee 19 39 all peopl went jordan when king wa come king kiss barzillai bless him he return unto hi own place 19 40 then king went gilgal chimham went him all peopl judah conduct king also half peopl israel 19 41 behold all men israel came king said unto king whi have our brethren men judah stolen thee away have brought king hi household all david s men him jordan 19 42 all men judah answer men israel becaus king is near kin us wherefor then be ye angri thi matter have we eaten all king s cost or hath he given us ani gift 19 43 men israel answer men judah said we have ten part king we have also more right david than ye whi then did ye despis us that our advic should not be first had bring back our king word men judah were fiercer than word men israel 20 1 there happen be there man belial whose name wa sheba son bichri benjamit he blew trumpet said we have no part david neither have we inherit son jess everi man hi tent o israel 20 2 so everi man israel went david follow sheba son bichri but men judah clave unto their king jordan even jerusalem 20 3 david came hi hous jerusalem king took ten women hi concubin whom he had left keep hous put them ward fed them but went not unto them so they were shut unto day their death live widowhood 20 4 then said king amasa assembl me men judah three day be thou here present 20 5 so amasa went assembl men judah but he tarri longer than set time which he had appoint him 20 6 david said abishai now shall sheba son bichri do us more harm than did absalom take thou thi lord s servant pursu him lest he get him fenc citi escap us 20 7 there went him joab s men cherethit pelethit all mighti men they went jerusalem pursu sheba son bichri 20 8 when they were great stone which is gibeon amasa went them joab s garment that he had put wa gird unto him it girdl sword fasten hi loin sheath thereof as he went forth it fell 20 9 joab said amasa art thou health my brother joab took amasa beard right hand kiss him 20 10 but amasa took no heed sword that wa joab s hand so he smote him therewith fifth rib shed hi bowel ground struck him not again he die so joab abishai hi brother pursu sheba son bichri 20 11 one joab s men stood him said he that favoureth joab he that is david let him go joab 20 12 amasa wallow blood midst highway when man saw that all peopl stood still he remov amasa highway field cast cloth him when he saw that everi one that came him stood still 20 13 when he wa remov highway all peopl went joab pursu sheba son bichri 20 14 he went all tribe israel unto abel bethmaachah all berit they were gather togeth went also him 20 15 they came besieg him abel bethmaachah they cast bank against citi it stood trench all peopl that were joab batter wall throw it down 20 16 then cri wise woman citi hear hear say i pray you unto joab come near hither that i may speak thee 20 17 when he wa come near unto her woman said art thou joab he answer i am he then she said unto him hear word thine handmaid he answer i do hear 20 18 then she spake say they were wont speak old time say they shall sure ask counsel abel so they end matter 20 19 i am one them that are peaceabl faith israel thou seekest destroy citi mother israel whi wilt thou swallow inherit lord 20 20 joab answer said far be it far be it me that i should swallow or destroy 20 21 matter is not so but man mount ephraim sheba son bichri name hath lift hi hand against king even against david deliv him onli i will depart citi woman said unto joab behold hi head shall be thrown thee wall 20 22 then woman went unto all peopl her wisdom they cut off head sheba son bichri cast it joab he blew trumpet they retir citi everi man hi tent joab return jerusalem unto king 20 23 now joab wa all host israel benaiah son jehoiada wa cherethit pelethit 20 24 adoram wa tribut jehoshaphat son ahilud wa record 20 25 sheva wa scribe zadok abiathar were priest 20 26 ira also jairit wa chief ruler david 21 1 then there wa famin day david three year year year david enquir lord lord answer it is saul hi bloodi hous becaus he slew gibeonit 21 2 king call gibeonit said unto them now gibeonit were not children israel but remnant amorit children israel had sworn unto them saul sought slay them hi zeal children israel judah 21 3 wherefor david said unto gibeonit what shall i do you wherewith shall i make aton that ye may bless inherit lord 21 4 gibeonit said unto him we will have no silver nor gold saul nor hi hous neither us shalt thou kill ani man israel he said what ye shall say that will i do you 21 5 they answer king man that consum us that devis against us that we should be destroy remain ani coast israel 21 6 let seven men hi son be deliv unto us we will hang them unto lord gibeah saul whom lord did choos king said i will give them 21 7 but king spare mephibosheth son jonathan son saul becaus lord s oath that wa them david jonathan son saul 21 8 but king took two son rizpah daughter aiah whom she bare unto saul armoni mephibosheth five son michal daughter saul whom she brought adriel son barzillai meholathit 21 9 he deliv them hand gibeonit they hang them hill lord they fell all seven togeth were put death day harvest first day begin barley harvest 21 10 rizpah daughter aiah took sackcloth spread it her rock begin harvest water drop them heaven suffer neither bird air rest them day nor beast field night 21 11 it wa told david what rizpah daughter aiah concubin saul had done 21 12 david went took bone saul bone jonathan hi son men jabeshgilead which had stolen them street bethshan where philistin had hang them when philistin had slain saul gilboa 21 13 he brought thenc bone saul bone jonathan hi son they gather bone them that were hang 21 14 bone saul jonathan hi son buri they countri benjamin zelah sepulchr kish hi father they perform all that king command that god wa intreat land 21 15 moreov philistin had yet war again israel david went down hi servant him fought against philistin david wax faint 21 16 ishbibenob which wa son giant weight whose spear weigh three hundr shekel brass weight he be gird new sword thought have slain david 21 17 but abishai son zeruiah succour him smote philistin kill him then men david sware unto him say thou shalt go no more us battl that thou quench not light israel 21 18 it came pass thi that there wa again battl philistin gob then sibbechai hushathit slew saph which wa son giant 21 19 there wa again battl gob philistin where elhanan son jaareoregim bethlehemit slew brother goliath gittit staff whose spear wa like weaver s beam 21 20 there wa yet battl gath where wa man great statur that had everi hand six finger everi foot six toe four twenti number he also wa born giant 21 21 when he defi israel jonathan son shimeah brother david slew him 21 22 these four were born giant gath fell hand david hand hi servant 22 1 david spake unto lord word thi song day that lord had deliv him hand all hi enemi hand saul 22 2 he said lord is my rock my fortress my deliver 22 3 god my rock him will i trust he is my shield horn my salvat my high tower my refug my saviour thou savest me violenc 22 4 i will call lord who is worthi be prais so shall i be save mine enemi 22 5 when wave death compass me flood ungodli men made me afraid 22 6 sorrow hell compass me snare death prevent me 22 7 my distress i call lord cri my god he did hear my voic hi templ my cri did enter hi ear 22 8 then earth shook trembl foundat heaven move shook becaus he wa wroth 22 9 there went smoke hi nostril fire hi mouth devour coal were kindl it 22 10 he bow heaven also came down dark wa hi feet 22 11 he rode cherub did fli he wa seen wing wind 22 12 he made dark pavilion round him dark water thick cloud sky 22 13 bright him were coal fire kindl 22 14 lord thunder heaven most high utter hi voic 22 15 he sent arrow scatter them lightn discomfit them 22 16 channel sea appear foundat world were discov rebuk lord blast breath hi nostril 22 17 he sent he took me he drew me mani water 22 18 he deliv me my strong enemi them that hate me they were too strong me 22 19 they prevent me day my calam but lord wa my stay 22 20 he brought me forth also larg place he deliv me becaus he delight me 22 21 lord reward me accord my righteous accord clean my hand hath he recompens me 22 22 i have kept way lord have not wickedli depart my god 22 23 all hi judgment were me as hi statut i did not depart them 22 24 i wa also upright him have kept myself mine iniqu 22 25 therefor lord hath recompens me accord my righteous accord my clean hi eye sight 22 26 merci thou wilt shew thyself merci upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright 22 27 pure thou wilt shew thyself pure froward thou wilt shew thyself unsavouri 22 28 afflict peopl thou wilt save but thine eye are haughti that thou mayest bring them down 22 29 thou art my lamp o lord lord will lighten my dark 22 30 thee i have run troop my god have i leap wall 22 31 as god hi way is perfect word lord is tri he is buckler all them that trust him 22 32 who is god save lord who is rock save our god 22 33 god is my strength power he maketh my way perfect 22 34 he maketh my feet like hind feet setteth me my high place 22 35 he teacheth my hand war so that bow steel is broken mine arm 22 36 thou hast also given me shield thi salvat thi gentl hath made me great 22 37 thou hast enlarg my step me so that my feet did not slip 22 38 i have pursu mine enemi destroy them turn not again i had consum them 22 39 i have consum them wound them that they could not aris yea they are fallen my feet 22 40 thou hast gird me strength battl them that rose against me hast thou subdu me 22 41 thou hast also given me neck mine enemi that i might destroy them that hate me 22 42 they look but there wa none save even unto lord but he answer them not 22 43 then did i beat them as small as dust earth i did stamp them as mire street did spread them abroad 22 44 thou also hast deliv me strive my peopl thou hast kept me be head heathen peopl which i knew not shall serv me 22 45 stranger shall submit themselv unto me as soon as they hear they shall be obedi unto me 22 46 stranger shall fade away they shall be afraid their close place 22 47 lord liveth bless be my rock exalt be god rock my salvat 22 48 it is god that avengeth me that bringeth down peopl me 22 49 that bringeth me forth mine enemi thou also hast lift me high them that rose against me thou hast deliv me violent man 22 50 therefor i will give thank unto thee o lord heathen i will sing prais unto thi name 22 51 he is tower salvat hi king sheweth merci hi anoint unto david hi seed evermor 23 1 now these be last word david david son jess said man who wa rais high anoint god jacob sweet psalmist israel said 23 2 spirit lord spake me hi word wa my tongu 23 3 god israel said rock israel spake me he that ruleth men must be just rule fear god 23 4 he shall be as light morn when sun riseth even morn cloud as tender grass spring earth clear shine rain 23 5 although my hous be not so god yet he hath made me everlast coven order all thing sure thi is all my salvat all my desir although he make it not grow 23 6 but son belial shall be all them as thorn thrust away becaus they cannot be taken hand 23 7 but man that shall touch them must be fenc iron staff spear they shall be utterli burn fire same place 23 8 these be name mighti men whom david had tachmonit that sat seat chief captain same wa adino eznit he lift hi spear against eight hundr whom he slew one time 23 9 him wa eleazar son dodo ahohit one three mighti men david when they defi philistin that were there gather togeth battl men israel were gone away 23 10 he aros smote philistin hi hand wa weari hi hand clave unto sword lord wrought great victori that day peopl return him onli spoil 23 11 him wa shammah son age hararit philistin were gather togeth troop where wa piec ground full lentil peopl fled philistin 23 12 but he stood midst ground defend it slew philistin lord wrought great victori 23 13 three thirti chief went down came david harvest time unto cave adullam troop philistin pitch valley rephaim 23 14 david wa then hold garrison philistin wa then bethlehem 23 15 david long said oh that one would give me drink water well bethlehem which is gate 23 16 three mighti men brake host philistin drew water well bethlehem that wa gate took it brought it david nevertheless he would not drink thereof but pour it unto lord 23 17 he said be it far me o lord that i should do thi is not thi blood men that went jeopardi their live therefor he would not drink it these thing did these three mighti men 23 18 abishai brother joab son zeruiah wa chief three he lift hi spear against three hundr slew them had name three 23 19 wa he not most honour three therefor he wa their captain howbeit he attain not unto first three 23 20 benaiah son jehoiada son valiant man kabzeel who had done mani act he slew two lionlik men moab he went down also slew lion midst pit time snow 23 21 he slew egyptian goodli man egyptian had spear hi hand but he went down him staff pluck spear egyptian s hand slew him hi own spear 23 22 these thing did benaiah son jehoiada had name three mighti men 23 23 he wa more honour than thirti but he attain not first three david set him hi guard 23 24 asahel brother joab wa one thirti elhanan son dodo
