israel judah 24 2 king said joab captain host which wa him go now all tribe israel dan even beersheba number ye peopl that i may know number peopl 24 3 joab said unto king now lord thi god add unto peopl how mani soever they be hundredfold that eye my lord king may see it but whi doth my lord king delight thi thing 24 4 notwithstand king s word prevail against joab against captain host joab captain host went presenc king number peopl israel 24 5 they pass jordan pitch aroer right side citi that lieth midst river gad jazer 24 6 then they came gilead land tahtimhodshi they came danjaan zidon 24 7 came strong hold tyre all citi hivit canaanit they went south judah even beersheba 24 8 so when they had gone all land they came jerusalem end nine month twenti day 24 9 joab gave sum number peopl unto king there were israel eight hundr thousand valiant men that drew sword men judah were five hundr thousand men 24 10 david s heart smote him that he had number peopl david said unto lord i have sin greatli that i have done now i beseech thee o lord take away iniqu thi servant i have done veri foolishli 24 11 when david wa morn word lord came unto prophet gad david s seer say 24 12 go say unto david thu saith lord i offer thee three thing choos thee one them that i may do it unto thee 24 13 so gad came david told him said unto him shall seven year famin come unto thee thi land or wilt thou flee three month thine enemi while they pursu thee or that there be three day pestil thi land now advis see what answer i shall return him that sent me 24 14 david said unto gad i am great strait let us fall now hand lord hi merci are great let me not fall hand man 24 15 so lord sent pestil israel morn even time appoint there die peopl dan even beersheba seventi thousand men 24 16 when angel stretch hi hand jerusalem destroy it lord repent him evil said angel that destroy peopl it is enough stay now thine hand angel lord wa threshingplac araunah jebusit 24 17 david spake unto lord when he saw angel that smote peopl said lo i have sin i have done wickedli but these sheep what have they done let thine hand i pray thee be against me against my father s hous 24 18 gad came that day david said unto him go rear altar unto lord threshingfloor araunah jebusit 24 19 david accord say gad went as lord command 24 20 araunah look saw king hi servant come him araunah went bow himself king hi face ground 24 21 araunah said wherefor is my lord king come hi servant david said buy threshingfloor thee build altar unto lord that plagu may be stay peopl 24 22 araunah said unto david let my lord king take offer what seemeth good unto him behold here be oxen burnt sacrific thresh instrument other instrument oxen wood 24 23 all these thing did araunah as king give unto king araunah said unto king lord thi god accept thee 24 24 king said unto araunah nay but i will sure buy it thee price neither will i offer burnt offer unto lord my god that which doth cost me noth so david bought threshingfloor oxen fifti shekel silver 24 25 david built there altar unto lord offer burnt offer peac offer so lord wa intreat land plagu wa stay israel first book king commonli call third book king 1 1 now king david wa old stricken year they cover him cloth but he gat no heat 1 2 wherefor hi servant said unto him let there be sought my lord king young virgin let her stand king let her cherish him let her lie thi bosom that my lord king may get heat 1 3 so they sought fair damsel all coast israel found abishag shunammit brought her king 1 4 damsel wa veri fair cherish king minist him but king knew her not 1 5 then adonijah son haggith exalt himself say i will be king he prepar him chariot horsemen fifti men run him 1 6 hi father had not displeas him ani time say whi hast thou done so he also wa veri goodli man hi mother bare him absalom 1 7 he confer joab son zeruiah abiathar priest they follow adonijah help him 1 8 but zadok priest benaiah son jehoiada nathan prophet shimei rei mighti men which belong david were not adonijah 1 9 adonijah slew sheep oxen fat cattl stone zoheleth which is enrogel call all hi brethren king s son all men judah king s servant 1 10 but nathan prophet benaiah mighti men solomon hi brother he call not 1 11 wherefor nathan spake unto bathsheba mother solomon say hast thou not heard that adonijah son haggith doth reign david our lord knoweth it not 1 12 now therefor come let me i pray thee give thee counsel that thou mayest save thine own life life thi son solomon 1 13 go get thee unto king david say unto him didst not thou my lord o king swear unto thine handmaid say assuredli solomon thi son shall reign me he shall sit my throne whi then doth adonijah reign 1 14 behold while thou yet talkest there king i also will come thee confirm thi word 1 15 bathsheba went unto king chamber king wa veri old abishag shunammit minist unto king 1 16 bathsheba bow did obeis unto king king said what wouldest thou 1 17 she said unto him my lord thou swarest lord thi god unto thine handmaid say assuredli solomon thi son shall reign me he shall sit my throne 1 18 now behold adonijah reigneth now my lord king thou knowest it not 1 19 he hath slain oxen fat cattl sheep abund hath call all son king abiathar priest joab captain host but solomon thi servant hath he not call 1 20 thou my lord o king eye all israel are thee that thou shouldest tell them who shall sit throne my lord king him 1 21 otherwis it shall come pass when my lord king shall sleep hi father that i my son solomon shall be count offend 1 22 lo while she yet talk king nathan prophet also came 1 23 they told king say behold nathan prophet when he wa come king he bow himself king hi face ground 1 24 nathan said my lord o king hast thou said adonijah shall reign me he shall sit my throne 1 25 he is gone down thi day hath slain oxen fat cattl sheep abund hath call all king s son captain host abiathar priest behold they eat drink him say god save king adonijah 1 26 but me even me thi servant zadok priest benaiah son jehoiada thi servant solomon hath he not call 1 27 is thi thing done my lord king thou hast not shew it unto thi servant who should sit throne my lord king him 1 28 then king david answer said call me bathsheba she came king s presenc stood king 1 29 king sware said as lord liveth that hath redeem my soul all distress 1 30 even as i sware unto thee lord god israel say assuredli solomon thi son shall reign me he shall sit my throne my stead even so will i certainli do thi day 1 31 then bathsheba bow her face earth did rever king said let my lord king david live ever 1 32 king david said call me zadok priest nathan prophet benaiah son jehoiada they came king 1 33 king also said unto them take you servant your lord caus solomon my son ride mine own mule bring him down gihon 1 34 let zadok priest nathan prophet anoint him there king israel blow ye trumpet say god save king solomon 1 35 then ye shall come him that he may come sit my throne he shall be king my stead i have appoint him be ruler israel judah 1 36 benaiah son jehoiada answer king said amen lord god my lord king say so too 1 37 as lord hath been my lord king even so be he solomon make hi throne greater than throne my lord king david 1 38 so zadok priest nathan prophet benaiah son jehoiada cherethit pelethit went down caus solomon ride king david s mule brought him gihon 1 39 zadok priest took horn oil tabernacl anoint solomon they blew trumpet all peopl said god save king solomon 1 40 all peopl came him peopl pipe pipe rejoic great joy so that earth rent sound them 1 41 adonijah all guest that were him heard it as they had made end eat when joab heard sound trumpet he said wherefor is thi nois citi be uproar 1 42 while he yet spake behold jonathan son abiathar priest came adonijah said unto him come thou art valiant man bringest good tide 1 43 jonathan answer said adonijah verili our lord king david hath made solomon king 1 44 king hath sent him zadok priest nathan prophet benaiah son jehoiada cherethit pelethit they have caus him ride king s mule 1 45 zadok priest nathan prophet have anoint him king gihon they are come thenc rejoic so that citi rang again thi is nois that ye have heard 1 46 also solomon sitteth throne kingdom 1 47 moreov king s servant came bless our lord king david say god make name solomon better than thi name make hi throne greater than thi throne king bow himself bed 1 48 also thu said king bless be lord god israel which hath given one sit my throne thi day mine eye even see it 1 49 all guest that were adonijah were afraid rose went everi man hi way 1 50 adonijah fear becaus solomon aros went caught hold horn altar 1 51 it wa told solomon say behold adonijah feareth king solomon lo he hath caught hold horn altar say let king solomon swear unto me today that he will not slay hi servant sword 1 52 solomon said if he will shew himself worthi man there shall not hair him fall earth but if wicked shall be found him he shall die 1 53 so king solomon sent they brought him down altar he came bow himself king solomon solomon said unto him go thine hous 2 1 now day david drew nigh that he should die he charg solomon hi son say 2 2 i go way all earth be thou strong therefor shew thyself man 2 3 keep charg lord thi god walk hi way keep hi statut hi command hi judgment hi testimoni as it is written law mose that thou mayest prosper all that thou doest whithersoev thou turnest thyself 2 4 that lord may continu hi word which he spake concern me say if thi children take heed their way walk me truth all their heart all their soul there shall not fail thee said he man throne israel 2 5 moreov thou knowest also what joab son zeruiah did me what he did two captain host israel unto abner son ner unto amasa son jether whom he slew shed blood war peac put blood war hi girdl that wa hi loin hi shoe that were hi feet 2 6 do therefor accord thi wisdom let not hi hoar head go down grave peac 2 7 but shew kind unto son barzillai gileadit let them be those that eat thi tabl so they came me when i fled becaus absalom thi brother 2 8 behold thou hast thee shimei son gera benjamit bahurim which curs me grievou curs day when i went mahanaim but he came down meet me jordan i sware him lord say i will not put thee death sword 2 9 now therefor hold him not guiltless thou art wise man knowest what thou oughtest do unto him but hi hoar head bring thou down grave blood 2 10 so david slept hi father wa buri citi david 2 11 day that david reign israel were forti year seven year reign he hebron thirti three year reign he jerusalem 2 12 then sat solomon throne david hi father hi kingdom wa establish greatli 2 13 adonijah son haggith came bathsheba mother solomon she said comest thou peaceabl he said peaceabl 2 14 he said moreov i have somewhat say unto thee she said say 2 15 he said thou knowest that kingdom wa mine that all israel set their face me that i should reign howbeit kingdom is turn is becom my brother s it wa hi lord 2 16 now i ask one petit thee deni me not she said unto him say 2 17 he said speak i pray thee unto solomon king he will not say thee nay that he give me abishag shunammit wife 2 18 bathsheba said well i will speak thee unto king 2 19 bathsheba therefor went unto king solomon speak unto him adonijah king rose meet her bow himself unto her sat down hi throne caus seat be set king s mother she sat hi right hand 2 20 then she said i desir one small petit thee i pray thee say me not nay king said unto her ask my mother i will not say thee nay 2 21 she said let abishag shunammit be given adonijah thi brother wife 2 22 king solomon answer said unto hi mother whi dost thou ask abishag shunammit adonijah ask him kingdom also he is mine elder brother even him abiathar priest joab son zeruiah 2 23 then king solomon sware lord say god do so me more also if adonijah have not spoken thi word against hi own life 2 24 now therefor as lord liveth which hath establish me set me throne david my father who hath made me hous as he promis adonijah shall be put death thi day 2 25 king solomon sent hand benaiah son jehoiada he fell him that he die 2 26 unto abiathar priest said king get thee anathoth unto thine own field thou art worthi death but i will not thi time put thee death becaus thou barest ark lord god david my father becaus thou hast been afflict all wherein my father wa afflict 2 27 so solomon thrust abiathar be priest unto lord that he might fulfil word lord which he spake concern hous eli shiloh 2 28 then tide came joab joab had turn adonijah though he turn not absalom joab fled unto tabernacl lord caught hold horn altar 2 29 it wa told king solomon that joab wa fled unto tabernacl lord behold he is altar then solomon sent benaiah son jehoiada say go fall him 2 30 benaiah came tabernacl lord said unto him thu saith king come forth he said nay but i will die here benaiah brought king word again say thu said joab thu he answer me 2 31 king said unto him do as he hath said fall him buri him that thou mayest take away innoc blood which joab shed me hous my father 2 32 lord shall return hi blood hi own head who fell two men more righteou better than he slew them sword my father david not know thereof wit abner son ner captain host israel amasa son jether captain host judah 2 33 their blood shall therefor return head joab head hi seed ever but david hi seed hi hous hi throne shall there be peac ever lord 2 34 so benaiah son jehoiada went fell him slew him he wa buri hi own hous wilder 2 35 king put benaiah son jehoiada hi room host zadok priest did king put room abiathar 2 36 king sent call shimei said unto him build thee hous jerusalem dwell there go not forth thenc ani whither 2 37 it shall be that day thou goest passest brook kidron thou shalt know certain that thou shalt sure die thi blood shall be thine own head 2 38 shimei said unto king say is good as my lord king hath said so will thi servant do shimei dwelt jerusalem mani day 2 39 it came pass end three year that two servant shimei ran away unto achish son maachah king gath they told shimei say behold thi servant be gath 2 40 shimei aros saddl hi ass went gath achish seek hi servant shimei went brought hi servant gath 2 41 it wa told solomon that shimei had gone jerusalem gath wa come again 2 42 king sent call shimei said unto him did i not make thee swear lord protest unto thee say know certain day thou goest walkest abroad ani whither that thou shalt sure die thou saidst unto me word that i have heard is good 2 43 whi then hast thou not kept oath lord command that i have charg thee 2 44 king said moreov shimei thou knowest all wicked which thine heart is privi that thou didst david my father therefor lord shall return thi wicked thine own head 2 45 king solomon shall be bless throne david shall be establish lord ever 2 46 so king command benaiah son jehoiada which went fell him that he die kingdom wa establish hand solomon 3 1 solomon made affin pharaoh king egypt took pharaoh s daughter brought her citi david he had made end build hi own hous hous lord wall jerusalem round 3 2 onli peopl sacrif high place becaus there wa no hous built unto name lord those day 3 3 solomon love lord walk statut david hi father onli he sacrif burnt incens high place 3 4 king went gibeon sacrific there that wa great high place thousand burnt offer did solomon offer that altar 3 5 gibeon lord appear solomon dream night god said ask what i shall give thee 3 6 solomon said thou hast shew unto thi servant david my father great merci accord as he walk thee truth righteous upright heart thee thou hast kept him thi great kind that thou hast given him son sit hi throne as it is thi day 3 7 now o lord my god thou hast made thi servant king instead david my father i am but littl child i know not how go or come 3 8 thi servant is midst thi peopl which thou hast chosen great peopl that cannot be number nor count multitud 3 9 give therefor thi servant understand heart judg thi peopl that i may discern good bad who is abl judg thi thi so great peopl 3 10 speech pleas lord that solomon had ask thi thing 3 11 god said unto him becaus thou hast ask thi thing hast not ask thyself long life neither hast ask rich thyself nor hast ask life thine enemi but hast ask thyself understand discern judgment 3 12 behold i have done accord thi word lo i have given thee wise understand heart so that there wa none like thee thee neither thee shall ani aris like unto thee 3 13 i have also given thee that which thou hast not ask both rich honour so that there shall not be ani king like unto thee all thi day 3 14 if thou wilt walk my way keep my statut my command as thi father david did walk then i will lengthen thi day 3 15 solomon awok behold it wa dream he came jerusalem stood ark coven lord offer burnt offer offer peac offer made feast all hi servant 3 16 then came there two women that were harlot unto king stood him 3 17 one woman said o my lord i thi woman dwell one hous i wa deliv child her hous 3 18 it came pass third day that i wa deliv that thi woman wa deliv also we were togeth there wa no stranger us hous save we two hous 3 19 thi woman s child die night becaus she overlaid it 3 20 she aros midnight took my son besid me while thine handmaid slept laid it her bosom laid her dead child my bosom 3 21 when i rose morn give my child suck behold it wa dead but when i had consid it morn behold it wa not my son which i did bear 3 22 other woman said nay but live is my son dead is thi son thi said no but dead is thi son live is my son thu they spake king 3 23 then said king one saith thi is my son that liveth thi son is dead other saith nay but thi son is dead my son is live 3 24 king said bring me sword they brought sword king 3 25 king said divid live child two give half one half other 3 26 then spake woman whose live child wa unto king her bowel yearn her son she said o my lord give her live child no wise slay it but other said let it be neither mine nor thine but divid it 3 27 then king answer said give her live child no wise slay it she is mother thereof 3 28 all israel heard judgment which king had judg they fear king they saw that wisdom god wa him do judgment 4 1 so king solomon wa king all israel 4 2 these were princ which he had azariah son zadok priest 4 3 elihoreph ahiah son shisha scribe jehoshaphat son ahilud record 4 4 benaiah son jehoiada wa host zadok abiathar were priest 4 5 azariah son nathan wa offic zabud son nathan wa princip offic king s friend 4 6 ahishar wa household adoniram son abda wa tribut 4 7 solomon had twelv offic all israel which provid victual king hi household each man hi month year made provis 4 8 these are their name son hur mount ephraim 4 9 son dekar makaz shaalbim bethshemesh elonbethhanan 4 10 son hese aruboth him pertain sochoh all land hepher 4 11 son abinadab all region dor which had taphath daughter solomon wife 4 12 baana son ahilud him pertain taanach megiddo all bethshean which is zartanah beneath jezreel bethshean abelmeholah even unto place that is jokneam 4 13 son geber ramothgilead him pertain town jair son manasseh which are gilead him also pertain region argob which is bashan threescor great citi wall brasen bar 4 14 ahinadab son iddo had mahanaim 4 15 ahimaaz wa naphtali he also took basmath daughter solomon wife 4 16 baanah son hushai wa asher aloth 4 17 jehoshaphat son paruah issachar 4 18 shimei son elah benjamin 4 19 geber son uri wa countri gilead countri sihon king amorit og king bashan he wa onli offic which wa land 4 20 judah israel were mani as sand which is sea multitud eat drink make merri 4 21 solomon reign all kingdom river unto land philistin unto border egypt they brought present serv solomon all day hi life 4 22 solomon s provis one day wa thirti measur fine flour threescor measur meal 4 23 ten fat oxen twenti oxen pastur hundr sheep besid hart roebuck fallowd fat fowl 4 24 he had dominion all region thi side river tiphsah even azzah all king thi side river he had peac all side round him 4 25 judah israel dwelt safe everi man hi vine hi fig tree dan even beersheba all day solomon 4 26 solomon had forti thousand stall hors hi chariot twelv thousand horsemen 4 27 those offic provid victual king solomon all that came unto king solomon s tabl everi man hi month they lack noth 4 28 barley also straw hors dromedari brought they unto place where offic were everi man accord hi charg 4 29 god gave solomon wisdom understand exceed much larg heart even as sand that is sea shore 4 30 solomon s wisdom excel wisdom all children east countri all wisdom egypt 4 31 he wa wiser than all men than ethan ezrahit heman chalcol darda son mahol hi fame wa all nation round 4 32 he spake three thousand proverb hi song were thousand five 4 33 he spake tree cedar tree that is lebanon even unto hyssop that springeth wall he spake also beast fowl creep thing fish 4 34 there came all peopl hear wisdom solomon all king earth which had heard hi wisdom 5 1 hiram king tyre sent hi servant unto solomon he had heard that they had anoint him king room hi father hiram wa ever lover david 5 2 solomon sent hiram say 5 3 thou knowest how that david my father could not build hous unto name lord hi god war which were him everi side lord put them sole hi feet 5 4 but now lord my god hath given me rest everi side so that there is neither adversari nor evil occurr 5 5 behold i purpos build hous unto name lord my god as lord spake unto david my father say thi son whom i will set thi throne thi room he shall build hous unto my name 5 6 now therefor command thou that they hew me cedar tree lebanon my servant shall be thi servant unto thee will i give hire thi servant accord all that thou shalt appoint thou knowest that there is not us ani that can skill hew timber like unto sidonian 5 7 it came pass when hiram heard word solomon that he rejoic greatli said bless be lord thi day which hath given unto david wise son thi great peopl 5 8 hiram sent solomon say i have consid thing which thou sentest me i will do all thi desir concern timber cedar concern timber fir 5 9 my servant shall bring them down lebanon unto sea i will convey them sea float unto place that thou shalt appoint me will caus them be discharg there thou shalt receiv them thou shalt accomplish my desir give food my household 5 10 so hiram gave solomon cedar tree fir tree accord all hi desir 5 11 solomon gave hiram twenti thousand measur wheat food hi household twenti measur pure oil thu gave solomon hiram year year 5 12 lord gave solomon wisdom as he promis him there wa peac hiram solomon they two made leagu togeth 5 13 king solomon rais levi all israel levi wa thirti thousand men 5 14 he sent them lebanon ten thousand month cours month they were lebanon two month home adoniram wa levi 5 15 solomon had threescor ten thousand that bare burden fourscor thousand hewer mountain 5 16 besid chief solomon s offic which were work three thousand three hundr which rule peopl that wrought work 5 17 king command they brought great stone costli stone hew stone lay foundat hous 5 18 solomon s builder hiram s builder did hew them stonesquar so they prepar timber stone build hous 6 1 it came pass four hundr eightieth year children israel were come land egypt fourth year solomon s reign israel month zif which is second month that he began build hous lord 6 2 hous which king solomon built lord length thereof wa threescor cubit breadth thereof twenti cubit height thereof thirti cubit 6 3 porch templ hous twenti cubit wa length thereof accord breadth hous ten cubit wa breadth thereof hous 6 4 hous he made window narrow light 6 5 against wall hous he built chamber round against wall hous round both templ oracl he made chamber round 6 6 nethermost chamber wa five cubit broad middl wa six cubit broad third wa seven cubit broad wall hous he made narrow rest round that beam should not be fasten wall hous 6 7 hous when it wa build wa built stone made readi it wa brought thither so that there wa neither hammer nor axe nor ani tool iron heard hous while it wa build 6 8 door middl chamber wa right side hous they went wind stair middl chamber middl third 6 9 so he built hous finish it cover hous beam board cedar 6 10 then he built chamber against all hous five cubit high they rest hous timber cedar 6 11 word lord came solomon say 6 12 concern thi hous which thou art build if thou wilt walk my statut execut my judgment keep all my command walk them then will i perform my word thee which i spake unto david thi father 6 13 i will dwell children israel will not forsak my peopl israel 6 14 so solomon built hous finish it 6 15 he lord 6 20 oracl forepart wa twenti cubit length twenti cubit breadth twenti cubit height thereof he overlaid it pure gold so cover altar which wa cedar 6 21 so solomon overlaid hous pure gold he made finish all part thereof accord all fashion it so wa he seven year build it 7 1 but solomon wa build hi own hous thirteen year he finish all hi hous 7 2 he built also hous forest lebanon length thereof wa hundr cubit breadth thereof fifti cubit height thereof thirti cubit four row cedar pillar cedar beam pillar 7 3 it wa cover cedar beam that lay forti five pillar fifteen row 7 4 there were window three row light wa against light three rank 7 5 all door post were squar window light wa against light three rank 7 6 he made porch pillar length thereof wa fifti cubit breadth thereof thirti cubit porch wa them other pillar thick beam were them 7 7 then he made porch throne where he might judg even porch judgment it wa cover cedar one side floor other 7 8 hi hous where he dwelt had anoth court outsid great court 7 10 foundat wa costli stone even great stone stone ten cubit stone eight cubit 7 11 were costli stone measur hew stone cedar 7 12 great court round wa three row hew stone row cedar beam both inner court hous lord porch hous 7 13 king solomon sent fetch hiram tyre 7 14 he wa widow s son tribe naphtali hi father wa man tyre worker brass he wa fill wisdom understand cun work all work brass he came king solomon wrought all hi work 7 15 he cast two pillar brass eighteen cubit high apiec line twelv cubit did compass either them 7 16 he made two chapit molten brass set top pillar height one chapit wa five cubit height other chapit wa five cubit 7 17 net checker work wreath chain work chapit which were top pillar seven one chapit seven other chapit 7 18 he made pillar two row which wa network pomegran were two hundr row round other chapit 7 21 he set pillar porch templ he set right pillar call name thereof jachin he set left pillar call name thereof boaz 7 22 top pillar wa lili work so wa work pillar finish 7 23 he made molten sea ten cubit one brim other it wa round all hi height wa five cubit line thirti cubit did compass it round 7 24 brim it round there were knop compass it ten cubit compass sea round knop were cast two row when it wa cast 7 25 it stood twelv oxen three look north three look west three look south three look east sea wa set them all their hinder part were inward 7 26 it wa hand breadth thick brim thereof wa wrought like brim cup flower lili it contain two thousand bath 7 27 he made ten base brass four cubit wa length one base four cubit breadth thereof three cubit height it 7 28 work base wa thi manner they had border border were ledg 7 29 border that were ledg were lion oxen cherubim ledg there wa base beneath lion oxen were certain addit made thin work 7 30 everi base had four brasen wheel plate brass four corner thereof had undersett laver were undersett molten side everi addit 7 31 mouth it chapit wa cubit but mouth thereof wa round work base cubit half also mouth it were grave their border foursquar not round 7 32 border were four wheel axletre wheel were join base height wheel wa cubit half cubit 7 33 work wheel wa like work chariot wheel their axletre their nave their fello their spoke were all molten 7 34 there were four undersett four corner one base undersett were veri base itself 7 35 top base wa there round compass half cubit high top base ledg thereof border thereof were same 7 36 plate ledg thereof border thereof he grave cherubim lion palm tree accord proport everi one addit round 7 37 thi manner he made ten base all them had one cast one measur one size 7 38 then made he ten laver brass one laver contain forti bath everi laver wa four cubit everi one ten base one laver 7 39 he put five 8 1 then solomon assembl elder israel all head tribe chief father children israel unto king solomon jerusalem that they might bring ark coven lord citi david which is zion 8 2 all men israel assembl themselv unto king solomon feast month ethanim which is seventh month 8 3 all elder israel came priest took ark 8 4 they brought ark lord tabernacl congreg all holi vessel that were tabernacl even those did priest levit bring 8 5 king solomon all congreg israel that were assembl unto him were him ark sacrif sheep oxen that could not be told nor number multitud 8 6 priest brought ark coven lord unto hi place oracl hous most holi place even wing cherubim 8 7 cherubim spread forth their two wing place ark cherubim cover ark stave thereof 8 8 they drew stave that end stave were seen holi place oracl they were not seen there they are unto thi day 8 9 there wa noth ark save two tabl stone which mose put there horeb when lord made coven children israel when they came land egypt 8 10 it came pass when priest were come holi place that cloud fill hous lord 8 11 so that priest could not stand minist becaus cloud glori lord had fill hous lord 8 12 then spake solomon lord said that he would dwell thick dark 8 13 i have sure built thee hous dwell settl place thee abid ever 8 14 king turn hi face bless all congreg israel all congreg israel stood 8 15 he said bless be lord god israel which spake hi mouth unto david my father hath hi hand fulfil it say 8 16 day that i brought forth my peopl israel egypt i chose no citi all tribe israel build hous that my name might be therein but i chose david be my peopl israel 8 17 it wa heart david my father build hous name lord god israel 8 18 lord said unto david my father wherea it wa thine heart build hous unto my name thou didst well that it wa thine heart 8 19 nevertheless thou shalt not build hous but thi son that shall come forth thi loin he shall build hous unto my name 8 20 lord hath perform hi word that he spake i am risen room david my father sit throne israel as lord promis have built hous name lord god israel 8 21 i have set there place ark wherein is coven lord which he made our father when he brought them land egypt 8 22 solomon stood altar lord presenc all congreg israel spread forth hi hand heaven 8 23 he said lord god israel there is no god like thee heaven or earth beneath who keepest coven merci thi servant that walk thee all their heart 8 24 who hast kept thi servant david my father that thou promisedst him thou spakest also thi mouth hast fulfil it thine hand as it is thi day 8 25 therefor now lord god israel keep thi servant david my father that thou promisedst him say there shall not fail thee man my sight sit throne israel so that thi children take heed their way that they walk me as thou hast walk me 8 26 now o god israel let thi word i pray thee be verifi which thou spakest unto thi servant david my father 8 27 but will god inde dwell earth behold heaven heaven heaven cannot contain thee how much less thi hous that i have build 8 28 yet have thou respect unto prayer thi servant hi supplic o lord my god hearken unto cri prayer which thi servant prayeth thee day 8 29 that thine eye may be open thi hous night day even place which thou hast said my name shall be there that thou mayest hearken unto prayer which thi servant shall make thi place 8 30 hearken thou supplic thi servant thi peopl israel when they shall pray thi place hear thou heaven thi dwell place when thou hearest forgiv 8 31 if ani man trespass against hi neighbour oath be laid him caus him swear oath come thine altar thi hous 8 32 then hear thou heaven do judg thi servant condemn wick bring hi way hi head justifi righteou give him accord hi righteous 8 33 when thi peopl israel be smitten down enemi becaus they have sin against thee shall turn again thee confess thi name pray make supplic unto thee thi hous 8 34 then hear thou heaven forgiv sin thi peopl israel bring them again unto land which thou gavest unto their father 8 35 when heaven is shut there is no rain becaus they have sin against thee if they pray thi place confess thi name turn their sin when thou afflictest them 8 36 then hear thou heaven forgiv sin thi servant thi peopl israel that thou teach them good way wherein they should walk give rain thi land which thou hast given thi peopl inherit 8 37 if there be land famin if there be pestil blast mildew locust or if there be caterpil if their enemi besieg them land their citi whatsoev plagu whatsoev sick there be 8 38 what prayer supplic soever be made ani man or all thi peopl israel which shall know everi man plagu hi own heart spread forth hi hand thi hous 8 39 then hear thou heaven thi dwell place forgiv do give everi man accord hi way whose heart thou knowest thou even thou onli knowest heart all children men 8 40 that they may fear thee all day that they live land which thou gavest unto our father 8 41 moreov concern stranger that is not thi peopl israel but cometh far countri thi name s sake 8 42 they shall hear thi great name thi strong hand thi stretch arm when he shall come pray thi hous 8 43 hear thou heaven thi dwell place do accord all that stranger calleth thee that all peopl earth may know thi name fear thee as do thi peopl israel that they may know that thi hous which i have build is call thi name 8 44 if thi peopl go battl against their enemi whithersoev thou shalt send them shall pray unto lord citi which thou hast chosen hous that i have built thi name 8 45 then hear thou heaven their prayer their supplic maintain their caus 8 46 if they sin against thee there is no man that sinneth not thou be angri them deliv them enemi so that they carri them away captiv unto land enemi far or near 8 47 yet if they shall bethink themselv land whither they were carri captiv repent make supplic unto thee land them that carri them captiv say we have sin have done pervers we have commit wicked 8 48 so return unto thee all their heart all their soul land their enemi which led them away captiv pray unto thee their land which thou gavest unto their father citi which thou hast chosen hous which i have built thi name 8 49 then hear thou their prayer their supplic heaven thi dwell place maintain their caus 8 50 forgiv thi peopl that have sin against thee all their transgress wherein they have transgress against thee give them compass them who carri them captiv that they may have compass them 8 51 they be thi peopl thine inherit which thou broughtest forth egypt midst furnac iron 8 52 that thine eye may be open unto supplic thi servant unto supplic thi peopl israel hearken unto them all that they call unto thee 8 53 thou didst separ them all peopl earth be thine inherit as thou spakest hand mose thi servant when thou broughtest our father egypt o lord god 8 54 it wa so that when solomon had made end pray all thi prayer supplic unto lord he aros altar lord kneel hi knee hi hand spread heaven 8 55 he stood bless all congreg israel loud voic say 8 56 bless be lord that hath given rest unto hi peopl israel accord all that he promis there hath not fail one word all hi good promis which he promis hand mose hi servant 8 57 lord our god be us as he wa our father let him not leav us nor forsak us 8 58 that he may inclin our heart unto him walk all hi way keep hi command hi statut hi judgment which he command our father 8 59 let these my word wherewith i have made supplic lord be nigh unto lord our god day night that he maintain caus hi servant caus hi peopl israel all time as matter shall requir 8 60 that all peopl earth may know that lord is god that there is none els 8 61 let your heart therefor be perfect lord our god walk hi statut keep hi command as thi day 8 62 king all israel him offer sacrific lord 8 63 solomon offer sacrific peac offer which he offer unto lord two twenti thousand oxen hundr twenti thousand sheep so king all children israel dedic hous lord 8 64 same day did king hallow middl court that wa hous lord there he offer burnt offer meat offer fat peac offer becaus brasen altar that wa lord wa too littl receiv burnt offer meat offer fat peac offer 8 65 that time solomon held feast all israel him great congreg enter hamath unto river egypt lord our god seven day seven day even fourteen day 8 66 eighth day he sent peopl away they bless king went unto their tent joy glad heart all good that lord had done david hi servant israel hi peopl 9 1 it came pass when solomon had finish build hous lord king s hous all solomon s desir which he wa pleas do 9 2 that lord appear solomon second time as he had appear unto him gibeon 9 3 lord said unto him i have heard thi prayer thi supplic that thou hast made me i have hallow thi hous which thou hast built put my name there ever mine eye mine heart shall be there perpetu 9 4 if thou wilt walk me as david thi father walk integr heart upright do accord all that i have command thee wilt keep my statut my judgment 9 5 then i will establish throne thi kingdom israel ever as i promis david thi father say there shall not fail thee man throne israel 9 6 but if ye shall all turn follow me ye or your children will not keep my command my statut which i have set you but go serv other god worship them 9 7 then will i cut off israel land which i have given them thi hous which i have hallow my name will i cast my sight israel shall be proverb byword all peopl 9 8 thi hous which is high everi one that passeth it shall be astonish shall hiss they shall say whi hath lord done thu unto thi land thi hous 9 9 they shall answer becaus they forsook lord their god who brought forth their father land egypt have taken hold other god have worship them serv them therefor hath lord brought them all thi evil 9 10 it came pass end twenti year when solomon had built two hous hous lord king s hous 9 11 now hiram king tyre had furnish solomon cedar tree fir tree gold accord all hi desir that then king solomon gave hiram twenti citi land galile 9 12 hiram came tyre see citi which solomon had given him they pleas him not 9 13 he said what citi are these which thou hast given me my brother he call them land cabul unto thi day 9 14 hiram sent king sixscor talent gold 9 15 thi is reason levi which king solomon rais build hous lord hi own hous millo wall jerusalem hazor megiddo gezer 9 16 pharaoh king egypt had gone taken gezer burnt it fire slain canaanit that dwelt citi given it present unto hi daughter solomon s wife 9 17 solomon built gezer bethhoron nether 9 18 baalath tadmor wilder land 9 19 all citi store that solomon had citi hi chariot citi hi horsemen that which solomon desir build jerusalem lebanon all land hi dominion 9 20 all peopl that were left amorit hittit perizzit hivit jebusit which were not children israel 9 21 their children that were left them land whom children israel also were not abl utterli destroy those did solomon levi tribut bondservic unto thi day 9 22 but children israel did solomon make no bondmen but they were men war hi servant hi princ hi captain ruler hi chariot hi horsemen 9 23 these were chief offic that were solomon s work five hundr fifti which bare rule peopl that wrought work 9 24 but pharaoh s daughter came citi david unto her hous which solomon had built her then did he build millo 9 25 three time year did solomon offer burnt offer peac offer altar which he built unto lord he burnt incens altar that wa lord so he finish hous 9 26 king solomon made navi ship eziongeb which is besid eloth shore red sea land edom 9 27 hiram sent navi hi servant shipmen that had knowledg sea servant solomon 9 28 they came ophir fetch thenc gold four hundr twenti talent brought it king solomon 10 1 when queen sheba heard fame solomon concern name lord she came prove him hard question 10 2 she came jerusalem veri great train camel that bare spice veri much gold preciou stone when she wa come solomon she commun him all that wa her heart 10 3 solomon told her all her question there wa not ani thing hid king which he told her not 10 4 when queen sheba had seen all solomon s wisdom hous that he had built 10 5 meat hi tabl sit hi servant attend hi minist their apparel hi cupbear hi ascent which he went unto hous lord there wa no more spirit her 10 6 she said king it wa true report that i heard mine own land thi act thi wisdom 10 7 howbeit i believ not word i came mine eye had seen it behold half wa not told me thi wisdom prosper exceedeth fame which i heard 10 8 happi are thi men happi are these thi servant which stand continu thee that hear thi wisdom 10 9 bless be lord thi god which delight thee set thee throne israel becaus lord love israel ever therefor made he thee king do judgment justic 10 10 she gave king hundr twenti talent gold spice veri great store preciou stone there came no more such abund spice as these which queen sheba gave king solomon 10 11 navi also hiram that brought gold ophir brought ophir great plenti almug tree preciou stone 10 12 king made almug tree pillar hous lord king s hous harp also psalteri singer there came no such almug tree nor were seen unto thi day 10 13 king solomon gave unto queen sheba all her desir whatsoev she ask besid that which solomon gave her hi royal bounti so she turn went her own countri she her servant 10 14 now weight gold that came solomon one year wa six hundr threescor six talent gold 10 15 besid that he had merchantmen traffick spice merchant all king arabia governor countri 10 16 king solomon made two hundr target beaten gold six hundr shekel gold went one target 10 17 he made three hundr shield beaten gold three pound gold went one shield king put them hous forest lebanon 10 18 moreov king made great throne ivori overlaid it best gold 10 19 throne had six step top throne wa round behind there were stay either side place seat two lion stood besid stay 10 20 twelv lion stood there one side other six step there wa not like made ani kingdom 10 21 all king solomon s drink vessel were gold all vessel hous forest lebanon were pure gold none were silver it wa noth account day solomon 10 22 king had sea navi tharshish navi hiram onc three year came navi tharshish bring gold silver ivori ape peacock 10 23 so king solomon exceed all king earth rich wisdom 10 24 all earth sought solomon hear hi wisdom which god had put hi heart 10 25 they brought everi man hi present vessel silver vessel gold garment armour spice hors mule rate year year 10 26 solomon gather togeth chariot horsemen he had thousand four hundr chariot twelv thousand horsemen whom he bestow citi chariot king jerusalem 10 27 king made silver be jerusalem as stone cedar made he be as sycomor tree that are vale abund 10 28 solomon had hors brought egypt linen yarn king s merchant receiv linen yarn price 10 29 chariot came went egypt six hundr shekel silver hors hundr fifti so all king hittit king syria did they bring them their mean 11 1 but king solomon love mani strang women togeth daughter pharaoh women moabit ammonit edomit zidonian hittit 11 2 nation concern which lord said unto children israel ye shall not go them neither shall they come unto you sure they will turn away your heart their god solomon clave unto these love 11 3 he had seven hundr wive princess three hundr concubin hi wive turn away hi heart 11 4 it came pass when solomon wa old that hi wive turn away hi heart other god hi heart wa not perfect lord hi god as wa heart david hi father 11 5 solomon went ashtoreth goddess zidonian milcom abomin ammonit 11 6 solomon did evil sight lord went not fulli lord as did david hi father 11 7 then did solomon build high place chemosh abomin moab hill that is jerusalem molech abomin children ammon 11 8 likewis did he all hi strang wive which burnt incens sacrif unto their god 11 9 lord wa angri solomon becaus hi heart wa turn lord god israel which had appear unto him twice 11 10 had command him concern thi thing that he should not go other god but he kept not that which lord command 11 11 wherefor lord said unto solomon forasmuch as thi is done thee thou hast not kept my coven my statut which i have command thee i will sure rend kingdom thee will give it thi servant 11 12 notwithstand thi day i will not do it david thi father s sake but i will rend it hand thi son 11 13 howbeit i will not rend away all kingdom but will give one tribe thi son david my servant s sake jerusalem s sake which i have chosen 11 14 lord stir adversari unto solomon hadad edomit he wa king s seed edom 11 15 it came pass when david wa edom joab captain host wa gone buri slain he had smitten everi male edom 11 16 six month did joab remain there all israel he had cut off everi male edom 11 17 that hadad fled he certain edomit hi father s servant him go egypt hadad be yet littl child 11 18 they aros midian came paran they took men them paran they came egypt unto pharaoh king egypt which gave him hous appoint him victual gave him land 11 19 hadad found great favour sight pharaoh so that he gave him wife sister hi own wife sister tahpen queen 11 20 sister tahpen bare him genubath hi son whom tahpen wean pharaoh s hous genubath wa pharaoh s household son pharaoh 11 21 when hadad heard egypt that david slept hi father that joab captain host wa dead hadad said pharaoh let me depart that i may go mine own countri 11 22 then pharaoh said unto him but what hast thou lack me that behold thou seekest go thine own countri he answer noth howbeit let me go ani wise 11 23 god stir him anoth adversari rezon son eliadah which fled hi lord hadadez king zobah 11 24 he gather men unto him becam captain band when david slew them zobah they went damascu dwelt therein reign damascu 11 25 he wa adversari israel all day solomon besid mischief that hadad did he abhor israel reign syria 11 26 jeroboam son nebat ephrathit zereda solomon s servant whose mother s name wa zeruah widow woman even he lift hi hand against king 11 27 thi wa caus that he lift hi hand against king solomon built millo repair breach citi david hi father 11 28 man jeroboam wa mighti man valour solomon see young man that he wa industri he made him ruler all charg hous joseph 11 29 it came pass that time when jeroboam went jerusalem that prophet ahijah shilonit found him way he had clad himself new garment they two were alon field 11 30 ahijah caught new garment that wa him rent it twelv piec 11 31 he said jeroboam take thee ten piec thu saith lord god israel behold i will rend kingdom hand solomon will give ten tribe thee 11 32 but he shall have one tribe my servant david s sake jerusalem s sake citi which i have chosen all tribe israel 11 33 becaus that they have forsaken me have worship ashtoreth goddess zidonian chemosh god moabit milcom god children ammon have not walk my way do that which is right mine eye keep my statut my judgment as did david hi father 11 34 howbeit i will not take whole kingdom hi hand but i will make him princ all day hi life david my servant s sake whom i chose becaus he kept my command my statut 11 35 but i will take kingdom hi son s hand will give it unto thee even ten tribe 11 36 unto hi son will i give one tribe that david my servant may have light alway me jerusalem citi which i have chosen me put my name there 11 37 i will take thee thou shalt reign accord all that thi soul desireth shalt be king israel 11 38 it shall be if thou wilt hearken unto all that i command thee wilt walk my way do that is right my sight keep my statut my command as david my servant did that i will be thee build thee sure hous as i built david will give israel unto thee 11 39 i will thi afflict seed david but not ever 11 40 solomon sought therefor kill jeroboam jeroboam aros fled egypt unto shishak king egypt wa egypt death solomon 11 41 rest act solomon all that he did hi wisdom are they not written book act solomon 11 42 time that solomon reign jerusalem all israel wa forti year 11 43 solomon slept hi father wa buri citi david hi father rehoboam hi son reign hi stead 12 1 rehoboam went shechem all israel were come shechem make him king 12 2 it came pass when jeroboam son nebat who wa yet egypt heard it he wa fled presenc king solomon jeroboam dwelt egypt 12 3 that they sent call him jeroboam all congreg israel came spake unto rehoboam say 12 4 thi father made our yoke grievou now therefor make thou grievou servic thi father hi heavi yoke which he put us lighter we will serv thee 12 5 he said unto them depart yet three day then come again me peopl depart 12 6 king rehoboam consult old men that stood solomon hi father while he yet live said how do ye advis that i may answer thi peopl 12 7 they spake unto him say if thou wilt be servant unto thi peopl thi day wilt serv them answer them speak good word them then they will be thi servant ever 12 8 but he forsook counsel old men which they had given him consult young men that were grown him which stood him 12 9 he said unto them what counsel give ye that we may answer thi peopl who have spoken me say make yoke which thi father did put us lighter 12 10 young men that were grown him spake unto him say thu shalt thou speak unto thi peopl that spake unto thee say thi father made our yoke heavi but make thou it lighter unto us thu shalt thou say unto them my littl finger shall be thicker than my father s loin 12 11 now wherea my father did lade you heavi yoke i will add your yoke my father hath chastis you whip but i will chastis you scorpion 12 12 so jeroboam all peopl came rehoboam third day as king had appoint say come me again third day 12 13 king answer peopl roughli forsook old men s counsel that they gave him 12 14 spake them counsel young men say my father made your yoke heavi i will add your yoke my father also chastis you whip but i will chastis you scorpion 12 15 wherefor king hearken not unto peopl caus wa lord that he might perform hi say which lord spake ahijah shilonit unto jeroboam son nebat 12 16 so when all israel saw that king hearken not unto them peopl answer king say what portion have we david neither have we inherit son jess your tent o israel now see thine own hous david so israel depart unto their tent 12 17 but as children israel which dwelt citi judah rehoboam reign them 12 18 then king rehoboam sent adoram who wa tribut all israel stone him stone that he die therefor king rehoboam made speed get him hi chariot flee jerusalem 12 19 so israel rebel against hous david unto thi day 12 20 it came pass when all israel heard that jeroboam wa come again that they sent call him unto congreg made him king all israel there wa none that follow hous david but tribe judah onli 12 21 when rehoboam wa come jerusalem he assembl all hous judah tribe benjamin hundr fourscor thousand chosen men which were warrior fight against hous israel bring kingdom again rehoboam son solomon 12 22 but word god came unto shemaiah man god say 12 23 speak unto rehoboam son solomon king judah unto all hous judah benjamin remnant peopl say 12 24 thu saith lord ye shall not go nor fight against your brethren children israel return everi man hi hous thi thing is me they hearken therefor word lord return depart accord word lord 12 25 then jeroboam built shechem mount ephraim dwelt therein went thenc built penuel 12 26 jeroboam said hi heart now shall kingdom return hous david 12 27 if thi peopl go do sacrific hous lord jerusalem then shall heart thi peopl turn again unto their lord even unto rehoboam king judah they shall kill me go again rehoboam king judah 12 28 whereupon king took counsel made two calv gold said unto them it is too much you go jerusalem behold thi god o israel which brought thee land egypt 12 29 he set one bethel other put he dan 12 30 thi thing becam sin peopl went worship one even unto dan 12 31 he made hous high place made priest lowest peopl which were not son levi 12 32 jeroboam ordain feast eighth month fifteenth day month like unto feast that is judah he offer altar so did he bethel sacrif unto calv that he had made he place bethel priest high place which he had made 12 33 so he offer altar which he had made bethel fifteenth day eighth month even month which he had devis hi own heart ordain feast unto children israel he offer altar burnt incens 13 1 behold there came man god judah word lord unto bethel jeroboam stood altar burn incens 13 2 he cri against altar word lord said o altar altar thu saith lord behold child shall be born unto hous david josiah name thee shall he offer priest high place that burn incens thee men s bone shall be burnt thee 13 3 he gave sign same day say thi is sign which lord hath spoken behold altar shall be rent ash that are it shall be pour 13 4 it came pass when king jeroboam heard say man god which had cri against altar bethel that he put forth hi hand altar say lay hold him hi hand which he put forth against him dri so that he could not pull it again him 13 5 altar also wa rent ash pour altar accord sign which man god had given word lord 13 6 king answer said unto man god intreat now face lord thi god pray me that my hand may be restor me again man god besought lord king s hand wa restor him again becam as it wa 13 7 king said unto man god come home me refresh thyself i will give thee reward 13 8 man god said unto king if thou wilt give me half thine hous i will not go thee neither will i eat bread nor drink water thi place 13 9 so wa it charg me word lord say eat no bread nor drink water nor turn again same way that thou camest 13 10 so he went anoth way return not way that he came bethel 13 11 now there dwelt old prophet bethel hi son came told him all work that man god had done that day bethel word which he had spoken unto king them they told also their father 13 12 their father said unto them what way went he hi son had seen what way man god went which came judah 13 13 he said unto hi son saddl me ass so they saddl him ass he rode thereon 13 14 went man god found him sit oak he said unto him art thou man god that camest judah he said i am 13 15 then he said unto him come home me eat bread 13 16 he said i may not return thee nor go thee neither will i eat bread nor drink water thee thi place 13 17 it wa said me word lord thou shalt eat no bread nor drink water there nor turn again go way that thou camest 13 18 he said unto him i am prophet also as thou art angel spake unto me word lord say bring him back thee thine hous that he may eat bread drink water but he lie unto him 13 19 so he went back him did eat bread hi hous drank water 13 20 it came pass as they sat tabl that word lord came unto prophet that brought him back 13 21 he cri unto man god that came judah say thu saith lord forasmuch as thou hast disobey mouth lord hast not kept command which lord thi god command thee 13 22 but camest back hast eaten bread drunk water place which lord did say thee eat no bread drink no water thi carcas shall not come unto sepulchr thi father 13 23 it came pass he had eaten bread he had drunk that he saddl him ass wit prophet whom he had brought back 13 24 when he wa gone lion met him way slew him hi carcas wa cast way ass stood it lion also stood carcas 13 25 behold men pass saw carcas cast way lion stand carcas they came told it citi where old prophet dwelt 13 26 when prophet that brought him back way heard thereof he said it is man god who wa disobedi unto word lord therefor lord hath deliv him unto lion which hath torn him slain him accord word lord which he spake unto him 13 27 he spake hi son say saddl me ass they saddl him 13 28 he went found hi carcas cast way ass lion stand carcas lion had not eaten carcas nor torn ass 13 29 prophet took carcas man god laid it ass brought it back old prophet came citi mourn buri him 13 30 he laid hi carcas hi own grave they mourn him say ala my brother 13 31 it came pass he had buri him that he spake hi son say when i am dead then buri me sepulchr wherein man god is buri lay my bone besid hi bone 13 32 say which he cri word lord against altar bethel against all hous high place which are citi samaria shall sure come pass 13 33 thi thing jeroboam return not hi evil way but made again lowest peopl priest high place whosoev would he consecr him he becam one priest high place 13 34 thi thing becam sin unto hous jeroboam even cut it off destroy it off face earth 14 1 that time abijah son jeroboam fell sick 14 2 jeroboam said hi wife aris i pray thee disguis thyself that thou be not known be wife jeroboam get thee shiloh behold there is ahijah prophet which told me that i should be king thi peopl 14 3 take thee ten loav cracknel cruse honey go him he shall tell thee what shall becom child 14 4 jeroboam s wife did so aros went shiloh came hous ahijah but ahijah could not see hi eye were set reason hi age 14 5 lord said unto ahijah behold wife jeroboam cometh ask thing thee her son he is sick thu thu shalt thou say unto her it shall be when she cometh that she shall feign herself be anoth woman 14 6 it wa so when ahijah heard sound her feet as she came door that he said come thou wife jeroboam whi feignest thou thyself be anoth i am sent thee heavi tide 14 7 go tell jeroboam thu saith lord god israel forasmuch as i exalt thee peopl made thee princ my peopl israel 14 8 rent kingdom away hous david gave it thee yet thou hast not been as my servant david who kept my command who follow me all hi heart do that onli which wa right mine eye 14 9 but hast done evil all that were thee thou hast gone made thee other god molten imag provok me anger hast cast me behind thi back 14 10 therefor behold i will bring evil hous jeroboam will cut off jeroboam him that pisseth against wall him that is shut left israel will take away remnant hous jeroboam as man taketh away dung till it be all gone 14 11 him that dieth jeroboam citi shall dog eat him that dieth field shall fowl air eat lord hath spoken it 14 12 aris thou therefor get thee thine own hous when thi feet enter citi child shall die 14 13 all israel shall mourn him buri him he onli jeroboam shall come grave becaus him there is found some good thing lord god israel hous jeroboam 14 14 moreov lord shall rais him king israel who shall cut off hous jeroboam that day but what even now 14 15 lord shall smite israel as reed is shaken water he shall root israel thi good land which he gave their father shall scatter them river becaus they have made their grove provok lord anger 14 16 he shall give israel becaus sin jeroboam who did sin who made israel sin 14 17 jeroboam s wife aros depart came tirzah when she came threshold door child die 14 18 they buri him all israel mourn him accord word lord which he spake hand hi servant ahijah prophet 14 19 rest act jeroboam how he war how he reign behold they are written book chronicl king israel 14 20 day which jeroboam reign were two twenti year he slept hi father nadab hi son reign hi stead 14 21 rehoboam son solomon reign judah rehoboam wa forti one year old when he began reign he reign seventeen year jerusalem citi which lord did choos all tribe israel put hi name there hi mother s name wa naamah ammonitess 14 22 judah did evil sight lord they provok him jealousi their sin which they had commit all that their father had done 14 23 they also built them high place imag grove everi high hill everi green tree 14 24 there were also sodomit land they did accord all abomin nation which lord cast children israel 14 25 it came pass fifth year king rehoboam that shishak king egypt came against jerusalem 14 26 he took away treasur hous lord treasur king s hous he even took away all he took away all shield gold which solomon had made 14 27 king rehoboam made their stead brasen shield commit them unto hand chief guard which kept door king s hous 14 28 it wa so when king went hous lord that guard bare them brought them back guard chamber 14 29 now rest act rehoboam all that he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 10 forti one year reign he jerusalem hi mother s name wa maachah daughter abishalom 15 11 asa did that which wa right eye lord as did david hi father 15 12 he took away sodomit land remov all idol that hi father had made 15 13 also maachah hi mother even her he remov be queen becaus she had made idol grove asa destroy her idol burnt it brook kidron 15 14 but high place were not remov nevertheless asa s heart wa perfect lord all hi day 15 15 he brought thing which hi father had dedic thing which himself had dedic hous lord silver gold vessel 15 16 there wa war asa baasha king israel all their day 15 17 baasha king israel went against judah built ramah that he might not suffer ani go or come asa king judah 15 18 then asa took all silver gold that were left treasur hous lord treasur king s hous deliv them hand hi servant king asa sent them benhadad son tabrimon son hezion king syria that dwelt damascu say 15 19 there is leagu me thee my father thi father behold i have sent unto thee present silver gold come break thi leagu baasha king israel that he may depart me 15 20 so benhadad hearken unto king asa sent captain host which he had against citi israel smote ijon dan abelbethmaachah all cinneroth all land naphtali 15 21 it came pass when baasha heard thereof that he left off build ramah dwelt tirzah 15 22 then king asa made proclam all judah none wa exempt they took away stone ramah timber thereof wherewith baasha had build king asa built them geba benjamin mizpah 15 23 rest all act asa all hi might all that he did citi which he built are they not conspir against him baasha smote him gibbethon which belong philistin nadab all israel laid sieg gibbethon 15 28 even third year asa king judah did baasha slay him reign hi stead 15 29 it came pass provok me anger their sin 16 3 behold i will take away poster baasha poster hi hous will make thi hous like hous jeroboam son nebat 16 4 him that dieth baasha citi shall dog eat him that dieth hi field shall fowl air eat 16 5 now rest act baasha what he did hi might are they not written book chronicl king israel 16 6 so baasha slept hi father wa buri tirzah elah hi son reign hi stead 16 7 also hand prophet jehu son hanani came word lord against baasha against hi hous even all evil that he did sight lord provok him anger work hi hand be like hous jeroboam becaus he kill him 16 8 twenti sixth year asa king judah began elah son baasha reign israel tirzah two year 16 9 hi servant zimri captain half hi chariot conspir against him as he wa tirzah drink himself drunk hous arza steward hi hous tirzah 16 10 zimri went smote him kill him twenti seventh year asa king judah reign hi stead 16 11 it came pass when he began reign as soon as he sat hi throne that he slew all hous baasha he left him not one that pisseth against wall neither hi kinsfolk nor hi friend 16 12 thu did zimri destroy all hous baasha accord word lord which he spake against baasha jehu prophet 16 13 all sin baasha sin elah hi son which they sin which they made israel sin provok lord god israel anger their vaniti 16 14 now rest act elah all that he did are they not written book chronicl king israel 16 15 twenti seventh year asa king judah did zimri reign seven day tirzah peopl were encamp against gibbethon which belong philistin 16 16 peopl that were encamp heard say zimri hath conspir hath also slain king wherefor all israel made omri captain host king israel that day camp 16 17 omri went gibbethon all israel him they besieg tirzah 16 18 it came pass when zimri saw that citi wa taken that he went palac king s hous burnt king s hous him fire die 16 19 hi sin which he sin do evil sight lord walk way jeroboam hi sin which he did make israel sin 16 20 now rest act zimri hi treason that he wrought are they not written book chronicl king israel 16 21 then were peopl israel divid two part half peopl follow tibni son ginath make him king half follow omri 16 22 but peopl that follow omri prevail against peopl that follow tibni son ginath so tibni die omri reign 16 23 thirti first year asa king judah began omri reign israel twelv year six year reign he tirzah 16 24 he bought hill samaria shemer two talent silver built hill call name citi which he built name shemer owner hill samaria 16 25 but omri wrought evil eye lord did wors than all that were him 16 26 he walk all way jeroboam son nebat hi sin wherewith he made israel sin provok lord god israel anger their vaniti 16 27 now rest act omri which he did hi might that he shew are they not written book chronicl king israel 16 28 so omri slept hi father wa buri samaria ahab hi son reign hi stead 16 29 thirti eighth year asa king judah began ahab son omri reign israel ahab son omri reign israel samaria twenti two year 16 30 ahab son omri did evil sight lord all that were him 16 31 it came pass as if it had been light thing him walk sin jeroboam son nebat that he took wife jezebel daughter ethbaal king zidonian went serv baal worship him 16 32 he rear altar baal hous baal which he had built samaria 16 33 ahab made grove ahab did more provok lord god israel anger than all king israel that were him 16 34 hi day did hiel bethelit build jericho he laid foundat thereof abiram hi firstborn set gate thereof hi youngest son segub accord word lord which he spake joshua son nun 17 1 elijah tishbit who wa inhabit gilead said unto ahab as lord god israel liveth whom i stand there shall not be dew nor rain these year but accord my word 17 2 word lord came unto him say 17 3 get thee henc turn thee eastward hide thyself brook cherith that is jordan 17 4 it shall be that thou shalt drink brook i have command raven feed thee there 17 5 so he went did accord unto word lord he went dwelt brook cherith that is jordan 17 6 raven brought him bread flesh morn bread flesh even he drank brook 17 7 it came pass while that brook dri becaus there had been no rain land 17 8 word lord came unto him say 17 9 aris get thee zarephath which belongeth zidon dwell there behold i have command widow woman there sustain thee 17 10 so he aros went zarephath when he came gate citi behold widow woman wa there gather stick he call her said fetch me i pray thee littl water vessel that i may drink 17 11 as she wa go fetch it he call her said bring me i pray thee morsel bread thine hand 17 12 she said as lord thi god liveth i have not cake but hand meal barrel littl oil cruse behold i am gather two stick that i may go dress it me my son that we may eat it die 17 13 elijah said unto her fear not go do as thou hast said but make me thereof littl cake first bring it unto me make thee thi son 17 14 thu saith lord god israel barrel meal shall not wast neither shall cruse oil fail day that lord sendeth rain earth 17 15 she went did accord say elijah she he her hous did eat mani day 17 16 barrel meal wast not neither did cruse oil fail accord word lord which he spake elijah 17 17 it came pass these thing that son woman mistress hous fell sick hi sick wa so sore that there wa no breath left him 17 18 she said unto elijah what have i do thee o thou man god art thou come unto me call my sin remembr slay my son 17 19 he said unto her give me thi son he took him her bosom carri him loft where he abod laid him hi own bed 17 20 he cri unto lord said o lord my god hast thou also brought evil widow whom i sojourn slay her son 17 21 he stretch himself child three time cri unto lord said o lord my god i pray thee let thi child s soul come him again 17 22 lord heard voic elijah soul child came him again he reviv 17 23 elijah took child brought him down chamber hous deliv him unto hi mother elijah said see thi son liveth 17 24 woman said elijah now thi i know that thou art man god that word lord thi mouth is truth 18 1 it came pass mani day that word lord came elijah third year say go shew thyself unto ahab i will send rain earth 18 2 elijah went shew himself unto ahab there wa sore famin samaria 18 3 ahab call obadiah which wa governor hi hous now obadiah fear lord greatli 18 4 it wa so when jezebel cut off prophet lord that obadiah took hundr prophet hid them fifti cave fed them bread water 18 5 ahab said unto obadiah go land unto all fountain water unto all brook peradventur we may find grass save hors mule aliv that we lose not all beast 18 6 so they divid land them pass it ahab went one way himself obadiah went anoth way himself 18 7 as obadiah wa way behold elijah met him he knew him fell hi face said art thou that my lord elijah 18 8 he answer him i am go tell thi lord behold elijah is here 18 9 he said what have i sin that thou wouldest deliv thi servant hand ahab slay me 18 10 as lord thi god liveth there is no nation or kingdom whither my lord hath not sent seek thee when they said he is not there he took oath kingdom nation that they found thee not 18 11 now thou sayest go tell thi lord behold elijah is here 18 12 it shall come pass as soon as i am gone thee that spirit lord shall carri thee whither i know not so when i come tell ahab he cannot find thee he shall slay me but i thi servant fear lord my youth 18 13 wa it not told my lord what i did when jezebel slew prophet lord how i hid hundr men lord s prophet fifti cave fed them bread water 18 14 now thou sayest go tell thi lord behold elijah is here he shall slay me 18 15 elijah said as lord host liveth whom i stand i will sure shew myself unto him day 18 16 so obadiah went meet ahab told him ahab went meet elijah 18 17 it came pass when ahab saw elijah that ahab said unto him art thou he that troubleth israel 18 18 he answer i have not troubl israel but thou thi father s hous that ye have forsaken command lord thou hast follow baalim 18 19 now therefor send gather me all israel unto mount carmel prophet baal four hundr fifti prophet grove four hundr which eat jezebel s tabl 18 20 so ahab sent unto all children israel gather prophet togeth unto mount carmel 18 21 elijah came unto all peopl said how long halt ye two opinion if lord be god follow him but if baal then follow him peopl answer him not word 18 22 then said elijah unto peopl i even i onli remain prophet lord but baal s prophet are four hundr fifti men 18 23 let them therefor give us two bullock let them choos one bullock themselv cut it piec lay it wood put no fire i will dress other bullock lay it wood put no fire 18 24 call ye name your god i will call name lord god that answereth fire let him be god all peopl answer said it is well spoken 18 25 elijah said unto prophet baal choos you one bullock yourselv dress it first ye are mani call name your god but put no fire 18 26 they took bullock which wa given them they dress it call name baal morn even noon say o baal hear us but there wa no voic nor ani that answer they leap altar which wa made 18 27 it came pass noon that elijah mock them said cri aloud he is god either he is talk or he is pursu or he is journey or peradventur he sleepeth must be awak 18 28 they cri aloud cut themselv their manner knive lancet till blood gush them 18 29 it came pass when midday wa past they prophesi time offer even sacrific that there wa neither voic nor ani answer nor ani that regard 18 30 elijah said unto all peopl come near unto me all peopl came near unto him he repair altar lord that wa broken down 18 31 elijah took twelv stone accord number tribe son jacob unto whom word lord came say israel shall be thi name 18 32 stone he built altar name lord he made trench altar as great as would contain two measur seed 18 33 he put wood order cut bullock piec laid him wood said fill four barrel water pour it burnt sacrific wood 18 34 he said do it second time they did it second time he said do it third time they did it third time 18 35 water ran round altar he fill trench also water 18 36 it came pass time offer even sacrific that elijah prophet came near said lord god abraham isaac israel let it be known thi day that thou art god israel that i am thi servant that i have done all these thing thi word 18 37 hear me o lord hear me that thi peopl may know that thou art lord god that thou hast turn their heart back again 18 38 then fire lord fell consum burnt sacrific wood stone dust lick water that wa trench 18 39 when all peopl saw it they fell their face they said lord he is god lord he is god 18 40 elijah said unto them take prophet baal let not one them escap they took them elijah brought them down brook kishon slew them there 18 41 elijah said unto ahab get thee eat drink there is sound abund rain 18 42 so ahab went eat drink elijah went top carmel he cast himself down earth put hi face hi knee 18 43 said hi servant go now look sea he went look said there is noth he said go again seven time 18 44 it came pass seventh time that he said behold there ariseth littl cloud sea like man s hand he said go say unto ahab prepar thi chariot get thee down that rain stop thee not 18 45 it came pass mean while that heaven wa black cloud wind there wa great rain ahab rode went jezreel 18 46 hand lord wa elijah he gird hi loin ran ahab entranc jezreel 19 1 ahab told jezebel all that elijah had done withal how he had slain all prophet sword 19 2 then jezebel sent messeng unto elijah say so let god do me more also if i make not thi life as life one them morrow thi time 19 3 when he saw that he aros went hi life came beersheba which belongeth judah left hi servant there 19 4 but he himself went day s journey wilder came sat down junip tree he request himself that he might die said it is enough now o lord take away my life i am not better than my father 19 5 as he lay slept junip tree behold then angel touch him said unto him aris eat 19 6 he look behold there wa cake baken coal cruse water hi head he did eat drink laid him down again 19 7 angel lord came again second time touch him said aris eat becaus journey is too great thee 19 8 he aros did eat drink went strength that meat forti day forti night unto horeb mount god 19 9 he came thither unto cave lodg there behold word lord came him he said unto him what doest thou here elijah 19 10 he said i have been veri jealou lord god host children israel have forsaken thi coven thrown down thine altar slain thi prophet sword i even i onli am left they seek my life take it away 19 11 he said go forth stand mount lord behold lord pass great strong wind rent mountain brake piec rock lord but lord wa not wind wind earthquak but lord wa not earthquak 19 12 earthquak fire but lord wa not fire fire still small voic 19 13 it wa so when elijah heard it that he wrap hi face hi mantl went stood enter cave behold there came voic unto him said what doest thou here elijah 19 14 he said i have been veri jealou lord god host becaus children israel have forsaken thi coven thrown down thine altar slain thi prophet sword i even i onli am left they seek my life take it away 19 15 lord said unto him go return thi way wilder damascu when thou comest anoint hazael be king syria 19 16 jehu son nimshi shalt thou anoint be king israel elisha son shaphat abelmeholah shalt thou anoint be prophet thi room 19 17 it shall come pass that him that escapeth sword hazael shall jehu slay him that escapeth sword jehu shall elisha slay 19 18 yet i have left me seven thousand israel all knee which have not bow unto baal everi mouth which hath not kiss him 19 19 so he depart thenc found elisha son shaphat who wa plow twelv yoke oxen him he twelfth elijah pass him cast hi mantl him 19 20 he left oxen ran elijah said let me i pray thee kiss my father my mother then i will follow thee he said unto him go back again what have i done thee 19 21 he return back him took yoke oxen slew them boil their flesh instrument oxen gave unto peopl they did eat then he aros went elijah minist unto him 20 1 benhadad king syria gather all hi host togeth there were thirti two king him hors chariot he went besieg samaria war against it 20 2 he sent messeng ahab king israel citi said unto him thu saith benhadad 20 3 thi silver thi gold is mine thi wive also thi children even goodliest are mine 20 4 king israel answer said my lord o king accord thi say i am thine all that i have 20 5 messeng came again said thu speaketh benhadad say although i have sent unto thee say thou shalt deliv me thi silver thi gold thi wive thi children 20 6 yet i will send my servant unto thee morrow thi time they shall search thine hous hous thi servant it shall be that whatsoev is pleasant thine eye they shall put it their hand take it away 20 7 then king israel call all elder land said mark i pray you see how thi man seeketh mischief he sent unto me my wive my children my silver my gold i deni him not 20 8 all elder all peopl said unto him hearken not unto him nor consent 20 9 wherefor he said unto messeng benhadad tell my lord king all that thou didst send thi servant first i will do but thi thing i may not do messeng depart brought him word again 20 10 benhadad sent unto him said god do so unto me more also if dust samaria shall suffic hand all peopl that follow me 20 11 king israel answer said tell him let not him that girdeth hi har boast himself as he that putteth it off 20 12 it came pass when ben hadad heard thi messag as he wa drink he king pavilion that he said unto hi servant set yourselv array they set themselv array against citi 20 13 behold there came prophet unto ahab king israel say thu saith lord hast thou seen all thi great multitud behold i will deliv it thine hand thi day thou shalt know that i am lord 20 14 ahab said whom he said thu saith lord even young men princ provinc then he said who shall order battl he answer thou 20 15 then he number young men princ provinc they were two hundr thirti two them he number all peopl even all children israel be seven thousand 20 16 they went noon but benhadad wa drink himself drunk pavilion he king thirti two king that help him 20 17 young men princ provinc went first benhadad sent they told him say there are men come samaria 20 18 he said they be come peac take them aliv or they be come war take them aliv 20 19 so these young men princ provinc came citi armi which follow them 20 20 they slew everi one hi man syrian fled israel pursu them benhadad king syria escap hors horsemen 20 21 king israel went smote hors chariot slew syrian great slaughter 20 22 prophet came king israel said unto him go strengthen thyself mark see what thou doest return year king syria will come against thee 20 23 servant king syria said unto him their god are god hill therefor they were stronger than we but let us fight against them plain sure we shall be stronger than they 20 24 do thi thing take king away everi man hi place put captain their room 20 25 number thee armi like armi that thou hast lost hors hors chariot chariot we will fight against them plain sure we shall be stronger than they he hearken unto their voic did so 20 26 it came pass return year that benhadad number syrian went aphek fight against israel 20 27 children israel were number were all present went against them children israel pitch them like two littl flock kid but syrian fill countri 20 28 there came man god spake unto king israel said thu saith lord becaus syrian have said lord is god hill but he is not god valley therefor will i deliv all thi great multitud thine hand ye shall know that i am lord 20 29 they pitch one against other seven day so it wa that seventh day battl wa join children israel slew syrian hundr thousand footmen one day 20 30 but rest fled aphek citi there wall fell twenti seven thousand men that were left benhadad fled came citi inner chamber 20 31 hi servant said unto him behold now we have heard that king hous israel are merci king let us i pray thee put sackcloth our loin rope our head go king israel peradventur he will save thi life 20 32 so they gird sackcloth their loin put rope their head came king israel said thi servant benhadad saith i pray thee let me live he
