said is he yet aliv he is my brother 20 33 now men did dilig observ ani thing would come him did hastili catch it they said thi brother benhadad then he said go ye bring him then benhadad came forth him he caus him come chariot 20 34 ben hadad said unto him citi which my father took thi father i will restor thou shalt make street thee damascu as my father made samaria then said ahab i will send thee away thi coven so he made coven him sent him away 20 35 certain man son prophet said unto hi neighbour word lord smite me i pray thee man refus smite him 20 36 then said he unto him becaus thou hast not obey voic lord behold as soon as thou art depart me lion shall slay thee as soon as he wa depart him lion found him slew him 20 37 then he found anoth man said smite me i pray thee man smote him so that smite he wound him 20 38 so prophet depart wait king way disguis himself ash hi face 20 39 as king pass he cri unto king he said thi servant went midst battl behold man turn asid brought man unto me said keep thi man if ani mean he be miss then shall thi life be hi life or els thou shalt pay talent silver 20 40 as thi servant wa busi here there he wa gone king israel said unto him so shall thi judgment be thyself hast decid it 20 41 he hast took ash away hi face king israel discern him that he wa prophet 20 42 he said unto him thu saith lord becaus thou hast let go thi hand man whom i appoint utter destruct therefor thi life shall go hi life thi peopl hi peopl 20 43 king israel went hi hous heavi displeas came samaria 21 1 it came pass these thing that naboth jezreelit had vineyard which wa jezreel hard palac ahab king samaria 21 2 ahab spake unto naboth say give me thi vineyard that i may have it garden herb becaus it is near unto my hous i will give thee it better vineyard than it or if it seem good thee i will give thee worth it money 21 3 naboth said ahab lord forbid it me that i should give inherit my father unto thee 21 4 ahab came hi hous heavi displeas becaus word which naboth jezreelit had spoken him he had said i will not give thee inherit my father he laid him down hi bed turn away hi face would eat no bread 21 5 but jezebel hi wife came him said unto him whi is thi spirit so sad that thou eatest no bread 21 6 he said unto her becaus i spake unto naboth jezreelit said unto him give me thi vineyard money or els if it pleas thee i will give thee anoth vineyard it he answer i will not give thee my vineyard 21 7 jezebel hi wife said unto him dost thou now govern kingdom israel aris eat bread let thine heart be merri i will give thee vineyard naboth jezreelit 21 8 so she wrote letter ahab s name seal them hi seal sent letter unto elder nobl that were hi citi dwell naboth 21 9 she wrote letter say proclaim fast set naboth high peopl 21 10 set two men son belial him bear wit against him say thou didst blasphem god king then carri him stone him that he may die 21 11 men hi citi even elder nobl who were inhabit hi citi did as jezebel had sent unto them as it wa written letter which she had sent unto them 21 12 they proclaim fast set naboth high peopl 21 13 there came two men children belial sat him men belial wit against him even against naboth presenc peopl say naboth did blasphem god king then they carri him forth citi stone him stone that he die 21 14 then they sent jezebel say naboth is stone is dead 21 15 it came pass when jezebel heard that naboth wa stone wa dead that jezebel said ahab aris take possess vineyard naboth jezreelit which he refus give thee money naboth is not aliv but dead 21 16 it came pass when ahab heard that naboth wa dead that ahab rose go down vineyard naboth jezreelit take possess it 21 17 word lord came elijah tishbit say 21 18 aris go down meet ahab king israel which is samaria behold he is vineyard naboth whither he is gone down possess it 21 19 thou shalt speak unto him say thu saith lord hast thou kill also taken possess thou shalt speak unto him say thu saith lord place where dog lick blood naboth shall dog lick thi blood even thine 21 20 ahab said elijah hast thou found me o mine enemi he answer i have found thee becaus thou hast sold thyself work evil sight lord 21 21 behold i will bring evil thee will take away thi poster will cut off ahab him that pisseth against wall him that is shut left israel 21 22 will make thine hous like hous jeroboam son nebat like hous baasha son ahijah provoc wherewith thou hast provok me anger made israel sin 21 23 jezebel also spake lord say dog shall eat jezebel wall jezreel 21 24 him that dieth ahab citi dog shall eat him that dieth field shall fowl air eat 21 25 but there wa none like unto ahab which did sell himself work wicked sight lord whom jezebel hi wife stir 21 26 he did veri abomin follow idol accord all thing as did amorit whom lord cast children israel 21 27 it came pass when ahab heard those word that he rent hi cloth put sackcloth hi flesh fast lay sackcloth went softli 21 28 word lord came elijah tishbit say 21 29 seest thou how ahab humbleth himself me becaus he humbleth himself me i will not bring evil hi day but hi son s day will i bring evil hi hous 22 1 they continu three year war syria israel 22 2 it came pass third year that jehoshaphat king judah came down king israel 22 3 king israel said unto hi servant know ye that ramoth gilead is our we be still take it not hand king syria 22 4 he said unto jehoshaphat wilt thou go me battl ramothgilead jehoshaphat said king israel i am as thou art my peopl as thi peopl my hors as thi hors 22 5 jehoshaphat said unto king israel enquir i pray thee word lord day 22 6 then king israel gather prophet togeth four hundr men said unto them shall i go against ramothgilead battl or shall i forbear they said go lord shall deliv it hand king 22 7 jehoshaphat said is there not here prophet lord besid that we might enquir him 22 8 king israel said unto jehoshaphat there is yet one man micaiah son imlah whom we may enquir lord but i hate him he doth not prophesi good concern me but evil jehoshaphat said let not king say so 22 9 then king israel call offic said hasten hither micaiah son imlah 22 10 king israel jehoshaphat king judah sat each hi throne have put their robe void place entranc gate samaria all prophet prophesi them 22 11 zedekiah son chenaanah made him horn iron he said thu saith lord these shalt thou push syrian thou have consum them 22 12 all prophet prophesi so say go ramothgilead prosper lord shall deliv it king s hand 22 13 messeng that wa gone call micaiah spake unto him say behold now word prophet declar good unto king one mouth let thi word i pray thee be like word one them speak that which is good 22 14 micaiah said as lord liveth what lord saith unto me that will i speak 22 15 so he came king king said unto him micaiah shall we go against ramothgilead battl or shall we forbear he answer him go prosper lord shall deliv it hand king 22 16 king said unto him how mani time shall i adjur thee that thou tell me noth but that which is true name lord 22 17 he said i saw all israel scatter hill as sheep that have not shepherd lord said these have no master let them return everi man hi hous peac 22 18 king israel said unto jehoshaphat did i not tell thee that he would prophesi no good concern me but evil 22 19 he said hear thou therefor word lord i saw lord sit hi throne all host heaven stand him hi right hand hi left 22 20 lord said who shall persuad ahab that he may go fall ramothgilead one said thi manner anoth said that manner 22 21 there came forth spirit stood lord said i will persuad him 22 22 lord said unto him wherewith he said i will go forth i will be lie spirit mouth all hi prophet he said thou shalt persud him prevail also go forth do so 22 23 now therefor behold lord hath put lie spirit mouth all these thi prophet lord hath spoken evil concern thee 22 24 but zedekiah son chenaanah went near smote micaiah cheek said which way went spirit lord me speak unto thee 22 25 micaiah said behold thou shalt see that day when thou shalt go inner chamber hide thyself 22 26 king israel said take micaiah carri him back unto amon governor citi joash king s son 22 27 say thu saith king put thi fellow prison feed him bread afflict water afflict i come peac 22 28 micaiah said if thou return all peac lord hath not spoken me he said hearken o peopl everi one you 22 29 so king israel jehoshaphat king judah went ramothgilead 22 30 king israel said unto jehoshaphat i will disguis myself enter battl but put thou thi robe king israel disguis himself went battl 22 31 but king syria command hi thirti two captain that had rule hi chariot say fight neither small nor great save onli king israel 22 32 it came pass when captain chariot saw jehoshaphat that they said sure it is king israel they turn asid fight against him jehoshaphat cri 22 33 it came pass when captain chariot perceiv that it wa not king israel that they turn back pursu him 22 34 certain man drew bow ventur smote king israel joint har wherefor he said unto driver hi chariot turn thine hand carri me host i am wound 22 35 battl increas that day king wa stay hi chariot against syrian die even blood ran wound midst chariot 22 36 there went proclam host go down sun say everi man hi citi everi man hi own countri 22 37 so king die wa brought samaria they buri king samaria 22 38 one wash chariot pool samaria dog lick hi blood they wash hi armour accord unto word lord which he spake 22 39 now rest act ahab all that he did ivori hous which he made all citi that he built are they not written book chronicl king israel 22 40 so ahab slept hi father ahaziah hi son reign hi stead 22 41 jehoshaphat son asa began reign judah fourth year ahab king israel 22 42 jehoshaphat wa thirti five year old when he began reign he reign twenti five year jerusalem hi mother s name wa azubah daughter shilhi 22 43 he walk all way asa hi father he turn not asid it do that which wa right eye lord nevertheless high place were not taken away peopl offer burnt incens yet high place 22 44 jehoshaphat made peac king israel 22 45 now rest act jehoshaphat hi might that he shew how he war are they not written book chronicl king judah 22 46 remnant sodomit which remain day hi father asa he took land 22 47 there wa then no king edom deputi wa king 22 48 jehoshaphat made ship tharshish go ophir gold but they went not ship were broken eziongeb 22 49 then said ahaziah son ahab unto jehoshaphat let my servant go thi servant ship but jehoshaphat would not 22 50 jehoshaphat slept hi father wa buri hi father citi david hi father jehoram hi son reign hi stead 22 51 ahaziah son ahab began reign israel samaria seventeenth year jehoshaphat king judah reign two year israel 22 52 he did evil sight lord walk way hi father way hi mother way jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin 22 53 he serv baal worship him provok anger lord god israel accord all that hi father had done second book king commonli call fourth book king 1 1 then moab rebel against israel death ahab 1 2 ahaziah fell down lattic hi upper chamber that wa samaria wa sick he sent messeng said unto them go enquir baalzebub god ekron i shall recov thi diseas 1 3 but angel lord said elijah tishbit aris go meet messeng king samaria say unto them is it not becaus there is not god israel that ye go enquir baalzebub god ekron 1 4 now therefor thu saith lord thou shalt not come down that bed which thou art gone but shalt sure die elijah depart 1 5 when messeng turn back unto him he said unto them whi are ye now turn back 1 6 they said unto him there came man meet us said unto us go turn again unto king that sent you say unto him thu saith lord is it not becaus there is not god israel that thou sendest enquir baalzebub god ekron therefor thou shalt not come down that bed which thou art gone but shalt sure die 1 7 he said unto them what manner man wa he which came meet you told you these word 1 8 they answer him he wa hairi man girt girdl leather hi loin he said it is elijah tishbit 1 9 then king sent unto him captain fifti hi fifti he went him behold he sat top hill he spake unto him thou man god king hath said come down 1 10 elijah answer said captain fifti if i be man god then let fire come down heaven consum thee thi fifti there came down fire heaven consum him hi fifti 1 11 again also he sent unto him anoth captain fifti hi fifti he answer said unto him o man god thu hath king said come down quickli 1 12 elijah answer said unto them if i be man god let fire come down heaven consum thee thi fifti fire god came down heaven consum him hi fifti 1 13 he sent again captain third fifti hi fifti third captain fifti went came fell hi knee elijah besought him said unto him o man god i pray thee let my life life these fifti thi servant be preciou thi sight 1 14 behold there came fire down heaven burnt two captain former fifti their fifti therefor let my life now be preciou thi sight 1 15 angel lord said unto elijah go down him be not afraid him he aros went down him unto king 1 16 he said unto him thu saith lord forasmuch as thou hast sent messeng enquir baalzebub god ekron is it not becaus there is no god israel enquir hi word therefor thou shalt not come down off that bed which thou art gone but shalt sure die 1 17 so he die accord word lord which elijah had spoken jehoram reign hi stead second year jehoram son jehoshaphat king judah becaus he had no son 1 18 now rest act ahaziah which he did are they not written book chronicl king israel 2 1 it came pass when lord would take elijah heaven whirlwind that elijah went elisha gilgal 2 2 elijah said unto elisha tarri here i pray thee lord hath sent me bethel elisha said unto him as lord liveth as thi soul liveth i will not leav thee so they went down bethel 2 3 son prophet that were bethel came forth elisha said unto him knowest thou that lord will take away thi master thi head day he said yea i know it hold ye your peac 2 4 elijah said unto him elisha tarri here i pray thee lord hath sent me jericho he said as lord liveth as thi soul liveth i will not leav thee so they came jericho 2 5 son prophet that were jericho came elisha said unto him knowest thou that lord will take away thi master thi head day he answer yea i know it hold ye your peac 2 6 elijah said unto him tarri i pray thee here lord hath sent me jordan he said as lord liveth as thi soul liveth i will not leav thee they two went 2 7 fifti men son prophet went stood view afar off they two stood jordan 2 8 elijah took hi mantl wrap it togeth smote water they were divid hither thither so that they two went dri ground 2 9 it came pass when they were gone that elijah said unto elisha ask what i shall do thee i be taken away thee elisha said i pray thee let doubl portion thi spirit be me 2 10 he said thou hast ask hard thing nevertheless if thou see me when i am taken thee it shall be so unto thee but if not it shall not be so 2 11 it came pass as they still went talk that behold there appear chariot fire hors fire part them both asund elijah went whirlwind heaven 2 12 elisha saw it he cri my father my father chariot israel horsemen thereof he saw him no more he took hold hi own cloth rent them two piec 2 13 he took also mantl elijah that fell him went back stood bank jordan 2 14 he took mantl elijah that fell him smote water said where is lord god elijah when he also had smitten water they part hither thither elisha went 2 15 when son prophet which were view jericho saw him they said spirit elijah doth rest elisha they came meet him bow themselv ground him 2 16 they said unto him behold now there be thi servant fifti strong men let them go we pray thee seek thi master lest peradventur spirit lord hath taken him cast him some mountain or some valley he said ye shall not send 2 17 when they urg him till he wa asham he said send they sent therefor fifti men they sought three day but found him not 2 18 when they came again him he tarri jericho he said unto them did i not say unto you go not 2 19 men citi said unto elisha behold i pray thee situat thi citi is pleasant as my lord seeth but water is naught ground barren 2 20 he said bring me new cruse put salt therein they brought it him 2 21 he went forth unto spring water cast salt there said thu saith lord i have heal these water there shall not be thenc ani more death or barren land 2 22 so water were heal unto thi day accord say elisha which he spake 2 23 he went thenc unto bethel as he wa go way there came forth littl children citi mock him said unto him go thou bald head go thou bald head 2 24 he turn back look them curs them name lord there came forth two she bear wood tare forti two children them 2 25 he went thenc mount carmel thenc he return samaria 3 1 now jehoram son ahab began reign israel samaria eighteenth year jehoshaphat king judah reign twelv year 3 2 he wrought evil sight lord but not like hi father like hi mother he put away imag baal that hi father had made 3 3 nevertheless he cleav unto sin jeroboam son nebat which made israel sin he depart not therefrom 3 4 mesha king moab wa sheepmast render unto king israel hundr thousand lamb hundr thousand ram wool 3 5 but it came pass when ahab wa dead that king moab rebel against king israel 3 6 king jehoram went samaria same time number all israel 3 7 he went sent jehoshaphat king judah say king moab hath rebel against me wilt thou go me against moab battl he said i will go i am as thou art my peopl as thi peopl my hors as thi hors 3 8 he said which way shall we go he answer way wilder edom 3 9 so king israel went king judah king edom they fetch compass seven day journey there wa no water host cattl that follow them 3 10 king israel said ala that lord hath call these three king togeth deliv them hand moab 3 11 but jehoshaphat said is there not here prophet lord that we may enquir lord him one king israel s servant answer said here is elisha son shaphat which pour water hand elijah 3 12 jehoshaphat said word lord is him so king israel jehoshaphat king edom went down him 3 13 elisha said unto king israel what have i do thee get thee prophet thi father prophet thi mother king israel said unto him nay lord hath call these three king togeth deliv them hand moab 3 14 elisha said as lord host liveth whom i stand sure were it not that i regard presenc jehoshaphat king judah i would not look thee nor see thee 3 15 but now bring me minstrel it came pass when minstrel play that hand lord came him 3 16 he said thu saith lord make thi valley full ditch 3 17 thu saith lord ye shall not see wind neither shall ye see rain yet that valley shall be fill water that ye may drink both ye your cattl your beast 3 18 thi is but light thing sight lord he will deliv moabit also your hand 3 19 ye shall smite everi fenc citi everi choic citi shall fell everi good tree stop all well water mar everi good piec land stone 3 20 it came pass morn when meat offer wa offer that behold there came water way edom countri wa fill water 3 21 when all moabit heard that king were come fight against them they gather all that were abl put armour upward stood border 3 22 they rose earli morn sun shone water moabit saw water other side as red as blood 3 23 they said thi is blood king are sure slain they have smitten one anoth now therefor moab spoil 3 24 when they came camp israel israelit rose smote moabit so that they fled them but they went forward smite moabit even their countri 3 25 they beat down citi everi good piec land cast everi man hi stone fill it they stop all well water fell all good tree onli kirharaseth left they stone thereof howbeit slinger went it smote it 3 26 when king moab saw that battl wa too sore him he took him seven hundr men that drew sword break even unto king edom but they could not 3 27 then he took hi eldest son that should have reign hi stead offer him burnt offer wall there wa great indign against israel they depart him return their own land 4 1 now there cri certain woman wive son prophet unto elisha say thi servant my husband is dead thou knowest that thi servant did fear lord creditor is come take unto him my two son be bondmen 4 2 elisha said unto her what shall i do thee tell me what hast thou hous she said thine handmaid hath not ani thing hous save pot oil 4 3 then he said go borrow thee vessel abroad all thi neighbour even empti vessel borrow not few 4 4 when thou art come thou shalt shut door thee thi son shalt pour all those vessel thou shalt set asid that which is full 4 5 so she went him shut door her her son who brought vessel her she pour 4 6 it came pass when vessel were full that she said unto her son bring me yet vessel he said unto her there is not vessel more oil stay 4 7 then she came told man god he said go sell oil pay thi debt live thou thi children rest 4 8 it fell day that elisha pass shunem where wa great woman she constrain him eat bread so it wa that as oft as he pass he turn thither eat bread 4 9 she said unto her husband behold now i perceiv that thi is holi man god which passeth us continu 4 10 let us make littl chamber i pray thee wall let us set him there bed tabl stool candlestick it shall be when he cometh us that he shall turn thither 4 11 it fell day that he came thither he turn chamber lay there 4 12 he said gehazi hi servant call thi shunammit when he had call her she stood him 4 13 he said unto him say now unto her behold thou hast been care us all thi care what is be done thee wouldest thou be spoken king or captain host she answer i dwell mine own peopl 4 14 he said what then is be done her gehazi answer verili she hath no child her husband is old 4 15 he said call her when he had call her she stood door 4 16 he said thi season accord time life thou shalt embrac son she said nay my lord thou man god do not lie unto thine handmaid 4 17 woman conceiv bare son that season that elisha had said unto her accord time life 4 18 when child wa grown it fell day that he went hi father reaper 4 19 he said unto hi father my head my head he said lad carri him hi mother 4 20 when he had taken him brought him hi mother he sat her knee till noon then die 4 21 she went laid him bed man god shut door him went 4 22 she call unto her husband said send me i pray thee one young men one ass that i may run man god come again 4 23 he said wherefor wilt thou go him day it is neither new moon nor sabbath she said it shall be well 4 24 then she saddl ass said her servant drive go forward slack not thi ride me i bid thee 4 25 so she went came unto man god mount carmel it came pass when man god saw her afar off that he said gehazi hi servant behold yonder is that shunammit 4 26 run now i pray thee meet her say unto her is it well thee is it well thi husband is it well child she answer it is well 4 27 when she came man god hill she caught him feet but gehazi came near thrust her away man god said let her alon her soul is vex her lord hath hid it me hath not told me 4 28 then she said did i desir son my lord did i not say do not deceiv me 4 29 then he said gehazi gird thi loin take my staff thine hand go thi way if thou meet ani man salut him not if ani salut thee answer him not again lay my staff face child 4 30 mother child said as lord liveth as thi soul liveth i will not leav thee he aros follow her 4 31 gehazi pass them laid staff face child but there wa neither voic nor hear wherefor he went again meet him told him say child is not awak 4 32 when elisha wa come hous behold child wa dead laid hi bed 4 33 he went therefor shut door them twain pray unto lord 4 34 he went lay child put hi mouth hi mouth hi eye hi eye hi hand hi hand stretch himself child flesh child wax warm 4 35 then he return walk hous fro went stretch himself him child sneez seven time child open hi eye 4 36 he call gehazi said call thi shunammit so he call her when she wa come unto him he said take thi son 4 37 then she went fell hi feet bow herself ground took her son went 4 38 elisha came again gilgal there wa dearth land son prophet were sit him he said unto hi servant set great pot seeth pottag son prophet 4 39 one went field gather herb found wild vine gather thereof wild gourd hi lap full came shred them pot pottag they knew them not 4 40 so they pour men eat it came pass as they were eat pottag that they cri said o thou man god there is death pot they could not eat thereof 4 41 but he said then bring meal he cast it pot he said pour peopl that they may eat there wa no harm pot 4 42 there came man baalshalisha brought man god bread firstfruit twenti loav barley full ear corn husk thereof he said give unto peopl that they may eat 4 43 hi servitor said what should i set thi hundr men he said again give peopl that they may eat thu saith lord they shall eat shall leav thereof 4 44 so he set it them they did eat left thereof accord word lord 5 1 now naaman captain host king syria wa great man hi master honour becaus him lord had given deliver unto syria he wa also mighti man valour but he wa leper 5 2 syrian had gone compani had brought away captiv land israel littl maid she wait naaman s wife 5 3 she said unto her mistress would god my lord were prophet that is samaria he would recov him hi leprosi 5 4 one went told hi lord say thu thu said maid that is land israel 5 5 king syria said go go i will send letter unto king israel he depart took him ten talent silver six thousand piec gold ten chang raiment 5 6 he brought letter king israel say now when thi letter is come unto thee behold i have therewith sent naaman my servant thee that thou mayest recov him hi leprosi 5 7 it came pass when king israel had read letter that he rent hi cloth said am i god kill make aliv that thi man doth send unto me recov man hi leprosi wherefor consid i pray you see how he seeketh quarrel against me 5 8 it wa so when elisha man god had heard that king israel had rent hi cloth that he sent king say wherefor hast thou rent thi cloth let him come now me he shall know that there is prophet israel 5 9 so naaman came hi hors hi chariot stood door hous elisha 5 10 elisha sent messeng unto him say go wash jordan seven time thi flesh shall come again thee thou shalt be clean 5 11 but naaman wa wroth went away said behold i thought he will sure come me stand call name lord hi god strike hi hand place recov leper 5 12 are not abana pharpar river damascu better than all water israel may i not wash them be clean so he turn went away rage 5 13 hi servant came near spake unto him said my father if prophet had bid thee do some great thing wouldest thou not have done it how much rather then when he saith thee wash be clean 5 14 then went he down dip himself seven time jordan accord say man god hi flesh came again like unto flesh littl child he wa clean 5 15 he return man god he all hi compani came stood him he said behold now i know that there is no god all earth but israel now therefor i pray thee take bless thi servant 5 16 but he said as lord liveth whom i stand i will receiv none he urg him take it but he refus 5 17 naaman said shall there not then i pray thee be given thi servant two mule burden earth thi servant will henceforth offer neither burnt offer nor sacrific unto other god but unto lord 5 18 thi thing lord pardon thi servant that when my master goeth hous rimmon worship there he leaneth my hand i bow myself hous rimmon when i bow down myself hous rimmon lord pardon thi servant thi thing 5 19 he said unto him go peac so he depart him littl way 5 20 but gehazi servant elisha man god said behold my master hath spare naaman thi syrian not receiv hi hand that which he brought but as lord liveth i will run him take somewhat him 5 21 so gehazi follow naaman when naaman saw him run him he light down chariot meet him said is all well 5 22 he said all is well my master hath sent me say behold even now there be come me mount ephraim two young men son prophet give them i pray thee talent silver two chang garment 5 23 naaman said be content take two talent he urg him bound two talent silver two bag two chang garment laid them two hi servant they bare them him 5 24 when he came tower he took them their hand bestow them hous he let men go they depart 5 25 but he went stood hi master elisha said unto him whenc comest thou gehazi he said thi servant went no whither 5 26 he said unto him went not mine heart thee when man turn again hi chariot meet thee is it time receiv money receiv garment oliveyard vineyard sheep oxen menserv maidserv 5 27 leprosi therefor naaman shall cleav unto thee unto thi seed ever he went hi presenc leper as white as snow 6 1 son prophet said unto elisha behold now place where we dwell thee is too strait us 6 2 let us go we pray thee unto jordan take thenc everi man beam let us make us place there where we may dwell he answer go ye 6 3 one said be content i pray thee go thi servant he answer i will go 6 4 so he went them when they came jordan they cut down wood 6 5 but as one wa fell beam axe head fell water he cri said ala master it wa borrow 6 6 man god said where fell it he shew him place he cut down stick cast it thither iron did swim 6 7 therefor said he take it thee he put hi hand took it 6 8 then king syria war against israel took counsel hi servant say such such place shall be my camp 6 9 man god sent unto king israel say bewar that thou pass not such place thither syrian are come down 6 10 king israel sent place which man god told him warn him save himself there not onc nor twice 6 11 therefor heart king syria wa sore troubl thi thing he call hi servant said unto them will ye not shew me which us is king israel 6 12 one hi servant said none my lord o king but elisha prophet that is israel telleth king israel word that thou speakest thi bedchamb 6 13 he said go spi where he is that i may send fetch him it wa told him say behold he is dothan 6 14 therefor sent he thither hors chariot great host they came night compass citi 6 15 when servant man god wa risen earli gone forth behold host compass citi both hors chariot hi servant said unto him ala my master how shall we do 6 16 he answer fear not they that be us are more than they that be them 6 17 elisha pray said lord i pray thee open hi eye that he may see lord open eye young man he saw behold mountain wa full hors chariot fire round elisha 6 18 when they came down him elisha pray unto lord said smite thi peopl i pray thee blind he smote them blind accord word elisha 6 19 elisha said unto them thi is not way neither is thi citi follow me i will bring you man whom ye seek but he led them samaria 6 20 it came pass when they were come samaria that elisha said lord open eye these men that they may see lord open their eye they saw behold they were midst samaria 6 21 king israel said unto elisha when he saw them my father shall i smite them shall i smite them 6 22 he answer thou shalt not smite them wouldest thou smite those whom thou hast taken captiv thi sword thi bow set bread water them that they may eat drink go their master 6 23 he prepar great provis them when they had eaten drunk he sent them away they went their master so band syria came no more land israel 6 24 it came pass thi that benhadad king syria gather all hi host went besieg samaria 6 25 there wa great famin samaria behold they besieg it ass s head wa sold fourscor piec silver fourth part cab dove s dung five piec silver 6 26 as king israel wa pass wall there cri woman unto him say help my lord o king 6 27 he said if lord do not help thee whenc shall i help thee barnfloor or winepress 6 28 king said unto her what aileth thee she answer thi woman said unto me give thi son that we may eat him day we will eat my son morrow 6 29 so we boil my son did eat him i said unto her next day give thi son that we may eat him she hath hid her son 6 30 it came pass when king heard word woman that he rent hi cloth he pass wall peopl look behold he had sackcloth hi flesh 6 31 then he said god do so more also me if head elisha son shaphat shall stand him thi day 6 32 but elisha sat hi hous elder sat him king sent man him but ere messeng came him he said elder see ye how thi son murder hath sent take away mine head look when messeng cometh shut door hold him fast door is not sound hi master s feet behind him 6 33 while he yet talk them behold messeng came down unto him he said behold thi evil is lord what should i wait lord ani longer 7 1 then elisha said hear ye word lord thu saith lord morrow thi time shall measur fine flour be sold shekel two measur barley shekel gate samaria 7 2 then lord whose hand king lean answer man god said behold if lord would make window heaven might thi thing be he said behold thou shalt see it thine eye but shalt not eat thereof 7 3 there were four leprou men enter gate they said one anoth whi sit we here we die 7 4 if we say we will enter citi then famin is citi we shall die there if we sit still here we die also now therefor come let us fall unto host syrian if they save us aliv we shall live if they kill us we shall but die 7 5 they rose twilight go unto camp syrian when they were come uttermost part camp syria behold there wa no man there 7 6 lord had made host syrian hear nois chariot nois hors even nois great host they said one anoth lo king israel hath hire against us king hittit king egyptian come us 7 7 wherefor they aros fled twilight left their tent their hors their ass even camp as it wa fled their life 7 8 when these leper came uttermost part camp they went one tent did eat drink carri thenc silver gold raiment went hid it came again enter anoth tent carri thenc also went hid it 7 9 then they said one anoth we do not well thi day is day good tide we hold our peac if we tarri till morn light some mischief will come us now therefor come that we may go tell king s household 7 10 so they came call unto porter citi they told them say we came camp syrian behold there wa no man there neither voic man but hors tie ass tie tent as they were 7 11 he call porter they told it king s hous 7 12 king aros night said unto hi servant i will now shew you what syrian have done us they know that we be hungri therefor are they gone camp hide themselv field say when they come citi we shall catch them aliv get citi 7 13 one hi servant answer said let some take i pray thee five hors that remain which are left citi behold they are as all multitud israel that are left it behold i say they are even as all multitud israelit that are consum let us send see 7 14 they took therefor two chariot hors king sent host syrian say go see 7 15 they went them unto jordan lo all way wa full garment vessel which syrian had cast away their hast messeng return told king 7 16 peopl went spoil tent syrian so measur fine flour wa sold shekel two measur barley shekel accord word lord 7 17 king appoint lord whose hand he lean have charg gate peopl trode him gate he die as man god had said who spake when king came down him 7 18 it came pass as man god had spoken king say two measur barley shekel measur fine flour shekel shall be morrow thi time gate samaria 7 19 that lord answer man god said now behold if lord should make window heaven might such thing be he said behold thou shalt see it thine eye but shalt not eat thereof 7 20 so it fell unto him peopl trode him gate he die 8 1 then spake elisha unto woman whose son he had restor life say aris go thou thine household sojourn wheresoev thou canst sojourn lord hath call famin it shall also come land seven year 8 2 woman aros did say man god she went her household sojourn land philistin seven year 8 3 it came pass seven year end that woman return land philistin she went forth cri unto king her hous her land 8 4 king talk gehazi servant man god say tell me i pray thee all great thing that elisha hath done 8 5 it came pass as he wa tell king how he had restor dead bodi life that behold woman whose son he had restor life cri king her hous her land gehazi said my lord o king thi is woman thi is her son whom elisha restor life 8 6 when king ask woman she told him so king appoint unto her certain offic say restor all that wa her all fruit field day that she left land even now 8 7 elisha came damascu benhadad king syria wa sick it wa told him say man god is come hither 8 8 king said unto hazael take present thine hand go meet man god enquir lord him say shall i recov thi diseas 8 9 so hazael went meet him took present him even everi good thing damascu forti camel burden came stood him said thi son benhadad king syria hath sent me thee say shall i recov thi diseas 8 10 elisha said unto him go say unto him thou mayest certainli recov howbeit lord hath shew me that he shall sure die 8 11 he settl hi counten stedfastli he wa asham man god wept 8 12 hazael said whi weepeth my lord he answer becaus i know evil that thou wilt do unto children israel their strong hold wilt thou set fire their young men wilt thou slay sword wilt dash their children rip their women child 8 13 hazael said but what is thi servant dog that he should do thi great thing elisha answer lord hath shew me that thou shalt be king syria 8 14 so he depart elisha came hi master who said him what said elisha thee he answer he told me that thou shouldest sure recov 8 15 it came pass morrow that he took thick cloth dip it water spread it hi face so that he die hazael reign hi stead 8 16 fifth year joram son ahab king israel jehoshaphat be then king judah jehoram son je hoshaphat king judah began reign 8 17 thirti two year old wa he when he began reign he reign eight year jerusalem 8 18 he walk way king israel as did hous ahab daughter ahab wa hi wife he did evil sight lord 8 19 yet lord would not destroy judah david hi servant s sake as he promis him give him alway light hi children 8 20 hi day edom revolt hand judah made king themselv 8 21 so joram went zair all chariot him he rose night smote edomit which compass him captain chariot peopl fled their tent 8 22 yet edom revolt hand judah unto thi day then libnah revolt same time 8 23 rest act joram all that he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 8 24 joram slept hi father wa buri hi father citi david ahaziah hi son reign hi stead 8 25 twelfth year joram son ahab king israel did ahaziah son jehoram king judah begin reign 8 26 two twenti year old wa ahaziah when he began reign he reign one year jerusalem hi mother s name wa athaliah daughter omri king israel 8 27 he walk way hous ahab did evil sight lord as did hous ahab he wa son law hous ahab 8 28 he went joram son ahab war against hazael king syria ramothgilead syrian wound joram 8 29 king joram went back be heal jezreel wound which syrian had given him ramah when he fought against hazael king syria ahaziah son jehoram king judah went down see joram son ahab jezreel becaus he wa sick 9 1 elisha prophet call one children prophet said unto him gird thi loin take thi box oil thine hand go ramothgilead 9 2 when thou comest thither look there jehu son jehoshaphat son nimshi go make him aris hi brethren carri him inner chamber 9 3 then take box oil pour it hi head say thu saith lord i have anoint thee king israel then open door flee tarri not 9 4 so young man even young man prophet went ramothgilead 9 5 when he came behold captain host were sit he said i have errand thee o captain jehu said unto which all us he said thee o captain 9 6 he aros went hous he pour oil hi head said unto him thu saith lord god israel i have anoint thee king peopl lord even israel 9 7 thou shalt smite hous ahab thi master that i may aveng blood my servant prophet blood all servant lord hand jezebel 9 8 whole hous ahab shall perish i will cut off ahab him that pisseth against wall him that is shut left israel 9 9 i will make hous ahab like hous jeroboam son nebat like hous baasha son ahijah 9 10 dog shall eat jezebel portion jezreel there shall be none buri her he open door fled 9 11 then jehu came forth servant hi lord one said unto him is all well wherefor came thi mad fellow thee he said unto them ye know man hi commun 9 12 they said it is fals tell us now he said thu thu spake he me say thu saith lord i have anoint thee king israel 9 13 then they hast took everi man hi garment put it him top stair blew trumpet say jehu is king 9 14 so jehu son jehoshaphat son nimshi conspir against joram now joram had kept ramothgilead he all israel becaus hazael king syria 9 15 but king joram wa return be heal jezreel wound which syrian had given him when he fought hazael king syria jehu said if it be your mind then let none go forth nor escap citi go tell it jezreel 9 16 so jehu rode chariot went jezreel joram lay there ahaziah king judah wa come down see joram 9 17 there stood watchman tower jezreel he spi compani jehu as he came said i see compani joram said take horseman send meet them let him say is it peac 9 18 so there went one horseback meet him said thu saith king is it peac jehu said what hast thou do peac turn thee behind me watchman told say messeng came them but he cometh not again 9 19 then he sent second horseback which came them said thu saith king is it peac jehu answer what hast thou do peac turn thee behind me 9 20 watchman told say he came even unto them cometh not again drive is like drive jehu son nimshi he driveth furious 9 21 joram said make readi hi chariot wa made readi joram king israel ahaziah king judah went each hi chariot they went against jehu met him portion naboth jezreelit 9 22 it came pass when joram saw jehu that he said is it peac jehu he answer what peac so long as whoredom thi mother jezebel her witchcraft are so mani 9 23 joram turn hi hand fled said ahaziah there is treacheri o ahaziah 9 24 jehu drew bow hi full strength smote jehoram hi arm arrow went hi heart he sunk down hi chariot 9 25 then said jehu bidkar hi captain take cast him portion field naboth jezreelit rememb how that when i thou rode togeth ahab hi father lord laid thi burden him 9 26 sure i have seen yesterday blood naboth blood hi son saith lord i will requit thee thi plat saith lord now therefor take cast him plat ground accord word lord 9 27 but when ahaziah king judah saw thi he fled way garden hous jehu follow him said smite him also chariot they did so go gur which is ibleam he fled megiddo die there 9 28 hi servant carri him chariot jerusalem buri him hi sepulchr hi father citi david 9 29 eleventh year joram son ahab began ahaziah reign judah 9 30 when jehu wa come jezreel jezebel heard it she paint her face tire her head look window 9 31 as jehu enter gate she said had zimri peac who slew hi master 9 32 he lift hi face window said who is my side who there look him two or three eunuch 9 33 he said throw her down so they threw her down some her blood wa sprinkl wall hors he trode her foot 9 34 when he wa come he did eat drink said go see now thi curs woman buri her she is king s daughter 9 35 they went buri her but they found no more her than skull feet palm her hand 9 36 wherefor they came again told him he said thi is word lord which he spake hi servant elijah tishbit say portion jezreel shall dog eat flesh jezebel 9 37 carcas jezebel shall be as dung face field portion jezreel so that they shall not say thi is jezebel 10 1 ahab had seventi son samaria jehu wrote letter sent samaria unto ruler jezreel elder them that brought ahab s children say 10 2 now as soon as thi letter cometh you see your master s son are you there are you chariot hors fenc citi also armour 10 3 look even best meetest your master s son set him hi father s throne fight your master s hous 10 4 but they were exceedingli afraid said behold two king stood not him how then shall we stand 10 5 he that wa hous he that wa citi elder also bringer children sent jehu say we are thi servant will do all that thou shalt bid us we will not make ani king do thou that which is good thine eye 10 6 then he wrote letter second time them say if ye be mine if ye will hearken unto my voic take ye head men your master s son come me jezreel morrow thi time now king s son be seventi person were great men citi which brought them 10 7 it came pass when letter came them that they took king s son slew seventi person put their head basket sent him them jezreel 10 8 there came messeng told him say they have brought head king s son he said lay ye them two heap enter gate morn 10 9 it came pass morn that he went stood said all peopl ye be righteou behold i conspir against my master slew him but who slew all these 10 10 know now that there shall fall unto earth noth word lord which lord spake concern hous ahab lord hath done that which he spake hi servant elijah 10 11 so jehu slew all that remain hous ahab jezreel all hi great men hi kinsfolk hi priest he left him none remain 10 12 he aros depart came samaria as he wa shear hous way 10 13 jehu met brethren ahaziah king judah said who are ye they answer we are brethren ahaziah we go down salut children king children queen 10 14 he said take them aliv they took them aliv slew them pit shear hous even two forti men neither left he ani them 10 15 when he wa depart thenc he light jehonadab son rechab come meet him he salut him said him is thine heart right as my heart is thi heart jehonadab answer it is if it be give me thine hand he gave him hi hand he took him him chariot 10 16 he said come me see my zeal lord so they made him ride hi chariot 10 17 when he came samaria he slew all that remain unto ahab samaria till he had destroy him accord say lord which he spake elijah 10 18 jehu gather all peopl togeth said unto them ahab serv baal littl but jehu shall serv him much 10 19 now therefor call unto me all prophet baal all hi servant all hi priest let none be want i have great sacrific do baal whosoev shall be want he shall not live but jehu did it subtilti intent that he might destroy worshipp baal 10 20 jehu said proclaim solemn assembl baal they proclaim it 10 21 jehu sent all israel all worshipp baal came so that there wa not man left that came not they came hous baal hous baal wa full one end anoth 10 22 he said unto him that wa vestri bring forth vestment all worshipp baal he brought them forth vestment 10 23 jehu went jehonadab son rechab hous baal said unto worshipp baal search look that there be here you none servant lord but worshipp baal onli 10 24 when they went offer sacrific burnt offer jehu appoint fourscor men said if ani men whom i have brought your hand escap he that letteth him go hi life shall be life him 10 25 it came pass as soon as he had made end offer burnt offer that jehu said guard captain go slay them let none come forth they smote them edg sword guard captain cast them went citi hous baal 10 26 they brought forth imag hous baal burn them 10 27 they brake down imag baal brake down hous baal made it draught hous unto thi day 10 28 thu jehu destroy baal israel 10 29 howbeit sin jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin jehu depart not them wit golden calv that were bethel that were dan 10 30 lord said unto jehu becaus thou hast done well execut that which is right mine eye hast done unto hous ahab accord all that wa mine heart thi children fourth gener shall sit throne israel 10 31 but jehu took no heed walk law lord god israel all hi heart he depart not sin jeroboam which made israel sin 10 32 those day lord began cut israel short hazael smote them all coast israel 10 33 jordan eastward all land gilead gadit reubenit manassit aroer which is river arnon even gilead bashan 10 34 now rest act jehu all that he did all hi might are they not written book chronicl king israel 10 35 jehu slept hi father they buri him samaria jehoahaz hi son reign hi stead 10 36 time that jehu reign israel samaria wa twenti eight year 11 1 when athaliah mother ahaziah saw that her son wa dead she aros destroy all seed royal 11 2 but jehosheba daughter king joram sister ahaziah took joash son ahaziah stole him king s son which were slain they hid him even him hi nurs bedchamb athaliah so that he wa not slain 11 3 he wa her hid hous lord six year athaliah did reign land 11 4 seventh year jehoiada sent fetch ruler hundr captain guard brought them him hous lord made coven them took oath them hous lord shew them king s son 11 5 he command them say thi is thing that ye shall do third part you that enter sabbath shall even be keeper watch king s hous 11 6 third part shall be gate sur third part gate behind guard so shall ye keep watch hous that it be not broken down 11 7 two part all you that go forth sabbath even they shall keep watch hous lord king 11 8 ye shall compass king round everi man hi weapon hi hand he that cometh rang let him be slain be ye king as he goeth as he cometh 11 9 captain hundr did accord all thing that jehoiada priest command they took everi man hi men that were come sabbath them that should go sabbath came jehoiada priest 11 10 captain hundr did priest give king david s spear shield that were templ lord 11 11 guard stood everi man hi weapon hi hand round king right corner templ left corner templ altar templ 11 12 he brought forth king s son put crown him gave him testimoni they made him king anoint him they clap their hand said god save king 11 13 when athaliah heard nois guard peopl she came peopl templ lord 11 14 when she look behold king stood pillar as manner wa princ trumpet king all peopl land rejoic blew trumpet athaliah rent her cloth cri treason treason 11 15 but jehoiada priest command captain hundr offic host said unto them have her forth rang him that followeth her kill sword priest had said let her not be slain hous lord 11 16 they laid hand her she went way which hors came king s hous there wa she slain 11 17 jehoiada made coven lord king peopl that they should be lord s peopl king also peopl 11 18 all peopl land went hous baal brake it down hi altar hi imag brake they piec thoroughli slew mattan priest baal altar priest appoint offic hous lord 11 19 he took ruler hundr captain guard all peopl land they brought down king hous lord came way gate guard king s hous he sat throne king 11 20 all peopl land rejoic citi wa quiet they slew athaliah sword besid king s hous 11 21 seven year old wa jehoash when he began reign 12 1 seventh year jehu jehoash began reign forti year reign he jerusalem hi mother s name wa zibiah beersheba 12 2 jehoash did that which wa right sight lord all hi day wherein jehoiada priest instruct him 12 3 but high place were not taken away peopl still sacrif burnt incens high place 12 4 jehoash said priest all money dedic thing that is brought hous lord even money everi one that passeth account money that everi man is set all money that cometh ani man s heart bring hous lord 12 5 let priest take it them everi man hi acquaint let them repair breach hous wheresoev ani breach shall be found 12 6 but it wa so that three twentieth year king jehoash priest had not repair breach hous 12 7 then king jehoash call jehoiada priest other priest said unto them whi repair ye not breach hous now therefor receiv no more money your acquaint but deliv it breach hous 12 8 priest consent receiv no more money peopl neither repair breach hous 12 9 but jehoiada priest took chest bore hole lid it set it besid altar right side as one cometh hous lord priest that kept door put therein all money that wa brought hous lord 12 10 it wa so when they saw that there wa much money chest that king s scribe high priest came they put bag told money that wa found hous lord 12 11 they gave money be told hand them that did work that had oversight hous lord they laid it carpent builder that wrought hous lord 12 12 mason hewer stone buy timber hew stone repair breach hous lord all that wa laid hous repair it 12 13 howbeit there were not made hous lord bowl silver snuffer bason trumpet ani vessel gold or vessel silver money that wa brought hous lord 12 14 but they gave that workmen repair therewith hous lord 12 15 moreov they reckon not men whose hand they deliv money be bestow workmen they dealt faith 12 16 trespass money sin money wa not brought hous lord it wa priest 12 17 then hazael king syria went fought against gath took it hazael set hi face go jerusalem 12 18 jehoash king judah took all hallow thing that jehoshaphat jehoram ahaziah hi father king judah had dedic hi own hallow thing all gold that wa found treasur hous lord king s hous sent it hazael king syria he went away jerusalem 12 19 rest act joash all that he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 12 20 hi servant aros made conspiraci slew joash hous millo which goeth down silla 12 21 jozachar son shimeath jehozabad son shomer hi servant smote him he die they buri him hi father citi david amaziah hi son reign hi stead 13 1 three twentieth year joash son ahaziah king judah jehoahaz son jehu began reign israel samaria reign seventeen year 13 2 he did that which wa evil sight lord follow sin jeroboam son nebat which made israel sin he depart not therefrom 13 3 anger lord wa kindl against israel he deliv them hand hazael king syria hand benhadad son hazael all their day 13 4 jehoahaz besought lord lord hearken unto him he saw oppress israel becaus king syria oppress them 13 5 lord gave israel saviour so that they went hand syrian children israel dwelt their tent as beforetim 13 6 nevertheless they depart not sin hous jeroboam who made israel sin but walk therein there remain grove also samaria 13 7 neither did he leav peopl jehoahaz but fifti horsemen ten chariot ten thousand footmen king syria had destroy them had made them like dust thresh 13 8 now rest act jehoahaz all that he did hi might are they not written book chronicl king israel 13 9 jehoahaz slept hi father they buri him samaria joash hi son reign hi stead 13 10 thirti seventh year joash king judah began jehoash son jehoahaz reign israel samaria reign sixteen year 13 11 he did that which wa evil sight lord he depart not all sin jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin but he walk therein 13 12 rest act joash all that he did hi might wherewith he fought against amaziah king judah are they not written book chronicl king israel 13 13 joash slept hi father jeroboam sat hi throne joash wa buri samaria king israel 13 14 now elisha wa fallen sick hi sick whereof he die joash king israel came down unto him wept hi face said o my father my father chariot israel horsemen thereof 13 15 elisha said unto him take bow arrow he took unto him bow arrow 13 16 he said king israel put thine hand bow he put hi hand it elisha put hi hand king s hand 13 17 he said open window eastward he open it then elisha said shoot he shot he said arrow lord s deliver arrow deliver syria thou shalt smite syrian aphek till thou have consum them 13 18 he said take arrow he took them he said unto king israel smite ground he smote thrice stay 13 19 man god wa wroth him said thou shouldest have smitten five or six time then hadst thou smitten syria till thou hadst consum it wherea now thou shalt smite syria but thrice 13 20 elisha die they buri him band moabit invad land come year 13 21 it came pass as they were buri man that behold they spi band men they cast man sepulchr elisha when man wa let down touch bone elisha he reviv stood hi feet 13 22 but hazael king syria oppress israel all day jehoahaz 13 23 lord wa graciou unto them had compass them had respect unto them becaus hi coven abraham isaac jacob would not destroy them neither cast he them hi presenc as yet 13 24 so hazael king syria die benhadad hi son reign hi stead 13 25 jehoash son jehoahaz took again hand benhadad son hazael citi which he had taken hand jehoahaz hi father war three time did joash beat him recov citi israel 14 1 second year joash son jehoahaz king israel reign amaziah son joash king judah 14 2 he wa twenti five year old when he began reign reign twenti nine year jerusalem hi mother s name wa jehoaddan jerusalem 14 3 he did that which wa right sight lord yet not like david hi father he did accord all thing as joash hi father did 14 4 howbeit high place were not taken away as yet peopl did sacrific burnt incens high place 14 5 it came pass as soon as kingdom wa confirm hi hand that he slew hi servant which had slain king hi father 14 6 but children murder he slew not accord unto that which is written book law mose wherein lord command say father shall not be put death children nor children be put death father but everi man shall be put death hi own sin 14 7 he slew edom valley salt ten thousand took selah war call name it joktheel unto thi day 14 8 then amaziah sent messeng jehoash son jehoahaz son jehu king israel say come let us look one anoth face 14 9 jehoash king israel sent amaziah king judah say thistl that wa lebanon sent cedar that wa lebanon say give thi daughter my son wife there pass wild beast that wa lebanon trode down thistl 14 10 thou hast inde smitten edom thine heart hath lift thee glori thi tarri home whi shouldest thou meddl thi hurt that thou shouldest fall even thou judah thee 14 11 but amaziah would not hear therefor jehoash king israel went he amaziah king judah look one anoth face bethshemesh which belongeth judah 14 12 judah wa put wors israel they fled everi man their tent 14 13 jehoash king israel took amaziah king judah son jehoash son ahaziah bethshemesh came jerusalem brake down wall jerusalem gate ephraim unto corner gate four hundr cubit 14 14 he took all gold silver all vessel that were found hous lord treasur king s hous hostag return samaria 14 15 now rest act jehoash which he did hi might how he fought amaziah king judah are they not written book chronicl king israel 14 16 jehoash slept hi father wa buri samaria king israel jeroboam hi son reign hi stead 14 17 amaziah son joash king judah live death jehoash son jehoahaz king israel fifteen year 14 18 rest act amaziah are they not written book chronicl king judah 14 19 now they made conspiraci against him jerusalem he fled lachish but they sent him lachish slew him there 14 20 they brought him hors he wa buri jerusalem hi father citi david 14 21 all peopl judah took azariah which wa sixteen year old made him king instead hi father amaziah 14 22 he built elath restor it judah that king slept hi father 14 23 fifteenth year amaziah son joash king judah jeroboam son joash king israel began reign samaria reign forti one year 14 24 he did that which wa evil sight lord he depart not all sin jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin 14 25 he restor coast israel enter hamath unto sea plain accord word lord god israel which he spake hand hi servant jonah son amittai prophet which wa gathheph 14 26 lord saw afflict israel that it wa veri bitter there wa not ani shut nor ani left nor ani helper israel 14 27 lord said not that he would blot name israel heaven but he save them hand jeroboam son joash 14 28 now rest act jeroboam all that he did hi might how he war how he recov damascu hamath which belong judah israel are they not written book chronicl king israel 14 29 jeroboam slept hi father even king israel zachariah hi son reign hi stead 15 1 twenti seventh year jeroboam king israel began azariah son amaziah king judah reign 15 2 sixteen year old wa he when he began reign he reign two fifti year jerusalem hi mother s name wa jecholiah jerusalem 15 3 he did that which wa right sight lord accord all that hi father amaziah had done 15 4 save that high place were not remov peopl sacrif burnt incens still high place 15 5 lord smote king so that he wa leper unto day hi death dwelt sever hous jotham king s son wa hous judg peopl land 15 6 rest act azariah all that he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 15 7 so azariah slept hi father they buri him hi father citi david jotham hi son reign hi stead 15 8 thirti eighth year azariah king judah did zachariah son jeroboam reign israel samaria six month 15 9 he did that which wa evil sight lord as hi father had done he depart not sin jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin 15 10 shallum son jabesh conspir against him smote him peopl slew him reign hi stead 15 11 rest act zachariah behold they are written book chronicl king israel 15 12 thi wa word lord which he spake unto jehu say thi son shall sit throne israel unto fourth gener so it came pass 15 13 shallum son jabesh began reign nine thirtieth year uzziah king judah he reign full month samaria 15 14 menahem son gadi went tirzah came samaria smote shallum son jabesh samaria slew him reign hi stead 15 15 rest act shallum hi conspiraci which he made behold they are written book chronicl king israel 15 16 then menahem smote tiphsah all that were therein coast thereof tirzah becaus they open not him therefor he smote it all women therein that were child he rip 15 17 nine thirtieth year azariah king judah began menahem son gadi reign israel reign ten year samaria 15 18 he did that which wa evil sight lord he depart not all hi day sin jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin 15 19 pul king assyria came against land menahem gave pul thousand talent silver that hi hand might be him confirm kingdom hi hand 15 20 menahem exact money israel even all mighti men wealth each man fifti shekel silver give king assyria so king assyria turn back stay not there land 15 21 rest act menahem all that he did are they not written book chronicl king israel 15 22 menahem slept hi father pekahiah hi son reign hi stead 15 23 fiftieth year azariah king judah pekahiah son menahem began reign israel samaria reign two year 15 24 he did that which wa evil sight lord he depart not sin jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin 15 25 but pekah son remaliah captain hi conspir against him smote him samaria palac king s hous argob arieh him fifti men gileadit he kill him reign hi room 15 26 rest act pekahiah all that he did behold they are written book chronicl king israel 15 27 two fiftieth year azariah king judah pekah son remaliah began reign israel samaria reign twenti year 15 28 he did that which wa evil sight lord he depart not sin jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin 15 29 day pekah king israel came tiglathpiles king assyria took ijon abelbethmaachah janoah kedesh hazor gilead galile all land naphtali carri them captiv assyria 15 30 hoshea son elah made conspiraci against pekah son remaliah smote him slew him reign hi stead twentieth year jotham son uzziah 15 31 rest act pekah all that he did behold they are written book chronicl king israel 15 32 second year pekah son remaliah king israel began jotham son uzziah king judah reign 15 33 five twenti year old wa he when he began reign he reign sixteen year jerusalem hi mother s name wa jerusha daughter zadok 15 34 he did that which wa right sight lord he did accord all that hi father uzziah had done 15 35 howbeit high place were not remov peopl sacrif burn incens still high place he built higher gate hous lord 15 36 now rest act jotham all that he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 15 37 those day lord began send against judah rezin king syria pekah son remaliah 15 38 jotham slept hi father wa buri hi father citi david hi father ahaz hi son reign hi stead 16 1 seventeenth year pekah son remaliah ahaz son jotham king judah began reign 16 2 twenti year old wa ahaz when he began reign reign sixteen year jerusalem did not that which wa right sight lord hi god like david hi father 16 3 but he walk way king israel yea made hi son pass fire accord abomin heathen whom lord cast children israel 16 4 he sacrif burnt incens high place hill everi green tree 16 5 then rezin king syria pekah son remaliah king israel came jerusalem war they besieg ahaz but could not overcom him 16 6 that time rezin king syria recov elath syria drave jew elath syrian came elath dwelt there unto thi day 16 7 so ahaz sent messeng tiglathpiles king assyria say i am thi servant thi son come save me hand king syria hand king israel which rise against me 16 8 ahaz took silver gold that wa found hous lord treasur king s hous sent it present king assyria 16 9 king assyria hearken unto him king assyria went against damascu took it carri peopl it captiv kir slew rezin 16 10 king ahaz went damascu meet tiglathpiles king assyria saw altar that wa damascu king ahaz sent urijah priest fashion altar pattern it accord all workmanship thereof 16 11 urijah priest built altar accord all that king ahaz had sent damascu so urijah priest made it against king ahaz came damascu 16 12 when king wa come damascu king saw altar king approach altar offer thereon 16 13 he burnt hi burnt offer hi meat offer pour hi drink offer sprinkl blood hi peac offer altar 16 14 he brought also brasen altar which wa lord forefront hous altar hous lord put it north side altar 16 15 king ahaz command urijah priest say great altar burn morn burnt offer even meat offer king s burnt sacrific hi meat offer burnt offer all peopl land their meat offer their drink offer sprinkl it all blood burnt offer all blood sacrific brasen altar shall be me enquir 16 16 thu did urijah priest accord all that king ahaz command 16 17 king ahaz cut off border base remov laver off them took down sea off brasen oxen that were it put it pavement stone 16 18 covert sabbath that they had built hous king s entri turn he hous lord king assyria 16 19 now rest act ahaz which he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 16 20 ahaz slept hi father wa buri hi father citi david hezekiah hi son reign hi stead 17 1 twelfth year ahaz king judah began hoshea son elah reign samaria israel nine year 17 2 he did that which wa evil sight lord but not as king israel that were him 17 3 against him came shalmanes king assyria hoshea becam hi servant gave him present 17 4 king assyria found conspiraci hoshea he had sent messeng so king egypt brought no present king assyria as he had done year year therefor king assyria shut him bound him prison 17 5 then king assyria came all land went samaria besieg it three year 17 6 ninth year hoshea king assyria took samaria carri israel away assyria place them halah habor river gozan citi mede 17 7 so it wa that children israel had sin against lord their god which had brought them land egypt hand pharaoh king egypt had fear other god 17 8 walk statut heathen whom lord cast children israel king israel which they had made 17 9 children israel did secretli those thing that were not right against lord their god they built them high place all their citi tower watchmen fenc citi 17 10 they set them imag grove everi high hill everi green tree 17 11 there they burnt incens all high place as did heathen whom lord carri away them wrought wick thing provok lord anger 17 12 they serv idol whereof lord had said unto them ye shall not do thi thing 17 13 yet lord testifi against israel against judah all prophet all seer say turn ye your evil way keep my command my statut accord all law which i command your father which i sent you my servant prophet 17 14 notwithstand they would not hear but harden their neck like neck their father that did not believ lord their god 17 15 they reject hi statut hi coven that he made their father hi testimoni which he testifi against them they follow vaniti becam vain went heathen that were round them concern whom lord had charg them that they should not do like them 17 16 they left all command lord their god made them molten imag even two calv made grove worship all host heaven serv baal 17 17 they caus their son their daughter pass fire use divin enchant sold themselv do evil sight lord provok him anger 17 18 therefor lord wa veri angri israel remov them hi sight there wa none left but tribe judah onli 17 19 also judah kept not command lord their god but walk statut israel which they made 17 20 lord reject all seed israel afflict them deliv them hand spoiler he had cast them hi sight 17 21 he rent israel hous david they made jeroboam son nebat king jeroboam drave israel follow lord made them sin great sin 17 22 children israel walk all sin jeroboam which he did they depart not them 17 23 lord remov israel hi sight as he had said all hi servant prophet so wa israel carri away their own land assyria unto thi day 17 24 king assyria brought men babylon cuthah ava hamath sepharvaim place them citi samaria instead children israel they possess samaria dwelt citi thereof 17 25 so it wa begin their dwell there that they fear not lord therefor lord sent lion them which slew some them 17 26 wherefor they spake king assyria say nation which thou hast remov place citi samaria know not manner god land therefor he hath sent lion them behold they slay them becaus they know not manner god land 17 27 then king assyria command say carri thither one priest whom ye brought thenc let them go dwell there let him teach them manner god land 17 28 then one priest whom they had carri away samaria came dwelt bethel taught them how they should fear lord 17 29 howbeit everi nation made god their own put them hous high place which samaritan had made everi nation their citi wherein they dwelt 17 30 men babylon made succothbenoth men cuth made nergal men hamath made ashima 17 31 avit made nibhaz tartak sepharvit burnt their children fire adrammelech anammelech god sepharvaim 17 32 so they fear lord made unto themselv lowest them priest high place which sacrif them hous high place 17 33 they fear lord serv their own god manner nation whom they carri away thenc 17 34 unto thi day they do former manner they fear not lord neither do they their statut or their ordin or law command which lord command children jacob whom he name israel 17 35 whom lord had made coven charg them say ye shall not fear other god nor bow yourselv them nor serv them nor sacrific them 17 36 but lord who brought you land egypt great power stretch arm him shall ye fear him shall ye worship him shall ye do sacrific 17 37 statut ordin law command which he wrote you ye shall observ do evermor ye shall not fear other god 17 38 coven that i have made you ye shall not forget neither shall ye fear other god 17 39 but lord your god ye shall fear he shall deliv you hand all your enemi 17 40 howbeit they did not hearken but they did their former manner 17 41 so these nation fear lord serv their graven imag both their children their children s children as did their father so do they unto thi day 18 1 now it came pass third year hoshea son elah king israel that hezekiah son ahaz king judah began reign 18 2 twenti five year old wa he when he began reign he reign twenti nine year jerusalem hi mother s name also wa abi daughter zachariah 18 3 he did that which wa right sight lord accord all that david hi father did 18 4 he remov high place brake imag cut down grove brake piec brasen serpent that mose had made unto those day children israel did burn incens it he call it nehushtan 18 5 he trust lord god israel so that him wa none like him all king judah nor ani that were him 18 6 he clave lord depart not follow him but kept hi command which lord command mose 18 7 lord wa him he prosper whithersoev he went forth he rebel against king assyria serv him not 18 8 he smote philistin even unto gaza border thereof tower watchmen fenc citi 18 9 it came pass fourth year king hezekiah which wa seventh year hoshea son elah king israel that shalmanes king assyria came against samaria besieg it 18 10 end three year they took it even sixth year hezekiah that is ninth year hoshea king israel samaria wa taken 18 11 king assyria did carri away israel unto assyria put them halah habor river gozan citi mede 18 12 becaus they obey not voic lord their god but transgress hi coven all that mose servant lord command would not hear them nor do them 18 13 now fourteenth year king hezekiah did sennacherib king assyria come against all fenc citi judah took them 18 14 hezekiah king judah sent king assyria lachish say i have offend return me that which thou puttest me will i bear king assyria appoint unto hezekiah king judah three hundr talent silver thirti talent gold 18 15 hezekiah gave him all silver that wa found hous lord treasur king s hous 18 16 that time did hezekiah cut off gold door templ lord pillar which hezekiah king judah had overlaid gave it king assyria 18 17 king assyria sent tartan rabsari rabshakeh lachish king hezekiah great host against jerusalem they went came jerusalem when they were come they came stood conduit upper pool which is highway fuller s field 18 18 when they had call king there came them eliakim son hilkiah which wa household shebna scribe joah son asaph record 18 19 rabshakeh said unto them speak ye now hezekiah thu saith great king king assyria what confid is thi wherein thou trustest 18 20 thou sayest but they are but vain word i have counsel strength war now whom dost thou trust that thou rebellest against me 18 21 now behold thou trustest staff thi bruis reed even egypt which if man lean it will go hi hand pierc it so is pharaoh king egypt unto all that trust him 18 22 but if ye say unto me we trust lord our god is not that he whose high place whose altar hezekiah hath taken away hath said judah jerusalem ye shall worship thi altar jerusalem 18 23 now therefor i pray thee give pledg my lord king assyria i will deliv thee two thousand hors if thou be abl thi part set rider them 18 24 how then wilt thou turn away face one captain least my master s servant put thi trust egypt chariot horsemen 18 25 am i now come lord against thi place destroy it lord said me go against thi land destroy it 18 26 then said eliakim son hilkiah shebna joah unto rabshakeh speak i pray thee thi servant syrian languag we understand it talk not us jew languag ear peopl that are wall 18 27 but rabshakeh said unto them hath my master sent me thi master thee speak these word hath he not sent me men which sit wall that they may eat their own dung drink their own piss you 18 28 then rabshakeh stood cri loud voic jew languag spake say hear word great king king assyria 18 29 thu saith king let not hezekiah deceiv you he shall not be abl deliv you hi hand 18 30 neither let hezekiah make you trust lord say lord will sure deliv us thi citi shall not be deliv hand king assyria 18 31 hearken not hezekiah thu saith king assyria make agreement me present come me then eat ye everi man hi own vine everi one hi fig tree drink ye everi one water hi cistern 18 32 i come take you away land like your own land land corn wine land bread vineyard land oil oliv honey that ye may live not die hearken not unto hezekiah when he persuadeth you say lord will deliv us 18 33 hath ani god nation deliv all hi land hand king assyria 18 34 where are god hamath arpad where are god sepharvaim hena ivah have they deliv samaria mine hand 18 35 who are they all god countri that have deliv their countri mine hand that lord should deliv jerusalem mine hand 18 36 but peopl held their peac answer him not word king s command wa say answer him not 18 37 then came eliakim son hilkiah which wa household shebna scribe joah son asaph record hezekiah their cloth rent told him word rabshakeh 19 1 it came pass when king hezekiah heard it that he rent hi cloth cover himself sackcloth went hous lord 19 2 he sent eliakim which wa household shebna scribe elder priest cover sackcloth isaiah prophet son amoz 19 3 they said unto him thu saith hezekiah thi day is day troubl rebuk blasphemi children are come birth there is not strength bring forth 19 4 it may be lord thi god will hear all word rabshakeh whom king assyria hi master hath sent reproach live god will reprov word which lord thi god hath heard wherefor lift thi prayer remnant that are left 19 5 so servant king hezekiah came isaiah 19 6 isaiah said unto them thu shall ye say your master thu saith lord be not afraid word which thou hast heard which servant king assyria have blasphem me 19 7 behold i will send blast him he shall hear rumour shall return hi own land i will caus him fall sword hi own land 19 8 so rabshakeh return found king assyria war against libnah he had heard that he wa depart lachish 19 9 when he heard say tirhakah king ethiopia behold he is come fight against thee he sent messeng again unto hezekiah say 19 10 thu shall ye speak hezekiah king judah say let not thi god whom thou trustest deceiv thee say jerusalem shall not be deliv hand king assyria 19 11 behold thou hast heard what king assyria have done all land destroy them utterli shalt thou be deliv 19 12 have god nation deliv them which my father have destroy as gozan haran rezeph children eden which were thelasar 19 13 where is king hamath king arpad king citi sepharvaim hena ivah 19 14 hezekiah receiv letter hand messeng read it hezekiah went hous lord spread it lord 19 15 hezekiah pray lord said o lord god israel which dwellest cherubim thou art god even thou alon all kingdom earth thou hast made heaven earth 19 16 lord bow down thine ear hear open lord thine eye see hear word sennacherib which hath sent him reproach live god 19 17 truth lord king assyria have destroy nation their land 19 18 have cast their god fire they were no god but work men s hand wood stone therefor they have destroy them 19 19 now therefor o lord our god i beseech thee save thou us hi hand that all kingdom earth may know that thou art lord god even thou onli 19 20 then isaiah son amoz sent hezekiah say thu saith lord god israel that which thou hast pray me against sennacherib king assyria i have heard 19 21 thi is word that lord hath spoken concern him virgin daughter zion hath despis thee laugh thee scorn daughter jerusalem hath shaken her head thee 19 22 whom hast thou reproach blasphem against whom hast thou exalt thi voic lift thine eye high even against holi one israel 19 23 thi messeng thou hast reproach lord hast said multitud my chariot i am come height mountain side lebanon will cut down tall cedar tree thereof choic fir tree thereof i will enter lodg hi border forest hi carmel 19 24 i have dig drunk strang water sole my feet have i dri all river besieg place 19 25 hast thou not heard long ago how i have done it ancient time that i have form it now have i brought it pass that thou shouldest be lay wast fenc citi ruinou heap 19 26 therefor their inhabit were small power they were dismay confound they were as grass field as green herb as grass hous top as corn blast it be grown 19 27 but i know thi abod thi go thi come thi rage against me 19 28 becaus thi rage against me thi tumult is come mine ear therefor i will put my hook thi nose my bridl thi lip i will turn thee back way which thou camest 19 29 thi shall be sign unto thee ye shall eat thi year such thing as grow themselv second year that which springeth same third year sow ye reap plant vineyard eat fruit thereof 19 30 remnant that is escap hous judah shall yet again take root downward bear fruit upward 19 31 jerusalem shall go forth remnant they that escap mount zion zeal lord host shall do thi 19 32 therefor thu saith lord concern king assyria he shall not come thi citi nor shoot arrow there nor come it shield nor cast bank against it 19 33 way that he came same shall he return shall not come thi citi saith lord 19 34 i will defend thi citi save it mine own sake my servant david s sake 19 35 it came pass that night that angel lord went smote camp assyrian hundr fourscor five thousand when they aros earli morn behold they were all dead corps 19 36 so sennacherib king assyria depart went return dwelt nineveh 19 37 it came pass as he wa worship hous nisroch hi god that adrammelech sharez hi son smote him sword they escap land armenia esarhaddon hi son reign hi stead 20 1 those day wa hezekiah sick unto death prophet isaiah son amoz came him said unto him thu saith lord set thine hous order thou shalt die not live 20 2 then he turn hi face wall pray unto lord say 20 3 i beseech thee o lord rememb now how i have walk thee truth perfect heart have done that which is good thi sight hezekiah wept sore 20 4 it came pass afor isaiah wa gone middl court that word lord came him say 20 5 turn again tell hezekiah captain my peopl thu saith lord god david thi father i have heard thi prayer i have seen thi tear behold i will heal thee third day thou shalt go unto hous lord 20 6 i will add unto thi day fifteen
