year i will deliv thee thi citi hand king assyria i will defend thi citi mine own sake my servant david s sake 20 7 isaiah said take lump fig they took laid it boil he recov 20 8 hezekiah said unto isaiah what shall be sign that lord will heal me that i shall go hous lord third day 20 9 isaiah said thi sign shalt thou have lord that lord will do thing that he hath spoken shall shadow go forward ten degre or go back ten degre 20 10 hezekiah answer it is light thing shadow go down ten degre nay but let shadow return backward ten degre 20 11 isaiah prophet cri unto lord he brought shadow ten degre backward which it had gone down dial ahaz 20 12 that time berodachbaladan son baladan king babylon sent letter present unto hezekiah he had heard that hezekiah had been sick 20 13 hezekiah hearken unto them shew them all hous hi preciou thing silver gold spice preciou ointment all hous hi armour all that wa found hi treasur there wa noth hi hous nor all hi dominion that hezekiah shew them not 20 14 then came isaiah prophet unto king hezekiah said unto him what said these men whenc came they unto thee hezekiah said they are come far countri even babylon 20 15 he said what have they seen thine hous hezekiah answer all thing that are mine hous have they seen there is noth my treasur that i have not shew them 20 16 isaiah said unto hezekiah hear word lord 20 17 behold day come that all that is thine hous that which thi father have laid store unto thi day shall be carri babylon noth shall be left saith lord 20 18 thi son that shall issu thee which thou shalt beget shall they take away they shall be eunuch palac king babylon 20 19 then said hezekiah unto isaiah good is word lord which thou hast spoken he said is it not good if peac truth be my day 20 20 rest act hezekiah all hi might how he made pool conduit brought water citi are they not written book chronicl king judah 20 21 hezekiah slept hi father manasseh hi son reign hi stead 21 1 manasseh wa twelv year old when he began reign reign fifti five year jerusalem hi mother s name wa hephzibah 21 2 he did that which wa evil sight lord abomin heathen whom lord cast children israel 21 3 he built again high place which hezekiah hi father had destroy he rear altar baal made grove as did ahab king israel worship all host heaven serv them 21 4 he built altar hous lord which lord said jerusalem will i put my name 21 5 he built altar all host heaven two court hous lord 21 6 he made hi son pass fire observ time use enchant dealt familiar spirit wizard he wrought much wicked sight lord provok him anger 21 7 he set graven imag grove that he had made hous which lord said david solomon hi son thi hous jerusalem which i have chosen all tribe israel will i put my name ever 21 8 neither will i make feet israel move ani more land which i gave their father onli if they will observ do accord all that i have command them accord all law that my servant mose command them 21 9 but they hearken not manasseh seduc them do more evil than did nation whom lord destroy children israel 21 10 lord spake hi servant prophet say 21 11 becaus manasseh king judah hath done these abomin hath done wickedli all that amorit did which were him hath made judah also sin hi idol 21 12 therefor thu saith lord god israel behold i am bring such evil jerusalem judah that whosoev heareth it both hi ear shall tingl 21 13 i will stretch jerusalem line samaria plummet hous ahab i will wipe jerusalem as man wipeth dish wipe it turn it upsid down 21 14 i will forsak remnant mine inherit deliv them hand their enemi they shall becom prey spoil all their enemi 21 15 becaus they have done that which wa evil my sight have provok me anger day their father came forth egypt even unto thi day 21 16 moreov manasseh shed innoc blood veri much till he had fill jerusalem one end anoth besid hi sin wherewith he made judah sin do that which wa evil sight lord 21 17 now rest act manasseh all that he did hi sin that he sin are they not written book chronicl king judah 21 18 manasseh slept hi father wa buri garden hi own hous garden uzza amon hi son reign hi stead 21 19 amon wa twenti two year old when he began reign he reign two year jerusalem hi mother s name wa meshullemeth daughter haruz jotbah 21 20 he did that which wa evil sight lord as hi father manasseh did 21 21 he walk all way that hi father walk serv idol that hi father serv worship them 21 22 he forsook lord god hi father walk not way lord 21 23 servant amon conspir against him slew king hi own hous 21 24 peopl land slew all them that had conspir against king amon peopl land made josiah hi son king hi stead 21 25 now rest act amon which he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 21 26 he wa buri hi sepulchr garden uzza josiah hi son reign hi stead 22 1 josiah wa eight year old when he began reign he reign thirti one year jerusalem hi mother s name wa jedidah daughter adaiah boscath 22 2 he did that which wa right sight lord walk all way david hi father turn not asid right hand or left 22 3 it came pass eighteenth year king josiah that king sent shaphan son azaliah son meshullam scribe hous lord say 22 4 go hilkiah high priest that he may sum silver which is brought hous lord which keeper door have gather peopl 22 5 let them deliv it hand doer work that have oversight hous lord let them give it doer work which is hous lord repair breach hous 22 6 unto carpent builder mason buy timber hewn stone repair hous 22 7 howbeit there wa no reckon made them money that wa deliv their hand becaus they dealt faith 22 8 hilkiah high priest said unto shaphan scribe i have found book law hous lord hilkiah gave book shaphan he read it 22 9 shaphan scribe came king brought king word again said thi servant have gather money that wa found hous have deliv it hand them that do work that have oversight hous lord 22 10 shaphan scribe shew king say hilkiah priest hath deliv me book shaphan read it king 22 11 it came pass when king had heard word book law that he rent hi cloth 22 12 king command hilkiah priest ahikam son shaphan achbor son michaiah shaphan scribe asahiah servant king s say 22 13 go ye enquir lord me peopl all judah concern word thi book that is found great is wrath lord that is kindl against us becaus our father have not hearken unto word thi book do accord unto all that which is written concern us 22 14 so hilkiah priest ahikam achbor shaphan asahiah went unto huldah prophetess wife shallum son tikvah son harha keeper wardrob now she dwelt jerusalem colleg they commun her 22 15 she said unto them thu saith lord god israel tell man that sent you me 22 16 thu saith lord behold i will bring evil thi place inhabit thereof even all word book which king judah hath read 22 17 becaus they have forsaken me have burn incens unto other god that they might provok me anger all work their hand therefor my wrath shall be kindl against thi place shall not be quench 22 18 but king judah which sent you enquir lord thu shall ye say him thu saith lord god israel as touch word which thou hast heard 22 19 becaus thine heart wa tender thou hast humbl thyself lord when thou heardest what i spake against thi place against inhabit thereof that they should becom desol curs hast rent thi cloth wept me i also have heard thee saith lord 22 20 behold therefor i will gather thee unto thi father thou shalt be gather thi grave peac thine eye shall not see all evil which i will bring thi place they brought king word again 23 1 king sent they gather unto him all elder judah jerusalem 23 2 king went hous lord all men judah all inhabit jerusalem him priest prophet all peopl both small great he read their ear all word book coven which wa found hous lord 23 3 king stood pillar made coven lord walk lord keep hi command hi testimoni hi statut all their heart all their soul perform word thi coven that were written thi book all peopl stood coven 23 4 king command hilkiah high priest priest second order keeper door bring forth templ lord all vessel that were made baal grove all host heaven he burn them jerusalem field kidron carri ash them unto bethel 23 5 he put down idolatr priest whom king judah had ordain burn incens high place citi judah place round jerusalem them also that burn incens unto baal sun moon planet all host heaven 23 6 he brought grove hous lord jerusalem unto brook kidron burn it brook kidron stamp it small powder cast powder thereof grave children peopl 23 7 he brake down hous sodomit that were hous lord where women wove hang grove 23 8 he brought all priest citi judah defil high place where priest had burn incens geba beersheba brake down high place gate that were enter gate joshua governor citi which were man s left hand gate citi 23 9 nevertheless priest high place came not altar lord jerusalem but they did eat unleaven bread their brethren 23 10 he defil topheth which is valley children hinnom that no man might make hi son or hi daughter pass fire molech 23 11 he took away hors that king judah had given sun enter hous lord chamber nathanmelech chamberlain which wa suburb burn chariot sun fire 23 12 altar that were top upper chamber ahaz which king judah had made altar which manasseh had made two court hous lord did king beat down brake them down thenc cast dust them brook kidron 23 13 high place that were jerusalem which were right hand mount corrupt which solomon king israel had build ashtoreth abomin zidonian chemosh abomin moabit milcom abomin children ammon did king defil 23 14 he brake piec imag cut down grove fill their place bone men 23 15 moreov altar that wa bethel high place which jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin had made both that altar high place he brake down burn high place stamp it small powder burn grove 23 16 as josiah turn himself he spi sepulchr that were there mount sent took bone sepulchr burn them altar pollut it accord word lord which man god proclaim who proclaim these word 23 17 then he said what titl is that that i see men citi told him it is sepulchr man god which came judah proclaim these thing that thou hast done against altar bethel 23 18 he said let him alon let no man move hi bone so they let hi bone alon bone prophet that came samaria 23 19 all hous also high place that were citi samaria which king israel had made provok lord anger josiah took away did them accord all act that he had done bethel 23 20 he slew all priest high place that were there altar burn men s bone them return jerusalem 23 21 king command all peopl say keep passov unto lord your god as it is written book thi coven 23 22 sure there wa not holden such passov day judg that judg israel nor all day king israel nor king judah 23 23 but eighteenth year king josiah wherein thi passov wa holden lord jerusalem 23 24 moreov worker familiar spirit wizard imag idol all abomin that were spi land judah jerusalem did josiah put away that he might perform word law which were written book that hilkiah priest found hous lord 23 25 like unto him wa there no king him that turn lord all hi heart all hi soul all hi might accord all law mose neither him aros there ani like him 23 26 notwithstand lord turn not fierc hi great wrath wherewith hi anger wa kindl against judah becaus all provoc that manasseh had provok him withal 23 27 lord said i will remov judah also my sight as i have remov israel will cast off thi citi jerusalem which i have chosen hous which i said my name shall be there 23 28 now rest act josiah all that he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 23 29 hi day pharaohnechoh king egypt went against king assyria river euphrat king josiah went against him he slew him megiddo when he had seen him 23 30 hi servant carri him chariot dead megiddo brought him jerusalem buri him hi own sepulchr peopl land took jehoahaz son josiah anoint him made him king hi father s stead 23 31 jehoahaz wa twenti three year old when he began reign he reign three month jerusalem hi mother s name wa hamut daughter jeremiah libnah 23 32 he did that which wa evil sight lord accord all that hi father had done 23 33 pharaohnechoh put him band riblah land hamath that he might not reign jerusalem put land tribut hundr talent silver talent gold 23 34 pharaohnechoh made eliakim son josiah king room josiah hi father turn hi name jehoiakim took jehoahaz away he came egypt die there 23 35 jehoiakim gave silver gold pharaoh but he tax land give money accord command pharaoh he exact silver gold peopl land everi one accord hi taxat give it unto pharaohnechoh 23 36 jehoiakim wa twenti five year old when he began reign he reign eleven year jerusalem hi mother s name wa zebudah daughter pedaiah rumah 23 37 he did that which wa evil sight lord accord all that hi father had done 24 1 hi day nebuchadnezzar king babylon came jehoiakim becam hi servant three year then he turn rebel against him 24 2 lord sent against him band chalde band syrian band moabit band children ammon sent them against judah destroy it accord word lord which he spake hi servant prophet 24 3 sure command lord came thi judah remov them hi sight sin manasseh accord all that he did 24 4 also innoc blood that he shed he fill jerusalem innoc blood which lord would not pardon 24 5 now rest act jehoiakim all that he did are they not written book chronicl king judah 24 6 so jehoiakim slept hi father jehoiachin hi son reign hi stead 24 7 king egypt came not again ani more hi land king babylon had taken river egypt unto river euphrat all that pertain king egypt 24 8 jehoiachin wa eighteen year old when he began reign he reign jerusalem three month hi mother s name wa nehushta daughter elnathan jerusalem 24 9 he did that which wa evil sight lord accord all that hi father had done 24 10 that time servant nebuchadnezzar king babylon came against jerusalem citi wa besieg 24 11 nebuchadnezzar king babylon came against citi hi servant did besieg it 24 12 jehoiachin king judah went king babylon he hi mother hi servant hi princ hi offic king babylon took him eighth year hi reign 24 13 he carri thenc all treasur hous lord treasur king s hous cut piec all vessel gold which solomon king israel had made templ lord as lord had said 24 14 he carri away all jerusalem all princ all mighti men valour even ten thousand captiv all craftsmen smith none remain save poorest sort peopl land 24 15 he carri away jehoiachin babylon king s mother king s wive hi offic mighti land those carri he captiv jerusalem babylon 24 16 all men might even seven thousand craftsmen smith thousand all that were strong apt war even them king babylon brought captiv babylon 24 17 king babylon made mattaniah hi father s brother king hi stead chang hi name zedekiah 24 18 zedekiah wa twenti one year old when he began reign he reign eleven year jerusalem hi mother s name wa hamut daughter jeremiah libnah 24 19 he did that which wa evil sight lord accord all that jehoiakim had done 24 20 anger lord it came pass jerusalem judah he had cast them hi presenc that zedekiah rebel against king babylon 25 1 it came pass ninth year hi reign tenth month tenth day month that nebuchadnezzar king babylon came he all hi host against jerusalem pitch against it they built fort against it round 25 2 citi wa besieg unto eleventh year king zedekiah 25 3 ninth day fourth month famin prevail citi there wa no bread peopl land 25 4 citi wa broken all men war fled night way gate two wall which is king s garden now chalde were against citi round king went way plain 25 5 armi chalde pursu king overtook him plain jericho all hi armi were scatter him 25 6 so they took king brought him king babylon riblah they gave judgment him 25 7 they slew son zedekiah hi eye put eye zedekiah bound him fetter brass carri him babylon 25 8 fifth month seventh day month which is nineteenth year king nebuchadnezzar king babylon came nebuzaradan captain guard servant king babylon unto jerusalem 25 9 he burnt hous lord king s hous all hous jerusalem everi great man s hous burnt he fire 25 10 all armi chalde that were captain guard brake down wall jerusalem round 25 11 now rest peopl that were left citi fugit that fell away king babylon remnant multitud did nebuzaradan captain guard carri away 25 12 but captain guard left door poor land be vinedress husbandmen 25 13 pillar brass that were hous lord base brasen sea that wa hous lord did chalde break piec carri brass them babylon 25 14 pot shovel snuffer spoon all vessel brass wherewith they minist took they away 25 15 firepan bowl such thing as were gold gold silver silver captain guard took away 25 16 two pillar one sea base which solomon had made hous lord brass all these vessel wa weight 25 17 height one pillar wa eighteen cubit chapit it wa brass height chapit three cubit wreathen work pomegran chapit round all brass like unto these had second pillar wreathen work 25 18 captain guard took seraiah chief priest zephaniah second priest three keeper door 25 19 citi he took offic that wa set men war five men them that were king s presenc which were found citi princip scribe host which muster peopl land threescor men peopl land that were found citi 25 20 nebuzaradan captain guard took these brought them king babylon riblah 25 21 king babylon smote them slew them riblah land hamath so judah wa carri away their land 25 22 as peopl that remain land judah whom nebuchadnezzar king babylon had left even them he made gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan ruler 25 23 when all captain armi they their men heard that king babylon had made gedaliah governor there jew chalde that were him mizpah 25 26 all peopl both small great captain armi aros came egypt they were afraid chalde 25 27 it came pass seven thirtieth year captiv jehoiachin king judah twelfth month them becaus they put their trust him 5 21 they took away their cattl their camel fifti thousand sheep two hundr fifti thousand ass two thousand men hundr thousand 5 22 there fell down mani slain becaus war wa god they dwelt their stead captiv 5 23 children half tribe manasseh dwelt land they increas bashan unto baalhermon senir unto mount hermon 5 24 these were head hous their father even son azel 10 1 now philistin fought against israel men israel fled philistin fell down slain mount gilboa 10 2 philistin follow hard saul hi son philistin slew jonathan abinadab malchishua son saul 10 3 battl went sore against saul archer hit him he wa wound archer 10 4 then said saul hi armourbear draw thi sword thrust me therewith lest these uncircumcis come abus me but hi armourbear would not he wa sore afraid so saul took sword fell it 10 5 when hi armourbear saw that saul wa dead he fell likewis sword die 10 6 so saul die hi three son all hi hous die togeth 10 7 when all men israel that were valley saw that they fled that saul hi son were dead then they forsook their citi fled philistin came dwelt them 10 8 it came pass morrow when philistin came strip slain that they found saul hi son fallen mount gilboa 10 9 when they had strip him they took hi head hi armour sent land philistin round carri tide unto their idol peopl 10 10 they put hi armour hous their god fasten hi head templ dagon 10 11 when all jabeshgilead heard all that philistin had done saul 10 12 they aros all valiant men took away bodi saul bodi hi son brought them jabesh buri their bone oak jabesh fast seven day 10 13 so saul die hi transgress which he commit against lord even against word lord which he kept not also ask counsel one that had familiar spirit enquir it 10 14 enquir not lord therefor he slew him turn kingdom unto david son jess 11 1 then all israel gather themselv david unto hebron say behold we are thi bone thi flesh 11 2 moreov time past even when saul wa king thou wast he that leddest broughtest israel lord thi god said unto thee thou shalt feed my peopl israel thou shalt be ruler my peopl israel 11 3 therefor came all elder israel king hebron david made coven them hebron lord they anoint david king israel accord word lord samuel 11 4 david all israel went jerusalem which is jebu where jebusit were inhabit land 11 5 inhabit jebu said david thou shalt not come hither nevertheless david took castl zion which is citi david 11 6 david said whosoev smiteth jebusit first shall be chief captain so joab son zeruiah went first wa chief 11 7 david dwelt castl therefor they call it citi david 11 8 he built citi round even millo round joab repair rest citi 11 9 so david wax greater greater lord host wa him 11 10 these also are chief mighti men whom david had who strengthen themselv him hi kingdom all israel make him king accord word lord concern israel 11 11 thi is number mighti men whom david had jashobeam hachmonit chief captain he lift hi spear against three hundr slain him they set themselv midst that parcel deliv it slew philistin lord save them great deliver 11 15 now three thirti captain went down rock david cave adullam host philistin encamp valley rephaim 11 16 david wa then hold philistin garrison wa then bethlehem 11 17 david long said oh that one would give me drink water well bethlehem that is gate 11 18 three brake host philistin drew water well bethlehem that wa gate took it brought it david but david would not drink it but pour it lord 11 19 said my god forbid it me that i should do thi thing shall i drink blood these men that have put their live jeopardi jeopardi their live they brought it therefor he would not drink it these thing did these three mightiest 11 20 abishai brother joab he wa chief three lift hi spear against three hundr he slew them had name three 11 21 three he wa more honour than two he wa their captain howbeit he attain not first three 11 22 benaiah son jehoiada son valiant man kabzeel who had done mani act offer god 16 2 when david had made end offer burnt offer peac offer he bless peopl name lord 16 3 he dealt everi one israel both man woman everi one loaf bread good piec flesh flagon wine 16 4 he made sound cymbal 16 6 benaiah also jahaziel priest trumpet continu ark coven god 16 7 then that day david deliv first thi psalm thank lord hand asaph hi brethren 16 8 give thank unto lord call hi name make known hi deed peopl 16 9 sing unto him sing psalm unto him talk ye all hi wondrou work 16 10 glori ye hi holi name let heart them rejoic that seek lord 16 11 seek lord hi strength seek hi face continu 16 12 rememb hi marvel work that he hath done hi wonder judgment hi mouth 16 13 o ye seed israel hi servant ye children jacob hi chosen one 16 14 he is lord our god hi judgment are all earth 16 15 be ye mind alway hi coven word which he command thousand gener 16 16 even coven which he made abraham hi oath unto isaac 16 17 hath confirm same jacob law israel everlast coven 16 18 say unto thee will i give land canaan lot your inherit 16 19 when ye were but few even few stranger it 16 20 when they went nation nation one kingdom anoth peopl 16 21 he suffer no man do them wrong yea he reprov king their sake 16 22 say touch not mine anoint do my prophet no harm 16 23 sing unto lord all earth shew forth day day hi salvat 16 24 declar hi glori heathen hi marvel work all nation 16 25 great is lord greatli be prais he also is be fear all god 16 26 all god peopl are idol but lord made heaven 16 27 glori honour are hi presenc strength glad are hi place 16 28 give unto lord ye kindr peopl give unto lord glori strength 16 29 give unto lord glori due unto hi name bring offer come him worship lord beauti holi 16 30 fear him all earth world also shall be stabl that it be not move 16 31 let heaven be glad let earth rejoic let men say nation lord reigneth 16 32 let sea roar ful thereof let field rejoic all that is therein 16 33 then shall tree wood sing presenc lord becaus he cometh judg earth 16 34 o give thank unto lord he is good hi merci endureth ever 16 35 say ye save us o god our salvat gather us togeth deliv us heathen that we may give thank thi holi name glori thi prais 16 36 bless be lord god israel ever ever all peopl said amen prais lord 16 37 so he left there ark coven lord asaph hi brethren minist ark continu as everi day s work requir 16 38 obededom their brethren threescor eight obededom also son jeduthun hosah be porter 16 39 zadok priest hi brethren priest tabernacl lord high place that wa gibeon 16 40 offer burnt offer unto lord altar burnt offer continu morn even do accord all that is written law lord which he command israel 16 41 them heman jeduthun rest that were chosen who were express name give thank lord becaus hi merci endureth ever 16 42 them heman jeduthun trumpet cymbal those that should make sound music instrument god son jeduthun were porter 16 43 all peopl depart everi man hi hous david return bless hi hous 17 1 now it came pass as david sat hi hous that david said nathan prophet lo i dwell hous cedar but ark coven lord remaineth curtain 17 2 then nathan said unto david do all that is thine heart god is thee 17 3 it came pass same night that word god came nathan say 17 4 go tell david my servant thu saith lord thou shalt not build me hous dwell 17 5 i have not dwelt hous day that i brought israel unto thi day but have gone tent tent one tabernacl anoth 17 6 wheresoev i have walk all israel spake i word ani judg israel whom i command feed my peopl say whi have ye not built me hous cedar 17 7 now therefor thu shalt thou say unto my servant david thu saith lord host i took thee sheepcot even follow sheep that thou shouldest be ruler my peopl israel 17 8 i have been thee whithersoev thou hast walk have cut off all thine enemi thee have made thee name like name great men that are earth 17 9 also i will ordain place my peopl israel will plant them they shall dwell their place shall be move no more neither shall children wicked wast them ani more as begin 17 10 time that i command judg be my peopl israel moreov i will subdu all thine enemi furthermor i tell thee that lord will build thee hous 17 11 it shall come pass when thi day be expir that thou must go be thi father that i will rais thi seed thee which shall be thi son i will establish hi kingdom 17 12 he shall build me hous i will stablish hi throne ever 17 13 i will be hi father he shall be my son i will not take my merci away him as i took it him that wa thee 17 14 but i will settl him mine hous my kingdom ever hi throne shall be establish evermor 17 15 accord all these word accord all thi vision so did nathan speak unto david 17 16 david king came sat lord said who am i o lord god what is mine hous that thou hast brought me hitherto 17 17 yet thi wa small thing thine eye o god thou hast also spoken thi servant s hous great while come hast regard me accord estat man high degre o lord god 17 18 what can david speak more thee honour thi servant thou knowest thi servant 17 19 o lord thi servant s sake accord thine own heart hast thou done all thi great make known all these great thing 17 20 o lord there is none like thee neither is there ani god besid thee accord all that we have heard our ear 17 21 what one nation earth is like thi peopl israel whom god went redeem be hi own peopl make thee name great terribl drive nation thi peopl whom thou hast redeem egypt 17 22 thi peopl israel didst thou make thine own peopl ever thou lord becamest their god 17 23 therefor now lord let thing that thou hast spoken concern thi servant concern hi hous be establish ever do as thou hast said 17 24 let it even be establish that thi name may be magnifi ever say lord host is god israel even god israel let hous david thi servant be establish thee 17 25 thou o my god hast told thi servant that thou wilt build him hous therefor thi servant hath found hi heart pray thee 17 26 now lord thou art god hast promis thi good unto thi servant 17 27 now therefor let it pleas thee bless hous thi servant that it may be thee ever thou blessest o lord it shall be bless ever 18 1 now thi it came pass that david smote philistin subdu them took gath her town hand philistin 18 2 he smote moab moabit becam david s servant brought gift 18 3 david smote hadarez king zobah unto hamath as he went stablish hi dominion river euphrat 18 4 david took him thousand chariot seven thousand horsemen twenti thousand footmen david also hough all chariot hors but reserv them hundr chariot 18 5 when syrian damascu came help hadarez king zobah david slew syrian two twenti thousand men 18 6 then david put garrison syriadamascu syrian becam david s servant brought gift thu lord preserv david whithersoev he went 18 7 david took shield gold that were servant hadarez brought them jerusalem 18 8 likewis tibhath chun citi hadarez brought david veri much brass wherewith solomon made brasen sea pillar vessel brass 18 9 now when tou king hamath heard how david had smitten all host hadarez king zobah 18 10 he sent hadoram hi son king david enquir hi welfar congratul him becaus he had fought against hadarez smitten him hadarez had war tou him all manner vessel gold silver brass 18 11 them also king david dedic unto lord silver gold that he brought all these nation edom moab children ammon philistin amalek 18 12 moreov abishai son zeruiah slew edomit valley salt eighteen thousand 18 13 he put garrison edom all edomit becam david s servant thu lord preserv david whithersoev he went 18 14 so david reign all israel execut judgment justic all hi peopl 18 15 joab son zeruiah wa host jehoshaphat son ahilud record 18 16 zadok son ahitub abimelech son abiathar were priest shavsha wa scribe 18 17 benaiah son jehoiada wa cherethit pelethit son david were chief king 19 1 now it came pass thi that nahash king children ammon die hi son reign hi stead 19 2 david said i will shew kind unto hanun son nahash becaus hi father shew kind me david sent messeng comfort him concern hi father so servant david came land children ammon hanun comfort him 19 3 but princ children ammon said hanun thinkest thou that david doth honour thi father that he hath sent comfort unto thee are not hi servant come unto thee search overthrow spi land 19 4 wherefor hanun took david s servant shave them cut off their garment midst hard their buttock sent them away 19 5 then there went certain told david how men were serv he sent meet them men were greatli asham king said tarri jericho your beard be grown then return 19 6 when children ammon saw that they had made themselv odiou david hanun children ammon sent thousand talent silver hire them chariot horsemen mesopotamia syriamaachah zobah 19 7 so they hire thirti two thousand chariot king maachah hi peopl who came pitch medeba children ammon gather themselv togeth their citi came battl 19 8 when david heard it he sent joab all host mighti men 19 9 children ammon came put battl array gate citi king that were come were themselv field 19 10 now when joab saw that battl wa set against him behind he chose all choic israel put them array against syrian 19 11 rest peopl he deliv unto hand abishai hi brother they set themselv array against children ammon 19 12 he said if syrian be too strong me then thou shalt help me but if children ammon be too strong thee then i will help thee 19 13 be good courag let us behav ourselv valiantli our peopl citi our god let lord do that which is good hi sight 19 14 so joab peopl that were him drew nigh syrian unto battl they fled him 19 15 when children ammon saw that syrian were fled they likewis fled abishai hi brother enter citi then joab came jerusalem 19 16 when syrian saw that they were put wors israel they sent messeng drew forth syrian that were river shophach captain host hadarez went them 19 17 it wa told david he gather all israel pass jordan came them set battl array against them so when david had put battl array against syrian they fought him 19 18 but syrian fled israel david slew syrian seven thousand men which fought chariot forti thousand footmen kill shophach captain host 19 19 when servant hadarez saw that they were put wors israel they made peac david becam hi servant neither would syrian help children ammon ani more 20 1 it came pass that year wa expir time that king go battl joab led forth power armi wast countri children ammon came besieg rabbah but david tarri jerusalem joab smote rabbah destroy it 20 2 david took crown their king off hi head found it weigh talent gold there were preciou stone it it wa set david s head he brought also exceed much spoil citi 20 3 he brought peopl that were it cut them saw harrow iron axe even so dealt david all citi children ammon david all peopl return jerusalem 20 4 it came pass thi that there aros war gezer philistin which time sibbechai hushathit slew sippai that wa children giant they were subdu 20 5 there wa war again philistin elhanan son jair slew lahmi brother goliath gittit whose spear staff wa like weaver s beam 20 6 yet again there wa war gath where wa man great statur whose finger toe were four twenti six each hand six each foot he also wa son giant 20 7 but when he defi israel jonathan son shimea david s brother slew him 20 8 these were born unto giant gath they fell hand david hand hi servant 21 1 satan stood against israel provok david number israel 21 2 david said joab ruler peopl go number israel beersheba even dan bring number them me that i may know it 21 3 joab answer lord make hi peopl hundr time so mani more as they be but my lord king are they not all my lord s servant whi then doth my lord requir thi thing whi will he be caus trespass israel 21 4 nevertheless king s word prevail against joab wherefor joab depart went all israel came jerusalem 21 5 joab gave sum number peopl unto david all they israel were thousand thousand hundr thousand men that drew sword judah wa four hundr threescor ten thousand men that drew sword 21 6 but levi benjamin count he not them king s word wa abomin joab 21 7 god wa displeas thi thing therefor he smote israel 21 8 david said unto god i have sin greatli becaus i have done thi thing but now i beseech thee do away iniqu thi servant i have done veri foolishli 21 9 lord spake unto gad david s seer say 21 10 go tell david say thu saith lord i offer thee three thing choos thee one them that i may do it unto thee 21 11 so gad came david said unto him thu saith lord choos thee 21 12 either three year famin or three month be destroy thi foe while that sword thine enemi overtaketh thee or els three day sword lord even pestil land angel lord destroy all coast israel now therefor advis thyself what word i shall bring again him that sent me 21 13 david said unto gad i am great strait let me fall now hand lord veri great are hi merci but let me not fall hand man 21 14 so lord sent pestil israel there fell israel seventi thousand men 21 15 god sent angel unto jerusalem destroy it as he wa destroy lord beheld he repent him evil said angel that destroy it is enough stay now thine hand angel lord stood threshingfloor ornan jebusit 21 16 david lift hi eye saw angel lord stand earth heaven have drawn sword hi hand stretch jerusalem then david elder israel who were cloth sackcloth fell their face 21 17 david said unto god is it not i that command peopl be number even i it is that have sin done evil inde but as these sheep what have they done let thine hand i pray thee o lord my god be me my father s hous but not thi peopl that they should be plagu 21 18 then angel lord command gad say david that david should go set altar unto lord threshingfloor ornan jebusit 21 19 david went say gad which he spake name lord 21 20 ornan turn back saw angel hi four son him hid themselv now ornan wa thresh wheat 21 21 as david came ornan ornan look saw david went threshingfloor bow himself david hi face ground 21 22 then david said ornan grant me place thi threshingfloor that i may build altar therein unto lord thou shalt grant it me full price that plagu may be stay peopl 21 23 ornan said unto david take it thee let my lord king do that which is good hi eye lo i give thee oxen also burnt offer thresh instrument wood wheat meat offer i give it all 21 24 king david said ornan nay but i will verili buy it full price i will not take that which is thine lord nor offer burnt offer cost 21 25 so david gave ornan place six hundr shekel gold weight 21 26 david built there altar unto lord offer burnt offer peac offer call lord he answer him heaven fire altar burnt offer 21 27 lord command angel he put hi sword again sheath thereof 21 28 that time when david saw that lord had answer him threshingfloor ornan jebusit then he sacrif there 21 29 tabernacl lord which mose made wilder altar burnt offer were that season high place gibeon 21 30 but david could not go it enquir god he wa afraid becaus sword angel lord 22 1 then david said thi is hous lord god thi is altar burnt offer israel 22 2 david command gather togeth stranger that were land israel he set mason hew wrought stone build hous god 22 3 david prepar iron abund nail door gate join brass abund weight 22 4 also cedar tree abund zidonian they tyre brought much cedar wood david 22 5 david said solomon my son is young tender hous that is be build lord must be exceed magnif fame glori all countri i will therefor now make prepar it so david prepar abundantli hi death 22 6 then he call solomon hi son charg him build hous lord god israel 22 7 david said solomon my son as me it wa my mind build hous unto name lord my god 22 8 but word lord came me say thou hast shed blood abundantli hast made great war thou shalt not build hous unto my name becaus thou hast shed much blood earth my sight 22 9 behold son shall be born thee who shall be man rest i will give him rest all hi enemi round hi name shall be solomon i will give peac quiet unto israel hi day 22 10 he shall build hous my name he shall be my son i will be hi father i will establish throne hi kingdom israel ever 22 11 now my son lord be thee prosper thou build hous lord thi god as he hath said thee 22 12 onli lord give thee wisdom understand give thee charg concern israel that thou mayest keep law lord thi god 22 13 then shalt thou prosper if thou takest heed fulfil statut judgment which lord charg mose concern israel be strong good courag dread not nor be dismay 22 14 now behold my troubl i have prepar hous lord hundr thousand talent gold thousand thousand talent silver brass iron weight it is abund timber also stone have i prepar thou mayest add thereto 22 15 moreov there are workmen thee abund hewer worker stone timber all manner cun men everi manner work 22 16 gold silver brass iron there is no number aris therefor be do lord be thee 22 17 david also command all princ israel help solomon hi son say 22 18 is not lord your god you hath he not given you holi vessel god hous that is be built name lord 23 1 so when david wa old full day he made solomon hi son king israel 23 2 he gather togeth all princ israel priest levit 23 3 now levit were number age
