rest ark coven lord footstool our god had made readi build 28 3 but god said unto me thou shalt not build hous my name becaus thou hast been man war hast shed blood 28 4 howbeit lord god israel chose me all hous my father be king israel ever he hath chosen judah be ruler hous judah hous my father son my father he like me make me king all israel 28 5 all my son lord hath given me mani son he hath chosen solomon my son sit throne kingdom lord israel 28 6 he said unto me solomon thi son he shall build my hous my court i have chosen him be my son i will be hi father 28 7 moreov i will establish hi kingdom ever if he be constant do my command my judgment as thi day 28 8 now therefor sight all israel congreg lord audienc our god keep seek all command lord your god that ye may possess thi good land leav it inherit your children you ever 28 9 thou solomon my son know thou god thi father serv him perfect heart will mind lord searcheth all heart understandeth all imagin thought if thou seek him he will be found thee but if thou forsak him he will cast thee off ever 28 10 take heed now lord hath chosen thee build hous sanctuari be strong do it 28 11 then david gave solomon hi son pattern porch hous thereof treasuri thereof upper chamber thereof inner parlour thereof place merci seat 28 12 pattern all that he had spirit court hous lord all chamber round treasuri hous god treasuri dedic thing 28 13 also cours priest levit all work servic hous lord all vessel servic hous lord 28 14 he gave gold weight thing gold all instrument all manner servic silver also all instrument silver weight all instrument everi kind servic 28 15 even weight candlestick gold their lamp gold weight everi candlestick lamp thereof candlestick silver weight both candlestick also lamp thereof accord use everi candlestick 28 16 weight he gave gold tabl shewbread everi tabl likewis silver tabl silver 28 17 also pure gold fleshhook bowl cup golden bason he gave gold weight everi bason likewis silver weight everi bason silver 28 18 altar incens refin gold weight gold pattern chariot cherubim that spread their wing cover ark coven lord 28 19 all thi said david lord made me understand write hi hand me even all work thi pattern 28 20 david said solomon hi son be strong good courag do it fear not nor be dismay lord god even my god will be thee he will not fail thee nor forsak thee thou hast finish all work servic hous lord 28 21 behold cours priest levit even they shall be thee all servic hous god there shall be thee all manner workmanship everi will skil man ani manner servic also princ all peopl will be wholli thi command 29 1 furthermor david king said unto all congreg solomon my son whom alon god hath chosen is yet young tender work is great palac is not man but lord god 29 2 now i have prepar all my might hous my god gold thing be made gold silver thing silver brass thing brass iron thing iron wood thing wood onyx stone stone be set glister stone diver colour all manner preciou stone marbl stone abund 29 3 moreov becaus i have set my affect hous my god i have mine own proper good gold silver which i have given hous my god all that i have prepar holi hous 29 4 even three thousand talent gold gold ophir seven thousand talent refin silver overlay wall hous withal 29 5 gold thing gold silver thing silver all manner work be made hand artific who then is will consecr hi servic thi day unto lord 29 6 then chief father princ tribe israel captain thousand hundr ruler king s work offer willingli 29 7 gave servic hous god gold five thousand talent ten thousand dram silver ten thousand talent brass eighteen thousand talent one hundr thousand talent iron 29 8 they whom preciou stone were found gave them treasur hous lord hand jehiel gershonit 29 9 then peopl rejoic that they offer willingli becaus perfect heart they offer willingli lord david king also rejoic great joy 29 10 wherefor david bless lord all congreg david said bless be thou lord god israel our father ever ever 29 11 thine o lord is great power glori victori majesti all that is heaven earth is thine thine is kingdom o lord thou art exalt as head all 29 12 both rich honour come thee thou reignest all thine hand is power might thine hand it is make great give strength unto all 29 13 now therefor our god we thank thee prais thi gloriou name 29 14 but who am i what is my peopl that we should be abl offer so willingli thi sort all thing come thee thine own have we given thee 29 15 we are stranger thee sojourn as were all our father our day earth are as shadow there is none abid 29 16 o lord our god all thi store that we have prepar build thee hous thine holi name cometh thine hand is all thine own 29 17 i know also my god that thou triest heart hast pleasur upright as me upright mine heart i have willingli offer all these thing now have i seen joy thi peopl which are present here offer willingli unto thee 29 18 o lord god abraham isaac israel our father keep thi ever imagin thought heart thi peopl prepar their heart unto thee 29 19 give unto solomon my son perfect heart keep thi command thi testimoni thi statut do all these thing build palac which i have made provis 29 20 david said all congreg now bless lord your god all congreg bless lord god their father bow down their head worship lord king 29 21 they sacrif sacrific unto lord offer burnt offer unto lord morrow that day even thousand bullock thousand ram thousand lamb their drink offer sacrific abund all israel 29 22 did eat drink lord that day great glad they made solomon son david king second time anoint him unto lord be chief governor zadok be priest 29 23 then solomon sat throne lord as king instead david hi father prosper all israel obey him 29 24 all princ mighti men all son likewis king david submit themselv unto solomon king 29 25 lord magnifi solomon exceedingli sight all israel bestow him such royal majesti as had not been ani king him israel 29 26 thu david son jess reign all israel 29 27 time that he reign israel wa forti year seven year reign he hebron thirti three year reign he jerusalem 29 28 he die good old age full day rich honour solomon hi son reign hi stead 29 29 now act david king first last behold they are written book samuel seer book nathan prophet book gad seer 29 30 all hi reign hi might time that went him israel all kingdom countri second book chronicl 1 1 solomon son david wa strengthen hi kingdom lord hi god wa him magnifi him exceedingli 1 2 then solomon spake unto all israel captain thousand hundr judg everi governor all israel chief father 1 3 so solomon all congreg him went high place that wa gibeon there wa tabernacl congreg god which mose servant lord had made wilder 1 4 but ark god had david brought kirjathjearim place which david had prepar it he had pitch tent it jerusalem 1 5 moreov brasen altar that bezaleel son uri son hur had made he put tabernacl lord solomon congreg sought unto it 1 6 solomon went thither brasen altar lord which wa tabernacl congreg offer thousand burnt offer it 1 7 that night did god appear unto solomon said unto him ask what i shall give thee 1 8 solomon said unto god thou hast shew great merci unto david my father hast made me reign hi stead 1 9 now o lord god let thi promis unto david my father be establish thou hast made me king peopl like dust earth multitud 1 10 give me now wisdom knowledg that i may go come thi peopl who can judg thi thi peopl that is so great 1 11 god said solomon becaus thi wa thine heart thou hast not ask rich wealth or honour nor life thine enemi neither yet hast ask long life but hast ask wisdom knowledg thyself that thou mayest judg my peopl whom i have made thee king 1 12 wisdom knowledg is grant unto thee i will give thee rich wealth honour such as none king have had that have been thee neither shall there ani thee have like 1 13 then solomon came hi journey high place that wa gibeon jerusalem tabernacl congreg reign israel 1 14 solomon gather chariot horsemen he had thousand four hundr chariot twelv thousand horsemen which he place chariot citi king jerusalem 1 15 king made silver gold jerusalem as plenteou as stone cedar tree made he as sycomor tree that are vale abund 1 16 solomon had hors brought egypt linen yarn king s merchant receiv linen yarn price 1 17 they fetch brought forth egypt chariot six hundr shekel silver hors hundr fifti so brought they hors all king hittit king syria their mean 2 1 solomon determin build hous name lord hous hi kingdom 2 2 solomon told threescor ten thousand men bear burden fourscor thousand hew mountain three thousand six hundr overse them 2 3 solomon sent huram king tyre say as thou didst deal david my father didst send him cedar build him hous dwell therein even so deal me 2 4 behold i build hous name lord my god dedic it him burn him sweet incens continu shewbread burnt offer morn even sabbath new moon solemn feast lord our god thi is ordin ever israel 2 5 hous which i build is great great is our god all god 2 6 but who is abl build him hous see heaven heaven heaven cannot contain him who am i then that i should build him hous save onli burn sacrific him 2 7 send me now therefor man cun work gold silver brass iron purpl crimson blue that can skill grave cun men that are me judah jerusalem whom david my father did provid 2 8 send me also cedar tree fir tree algum tree lebanon i know that thi servant can skill cut timber lebanon behold my servant shall be thi servant 2 9 even prepar me timber abund hous which i am build shall be wonder great 2 10 behold i will give thi servant hewer that cut timber twenti thousand measur beaten wheat twenti thousand measur barley twenti thousand bath wine twenti thousand bath oil 2 11 then huram king tyre answer write which he sent solomon becaus lord hath love hi peopl he hath made thee king them 2 12 huram said moreov bless be lord god israel that made heaven earth who hath given david king wise son endu prudenc understand that might build hous lord hous hi kingdom 2 13 now i have sent cun man endu understand huram my father s 2 14 son woman daughter dan hi father wa man tyre skil work gold silver brass iron stone timber purpl blue fine linen crimson also grave ani manner grave find everi devic which shall be put him thi cun men cun men my lord david thi father 2 15 now therefor wheat barley oil wine which my lord hath spoken let him send unto hi servant 2 16 we will cut wood lebanon as much as thou shalt need we will bring it thee float sea joppa thou shalt carri it jerusalem 2 17 solomon number all stranger that were land israel number wherewith david hi father had number them they were found hundr fifti thousand three thousand six hundr 2 18 he set threescor ten thousand them be bearer burden fourscor thousand be hewer mountain three thousand six hundr overs set peopl work 3 1 then solomon began build hous lord jerusalem mount moriah where lord appear unto david hi father place that david had prepar threshingfloor ornan jebusit 3 2 he began build second day second month fourth year hi reign 3 3 now these are thing wherein solomon wa instruct build hous god length cubit first measur wa threescor cubit breadth twenti cubit 3 4 porch that wa front hous length it wa accord breadth hous twenti cubit height wa hundr twenti he overlaid it pure gold 3 5 greater hous he ciel fir tree which he overlaid fine gold set thereon palm tree chain 3 6 he garnish hous preciou stone beauti gold wa gold parvaim 3 7 he overlaid also hous beam post wall thereof door thereof gold grave cherubim wall 3 8 he made most holi hous length whereof wa accord breadth hous twenti cubit breadth thereof twenti cubit he overlaid it fine gold amount six hundr talent 3 9 weight nail wa fifti shekel gold he overlaid upper chamber gold 3 10 most holi hous he made two cherubim imag work overlaid them gold 3 11 wing cherubim were twenti cubit long one wing one cherub wa five cubit reach wall hous other wing wa likewis five cubit reach wing other cherub 3 12 one wing other cherub wa five cubit reach wall hous other wing wa five cubit also join wing other cherub 3 13 wing these cherubim spread themselv forth twenti cubit they stood their feet their face were inward 3 14 he made vail blue purpl crimson fine linen wrought cherubim thereon 3 15 also he made hous two pillar thirti five cubit high chapit that wa top each them wa five cubit 3 16 he made chain as oracl put them head pillar made hundr pomegran put them chain 3 17 he rear pillar templ one right hand other left call name that right hand jachin name that left boaz 4 1 moreov he made altar brass twenti cubit length thereof twenti cubit breadth thereof ten cubit height thereof 4 2 also he made molten sea ten cubit brim brim round compass five cubit height thereof line thirti cubit did compass it round 4 3 it wa similitud oxen which did compass it round ten cubit compass sea round two row oxen were cast when it wa cast 4 4 it stood twelv oxen three look north three look west three look south three look east sea wa set them all their hinder part were inward 4 5 thick it wa handbreadth brim it like work brim cup flower lili it receiv held three thousand bath 4 6 he made also ten laver put five right hand five left wash them such thing as they offer burnt offer they wash them but sea wa priest wash 4 7 he made ten candlestick gold accord their form set them templ five right hand five left 4 8 he made also ten tabl place them templ five right side five left he made hundr bason gold 4 9 furthermor he made court priest great court door court overlaid door them brass 4 10 he set sea right side east end against south 4 11 huram made pot shovel bason huram finish work that he wa make king solomon hous god 4 12 wit two pillar pommel chapit which were top two pillar two wreath cover two pommel chapit which were top pillar 4 13 four hundr pomegran two wreath two row pomegran each wreath cover two pommel chapit which were pillar 4 14 he made also base laver made he base 4 15 one sea twelv oxen it 4 16 pot also shovel fleshhook all their instrument did huram hi father make king solomon hous lord bright brass 4 17 plain jordan did king cast them clay ground succoth zeredathah 4 18 thu solomon made all these vessel great abund weight brass could not be found 4 19 solomon made all vessel that were hous god golden altar also tabl whereon shewbread wa set 4 20 moreov candlestick their lamp that they should burn manner oracl pure gold 4 21 flower lamp tong made he gold that perfect gold 4 22 snuffer bason spoon censer pure gold entri hous inner door thereof most holi place door hous templ were gold 5 1 thu all work that solomon made hous lord wa finish solomon brought all thing that david hi father had dedic silver gold all instrument put he treasur hous god 5 2 then solomon assembl elder israel all head tribe chief father children israel unto jerusalem bring ark coven lord citi david which is zion 5 3 wherefor all men israel assembl themselv unto king feast which wa seventh month 5 4 all elder israel came levit took ark 5 5 they brought ark tabernacl congreg all holi vessel that were tabernacl these did priest levit bring 5 6 also king solomon all congreg israel that were assembl unto him ark sacrif sheep oxen which could not be told nor number multitud 5 7 priest brought ark coven lord unto hi place oracl hous most holi place even wing cherubim 5 8 cherubim spread forth their wing place ark cherubim cover ark stave thereof 5 9 they drew stave ark that end stave were seen ark oracl but they were not seen there it is unto thi day 5 10 there wa noth ark save two tabl which mose put therein horeb when lord made coven children israel when they came egypt 5 11 it came pass when priest were come holi place all priest that were present were sanctifi did not then wait cours 5 12 also levit which were singer all them asaph heman jeduthun their son their brethren be array white linen have cymbal psalteri harp stood east end altar them hundr twenti priest sound trumpet 5 13 it came even pass as trumpet singer were as one make one sound be heard prais thank lord when they lift their voic trumpet cymbal instrument musick prais lord say he is good hi merci endureth ever that then hous wa fill cloud even hous lord 5 14 so that priest could not stand minist reason cloud glori lord had fill hous god 6 1 then said solomon lord hath said that he would dwell thick dark 6 2 but i have built hous habit thee place thi dwell ever 6 3 king turn hi face bless whole congreg israel all congreg israel stood 6 4 he said bless be lord god israel who hath hi hand fulfil that which he spake hi mouth my father david say 6 5 day that i brought forth my peopl land egypt i chose no citi all tribe israel build hous that my name might be there neither chose i ani man be ruler my peopl israel 6 6 but i have chosen jerusalem that my name might be there have chosen david be my peopl israel 6 7 now it wa heart david my father build hous name lord god israel 6 8 but lord said david my father forasmuch as it wa thine heart build hous my name thou didst well that it wa thine heart 6 9 notwithstand thou shalt not build hous but thi son which shall come forth thi loin he shall build hous my name 6 10 lord therefor hath perform hi word that he hath spoken i am risen room david my father am set throne israel as lord promis have built hous name lord god israel 6 11 it have i put ark wherein is coven lord that he made children israel 6 12 he stood altar lord presenc all congreg israel spread forth hi hand 6 13 solomon had made brasen scaffold five cubit long five cubit broad three cubit high had set it midst court it he stood kneel down hi knee all congreg israel spread forth hi hand heaven 6 14 said o lord god israel there is no god like thee heaven nor earth which keepest coven shewest merci unto thi servant that walk thee all their heart 6 15 thou which hast kept thi servant david my father that which thou hast promis him spakest thi mouth hast fulfil it thine hand as it is thi day 6 16 now therefor o lord god israel keep thi servant david my father that which thou hast promis him say there shall not fail thee man my sight sit throne israel yet so that thi children take heed their way walk my law as thou hast walk me 6 17 now then o lord god israel let thi word be verifi which thou hast spoken unto thi servant david 6 18 but will god veri deed dwell men earth behold heaven heaven heaven cannot contain thee how much less thi hous which i have built 6 19 have respect therefor prayer thi servant hi supplic o lord my god hearken unto cri prayer which thi servant prayeth thee 6 20 that thine eye may be open thi hous day night place whereof thou hast said that thou wouldest put thi name there hearken unto prayer which thi servant prayeth thi place 6 21 hearken therefor unto supplic thi servant thi peopl israel which they shall make thi place hear thou thi dwell place even heaven when thou hearest forgiv 6 22 if man sin against hi neighbour oath be laid him make him swear oath come thine altar thi hous 6 23 then hear thou heaven do judg thi servant requit wick recompens hi way hi own head justifi righteou give him accord hi righteous 6 24 if thi peopl israel be put wors enemi becaus they have sin against thee shall return confess thi name pray make supplic thee thi hous 6 25 then hear thou heaven forgiv sin thi peopl israel bring them again unto land which thou gavest them their father 6 26 when heaven is shut there is no rain becaus they have sin against thee yet if they pray thi place confess thi name turn their sin when thou dost afflict them 6 27 then hear thou heaven forgiv sin thi servant thi peopl israel when thou hast taught them good way wherein they should walk send rain thi land which thou hast given unto thi peopl inherit 6 28 if there be dearth land if there be pestil if there be blast or mildew locust or caterpil if their enemi besieg them citi their land whatsoev sore or whatsoev sick there be 6 29 then what prayer or what supplic soever shall be made ani man or all thi peopl israel when everi one shall know hi own sore hi own grief shall spread forth hi hand thi hous 6 30 then hear thou heaven thi dwell place forgiv render unto everi man accord unto all hi way whose heart thou knowest thou onli knowest heart children men 6 31 that they may fear thee walk thi way so long as they live land which thou gavest unto our father 6 32 moreov concern stranger which is not thi peopl israel but is come far countri thi great name s sake thi mighti hand thi stretch arm if they come pray thi hous 6 33 then hear thou heaven even thi dwell place do accord all that stranger calleth thee that all peopl earth may know thi name fear thee as doth thi peopl israel may know that thi hous which i have built is call thi name 6 34 if thi peopl go war against their enemi way that thou shalt send them they pray unto thee thi citi which thou hast chosen hous which i have built thi name 6 35 then hear thou heaven their prayer their supplic maintain their caus 6 36 if they sin against thee there is no man which sinneth not thou be angri them deliv them their enemi they carri them away captiv unto land far off or near 6 37 yet if they bethink themselv land whither they are carri captiv turn pray unto thee land their captiv say we have sin we have done amiss have dealt wickedli 6 38 if they return thee all their heart all their soul land their captiv whither they have carri them captiv pray their land which thou gavest unto their father citi which thou hast chosen hous which i have built thi name 6 39 then hear thou heaven even thi dwell place their prayer their supplic maintain their caus forgiv thi peopl which have sin against thee 6 40 now my god let i beseech thee thine eye be open let thine ear be attent unto prayer that is made thi place 6 41 now therefor aris o lord god thi rest place thou ark thi strength let thi priest o lord god be cloth salvat let thi saint rejoic good 6 42 o lord god turn not away face thine anoint rememb merci david thi servant 7 1 now when solomon had made end pray fire came down heaven consum burnt offer sacrific glori lord fill hous 7 2 priest could not enter hous lord becaus glori lord had fill lord s hous 7 3 when all children israel saw how fire came down glori lord hous they bow themselv their face ground pavement worship prais lord say he is good hi merci endureth ever 7 4 then king all peopl offer sacrific lord 7 5 king solomon offer sacrific twenti two thousand oxen hundr twenti thousand sheep so king all peopl dedic hous god 7 6 priest wait their offic levit also instrument musick lord which david king had made prais lord becaus hi merci endureth ever when david prais their ministri priest sound trumpet them all israel stood 7 7 moreov solomon hallow middl court that wa hous lord there he offer burnt offer fat peac offer becaus brasen altar which solomon had made wa not abl receiv burnt offer meat offer fat 7 8 also same time solomon kept feast seven day all israel him veri great congreg enter hamath unto river egypt 7 9 eighth day they made solemn assembl they kept dedic altar seven day feast seven day 7 10 three twentieth day seventh month he sent peopl away their tent glad merri heart good that lord had shew unto david solomon israel hi peopl 7 11 thu solomon finish hous lord king s hous all that came solomon s heart make hous lord hi own hous he prosper effect 7 12 lord appear solomon night said unto him i have heard thi prayer have chosen thi place myself hous sacrific 7 13 if i shut heaven that there be no rain or if i command locust devour land or if i send pestil my peopl 7 14 if my peopl which are call my name shall humbl themselv pray seek my face turn their wick way then will i hear heaven will forgiv their sin will heal their land 7 15 now mine eye shall be open mine ear attent unto prayer that is made thi place 7 16 now have i chosen sanctifi thi hous that my name may be there ever mine eye mine heart shall be there perpetu 7 17 as thee if thou wilt walk me as david thi father walk do accord all that i have command thee shalt observ my statut my judgment 7 18 then will i stablish throne thi kingdom accord as i have coven david thi father say there shall not fail thee man be ruler israel 7 19 but if ye turn away forsak my statut my command which i have set you shall go serv other god worship them 7 20 then will i pluck them root my land which i have given them thi hous which i have sanctifi my name will i cast my sight will make it be proverb byword all nation 7 21 thi hous which is high shall be astonish everi one that passeth it so that he shall say whi hath lord done thu unto thi land unto thi hous 7 22 it shall be answer becaus they forsook lord god their father which brought them forth land egypt laid hold other god worship them serv them therefor hath he brought all thi evil them 8 1 it came pass end twenti year wherein solomon had built hous lord hi own hous 8 2 that citi which huram had restor solomon solomon built them caus children israel dwell there 8 3 solomon went hamathzobah prevail against it 8 4 he built tadmor wilder all store citi which he built hamath 8 5 also he built bethhoron upper bethhoron nether fenc citi wall gate bar 8 6 baalath all store citi that solomon had all chariot citi citi horsemen all that solomon desir build jerusalem lebanon all land hi dominion 8 7 as all peopl that were left hittit amorit perizzit hivit jebusit which were not israel 8 8 but their children who were left them land whom children israel consum not them did solomon make pay tribut thi day 8 9 but children israel did solomon make no servant hi work but they were men war chief hi captain captain hi chariot horsemen 8 10 these were chief king solomon s offic even two hundr fifti that bare rule peopl 8 11 solomon brought daughter pharaoh citi david unto hous that he had built her he said my wife shall not dwell hous david king israel becaus place are holi whereunto ark lord hath come 8 12 then solomon offer burnt offer unto lord altar lord which he had built porch 8 13 even certain rate everi day offer accord command mose sabbath new moon solemn feast three time year even feast unleaven bread feast week feast tabernacl 8 14 he appoint accord order david hi father cours priest their servic levit their charg prais minist priest as duti everi day requir porter also their cours everi gate so had david man god command 8 15 they depart not command king unto priest levit concern ani matter or concern treasur 8 16 now all work solomon wa prepar unto day foundat hous lord it wa finish so hous lord wa perfect 8 17 then went solomon eziongeb eloth sea side land edom 8 18 huram sent him hand hi servant ship servant that had knowledg sea they went servant solomon ophir took thenc four hundr fifti talent gold brought them king solomon 9 1 when queen sheba heard fame solomon she came prove solomon hard question jerusalem veri great compani camel that bare spice gold abund preciou stone when she wa come solomon she commun him all that wa her heart 9 2 solomon told her all her question there wa noth hid solomon which he told her not 9 3 when queen sheba had seen wisdom solomon hous that he had built 9 4 meat hi tabl sit hi servant attend hi minist their apparel hi cupbear also their apparel hi ascent which he went hous lord there wa no more spirit her 9 5 she said king it wa true report which i heard mine own land thine act thi wisdom 9 6 howbeit i believ not their word i came mine eye had seen it behold one half great thi wisdom wa not told me thou exceedest fame that i heard 9 7 happi are thi men happi are these thi servant which stand continu thee hear thi wisdom 9 8 bless be lord thi god which delight thee set thee hi throne be king lord thi god becaus thi god love israel establish them ever therefor made he thee king them do judgment justic 9 9 she gave king hundr twenti talent gold spice great abund preciou stone neither wa there ani such spice as queen sheba gave king solomon 9 10 servant also huram servant solomon which brought gold ophir brought algum tree preciou stone 9 11 king made algum tree terrac hous lord king s palac harp psalteri singer there were none such seen land judah 9 12 king solomon gave queen sheba all her desir whatsoev she ask besid that which she had brought unto king so she turn went away her own land she her servant 9 13 now weight gold that came solomon one year wa six hundr threescor six talent gold 9 14 besid that which chapmen merchant brought all king arabia governor countri brought gold silver solomon 9 15 king solomon made two hundr target beaten gold six hundr shekel beaten gold went one target 9 16 three hundr shield made he beaten gold three hundr shekel gold went one shield king put them hous forest lebanon 9 17 moreov king made great throne ivori overlaid it pure gold 9 18 there were six step throne footstool gold which were fasten throne stay each side sit place two lion stand stay 9 19 twelv lion stood there one side other six step there wa not like made ani kingdom 9 20 all drink vessel king solomon were gold all vessel hous forest lebanon were pure gold none were silver it wa not ani thing account day solomon 9 21 king s ship went tarshish servant huram everi three year onc came ship tarshish bring gold silver ivori ape peacock 9 22 king solomon pass all king earth rich wisdom 9 23 all king earth sought presenc solomon hear hi wisdom that god had put hi heart 9 24 they brought everi man hi present vessel silver vessel gold raiment har spice hors mule rate year year 9 25 solomon had four thousand stall hors chariot twelv thousand horsemen whom he bestow chariot citi king jerusalem 9 26 he reign all king river even unto land philistin border egypt 9 27 king made silver jerusalem as stone cedar tree made he as sycomor tree that are low plain abund 9 28 they brought unto solomon hors egypt all land 9 29 now rest act solomon first last are they not written book nathan prophet propheci ahijah shilonit vision iddo seer against jeroboam son nebat 9 30 solomon reign jerusalem all israel forti year 9 31 solomon slept hi father he wa buri citi david hi father rehoboam hi son reign hi stead 10 1 rehoboam went shechem shechem were all israel come make him king 10 2 it came pass when jeroboam son nebat who wa egypt whither he fled presenc solomon king heard it that jeroboam return egypt 10 3 they sent call him so jeroboam all israel came spake rehoboam say 10 4 thi father made our yoke grievou now therefor eas thou somewhat grievou servitud thi father hi heavi yoke that he put us we will serv thee 10 5 he said unto them come again unto me three day peopl depart 10 6 king rehoboam took counsel old men that had stood solomon hi father while he yet live say what counsel give ye me return answer thi peopl 10 7 they spake unto him say if thou be kind thi peopl pleas them speak good word them they will be thi servant ever 10 8 but he forsook counsel which old men gave him took counsel young men that were brought him that stood him 10 9 he said unto them what advic give ye that we may return answer thi peopl which have spoken me say eas somewhat yoke that thi father did put us 10 10 young men that were brought him spake unto him say thu shalt thou answer peopl that spake unto thee say thi father made our yoke heavi but make thou it somewhat lighter us thu shalt thou say unto them my littl finger shall be thicker than my father s loin 10 11 wherea my father put heavi yoke you i will put more your yoke my father chastis you whip but i will chastis you scorpion 10 12 so jeroboam all peopl came rehoboam third day as king bade say come again me third day 10 13 king answer them roughli king rehoboam forsook counsel old men 10 14 answer them advic young men say my father made your yoke heavi but i will add thereto my father chastis you whip but i will chastis you scorpion 10 15 so king hearken not unto peopl caus wa god that lord might perform hi word which he spake hand ahijah shilonit jeroboam son nebat 10 16 when all israel saw that king would not hearken unto them peopl answer king say what portion have we david we have none inherit son jess everi man your tent o israel now david see thine own hous so all israel went their tent 10 17 but as children israel that dwelt citi judah rehoboam reign them 10 18 then king rehoboam sent hadoram that wa tribut children israel stone him stone that he die but king rehoboam made speed get him hi chariot flee jerusalem 10 19 israel rebel against hous david unto thi day 11 1 when rehoboam wa come jerusalem he gather hous judah benjamin hundr fourscor thousand chosen men which were warrior fight against israel that he might bring kingdom again rehoboam 11 2 but word lord came shemaiah man god say 11 3 speak unto rehoboam son solomon king judah all israel judah benjamin say 11 4 thu saith lord ye shall not go nor fight against your brethren return everi man hi hous thi thing is done me they obey word lord return go against jeroboam 11 5 rehoboam dwelt jerusalem built citi defenc judah 11 6 he built even bethlehem etam tekoa 11 7 bethzur shoco adullam 11 8 gath mareshah ziph 11 9 adoraim lachish azekah 11 10 zorah aijalon hebron which are judah benjamin fenc citi 11 11 he fortifi strong hold put captain them store victual oil wine 11 12 everi sever citi he put shield spear made them exceed strong have judah benjamin hi side 11 13 priest levit that were all israel resort him all their coast 11 14 levit left their suburb their possess came judah jerusalem jeroboam hi son had cast them off execut priest s offic unto lord 11 15 he ordain him priest high place devil calv which he had made 11 16 them all tribe israel such as set their heart seek lord god israel came jerusalem sacrific unto lord god their father 11 17 so they strengthen kingdom judah made rehoboam son solomon strong three year three year they walk way david solomon 11 18 rehoboam took him mahalath daughter jerimoth son david wife abihail daughter eliab son jess 11 19 which bare him children jeush shamariah zaham 11 20 her he took maachah daughter absalom which bare him abijah attai ziza shelomith 11 21 rehoboam love maachah daughter absalom all hi wive hi concubin he took eighteen wive threescor concubin begat twenti eight son threescor daughter 11 22 rehoboam made abijah son maachah chief be ruler hi brethren he thought make him king 11 23 he dealt wise dispers all hi children all countri judah benjamin unto everi fenc citi he gave them victual abund he desir mani wive 12 1 it came pass when rehoboam had establish kingdom had strengthen himself he forsook law lord all israel him 12 2 it came pass that fifth year king rehoboam shishak king egypt came against jerusalem becaus they had transgress against lord 12 3 twelv hundr chariot threescor thousand horsemen peopl were number that came him egypt lubim sukkiim ethiopian 12 4 he took fenc citi which pertain judah came jerusalem 12 5 then came shemaiah prophet rehoboam princ judah that were gather togeth jerusalem becaus shishak said unto them thu saith lord ye have forsaken me therefor have i also left you hand shishak 12 6 whereupon princ israel king humbl themselv they said lord is righteou 12 7 when lord saw that they humbl themselv word lord came shemaiah say they have humbl themselv therefor i will not destroy them but i will grant them some deliver my wrath shall not be pour jerusalem hand shishak 12 8 nevertheless they shall be hi servant that they may know my servic servic kingdom countri 12 9 so shishak king egypt came against jerusalem took away treasur hous lord treasur king s hous he took all he carri away also shield gold which solomon had made 12 10 instead which king rehoboam made shield brass commit them hand chief guard that kept entranc king s hous 12 11 when king enter hous lord guard came fetch them brought them again guard chamber 12 12 when he humbl himself wrath lord turn him that he would not destroy him altogeth also judah thing went well 12 13 so king rehoboam strengthen himself jerusalem reign rehoboam wa one forti year old when he began reign he reign seventeen year jerusalem citi which lord had chosen all tribe israel put hi name there hi mother s name wa naamah ammonitess 12 14 he did evil becaus he prepar not hi heart seek lord 12 15 now act rehoboam first last are they not written book shemaiah prophet iddo seer concern genealog there were war rehoboam jeroboam continu 12 16 rehoboam slept hi father wa buri citi david abijah hi son reign hi stead 13 1 now eighteenth year king jeroboam began abijah reign judah 13 2 he reign three year jerusalem hi mother s name also wa michaiah daughter uriel gibeah there wa war abijah jeroboam 13 3 abijah set battl array armi valiant men war even four hundr thousand chosen men jeroboam also set battl array against him eight hundr thousand chosen men be mighti men valour 13 4 abijah stood mount zemaraim which is mount ephraim said hear me thou jeroboam all israel 13 5 ought ye not know that lord god israel gave kingdom israel david ever even him hi son coven salt 13 6 yet jeroboam son nebat servant solomon son david is risen hath rebel against hi lord 13 7 there are gather unto him vain men children belial have strengthen themselv against rehoboam son solomon when rehoboam wa young tenderheart could not withstand them 13 8 now ye think withstand kingdom lord hand son david ye be great multitud there are your golden calv which jeroboam made you god 13 9 have ye not cast priest lord son aaron levit have made you priest manner nation other land so that whosoev cometh consecr himself young bullock seven ram same may be priest them that are no god 13 10 but as us lord is our god we have not forsaken him priest which minist unto lord are son aaron levit wait their busi 13 11 they burn unto lord everi morn everi even burnt sacrific sweet incens shewbread also set they order pure tabl candlestick gold lamp thereof burn everi even we keep charg lord our god but ye have forsaken him 13 12 behold god himself is us our captain hi priest sound trumpet cri alarm against you o children israel fight ye not against lord god your father ye shall not prosper 13 13 but jeroboam caus ambush come behind them so they were judah ambush wa behind them 13 14 when judah look back behold battl wa behind they cri unto lord priest sound trumpet 13 15 then men judah gave shout as men judah shout it came pass that god smote jeroboam all israel abijah judah 13 16 children israel fled judah god deliv them their hand 13 17 abijah hi peopl slew them great slaughter so there fell down slain israel five hundr thousand chosen men 13 18 thu children israel were brought that time children judah prevail becaus they reli lord god their father 13 19 abijah pursu jeroboam took citi him bethel town thereof jeshanah town thereof ephraim town thereof 13 20 neither did jeroboam recov strength again day abijah lord struck him he die 13 21 but abijah wax mighti marri fourteen wive begat twenti two son sixteen daughter 13 22 rest act abijah hi way hi say are written stori prophet iddo 14 1 so abijah slept hi father they buri him citi david asa hi son reign hi stead hi day land wa quiet ten year 14 2 asa did that which wa good right eye lord hi god 14 3 he took away altar strang god high place brake down imag cut down grove 14 4 command judah seek lord god their father do law command 14 5 also he took away all citi judah high place imag kingdom wa quiet him 14 6 he built fenc citi judah land had rest he had no war those year becaus lord had given him rest 14 7 therefor he said unto judah let us build these citi make them wall tower gate bar while land is yet us becaus we have sought lord our god we have sought him he hath given us rest everi side so they built prosper 14 8 asa had armi men that bare target spear judah three hundr thousand benjamin that bare shield drew bow two hundr fourscor thousand all these were mighti men valour 14 9 there came against them zerah ethiopian host thousand thousand three hundr chariot came unto mareshah 14 10 then asa went against him they set battl array valley zephathah mareshah 14 11 asa cri unto lord hi god said lord it is noth thee help mani or them that have no power help us o lord our god we rest thee thi name we go against thi multitud o lord thou art our god let no man prevail against thee 14 12 so lord smote ethiopian asa judah ethiopian fled 14 13 asa peopl that were him pursu them unto gerar ethiopian were overthrown that they could not recov themselv they were destroy lord hi host they carri away veri much spoil 14 14 they smote all citi round gerar fear lord came them they spoil all citi there wa exceed much spoil them 14 15 they smote also tent cattl carri away sheep camel abund return jerusalem 15 1 spirit god came azariah son ode 15 2 he went meet asa said unto him hear ye me asa all judah benjamin lord is you while ye be him if ye seek him he will be found you but if ye forsak him he will forsak you 15 3 now long season israel hath been true god teach priest law 15 4 but when they their troubl did turn unto lord god israel sought him he wa found them 15 5 those time there wa no peac him that went nor him that came but great vexat were all inhabit countri 15 6 nation wa destroy nation citi citi god did vex them all advers 15 7 be ye strong therefor let not your hand be weak your work shall be reward 15 8 when asa heard these word propheci ode prophet he took courag put away abomin idol all land judah benjamin citi which he had taken mount ephraim renew altar lord that wa porch lord 15 9 he gather all judah benjamin stranger them ephraim manasseh simeon they fell him israel abund when they saw that lord hi god wa him 15 10 so they gather themselv togeth jerusalem third month fifteenth year reign asa 15 11 they offer unto lord same time spoil which they had brought seven hundr oxen seven thousand sheep 15 12 they enter coven seek lord god their father all their heart all their soul 15 13 that whosoev would not seek lord god israel should be put death small or great man or woman 15 14 they sware unto lord loud voic shout trumpet cornet 15 15 all judah rejoic oath they had sworn all their heart sought him their whole desir he wa found them lord gave them rest round 15 16 also concern maachah mother asa king he remov her be queen becaus she had made idol grove asa cut down her idol stamp it burnt it brook kidron 15 17 but high place were not taken away israel nevertheless heart asa wa perfect all hi day 15 18 he brought hous god thing that hi father had dedic that he himself had dedic silver gold vessel 15 19 there wa no more war unto five thirtieth year reign asa 16 1 six thirtieth year reign asa baasha king israel came against judah built ramah intent that he might let none go or come asa king judah 16 2 then asa brought silver gold treasur hous lord king s hous sent benhadad king syria that dwelt damascu say 16 3 there is leagu me thee as there wa my father thi father behold i have sent thee silver gold go break thi leagu baasha king israel that he may depart me 16 4 benhadad hearken unto king asa sent captain hi armi against citi israel they smote ijon dan abelmaim all store citi naphtali 16 5 it came pass when baasha heard it that he left off build ramah let hi work ceas 16 6 then asa king took all judah they carri away stone ramah timber thereof wherewith baasha wa build he built therewith geba mizpah 16 7 that time hanani seer came asa king judah said unto him becaus thou hast reli king syria not reli lord thi god therefor is host king syria escap thine hand 16 8 were not ethiopian lubim huge host veri mani chariot horsemen yet becaus thou didst reli lord he deliv them thine hand 16 9 eye lord run fro whole earth shew himself strong behalf them whose heart is perfect him herein thou hast done foolishli therefor henceforth thou shalt have war 16 10 then asa wa wroth seer put him prison hous he wa rage him becaus thi thing asa oppress some peopl same time 16 11 behold act asa first last lo they are written book king judah israel 16 12 asa thirti ninth year hi reign wa diseas hi feet hi diseas wa exceed great yet hi diseas he sought not lord but physician 16 13 asa slept hi father die one fortieth year hi reign 16 14 they buri him hi own sepulchr which he had made himself citi david laid him bed which wa fill sweet odour diver kind spice prepar apothecari art they made veri great burn him 17 1 jehoshaphat hi son reign hi stead strengthen himself against israel 17 2 he place forc all fenc citi judah set garrison land judah citi ephraim which asa hi father had taken 17 3 lord wa jehoshaphat becaus he walk first way hi father david sought not unto baalim 17 4 but sought lord god hi father walk hi command not do israel 17 5 therefor lord stablish kingdom hi hand all judah brought jehoshaphat present he had rich honour abund 17 6 hi heart wa lift way lord moreov he took away high place grove judah 17 7 also third year hi reign he sent hi princ even benhail obadiah zechariah nethaneel michaiah teach citi judah 17 8 them he sent levit even shemaiah nethaniah zebadiah asahel shemiramoth jehonathan adonijah tobijah tobadonijah levit them elishama jehoram priest 17 9 they taught judah had book law lord them went all citi judah taught peopl 17 10 fear lord fell all kingdom land that were round judah so that they made no war against jehoshaphat 17 11 also some philistin brought jehoshaphat present tribut silver arabian brought him flock seven thousand seven hundr ram seven thousand seven hundr he goat 17 12 jehoshaphat wax great exceedingli he built judah castl citi store 17 13 he had much busi citi judah men war mighti men valour were jerusalem 17 14 these are number them accord hous their father judah captain thousand adnah chief him mighti men valour three hundr thousand 17 15 next him wa jehohanan captain him two hundr fourscor thousand 17 16 next him wa amasiah son zichri who willingli offer himself unto lord him two hundr thousand mighti men valour 17 17 benjamin eliada mighti man valour him arm men bow shield two hundr thousand 17 18 next him wa jehozabad him hundr fourscor thousand readi prepar war 17 19 these wait king besid those whom king put fenc citi all judah 18 1 now jehoshaphat had rich honour abund join affin ahab 18 2 certain year he went down ahab samaria ahab kill sheep oxen him abund peopl that he had him persuad him go him ramothgilead 18 3 ahab king israel said unto jehoshaphat king judah wilt thou go me ramothgilead he answer him i am as thou art my peopl as thi peopl we will be thee war 18 4 jehoshaphat said unto king israel enquir i pray thee word lord day 18 5 therefor king israel gather togeth prophet four hundr men said unto them shall we go ramothgilead battl or shall i forbear they said go god will deliv it king s hand 18 6 but jehoshaphat said is there not here prophet lord besid that we might enquir him 18 7 king israel said unto jehoshaphat there is yet one man whom we may enquir lord but i hate him he never prophesi good unto me but alway evil same is micaiah son imla jehoshaphat said let not king say so 18 8 king israel call one hi offic said fetch quickli micaiah son imla 18 9 king israel jehoshaphat king judah sat either them hi throne cloth their robe they sat void place enter gate samaria all prophet prophesi them 18 10 zedekiah son chenaanah had made him horn iron said thu saith lord these thou shalt push syria they be consum 18 11 all prophet prophesi so say go ramothgilead prosper lord shall deliv it hand king 18 12 messeng that went call micaiah spake him say behold word prophet declar good king one assent let thi word therefor i pray thee be like one their speak thou good 18 13 micaiah said as lord liveth even what my god saith that will i speak 18 14 when he wa come king king said unto him micaiah shall we go ramothgilead battl or shall i forbear he said go ye prosper they shall be deliv your hand 18 15 king said him how mani time shall i adjur thee that thou say noth but truth me name lord 18 16 then he said i did see all israel scatter mountain as sheep that have no shepherd lord said these have no master let them return therefor everi man hi hous peac 18 17 king israel said jehoshaphat did i not tell thee that he would not prophesi good unto me but evil 18 18 again he said therefor hear word lord i saw lord sit hi throne all host heaven stand hi right hand hi left 18 19 lord said who shall entic ahab king israel that he may go fall ramothgilead one spake say thi manner anoth say that manner 18 20 then there came spirit stood lord said i will entic him lord said unto him wherewith 18 21 he said i will go be lie spirit mouth all hi prophet lord said thou shalt entic him thou shalt also prevail go do even so 18 22 now therefor behold lord hath put lie spirit mouth these thi prophet lord hath spoken evil against thee 18 23 then zedekiah son chenaanah came near smote micaiah cheek said which way went spirit lord me speak unto thee 18 24 micaiah said behold thou shalt see that day when thou shalt go inner chamber hide thyself 18 25 then king israel said take ye micaiah carri him back amon governor citi joash king s son 18 26 say thu saith king put thi fellow prison feed him bread afflict water afflict i return peac 18 27 micaiah said if thou certainli return peac then hath not lord spoken me he said hearken all ye peopl 18 28 so king israel jehoshaphat king judah went ramothgilead 18 29 king israel said unto jehoshaphat i will disguis myself i will go battl but put thou thi robe so king israel disguis himself they went battl 18 30 now king syria had command captain chariot that were him say fight ye not small or great save onli king israel 18 31 it came pass when captain chariot saw jehoshaphat that they said it is king israel therefor they compass him fight but jehoshaphat cri lord help him god move them depart him 18 32 it came pass that when captain chariot perceiv that it wa not king israel they turn back again pursu him 18 33 certain man drew bow ventur smote king israel joint har therefor he said hi chariot man turn thine hand that thou mayest carri me host i am wound 18 34 battl increas that day howbeit king israel stay himself hi chariot against syrian even time sun go down he die 19 1 jehoshaphat king judah return hi hous peac jerusalem 19 2 jehu son hanani seer went meet him said king jehoshaphat shouldest thou help ungodli love them that hate lord therefor is wrath thee lord 19 3 nevertheless there are good thing found thee that thou hast taken away grove land hast prepar thine heart seek god 19 4 jehoshaphat dwelt jerusalem he went again peopl beersheba mount ephraim brought them back unto lord god their father 19 5 he set judg land all fenc citi judah citi citi 19 6 said judg take heed what ye do ye judg not man but lord who is you judgment 19 7 wherefor now let fear lord be you take heed do it there is no iniqu lord our god nor respect person nor take gift 19 8 moreov jerusalem did jehoshaphat set levit priest chief father israel judgment lord controversi when they return jerusalem 19 9 he charg them say thu shall ye do fear lord faith perfect heart 19 10 what caus soever shall come you your brethren that dwell your citi blood blood law command statut judgment ye shall even warn them that they trespass not against lord so wrath come you your brethren thi do ye shall not trespass 19 11 behold amariah chief priest is you all matter lord zebadiah son ishmael ruler hous judah all king s matter also levit shall be offic you deal courag lord shall be good 20 1 it came pass thi also that children moab children ammon them other besid ammonit came against jehoshaphat battl 20 2 then there came some that told jehoshaphat say there cometh great multitud against thee sea thi side syria behold they be hazazontamar which is engedi 20 3 jehoshaphat fear set himself seek lord proclaim fast all judah 20 4 judah gather themselv togeth ask help lord even all citi judah they came seek lord 20 5 jehoshaphat stood congreg judah jerusalem hous lord new court 20 6 said o lord god our father art not thou god heaven rulest not thou all kingdom heathen thine hand is there not power might so that none is abl withstand thee 20 7 art not thou our god who didst drive inhabit thi land thi peopl israel gavest it seed abraham thi friend ever 20 8 they dwelt therein have built thee sanctuari therein thi name say 20 9 if when evil cometh us as sword judgment or pestil or famin we stand thi hous thi presenc thi name is thi hous cri unto thee our afflict then thou wilt hear help 20 10 now behold children ammon moab mount seir whom thou wouldest not let israel invad when they came land egypt but they turn them destroy them not 20 11 behold i say how they reward us come cast us thi possess which thou hast given us inherit 20 12 o our god wilt thou not judg them we have no might against thi great compani that cometh against us neither know we what do but our eye are thee 20 13 all judah stood lord their littl one their wive their children 20 14 then jahaziel son zechariah son benaiah son jeiel son mattaniah levit son asaph came spirit lord midst congreg 20 15 he said hearken ye all judah ye inhabit jerusalem thou king jehoshaphat thu saith lord unto you be not afraid nor dismay reason thi great multitud battl is not your but god s kohathit children korhit stood prais lord god israel loud voic high 20 20 they rose earli morn went forth wilder tekoa as they went forth jehoshaphat stood said hear me o judah ye inhabit jerusalem believ lord your god so shall ye be establish believ hi prophet so shall ye prosper 20 21 when he had consult peopl he appoint singer unto lord that should prais beauti holi as they went armi say prais lord hi merci endureth ever 20 22 when they began sing prais lord set ambush against children ammon moab mount seir which were come against judah they were smitten 20 23 children ammon moab stood against inhabit mount seir utterli slay destroy them when they had made end inhabit seir everi one help destroy anoth 20 24 when judah came watch tower wilder they look unto multitud behold they were dead bodi fallen earth none escap 20 25 when jehoshaphat hi peopl came take away spoil them they found them abund both rich dead bodi preciou jewel which they strip off themselv more than they could carri away they were three day gather spoil it wa so much 20 26 fourth day they assembl themselv valley berachah there they bless lord therefor name same place wa call valley berachah unto thi day 20 27 then they return everi man judah jerusalem jehoshaphat forefront them go again jerusalem joy lord had made them rejoic their enemi 20 28 they came jerusalem psalteri harp trumpet unto hous lord 20 29 fear god wa all kingdom those countri when they had heard that lord fought against enemi israel 20 30 so realm jehoshaphat wa quiet hi god gave him rest round 20 31 jehoshaphat reign judah
