jehoshaphat king israel 21 3 their father gave them great gift silver gold preciou thing fenc citi judah but kingdom gave he jehoram becaus he wa firstborn 21 4 now when jehoram wa risen kingdom hi father he strengthen himself slew all hi brethren sword diver also princ israel 21 5 jehoram wa thirti two year old when he began reign he reign eight year jerusalem 21 6 he walk way king israel like as did hous ahab he had daughter ahab wife he wrought that which wa evil eye lord 21 7 howbeit lord would not destroy hous david becaus coven that he had made david as he promis give light him hi son ever 21 8 hi day edomit revolt dominion judah made themselv king 21 9 then jehoram went forth hi princ all hi chariot him he rose night smote edomit which compass him captain chariot 21 10 so edomit revolt hand judah unto thi day same time also did libnah revolt hi hand becaus he had forsaken lord god hi father 21 11 moreov he made high place mountain judah caus inhabit jerusalem commit fornic compel judah thereto 21 12 there came write him elijah prophet say thu saith lord god david thi father becaus thou hast not walk way jehoshaphat thi father nor way asa king judah 21 13 but hast walk way king israel hast made judah inhabit jerusalem go whore like whoredom hous ahab also hast slain thi brethren thi father s hous which were better than thyself 21 14 behold great plagu will lord smite thi peopl thi children thi wive all thi good 21 15 thou shalt have great sick diseas thi bowel thi bowel fall reason sick day day 21 16 moreov lord stir against jehoram spirit philistin arabian that were near ethiopian 21 17 they came judah brake it carri away all substanc that wa found king s hous hi son also hi wive so that there wa never son left him save jehoahaz youngest hi son 21 18 all thi lord smote him hi bowel incur diseas 21 19 it came pass that process time end two year hi bowel fell reason hi sick so he die sore diseas hi peopl made no burn him like burn hi father 21 20 thirti two year old wa he when he began reign he reign jerusalem eight year depart be desir howbeit they buri him citi david but not sepulchr king 22 1 inhabit jerusalem made ahaziah hi youngest son king hi stead band men that came arabian camp had slain all eldest so ahaziah son jehoram king judah reign 22 2 forti two year old wa ahaziah when he began reign he reign one year jerusalem hi mother s name also wa athaliah daughter omri 22 3 he also walk way hous ahab hi mother wa hi counsellor do wickedli 22 4 wherefor he did evil sight lord like hous ahab they were hi counsellor death hi father hi destruct 22 5 he walk also their counsel went jehoram son ahab king israel war against hazael king syria ramothgilead syrian smote joram 22 6 he return be heal jezreel becaus wound which were given him ramah when he fought hazael king syria azariah son jehoram king judah went down see jehoram son ahab jezreel becaus he wa sick 22 7 destruct ahaziah wa god come joram when he wa come he went jehoram against jehu son nimshi whom lord had anoint cut off hous ahab 22 8 it came pass that when jehu wa execut judgment hous ahab found princ judah son brethren ahaziah that minist ahaziah he slew them 22 9 he sought ahaziah they caught him he wa hid samaria brought him jehu when they had slain him they buri him becaus said they he is son jehoshaphat who sought lord all hi heart so hous ahaziah had no power keep still kingdom 22 10 but when athaliah mother ahaziah saw that her son wa dead she aros destroy all seed royal hous judah 22 11 but jehoshabeath daughter king took joash son ahaziah stole him king s son that were slain put him hi nurs bedchamb so jehoshabeath daughter king jehoram wife jehoiada priest she wa sister ahaziah hid him athaliah so that she slew him not 22 12 he wa them hid hous god six year athaliah reign land 23 1 seventh year jehoiada strengthen himself took captain hundr azariah son jeroham ishmael son jehohanan azariah son obe maaseiah son adaiah elishaphat son zichri coven him 23 2 they went judah gather levit all citi judah chief father israel they came jerusalem 23 3 all congreg made coven king hous god he said unto them behold king s son shall reign as lord hath said son david 23 4 thi is thing that ye shall do third part you enter sabbath priest levit shall be porter door 23 5 third part shall be king s hous third part gate foundat all peopl shall be court hous lord 23 6 but let none come hous lord save priest they that minist levit they shall go they are holi but all peopl shall keep watch lord 23 7 levit shall compass king round everi man hi weapon hi hand whosoev els cometh hous he shall be put death but be ye king when he cometh when he goeth 23 8 so levit all judah did accord all thing that jehoiada priest had command took everi man hi men that were come sabbath them that were go sabbath jehoiada priest dismiss not cours 23 9 moreov jehoiada priest deliv captain hundr spear buckler shield that had been king david s which were hous god 23 10 he set all peopl everi man have hi weapon hi hand right side templ left side templ altar templ king round 23 11 then they brought king s son put him crown gave him testimoni made him king jehoiada hi son anoint him said god save king 23 12 now when athaliah heard nois peopl run prais king she came peopl hous lord 23 13 she look behold king stood hi pillar enter princ trumpet king all peopl land rejoic sound trumpet also singer instrument musick such as taught sing prais then athaliah rent her cloth said treason treason 23 14 then jehoiada priest brought captain hundr that were set host said unto them have her forth rang whoso followeth her let him be slain sword priest said slay her not hous lord 23 15 so they laid hand her when she wa come enter hors gate king s hous they slew her there 23 16 jehoiada made coven him all peopl king that they should be lord s peopl 23 17 then all peopl went hous baal brake it down brake hi altar hi imag piec slew mattan priest baal altar 23 18 also jehoiada appoint offic hous lord hand priest levit whom david had distribut hous lord offer burnt offer lord as it is written law mose rejoic sing as it wa ordain david 23 19 he set porter gate hous lord that none which wa unclean ani thing should enter 23 20 he took captain hundr nobl governor peopl all peopl land brought down king hous lord they came high gate king s hous set king throne kingdom 23 21 all peopl land rejoic citi wa quiet that they had slain athaliah sword 24 1 joash wa seven year old when he began reign he reign forti year jerusalem hi mother s name also wa zibiah beersheba 24 2 joash did that which wa right sight lord all day jehoiada priest 24 3 jehoiada took him two wive he begat son daughter 24 4 it came pass thi that joash wa mind repair hous lord 24 5 he gather togeth priest levit said them go unto citi judah gather all israel money repair hous your god year year see that ye hasten matter howbeit levit hasten it not 24 6 king call jehoiada chief said unto him whi hast thou not requir levit bring judah jerusalem collect accord command mose servant lord congreg israel tabernacl wit 24 7 son athaliah that wick woman had broken hous god also all dedic thing hous lord did they bestow baalim 24 8 king s command they made chest set it gate hous lord 24 9 they made proclam judah jerusalem bring lord collect that mose servant god laid israel wilder 24 10 all princ all peopl rejoic brought cast chest they had made end 24 11 now it came pass that what time chest wa brought unto king s offic hand levit when they saw that there wa much money king s scribe high priest s offic came empti chest took it carri it hi place again thu they did day day gather money abund 24 12 king jehoiada gave it such as did work servic hous lord hire mason carpent repair hous lord also such as wrought iron brass mend hous lord 24 13 so workmen wrought work wa perfect them they set hous god hi state strengthen it 24 14 when they had finish it they brought rest money king jehoiada whereof were made vessel hous lord even vessel minist offer withal spoon vessel gold silver they offer burnt offer hous lord continu all day jehoiada 24 15 but jehoiada wax old wa full day when he die hundr thirti year old wa he when he die 24 16 they buri him citi david king becaus he had done good israel both god hi hous 24 17 now death jehoiada came princ judah made obeis king then king hearken unto them 24 18 they left hous lord god their father serv grove idol wrath came judah jerusalem thi their trespass 24 19 yet he sent prophet them bring them again unto lord they testifi against them but they would not give ear 24 20 spirit god came zechariah son jehoiada priest which stood peopl said unto them thu saith god whi transgress ye command lord that ye cannot prosper becaus ye have forsaken lord he hath also forsaken you 24 21 they conspir against him stone him stone command king court hous lord 24 22 thu joash king rememb not kind which jehoiada hi father had done him but slew hi son when he die he said lord look it requir it 24 23 it came pass end year that host syria came against him they came judah jerusalem destroy all princ peopl peopl sent all spoil them unto king damascu 24 24 armi syrian came small compani men lord deliv veri great host their hand becaus they had forsaken lord god their father so they execut judgment against joash 24 25 when they were depart him they left him great diseas hi own servant conspir against him blood son jehoiada priest slew him hi bed he die they buri him citi david but they buri him not sepulchr king 24 26 these are they that conspir against him zabad son shimeath ammonitess jehozabad son shimrith moabitess 24 27 now concern hi son great burden laid him repair hous god behold they are written stori book king amaziah hi son reign hi stead 25 1 amaziah wa twenti five year old when he began reign he reign twenti nine year jerusalem hi mother s name wa jehoaddan jerusalem 25 2 he did that which wa right sight lord but not perfect heart 25 3 now it came pass when kingdom wa establish him that he slew hi servant that had kill king hi father 25 4 but he slew not their children but did as it is written law book mose where lord command say father shall not die children neither shall children die father but everi man shall die hi own sin 25 5 moreov amaziah gather judah togeth made them captain thousand captain hundr accord hous their father all judah benjamin he number them twenti year old found them three hundr thousand choic men abl go forth war that could handl spear shield 25 6 he hire also hundr thousand mighti men valour israel hundr talent silver 25 7 but there came man god him say o king let not armi israel go thee lord is not israel wit all children ephraim 25 8 but if thou wilt go do it be strong battl god shall make thee fall enemi god hath power help cast down 25 9 amaziah said man god but what shall we do hundr talent which i have given armi israel man god answer lord is abl give thee much more than thi 25 10 then amaziah separ them wit armi that wa come him ephraim go home again wherefor their anger wa greatli kindl against judah they return home great anger 25 11 amaziah strengthen himself led forth hi peopl went valley salt smote children seir ten thousand 25 12 other ten thousand left aliv did children judah carri away captiv brought them unto top rock cast them down top rock that they all were broken piec 25 13 but soldier armi which amaziah sent back that they should not go him battl fell citi judah samaria even unto bethhoron smote three thousand them took much spoil 25 14 now it came pass that amaziah wa come slaughter edomit that he brought god children seir set them be hi god bow down himself them burn incens unto them 25 15 wherefor anger lord wa kindl against amaziah he sent unto him prophet which said unto him whi hast thou sought god peopl which could not deliv their own peopl thine hand 25 16 it came pass as he talk him that king said unto him art thou made king s counsel forbear whi shouldest thou be smitten then prophet forbar said i know that god hath determin destroy thee becaus thou hast done thi hast not hearken unto my counsel 25 17 then amaziah king judah took advic sent joash son jehoahaz son jehu king israel say come let us see one anoth face 25 18 joash king israel sent amaziah king judah say thistl that wa lebanon sent cedar that wa lebanon say give thi daughter my son wife there pass wild beast that wa lebanon trode down thistl 25 19 thou sayest lo thou hast smitten edomit thine heart lifteth thee boast abid now home whi shouldest thou meddl thine hurt that thou shouldest fall even thou judah thee 25 20 but amaziah would not hear it came god that he might deliv them hand their enemi becaus they sought god edom 25 21 so joash king israel went they saw one anoth face both he amaziah king judah bethshemesh which belongeth judah 25 22 judah wa put wors israel they fled everi man hi tent 25 23 joash king israel took amaziah king judah son joash son jehoahaz bethshemesh brought him jerusalem brake down wall jerusalem gate ephraim corner gate four hundr cubit 25 24 he took all gold silver all vessel that were found hous god obededom treasur king s hous hostag also return samaria 25 25 amaziah son joash king judah live death joash son jehoahaz king israel fifteen year 25 26 now rest act amaziah first last behold are they not written book king judah israel 25 27 now time that amaziah did turn away follow lord they made conspiraci against him jerusalem he fled lachish but they sent lachish him slew him there 25 28 they brought him hors buri him hi father citi judah 26 1 then all peopl judah took uzziah who wa sixteen year old made him king room hi father amaziah 26 2 he built eloth restor it judah that king slept hi father 26 3 sixteen year old wa uzziah when he began reign he reign fifti two year jerusalem hi mother s name also wa jecoliah jerusalem 26 4 he did that which wa right sight lord accord all that hi father amaziah did 26 5 he sought god day zechariah who had understand vision god as long as he sought lord god made him prosper 26 6 he went forth war against philistin brake down wall gath wall jabneh wall ashdod built citi ashdod philistin 26 7 god help him against philistin against arabian that dwelt gurbaal mehunim 26 8 ammonit gave gift uzziah hi name spread abroad even enter egypt he strengthen himself exceedingli 26 9 moreov uzziah built tower jerusalem corner gate valley gate turn wall fortifi them 26 10 also he built tower desert dig mani well he had much cattl both low countri plain husbandmen also vine dresser mountain carmel he love husbandri 26 11 moreov uzziah had host fight men that went war band accord number their account hand jeiel scribe maaseiah ruler hand hananiah one king s captain 26 12 whole number chief father mighti men valour were two thousand six hundr 26 13 their hand wa armi three hundr thousand seven thousand five hundr that made war mighti power help king against enemi 26 14 uzziah prepar them all host shield spear helmet habergeon bow sling cast stone 26 15 he made jerusalem engin invent cun men be tower bulwark shoot arrow great stone withal hi name spread far abroad he wa marvel help till he wa strong 26 16 but when he wa strong hi heart wa lift hi destruct he transgress against lord hi god went templ lord burn incens altar incens 26 17 azariah priest went him him fourscor priest lord that were valiant men 26 18 they withstood uzziah king said unto him it appertaineth not unto thee uzziah burn incens unto lord but priest son aaron that are consecr burn incens go sanctuari thou hast trespass neither shall it be thine honour lord god 26 19 then uzziah wa wroth had censer hi hand burn incens while he wa wroth priest leprosi even rose hi forehead priest hous lord besid incens altar 26 20 azariah chief priest all priest look him behold he wa leprou hi forehead they thrust him thenc yea himself hast also go becaus lord had smitten him 26 21 uzziah king wa leper unto day hi death dwelt sever hous be leper he wa cut off hous lord jotham hi son wa king s hous judg peopl land 26 22 now rest act uzziah first last did isaiah prophet son amoz write 26 23 so uzziah slept hi father they buri him hi father field burial which belong king they said he is leper jotham hi son reign hi stead 27 1 jotham wa twenti five year old when he began reign he reign sixteen year jerusalem hi mother s name also wa jerushah daughter zadok 27 2 he did that which wa right sight lord accord all that hi father uzziah did howbeit he enter not templ lord peopl did yet corruptli 27 3 he built high gate hous lord wall ophel he built much 27 4 moreov he built citi mountain judah forest he built castl tower 27 5 he fought also king ammonit prevail against them children ammon gave him same year hundr talent silver ten thousand measur wheat ten thousand barley so much did children ammon pay unto him both second year third 27 6 so jotham becam mighti becaus he prepar hi way lord hi god 27 7 now rest act jotham all hi war hi way lo they are written book king israel judah 27 8 he wa five twenti year old when he began reign reign sixteen year jerusalem 27 9 jotham slept hi father they buri him citi david ahaz hi son reign hi stead 28 1 ahaz wa twenti year old when he began reign he reign sixteen year jerusalem but he did not that which wa right sight lord like david hi father 28 2 he walk way king israel made also molten imag baalim 28 3 moreov he burnt incens valley son hinnom burnt hi children fire abomin heathen whom lord had cast children israel 28 4 he sacrif also burnt incens high place hill everi green tree 28 5 wherefor lord hi god deliv him hand king syria they smote him carri away great multitud them captiv brought them damascu he wa also deliv hand king israel who smote him great slaughter 28 6 pekah son remaliah slew judah hundr twenti thousand one day which were all valiant men becaus they had forsaken lord god their father 28 7 zichri mighti man ephraim slew maaseiah king s son azrikam governor hous elkanah that wa next king 28 8 children israel carri away captiv their brethren two hundr thousand women son daughter took also away much spoil them brought spoil samaria 28 9 but prophet lord wa there whose name wa ode he went host that came samaria said unto them behold becaus lord god your father wa wroth judah he hath deliv them your hand ye have slain them rage that reacheth unto heaven 28 10 now ye purpos keep children judah jerusalem bondmen bondwomen unto you but are there not you even you sin against lord your god 28 11 now hear me therefor deliv captiv again which ye have taken captiv your brethren fierc wrath lord is you 28 12 then certain head children ephraim azariah son johanan berechiah son meshillemoth jehizkiah son shallum amasa son hadlai stood against them that came war 28 13 said unto them ye shall not bring captiv hither wherea we have offend against lord alreadi ye intend add more our sin our trespass our trespass is great there is fierc wrath against israel 28 14 so arm men left captiv spoil princ all congreg 28 15 men which were express name rose took captiv spoil cloth all that were nake them array them shod them gave them eat drink anoint them carri all feebl them ass brought them jericho citi palm tree their brethren then they return samaria 28 16 that time did king ahaz send unto king assyria help him 28 17 again edomit had come smitten judah carri away captiv 28 18 philistin also had invad citi low countri south judah had taken bethshemesh ajalon gederoth shocho villag thereof timnah villag thereof gimzo also villag thereof they dwelt there 28 19 lord brought judah low becaus ahaz king israel he made judah nake transgress sore against lord 28 20 tilgathpilnes king assyria came unto him distress him but strengthen him not 28 21 ahaz took away portion hous lord hous king princ gave it unto king assyria but he help him not 28 22 time hi distress did he trespass yet more against lord thi is that king ahaz 28 23 he sacrif unto god damascu which smote him he said becaus god king syria help them therefor will i sacrific them that they may help me but they were ruin him all israel 28 24 ahaz gather togeth vessel hous god cut piec vessel hous god shut door hous lord he made him altar everi corner jerusalem 28 25 everi sever citi judah he made high place burn incens unto other god provok anger lord god hi father 28 26 now rest hi act all hi way first last behold they are written book king judah israel 28 27 ahaz slept hi father they buri him citi even jerusalem but they brought him not sepulchr king israel hezekiah hi son reign hi stead 29 1 hezekiah began reign when he wa five twenti year old he reign nine twenti year jerusalem hi mother s name wa abijah daughter zechariah 29 2 he did that which wa right sight lord accord all that david hi father had done 29 3 he first year hi reign first month open door hous lord repair them 29 4 he brought priest levit gather them togeth east street 29 5 said unto them hear me ye levit sanctifi now yourselv sanctifi hous lord god your father carri forth filthi holi place 29 6 our father have trespass done that which wa evil eye lord our god have forsaken him have turn away their face habit lord turn their back 29 7 also they have shut door porch put lamp have not burn incens nor offer burnt offer holi place unto god israel 29 8 wherefor wrath lord wa judah jerusalem he hath deliv them troubl astonish hiss as ye see your eye 29 9 lo our father have fallen sword our son our daughter our wive are captiv thi 29 10 now it is mine heart make coven lord god israel that hi fierc wrath may turn away us 29 11 my son be not now neglig lord hath chosen you stand him serv him that ye should minist unto him burn incens 29 12 then levit aros mahath son amasai joel son azariah son kohathit son merari kish son abdi azariah son jehalelel gershonit joah son zimmah eden son joah 29 13 son elizaphan shimri jeiel son asaph zechariah mattaniah 29 14 son heman jehiel shimei son jeduthun shemaiah uzziel 29 15 they gather their brethren sanctifi themselv came accord command king word lord cleans hous lord 29 16 priest went inner part hous lord cleans it brought all unclean that they found templ lord court hous lord levit took it carri it abroad brook kidron 29 17 now they began first day first month sanctifi eighth day month came they porch lord so they sanctifi hous lord eight day sixteenth day first month they made end 29 18 then they went hezekiah king said we have cleans all hous lord altar burnt offer all vessel thereof shewbread tabl all vessel thereof 29 19 moreov all vessel which king ahaz hi reign did cast away hi transgress have we prepar sanctifi behold they are altar lord 29 20 then hezekiah king rose earli gather ruler citi went hous lord 29 21 they brought seven bullock seven ram seven lamb seven he goat sin offer kingdom sanctuari judah he command priest son aaron offer them altar lord 29 22 so they kill bullock priest receiv blood sprinkl it altar likewis when they had kill ram they sprinkl blood altar they kill also lamb they sprinkl blood altar 29 23 they brought forth he goat sin offer king congreg they laid their hand them 29 24 priest kill them they made reconcili their blood altar make aton all israel king command that burnt offer sin offer should be made all israel 29 25 he set levit hous lord cymbal psalteri harp accord command david gad king s seer nathan prophet so wa command lord hi prophet 29 26 levit stood instrument david priest trumpet 29 27 hezekiah command offer burnt offer altar when burnt offer began song lord began also trumpet instrument ordain david king israel 29 28 all congreg worship singer sang trumpet sound all thi continu burnt offer wa finish 29 29 when they had made end offer king all that were present him bow themselv worship 29 30 moreov hezekiah king princ command levit sing prais unto lord word david asaph seer they sang prais glad they bow their head worship 29 31 then hezekiah answer said now ye have consecr yourselv unto lord come near bring sacrific thank offer hous lord congreg brought sacrific thank offer as mani as were free heart burnt offer 29 32 number burnt offer which congreg brought wa threescor ten bullock hundr ram two hundr lamb all these were burnt offer lord 29 33 consecr thing were six hundr oxen three thousand sheep 29 34 but priest were too few so that they could not flay all burnt offer wherefor their brethren levit did help them till work wa end other priest had sanctifi themselv levit were more upright heart sanctifi themselv than priest 29 35 also burnt offer were abund fat peac offer drink offer everi burnt offer so servic hous lord wa set order 29 36 hezekiah rejoic all peopl that god had prepar peopl thing wa done suddenli 30 1 hezekiah sent all israel judah wrote letter also ephraim manasseh that they should come hous lord jerusalem keep passov unto lord god israel 30 2 king had taken counsel hi princ all congreg jerusalem keep passov second month 30 3 they could not keep it that time becaus priest had not sanctifi themselv suffici neither had peopl gather themselv togeth jerusalem 30 4 thing pleas king all congreg 30 5 so they establish decre make proclam all israel beersheba even dan that they should come keep passov unto lord god israel jerusalem they had not done it long time such sort as it wa written 30 6 so post went letter king hi princ all israel judah accord command king say ye children israel turn again unto lord god abraham isaac israel he will return remnant you that are escap hand king assyria 30 7 be not ye like your father like your brethren which trespass against lord god their father who therefor gave them desol as ye see 30 8 now be ye not stiffneck as your father were but yield yourselv unto lord enter hi sanctuari which he hath sanctifi ever serv lord your god that fierc hi wrath may turn away you 30 9 if ye turn again unto lord your brethren your children shall find compass them that lead them captiv so that they shall come again thi land lord your god is graciou merci will not turn away hi face you if ye return unto him 30 10 so post pass citi citi countri ephraim manasseh even unto zebulun but they laugh them scorn mock them 30 11 nevertheless diver asher manasseh zebulun humbl themselv came jerusalem 30 12 also judah hand god wa give them one heart do command king princ word lord 30 13 there assembl jerusalem much peopl keep feast unleaven bread second month veri great congreg 30 14 they aros took away altar that were jerusalem all altar incens took they away cast them brook kidron 30 15 then they kill passov fourteenth day second month priest levit were asham sanctifi themselv brought burnt offer hous lord 30 16 they stood their place their manner accord law mose man god priest sprinkl blood which they receiv hand levit 30 17 there were mani congreg that were not sanctifi therefor levit had charg kill passov everi one that wa not clean sanctifi them unto lord 30 18 multitud peopl even mani ephraim manasseh issachar zebulun had not cleans themselv yet did they eat passov otherwis than it wa written but hezekiah pray them say good lord pardon everi one 30 19 that prepareth hi heart seek god lord god hi father though he be not cleans accord purif sanctuari 30 20 lord hearken hezekiah heal peopl 30 21 children israel that were present jerusalem kept feast unleaven bread seven day great glad levit priest prais lord day day sing loud instrument unto lord 30 22 hezekiah spake comfort unto all levit that taught good knowledg lord they did eat feast seven day offer peac offer make confess lord god their father 30 23 whole assembl took counsel keep other seven day they kept other seven day glad 30 24 hezekiah king judah did give congreg thousand bullock seven thousand sheep princ gave congreg thousand bullock ten thousand sheep great number priest sanctifi themselv 30 25 all congreg judah priest levit all congreg that came israel stranger that came land israel that hi holi dwell place even unto heaven 31 1 now when all thi wa finish all israel that were present went citi judah brake imag piec cut down grove threw down high place altar all judah benjamin ephraim also manasseh they had utterli destroy them all then all children israel return everi man hi possess their own citi 31 2 hezekiah appoint cours priest levit their cours everi man accord hi servic as it is written law lord 31 4 moreov he command peopl that dwelt jerusalem give portion priest levit that they might be encourag law lord 31 5 as soon as command came abroad children israel brought abund firstfruit corn wine oil honey all increas field tith all thing brought they abundantli 31 6 concern children israel judah that dwelt citi judah they also brought tith oxen sheep tith holi thing which were consecr unto lord their god laid them heap 31 7 third month they began lay foundat heap finish them seventh month 31 8 when hezekiah princ came saw heap they bless lord hi peopl israel 31 9 then hezekiah question priest levit concern heap 31 10 azariah chief priest hous zadok answer him said peopl began bring offer hous lord we have had enough eat have left plenti lord hath bless hi peopl that which is left is thi great store 31 11 then hezekiah command prepar chamber hous lord they prepar them 31 12 brought offer tith dedic thing faith which cononiah levit wa ruler shimei hi brother wa next 31 13 jehiel azaziah nahath asahel jerimoth jozabad eliel ismachiah mahath benaiah were overs hand cononiah shimei hi brother command hezekiah king azariah ruler hous god 31 14 kore 32 3 he took counsel hi princ hi mighti men stop water fountain which were citi they did help him 32 4 so there wa gather much peopl togeth who stop all fountain brook that ran midst land say whi should king assyria come find much water 32 5 also he strengthen himself built all wall that wa broken rais it tower anoth wall repair millo citi david made dart shield abund 32 6 he set captain war peopl gather them togeth him street gate citi spake comfort them say 32 7 be strong courag be not afraid nor dismay king assyria nor all multitud that is him there be more us than him 32 8 him is arm flesh but us is lord our god help us fight our battl peopl rest themselv word hezekiah king judah 32 9 thi did sennacherib king assyria send hi servant jerusalem but he himself laid sieg against lachish all hi power him unto hezekiah king judah unto all judah that were jerusalem say 32 10 thu saith sennacherib king assyria whereon do ye trust that ye abid sieg jerusalem 32 11 doth not hezekiah persuad you give yourselv die famin thirst say lord our god shall deliv us hand king assyria 32 12 hath not same hezekiah taken away hi high place hi altar command judah jerusalem say ye shall worship one altar burn incens it 32 13 know ye not what i my father have done unto all peopl other land were god nation those land ani way abl deliv their land mine hand 32 14 who wa there all god those nation that my father utterli destroy that could deliv hi peopl mine hand that your god should be abl deliv you mine hand 32 15 now therefor let not hezekiah deceiv you nor persuad you thi manner neither yet believ him no god ani nation or kingdom wa abl deliv hi peopl mine hand hand my father how much less shall your god deliv you mine hand 32 16 hi servant spake yet more against lord god against hi servant hezekiah 32 17 he wrote also letter rail lord god israel speak against him say as god nation other land have not deliv their peopl mine hand so shall not god hezekiah deliv hi peopl mine hand 32 18 then they cri loud voic jew speech unto peopl jerusalem that were wall affright them troubl them that they might take citi 32 19 they spake against god jerusalem as against god peopl earth which were work hand man 32 20 thi caus hezekiah king prophet isaiah son amoz pray cri heaven 32 21 lord sent angel which cut off all mighti men valour leader captain camp king assyria so he return shame face hi own land when he wa come hous hi god they that came forth hi own bowel slew him there sword 32 22 thu lord save hezekiah inhabit jerusalem hand sennacherib king assyria hand all other guid them everi side 32 23 mani brought gift unto lord jerusalem present hezekiah king judah so that he wa magnifi sight all nation thenceforth 32 24 those day hezekiah wa sick death pray unto lord he spake unto him he gave him sign 32 25 but hezekiah render not again accord benefit done unto him hi heart wa lift therefor there wa wrath him judah jerusalem 32 26 notwithstand hezekiah humbl himself pride hi heart both he inhabit jerusalem so that wrath lord came not them day hezekiah 32 27 hezekiah had exceed much rich honour he made himself treasuri silver gold preciou stone spice much 32 30 thi same hezekiah also stop upper watercours gihon brought it straight down west side citi david hezekiah prosper all hi work 32 31 howbeit busi ambassador princ babylon who sent unto him israel 32 33 hezekiah slept hi father they buri him chiefest sepulchr son david all judah inhabit jerusalem did him honour hi death manasseh hi son reign hi stead 33 1 manasseh wa twelv year old when he began reign he reign fifti five year jerusalem 33 2 but did that which wa evil sight lord like unto abomin heathen whom lord had cast children israel 33 3 he built again high place which hezekiah hi father had broken down he rear altar baalim made grove worship all host heaven serv them 33 4 also he built altar hous lord whereof lord had said jerusalem shall my name be ever 33 5 he built altar all host heaven two court hous lord 33 6 he caus hi children pass fire valley son hinnom also he observ time use enchant use witchcraft dealt familiar spirit wizard he wrought much evil sight lord provok him anger 33 7 he set carv imag idol which he had made hous god which god had said david solomon hi son thi hous jerusalem which i have chosen all tribe israel will i put my name ever 33 8 neither will i ani more remov foot israel land which i have appoint your father so that they will take heed do all that i have command them accord whole law statut ordin hand mose 33 9 so manasseh made judah inhabit jerusalem err do wors than heathen whom lord had destroy children israel 33 10 lord spake manasseh hi peopl but they would not hearken 33 11 wherefor lord brought them captain host king assyria which took manasseh thorn bound him fetter carri him babylon 33 12 when he wa afflict he besought lord hi god humbl himself greatli god hi father 33 13 pray unto him he wa intreat him heard hi supplic brought him again jerusalem hi kingdom then manasseh knew that lord he wa god 33 14 now thi he built wall citi david west side gihon valley even enter fish gate compass ophel rais it veri great height put captain war all fenc citi judah 33 15 he took away strang god idol hous lord all altar that he had built mount hous lord jerusalem cast them citi 33 16 he repair altar lord sacrif thereon peac offer thank offer command judah serv lord god israel 33 17 nevertheless peopl did sacrific still high place yet unto lord their god onli 33 18 now rest act manasseh hi prayer unto hi god word seer that spake him name lord god israel behold they are written book king israel 33 19 hi prayer also how god wa intreat him all hi sin hi trespass place wherein he built high place set grove graven imag he wa humbl behold they are written say seer 33 20 so manasseh slept hi father they buri him hi own hous amon hi son reign hi stead 33 21 amon wa two twenti year old when he began reign reign two year jerusalem 33 22 but he did that which wa evil sight lord as did manasseh hi father amon sacrif unto all carv imag which manasseh hi father had made serv them 33 23 humbl not himself lord as manasseh hi father had humbl himself but amon trespass more more 33 24 hi servant conspir against him slew him hi own hous 33 25 but peopl land slew all them that had conspir against king amon peopl land made josiah hi son king hi stead 34 1 josiah wa eight year old when he began reign he reign jerusalem one thirti year 34 2 he did that which wa right sight lord walk way david hi father declin neither right hand nor left 34 3 eighth year hi reign while he wa yet young he began seek god david hi father twelfth year he began purg judah jerusalem high place grove carv imag molten imag 34 4 they brake down altar baalim hi presenc imag that were high them he cut down grove carv imag molten imag he brake piec made dust them strow it grave them that had sacrif unto them 34 5 he burnt bone priest their altar cleans judah jerusalem 34 6 so did he citi manasseh ephraim simeon even unto naphtali their mattock round 34 7 when he had broken down altar grove had beaten graven imag powder cut down all idol all land israel he return jerusalem 34 8 now eighteenth year hi reign when he had purg land hous he sent shaphan son azaliah maaseiah governor citi joah son joahaz record repair hous lord hi god 34 9 when they came hilkiah high priest they deliv money that wa brought hous god which levit that kept door had gather hand manasseh ephraim all remnant israel all judah benjamin they return jerusalem 34 10 they put it hand workmen that had oversight hous lord they gave it workmen that wrought hous lord repair amend hous 34 11 even artific builder gave they it buy hewn stone timber coupl floor hous which king judah had destroy 34 12 men did work faith overs them were jahath obadiah levit son merari zechariah meshullam son kohathit set it forward other levit all that could skill instrument musick 34 13 also they were bearer burden were overs all that wrought work ani manner servic levit there were scribe offic porter 34 14 when they brought money that wa brought hous lord hilkiah priest found book law lord given mose 34 15 hilkiah answer said shaphan scribe i have found book law hous lord hilkiah deliv book shaphan 34 16 shaphan carri book king brought king word back again say all that wa commit thi servant they do it 34 17 they have gather togeth money that wa found hous lord have deliv it hand overs hand workmen 34 18 then shaphan scribe told king say hilkiah priest hath given me book shaphan read it king 34 19 it came pass when king had heard word law that he rent hi cloth 34 20 king command hilkiah ahikam son shaphan abdon son micah shaphan scribe asaiah servant king s say 34 21 go enquir lord me them that are left israel judah concern word book that is found great is wrath lord that is pour us becaus our father have not kept word lord do all that is written thi book 34 22 hilkiah they that king had appoint went huldah prophetess wife shallum son tikvath son hasrah keeper wardrob now she dwelt jerusalem colleg they spake her that effect 34 23 she answer them thu saith lord god israel tell ye man that sent you me 34 24 thu saith lord behold i will bring evil thi place inhabit thereof even all curs that are written book which they have read king judah 34 25 becaus they have forsaken me have burn incens unto other god that they might provok me anger all work their hand therefor my wrath shall be pour thi place shall not be quench 34 26 as king judah who sent you enquir lord so shall ye say unto him thu saith lord god israel concern word which thou hast heard 34 27 becaus thine heart wa tender thou didst humbl thyself god when thou heardest hi word against thi place against inhabit thereof humbledst thyself me didst rend thi cloth weep me i have even heard thee also saith lord 34 28 behold i will gather thee thi father thou shalt be gather thi grave peac neither shall thine eye see all evil that i will bring thi place inhabit same so they brought king word again 34 29 then king sent gather togeth all elder judah jerusalem 34 30 king went hous lord all men judah inhabit jerusalem priest levit all peopl great small he read their ear all word book coven that wa found hous lord 34 31 king stood hi place made coven lord walk lord keep hi command hi testimoni hi statut all hi heart all hi soul perform word coven which are written thi book 34 32 he caus all that were present jerusalem benjamin stand it inhabit jerusalem did accord coven god god their father 34 33 josiah took away all abomin all countri that pertain children israel made all that were present israel serv even serv lord their god all hi day they depart not follow lord god their father 35 1 moreov josiah kept passov unto lord jerusalem they kill passov fourteenth day first month 35 2 he set priest their charg encourag them servic hous lord 35 3 said unto levit that taught all israel which were holi unto lord put holi ark hous which solomon son david king israel did build it shall not be burden your shoulder serv now lord your god hi peopl israel 35 4 prepar yourselv hous your father your cours accord write david king israel accord write solomon hi son 35 5 stand holi place accord divis famili father your brethren peopl divis famili levit 35 6 so kill passov sanctifi yourselv prepar your brethren that they may do accord word lord hand mose 35 7 josiah gave peopl flock lamb kid all passov offer all that were present number thirti thousand three thousand bullock these were king s substanc 35 8 hi princ gave willingli unto peopl priest levit hilkiah zechariah jehiel ruler hous god gave unto priest passov offer two thousand six hundr small cattl three hundr oxen 35 9 conaniah also shemaiah nethaneel hi brethren hashabiah jeiel jozabad chief levit gave unto levit passov offer five thousand small cattl five hundr oxen 35 10 so servic wa prepar priest stood their place levit their cours accord king s command 35 11 they kill passov priest sprinkl blood their hand levit flay them 35 12 they remov burnt offer that they might give accord divis famili peopl offer unto lord as it is written book mose so did they oxen 35 13 they roast passov fire accord ordin but other holi offer sod they pot caldron pan divid them speedili all peopl 35 14 afterward they made readi themselv priest becaus priest son aaron were busi offer burnt offer fat night therefor levit prepar themselv priest son aaron 35 15 singer son asaph were their place accord command david asaph heman jeduthun king s seer porter wait everi gate they might not depart their servic their brethren levit prepar them 35 16 so all servic lord wa prepar same day keep passov offer burnt offer altar lord accord command king josiah 35 17 children israel that were present kept passov that time feast unleaven bread seven day 35 18 there wa no passov like that kept israel day samuel prophet neither did all king israel keep such passov as josiah kept priest levit all judah israel that were present inhabit jerusalem 35 19 eighteenth year reign josiah wa thi passov kept 35 20 all thi when josiah had prepar templ necho king egypt came fight against charchemish euphrat josiah went against him 35 21 but he sent ambassador him say what have i do thee thou king judah i come not against thee thi day but against hous wherewith i have war god command me make hast forbear thee meddl god who is me that he destroy thee not 35 22 nevertheless josiah would not turn hi face him but disguis himself that he might fight him hearken not unto word necho mouth god came fight valley megiddo 35 23 archer shot king josiah king said hi servant have me away i am sore wound 35 24 hi servant therefor took him that chariot put him second chariot that he had they brought him jerusalem he die wa buri one sepulchr hi father all judah jerusalem mourn josiah 35 25 jeremiah lament josiah all sing men sing women spake josiah their lament thi day made them ordin israel behold they are written lament 35 26 now rest act josiah hi good accord that which wa written law lord 35 27 hi deed first last behold they are written book king israel judah 36 1 then peopl land took jehoahaz son josiah made him king hi father s stead jerusalem 36 2 jehoahaz wa twenti three year old when he began reign he reign three month jerusalem 36 3 king egypt put him down jerusalem condemn land hundr talent silver talent gold 36 4 king egypt made eliakim hi brother king judah jerusalem turn hi name jehoiakim necho took jehoahaz hi brother carri him egypt 36 5 jehoiakim wa twenti five year old when he began reign he reign eleven year jerusalem he did that which wa evil sight lord hi god 36 6 against him came nebuchadnezzar king babylon bound him fetter carri him babylon 36 7 nebuchadnezzar also carri vessel hous lord babylon put them hi templ babylon 36 8 now rest act jehoiakim hi abomin which he did that which wa found him behold they are written book king israel judah jehoiachin hi son reign hi stead 36 9 jehoiachin wa eight year old when he began reign he reign three month ten day jerusalem he did that which wa evil sight lord 36 10 when year wa expir king nebuchadnezzar sent brought him babylon goodli vessel hous lord made zedekiah hi brother king judah jerusalem 36 11 zedekiah wa one twenti year old when he began reign reign eleven year jerusalem 36 12 he did that which wa evil sight lord hi god humbl not himself jeremiah prophet speak mouth lord 36 13 he also rebel against king nebuchadnezzar who had made him swear god but he stiffen hi neck harden hi heart turn unto lord god israel 36 14 moreov all chief priest peopl transgress veri much all abomin heathen pollut hous lord which he had hallow jerusalem 36 15 lord god their father sent them hi messeng rise betim send becaus he had compass hi peopl hi dwell place 36 16 but they mock messeng god despis hi word misus hi prophet wrath lord aros against hi peopl till there wa no remedi 36 17 therefor he brought them king chalde who slew their young men sword hous their sanctuari had no compass young man or maiden old man or him that stoop age he gave them all hi hand 36 18 all vessel hous god great small treasur hous lord treasur king hi princ all these he brought babylon 36 19 they burnt hous god brake down wall jerusalem burnt all palac thereof fire destroy all goodli vessel thereof 36 20 them that had escap sword carri he away babylon where they were servant him hi son reign kingdom persia 36 21 fulfil word lord mouth jeremiah land had enjoy her sabbath as long as she lay desol she kept sabbath fulfil threescor ten year 36 22 now first year cyru king persia that word lord spoken mouth jeremiah might be accomplish lord stir spirit cyru king persia that he made proclam all hi kingdom put it also write say 36 23 thu saith cyru king persia 3 8 now second year their come unto hous god jerusalem second month began zerubbabel son shealtiel jeshua son jozadak remnant their brethren priest levit all they that were come captiv unto their brethren levit 3 10 when builder laid foundat templ lord they set priest their apparel trumpet levit son asaph cymbal prais lord ordin david king israel 3 11 they sang togeth cours prais give ancient men that had seen first hous when foundat thi hous wa laid their eye wept loud voic mani shout aloud joy 3 13 so that peopl could not discern nois shout joy nois weep peopl peopl shout loud shout nois wa heard afar off 4 1 now when adversari judah benjamin heard that children captiv build templ unto lord god israel 4 2 then they came zerubbabel chief father said unto them let us build you we seek your god as ye do we do sacrific unto him day esarhaddon king assur which brought us hither 4 3 but zerubbabel jeshua rest chief father israel said unto them ye have noth do us build hous unto our god but we ourselv togeth will build unto lord god israel as king cyru king persia hath command us 4 4 then peopl land weaken hand peopl judah troubl them build 4 5 hire counsellor against great nobl asnapp brought set citi samaria rest that are thi side river such time 4 11 thi is copi letter that they sent unto him even unto artaxerx king thi servant men thi side river such time 4 12 be it known unto king that jew which came thee us are come unto jerusalem build rebelli bad citi have set wall thereof join foundat 4 13 be it known now unto king that if thi citi be build wall set again then will they not pay toll tribut custom so thou shalt endamag revenu king 4 14 now becaus we have mainten king s palac it wa not meet us see king s dishonour therefor have we sent certifi king 4 15 that search may be made book record thi father so shalt thou find book record know that thi citi is rebelli citi hurt unto king provinc that they have move sedit same old time which caus wa thi citi destroy 4 16 we certifi king that if thi citi be build again wall thereof set thi mean thou shalt have no portion thi side river 4 17 then sent king answer unto rehum chancellor shimshai scribe rest their companion that dwell samaria unto rest river peac such time 4 18 letter which ye sent unto us hath been plainli read me 4 19 i command search hath been made it is found that thi citi old time hath made insurrect against king that rebellion sedit have been made therein 4 20 there have been mighti king also jerusalem which have rule all countri river toll tribut custom wa paid unto them 4 21 give ye now command caus these men ceas that thi citi be not build anoth command shall be given me 4 22 take heed now that ye fail not do thi whi should damag grow hurt king 4 23 now when copi king artaxerx letter wa read rehum shimshai scribe their companion they went hast jerusalem unto jew made them ceas forc power 4 24 then ceas work hous god which is jerusalem so it ceas unto second year reign dariu king persia 5 1 then prophet haggai prophet zechariah son iddo prophesi unto jew that were judah jerusalem name god israel even unto them 5 2 then rose zerubbabel son shealtiel jeshua son jozadak began build hous god which is jerusalem them were prophet god help them 5 3 same time came them tatnai governor thi side river shetharboznai their companion said thu unto them who hath command you build thi hous make thi wall 5 4 then said we unto them thi manner what are name men that make thi build 5 5 but eye their god wa elder jew that they could not caus them ceas till matter came dariu then they return answer letter concern thi matter 5 6 copi letter that tatnai governor thi side river shetharboznai hi companion apharsachit which were thi side river sent unto dariu king 5 7 they sent letter unto him wherein wa written thu unto dariu king all peac 5 8 be it known unto king that we went provinc judea hous great god which is build great stone timber is laid wall thi work goeth fast prospereth their hand 5 9 then ask we those elder said unto them thu who command you build thi hous make these wall 5 10 we ask their name also certifi thee that we might write name men that were chief them 5 11 thu they return us answer say we are servant god heaven earth build hous that wa build these mani year ago which great king israel build set 5 12 but that our father had provok god heaven unto wrath he gave them hand nebuchadnezzar king babylon chaldean who destroy thi hous carri peopl away babylon 5 13 but first year cyru king babylon same king cyru made decre build thi hous god 5 14 vessel also gold silver hous god which nebuchadnezzar took templ that wa jerusalem brought them templ babylon those did cyru king take templ babylon they were deliv unto one whose name wa sheshbazzar whom he had made governor 5 15 said unto him take these vessel go carri them templ that is jerusalem let hous god be build hi place 5 16 then came same sheshbazzar laid foundat hous god which is jerusalem that time even now hath it been build yet it is not finish 5 17 now therefor if it seem good king let there be search made king s treasur hous which is there babylon it be so that decre wa made cyru king build thi hous god jerusalem let king send hi pleasur us concern thi matter 6 1 then dariu king made decre search wa made hous roll where treasur were laid babylon 6 2 need both young bullock ram lamb burnt offer god heaven wheat salt wine oil accord appoint priest which are jerusalem let it be given them day day fail 6 10 that they may offer sacrific sweet savour unto god heaven pray life king hi son 6 11 also i have made decre that whosoev shall alter thi word let timber be pull down hi hous be set let him be hang thereon let hi hous be made dunghil thi 6 12 god that hath caus hi name dwell there destroy all king peopl that shall put their hand alter destroy thi hous god which is jerusalem i dariu have made decre let it be done speed 6 13 then tatnai put such thing as thi king s heart beautifi hous lord which is jerusalem 7 28 hath extend merci unto me king hi counsellor all king s mighti princ i wa strengthen as hand lord my god wa me i gather god us they brought us man understand son mahli son levi son israel sherebiah hi son hi brethren eighteen 8 19 hashabiah him jeshaiah son merari hi brethren their son twenti 8 20 also nethinim whom david princ had appoint servic levit two hundr twenti nethinim all them were express name 8 21 then i proclaim fast there river ahava that we might afflict ourselv our god seek him right way us our littl one all our substanc 8 22 i wa asham requir king band soldier horsemen help us against enemi way becaus we had spoken unto king say hand our god is all them good that seek him but hi power hi wrath is against all them that forsak him 8 23 so we fast besought our god thi he wa intreat us 8 24 then i separ twelv chief priest sherebiah hashabiah ten their brethren them 8 25 weigh unto them silver gold vessel even offer hous our god which king hi counsellor hi lord all israel there present had offer 8 26 i even weigh unto their hand six hundr fifti talent silver silver vessel hundr talent gold hundr talent 8 27 also twenti bason gold thousand dram two vessel fine copper preciou as gold 8 28 i said unto them ye are holi unto lord vessel are holi also silver gold are freewil offer unto lord god your father 8 29 watch ye keep them ye weigh them chief priest levit chief father israel jerusalem chamber hous lord 8 30 so took priest levit weight silver gold vessel bring them jerusalem unto hous our god 8 31 then we depart river ahava twelfth day first month go unto jerusalem hand our god wa us he deliv us hand enemi such as lay wait way 8 32 we came jerusalem abod there seven lamb twelv he goat sin offer all thi wa burnt offer unto lord 8 36 they deliv king s commiss unto king s lieuten governor thi side river they further peopl hous god 9 1 now when these thing were done princ came me say peopl israel priest levit have not separ themselv peopl land do accord their abomin even canaanit hittit perizzit jebusit ammonit moabit egyptian amorit 9 2 they have taken their daughter themselv their son so that holi seed have mingl themselv peopl those land yea hand princ ruler hath been chief thi trespass 9 3 when i heard thi thing i rent my garment my mantl pluck off hair my head my beard sat down astoni 9 4 then were assembl unto me everi one that trembl word god israel becaus transgress those that had been carri away i sat astoni even sacrific 9 5 even sacrific i aros my heavi have rent my garment my mantl i fell my knee spread my hand unto lord my god 9 6 said o my god i am asham blush lift my face thee my god our iniqu are increas our head our trespass is grown unto heaven 9 7 day our father have we been great trespass unto thi day our iniqu have we our king our priest been deliv hand king land sword captiv spoil confus face as it is thi day 9 8 now littl space grace hath been shew lord our god leav us remnant escap give us nail hi holi place that our god may lighten our eye give us littl reviv our bondag 9 9 we were bondmen yet our god hath not forsaken us our bondag but hath extend merci unto us sight king persia give us reviv set hous our god repair desol thereof give us wall judah jerusalem 9 10 now o our god what shall we say thi we have forsaken thi command 9 11 which thou hast command thi servant prophet say land unto which ye go possess it is unclean land filthi peopl land their abomin which have fill it one end anoth their unclean 9 12 now therefor give not your daughter unto their son neither take their daughter unto your son nor seek their peac or their wealth ever that ye may be strong eat good land leav it inherit your children ever 9 13 all that is come us our evil deed our great trespass see that thou our god hast punish us less than our iniqu deserv hast given us such deliver as thi 9 14 should we again break thi command join affin peopl these abomin wouldest not thou be angri us till thou hadst consum us so that there should be no remnant nor escap 9 15 o lord god israel thou art righteou we remain yet escap as it is thi day behold we are thee our trespass we cannot stand thee becaus thi 10 1 now when ezra had pray when he had confess weep cast himself down hous god there assembl unto him israel veri great congreg men women children peopl wept veri sore 10 2 shechaniah son jehiel one son elam answer said unto ezra we have trespass against our god have taken strang wive peopl land yet now there is hope israel concern thi thing 10 3 now therefor let us make coven our god put away all wive such as are born them accord counsel my lord those that trembl command our god let it be done accord law 10 4 aris thi matter belongeth unto thee we also will be thee be good courag do it 10 5 then aros ezra made chief priest levit all israel swear that they should do accord thi word they sware 10 6 then ezra rose hous god went chamber johanan son eliashib when he came thither he did eat no bread nor drink water he mourn becaus transgress them that had been carri away 10 7 they made proclam judah jerusalem unto all children captiv that they should gather themselv togeth unto jerusalem 10 8 that whosoev would not come three day accord counsel princ elder all hi substanc should be forfeit himself separ congreg those that had been carri away 10 9 then all men judah benjamin gather themselv togeth unto jerusalem three day it wa ninth month twentieth day month all peopl sat street hous god trembl becaus thi matter great rain 10 10 ezra priest stood said unto them ye have transgress have taken strang wive increas trespass israel 10 11 now therefor make confess unto lord god your father do hi pleasur separ yourselv peopl land strang wive 10 12 then all congreg answer said loud voic as thou hast said so must we do 10 13 but peopl are mani it is time much rain we are not abl stand neither is thi work one day or two we are mani that have transgress thi thing 10 14 let now our ruler all congreg stand let all them which have taken strang wive our citi come appoint time them elder everi citi judg thereof fierc wrath our god thi matter be turn us 10 15 onli jonathan son asahel jahaziah son tikvah were employ thi matter meshullam shabbethai levit help them 10 16 children captiv did so ezra priest certain chief father hous their father all them their name were separ sat down first day tenth month examin matter 10 17 they made end all men that had taken strang wive first day first month 10 18 son priest there were found that had taken strang wive name son jeshua son jozadak hi brethren maaseiah eliez jarib gedaliah 10 19 they gave their hand that they would put away their wive be guilti they offer ram flock their trespass 10 20 son immer hanani zebadiah 10 21 son harim maaseiah elijah shemaiah jehiel uzziah 10 22 son pashur elioenai maaseiah ishmael nethaneel jozabad elasah 10 23 also levit jozabad shimei kelaiah same is kelita pethahiah judah eliez 10 24 singer also eliashib porter shallum telem uri 10 25 moreov israel son parosh ramiah jeziah malchiah miamin eleazar malchijah benaiah 10 26 son elam mattaniah zechariah jehiel abdi jeremoth eliah 10 27 son zattu elioenai eliashib mattaniah jeremoth zabad aziza 10 28 son also bebai jehohanan hananiah zabbai athlai 10 29 son bani meshullam malluch adaiah jashub sheal ramoth 10 30 son pahathmoab adna chelal benaiah maaseiah mattaniah bezaleel binnui manasseh 10 31 son harim eliez ishijah 36 vaniah meremoth eliashib 10 37 mattaniah mattenai jaasau 10 38 bani binnui shimei 10 39 shelemiah nathan adaiah 10 40 machnadebai shashai sharai 10 41 azareel shelemiah shemariah 10 42 shallum amariah joseph 10 43 son nebo jeiel mattithiah zabad zebina jadau joel benaiah 10 44 all these had taken strang wive some them had wive whom they had children book nehemiah 1 1 word nehemiah son hachaliah it came pass month chisleu twentieth year as i wa shushan palac 1 2 that hanani one my brethren came he certain men judah i ask them concern jew that had escap which were left captiv concern jerusalem 1 3 they said unto me remnant that are left captiv there provinc are great afflict reproach wall jerusalem also is broken down gate thereof are burn fire 1 4 it came pass when i heard these word that i sat down wept mourn certain day fast pray god heaven 1 5 said i beseech thee o lord god heaven great terribl god that keepeth coven merci them that love him observ hi command 1 6 let thine ear now be attent thine eye open that thou mayest hear prayer thi servant which i pray thee now day night children israel thi servant confess sin children israel which we have sin against thee both i my father s hous have sin 1 7 we have dealt veri corruptli against thee have not kept command nor statut nor judgment which thou commandedst thi servant mose 1 8 rememb i beseech thee word that thou commandedst thi servant mose say if ye transgress i will scatter you abroad nation 1 9 but if ye turn unto me keep my command do them though there were you cast unto uttermost part heaven yet will i gather them thenc will bring them unto place that i have chosen set my name there 1 10 now these are thi servant thi peopl whom thou hast redeem thi great power thi strong hand 1 11 o lord i beseech thee let now thine ear be attent prayer thi servant prayer thi servant who desir fear thi name prosper i pray thee thi servant thi day grant him merci sight thi man i wa king s cupbear 2 1 it came pass month nisan twentieth year artaxerx king that wine wa him i took wine gave it unto king now i had not been beforetim sad hi presenc 2 2 wherefor king said unto me whi is thi counten sad see thou art not sick thi is noth els but sorrow heart then i wa veri sore afraid 2 3 said unto king let king live ever whi should not my counten be sad when citi place my father sepulchr lieth wast gate thereof are consum fire 2 4 then king said unto me what dost thou make request so i pray god heaven 2 5 i said unto king if it pleas king if thi servant have found favour thi sight that thou wouldest send me unto judah unto citi my father sepulchr that i may build it 2 6 king said unto me queen also sit him how long shall thi journey be when wilt thou return so it pleas king send me i set him time 2 7 moreov i said unto king if it pleas king let letter be given me governor river that they may convey me till i come judah 2 8 letter unto asaph keeper king s forest that he may give me timber make beam gate palac which appertain hous wall citi hous that i shall enter king grant me accord good hand my god me 2 9 then i came governor river gave them king s letter now king had sent captain armi horsemen me 2 10 when sanballat horonit tobiah servant ammonit heard it it griev them exceedingli that there wa come man seek welfar children israel 2 11 so i came jerusalem wa there three day 2 12 i aros night i some few men me neither told i ani man what my god had put my heart do jerusalem neither wa there ani beast me save beast that i rode 2 13 i went night gate valley even dragon well dung port view wall jerusalem which were broken down gate thereof were consum fire 2 14 then i went gate fountain king s pool but there wa no place beast that wa me pass 2 15 then went i night brook view wall turn back enter gate valley so return 2 16 ruler knew not whither i went or what i did neither had i as yet told it jew nor priest nor nobl nor ruler nor rest that did work 2 17 then said i unto them ye see distress that we are how jerusalem lieth wast gate thereof are burn fire come let us build wall jerusalem that we be no more reproach 2 18 then i told them hand my god which wa good me as also king s word that he had spoken unto me they said let us rise build so they strengthen their hand thi good work 2 19 but when sanballat horonit tobiah servant ammonit geshem arabian heard it they laugh us scorn despis us said what is thi thing that ye do will ye rebel against king 2 20 then answer i them said unto them god heaven he will prosper us therefor we hi servant will aris build but ye have no portion nor right nor memori jerusalem 3 1 then eliashib high priest rose hi brethren priest they build sheep gate they sanctifi it set door it even unto tower meah they sanctifi it unto tower hananeel 3 2 next unto him build men jericho next them build zaccur son imri 3 3 but fish gate did son hassenaah build who also laid beam thereof set door thereof lock thereof bar thereof 3 4 next son hashabniah 3 11 malchijah son harim hashub son pahathmoab repair other piec tower furnac 3 12 next unto him repair shallum son halohesh ruler half part jerusalem he hi daughter 3 13 valley gate repair hanun inhabit zanoah they built it set door thereof lock thereof bar thereof thousand cubit wall unto dung gate 3 14 but dung gate repair malchiah son rechab ruler part bethhaccerem he built it set door thereof lock thereof bar thereof 3 15 but gate fountain repair shallun son colhozeh ruler part mizpah he built it cover it set door thereof lock thereof bar thereof wall pool siloah king s garden unto stair that go down citi david 3 16 him repair nehemiah son azbuk ruler half part bethzur unto place against sepulchr david pool that wa made unto hous mighti 3 17 him repair levit rehum son bani next unto him repair hashabiah ruler half part keilah hi part 3 18 him repair their brethren bavai son henadad ruler half part keilah 3 19 next him repair ezer son jeshua ruler mizpah anoth against hi hous 3 29 them repair zadok son immer against hi hous him repair also shemaiah son shechaniah keeper east gate 3 30 him repair hananiah son shelemiah hanun sixth son zalaph anoth piec him merchant 4 1 but it came pass that when sanballat heard that we build wall he wa wroth took great indign mock jew 4 2 he spake hi brethren armi samaria said what do these feebl jew will they fortifi themselv will they sacrific will they make end day will they reviv stone heap rubbish which are burn 4 3 now tobiah ammonit wa him he said even that which they build if fox go he shall even break down their stone wall 4 4 hear o our god we are despis turn their reproach their own head give them prey land captiv 4 5 cover not their iniqu let not their sin be blot thee they have provok thee anger builder 4 6 so built we wall all wall wa join togeth unto half thereof peopl had mind work 4 7 but it came pass that when sanballat tobiah arabian ammonit ashdodit heard that wall jerusalem were made that breach began be stop then they were veri wroth 4 8 conspir all them togeth come fight against jerusalem hinder it 4 9 nevertheless we made our prayer unto our god set watch against them day night becaus them 4 10 judah said strength bearer burden is decay there is much rubbish so that we are not abl build wall 4 11 our adversari said they shall not know neither see till we come midst them slay them caus work ceas 4 12 it came pass that when jew which dwelt them came they said unto us ten time all place whenc ye shall return unto us they will be you 4 13 therefor set i lower place behind wall higher place i even set peopl their famili their sword their spear their bow 4 14 i look rose said unto nobl ruler rest peopl be not ye afraid them rememb lord which is great terribl fight your brethren your son your daughter your wive your hous 4 15 it came pass when our enemi heard that it wa known unto us god had brought their counsel nought that we return all us wall everi one unto hi work 4 16 it came pass that time forth that half my servant wrought work other half them held both spear shield bow habergeon ruler were behind all hous judah 4 17 they which build wall they that bare burden those that lade everi one one hi hand wrought work other hand held weapon 4 18 builder everi one had hi sword gird hi side so build he that sound trumpet wa me 4 19 i said unto nobl ruler rest peopl work is great larg we are separ wall one far anoth 4 20 what place therefor ye hear sound trumpet resort ye thither unto us our god shall fight us 4 21 so we labour work half them held spear rise morn till star appear 4 22 likewis same time said i unto peopl let everi one hi servant lodg jerusalem that night they may be guard us labour day 4 23 so neither i nor my brethren nor my servant nor men guard which follow me none us put off our cloth save that everi one put them off wash 5 1 there wa great cri peopl their wive against their brethren jew 5 2 there were that said we our son our daughter are mani therefor we take corn them that we may eat live 5 3 some also there were that said we have mortgag our land vineyard hous that we might buy corn becaus dearth 5 4 there were also that said we have borrow money king s tribut that our land vineyard 5 5 yet now our flesh is as flesh our brethren our children as their children lo we bring bondag our son our daughter be servant some our daughter are brought unto bondag alreadi neither is it our power redeem them other men have our land vineyard 5 6 i wa veri angri when i heard their cri these word 5 7 then i consult myself i rebuk nobl ruler said unto them ye exact usuri everi one hi brother i set great assembl against them 5 8 i said unto them we our abil have redeem our brethren jew which were sold unto heathen will ye even sell your brethren or shall they be sold unto us then held they their peac found noth answer 5 9 also i said it is not good that ye do ought ye not walk fear our god becaus reproach heathen our enemi 5 10 i likewis my brethren my servant might exact them money corn i pray you let us leav off thi usuri 5 11 restor i pray you them even thi day their land their vineyard their oliveyard their hous also hundredth part money corn wine oil that ye exact them 5 12 then said they we will restor them will requir noth them so will we do as thou sayest then i call priest took oath them that they should do accord thi promis 5 13 also i shook my lap said so god shake everi man hi hous hi labour that performeth not thi promis even thu be he shaken empti all congreg said amen prais lord peopl did accord thi promis 5 14 moreov time that i wa appoint be their governor land judah twentieth year even unto two thirtieth year artaxerx king that is twelv year i my brethren have not eaten bread governor 5 15 but former governor that had been me were chargeabl unto peopl had taken them bread wine besid forti shekel silver yea even their servant bare rule peopl but so did not i becaus fear god 5 16 yea also i continu work thi wall neither bought we ani land all my servant were gather thither unto work 5 17 moreov there were my tabl hundr fifti jew ruler besid those that came unto us heathen that are us 5 18 now that which wa prepar me daili wa one ox six choic sheep also fowl were prepar me onc ten day store all sort wine yet all thi requir not i bread governor becaus bondag wa heavi thi peopl 5 19 think me my god good accord all that i have done thi peopl 6 1 now it came pass when sanballat tobiah geshem arabian rest our enemi heard that i had build wall that there wa no breach left therein though that time i had not set door gate 6 2 that sanballat geshem sent unto me say come let us meet togeth some one villag plain ono but they thought do me mischief 6 3 i sent messeng unto them say i am do great work so that i cannot come down whi should work ceas whilst i leav it come down you 6 4 yet they sent unto me four time thi sort i answer them same manner 6 5 then sent sanballat hi servant unto me like manner fifth time open letter hi hand 6 6 wherein wa written it is report heathen gashmu saith it that thou jew think rebel which caus thou buildest wall that thou mayest be their king accord these word 6 7 thou hast also appoint prophet preach thee jerusalem say there is king judah now shall it be report king accord these word come now therefor let us take counsel togeth 6 8 then i sent unto him say there are no such thing done as thou sayest but thou feignest them thine own heart 6 9 they all made us afraid say their hand shall be weaken work that it be not done now therefor o god strengthen my hand 6 10 afterward i came unto hous shemaiah son delaiah son mehetabeel who wa shut he said let us meet togeth hous god templ let us shut door templ they will come slay thee yea night will they come slay thee 6 11 i said should such man as i flee who is there that be as i am would go templ save hi life i will not go 6 12 lo i perceiv that god had not sent him but that he pronounc thi propheci against me tobiah sanballat had hire him 6 13 therefor wa he hire that i should be afraid do so sin that they might have matter evil report that they might reproach me 6 14 my god think thou tobiah sanballat accord these their work prophetess noadiah rest prophet that would have put me fear 6 15 so wall wa finish twenti fifth day month elul fifti two day 6 16 it came pass that when all our enemi heard thereof all heathen that were us saw these thing they were much cast down their own eye they perceiv that thi work wa wrought our god 6 17 moreov those day nobl judah sent mani letter unto tobiah letter tobiah came unto them 6 18 there were mani judah sworn unto him becaus he wa son law shechaniah son arah hi son johanan had taken daughter meshullam son berechiah 6 19 also they report hi good deed me utter my word him tobiah sent letter put me fear 7 1 now it came pass when wall wa built i had set door porter singer levit were appoint 7 2 that i gave my brother hanani hananiah ruler palac charg jerusalem he wa faith man fear god mani 7 3 i said unto them let not gate jerusalem be open sun be hot while they stand let them shut door bar them ruler peopl that they might be reckon genealog i found regist genealog them which came first found written therein 7 6 these are children provinc that went captiv those that had been carri away whom three hundr threescor 7 67 besid their manserv their maidserv whom there were seven thousand three hundr thirti seven they had two hundr forti five sing men sing women 7 68 their hors seven hundr
