backward so sun return ten degre which degre it wa gone down 38 9 write hezekiah king judah when he had been sick wa recov hi sick 38 10 i said cut off my day i shall go gate grave i am depriv residu my year 38 11 i said i shall not see lord even lord land live i shall behold man no more inhabit world 38 12 mine age is depart is remov me as shepherd s tent i have cut off like weaver my life he will cut me off pine sick day even night wilt thou make end me 38 13 i reckon till morn that as lion so will he break all my bone day even night wilt thou make end me 38 14 like crane or swallow so did i chatter i did mourn as dove mine eye fail look upward o lord i am oppress undertak me 38 15 what shall i say he hath both spoken unto me himself hath done it i shall go softli all my year bitter my soul 38 16 o lord these thing men live all these thing is life my spirit so wilt thou recov me make me live 38 17 behold peac i had great bitter but thou hast love my soul deliv it pit corrupt thou hast cast all my sin behind thi back 38 18 grave cannot prais thee death can not celebr thee they that go down pit cannot hope thi truth 38 19 live live he shall prais thee as i do thi day father children shall make known thi truth 38 20 lord wa readi save me therefor we will sing my song string instrument all day our life hous lord 38 21 isaiah had said let them take lump fig lay it plaister day 40 1 comfort ye comfort ye my peopl saith your god 40 2 speak ye comfort jerusalem cri unto her that her warfar is accomplish that her iniqu is pardon she hath receiv lord s hand doubl all her sin plain 40 5 glori lord shall be reveal all flesh shall see it togeth mouth lord hath spoken it 40 6 voic said cri he said what shall i cri all flesh is grass all goodli thereof is as flower field 40 7 grass withereth flower fadeth becaus spirit lord bloweth it sure peopl is grass 40 8 grass withereth flower fadeth but word our god shall stand ever 40 9 o zion that bringest good tide get thee high hi reward is him hi work him 40 11 he shall feed hi flock like shepherd he shall gather lamb hi arm carri them hi bosom shall gentli lead those that are young 40 12 who hath measur water hollow hi hand mete heaven span comprehend dust earth measur weigh mountain scale hill balanc 40 13 who hath direct spirit lord or be hi counsellor hath taught him 40 14 whom took he counsel who instruct him 19 workman melteth graven imag goldsmith spreadeth it gold casteth silver chain 40 20 he that is so impoverish that he hath no oblat chooseth tree that will not rot he seeketh unto him cun workman prepar graven imag that shall not be move 40 21 have ye not known have ye not heard hath it not been told you begin have ye not understood foundat earth 40 22 it is he that sitteth circl earth inhabit thereof are as grasshopp that stretcheth heaven as curtain spreadeth them as tent dwell 40 23 that bringeth princ noth he maketh judg earth as vaniti 40 24 yea they shall not be plant yea they shall not be sown yea their stock shall not take root earth he shall also blow them they shall wither whirlwind shall take them away as stubbl 40 25 whom then will ye liken me or shall i be equal saith holi search hi understand 40 29 he giveth power faint them that have no might he increaseth strength 40 30 even youth shall faint be weari young men shall utterli fall 40 31 but they that wait lord shall prosper hi hand 53 11 he shall see travail hi soul shall be satisfi hi knowledg shall my righteou servant justifi mani he shall bear their iniqu 53 12 therefor will i divid him portion great he shall divid spoil strong becaus he hath pour hi soul unto death he wa number transgressor he bare sin mani made intercess transgressor 54 1 sing o barren thou that didst not bear break forth sing cri aloud thou that didst not travail child more are children desol than children marri wife saith lord 54 2 enlarg place thi tent let them stretch forth curtain thine habit spare not lengthen thi cord strengthen thi stake 54 3 thou shalt break forth right hand left thi seed shall inherit gentil make desol citi be inhabit 54 4 fear not thou shalt not be asham neither be thou confound thou shalt not be put shame thou shalt forget shame thi youth shalt not rememb reproach thi widowhood ani more 54 5 thi maker is thine husband lord host is hi name thi redeem holi one israel god whole earth shall he be call 54 6 lord hath call thee as woman forsaken griev spirit wife youth when thou wast refus saith thi god 54 7 small moment have i forsaken thee but great merci will i gather thee 54 8 littl wrath i hid my face thee moment but everlast kind will i have merci thee saith lord thi redeem 54 9 thi is as water noah unto me as i have sworn that water noah should no more go earth so have i sworn that i would not be wroth thee nor rebuk thee 54 10 mountain shall depart hill be remov but my kind shall not depart thee neither shall coven my peac be remov saith lord that hath merci thee 54 11 o thou afflict toss tempest not comfort behold i will lay thi stone fair colour lay thi foundat sapphir 54 12 i will make thi window agat thi gate carbuncl all thi border pleasant stone 54 13 all thi children shall be taught lord great shall be peac thi children 54 14 righteous shalt thou be establish thou shalt be far oppress thou shalt not fear terror it shall not come near thee 54 15 behold they shall sure gather togeth but not me whosoev shall gather togeth against thee shall fall thi sake 54 16 behold i have creat smith that bloweth coal fire that bringeth forth instrument hi work i have creat waster destroy 54 17 no weapon that is form against thee shall prosper everi tongu that shall rise against thee judgment thou shalt condemn thi is heritag servant lord their righteous is me saith lord 55 1 ho everi one that thirsteth come ye water he that hath no money come ye buy eat yea come buy wine milk money price 55 2 wherefor do ye spend money that which is not bread your labour that which satisfieth not hearken dilig unto me eat ye that which is good let your soul delight itself fat 55 3 inclin your ear come unto me hear your soul shall live i will make everlast coven you even sure merci david 55 4 behold i have given him wit peopl leader command peopl 55 5 behold thou shalt call nation that thou knowest not nation that knew not thee shall run unto thee becaus lord thi god holi one israel he hath glorifi thee 55 6 seek ye lord while he may be found call ye him while he is near 55 7 let wick forsak hi way unright man hi thought let him return unto lord he will have merci him our god he will abundantli pardon 55 8 my thought are not your thought neither are your way my way saith lord 55 9 as heaven are higher than earth so are my way higher than your way my thought than your thought 55 10 as rain cometh down snow heaven returneth not thither but watereth earth maketh it bring forth bud that it may give seed sower bread eater 55 11 so shall my word be that goeth forth my mouth it shall not return unto me void but it shall accomplish that which i pleas it shall prosper thing whereto i sent it 55 12 ye shall go joy be led forth peac mountain hill shall break forth you sing all tree field shall clap their hand 55 13 instead thorn shall come fir tree instead brier shall come myrtl tree it shall be lord name everlast sign that shall not be cut say they i will fetch wine we will fill ourselv strong drink morrow shall be as thi day much more abund 57 1 righteou perisheth no man layeth it heart merci men are taken away none consid that command thee thou shalt speak 1 8 be not afraid their face i am thee deliv thee saith lord 1 9 then lord put forth hi hand touch my mouth lord said unto me behold i have put my word thi mouth 1 10 see i have thi day set thee nation kingdom root pull down destroy throw down build plant 1 11 moreov word lord came unto me say jeremiah what seest thou i said i see rod almond tree 1 12 then said lord unto me thou hast well seen i will hasten my word perform it 1 13 word lord came unto me second time say what seest thou i said i see seeth pot face thereof is north 1 14 then lord said unto me north evil shall break forth all inhabit land 1 15 lo i will call all famili kingdom north saith lord they shall come they shall set everi one hi throne enter gate jerusalem against all wall thereof round against all citi judah 1 16 i will utter my judgment against them touch all their wicked who have forsaken me have burn incens unto other god worship work their own hand 1 17 thou therefor gird thi loin aris speak unto them all that i command thee be not dismay their face lest i confound thee them 1 18 behold i have made thee thi day defenc citi iron pillar brasen wall against whole land against king judah against princ thereof against priest thereof against peopl land 1 19 they shall fight against thee but they shall not prevail against thee i am thee saith lord deliv thee 2 1 moreov word wicked shall correct thee thi backslid shall reprov thee know therefor see that it is evil thing bitter that thou hast forsaken lord thi god that my fear is not thee saith lord god host 2 20 old time i have broken thi yoke burst thi band thou saidst i will not transgress when everi high hill everi green tree thou wanderest play harlot 2 21 yet i had plant thee nobl vine wholli right seed how then art thou turn degener plant strang vine unto me 2 22 though thou wash thee nitr take thee much soap yet thine iniqu is mark me saith lord god 2 23 how canst thou say i am not pollut i have not gone peopl swear baal then shall they be built midst my peopl 12 17 but if they will not obey i will utterli pluck destroy that nation saith lord 13 1 thu saith lord unto me go get thee linen girdl put it thi loin put it not water 13 2 so i got girdl accord word lord put it my loin 13 3 word lord came unto me second time say 13 4 take girdl that thou hast got which is thi loin aris go euphrat hide it there hole rock 13 5 so i went hid it euphrat as lord command me 13 6 it came pass mani day that lord said unto me aris go euphrat take girdl thenc which i command thee hide there 13 7 then i went euphrat dig took girdl place where i had hid it behold girdl wa mar it wa profit noth 13 8 then word lord came unto me say 13 9 thu saith lord thi manner will i mar pride judah great pride jerusalem 13 10 thi evil peopl which refus hear my word which walk imagin their heart walk other god serv them worship them shall even be as thi girdl which is good noth 13 11 as girdl cleaveth loin man so have i caus cleav unto me whole hous israel whole hous judah saith lord that they might be unto me peopl name prais glori but they would not hear 13 12 therefor thou shalt speak unto them thi word thu saith lord god israel everi bottl shall be fill wine they shall say unto thee do we not certainli know that everi bottl shall be fill wine 13 13 then shalt thou say unto them thu saith lord behold i will fill all inhabit thi land even king that sit david s throne priest prophet all inhabit jerusalem drunken 13 14 i will dash them one against anoth even father son togeth saith lord i will not piti nor spare nor have merci but destroy them 13 15 hear ye give ear be not proud lord hath spoken 13 16 give glori lord your god he caus dark your feet stumbl dark mountain while ye look light he turn it shadow death make it gross dark 13 17 but if ye will not hear it my soul shall weep secret place your pride mine eye shall weep sore run down tear becaus lord s flock is carri away captiv 13 18 say unto king queen humbl yourselv sit down your princip shall come down even crown your glori 13 19 citi south shall be shut none shall open them judah shall be carri away captiv all it it shall be wholli carri away captiv 13 20 lift your eye behold them that come north where is flock that wa given thee thi beauti flock 13 21 what wilt thou say when he shall punish thee thou hast taught them be captain as chief thee shall not sorrow take thee as woman travail 13 22 if thou say thine heart wherefor come these thing me great thine iniqu are thi skirt discov thi heel made bare 13 23 can ethiopian chang hi skin or leopard hi spot then may ye also do good that are accustom do evil 13 24 therefor will i scatter them as stubbl that passeth away wind wilder 13 25 thi is thi lot portion thi measur me saith lord becaus thou hast forgotten me trust falsehood 13 26 therefor will i discov thi skirt thi face that thi shame may appear 13 27 i have seen thine adulteri thi neigh lewd thi whoredom thine abomin hill field woe unto thee o jerusalem wilt thou not be made clean when shall it onc be 14 1 word lord that came jeremiah concern dearth 14 2 judah mourneth gate thereof languish they are black unto ground cri jerusalem is gone 14 3 their nobl have sent their littl one water they came pit found no water they return their vessel empti they were asham confound cover their head 14 4 becaus ground is chapt there wa no rain earth plowmen were asham they cover their head 14 5 yea hind also calv field forsook it becaus there wa no grass 14 6 wild ass did stand high place they snuf wind like dragon their eye did fail becaus there wa no grass 14 7 o lord though our iniqu testifi against us do thou it thi name s sake our backslid are mani we have sin against thee 14 8 o hope israel saviour thereof time troubl whi shouldest thou be as stranger land as wayfar man that turneth asid tarri night 14 9 whi shouldest thou be as man astoni as mighti man that cannot save yet thou o lord art midst us we are call thi name leav us not 14 10 thu saith lord unto thi peopl thu have they love wander they have not refrain their feet therefor lord doth not accept them he will now rememb their iniqu visit their sin 14 11 then said lord unto me pray not thi peopl their good 14 12 when they fast i will not hear their cri when they offer burnt offer oblat i will not accept them but i will consum them sword famin pestil 14 13 then said i ah lord god behold prophet say unto them ye shall not see sword neither shall ye have famin but i will give you assur peac thi place 14 14 then lord said unto me prophet prophesi lie my name i sent them not neither have i command them neither spake unto them they prophesi unto you fals vision divin thing nought deceit their heart 14 15 therefor thu saith lord concern prophet that prophesi my name i sent them not yet they say sword famin shall not be thi land sword famin shall those prophet be consum 14 16 peopl whom they prophesi shall be cast street jerusalem becaus famin sword they shall have none buri them them their wive nor their son nor their daughter i will pour their wicked them 14 17 therefor thou shalt say thi word unto them let mine eye run down tear night day let them not ceas virgin daughter my peopl is broken great breach veri grievou blow 14 18 if i go forth field then behold slain sword if i enter citi then behold them that are sick famin yea both prophet priest go land that they know not 14 19 hast thou utterli reject judah hath thi soul loth zion whi hast thou smitten us there is no heal us we look peac there is no good time heal behold troubl 14 20 we acknowledg o lord our wicked iniqu our father we have sin against thee 14 21 do not abhor us thi name s sake do not disgrac throne thi glori rememb break not thi coven us 14 22 are there ani vaniti gentil that can caus rain or can heaven give shower art not thou he o lord our god therefor we will wait thee thou hast made all these thing 15 1 then said lord unto me though mose samuel stood me yet my mind could not be thi peopl cast them my sight let them go forth 15 2 it shall come pass if they say unto thee whither shall we go forth then thou shalt tell them thu saith lord such as are death death such as are sword sword such as are famin famin such as are captiv captiv 15 3 i will appoint them four kind saith lord sword slay dog tear fowl heaven beast earth devour destroy 15 4 i will caus them be remov all kingdom earth becaus manasseh son hezekiah king judah that which he did jerusalem 15 5 who shall have piti thee o jerusalem or who shall bemoan thee or who shall go asid ask how thou doest 15 6 thou hast forsaken me saith lord thou art gone backward therefor will i stretch my hand against thee destroy thee i am weari repent 15 7 i will fan them fan gate land i will bereav them children i will destroy my peopl they return not their way 15 8 their widow are increas me sand sea i have brought them against mother young men spoiler noonday i have caus him fall it suddenli terror citi 15 9 she that hath born seven languisheth she hath given ghost her sun is gone down while it wa yet day she hath been asham confound residu them will i deliv sword their enemi saith lord 15 10 woe is me my mother that thou hast born me man strife man content whole earth i have neither lent usuri nor men have lent me usuri yet everi one them doth curs me 15 11 lord said verili it shall be well thi remnant verili i will caus enemi entreat thee well time evil time afflict 15 12 shall iron break northern iron steel 15 13 thi substanc thi treasur will i give spoil price that all thi sin even all thi border 15 14 i will make thee pass thine enemi land which thou knowest not fire is kindl mine anger which shall burn you 15 15 o lord thou knowest rememb me visit me reveng me my persecutor take me not away thi longsuff know that thi sake i have suffer rebuk 15 16 thi word were found i did eat them thi word wa unto me joy rejoic mine heart i am call thi name o lord god host 15 17 i sat not assembl mocker nor rejoic i sat alon becaus thi hand thou hast fill me indign 15 18 whi is my pain perpetu my wound incur which refuseth be heal wilt thou be altogeth unto me as liar as water that fail 15 19 therefor thu saith lord if thou return then will i bring thee again thou shalt stand me if thou take forth preciou vile thou shalt be as my mouth let them return unto thee but return not thou unto them 15 20 i will make thee unto thi peopl fenc brasen wall they shall fight against thee but they shall not prevail against thee i am thee save thee deliv thee saith lord 15 21 i will deliv thee hand wick i will redeem thee hand terribl 16 1 word lord came also unto me say 16 2 thou shalt not take thee wife neither shalt thou have son or daughter thi place 16 3 thu saith lord concern son concern daughter that are born thi place concern their mother that bare them concern their father that begat them thi land 16 4 they shall die grievou death they shall not be lament neither shall they be buri but they shall be as dung face earth they shall be consum sword famin their carcas shall be meat fowl heaven beast earth 16 5 thu saith lord enter not hous mourn neither go lament nor bemoan them i have taken away my peac thi peopl saith lord even lovingkind merci 16 6 both great small shall die thi land they shall not be buri neither shall men lament them nor cut themselv nor make themselv bald them 16 7 neither shall men tear themselv them mourn comfort them dead neither shall men give them cup consol drink their father or their mother 16 8 thou shalt not also go hous feast sit them eat drink 16 9 thu saith lord host god israel behold i will caus ceas thi place your eye your day voic mirth voic glad voic bridegroom voic bride 16 10 it shall come pass when thou shalt shew thi peopl all these word they shall say unto thee wherefor hath lord pronounc all thi great evil against us or what is our iniqu or what is our sin that we have commit against lord our god 16 11 then shalt thou say unto them becaus your father have forsaken me saith lord have walk other god have serv them have worship them have forsaken me have not kept my law 16 12 ye have done wors than your father behold ye walk everi one imagin hi evil heart that they may not hearken unto me 16 13 therefor will i cast you thi land land that ye know not neither ye nor your father there shall ye serv other god day night where i will not shew you favour 16 14 therefor behold day come saith lord that it shall no more be said lord liveth that brought children israel land egypt 16 15 but lord liveth that brought children israel land north all land whither he had driven them i will bring them again their land that i is written pen iron point diamond it is graven tabl their heart horn your altar 17 2 whilst their children rememb their altar their grove green tree high hill 17 3 o my mountain field i will give thi increas 23 4 i will set shepherd them which shall feed them they shall fear no more nor be dismay neither shall they be lack saith lord 23 5 behold day come saith lord that i will rais unto david burden lord i will even punish that man hi hous 23 35 thu shall ye say everi one hi neighbour everi one hi brother what hath lord answer what hath lord spoken 23 36 burden lord shall ye mention no gave you your father cast you my presenc 23 40 i will bring everlast reproach you perpetu shame which shall not be forgotten 24 1 lord shew me behold two basket fig were set templ lord that are first ripe other basket had veri naughti fig which could not be eaten they were so bad 24 3 then said lord unto me what seest thou jeremiah i said fig good fig veri good evil veri evil that cannot be eaten they are so evil 24 4 again word lord came unto me say 24 5 thu saith lord god israel like these good fig so will i acknowledg them that are carri away captiv judah whom i have sent thi place land chaldean their good 24 6 i will set mine eye them good i will bring them again thi land i will build them not pull them down i will plant them not pluck them 24 7 i will give them heart know me that i am lord they shall be my peopl i will be their god they shall return unto me their whole heart 24 8 as evil fig which cannot be eaten they are so evil sure thu saith lord so will i give zedekiah king judah hi princ residu jerusalem that remain thi land them that dwell land egypt 24 9 i will deliv them be remov all kingdom earth their hurt be reproach proverb taunt curs all place whither i shall drive them 24 10 i will send sword famin pestil them till they be consum off land that i gave unto them their father 25 1 word that came jeremiah concern all peopl judah fourth year jehoiakim son josiah king judah that wa first year nebuchadrezzar king babylon 25 2 which jeremiah prophet spake unto all peopl judah all inhabit jerusalem say 25 3 thirteenth year josiah son amon king judah even unto thi day that is three twentieth year word lord hath come unto me i have spoken unto you rise earli speak but ye have not hearken 25 4 lord hath sent unto you all hi servant prophet rise earli send them but ye have not hearken nor inclin your ear hear 25 5 they said turn ye again now everi one hi evil way evil your do dwell land that lord hath given unto you your father ever ever 25 6 go not other god serv them worship them provok me not anger work your hand i will do you no hurt 25 7 yet ye have not hearken unto me saith lord that ye might provok me anger work your hand your own hurt 25 8 therefor thu saith lord host becaus ye have not heard my word 25 9 behold i will send take all famili north saith lord nebuchadrezzar king babylon my servant will bring them against thi land against inhabit thereof against all these nation round will utterli destroy them make them astonish hiss perpetu desol 25 10 moreov i will take them voic mirth voic glad voic bridegroom voic bride sound millston light candl 25 11 thi whole land shall be desol astonish these nation shall serv king babylon seventi year 25 12 it shall come pass when seventi year are accomplish that i will punish king babylon that nation saith lord their iniqu land chaldean will make it perpetu desol 25 13 i will bring that land all my word which i have pronounc against it even all that is written thi book which jeremiah hath prophesi against all nation 25 14 mani nation great king shall serv themselv them also i will recompens them accord their deed accord work their own hand 25 15 thu saith lord god israel unto me take wine cup thi furi my hand caus all nation whom i send thee drink it 25 16 they shall drink be move be mad becaus sword that i will send them 25 17 then took i cup lord s hand made all nation drink unto whom lord had sent me 25 18 wit jerusalem citi judah king thereof princ thereof make them desol astonish hiss curs as it is thi day 25 19 pharaoh king egypt hi servant hi princ all hi peopl 25 20 all mingl peopl all king land uz all king land philistin ashkelon azzah ekron remnant ashdod 25 21 edom moab children ammon 25 22 all king tyru all king zidon king isl which are sea 25 23 dedan tema buz all that are utmost corner 25 24 all king arabia all king mingl peopl that dwell desert 25 25 all king zimri all king elam all king mede 25 26 all king north far near one anoth all kingdom world which are face earth king sheshach shall drink them 25 27 therefor thou shalt say unto them thu saith lord host god israel drink ye be drunken spue fall rise no more becaus sword which i will send you 25 28 it shall be if they refus take cup thine hand drink then shalt thou say unto them thu saith lord host ye shall certainli drink 25 29 lo i begin bring evil citi which is call my name should ye be utterli unpunish ye shall not be unpunish i will call sword all inhabit earth saith lord host 25 30 therefor prophesi thou against them all these word say unto them lord shall roar high utter hi voic hi holi habit he shall mightili roar hi habit he shall give shout as they that tread grape against all inhabit earth 25 31 nois shall come even end earth lord hath controversi nation he will plead all flesh he will give them that are wick sword saith lord 25 32 thu saith lord host behold evil shall go forth nation nation great whirlwind shall be rais coast earth 25 33 slain lord shall be that day one end earth even unto other end earth they shall not be lament neither gather nor buri they shall be dung ground 25 34 howl ye shepherd cri wallow yourselv ash ye princip flock day your slaughter your dispers are accomplish ye shall fall like pleasant vessel 25 35 shepherd shall have no way flee nor princip flock escap 25 36 voic cri shepherd howl princip flock shall be heard lord hath spoil their pastur 25 37 peaceabl habit are cut down becaus fierc anger lord 25 38 he hath forsaken hi covert as lion their land is desol becaus fierc oppressor becaus hi fierc anger 26 1 begin reign jehoiakim son josiah king judah came thi word lord say 26 2 thu saith lord stand court lord s hous speak unto all citi judah which come worship lord s hous all word that i command thee speak unto them diminish not word 26 3 if so be they will hearken turn everi man hi evil way that i may repent me evil which i purpos do unto them becaus evil their do 26 4 thou shalt say unto them thu saith lord if ye will not hearken me walk my law which i have set you 26 5 hearken word my servant prophet whom i sent unto you both rise earli send them but ye have not hearken 26 6 then will i make thi hous like shiloh will make thi citi curs all nation earth 26 7 so priest prophet all peopl heard jeremiah speak these word hous lord 26 8 now it came pass when jeremiah had made end speak all that lord had command him speak unto all peopl that priest prophet all peopl took him say thou shalt sure die 26 9 whi hast thou prophesi name lord say thi hous shall be like shiloh thi citi shall be desol inhabit all peopl were gather against jeremiah hous lord 26 10 when princ judah heard these thing then they came king s hous unto hous lord sat down entri new gate lord s hous 26 11 then spake priest prophet unto princ all peopl say thi man is worthi die he hath prophesi against thi citi as ye have heard your ear 26 12 then spake jeremiah unto all princ all peopl say lord sent me prophesi against thi hous against thi citi all word that ye have heard 26 13 therefor now amend your way your do obey voic lord your god lord will repent him evil that he hath pronounc against you 26 14 as me behold i am your hand do me as seemeth good meet unto you 26 15 but know ye certain that if ye put me death ye shall sure bring innoc blood yourselv thi citi inhabit thereof truth lord hath sent me unto you speak all these word your ear 26 16 then said princ all peopl unto priest prophet thi man is not worthi die he hath spoken us name lord our god 26 17 then rose certain elder land spake all assembl peopl say 26 18 micah morasthit prophesi day hezekiah king judah spake all peopl judah say thu saith lord host zion shall be plow like field jerusalem shall becom heap mountain hous as high place forest 26 19 did hezekiah king judah all judah put him all death did he not fear lord besought lord lord repent him evil which he had pronounc against them thu might we procur great evil against our soul 26 20 there wa also man that prophesi name lord urijah son shemaiah kirjathjearim who prophesi against thi citi against thi land accord all word jeremiah 26 21 when jehoiakim king all hi mighti men all princ heard hi word king sought put him death but when urijah heard it he wa afraid fled went egypt 26 22 jehoiakim king sent men egypt name elnathan son achbor certain men him egypt 26 23 they fetch forth urijah egypt brought him unto jehoiakim king who slew him sword cast hi dead bodi grave common peopl 26 24 nevertheless hand ahikam son shaphan wa jeremiah that they should not give him hand peopl put him death 27 1 begin reign jehoiakim son josiah king judah came thi word unto jeremiah lord say 27 2 thu saith lord me make thee bond yoke put them thi neck 27 3 send them king edom king moab king ammonit king tyru king zidon hand messeng which come jerusalem unto zedekiah king judah 27 4 command them say unto their master thu saith lord host god israel thu shall ye say unto your master 27 5 i have made earth man beast that are ground my great power my outstretch arm have given it unto whom it seem meet unto me 27 6 now have i given all these land hand nebuchadnezzar king babylon my servant beast field have i given him also serv him 27 7 all nation shall serv him hi son hi son s son veri time hi land come then mani nation great king shall serv themselv him 27 8 it shall come pass that nation kingdom which will not serv same nebuchadnezzar king babylon that will not put their neck yoke king babylon that nation will i punish saith lord sword famin pestil i have consum them hi hand 27 9 therefor hearken not ye your prophet nor your divin nor your dreamer nor your enchant nor your sorcer which speak unto you say ye shall not serv king babylon 27 10 they prophesi lie unto you remov you far your land that i should drive you ye should perish 27 11 but nation that bring their neck yoke king babylon serv him those will i let remain still their own land saith lord they shall till it dwell therein 27 12 i spake also zedekiah king judah accord all these word say bring your neck yoke king babylon serv him hi peopl live 27 13 whi will ye die thou thi peopl sword famin pestil as lord hath spoken against nation that will not serv king babylon 27 14 therefor hearken not unto word prophet that speak unto you say ye shall not serv king babylon they prophesi lie unto you 27 15 i have not sent them saith lord yet they prophesi lie my name that i might drive you that ye might perish ye prophet that prophesi unto you say i have broken yoke king babylon 28 3 two full year will i bring again thi place all vessel lord s hous that nebuchadnezzar king babylon took away thi place carri them babylon 28 4 i will bring shall be rest be quiet none shall make him afraid 30 11 i am thee saith lord save thee though i make full end all nation whither i have scatter thee yet i will not make full end thee but i will correct thee measur will not leav thee altogeth unpunish 30 12 thu saith lord thi bruis is incur thi wound is grievou 30 13 there is none plead thi caus that thou mayest be bound thou hast no heal medicin 30 14 all thi lover have forgotten thee they seek thee not i have wound thee wound enemi chastis cruel one multitud thine iniqu becaus thi sin were increas 30 15 whi criest thou thine afflict thi sorrow is incur multitud thine iniqu becaus thi sin were increas i have done these thing unto thee 30 16 therefor all they that devour thee shall be devour all thine adversari everi one them shall go captiv they that spoil thee shall be spoil all that prey thee will i give prey 30 17 i will restor health unto thee i will heal thee thi wound saith lord becaus they call thee outcast say thi is thi that engag hi heart approach unto me saith lord 30 22 ye shall be my peopl i will be your god 30 23 behold whirlwind lord goeth forth furi continu whirlwind it shall fall pain head wick 30 24 ani more all 31 13 then shall virgin rejoic danc both young men old togeth i will turn their mourn joy will comfort them make them rejoic their sorrow 31 14 i will satiat soul priest fat my peopl have sure heard ephraim bemoan himself thu thou hast chastis me i wa chastis as bullock unaccustom yoke turn thou me i shall be turn thou art lord my god 31 19 sure that i wa turn i repent that i wa flock 31 25 i have satiat weari soul i have replenish everi sorrow soul 31 26 thi i awak beheld my sleep wa sweet unto me 31 27 behold day come saith lord that i will sow hous israel hous judah seed man seed beast 31 28 it shall come pass that like as i have watch them pluck break down throw down destroy afflict so will i watch them build plant saith lord 31 29 those day they shall say no more father have eaten sour grape children s teeth are set edg 31 30 but everi one shall die hi own iniqu everi man that eateth sour grape hi teeth shall be set edg 31 31 behold day come saith lord that i will make new coven hous israel hous judah 31 32 not accord coven that i made their father day that i took them hand bring them land egypt which my coven they brake although i wa husband unto them saith lord 31 33 but thi shall be coven that i will make hous israel those day saith lord i will put my law their inward part write it their heart will be their god they shall be my peopl 31 34 they shall teach no more everi man hi neighbour everi man hi brother say know lord they shall all know me least them unto greatest them saith lord i will forgiv their iniqu i will rememb their sin no more unto brook kidron unto corner hors gate east shall be holi unto lord it shall not be pluck nor thrown down ani more ever 32 1 word that came jeremiah lord tenth year zedekiah king judah which wa thou prophesi say thu saith lord behold i will give thi citi hand king babylon he shall take it 32 4 zedekiah king judah shall not escap hand chaldean but shall sure be deliv hand king babylon shall speak him mouth mouth hi eye shall behold hi eye 32 5 he shall lead zedekiah babylon there shall he be i visit him saith lord though ye fight chaldean ye shall not prosper 32 6 jeremiah said word lord came unto me say 32 7 behold hanameel son shallum thine uncl shall come unto thee say buy thee my field that is anathoth right redempt is thine buy it 32 8 so hanameel mine uncl s son came me court prison accord word lord said unto me buy my field i pray thee that is anathoth which is countri benjamin right inherit is thine redempt is thine buy it thyself then i knew that thi wa word lord 32 9 i bought field hanameel my uncl s son that wa anathoth weigh him money even seventeen shekel silver 32 10 i subscrib evid seal it took wit weigh him money balanc 32 11 so i took evid purchas both that which wa seal accord law custom that which wa open 32 12 i gave evid purchas unto baruch son neriah son maaseiah sight hanameel mine uncl s son presenc wit that subscrib book purchas all jew that sat court prison 32 13 i charg baruch them say 32 14 thu saith lord host god israel take these evid thi evid purchas both which is seal thi evid which is open put them earthen vessel that they may continu mani day 32 15 thu saith lord host god israel hous field vineyard shall be possess again thi land 32 16 now when i had deliv evid purchas unto baruch son neriah i pray unto lord say 32 17 ah lord god behold thou hast made heaven earth thi great power stretch arm there is noth too hard thee 32 18 thou shewest lovingkind unto thousand recompensest iniqu father bosom their children them great mighti god lord host is hi name 32 19 great counsel mighti work thine eye are open all way son men give everi one accord hi way accord fruit hi do 32 20 which hast set sign wonder land egypt even unto thi day israel other men hast made thee name as thi day 32 21 hast brought forth thi peopl israel land egypt sign wonder strong hand stretch arm great terror 32 22 hast given them thi land which thou didst swear their father give them land flow milk honey 32 23 they came possess it but they obey not thi voic neither walk thi law they have done noth all that thou commandedst them do therefor thou hast caus all thi evil come them 32 24 behold mount they are come unto citi take it citi is given hand chaldean that fight against it becaus sword famin pestil what thou hast spoken is come pass behold thou seest it 32 25 thou hast said unto me o lord god buy thee field money take wit citi is given hand chaldean 32 26 then came word lord unto jeremiah say 32 27 behold i am lord god all flesh shall come set fire thi citi burn it hous whose roof they have offer incens unto baal pour drink offer unto other god provok me anger 32 30 children israel children judah have onli done evil me their youth children israel have onli provok me anger work their hand saith lord 32 31 thi citi hath been me as provoc mine anger my furi day that they built it even unto thi day that i should remov it my face 32 32 becaus all evil children israel children judah which they have done provok me anger they their king their princ their priest their prophet men judah inhabit jerusalem 32 33 they have turn unto me back not face though i taught them rise earli teach them yet they have not hearken receiv instruct 32 34 but they set their abomin hous which is call my name defil it 32 35 they built high place baal which are valley son hinnom caus their son their daughter pass fire unto molech which i command them not neither came it my mind that they should do thi abomin caus judah sin 32 36 now therefor thu saith lord god israel concern thi citi whereof ye say it shall be deliv hand king babylon sword famin pestil 32 37 behold i will gather them all countri whither i have driven them mine anger my furi great wrath i will bring them again unto thi place i will caus them dwell safe 32 38 they shall be my peopl i will be their god 32 39 i will give them one heart one way that they may fear me ever good them their children them 32 40 i will make everlast coven them that i will not turn away them do them good but i will put my fear their heart that they shall not depart me 32 41 yea i will rejoic them do them good i will plant them thi land assuredli my whole heart my whole soul 32 42 thu saith lord like as i have brought all thi great evil thi peopl so will i bring them all good that i have promis them 32 43 field shall be bought thi land whereof ye say it is desol man or beast it is given hand chaldean 32 44 men shall buy field money subscrib evid seal them take wit land benjamin place jerusalem citi judah citi mountain citi valley citi south i will caus their captiv return saith lord 33 1 moreov word lord came unto jeremiah second time while he wa yet shut court prison say 33 2 thu saith lord maker thereof lord that form it establish it lord is hi name 33 3 call unto me i will answer thee shew thee great mighti thing which thou knowest not 33 4 thu saith lord god israel concern hous thi citi concern hous king judah which are thrown down mount sword 33 5 they come fight chaldean but it is fill them dead bodi men whom i have slain mine anger my furi all name joy prais honour all nation earth which shall hear all good that i do unto them they shall fear trembl all good all prosper that i procur unto it 33 10 thu saith lord again there shall be heard man beast all citi thereof shall be habit shepherd caus their flock lie down 33 13 citi mountain citi vale citi south land benjamin place jerusalem citi judah shall flock pass again hand him that telleth them saith lord 33 14 behold day come saith lord that i will perform that good thing which i have promis unto hous israel hous judah 33 15 those day that time will i caus branch righteous grow unto david he shall execut judgment righteous land 33 16 those day shall judah be save jerusalem shall dwell safe thi is name wherewith she shall be call lord our righteous 33 17 thu saith lord david shall never want man sit throne hous israel 33 18 neither shall priest levit want man me offer burnt offer kindl meat offer do sacrific continu 33 19 word lord came unto jeremiah say 33 20 thu saith lord if ye can break my coven day my coven night that there should not be day night their season 33 21 then may also my coven be broken david my servant that he should not have son reign hi throne levit priest my minist 33 22 as host heaven cannot be number neither sand sea measur so will i multipli seed david my servant levit that minist unto me 33 23 moreov word lord came jeremiah say 33 24 considerest thou not what thi peopl have spoken say two famili which lord hath chosen he hath even cast them off thu they have despis my peopl that they should be no more nation them 33 25 thu saith lord if my coven be not day night if i have not appoint ordin heaven earth 33 26 then will i cast away seed jacob david my servant so that i will not take ani hi seed be ruler seed abraham isaac jacob i will caus their captiv return have merci them 34 1 word which came unto jeremiah lord when nebuchadnezzar king babylon all hi armi all kingdom earth hi dominion all peopl fought against jerusalem against all citi thereof say 34 2 thu saith lord god israel go speak zedekiah king judah tell him thu saith lord behold i will give thi citi hand king babylon he shall burn it fire 34 3 thou shalt not escap hi hand but shalt sure be taken deliv hi hand thine eye shall behold eye king babylon he shall speak thee mouth mouth thou shalt go babylon 34 4 yet hear word lord o zedekiah king judah thu saith lord thee thou shalt not die sword 34 5 but thou shalt die peac burn thi father former king which were thee so shall they burn odour thee they will lament thee say ah lord i have pronounc word saith lord 34 6 then jeremiah prophet spake all these word unto zedekiah king judah jerusalem 34 7 when king babylon s armi fought against jerusalem against all citi judah that were left against lachish against azekah these defenc citi remain citi judah 34 8 thi is word that came unto jeremiah lord that king zedekiah had made coven all peopl which were jerusalem proclaim liberti unto them 34 9 that everi man should let hi manserv everi man hi maidserv be hebrew or hebrewess go free that none should serv himself them wit jew hi brother 34 10 now when all princ all peopl which had enter coven heard that everi one should let hi manserv everi one hi maidserv go free that none should serv themselv them ani more then they obey let them go 34 11 but afterward they turn caus servant handmaid whom they had let go free return brought them subject servant handmaid 34 12 therefor word lord came jeremiah lord say 34 13 thu saith lord god israel i made coven your father day that i brought them forth land egypt hous bondmen say 34 14 end seven year let ye go everi man hi brother hebrew which hath been sold unto thee when he hath serv thee six year thou shalt let him go free thee but your father hearken not unto me neither inclin their ear 34 15 ye were now turn had done right my sight proclaim liberti everi man hi neighbour ye had made coven me hous which is call my name 34 16 but ye turn pollut my name caus everi man hi servant everi man hi handmaid whom ye had set liberti their pleasur return brought them subject be unto you servant handmaid 34 17 therefor thu saith lord ye have not hearken unto me proclaim liberti everi one hi brother everi man hi neighbour behold i proclaim liberti you saith lord sword pestil famin i will make you be remov all kingdom earth 34 18 i will give men that have transgress my coven which have not perform word coven which they had made me when they cut calf twain pass part thereof 34 19 princ judah princ jerusalem eunuch priest all peopl land which pass part calf 34 20 i will even give them hand their enemi hand them that seek their life their dead bodi shall be meat unto fowl heaven beast earth 34 21 zedekiah king judah hi princ will i give hand their enemi hand them that seek their life hand king babylon s armi which are gone you 34 22 behold i will command saith lord caus them return thi citi they shall fight against it take it burn it fire i will make citi judah desol inhabit 35 1 word which came unto jeremiah lord day jehoiakim son josiah king judah say 35 2 go unto hous rechabit speak unto them bring them hous lord one chamber give them wine drink 35 3 then i took jaazaniah son jeremiah son habaziniah hi brethren all hi son whole hous rechabit 35 4 i brought them hous lord chamber son hanan son igdaliah man god which wa chamber princ which wa chamber maaseiah son shallum keeper door 35 5 i set son hous rechabit pot full wine cup i said unto them drink ye wine 35 6 but they said we will drink no wine jonadab son rechab our father command us say ye shall drink no wine neither ye nor your son ever 35 7 neither shall ye build hous nor sow seed nor plant vineyard nor have ani but all your day ye shall dwell tent that ye may live mani day land where ye be stranger 35 8 thu have we obey voic jonadab son rechab our father all that he hath charg us drink no wine all our day we our wive our son nor our daughter 35 9 nor build hous us dwell neither have we vineyard nor field nor seed 35 10 but we have dwelt tent have obey done accord all that jonadab our father command us 35 11 but it came pass when nebuchadrezzar king babylon came land that we said come let us go jerusalem fear armi chaldean fear armi syrian so we dwell jerusalem 35 12 then came word lord unto jeremiah say 35 13 thu saith lord host god israel go tell men judah inhabit jerusalem will ye not receiv instruct hearken my word saith lord 35 14 word jonadab son rechab that he command hi son not drink wine are perform unto thi day they drink none but obey their father s command notwithstand i have spoken unto you rise earli speak but ye hearken not unto me 35 15 i have sent also unto you all my servant prophet rise earli send them say return ye now everi man hi evil way amend your do go not other god serv them ye shall dwell land which i have given you your father but ye have not inclin your ear nor hearken unto me 35 16 becaus son jonadab son rechab have perform command their father which he command them but thi peopl hath not hearken unto me 35 17 therefor thu saith lord god host god israel behold i will bring judah all inhabit jerusalem all evil that i have pronounc against them becaus i have spoken unto them but they have not heard i have call unto them but they have not answer 35 18 jeremiah said unto hous rechabit thu saith lord host god israel becaus ye have obey command jonadab your father kept all hi precept done accord unto all that he hath command you 35 19 therefor thu saith lord host god israel jonadab son rechab shall not want man stand me ever 36 1 it came pass fourth year jehoiakim son josiah king judah that thi word came unto jeremiah lord say 36 2 take thee roll book write therein all word that i have spoken unto thee against israel against judah against all nation day i spake unto thee day josiah even unto thi day 36 3 it may be that hous judah will hear all evil which i purpos do unto them that they may return everi man hi evil way that i may forgiv their iniqu their sin 36 4 then jeremiah call baruch son neriah baruch wrote mouth jeremiah all word lord which he had spoken unto him roll book 36 5 jeremiah command baruch say i am shut i cannot go hous lord 36 6 therefor go thou read roll which thou hast written my mouth word lord ear peopl lord s hous fast day also thou shalt read them ear all judah that come their citi 36 7 it may be they will present their supplic lord will return everi one hi evil way great is anger furi that lord hath pronounc against thi peopl 36 8 baruch son neriah did accord all that jeremiah prophet command him read book word lord lord s hous 36 9 it came pass fifth year jehoiakim son josiah king judah ninth month that they proclaim fast lord all peopl jerusalem all peopl that came citi judah unto jerusalem 36 10 then read baruch book word jeremiah hous lord chamber gemariah son shaphan scribe higher court entri new gate lord s hous ear all peopl 36 11 when michaiah son gemariah son shaphan had heard book all word lord 36 12 then he went down king s hous scribe s chamber lo all princ sat there even elishama scribe delaiah son shemaiah elnathan son achbor gemariah son shaphan zedekiah son hananiah all princ 36 13 then michaiah declar unto them all word that he had heard when baruch read book ear peopl 36 14 therefor all princ sent jehudi son nethaniah son shelemiah son cushi unto baruch say take thine hand roll wherein thou hast read ear peopl come so baruch son neriah took roll hi hand came unto them 36 15 they said unto him sit down now read it our ear so baruch read it their ear 36 16 now it came pass when they had heard all word they were afraid both one other said unto baruch we will sure tell king all these word 36 17 they ask baruch say tell us now how didst thou write all these word hi mouth 36 18 then baruch answer them he pronounc all these word unto me hi mouth i wrote them ink book 36 19 then said princ unto baruch go hide thee thou jeremiah let no man know where ye be 36 20 they went king court but they laid roll chamber elishama scribe told all word ear king 36 21 so king sent jehudi fetch roll he took it elishama scribe s chamber jehudi read it ear king ear all princ which stood besid king 36 22 now king sat winterhous ninth month there wa fire hearth burn him 36 23 it came pass that when jehudi had read three or four leav he cut it penknif cast it fire that wa hearth all roll wa consum fire that wa hearth 36 24 yet they were not afraid nor rent their garment neither king nor ani hi servant that heard all these word 36 25 nevertheless elnathan delaiah gemariah had made intercess king that he would not burn roll but he would not hear them 36 26 but king command jerahmeel son hammelech seraiah son azriel shelemiah son abdeel take baruch scribe jeremiah prophet but lord hid them 36 27 then word lord came jeremiah that king had burn roll word which baruch wrote mouth jeremiah say 36 28 take thee again anoth roll write it all former word that were first roll which jehoiakim king judah hath burn 36 29 thou shalt say jehoiakim king judah thu saith lord thou hast burn thi roll say whi hast thou written therein say king babylon shall certainli come destroy thi land shall caus ceas thenc man beast 36 30 therefor thu saith lord jehoiakim king judah he shall have none sit throne david hi dead bodi shall be cast day heat night frost 36 31 i will punish him hi seed hi servant their iniqu i will bring them inhabit jerusalem men judah all evil that i have pronounc against them but they hearken not 36 32 then took jeremiah anoth roll gave it baruch scribe son neriah who wrote therein mouth jeremiah all word book which jehoiakim king judah had burn fire there were ad besid unto them mani like word 37 1 king zedekiah son josiah reign instead coniah son jehoiakim whom nebuchadrezzar king babylon made king land judah 37 2 but neither he nor hi servant nor peopl land did hearken unto word lord which he spake prophet jeremiah 37 3 zedekiah king sent jehuc son shelemiah zephaniah son maaseiah priest prophet jeremiah say pray now unto lord our god us 37 4 now jeremiah came went peopl they had not put him prison 37 5 then pharaoh s armi wa come forth egypt when chaldean that besieg jerusalem heard tide them they depart jerusalem 37 6 then came word lord unto prophet jeremiah say 37 7 thu saith lord god israel thu shall ye say king judah that sent you unto me enquir me behold pharaoh s armi which is come forth help you shall return egypt their own land 37 8 chaldean shall come again fight against thi citi take it burn it fire 37 9 thu saith lord deceiv not yourselv say chaldean shall sure depart us they shall not depart 37 10 though ye had smitten whole armi chaldean that fight against you there remain but wound men them yet should they rise everi man hi tent burn thi citi fire 37 11 it came pass that when armi chaldean wa broken jerusalem fear pharaoh s armi 37 12 then jeremiah went forth jerusalem go land benjamin separ himself thenc midst peopl 37 13 when he wa gate benjamin captain ward wa there whose name wa irijah son shelemiah son hananiah he took jeremiah prophet say thou fallest away chaldean 37 14 then said jeremiah it is fals i fall not away chaldean but he hearken not him so irijah took jeremiah brought him princ 37 15 wherefor princ were wroth jeremiah smote him put him prison hous jonathan scribe they had made that prison 37 16 when jeremiah wa enter dungeon cabin jeremiah had remain there mani day 37 17 then zedekiah king sent took him king ask him secretli hi hous said is there ani word lord jeremiah said there is said he thou shalt be deliv hand king babylon 37 18 moreov jeremiah said unto king zedekiah what have i offend against thee or against thi servant or against thi peopl that ye have put me prison 37 19 where are now your prophet which prophesi unto you say king babylon shall not come against you nor against thi land 37 20 therefor hear now i pray thee o my lord king let my supplic i pray thee be accept thee that thou caus me not return hous jonathan scribe lest i die there 37 21 then zedekiah king command that they should commit jeremiah court prison that they should give him daili piec bread baker street all bread citi were spent thu jeremiah remain court prison 38 1 then shephatiah son mattan gedaliah son pashur jucal son shelemiah pashur son malchiah heard word that jeremiah had spoken unto all peopl say 38 2 thu saith lord he that remaineth thi citi shall die sword famin pestil but he that goeth forth chaldean shall live he shall have hi life prey shall live 38 3 thu saith lord thi citi shall sure be given hand king babylon s armi which shall take it 38 4 therefor princ said unto king we beseech thee let thi man be put death thu he weakeneth hand men war that remain thi citi hand all peopl speak such word unto them thi man seeketh not welfar thi peopl but hurt 38 5 then zedekiah king said behold he is your hand king is not he that can do ani thing against you 38 6 then took they jeremiah cast him dungeon malchiah son hammelech that wa court prison they let down jeremiah cord dungeon there wa no water but mire so jeremiah sunk mire 38 7 now when ebedmelech ethiopian one eunuch which wa king s hous heard that they had put jeremiah dungeon king then sit gate benjamin 38 8 ebedmelech went forth king s hous spake king say 38 9 my lord king these men have done evil all that they have done jeremiah prophet whom they have cast dungeon he is like die hunger place where he is there is no more bread citi 38 10 then king command ebedmelech ethiopian say take henc thirti men thee take jeremiah prophet dungeon he die 38 11 so ebedmelech took men him went hous king treasuri took thenc old cast clout old rotten rag let them down cord dungeon jeremiah 38 12 ebedmelech ethiopian said unto jeremiah put now these old cast clout rotten rag thine armhol cord jeremiah did so 38 13 so they drew jeremiah cord took him dungeon jeremiah remain court prison 38 14 then zedekiah king sent took jeremiah prophet unto him third entri that is hous lord king said unto jeremiah i will ask thee thing hide noth me 38 15 then jeremiah said unto zedekiah if i declar it unto thee wilt thou not sure put me death if i give thee counsel wilt thou not hearken unto me 38 16 so zedekiah king sware secretli unto jeremiah say as lord liveth that made us thi soul i will not put thee death neither will i give thee hand these men that seek thi life 38 17 then said jeremiah unto zedekiah thu saith lord god host god israel if thou wilt assuredli go forth unto king babylon s princ then thi soul shall live thi citi shall not be burn fire thou shalt live thine hous 38 18 but if thou wilt not go forth king babylon s princ then shall thi citi be given hand chaldean they shall burn it fire thou shalt not escap their hand 38 19 zedekiah king said unto jeremiah i am afraid jew that are fallen chaldean lest they deliv me their hand they mock me 38 20 but jeremiah said they shall not deliv thee obey i beseech thee voic lord which i speak unto thee so it shall be well unto thee thi soul shall live 38 21 but if thou refus go forth thi is word that lord hath shew me 38 22 behold all women that are left king judah s hous shall be brought forth king babylon s princ those women shall say thi friend have set thee have prevail against thee thi feet are sunk mire they are turn away back 38 23 so they shall bring all thi wive thi children chaldean thou shalt not escap their hand but shalt be taken hand king babylon thou shalt caus thi citi be burn fire 38 24 then said zedekiah unto jeremiah let no man know these word thou shalt not die 38 25 but if princ hear that i have talk thee they come unto thee say unto thee declar unto us now what thou hast said unto king hide it not us we will not put thee death also what king said unto thee 38 26 then thou shalt say unto them i present my supplic king that he would not caus me return jonathan s hous die there 38 27 then came all princ unto jeremiah ask him he told them accord all these word that king had command so they left off speak him matter wa not perceiv 38 28 so jeremiah abod court prison day that jerusalem wa taken he wa there when jerusalem wa taken 39 1 ninth year zedekiah king judah tenth month came nebuchadrezzar king babylon all hi armi against jerusalem they besieg it 39 2 eleventh year zedekiah fourth month ninth day month citi wa broken 39 3 all princ king babylon came sat middl gate even nergalsharez samgarnebo sarsechim rabsari nergalsharez rabmag all residu princ king babylon 39 4 it came pass that when zedekiah king judah saw them all men war then they fled went forth citi night way king s garden gate betwixt two wall he went way plain 39 5 but chaldean armi pursu them overtook zedekiah plain jericho when they had taken him they brought him nebuchadnezzar king babylon riblah land hamath where he gave judgment him 39 6 then king babylon slew son zedekiah riblah hi eye also king babylon slew all nobl judah 39 7 moreov he put zedekiah s eye bound him chain carri him babylon 39 8 chaldean burn king s hous hous peopl fire brake down wall jerusalem 39 9 then nebuzaradan captain guard carri away captiv babylon remnant peopl that remain citi those that fell away that fell him rest peopl that remain 39 10 but nebuzaradan captain guard left poor peopl which had noth land judah gave them vineyard field same time 39 11 now nebuchadrezzar king babylon gave charg concern jeremiah nebuzaradan captain guard say 39 12 take him look well him do him no harm but do unto him even as he shall say unto thee 39 13 so nebuzaradan captain guard sent nebushasban rabsari nergalsharez rabmag all king babylon s princ 39 14 even they sent took jeremiah court prison commit him unto gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan that he should carri him home so he dwelt peopl 39 15 now word lord came unto jeremiah while he wa shut court prison say 39 16 go speak ebedmelech ethiopian say thu saith lord host god israel behold i will bring my word thi citi evil not good they shall be accomplish that day thee 39 17 but i will deliv thee that day saith lord thou shalt not be given hand men whom thou art afraid 39 18 i will sure deliv thee thou shalt not fall sword but thi life shall be prey unto thee becaus thou hast put thi trust me saith lord 40 1 word that came jeremiah lord that nebuzaradan captain guard had let him go ramah when he had taken him be bound chain all that were carri away captiv jerusalem judah which were carri away captiv unto babylon 40 2 captain guard took jeremiah said unto him lord thi god hath pronounc thi evil thi place 40 3 now lord hath brought it done accord as he hath said becaus ye have sin against lord have not obey hi voic therefor thi thing is come you 40 4 now behold i loos thee thi day chain which were thine hand if it seem good unto thee come me babylon come i will look well unto thee but if it seem ill unto thee come me babylon forbear behold all land is thee whither it seemeth good conveni thee go thither go 40 5 now while he wa not yet gone back he said go back also gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan whom king babylon hath made governor citi judah dwell him peopl or go wheresoev it seemeth conveni unto thee go so captain guard gave him victual reward let him go 40 6 then went jeremiah unto gedaliah son ahikam mizpah dwelt him peopl that were left land 40 7 now when all captain forc which were field even they their men heard that king babylon had made gedaliah son ahikam governor land had commit unto him men women children poor land them that were not carri away captiv babylon 40 8 then they came gedaliah mizpah even ishmael son nethaniah johanan jonathan son kareah seraiah son tanhumeth son ephai netophathit jezaniah son maachathit they their men 40 9 gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan sware unto them their men say fear not serv chaldean dwell land serv king babylon it shall be well you 40 10 as me behold i will dwell mizpah serv chaldean which will come unto us but ye gather ye wine summer fruit oil put them your vessel dwell your citi that ye have taken 40 11 likewis when all jew that were moab ammonit edom that were all countri heard that king babylon had left remnant judah that he had set them gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan 40 12 even all jew return all place whither they were driven came land judah gedaliah unto mizpah gather wine summer fruit veri much 40 13 moreov johanan son kareah all captain forc that were field came gedaliah mizpah 40 14 said unto him dost thou certainli know that baali king ammonit hath sent ishmael son nethaniah slay thee but gedaliah son ahikam believ them not 40 15 then johanan son kareah spake gedaliah mizpah secretli say let me go i pray thee i will slay ishmael son nethaniah no man shall know it wherefor should he slay thee that all jew which are gather unto thee should be scatter remnant judah perish 40 16 but gedaliah son ahikam said unto johanan son kareah thou shalt not do thi thing thou speakest fals ishmael 41 1 now it came pass seventh month that ishmael son nethaniah son elishama seed royal princ king even ten men him came unto gedaliah son ahikam mizpah there they did eat bread togeth mizpah 41 2 then aros ishmael son nethaniah ten men that were him smote gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan sword slew him whom king babylon had made governor land 41 3 ishmael also slew all jew that were him even gedaliah mizpah chaldean that were found there men war 41 4 it came pass second day he had slain gedaliah no man knew it 41 5 that there came certain shechem shiloh samaria even fourscor men have their beard shaven their cloth rent have cut themselv offer incens their hand bring them hous lord 41 6 ishmael son nethaniah went forth mizpah meet them weep all as he went it came pass as he met them he said unto them come gedaliah son ahikam 41 7 it wa so when they came midst citi that ishmael son nethaniah slew them cast them midst pit he men that were him 41 8 but ten men were found them that said unto ishmael slay us not we have treasur field wheat barley oil honey so he forbar slew them not their brethren 41 9 now pit wherein ishmael had cast all dead bodi men whom he had slain becaus gedaliah wa it which asa king had made fear baasha king israel ishmael son nethaniah fill it them that were slain 41 10 then ishmael carri away captiv all residu peopl that were mizpah even king s daughter all peopl that remain mizpah whom nebuzaradan captain guard had commit gedaliah son ahikam ishmael son nethaniah carri them away captiv depart go ammonit 41 11 but when johanan son kareah all captain forc that were him heard all evil that ishmael son nethaniah had done 41 12 then they took all men went fight ishmael son nethaniah found him great water that are gibeon 41 13 now it came pass that when all peopl which were ishmael saw johanan son kareah all captain forc that were him then they were glad 41 14 so all peopl that ishmael had carri away captiv mizpah cast return went unto johanan son kareah 41 15 but ishmael son nethaniah escap johanan eight men went ammonit 41 16 then took johanan son kareah all captain forc that were him all remnant peopl whom he had recov ishmael son nethaniah mizpah that he had slain gedaliah son ahikam even mighti men war women children eunuch whom he had brought again gibeon 41 17 they depart dwelt habit chimham which is bethlehem go enter egypt 41 18 becaus chaldean they were afraid them becaus ishmael son nethaniah had slain gedaliah son ahikam whom king babylon made governor land 42 1 then all captain forc johanan son kareah jezaniah son hoshaiah all peopl least even unto greatest came near 42 2 said unto jeremiah prophet let we beseech thee our supplic be accept thee pray us unto lord thi god even all thi remnant we are left but few mani as thine eye do behold us 42 3 that lord thi god may shew us way wherein we may walk thing that we may do 42 4 then jeremiah prophet said unto them i have heard you behold i will pray unto lord your god accord your word it shall come pass that whatsoev thing lord shall answer you i will declar it unto you i will keep noth back you 42 5 then they said jeremiah lord be true faith wit us if we do not even accord all thing which lord thi god shall send thee us 42 6 it be good or it be evil we will obey voic lord our god whom we send thee that it may be well us when we obey voic lord our god 42 7 it came pass ten day that word lord came unto jeremiah 42 8 then call he johanan son kareah all captain forc which were him all peopl least even greatest 42 9 said unto them thu saith lord god israel unto whom ye sent me present your supplic him 42 10 if ye will still abid thi land then will i build you not pull you down i will plant you not pluck you i repent me evil that i have done unto you 42 11 be not afraid king babylon whom ye are afraid be not afraid him saith lord i am you save you deliv you hi hand 42 12 i will shew merci unto you that he may have merci you caus you return your own land 42 13 but if ye say we will not dwell thi land neither obey voic lord your god 42 14 say no but we will go land egypt where we shall see no war nor hear sound trumpet nor have hunger bread there will we dwell 42 15 now therefor hear word lord ye remnant judah thu saith lord host god israel if ye wholli set your face enter egypt go sojourn there 42 16 then it shall come pass that sword which ye fear shall overtak you there land egypt famin whereof ye were afraid shall follow close you there egypt there ye shall die 42 17 so shall it be all men that set their face go egypt sojourn there they shall die sword famin pestil none them shall remain or escap evil that i will bring them 42 18 thu saith lord host god israel as mine anger my furi hath been pour forth inhabit jerusalem so shall my furi be pour forth you when ye shall enter egypt ye shall be execr astonish curs reproach ye shall see thi place no more 42 19 lord hath said concern you o ye remnant judah go ye not egypt know certainli that i have admonish you thi day 42 20 ye dissembl your heart when ye sent me unto lord your god say pray us unto lord our god accord unto all that lord our god shall say so declar unto us we will do it 42 21 now i have thi day declar it you but ye have not obey voic lord your god nor ani thing which he hath sent me unto you 42 22 now therefor know certainli that ye shall die sword famin pestil place whither ye desir go sojourn 43 1 it came pass that when jeremiah had made end speak unto all peopl all word lord their god which lord their god had sent him them even all these word 43 2 then spake azariah son hoshaiah johanan son kareah all proud men say unto jeremiah thou speakest fals lord our god hath not sent thee say go not egypt sojourn there 43 3 but baruch son neriah setteth thee against us deliv us hand chaldean that they might put us death carri us away captiv babylon 43 4 so johanan son kareah all captain forc all peopl obey not voic lord dwell land judah 43 5 but johanan son kareah all captain forc took all remnant judah that were return all nation whither they had been driven dwell land judah 43 6 even men women children king s daughter everi person that nebuzaradan captain guard had left gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan jeremiah prophet baruch son neriah 43 7 so they came land egypt they obey not voic lord thu came they even tahpanh 43 8 then came word lord unto jeremiah tahpanh say 43 9 take great stone thine hand hide them clay brickkiln which is entri pharaoh s hous tahpanh sight men judah 43 10 say unto them thu saith lord host god israel behold i will send take nebuchadrezzar king babylon my servant will set hi throne these stone that i have hid he shall spread hi royal pavilion them 43 11 when he cometh he shall smite land egypt deliv such as are death death such as are captiv captiv such as are sword sword 43 12 i will kindl fire hous god egypt he shall burn them carri them away captiv he shall array himself land egypt as shepherd putteth hi garment he shall go forth thenc peac 43 13 he shall break also imag bethshemesh that is land egypt hous god egyptian shall he burn fire 44 1 word that came jeremiah concern all jew which dwell land egypt which dwell migdol tahpanh noph countri pathro say 44 2 thu saith lord host god israel ye have seen all evil that i have brought jerusalem all citi judah behold thi day they are desol no man dwelleth therein 44 3 becaus their wicked which they have commit provok me anger that they went burn incens serv other god whom they knew not neither they ye nor your father 44 4 howbeit i sent unto you all my servant prophet rise earli send them say oh do not thi abomin thing that i hate 44 5 but they hearken not nor inclin their ear turn their wicked burn no incens unto other god 44 6 wherefor my furi mine anger wa pour forth wa kindl citi judah street jerusalem they are wast desol as thi day 44 7 therefor now thu saith lord god host god israel wherefor commit ye thi great evil against your soul cut off you man woman child suckl judah leav you none remain 44 8 that ye provok me unto wrath work your hand burn incens unto other god land egypt whither ye be gone dwell that ye might cut yourselv off that ye might be curs reproach all nation earth 44 9 have ye forgotten wicked your father wicked king judah wicked their wive your own wicked wicked your wive which they have commit land judah street jerusalem 44 10 they are not humbl even unto thi day neither have they fear nor walk my law nor my statut that i set you your father 44 11 therefor thu saith lord host god israel behold i will set my face against you evil cut off all judah 44 12 i will take remnant judah that have set their face go land egypt sojourn there they shall all be consum fall land egypt they shall even be consum sword famin they shall die least even unto greatest sword famin they shall be execr astonish curs reproach 44 13 i will punish them that dwell land egypt as i have punish jerusalem sword famin pestil 44 14 so that none remnant judah which are gone land egypt sojourn there shall escap or remain that they should return land judah which they have desir return dwell there none shall return but such as shall escap 44 15 then all men which knew that their wive had burn incens unto other god all women that stood great multitud even all peopl that dwelt land egypt pathro answer jeremiah say 44 16 as word that thou hast spoken unto us name lord we will not hearken unto thee 44 17 but we will certainli do whatsoev thing goeth forth our own mouth burn incens unto queen heaven pour drink offer unto her as we have done we our father our king our princ citi judah street jerusalem then had we plenti victual were well saw no evil 44 18 but we left off burn incens queen heaven pour drink offer unto her we have want all thing have been consum sword famin 44 19 when we burn incens queen heaven pour drink offer unto her did we make her cake worship her pour drink offer unto her our men 44 20 then jeremiah said unto all peopl men women all peopl which had given him that answer say 44 21 incens that ye burn citi judah street jerusalem ye your father your king your princ peopl land did not lord rememb them came it not hi mind 44 22 so that lord could no longer bear becaus evil your do becaus abomin which ye have commit therefor is your land desol astonish curs inhabit as thi day 44 23 becaus ye have burn incens becaus ye have sin against lord have not obey voic lord nor walk hi law nor hi statut nor hi testimoni therefor thi evil is happen unto you as thi day 44 24 moreov jeremiah said unto all peopl all women hear word lord all judah that are land egypt 44 25 thu saith lord host god israel say ye your wive have both spoken your mouth fulfil your hand say we will sure perform our vow that we have vow burn incens queen heaven pour drink offer unto her ye will sure accomplish your vow sure perform your vow 44 26 therefor hear ye word lord all judah that dwell land egypt behold i have sworn my great name saith lord that my name shall no more be name mouth ani man judah all land egypt say lord god liveth 44 27 behold i will watch them evil not good all men judah that are land egypt shall be consum sword famin there be end them 44 28 yet small number that escap sword shall return land egypt land judah all remnant judah that are gone land egypt sojourn there shall know whose word shall stand mine or their 44 29 thi shall be sign unto you saith lord that i will punish you thi place that ye may know that my word shall sure stand against you evil 44 30 thu saith
