reign eleven year jerusalem hi mother s name wa hamut daughter jeremiah libnah 52 2 he did that which wa evil eye lord accord all that jehoiakim had done 52 3 anger lord it came pass jerusalem judah till he had cast them hi presenc that zedekiah rebel against king babylon 52 4 it came pass ninth year hi reign tenth month tenth day month that nebuchadrezzar king babylon came he all hi armi against jerusalem pitch against it built fort against it round 52 5 so citi wa besieg unto eleventh year king zedekiah 52 6 fourth month ninth day month famin wa sore citi so that there wa no bread peopl land 52 7 then citi wa broken all men war fled went forth citi night way gate two wall which wa king s garden now chaldean were citi round they went way plain 52 8 but armi chaldean pursu king overtook zedekiah plain jericho all hi armi wa scatter him 52 9 then they took king carri him unto king babylon riblah land hamath where he gave judgment him 52 10 king babylon slew son zedekiah hi eye he slew also all princ judah riblah 52 11 then he put eye zedekiah king babylon bound him chain carri him babylon put him prison till day hi death 52 12 now fifth month tenth day month which wa nineteenth year nebuchadrezzar king babylon came nebuzaradan captain guard which serv king babylon jerusalem 52 13 burn hous lord king s hous all hous jerusalem all hous great men burn he fire 52 14 all armi chaldean that were captain guard brake down all wall jerusalem round 52 15 then nebuzaradan captain guard carri away captiv certain poor peopl residu peopl that remain citi those that fell away that fell king babylon rest multitud 52 16 but nebuzaradan captain guard left certain poor land vinedress husbandmen 52 17 also pillar brass that were hous lord base brasen sea that wa hous lord chaldean brake carri all brass them babylon 52 18 caldron also shovel snuffer bowl spoon all vessel brass wherewith they minist took they away 52 19 bason firepan bowl caldron candlestick spoon cup that which wa gold gold that which wa silver silver took captain guard away 52 20 two pillar one sea twelv brasen bull that were base which king solomon had made hous lord brass all these vessel wa weight 52 21 concern pillar height one pillar wa eighteen cubit fillet twelv cubit did compass it thick thereof wa four finger it wa hollow 52 22 chapit brass wa it height one chapit wa five cubit network pomegran chapit round all brass second pillar also pomegran were like unto these 52 23 there were nineti six pomegran side all pomegran network were hundr round 52 24 captain guard took seraiah chief priest zephaniah second priest three keeper door 52 25 he took also citi eunuch which had charg men war seven men them that were near king s person which were found citi princip scribe host who muster peopl land threescor men peopl land that were found midst citi 52 26 so nebuzaradan captain guard took them brought them king babylon riblah 52 27 king babylon smote them put them death riblah land hamath thu judah wa carri away captiv hi own land 52 28 thi is peopl whom nebuchadrezzar carri away captiv seventh year three thousand jew three twenti 52 29 eighteenth year nebuchadrezzar he carri away captiv jerusalem eight hundr thirti two person 52 30 three twentieth year nebuchadrezzar nebuzaradan captain guard carri away captiv jew seven hundr forti five person all person were four thousand six hundr 52 31 it came pass seven thirtieth year captiv jehoiachin king judah twelfth month five twentieth day month that evilmerodach king babylon first year hi reign lift head jehoiachin king judah brought him forth prison 52 32 spake kindli unto him set hi throne throne king that were him babylon 52 33 chang hi prison garment he did continu eat bread him all day hi life 52 34 hi diet there wa continu diet given him king babylon everi day portion day hi death all day hi life lament jeremiah 1 1 how doth citi sit solitari that wa full peopl how is she becom as widow she that wa great nation princess provinc how is she becom tributari 1 2 she weepeth sore night her tear are her cheek all her lover she hath none comfort her all her friend have dealt treacher her they are becom her enemi 1 3 judah is gone captiv becaus afflict becaus great servitud she dwelleth heathen she findeth no rest all her persecutor overtook her strait 1 4 way zion do mourn becaus none come solemn feast all her gate are desol her priest sigh her virgin are afflict she is bitter 1 5 her adversari are chief her enemi prosper lord hath afflict her multitud her transgress her children are gone captiv enemi 1 6 daughter zion all her beauti is depart her princ are becom like hart that find no pastur they are gone strength pursuer 1 7 jerusalem rememb day her afflict her miseri all her pleasant thing that she had day old when her peopl fell hand enemi none did help her adversari saw her did mock her sabbath 1 8 jerusalem hath grievous sin therefor she is remov all that honour her despis her becaus they have seen her naked yea she sigheth turneth backward 1 9 her filthi is her skirt she remembereth not her last end therefor she came down wonder she had no comfort o lord behold my afflict enemi hath magnifi himself 1 10 adversari hath spread hi hand all her pleasant thing she hath seen that heathen enter her sanctuari whom thou didst command that they should not enter thi congreg 1 11 all her peopl sigh they seek bread they have given their pleasant thing meat reliev soul see o lord consid i am becom vile 1 12 is it noth you all ye that pass behold see if there be ani sorrow like unto my sorrow which is done unto me wherewith lord hath afflict me day hi fierc anger 1 13 hath he sent fire my bone it prevaileth against them he hath spread net my feet he hath turn me back he hath made me desol faint all day 1 14 yoke my transgress is bound hi hand they are wreath come my neck he hath made my strength fall lord hath deliv me their hand whom i am not abl rise 1 15 lord hath trodden foot all my mighti men midst me he hath call assembl against me crush my young men lord hath trodden virgin daughter judah as winepress 1 16 these thing i weep mine eye mine eye runneth down water becaus comfort that should reliev my soul is far me my children are desol becaus enemi prevail 1 17 zion spreadeth forth her hand there is none comfort her lord hath command concern jacob that hi adversari should be round him jerusalem is as menstruou woman them 1 18 lord is righteou i have rebel against hi command hear i pray you all peopl behold my sorrow my virgin my young men are gone captiv 1 19 i call my lover but they deceiv me my priest mine elder gave ghost citi while they sought their meat reliev their soul 1 20 behold o lord i am distress my bowel are troubl mine heart is turn me i have grievous rebel abroad sword bereaveth home there is as death 1 21 they have heard that i sigh there is none comfort me all mine enemi have heard my troubl they are glad that thou hast done it thou wilt bring day that thou hast call they shall be like unto me 1 22 let all their wicked come thee do unto them as thou hast done unto me all my transgress my sigh are mani my heart is faint 2 1 how hath lord cover daughter zion cloud hi anger cast down heaven unto earth beauti israel rememb not hi footstool day hi anger 2 2 lord hath swallow all habit jacob hath not piti he hath thrown down hi wrath strong hold daughter judah he hath brought them down ground he hath pollut kingdom princ thereof 2 3 he hath cut off hi fierc anger all horn israel he hath drawn back hi right hand enemi he burn against jacob like flame fire which devoureth round 2 4 he hath bent hi bow like enemi he stood hi right hand as adversari slew all that were pleasant eye tabernacl daughter zion he pour hi furi like fire 2 5 lord wa as enemi he hath swallow israel he hath swallow all her palac he hath destroy hi strong hold hath increas daughter judah mourn lament 2 6 he hath violent taken away hi tabernacl as if it were garden he hath destroy hi place assembl lord hath caus solemn feast sabbath be forgotten zion hath despis indign hi anger king priest 2 7 lord hath cast off hi altar he hath abhor hi sanctuari he hath given hand enemi wall her palac they have made nois hous lord as day solemn feast 2 8 lord hath purpos destroy wall daughter zion he hath stretch line he hath not withdrawn hi hand destroy therefor he made rampart wall lament they languish togeth 2 9 her gate are sunk ground he hath destroy broken her bar her king her princ are gentil law is no more her prophet also find no vision lord 2 10 elder daughter zion sit ground keep silenc they have cast dust their head they have gird themselv sackcloth virgin jerusalem hang down their head ground 2 11 mine eye do fail tear my bowel are troubl my liver is pour earth destruct daughter my peopl becaus children suckl swoon street citi 2 12 they say their mother where is corn wine when they swoon as wound street citi when their soul wa pour their mother bosom 2 13 what thing shall i take wit thee what thing shall i liken thee o daughter jerusalem what shall i equal thee that i may comfort thee o virgin daughter zion thi breach is great like sea who can heal thee 2 14 thi prophet have seen vain foolish thing thee they have not discov thine iniqu turn away thi captiv but have seen thee fals burden caus banish 2 15 all that pass clap their hand thee they hiss wag their head daughter jerusalem say is thi citi that men call perfect beauti joy whole earth 2 16 all thine enemi have open their mouth against thee they hiss gnash teeth they say we have swallow her certainli thi is day that we look we have found we have seen it 2 17 lord hath done that which he had devis he hath fulfil hi word that he had command day old he hath thrown down hath not piti he hath caus thine enemi rejoic thee he hath set horn thine adversari 2 18 their heart cri unto lord o wall daughter zion let tear run down like river day night give thyself no rest let not appl thine eye ceas 2 19 aris cri night begin watch pour thine heart like water face lord lift thi hand him life thi young children that faint hunger top everi street 2 20 behold o lord consid whom thou hast done thi shall women eat their fruit children span long shall priest prophet be slain sanctuari lord 2 21 young old lie ground street my virgin my young men are fallen sword thou hast slain them day thine anger thou hast kill not piti 2 22 thou hast call as solemn day my terror round so that day lord s anger none escap nor remain those that i have swaddl brought hath mine enemi consum 3 1 i am man that hath seen afflict rod hi wrath 3 2 he hath led me brought me dark but not light 3 3 sure against me is he turn he turneth hi hand against me all day 3 4 my flesh my skin hath he made old he hath broken my bone 3 5 he hath build against me compass me gall travail 3 6 he hath set me dark place as they that be dead old 3 7 he hath hedg me that i cannot get he hath made my chain heavi 3 8 also when i cri shout he shutteth my prayer 3 9 he hath inclos my way hewn stone he hath made my path crook 3 10 he wa unto me as bear lie wait as lion secret place 3 11 he hath turn asid my way pull me piec he hath made me desol 3 12 he hath bent hi bow set me as mark arrow 3 13 he hath caus arrow hi quiver enter my rein 3 14 i wa deris all my peopl their song all day 3 15 he hath fill me bitter he hath made me drunken wormwood 3 16 he hath also broken my teeth gravel stone he hath cover me ash 3 17 thou hast remov my soul far off peac i forgat prosper 3 18 i said my strength my hope is perish lord 3 19 rememb mine afflict my miseri wormwood gall 3 20 my soul hath them still remembr is humbl me 3 21 thi i recal my mind therefor have i hope 3 22 it is lord s merci that we are not consum becaus hi compass fail not 3 23 they are new everi morn great is thi faith 3 24 lord is my portion saith my soul therefor will i hope him 3 25 lord is good unto them that wait him soul that seeketh him 3 26 it is good that man should both hope quietli wait salvat lord 3 27 it is good man that he bear yoke hi youth 3 28 he sitteth alon keepeth silenc becaus he hath born it him 3 29 he putteth hi mouth dust if so be there may be hope 3 30 he giveth hi cheek him that smiteth him he is fill full reproach 3 31 lord will not cast off ever 3 32 but though he caus grief yet will he have compass accord multitud hi merci 3 33 he doth not afflict willingli nor griev children men 3 34 crush hi feet all prison earth 3 35 turn asid right man face most high 3 36 subvert man hi caus lord approveth not 3 37 who is he that saith it cometh pass when lord commandeth it not 3 38 mouth most high proceedeth not evil good 3 39 wherefor doth live man complain man punish hi sin 3 40 let us search tri our way turn again lord 3 41 let us lift our heart our hand unto god heaven 3 42 we have transgress have rebel thou hast not pardon 3 43 thou hast cover anger persecut us thou hast slain thou hast not piti 3 44 thou hast cover thyself cloud that our prayer should not pass 3 45 thou hast made us as offscour refus midst peopl 3 46 all our enemi have open their mouth against us 3 47 fear snare is come us desol destruct 3 48 mine eye runneth down river water destruct daughter my peopl 3 49 mine eye trickleth down ceaseth not ani intermiss 3 50 till lord look down behold heaven 3 51 mine eye affecteth mine heart becaus all daughter my citi 3 52 mine enemi chase me sore like bird caus 3 53 they have cut off my life dungeon cast stone me 3 54 water flow mine head then i said i am cut off 3 55 i call thi name o lord low dungeon 3 56 thou hast heard my voic hide not thine ear my breath my cri 3 57 thou drewest near day that i call thee thou saidst fear not 3 58 o lord thou hast plead caus my soul thou hast redeem my life 3 59 o lord thou hast seen my wrong judg thou my caus 3 60 thou hast seen all their vengeanc all their imagin against me 3 61 thou hast heard their reproach o lord all their imagin against me 3 62 lip those that rose against me their devic against me all day 3 63 behold their sit down their rise i am their musick 3 64 render unto them recomp o lord accord work their hand 3 65 give them sorrow heart thi curs unto them 3 66 persecut destroy them anger heaven lord 4 1 how is gold becom dim how is most fine gold chang stone sanctuari are pour top everi street 4 2 preciou son zion compar fine gold how are they esteem as earthen pitcher work hand potter 4 3 even sea monster draw breast they give suck their young one daughter my peopl is becom cruel like ostrich wilder 4 4 tongu suck child cleaveth roof hi mouth thirst young children ask bread no man breaketh it unto them 4 5 they that did feed delic are desol street they that were brought scarlet embrac dunghil 4 6 punish iniqu daughter my peopl is greater than punish sin sodom that wa overthrown as moment no hand stay her 4 7 her nazarit were purer than snow they were whiter than milk they were more ruddi bodi than rubi their polish wa sapphir 4 8 their visag is blacker than coal they are not known street their skin cleaveth their bone it is wither it is becom like stick 4 9 they that be slain sword are better than they that be slain hunger these pine away stricken want fruit field 4 10 hand piti women have sodden their own children they were their meat destruct daughter my peopl 4 11 lord hath accomplish hi furi he hath pour hi fierc anger hath kindl fire zion it hath devour foundat thereof 4 12 king earth all inhabit world would not have believ that adversari enemi should have enter gate jerusalem 4 13 sin her prophet iniqu her priest that have shed blood just midst her 4 14 they have wander as blind men street they have pollut themselv blood so that men could not touch their garment 4 15 they cri unto them depart ye it is unclean depart depart touch not when they fled away wander they said heathen they shall no more sojourn there 4 16 anger lord hath divid them he will no more regard them they respect not person priest they favour not elder 4 17 as us our eye as yet fail our vain help our watch we have watch nation that could not save us 4 18 they hunt our step that we cannot go our street our end is near our day are fulfil our end is come 4 19 our persecutor are swifter than eagl heaven they pursu us mountain they laid wait us wilder 4 20 breath our nostril anoint lord wa taken their pit whom we said hi shadow we shall live heathen 4 21 rejoic be glad o daughter edom that dwellest land uz cup also shall pass unto thee thou shalt be drunken shalt make thyself nake 4 22 punish thine iniqu is accomplish o daughter zion he will no more carri thee away captiv he will visit thine iniqu o daughter edom he will water money our wood is sold unto us 5 5 our neck are persecut we labour have no rest 5 6 we have given hand egyptian assyrian be satisfi bread 5 7 our father have sin are not we have born their iniqu 5 8 servant have rule us there is none that doth deliv us their hand 5 9 we gat our bread peril our live becaus sword wilder 5 10 our skin wa black like oven becaus terribl famin 5 11 they ravish women zion maid citi judah 5 12 princ are hang their hand face elder were not honour 5 13 they took young men grind children fell wood 5 14 elder have ceas gate young men their musick 5 15 joy our 22 but thou hast utterli reject us thou art veri wroth against us book prophet ezekiel 1 1 now it came pass thirtieth year fourth month fifth day month as i wa captiv river chebar that heaven were open i saw vision god 1 2 fifth day month which wa fifth year king jehoiachin s captiv 1 3 word lord came expressli unto ezekiel priest son buzi land chaldean river chebar hand lord wa there him 1 4 i look behold whirlwind came north great cloud fire infold itself bright wa it midst thereof as colour amber midst fire 1 5 also midst thereof came like four live creatur thi wa their appear they had like man 1 6 everi one had four face everi one had four wing 1 7 their feet were straight feet sole their feet wa like sole calf s foot they sparkl like colour burnish brass 1 8 they had hand man their wing their four side they four had their face their wing 1 9 their wing were join one anoth they turn not when they went they went everi one straight forward 1 10 as like their face they four had face man face lion right side they four had face ox left side they four also had face eagl 1 11 thu were their face their wing were stretch upward two wing everi one were join one anoth two cover their bodi 1 12 they went everi one straight forward whither spirit wa go they went they turn not when they went 1 13 as like live creatur their appear wa like burn coal fire like appear lamp it went down live creatur fire wa bright fire went forth lightn 1 14 live creatur ran return as appear flash lightn 1 15 now as i beheld live creatur behold one wheel earth live creatur hi four face 1 16 appear wheel their work wa like unto colour beryl they four had one like their appear their work wa as it were wheel middl wheel 1 17 when they went they went their four side they turn not when they went 1 18 as their ring they were so high that they were dread their ring were full eye round them four 1 19 when live creatur went wheel went them when live creatur were lift earth wheel were lift 1 20 whithersoev spirit wa go they went thither wa their spirit go wheel were lift against them spirit live creatur wa wheel 1 21 when those went these went when those stood these stood when those were lift earth wheel were lift against them spirit live creatur wa wheel 1 22 like firmament head live creatur wa as colour terribl crystal stretch forth their head 1 23 firmament were their wing straight one other everi one had two which cover thi side everi one had two which cover that side their bodi 1 24 when they went i heard nois their wing like nois great water as voic almighti voic speech as nois host when they stood they let down their wing 1 25 there wa voic firmament that wa their head when they stood had let down their wing 1 26 firmament that wa their head wa like throne as appear sapphir stone like throne wa like as appear man it 1 27 i saw as colour amber as appear fire round it appear hi loin even upward appear hi loin even downward i saw as it were appear fire it had bright round 1 28 as appear bow that is cloud day rain so wa appear bright round thi wa appear like glori lord when i saw it i fell my face i heard voic one that spake 2 1 he said unto me son man stand thi feet i will speak unto thee 2 2 spirit enter me when he spake unto me set me my feet that i heard him that spake unto me 2 3 he said unto me son man i send thee children israel rebelli nation that hath rebel against me they their father have transgress against me even unto thi veri day 2 4 they are impud children stiffheart i do send thee unto them thou shalt say unto them thu saith lord god 2 5 they they will hear or they will forbear they are rebelli hous yet shall know that there hath been prophet them 2 6 thou son man be not afraid them neither be afraid their word though brier thorn be thee thou dost dwell scorpion be not afraid their word nor be dismay their look though they be rebelli hous 2 7 thou shalt speak my word unto them they will hear or they will forbear they are most rebelli 2 8 but thou son man hear what i say unto thee be not thou rebelli like that rebelli hous open thi mouth eat that i give thee 2 9 when i look behold hand wa sent unto me lo roll book wa therein 2 10 he spread it me it wa written there wa written therein lament mourn woe 3 1 moreov he said unto me son man eat that thou findest eat thi roll go speak unto hous israel 3 2 so i open my mouth he caus me eat that roll 3 3 he said unto me son man caus thi belli eat fill thi bowel thi roll that i give thee then did i eat it it wa my mouth as honey sweet 3 4 he said unto me son man go get thee unto hous israel speak my word unto them 3 5 thou art not sent peopl strang speech hard languag but hous israel 3 6 not mani peopl strang speech hard languag whose word thou canst not understand sure had i sent thee them they would have hearken unto thee 3 7 but hous israel will not hearken unto thee they will not hearken unto me all hous israel are impud hardheart 3 8 behold i have made thi face strong against their face thi forehead strong against their forehead 3 9 as adam harder than flint have i made thi forehead fear them not neither be dismay their look though they be rebelli hous 3 10 moreov he said unto me son man all my word that i shall speak unto thee receiv thine heart hear thine ear 3 11 go get thee them captiv unto children thi peopl speak unto them tell them thu saith lord god they will hear or they will forbear 3 12 then spirit took me i heard behind me voic great rush say bless be glori lord hi place 3 13 i heard also nois wing live creatur that touch one anoth nois wheel against them nois great rush 3 14 so spirit lift me took me away i went bitter heat my spirit but hand lord wa strong me 3 15 then i came them captiv telabib that dwelt river chebar i sat where they sat remain there astonish them seven day 3 16 it came pass end seven day that word lord came unto me say 3 17 son man i have made thee watchman unto hous israel therefor hear word my mouth give them warn me 3 18 when i say unto wick thou shalt sure die thou givest him not warn nor speakest warn wick hi wick way save hi life same wick man shall die hi iniqu but hi blood will i requir thine hand 3 19 yet if thou warn wick he turn not hi wicked nor hi wick way he shall die hi iniqu but thou hast deliv thi soul 3 20 again when righteou man doth turn hi righteous commit iniqu i lay stumbl block him he shall die becaus thou hast not given him warn he shall die hi sin hi righteous which he hath done shall not be rememb but hi blood will i requir thine hand 3 21 nevertheless if thou warn righteou man that righteou sin not he doth not sin he shall sure live becaus he is warn also thou hast deliv thi soul 3 22 hand lord wa there me he said unto me aris go forth plain i will there talk thee 3 23 then i aros went forth plain behold glori lord stood there as glori which i saw river chebar i fell my face 3 24 then spirit enter me set me my feet spake me said unto me go shut thyself thine hous 3 25 but thou o son man behold they shall put band thee shall bind thee them thou shalt not go them 3 26 i will make thi tongu cleav roof thi mouth that thou shalt be dumb shalt not be them reprov they are rebelli hous 3 27 but when i speak thee i will open thi mouth thou shalt say unto them thu saith lord god he that heareth let him hear he that forbeareth let him forbear they are rebelli hous 4 1 thou also son man take thee tile lay it thee pourtray it citi even jerusalem 4 2 lay sieg against it build fort against it cast mount against it set camp also against it set batter ram against it round 4 3 moreov take thou unto thee iron pan set it wall iron thee citi set thi face against it it shall be besieg thou shalt lay sieg against it thi shall be them 5 13 thu shall mine anger be accomplish i will caus my furi rest them i will be comfort they shall know that i lord have spoken it my zeal when i have accomplish my furi them 5 14 moreov i will but they that escap them shall escap shall be mountain like dove valley all them mourn everi one hi iniqu 7 17 all hand shall be feebl all knee shall be weak as water 7 18 they shall also gird themselv sackcloth horror shall cover them shame shall be all face bald all their head 7 19 they shall cast their silver street their gold shall be remov their silver their gold shall not be abl deliv them day wrath lord they shall not satisfi their soul neither fill their bowel becaus it is stumblingblock their iniqu 7 20 as beauti hi ornament he set it majesti but they made imag their abomin their detest thing therein therefor have i set it far them 7 21 i will give it hand stranger prey wick earth spoil they shall pollut it 7 22 my face will i turn also them they shall pollut my secret place robber shall enter it defil it 7 23 make chain land is full bloodi crime citi is full violenc 7 24 wherefor i will bring worst heathen they shall possess their hous i will also make pomp strong ceas their holi place shall be defil 7 25 destruct cometh they shall seek peac there shall be none 7 26 mischief shall come mischief rumour shall be rumour then shall they seek vision prophet but law shall perish priest counsel ancient 7 27 king shall mourn princ shall be cloth desol hand peopl land shall be troubl i will do unto them their way accord their desert will i judg them they shall know that i am lord 8 1 it came pass sixth year sixth month fifth day month as i sat mine hous elder judah sat me that hand lord god fell there me 8 2 then i beheld lo like as appear fire appear hi loin even downward fire hi loin even upward as appear bright as colour amber 8 3 he put forth form hand took me lock mine head spirit lift me earth heaven brought me vision god jerusalem door inner gate that looketh north where wa seat imag jealousi which provoketh jealousi 8 4 behold glori god israel wa there accord vision that i saw plain 8 5 then said he unto me son man lift thine eye now way north so i lift mine eye way north behold northward gate altar thi imag jealousi entri 8 6 he said furthermor unto me son man seest thou what they do even great abomin that hous israel committeth here that i should go far off my sanctuari but turn thee yet again thou shalt see greater abomin 8 7 he brought me door court when i look behold hole wall 8 8 then said he unto me son man dig now wall when i had dig wall behold door 8 9 he said unto me go behold wick abomin that they do here 8 10 so i went saw behold everi form creep thing abomin beast all idol hous israel pourtray wall round 8 11 there stood them seventi men ancient hous israel midst them stood jaazaniah son shaphan everi man hi censer hi hand thick cloud incens went 8 12 then said he unto me son man hast thou seen what ancient hous israel do dark everi man chamber hi imageri they say lord seeth us not lord hath forsaken earth 8 13 he said also unto me turn thee yet again thou shalt see greater abomin that they do 8 14 then he brought me door gate lord s hous which wa north behold there sat women weep tammuz 8 15 then said he unto me hast thou seen thi o son man turn thee yet again thou shalt see greater abomin than these 8 16 he brought me inner court lord s hous behold door templ lord porch altar were five twenti men their back templ lord their face east they worship sun east 8 17 then he said unto me hast thou seen thi o son man is it light thing hous judah that they commit abomin which they commit here they have fill land violenc have return provok me anger lo they put branch their nose 8 18 therefor will i also deal furi mine eye shall not spare neither will i have piti though they cri mine ear loud voic yet will i not hear them 9 1 he cri also mine ear loud voic say caus them that have charg citi draw near even everi man hi destroy weapon hi hand 9 2 behold six men came way higher gate which lieth north everi man slaughter weapon hi hand one man them wa cloth linen writer s inkhorn hi side they went stood besid brasen altar 9 3 glori god israel wa gone cherub whereupon he wa threshold hous he call man cloth linen which had writer s inkhorn hi side 9 4 lord said unto him go midst citi midst jerusalem set mark forehead men that sigh that cri all abomin that be done midst thereof 9 5 other he said mine hear go ye him citi smite let not your eye spare neither have ye piti 9 6 slay utterli old young both maid littl children women but come not near ani man whom is mark begin my sanctuari then they began ancient men which were hous 9 7 he said unto them defil hous fill court slain go ye forth they went forth slew citi 9 8 it came pass while they were slay them i wa left that i fell my face cri said ah lord god wilt thou destroy all residu israel thi pour thi furi jerusalem 9 9 then said he unto me iniqu hous israel judah is exceed great land is full blood citi full pervers they say lord hath forsaken earth lord seeth not 9 10 as me also mine eye shall not spare neither will i wa head cherubim there appear them as it were sapphir stone as appear like throne 10 2 he spake unto man cloth linen said go wheel even cherub fill thine hand coal fire cherubim scatter them citi he went my sight 10 3 now cherubim stood right side hous when man went cloud fill inner court 10 4 then glori lord went cherub stood threshold hous hous wa fill cloud court wa full bright lord s glori 10 wheel 10 11 when they went they went their four side they turn not as they went but place whither head look they follow it they turn not as they went 10 12 their whole bodi their back their hand their wing wheel were full eye round even wheel that they four had 10 13 as wheel it wa cri unto them my hear o wheel 10 14 everi one had four face first face wa face cherub second face wa face man third themselv they went everi one straight forward 11 1 moreov spirit lift me brought me unto east gate lord s hous which looketh eastward behold door gate five twenti men whom i saw jaazaniah son azur pelatiah son benaiah princ peopl 11 2 then said he unto me son man these are men that devis mischief give wick counsel thi citi 11 3 which say it is not near let us build hous thi citi is caldron we be flesh 11 4 therefor prophesi against them prophesi o son man 11 5 spirit lord fell me said unto me speak thu saith lord thu have ye said o hous israel i know thing that come your mind everi one them 11 6 ye have multipli your slain thi citi ye have fill street thereof slain 11 7 therefor thu saith lord god your slain whom ye have laid midst it they are flesh thi citi is caldron but i will bring you forth midst it 11 8 ye have fear sword i will bring sword you saith lord god 11 9 i will bring you midst thereof deliv you hand stranger will execut judgment you 11 10 ye shall fall sword i will judg you border israel ye shall know that i am lord 11 11 thi citi shall not be your caldron neither shall ye be flesh midst thereof but i will judg you border israel 11 12 ye shall know that i am lord ye have not walk my statut neither execut my judgment but have done manner heathen that are round you 11 13 it came pass when i prophesi that pelatiah son benaiah die then fell i down my face cri loud voic said ah lord god wilt thou make full end remnant israel 11 14 again word lord came unto me say 11 15 son man thi brethren even thi brethren men thi kindr all hous israel wholli are they that lord had shew me 12 1 word lord also came unto me say 12 2 son man thou dwellest midst rebelli hous which have eye see see not they have ear hear hear not they are rebelli hous 12 3 therefor thou son man prepar thee stuff remov remov day their sight thou shalt remov thi place anoth place their sight it may be they will consid though they be rebelli hous 12 4 then shalt thou bring forth thi them thu saith lord god there shall none my word be prolong ani more but word which i have spoken shall be done saith lord god 13 1 word lord came unto me say 13 2 son man prophesi against prophet thou hast increas waxen great thou art come excel ornament thi breast are fashion thine hair is grown wherea thou wast nake bare 16 8 now when i pass thee look thee behold thi time wa time love i thou hast also taken thi fair jewel my gold my silver which i had given thee madest thyself imag men didst commit whoredom them 16 18 tookest thi broider garment coveredst them thou hast set mine oil mine incens them 16 19 my meat also which i gave thee fine flour oil honey wherewith i fed thee thou hast even set it them sweet savour thu it wa saith lord god 16 20 moreov thou hast taken thi son thi daughter whom thou hast born unto me these hast thou sacrif unto them be devour is thi thi whoredom small matter 16 21 that thou hast slain my children deliv them caus them pass fire them 16 22 ordinari food deliv thee unto will them that hate thee daughter philistin which are asham thi lewd way 16 28 thou hast play whore also assyrian becaus thou wast unsati yea thou hast play harlot them yet couldest not be satisfi 16 29 thou hast moreov multipli thi fornic land canaan unto chaldea yet thou wast not satisfi therewith 16 30 how weak is thine heart saith lord god see thou doest all these thing work imperi whorish woman 16 31 that thou buildest thine emin place head everi way makest thine high place everi street hast not been as harlot that thou scornest hire 16 32 but as wife that committeth adulteri which taketh stranger instead her husband 16 33 they give gift all whore but thou givest thi gift all thi lover hirest them that they may come unto thee everi side thi whoredom 16 34 contrari is thee other women thi whoredom wherea none followeth thee commit whoredom that thou givest reward no reward is given unto thee therefor thou art contrari 16 35 wherefor o harlot hear word lord 16 36 thu saith lord god becaus thi filthi wa pour thi naked discov thi whoredom thi lover all idol thi abomin blood thi children which thou didst give unto them 16 37 behold therefor i will gather all thi lover whom thou hast taken pleasur all them that thou hast love all them that thou hast hate i will even gather them round against thee will discov thi naked unto them that they may see all thi naked 16 38 i will judg thee as women that break wedlock shed blood are judg i will give thee blood furi jealousi 16 39 i will also give thee their hand they shall throw down thine emin place shall break down thi high place they shall strip thee also thi cloth shall take thi fair jewel leav thee nake bare 16 40 they shall also bring compani against thee they shall stone thee stone thrust thee their sword 16 41 they shall burn thine hous fire execut judgment thee sight mani women i will caus thee ceas play harlot thou also shalt give no hire ani more 16 42 so will i make my furi thee rest my jealousi shall depart thee i will be quiet will be no more angri 16 43 becaus thou hast not rememb day thi youth but hast fret me all these thing behold therefor i also will recompens thi way thine head saith lord god thou shalt not commit thi lewd all thine abomin 16 44 behold everi one that useth proverb shall use thi proverb against thee say as is mother so is her daughter 16 45 thou art thi mother s daughter that lotheth her husband her children thou art sister thi sister which loth their husband their children your mother wa hittit your father amorit 16 46 thine elder sister is samaria she her daughter that dwell thi left hand thi younger sister that dwelleth thi right hand is sodom her daughter 16 47 yet hast thou not walk their way nor done their abomin but as if that were veri littl thing thou wast corrupt more than they all thi way 16 48 as i live saith lord god sodom thi sister hath not done she nor her daughter as thou hast done thou thi daughter 16 49 behold thi wa iniqu thi sister sodom pride ful bread abund idl wa her her daughter neither did she strengthen hand poor needi 16 50 they were haughti commit abomin me therefor i took them away as i saw good 16 51 neither hath samaria commit half thi sin but thou hast multipli thine abomin more than they hast justifi thi sister all thine abomin which thou hast done 16 52 thou also which hast judg thi sister bear thine own shame thi sin that thou hast commit more abomin than they they are more righteou than thou yea be thou confound also bear thi shame that thou hast justifi thi sister 16 53 when i shall bring again their captiv captiv sodom her daughter captiv samaria her daughter then will i bring again captiv thi captiv midst them 16 54 that thou mayest bear thine own shame mayest be confound all that thou hast done that thou art comfort unto them 16 55 when thi sister sodom her daughter shall return their former estat samaria her daughter shall return their former estat then thou thi daughter shall return your former estat 16 56 thi sister sodom wa not mention thi mouth day thi pride 16 57 thi wicked wa discov as time thi reproach daughter syria all that are round her daughter philistin which despis thee round 16 58 thou hast born thi lewd thine abomin saith lord 16 59 thu saith lord god i will even deal thee as thou hast done which hast despis oath break coven 16 60 nevertheless i will rememb my coven thee day thi youth i will establish unto thee everlast coven 16 61 then thou shalt rememb thi way be asham when thou shalt receiv thi sister thine elder thi younger i will give them unto thee daughter but not thi coven 16 62 i will establish my coven thee thou shalt know that i am lord 16 63 that thou mayest rememb be confound never open thi mouth ani more becaus thi shame when i am pacifi thee all that thou hast done saith lord god 17 1 word lord came unto me say 17 2 son man put forth riddl speak parabl unto hous israel 17 3 say thu saith lord god great eagl great wing longwing full feather which had diver colour came unto lebanon took highest branch cedar 17 4 he crop off top hi young twig carri it land traffick he set it citi merchant 17 5 he took also seed land plant it fruit field he place it great water set it as willow tree 17 6 it grew becam spread vine low statur whose branch turn him root thereof were him so it becam vine brought forth branch shot forth sprig 17 7 there wa also anoth great eagl great wing mani feather behold thi vine did bend her root him shot forth her branch him that he might water it furrow her plantat 17 8 it wa plant good soil great water that it might bring forth branch that it might bear fruit that it might be goodli vine 17 9 say thou thu saith lord god shall it prosper shall he not pull root thereof cut off fruit thereof that it wither it shall wither all leav her spring even great power or mani peopl pluck it root thereof 17 10 yea behold be plant shall it prosper shall it not utterli wither when east wind toucheth it it shall wither furrow where it grew 17 11 moreov word lord came unto me say 17 12 say now rebelli hous know ye not what these thing mean tell them behold king babylon is come jerusalem hath taken king thereof princ thereof led them him babylon 17 13 hath taken king s seed made coven him hath taken oath him he hath also taken mighti land 17 14 that kingdom might be base that it might not lift itself but that keep hi coven it might stand 17 15 but he rebel against him send hi ambassador egypt that they might give him hors much peopl shall he prosper shall he escap that doeth such thing or shall he break coven be deliv 17 16 as i live saith lord god sure place where king dwelleth that made him king whose oath he despis whose coven he brake even him midst babylon he shall die 17 17 neither shall pharaoh hi mighti armi great compani make him war cast mount build fort cut off mani person 17 18 see he despis oath break coven when lo he had given hi hand hath done all these thing he shall not escap 17 19 therefor thu saith lord god as i live sure mine oath that he hath despis my coven that he hath broken even it will i recompens hi own head 17 20 i will spread my net him he shall be taken my snare i will bring him babylon will plead him there hi trespass that he hath trespass against me 17 21 all hi fugit all hi band shall fall sword they that remain shall be scatter all wind ye shall know that i lord have spoken it 17 22 thu saith lord god i will also take highest branch high cedar will set it i will crop off top hi young twig tender one will plant it high mountain emin 17 23 mountain height israel will i plant it it shall bring forth bough bear fruit be goodli cedar it shall dwell all fowl everi wing shadow branch thereof shall they dwell 17 24 all tree field shall know that i lord have brought down high tree have exalt low tree have dri green tree have made dri tree flourish i lord have spoken have done it 18 1 word lord came unto me again say 18 2 what mean ye that ye use thi proverb concern land israel say father have eaten sour grape children s teeth are set edg 18 3 as i live saith lord god ye shall not have occas ani more use thi proverb israel 18 4 behold all soul are mine as soul father so also soul son is mine soul that sinneth it shall die 18 5 but if man be just do that which is law right 18 6 hath not eaten mountain neither hath lift hi eye idol hous israel neither hath defil hi neighbour wife neither hath come near menstruou woman 18 7 hath not oppress ani but hath restor debtor hi pledg hath spoil none violenc hath given hi bread hungri hath cover nake garment 18 8 he that hath not given forth usuri neither hath taken ani increas that hath withdrawn hi hand iniqu hath execut true judgment man man 18 9 hath walk my statut hath kept my judgment deal truli he is just he shall sure live saith lord god 18 10 if he beget son that is robber shedder blood that doeth like ani one these thing 18 11 that doeth not ani those duti but even hath eaten mountain defil hi neighbour wife 18 12 hath oppress poor needi hath spoil violenc hath not restor pledg hath lift hi eye idol hath commit abomin 18 13 hath given forth usuri hath taken increas shall he then live he shall not live he hath done all these abomin he shall sure die hi blood shall be him 18 14 now lo if he beget son that seeth all hi father s sin which he hath done considereth doeth not such like 18 15 that hath not eaten mountain neither hath lift hi eye idol hous israel hath not defil hi neighbour wife 18 16 neither hath oppress ani hath not withholden pledg neither hath spoil violenc but hath given hi bread hungri hath cover nake garment 18 17 that hath taken off hi hand poor that hath not receiv usuri nor increas hath execut my judgment hath walk my statut he shall not die iniqu hi father he shall sure live 18 18 as hi father becaus he cruelli oppress spoil hi brother violenc did that which is not good hi peopl lo even he shall die hi iniqu 18 19 yet say ye whi doth not son bear iniqu father when son hath done that which is law right hath kept all my statut hath done them he shall sure live 18 20 soul that sinneth it shall die son shall not bear iniqu father neither shall father bear iniqu son righteous righteou shall be him wicked wick shall be him 18 21 but if wick will turn all hi sin that he hath commit keep all my statut do that which is law right he shall sure live he shall not die 18 22 all hi transgress that he hath commit they shall not be mention unto him hi righteous that he hath done he shall live 18 23 have i ani pleasur all that wick should die saith lord god not that he should return hi way live 18 24 but when righteou turneth away hi righteous committeth iniqu doeth accord all abomin that wick man doeth shall he live all hi righteous that he hath done shall not be mention hi trespass that he hath trespass hi sin that he hath sin them shall he die 18 25 yet ye say way lord is not equal hear now o hous israel is not my way equal are not your way unequ 18 26 when righteou man turneth away hi righteous committeth iniqu dieth them hi iniqu that he hath done shall he die 18 27 again when wick man turneth away hi wicked that he hath commit doeth that which is law right he shall save hi soul aliv 18 28 becaus he considereth turneth away all hi transgress that he hath commit he shall sure live he shall not die 18 29 yet saith hous israel way lord is not equal o hous israel are not my way equal are not your way unequ 18 30 therefor i will judg you o hous israel everi one accord hi way saith lord god repent turn yourselv all your transgress so iniqu shall not be your ruin 18 31 cast away you all your transgress wherebi ye have transgress make you new heart new spirit whi will ye die o hous israel 18 32 i have no pleasur death him that dieth saith lord god wherefor turn yourselv live ye 19 1 moreov take thou lament princ israel 19 2 say what is thi mother lioness she lay down lion she nourish her whelp young lion 19 3 she brought one her whelp it becam young lion it learn catch prey it devour men 19 4 nation also heard him he wa taken their pit they brought him chain unto land egypt 19 5 now when she saw that she had wait her hope wa lost then she took anoth her whelp made him young lion 19 6 he went down lion he becam young lion learn catch prey devour men 19 7 he knew their desol palac he laid wast their citi land wa desol ful thereof nois hi roar 19 8 then nation set against him everi side provinc spread their net him he wa taken their pit 19 9 they put him ward chain brought him king babylon they brought him hold that hi voic should no more be heard mountain israel 19 10 thi mother is like vine thi blood plant water she wa fruit full branch reason mani water 19 11 she had strong rod sceptr them that bare rule her statur wa exalt thick branch she appear her height multitud her branch 19 12 but she wa pluck furi she wa cast down ground east wind dri her fruit her strong rod were broken wither fire consum them 19 13 now she is plant wilder dri thirsti ground 19 14 fire is gone rod her branch which hath devour her fruit so that she hath no strong rod be sceptr rule thi is lament shall be lament 20 1 it came pass seventh year fifth month tenth day month that certain elder israel came enquir lord sat me 20 2 then came word lord unto me say 20 3 son man speak unto elder israel say unto them thu saith lord god are ye come enquir me as i live saith lord god i will not be enquir you 20 4 wilt thou judg them son man wilt thou judg them caus them know abomin their father 20 5 say unto them thu saith lord god day when i chose israel lift mine hand unto seed hous jacob made myself known unto them land egypt when i lift mine hand unto them say i am lord your god 20 6 day that i lift mine hand unto them bring them forth land egypt land that i had espi them flow milk honey which is glori all land 20 7 then said i unto them cast ye away everi man abomin hi eye defil not yourselv idol egypt i am lord your god 20 8 but they rebel against me would not hearken unto me they did not everi man cast away abomin their eye neither did they forsak idol egypt then i said i will pour my furi them accomplish my anger against them midst land egypt 20 9 but i wrought my name s sake that it should not be pollut heathen whom they were whose sight i made myself known unto them bring them forth land egypt 20 10 wherefor i caus them go forth land egypt brought them wilder 20 11 i gave them my statut shew them my judgment which if man do he shall even live them 20 12 moreov also i gave them my sabbath be sign me them that they might know that i am lord that sanctifi them 20 13 but hous israel rebel against me wilder they walk not my statut they despis my judgment which if man do he shall even live them my sabbath they greatli pollut then i said i would pour my furi them wilder consum them 20 14 but i wrought my name s sake that it should not be pollut heathen whose sight i brought them 20 15 yet also i lift my hand unto them wilder that i would not bring them land which i had given them flow milk honey which is glori all land 20 16 becaus they despis my judgment walk not my statut but pollut my sabbath their heart went their idol 20 17 nevertheless mine eye spare them destroy them neither did i make end them wilder 20 18 but i said unto their children wilder walk ye not statut your father neither observ their judgment nor defil yourselv their idol 20 19 i am lord your god walk my statut keep my judgment do them 20 20 hallow my sabbath they shall be sign me you that ye may know that i am lord your god 20 21 notwithstand children rebel against me they walk not my statut neither kept my judgment do them which if man do he shall even live them they pollut my sabbath then i said i would pour my furi them accomplish my anger against them wilder 20 22 nevertheless i withdrew mine hand wrought my name s sake that it should not be pollut sight heathen whose sight i brought them forth 20 23 i lift mine hand unto them also wilder that i would scatter them heathen dispers them countri 20 24 becaus they had not execut my judgment but had despis my statut had pollut my sabbath their eye were their father idol 20 25 wherefor i gave them also statut that were not good judgment wherebi they should not live 20 26 i pollut them their own gift that they caus pass fire all that openeth womb that i might make them desol end that they might know that i am lord 20 27 therefor son man speak unto hous israel say unto them thu saith lord god yet thi your father have blasphem me that they have commit trespass against me 20 28 when i had brought them land which i lift mine hand give it them then they saw everi high hill all thick tree they offer there their sacrific there they present provoc their offer there also they made their sweet savour pour there their drink offer 20 29 then i said unto them what is high place whereunto ye go name whereof is call bamah unto thi day 20 30 wherefor say unto hous israel thu saith lord god are ye pollut manner your father commit ye whoredom their abomin 20 31 when ye offer your gift when ye make your son pass fire ye pollut yourselv all your idol even unto thi day shall i be enquir you o hous israel as i live saith lord god i will not be enquir you 20 32 that which cometh your mind shall not be all that ye say we will be as heathen as famili countri serv wood stone 20 33 as i live saith lord god sure mighti hand stretch arm furi pour will i rule you 20 34 i will bring you peopl will gather you countri wherein ye are scatter mighti hand stretch arm furi pour 20 35 i will bring you wilder peopl there will i plead you face face 20 36 like as i plead your father wilder land egypt so will i plead you saith lord god 20 37 i will caus you pass rod i will bring you bond coven 20 38 i will purg you rebel them that transgress against me i will bring them forth countri where they sojourn they shall not enter land israel ye shall know that i am lord 20 39 as you o hous israel thu saith lord god go ye serv ye everi one hi idol hereaft also if ye will not hearken unto me but pollut ye my holi name no more your gift your idol 20 40 mine holi mountain mountain height israel saith lord god there shall all hous israel all them land serv me there will i accept them there will i requir your offer firstfruit your oblat all your holi thing 20 41 i will accept you your sweet savour when i bring you peopl gather you countri wherein ye have been scatter i will be sanctifi you heathen 20 42 ye shall know that i am lord when i shall bring you land israel countri which i lift mine hand give it your father 20 43 there shall ye rememb your way all your do wherein ye have been defil ye shall loth yourselv your own sight all your evil that ye have commit 20 44 ye shall know that i am lord when i have wrought you my name s sake not accord your wick way nor accord your corrupt do o ye hous israel saith lord god 20 45 moreov word lord came unto me say 20 46 son man set thi face south drop thi word south prophesi against forest south field 20 47 say forest south hear word lord thu saith lord god behold i will kindl fire thee it shall devour everi green tree thee everi dri tree flame flame shall not be quench all face south north shall be burn therein 20 48 all flesh shall see that i lord have kindl it it shall not be quench 20 49 then said i ah lord god they say me doth he not speak parabl 21 1 word lord came unto me say 21 2 son man set thi face jerusalem drop thi word holi place prophesi against land israel 21 3 say land israel thu saith lord behold i am against thee will draw forth my sword hi sheath will cut off thee righteou wick 21 4 see then that i will cut off thee righteou wick therefor shall my sword go forth hi sheath against all flesh south north 21 5 that all flesh may know that i lord have drawn forth my sword hi sheath it shall not return ani more 21 6 sigh therefor thou son man break thi loin bitter sigh their eye 21 7 it shall be when they say unto thee wherefor sighest thou that thou shalt answer tide becaus it cometh everi heart shall melt all hand shall be feebl everi spirit shall faint all knee shall be weak as water behold it cometh shall be brought pass saith lord god 21 8 again word lord came unto me say 21 9 son man prophesi say thu saith lord say sword sword is sharpen also furbish 21 10 it is sharpen make sore slaughter it is furbish that it may glitter should we then make mirth it contemneth rod my son as everi tree 21 11 he hath given it be furbish that it may be handl thi sword is sharpen it is furbish give it hand slayer 21 12 cri howl son man it shall be my peopl it shall be all princ israel terror reason sword shall be my peopl smite therefor thi thigh 21 13 becaus it is trial what if sword contemn even rod it shall be no more saith lord god 21 14 thou therefor son man prophesi smite thine hand togeth let sword be doubl third time sword slain it is sword great men that are slain which entereth their privi chamber 21 15 i have set point sword against all their gate that their heart may faint their ruin be multipli ah it is made bright it is wrap slaughter 21 16 go thee one way or other either right hand or left whithersoev thi face is set 21 17 i will also smite mine hand togeth i will caus my furi rest i lord have said it 21 18 word lord came unto me again say 21 19 also thou son man appoint thee two way that sword king babylon may come both twain he made hi arrow bright he consult imag he look liver 21 22 hi right hand wa divin jerusalem appoint captain open mouth slaughter lift voic shout appoint batter ram against gate cast mount build fort becom guilti thi blood that thou hast shed hast defil thyself thine idol which thou hast made thou hast caus thi day draw near art come even unto thi year therefor have i made thee reproach unto heathen mock all countri 22 5 those that be near those that be far thee shall mock thee which art infam much vex 22 6 behold princ israel everi one were thee their power shed blood 22 7 thee have they set light father mother midst thee have they dealt oppress stranger thee have they vex fatherless widow 22 8 thou hast despis mine holi thing hast profan my sabbath 22 9 thee are men that carri tale wife anoth hath lewdli defil hi daughter law anoth thee hath humbl hi sister hi father s daughter 22 12 thee have they taken gift shed blood thou hast taken usuri increas thou hast greedili gain thi neighbour extort hast forgotten me saith lord god 22 13 behold therefor i have smitten mine hand thi dishonest gain which thou hast made thi blood which hath been midst thee 22 14 can thine heart endur or can thine hand be strong day that i shall deal thee i lord have spoken it will do it 22 15 i will scatter thee heathen dispers thee countri will consum thi filthi thee 22 16 thou shalt take thine inherit thyself sight heathen thou shalt know that i am lord 22 17 word lord came unto me say 22 18 son man hous israel is me becom dross all they are brass tin iron lead midst furnac they are even dross silver 22 19 therefor thu saith lord god becaus ye are all becom dross behold therefor i will gather you midst jerusalem 22 20 as they gather silver brass iron lead tin midst furnac blow fire it melt it so will i gather you mine anger my furi i will leav you there melt you 22 21 yea i will gather you blow you fire my wrath ye shall be melt midst therof 22 22 as silver is melt midst furnac so shall ye be melt midst thereof ye shall know that i lord have pour my furi you 22 23 word lord came unto me say 22 24 son man say unto her thou art land that is not cleans nor rain day indign 22 25 there is conspiraci her prophet midst thereof like roar lion raven prey they have devour soul they have taken treasur preciou thing they have made her mani widow midst thereof 22 26 her priest have violat my law have profan mine holi thing they have put no differ holi profan neither have they shew differ unclean clean have hid their eye my sabbath i am profan them 22 27 her princ midst thereof are like wolv raven prey shed blood destroy soul get dishonest gain 22 28 her prophet have daub them untemp morter see vaniti divin lie unto them say thu saith lord god when lord hath not spoken 22 29 peopl land have use oppress exercis robberi have vex poor needi yea they have oppress stranger wrong 22 30 i sought man them that should make hedg stand gap me land that i should not destroy it but i found none 22 31 therefor have i pour mine indign them i have consum them fire my wrath their own way have i recompens their head saith lord god 23 1 word lord came again unto me say 23 2 son man there were two women daughter one mother 23 3 they commit whoredom egypt they commit whoredom their youth there were their breast press there they bruis teat their virgin 23 4 name them were aholah elder aholibah her sister they were mine they bare son daughter thu were their name samaria is aholah jerusalem aholibah 23 5 aholah play harlot when she wa mine she dote her lover assyrian her neighbour 23 6 which were cloth blue captain ruler all them desir young men horsemen ride hors 23 7 thu she commit her whoredom them all them that were chosen men assyria all whom she dote all their idol she defil herself 23 8 neither left she her whoredom brought egypt her youth they lay her they bruis breast her virgin pour their whoredom her 23 9 wherefor i have deliv her hand her lover hand assyrian whom she dote 23 10 these discov her naked they took her son her daughter slew her sword she becam famou women they had execut judgment her 23 11 when her sister aholibah saw thi she wa more corrupt her inordin love than she her whoredom more than her sister her whoredom 23 12 she dote assyrian her neighbour captain ruler cloth most gorgeous horsemen ride hors all them desir young men 23 13 then i saw that she wa defil that they took both one way 23 14 that she increas her whoredom when she saw men pourtray wall imag chaldean pourtray vermilion 23 15 gird girdl their loin exceed dy attir their head all them princ look manner babylonian chaldea land their nativ 23 16 as soon as she saw them her eye she dote them sent messeng unto them chaldea 23 17 babylonian came her bed love they defil her their whoredom she wa pollut them her mind wa alien them 23 18 so she discov her whoredom discov her naked then my mind wa alien her like as my mind wa alien her sister 23 19 yet she multipli her whoredom call remembr day her youth wherein she had play harlot land egypt 23 20 she dote their paramour whose flesh is as flesh ass whose issu is like issu hors 23 21 thu thou calledst remembr lewd thi youth bruis thi teat egyptian pap thi youth 23 22 therefor o aholibah thu saith lord god behold i will rais thi lover against thee whom thi mind is alien i will bring them against thee everi side 23 23 babylonian all chaldean pekod shoa koa all assyrian them all them desir young men captain ruler great lord renown all them ride hors 23 24 they shall come against thee chariot wagon wheel assembl peopl which shall set against thee buckler shield helmet round i will set judgment them they shall judg thee accord their judgment 23 25 i will set my jealousi against thee they shall deal furious thee they shall take away thi nose thine ear thi remnant shall fall sword they shall take thi son thi daughter thi residu shall be devour fire 23 26 they shall also strip thee thi cloth take away thi fair jewel 23 27 thu will i make thi lewd ceas thee thi whoredom brought land egypt so that thou shalt not lift thine eye unto them nor rememb egypt ani more 23 28 thu saith lord god behold i will deliv thee hand them whom thou hatest hand them whom thi mind is alien 23 29 they shall deal thee hate shall take away all thi labour shall leav thee nake bare sister therefor will i give her cup thine hand 23 32 thu saith lord god thou shalt drink thi sister s cup deep larg thou shalt be laugh scorn had deris it containeth much 23 33 thou shalt be fill drunken sorrow cup astonish desol cup thi sister samaria 23 34 thou shalt even drink it suck it thou shalt break sherd thereof pluck off thine own breast i have spoken it saith lord god 23 35 therefor will even make pile fire great 24 10 heap wood kindl fire consum flesh spice it well let bone be burn 24 11 then set it empti coal thereof that brass it may be hot may burn that filthi it may be wife die i did morn as i wa command 24 19 peopl said unto me wilt thou not tell us what these thing are us that thou doest so 24 20 then i answer them word lord came unto me say 24 21 speak unto hous as i have done ye shall not cover your lip nor eat bread men 24 23 your tire shall be your head your shoe your feet ye shall not mourn nor weep but ye shall pine away your iniqu mourn one anoth 24 24
