day month that word lord came unto me say 26 2 son man becaus that tyru hath said against jerusalem aha she is broken that wa gate peopl she is turn unto me i shall be replenish now she is laid wast 26 3 therefor thu saith lord god behold i am against thee o tyru will caus mani nation come against thee as sea causeth hi wave come 26 4 they shall destroy wall tyru break down her tower i will also scrape her dust her make her like top rock 26 5 it shall be place spread net midst sea i have spoken it saith lord god it shall becom spoil nation 26 6 her daughter which are field shall be slain sword they shall know that i am lord 26 7 thu saith lord god behold i will bring tyru nebuchadrezzar king babylon king king north hors chariot horsemen compani much peopl 26 8 he shall slay sword thi daughter field he shall make fort against thee cast mount against thee lift buckler against thee 26 9 he shall set engin war against thi wall hi axe he shall break down thi tower 26 10 reason abund hi hors their dust shall cover thee thi wall shall shake nois horsemen wheel chariot when he shall enter thi gate as men enter citi wherein is made breach 26 11 hoof hi hors shall he tread down all thi street he shall slay thi peopl sword thi strong garrison shall go down ground 26 12 they shall make spoil thi rich make prey thi merchandis they shall break down thi wall destroy thi pleasant hous they shall lay thi stone thi timber thi dust midst water 26 13 i will caus nois thi song ceas sound thi harp shall be no more heard 26 14 i will make thee like top rock thou shalt be place spread net thou shalt be built no more i lord have spoken it saith lord god 26 15 thu saith lord god tyru shall not isl shake sound thi fall when wound cri when slaughter is made midst thee 26 16 then all princ sea shall come down their throne lay away their robe put off their broider garment they shall cloth themselv trembl they shall sit ground shall trembl everi moment be astonish thee 26 17 they shall take lament thee say thee how art thou destroy that wast inhabit seafar men renown citi which wast strong sea she her inhabit which caus their terror be all that haunt it 26 18 now shall isl trembl day thi fall yea isl that are sea shall be troubl thi departur 26 19 thu saith lord god when i shall make thee desol citi like citi that are not inhabit when i shall bring deep thee great water shall cover thee 26 20 when i shall bring thee down them that descend pit peopl old time shall set thee low part earth place desol old them that go down pit that thou be not inhabit i shall set glori land live 26 21 i will make thee terror thou shalt be no more though thou be sought yet shalt thou never be found again saith lord god 27 1 word lord came again unto me say 27 2 now thou son man take lament tyru 27 3 say unto tyru o thou that art situat entri sea which art merchant peopl mani isl thu saith lord god o tyru thou hast said i am perfect beauti 27 4 thi border are midst sea thi builder have perfect thi beauti 27 5 they have made all thi ship board fir tree senir they have taken cedar lebanon make mast thee 27 6 oak bashan have they made thine oar compani ashurit have made thi bench ivori brought isl chittim 27 7 fine linen broider work egypt wa that which thou spreadest forth be thi sail blue purpl isl elishah wa that which cover thee 27 8 inhabit zidon arvad were thi marin thi wise men o tyru that were thee were thi pilot 27 9 ancient gebal wise men thereof were thee thi calker all ship sea their marin were thee occupi thi merchandis 27 10 they persia lud phut were thine armi thi men war they hang shield helmet thee they set forth thi comeli 27 11 men arvad thine armi were thi wall round gammadim were thi tower they hang their shield thi wall round they have made thi beauti perfect 27 12 tarshish wa thi merchant reason multitud all kind rich silver iron tin lead they trade thi fair 27 13 javan tubal meshech they were thi merchant they trade person men vessel brass thi market 27 14 they hous togarmah trade thi fair hors horsemen mule 27 15 men dedan were thi merchant mani isl were merchandis thine hand they brought thee present horn ivori eboni 27 16 syria wa thi merchant reason multitud ware thi make they occupi thi fair emerald purpl broider work fine linen coral agat 27 17 judah land israel they were thi merchant they trade thi market wheat minnith pannag honey oil balm 27 18 damascu wa thi merchant multitud ware thi make multitud all rich wine helbon white wool 27 19 dan also javan go fro occupi thi fair bright iron cassia calamu were thi market 27 20 dedan wa thi merchant preciou cloth chariot 27 21 arabia all princ kedar they occupi thee lamb ram goat these were they thi merchant 27 22 merchant sheba raamah they were thi merchant they occupi thi fair chief all spice all preciou stone gold 27 23 haran canneh eden merchant sheba asshur chilmad were thi merchant 27 24 these were thi merchant all sort thing blue cloth broider work chest rich apparel bound cord made cedar thi merchandis 27 25 ship tarshish did sing thee thi market thou wast replenish made veri gloriou midst sea 27 26 thi rower have brought thee great water east wind hath broken thee midst sea 27 27 thi rich thi fair thi merchandis thi marin thi pilot thi calker occupi thi merchandis all thi men war that are thee all thi compani which is midst thee shall fall midst sea day thi ruin 27 28 suburb shall shake sound cri thi pilot 27 29 all that handl oar marin all pilot sea shall come down their ship they shall stand land 27 30 shall caus their voic be heard against thee shall cri bitterli shall cast dust their head they shall wallow themselv ash 27 31 they shall make themselv utterli bald thee gird them sackcloth they shall weep thee bitter heart bitter wail 27 32 their wail they shall take lament thee lament thee say what citi is like tyru like destroy midst sea 27 33 when thi ware went forth sea thou filledst mani peopl thou didst enrich king earth multitud thi rich thi merchandis 27 34 time when thou shalt be broken sea depth water thi merchandis all thi compani midst thee shall fall 27 35 all inhabit isl shall be astonish thee their king shall be sore afraid they shall be troubl their counten 27 36 merchant peopl shall hiss thee thou shalt be terror never shalt be ani more 28 1 word lord came again unto me say 28 2 son man say unto princ tyru thu saith lord god becaus thine heart is lift thou hast said i am god i sit seat god midst sea yet thou art man not god though thou set thine heart as heart god 28 3 behold thou art wiser than daniel there is no secret that they can hide thee 28 4 thi wisdom thine understand thou hast gotten thee rich hast gotten gold silver thi treasur 28 5 thi great wisdom thi traffick hast thou increas thi rich thine heart is lift becaus thi rich 28 6 therefor thu saith lord god becaus thou hast set thine heart as heart god 28 7 behold therefor i will bring stranger thee terribl nation they shall draw their sword against beauti thi wisdom they shall defil thi bright 28 8 they shall bring thee down pit thou shalt die death them that are slain midst sea 28 9 wilt thou yet say him that slayeth thee i am god but thou shalt be man no god hand him that slayeth thee 28 10 thou shalt die death uncircumcis hand stranger i have spoken it saith lord god 28 11 moreov word lord came unto me say 28 12 son man take lament king tyru say unto him thu saith lord god thou sealest sum full wisdom perfect beauti 28 13 thou hast been eden garden god everi preciou stone wa thi cover sardiu topaz diamond beryl onyx jasper sapphir emerald carbuncl gold workmanship thi tabret thi pipe wa prepar thee day that thou wast creat 28 14 thou art anoint cherub that covereth i have set thee so thou wast holi mountain god thou hast walk down midst stone fire 28 15 thou wast perfect thi way day that thou wast creat till iniqu wa found thee 28 16 multitud thi merchandis they have fill midst thee violenc thou hast sin therefor i will cast thee as profan mountain god i will destroy thee o cover cherub midst stone fire 28 17 thine heart wa lift becaus thi beauti thou hast corrupt thi wisdom reason thi bright i will cast thee ground i will lay thee king that they may behold thee 28 18 thou hast defil thi sanctuari multitud thine iniqu iniqu thi traffick therefor will i bring forth fire midst thee it shall devour thee i will bring thee ash earth sight all them that behold thee 28 19 all they that know thee peopl shall be astonish thee thou shalt be terror never shalt thou be ani more 28 20 again word lord came unto me say 28 21 son man set thi face against zidon prophesi against it 28 22 say thu saith lord god behold i am against thee o zidon i will be glorifi midst thee they shall know that i am lord when i shall have execut judgment her shall be sanctifi her 28 23 i will send her pestil blood her street wound shall be judg midst her sword her everi side they shall know that i am lord 28 24 there shall be no more prick brier unto hous israel nor ani griev thorn all that are round them that despis them they shall know that i am lord god 28 25 thu saith lord god when i shall have gather hous israel peopl whom they are scatter shall be sanctifi them sight heathen then shall they dwell their land that i have given my servant jacob 28 26 they shall dwell safe therein shall build hous plant vineyard yea they shall dwell confid when i have execut judgment all those that despis them round them they shall know that i am lord their god 29 1 tenth year tenth month twelfth day month word lord came unto me say 29 2 son man set thi face against pharaoh king egypt prophesi against him against all egypt 29 3 speak say thu saith lord god behold i am against thee pharaoh king egypt great dragon that lieth midst hi river which hath said my river is mine own i have made it myself 29 4 but i will put hook thi jaw i will caus fish thi river stick unto thi scale i will bring thee midst thi river all fish thi river shall stick unto thi scale 29 5 i will leav thee thrown wilder thee all fish thi river thou shalt fall open field thou shalt not be brought togeth nor gather i have given thee meat beast field fowl heaven 29 6 all inhabit egypt shall know that i am lord becaus they have been staff reed hous israel 29 7 when they took hold thee thi hand thou didst break rend all their shoulder when they lean thee thou brakest madest all their loin be stand 29 8 therefor thu saith lord god behold i will bring sword thee cut off man beast thee 29 9 land egypt shall be desol wast they shall know that i am lord becaus he hath said river is mine i have made it 29 10 behold therefor i am against thee against thi river i will make land egypt utterli wast desol tower syen even unto border ethiopia 29 11 no foot man shall pass it nor foot beast shall pass it neither shall it be inhabit forti year 29 12 i will make land egypt desol midst countri that are desol her citi citi that are laid wast shall be desol forti year i will scatter egyptian nation will dispers them countri 29 13 yet thu saith lord god end forti year will i gather egyptian peopl whither they were scatter 29 14 i will bring again captiv egypt will caus them return land pathro land their habit they shall be there base kingdom 29 15 it shall be basest kingdom neither shall it exalt itself ani more nation i will diminish them that they shall no more rule nation 29 16 it shall be no more confid hous israel which bringeth their iniqu remembr when they shall look them but they shall know that i am lord god 29 17 it came pass seven twentieth year first month first day month word lord came unto me say 29 18 son man nebuchadrezzar king babylon caus hi armi serv great servic against tyru everi head wa made bald everi shoulder wa peel yet had he no wage nor hi armi tyru servic that he had serv against it 29 19 therefor thu saith lord god behold i will give land egypt unto nebuchadrezzar king babylon he shall take her multitud take her spoil take her prey it shall be wage hi armi 29 20 i have given him land egypt hi labour wherewith he serv against it becaus they wrought me saith lord god 29 21 that day will i caus horn hous israel bud forth i will give thee open mouth midst them they shall know that i am lord 30 1 word lord came again unto me say 30 2 son man prophesi say thu saith lord god howl ye woe worth day 30 3 day is near even day lord is near cloudi day it shall be time heathen 30 4 sword shall come egypt great pain shall be ethiopia when slain shall fall egypt they shall take away her multitud her foundat shall be broken down 30 5 ethiopia libya lydia all mingl peopl chub men land that is leagu shall fall them sword 30 6 thu saith lord they also that uphold egypt shall fall pride her power shall come down tower syen shall they fall it sword saith lord god 30 7 they shall be desol midst countri that are desol her citi shall be midst citi that are wast 30 8 they shall know that i am lord when i have set fire egypt when all her helper shall be destroy 30 9 that day shall messeng go forth me ship make careless ethiopian afraid great pain shall come them as day egypt lo it cometh 30 10 thu saith lord god i will also make multitud egypt ceas hand nebuchadrezzar king babylon 30 11 he hi peopl him terribl nation shall be brought destroy land they shall draw their sword against egypt fill land slain 30 12 i will make river dri sell land hand wick i will make land wast all that is therein hand stranger i lord have spoken it 30 13 thu saith lord god i will also destroy idol i will caus their imag ceas noph there shall be no more princ land egypt i will put fear land egypt 30 14 i will make pathro desol will set fire zoan will execut judgment no 30 15 i will pour my furi sin strength egypt i will cut off multitud no 30 16 i will set fire egypt sin shall have great pain no shall be rent asund noph shall have distress daili 30 17 young men aven pibeseth shall fall sword these citi shall go captiv 30 18 tehaphneh also day shall be darken when i shall break there yoke egypt pomp her strength shall ceas her as her cloud shall cover her her daughter shall go captiv 30 19 thu will i execut judgment egypt they shall know that i am lord 30 20 it came pass eleventh year first month seventh day month that word lord came unto me say 30 21 son man i have broken arm pharaoh king egypt lo it shall not be bound be heal put roller bind it make it strong hold sword 30 22 therefor thu saith lord god behold i am against pharaoh king egypt will break hi arm strong that which wa broken i will caus sword fall hi hand 30 23 i will scatter egyptian nation will dispers them countri 30 24 i will strengthen arm king babylon put my sword hi hand but i will break pharaoh s arm he shall groan him groan deadli wound man 30 25 but i will strengthen arm king babylon arm pharaoh shall fall down they shall know that i am lord when i shall put my sword hand king babylon he shall stretch it land egypt 30 26 i will scatter egyptian nation dispers them countri they shall know that i am lord 31 1 it came pass eleventh year third month first day month that word lord came unto me say 31 2 son man speak unto pharaoh king egypt hi multitud whom art thou like thi great 31 3 behold assyrian wa cedar lebanon fair branch shadow shroud high statur hi top wa thick bough 31 4 water made him great deep set him high her river run round hi plant sent her littl river unto all tree field 31 5 therefor hi height wa exalt all tree field hi bough were multipli hi branch becam long becaus multitud water when he shot forth 31 6 all fowl heaven made their nest hi bough hi branch did all beast field bring forth their young hi shadow dwelt all great nation 31 7 thu wa he fair hi great length hi branch hi root wa great water 31 8 cedar garden god could not hide him fir tree were not like hi bough chestnut tree were not like hi branch nor ani tree garden god wa like unto him hi beauti 31 9 i have made him fair multitud hi branch so that all tree eden that were garden god envi him 31 10 therefor thu saith lord god becaus thou hast lift thyself height he hath shot hi top thick bough hi heart is lift hi height 31 11 i have therefor deliv him hand mighti one heathen he shall sure deal him i have driven him hi wicked 31 12 stranger terribl nation have cut him off have left him mountain all valley hi branch are fallen hi bough are broken all river land all peopl earth are gone down hi shadow have left him 31 13 hi ruin shall all fowl heaven remain all beast field shall be hi branch 31 14 end that none all tree water exalt themselv their height neither shoot their top thick bough neither their tree stand their height all that drink water they are all deliv unto death nether part earth midst children men them that go down pit 31 15 thu saith lord god day when he went down grave i caus mourn i cover deep him i restrain flood thereof great water were stay i caus lebanon mourn him all tree field faint him 31 16 i made nation shake sound hi fall when i cast him down hell them that descend pit all tree eden choic best lebanon all that drink water shall be comfort nether part earth 31 17 they also went down hell him unto them that be slain sword they that were hi arm that dwelt hi shadow midst heathen 31 18 whom art thou thu like glori great tree eden yet shalt thou be brought down tree eden unto nether part earth thou shalt lie midst uncircumcis them that be slain sword thi is pharaoh all hi multitud saith lord god 32 1 it came pass twelfth year twelfth month first day month that word lord came unto me say 32 2 son man take lament pharaoh king egypt say unto him thou art like young lion nation thou art as whale sea thou camest forth thi river troubledst water thi feet fouledst their river 32 3 thu saith lord god i will therefor spread my net thee compani mani peopl they shall bring thee my net 32 4 then will i leav thee land i will cast thee forth open field will caus all fowl heaven remain thee i will fill beast whole earth thee 32 5 i will lay thi flesh mountain fill valley thi height 32 6 i will also water thi blood land wherein thou swimmest even mountain river shall be full thee 32 7 when i shall put thee i will cover heaven make star thereof dark i will cover sun cloud moon shall not give her light 32 8 all bright light heaven will i make dark thee set dark thi land saith lord god 32 9 i will also vex heart mani peopl when i shall bring thi destruct nation countri which thou hast not known 32 10 yea i will make mani peopl amaz thee their king shall be horribl afraid thee when i shall brandish my sword them they shall trembl everi moment everi man hi own life day thi fall 32 11 thu saith lord god sword king babylon shall come thee 32 12 sword mighti will i caus thi multitud fall terribl nation all them they shall spoil pomp egypt all multitud thereof shall be destroy 32 13 i will destroy also all beast thereof besid great water neither shall foot man troubl them ani more nor hoof beast troubl them 32 14 then will i make their water deep caus their river run like oil saith lord god 32 15 when i shall make land egypt desol countri shall be destitut that whereof it wa full when i shall smite all them that dwell therein then shall they know that i am lord 32 16 thi is lament wherewith they shall lament her daughter nation shall lament her they shall lament her even egypt all her multitud saith lord god 32 17 it came pass also twelfth year fifteenth day month that word lord came unto me say 32 18 son man wail multitud egypt cast them down even her daughter famou nation unto nether part earth them that go down pit 32 19 whom dost thou pass beauti go down be thou laid uncircumcis 32 20 they shall fall midst them that are slain sword she is deliv sword draw her all her multitud 32 21 strong mighti shall speak him midst hell them that help him they are gone down they lie uncircumcis slain sword 32 22 asshur is there all her compani hi grave are him all them slain fallen sword 32 23 whose grave are set side pit her compani is round her grave all them slain fallen sword which caus terror land live 32 24 there is elam all her multitud round her grave all them slain fallen sword which are gone down uncircumcis nether part earth which caus their terror land live yet have they born their shame them that go down pit 32 25 they have set her bed midst slain all her multitud her grave are round him all them uncircumcis slain sword though their terror wa caus land live yet have they born their shame them that go down pit he is put midst them that be slain 32 26 there is meshech tubal all her multitud her grave are round him all them uncircumcis slain sword though they caus their terror land live 32 27 they shall not lie mighti that are fallen uncircumcis which are gone down hell their weapon war they have laid their sword their head but their iniqu shall be their bone though they were terror mighti land live 32 28 yea thou shalt be broken midst uncircumcis shalt lie them that are slain sword 32 29 there is edom her king all her princ which their might are laid them that were slain sword they shall lie uncircumcis them that go down pit 32 30 there be princ north all them all zidonian which are gone down slain their terror they are asham their might they lie uncircumcis them that be slain sword bear their shame them that go down pit 32 31 pharaoh shall see them shall be comfort all hi multitud even pharaoh all hi armi slain sword saith lord god 32 32 i have caus my terror land live he shall be laid midst uncircumcis them that are slain sword even pharaoh all hi multitud saith lord god 33 1 again word lord came unto me say 33 2 son man speak children thi peopl say unto them when i bring sword land if peopl land take man their coast set him their watchman 33 3 if when he seeth sword come land he blow trumpet warn peopl 33 4 then whosoev heareth sound trumpet taketh not warn if sword come take him away hi blood shall be hi own head 33 5 he heard sound trumpet took not warn hi blood shall be him but he that taketh warn shall deliv hi soul 33 6 but if watchman see sword come blow not trumpet peopl be not warn if sword come take ani person them he is taken away hi iniqu but hi blood will i requir watchman s hand 33 7 so thou o son man i have set thee watchman unto hous israel therefor thou shalt hear word my mouth warn them me 33 8 when i say unto wick o wick man thou shalt sure die if thou dost not speak warn wick hi way that wick man shall die hi iniqu but hi blood will i requir thine hand 33 9 nevertheless if thou warn wick hi way turn it if he do not turn hi way he shall die hi iniqu but thou hast deliv thi soul 33 10 therefor o thou son man speak unto hous israel thu ye speak say if our transgress our sin be us we pine away them how should we then live 33 11 say unto them as i live saith lord god i have no pleasur death wick but that wick turn hi way live turn ye turn ye your evil way whi will ye die o hous israel 33 12 therefor thou son man say unto children thi peopl righteous righteou shall not deliv him day hi transgress as wicked wick he shall not fall therebi day that he turneth hi wicked neither shall righteou be abl live hi righteous day that he sinneth 33 13 when i shall say righteou that he shall sure live if he trust hi own righteous commit iniqu all hi righteous shall not be rememb but hi iniqu that he hath commit he shall die it 33 14 again when i say unto wick thou shalt sure die if he turn hi sin do that which is law right 33 15 if wick restor pledg give again that he had rob walk statut life commit iniqu he shall sure live he shall not die 33 16 none hi sin that he hath commit shall be mention unto him he hath done that which is law right he shall sure live 33 17 yet children thi peopl say way lord is not equal but as them their way is not equal 33 18 when righteou turneth hi righteous committeth iniqu he shall even die therebi 33 19 but if wick turn hi wicked do that which is law right he shall live therebi 33 20 yet ye say way lord is not equal o ye hous israel i will judg you everi one hi way 33 21 it came pass twelfth year our captiv tenth month fifth day month that one that had escap jerusalem came unto me say citi is smitten 33 22 now hand lord wa me even afor he that wa escap came had open my mouth he came me morn my mouth wa open i wa no more dumb 33 23 then word lord came unto me say 33 24 son man they that inhabit those wast land israel speak say abraham wa one he inherit land but we are mani land is given us inherit 33 25 wherefor say unto them thu saith lord god ye eat blood lift your eye your idol shed blood shall ye possess land 33 26 ye stand your sword ye work abomin ye defil everi one hi neighbour wife shall ye possess land 33 27 say thou thu unto them thu saith lord god as i live sure they that are wast shall fall sword him that is open field will i give beast be devour they that be fort cave shall die pestil 33 28 i will lay land most desol pomp her strength shall ceas mountain israel shall be desol that none shall pass 33 29 then shall they know that i am lord when i have laid land most desol becaus all their abomin which they have commit 33 30 also thou son man children thi peopl still are talk against thee wall door hous speak one anoth everi one hi brother say come i pray you hear what is word that cometh forth lord 33 31 they come unto thee as peopl cometh they sit thee as my peopl they hear thi word but they will not do them their mouth they shew much love but their heart goeth their covet 33 32 lo thou art unto them as veri love song one that hath pleasant voic can play well instrument they hear thi word but they do them not 33 33 when thi cometh pass lo it will come then shall they know that prophet hath been them 34 1 word lord came unto me say 34 2 son man prophesi against shepherd israel prophesi say unto them thu saith lord god unto shepherd woe be shepherd israel that do feed themselv should not shepherd feed flock 34 3 ye eat fat ye cloth you wool ye kill them that are fed but ye feed not flock 34 4 diseas have ye not strengthen neither have ye heal that which wa sick neither have ye bound that which wa broken neither have ye brought again that which wa driven away neither have ye sought that which wa lost but forc cruelti have ye rule them 34 5 they were scatter becaus there is no shepherd they becam meat all beast field when they were scatter 34 6 my sheep wander all mountain everi high hill yea my flock wa scatter all face earth none did search or seek them 34 7 therefor ye shepherd hear word lord 34 8 as i live saith lord god sure becaus my flock becam prey my flock becam meat everi beast field becaus there wa no shepherd neither did my shepherd search my flock but shepherd fed themselv fed not my flock 34 9 therefor o ye shepherd hear word lord 34 10 thu saith lord god behold i am against shepherd i will requir my flock their hand caus them ceas feed flock neither shall shepherd feed themselv ani more i will deliv my flock their mouth that they may not be meat them 34 11 thu saith lord god behold i even i will both search my sheep seek them 34 12 as shepherd seeketh hi flock day that he is hi sheep that are scatter so will i seek my sheep will deliv them all place where they have been scatter cloudi dark day 34 13 i will bring them peopl gather them countri will bring them their own land feed them mountain israel river all inhabit place countri 34 14 i will feed them good pastur high mountain israel shall their fold be there shall they lie good fold fat pastur shall they feed mountain israel 34 15 i will feed my flock i will caus them lie down saith lord god 34 16 i will seek that which wa lost bring again that which wa driven away will bind that which wa broken will strengthen that which wa sick but i will destroy fat strong i will feed them judgment 34 17 as you o my flock thu saith lord god behold i judg cattl cattl ram he goat 34 18 seemeth it small thing unto you have eaten good pastur but ye must tread down your feet residu your pastur have drunk deep water but ye must foul residu your feet 34 19 as my flock they eat that which ye have trodden your feet they drink that which ye have foul your feet 34 20 therefor thu saith lord god unto them behold i even i will judg fat cattl lean cattl 34 21 becaus ye have thrust side shoulder push all diseas your horn till ye have scatter them abroad 34 22 therefor will i save my flock they shall no more be prey i will judg cattl cattl 34 23 i will set one shepherd them he shall feed them even my servant david he shall feed them he shall be their shepherd 34 24 i lord will be their god my servant david princ them i lord have spoken it 34 25 i will make them coven peac will caus evil beast ceas land they shall dwell safe wilder sleep wood 34 26 i will make them place round my hill bless i will caus shower come down hi season there shall be shower bless 34 27 tree field shall yield her fruit earth shall yield her increas they shall be safe their land shall know that i am lord when i have broken band their yoke deliv them hand those that serv themselv them 34 28 they shall no more be prey heathen neither shall beast land devour them but they shall dwell safe none shall make them afraid 34 29 i will rais them plant renown they shall be no more consum hunger land neither bear shame heathen ani more 34 30 thu shall they know that i lord their god am them that they even hous israel are my peopl saith lord god 34 31 ye my flock flock my pastur are men i am your god saith lord god 35 1 moreov word lord came unto me say 35 2 son man set thi face against mount seir prophesi against it 35 3 say unto it thu saith lord god behold o mount seir i am against thee i will stretch mine hand against thee i will make thee most desol 35 4 i will lay thi citi wast thou shalt be desol thou shalt know that i am lord 35 5 becaus thou hast had perpetu hatr hast shed blood children israel forc sword time their calam time that their iniqu had end 35 6 therefor as i live saith lord god i will prepar thee unto blood blood shall pursu thee sith thou hast not hate blood even blood shall pursu thee 35 7 thu will i make mount seir most desol cut off it him that passeth him that returneth 35 8 i will fill hi mountain hi slain men thi hill thi valley all thi river shall they fall that are slain sword 35 9 i will make thee perpetu desol thi citi shall not return ye shall know that i am lord 35 10 becaus thou hast said these two nation these two countri shall be mine we will possess it wherea lord wa there 35 11 therefor as i live saith lord god i will even do accord thine anger accord thine envi which thou hast use thi hatr against them i will make myself known them when i have judg thee 35 12 thou shalt know that i am lord that i have heard all mount seir all idumea even all it they shall know that i am lord 36 1 also thou son man prophesi unto mountain israel say ye mountain israel hear word lord 36 2 thu saith lord god becaus enemi hath said against you aha even ancient high place are our possess 36 3 therefor prophesi say thu saith lord god becaus they have made you desol swallow you everi side that ye might be possess unto residu heathen ye are taken lip talker are infami peopl 36 4 therefor ye mountain israel hear word lord god thu saith lord god mountain hill river valley desol wast citi that are forsaken which becam prey deris residu heathen that are round 36 5 therefor thu saith lord god sure fire my jealousi have i spoken against residu heathen against all idumea which have appoint my land their possess joy all their heart despit mind cast it prey 36 6 prophesi therefor concern land israel say unto mountain hill river valley thu saith lord god behold i have spoken my jealousi my furi becaus ye have born shame heathen 36 7 therefor thu saith lord god i have lift mine hand sure heathen that are you they shall bear their shame 36 8 but ye o mountain israel ye shall shoot forth your branch yield your fruit my peopl israel they are hand come 36 9 behold i am you i will turn unto you ye shall be till sown 36 10 i will multipli men you all hous israel even all it citi shall be inhabit wast shall be build 36 11 i will multipli you man beast they shall increas bring fruit i will settl you your old estat will do better unto you than your begin ye shall know that i am lord 36 12 yea i will caus men walk you even my peopl israel they shall possess thee thou shalt be their inherit thou shalt no more henceforth bereav them men 36 13 thu saith lord god becaus they say unto you thou land devourest men hast bereav thi nation 36 14 therefor thou shalt devour men no more neither bereav thi nation ani more saith lord god 36 15 neither will i caus men hear thee shame heathen ani more neither shalt thou bear reproach peopl ani more neither shalt thou caus thi nation fall ani more saith lord god 36 16 moreov word lord came unto me say 36 17 son man when hous israel dwelt their own land they defil it their own way their do their way wa me as unclean remov woman 36 18 wherefor i pour my furi them blood that they had shed land their idol wherewith they had pollut it 36 19 i scatter them heathen they were dispers countri accord their way accord their do i judg them 36 20 when they enter unto heathen whither they went they profan my holi name when they said them these are peopl lord are gone forth hi land 36 21 but i had piti mine holi name which hous israel had profan heathen whither they went 36 22 therefor say unto hous israel thu saith lord god i do not thi your sake o hous israel but mine holi name s sake which ye have profan heathen whither ye went 36 23 i will sanctifi my great name which wa profan heathen which ye have profan midst them heathen shall know that i am lord saith lord god when i shall be sanctifi you their eye 36 24 i will take you heathen gather you all countri will bring you your own land 36 25 then will i sprinkl clean water you ye shall be clean all your filthi all your idol will i cleans you 36 26 new heart also will i give you new spirit will i put you i will take away stoni heart your flesh i will give you heart flesh 36 27 i will put my spirit you caus you walk my statut ye shall keep my judgment do them 36 28 ye shall dwell land that i gave your father ye shall be my peopl i will be your god 36 29 i will also save you all your unclean i will call corn will increas it lay no famin you 36 30 i will multipli fruit tree increas field that ye shall receiv no more reproach famin heathen 36 31 then shall ye rememb your own evil way your do that were not good shall loth yourselv your own sight your iniqu your abomin 36 32 not your sake do i thi saith lord god be it known unto you be asham confound your own way o hous israel 36 33 thu saith lord god day that i shall have cleans you all your iniqu i will also caus you dwell citi wast shall be build 36 34 desol land shall be till wherea it lay desol sight all that pass 36 35 they shall say thi land that wa desol is becom like garden eden wast desol ruin citi are becom fenc are inhabit 36 36 then heathen that are left round you shall know that i lord build ruin place plant that that wa desol i lord have spoken it i will do it 36 37 thu saith lord god i will yet thi be enquir hous israel do it them i will increas them men like flock 36 38 as holi flock as flock jerusalem her solemn feast so shall wast citi be fill flock men they shall know that i am lord 37 1 hand lord wa me carri me spirit lord set me down midst valley which wa full bone 37 2 caus me pass them round behold there were veri mani open valley lo they were veri dri 37 3 he said unto me son man can these bone live i answer o lord god thou knowest 37 4 again he said unto me prophesi these bone say unto them o ye dri bone hear word lord 37 5 thu saith lord god unto these bone behold i will caus breath enter you ye shall live 37 6 i will lay sinew you will bring flesh you cover you skin put breath you ye shall live ye shall know that i am lord 37 7 so i prophesi as i wa command as i prophesi there wa nois behold shake bone came togeth bone hi bone 37 8 when i beheld lo sinew flesh came them skin cover them but there wa no breath them 37 9 then said he unto me prophesi unto wind prophesi son man say wind thu saith lord god come four wind o breath breath these slain that they may live 37 10 so i prophesi as he command me breath came them they live stood their feet exceed great armi 37 11 then he said unto me son man these bone are whole hous israel behold they say our bone are dri our hope is lost we are cut off our part 37 12 therefor prophesi say unto them thu saith lord god behold o my peopl i will open your grave caus you come your grave bring you land israel 37 13 ye shall know that i am lord when i have open your grave o my peopl brought you your grave 37 14 shall put my spirit you ye shall live i shall place you your own land then shall ye know that i lord have spoken it perform it saith lord 37 15 word lord came again unto me say 37 16 moreov thou son man take thee one stick write it judah children israel hi companion then take anoth stick write it joseph stick ephraim all hous israel hi companion 37 17 join them one anoth one stick they shall becom one thine hand 37 18 when children thi peopl shall speak unto thee say wilt thou not shew us what thou meanest these 37 19 say unto them thu saith lord god behold i will take stick joseph which is hand ephraim tribe israel hi fellow will put them him even stick judah make them one stick they shall be one mine hand 37 20 stick whereon thou writest shall be thine hand their eye 37 21 say unto them thu saith lord god behold i will take children israel heathen whither they be gone will gather them everi side bring them their own land 37 22 i will make them one nation land mountain israel one king shall be king them all they shall be no more two nation neither shall they be divid two kingdom ani more all 37 23 neither shall they defil themselv ani more their idol nor their detest thing nor ani their transgress but i will save them all their dwellingplac wherein they have sin will cleans them so shall they be my peopl i will be their god 37 24 david my servant shall be king them they all shall have one shepherd they shall also walk my judgment observ my statut do them 37 25 they shall dwell land that i have given unto jacob my servant wherein your father have dwelt they shall dwell therein even they their children their children s children ever my servant david shall be their princ ever 37 26 moreov i will make coven peac them it shall be everlast coven them i will place them multipli them will set my sanctuari midst them evermor 37 27 my tabernacl also shall be them yea i will be their god they shall be my peopl 37 28 heathen shall know that i lord do sanctifi israel when my sanctuari shall be midst them evermor 38 1 word lord came unto me say 38 2 son man set thi face against gog land magog chief princ meshech tubal prophesi against him 38 3 say thu saith lord god behold i am against thee o gog chief princ meshech tubal 38 4 i will turn thee back put hook thi jaw i will bring thee forth all thine armi hors horsemen all them cloth all sort armour even great compani buckler shield all them handl sword 38 5 persia ethiopia libya them all them shield helmet 38 6 gomer all hi band hous togarmah north quarter all hi band mani peopl thee 38 7 be thou prepar prepar thyself thou all thi compani that are assembl unto thee be thou guard unto them 38 8 mani day thou shalt be visit latter year thou shalt come land that is brought back sword is gather mani peopl against mountain israel which have been alway wast but it is brought forth nation they shall dwell safe all them 38 9 thou shalt ascend come like storm thou shalt be like cloud cover land thou all thi band mani peopl thee 38 10 thu saith lord god it shall also come pass that same time shall thing come thi mind thou shalt think evil thought 38 11 thou shalt say i will go land unwal villag i will go them that are rest that dwell safe all them dwell wall have neither bar nor gate 38 12 take spoil take prey turn thine hand desol place that are now inhabit peopl that are gather nation which have gotten cattl good that dwell midst land 38 13 sheba dedan merchant tarshish all young lion thereof shall say unto thee art thou come take spoil hast thou gather thi compani take prey carri away silver gold take away cattl good take great spoil 38 14 therefor son man prophesi say unto gog thu saith lord god that day when my peopl israel dwelleth safe shalt thou not know it 38 15 thou shalt come thi place north part thou mani peopl thee all them ride hors great compani mighti armi 38 16 thou shalt come against my peopl israel as cloud cover land it shall be latter day i will bring thee against my land that heathen may know me when i shall be sanctifi thee o gog their eye 38 17 thu saith lord god art thou he whom i have spoken old time my servant prophet israel which prophesi those day mani year that i would bring thee against them 38 18 it shall come pass same time when gog shall come against land israel saith lord god that my furi shall come my face 38 19 my jealousi fire my wrath have i spoken sure that day there shall be great shake land israel 38 20 so that fish sea fowl heaven beast field all creep thing that creep earth all men that are face earth shall shake my presenc mountain shall be thrown down steep place shall fall everi wall shall fall ground 38 21 i will call sword against him all my mountain saith lord god everi man s sword shall be against hi brother 38 22 i will plead against him pestil blood i will rain him hi band mani peopl that are him overflow rain great hailston fire cut down ani forest they shall burn weapon fire they shall spoil those that spoil them rob those that rob them saith lord god 39 11 it shall come pass that day that i will give unto gog place there he measur thousand it wa river that i could not pass water were risen water swim river that could not be pass 47 6 he said unto me son man hast thou seen thi then he brought me caus me return brink river 47 7 now when i had return behold bank river were veri mani tree one side other 47 8 then said he unto me these water issu east countri go down desert go sea which be brought forth sea water shall be heal 47 9 it shall come pass that everi thing that liveth which moveth whithersoev river shall come shall live there shall be veri great multitud fish becaus these water shall come thither they shall be heal everi thing shall live whither river cometh 47 10 it shall come pass that fisher shall stand it engedi even unto eneglaim they shall be place spread forth net their fish shall be accord their kind as fish great sea exceed mani 47 11 but miri place thereof marish thereof shall not be heal they shall be given salt 47 12 river bank thereof thi side that side shall grow all tree meat whose leaf shall not fade neither shall fruit thereof be consum it shall bring forth new fruit accord hi month becaus their water they issu sanctuari fruit thereof shall be meat leaf thereof medicin 47 13 thu saith lord god thi shall be border wherebi ye shall inherit land accord twelv tribe israel joseph shall have two portion 47 14 ye shall inherit it one as well as anoth concern which i lift mine hand give it unto your father thi land shall fall unto you inherit 47 15 thi shall be border land north side great sea way hethlon as men go zedad 47 16 hamath berothah sibraim which is border damascu border hamath hazarhatticon which is coast hauran 47 17 border sea shall be hazarenan border damascu north northward border hamath thi is north side 47 18 east side ye shall measur hauran damascu gilead land israel jordan border unto east sea thi is east side 47 19 south side southward tamar even water strife kadesh river great sea thi is south side southward 47 20 west side also shall be great sea border till man come against hamath thi is west side 47 21 so shall ye divid thi land unto you accord tribe israel 47 22 it shall come pass that ye shall divid it lot inherit unto you stranger that sojourn you which shall beget children you they shall be unto you as born countri children israel they shall have inherit you tribe israel 47 23 it shall come pass that what tribe stranger sojourneth there shall ye give him hi inherit saith lord god 48 1 now these are name tribe north end coast way hethlon as one goeth hamath hazarenan border damascu northward coast hamath these are hi side east west portion dan 48 2 border dan east side unto west side portion asher 48 3 border asher east side even unto west side portion naphtali 48 4 border naphtali east side unto west side portion manasseh 48 5 border manasseh east side unto west side portion ephraim 48 6 border ephraim east side even unto west side portion reuben 48 7 border reuben east side unto west side portion judah 48 8 border judah east side unto west side shall be offer which ye shall offer five twenti thousand reed breadth length as one other part east side unto west side sanctuari shall be midst it 48 9 oblat that ye shall offer unto lord shall be five twenti thousand length ten thousand breadth 48 10 them even priest shall be thi holi oblat north five twenti thousand length west ten thousand breadth east ten thousand breadth south five twenti thousand length sanctuari lord shall be midst thereof 48 11 it shall be priest that are sanctifi son zadok which have kept my charg which went not astray when children israel went astray as levit went astray 48 12 thi oblat land that is offer shall be unto them thing most holi border levit 48 13 against border priest levit shall have five twenti thousand length ten thousand breadth all length shall be five twenti thousand breadth ten thousand 48 14 they shall not sell it neither exchang nor alien firstfruit land it is holi unto lord 48 15 five thousand that are left breadth against five twenti thousand shall be profan place citi dwell suburb citi shall be midst thereof 48 16 these shall be measur thereof north side four thousand five hundr south side four thousand five hundr east side four thousand five hundr west side four thousand five hundr 48 17 suburb citi shall be north two hundr fifti south two hundr fifti east two hundr fifti west two hundr fifti 48 18 residu length against oblat holi portion shall be ten thousand eastward ten thousand westward it shall be against oblat holi portion increas thereof shall be food unto them that serv citi 48 19 they that serv citi shall serv it all tribe israel 48 20 all oblat shall be five twenti thousand five twenti thousand ye shall offer holi oblat foursquar possess citi 48 21 residu shall be princ one side other holi oblat possess citi against five twenti thousand oblat east border westward against five twenti thousand west border against portion princ it shall be holi oblat sanctuari hous shall be midst thereof 48 22 moreov possess levit possess citi be midst that which is princ s border judah border benjamin shall be princ 48 23 as rest tribe east side unto west side benjamin shall have portion 48 24 border benjamin east side unto west side simeon shall have portion 48 25 border simeon east side unto west side issachar portion 48 26 border issachar east side unto west side zebulun portion 48 27 border zebulun east side unto west side gad portion 48 28 border gad south side southward border shall be even tamar unto water strife kadesh river great sea 48 29 thi is land which ye shall divid lot unto tribe israel inherit these are their portion saith lord god 48 30 these are go citi north side four thousand five hundr measur 48 31 gate citi shall be name tribe israel three gate northward one gate reuben one gate judah one gate levi 48 32 east side four thousand five hundr three gate one gate joseph one gate benjamin one gate dan 48 33 south side four thousand five hundr measur three gate one gate simeon one gate issachar one gate zebulun 48 34 west side four thousand five hundr their three gate one gate gad one gate asher one gate naphtali 48 35 it wa round eighteen thousand measur name citi that day shall be lord is there book daniel 1 1 third year reign jehoiakim king judah came nebuchadnezzar king babylon unto jerusalem besieg it 1 2 lord gave jehoiakim king judah hi hand part vessel hous god which he carri land shinar hous hi god he brought vessel treasur hous hi god 1 3 king spake unto ashpenaz master hi eunuch that he should bring certain children israel king s seed princ 1 4 children whom wa no blemish but well favour skil all wisdom cun knowledg understand scienc such as had abil them stand king s palac whom they might teach learn tongu chaldean 1 5 king appoint them daili provis king s meat wine which he drank so nourish them three year that end thereof they might stand king 1 6 now these were children judah daniel hananiah mishael azariah 1 7 unto whom princ eunuch gave name he gave unto daniel name belteshazzar hananiah shadrach mishael meshach azariah abednego 1 8 but daniel purpos hi heart that he would not defil himself portion king s meat nor wine which he drank therefor he request princ eunuch that he might not defil himself 1 9 now god had brought daniel favour tender love princ eunuch 1 10 princ eunuch said unto daniel i fear my lord king who hath appoint your meat your drink whi should he see your face wors like than children which are your sort then shall ye make me endang my head king 1 11 then said daniel melzar whom princ eunuch had set daniel hananiah mishael azariah 1 12 prove thi servant i beseech thee ten day let them give us puls eat water drink 1 13 then let our counten be look thee counten children that eat portion king s meat as thou seest deal thi servant 1 14 so he consent them thi matter prove them ten day 1 15 end ten day their counten appear fairer fatter flesh than all children which did eat portion king s meat 1 16 thu melzar took away portion their meat wine that they should drink gave them puls 1 17 as these four children god gave them knowledg skill all learn wisdom daniel had understand all vision dream 1 18 now end day that king had said he should bring them then princ eunuch brought them nebuchadnezzar 1 19 king commun them them all wa found none like daniel hananiah mishael azariah therefor stood they king 1 20 all matter wisdom understand that king enquir them he found them ten time better than all magician astrolog that were all hi realm 1 21 daniel continu even unto first year king cyru 2 1 second year reign nebuchadnezzar nebuchadnezzar dream dream wherewith hi spirit wa troubl hi sleep brake him 2 2 then king command call magician astrolog sorcer chaldean shew king hi dream so they came stood king 2 3 king said unto them i have dream dream my spirit wa troubl know dream 2 4 then spake chaldean king syriack o king live ever tell thi servant dream we will shew interpret 2 5 king answer said chaldean thing is gone me if ye will not make known unto me dream interpret thereof ye shall be cut piec your hous shall be made dunghil 2 6 but if ye shew dream interpret thereof ye shall receiv me gift reward great honour therefor shew me dream interpret thereof 2 7 they answer again said let king tell hi servant dream we will shew interpret it 2 8 king answer said i know certainti that ye would gain time becaus ye see thing is gone me 2 9 but if ye will not make known unto me dream there is but one decre you ye have prepar lie corrupt word speak me till time be chang therefor tell me dream i shall know that ye can shew me interpret thereof 2 10 chaldean answer king said there is not man earth that can shew king s matter therefor there is no king lord nor ruler that ask such thing ani magician or astrolog or chaldean 2 11 it is rare thing that king requireth there is none other that can shew it king god whose dwell is not flesh 2 12 thi caus king wa angri veri furiou command destroy all wise men babylon 2 13 decre went forth that wise men should be slain they sought daniel hi fellow be slain 2 14 then daniel answer counsel wisdom arioch captain king s guard which wa gone forth slay wise men babylon 2 15 he answer said arioch king s captain whi is decre so hasti king then arioch made thing known daniel 2 16 then daniel went desir king that he would give him time that he would shew king interpret 2 17 then daniel went hi hous made thing known hananiah mishael azariah hi companion 2 18 that they would desir merci god heaven concern thi secret that daniel hi fellow should not perish rest wise men babylon 2 19 then wa secret reveal unto daniel night vision then daniel bless god heaven 2 20 daniel answer said bless be name god ever ever wisdom might are hi 2 21 he changeth time season he removeth king setteth king he giveth wisdom unto wise knowledg them that know understand 2 22 he revealeth deep secret thing he knoweth what is dark light dwelleth him 2 23 i thank thee prais thee o thou god my father who hast given me wisdom might hast made known unto me now what we desir thee thou hast now made known unto us king s matter 2 24 therefor daniel went unto arioch whom king had ordain destroy wise men babylon he went said thu unto him destroy not wise men babylon bring me king i will shew unto king interpret 2 25 then arioch brought daniel king hast said thu unto him i have found man captiv judah that will make known unto king interpret 2 26 king answer said daniel whose name wa belteshazzar art thou abl make known unto me dream which i have seen interpret thereof 2 27 daniel answer presenc king said secret which king hath demand cannot wise men astrolog magician soothsay shew unto king 2 28 but there is god heaven that revealeth secret maketh known king nebuchadnezzar what shall be latter day thi dream vision thi head thi bed are these 2 29 as thee o king thi thought came thi mind thi bed what should come pass hereaft he that revealeth secret maketh known thee what shall come pass 2 30 but as me thi secret is not reveal me ani wisdom that i have more than ani live but their sake that shall make known interpret king that thou mightest know thought thi heart 2 31 thou o king sawest behold great imag thi great imag whose bright wa excel stood thee form thereof wa terribl 2 32 thi imag s head wa fine gold hi breast hi arm silver hi belli hi thigh brass 2 33 hi leg iron hi feet part iron part clay 2 34 thou sawest till that stone wa cut hand which smote imag hi feet that were iron clay brake them piec 2 35 then wa iron clay brass silver gold broken piec togeth becam like chaff summer threshingfloor wind carri them away that no place wa found them stone that smote imag becam great mountain fill whole earth 2 36 thi is dream we will tell interpret thereof king 2 37 thou o king art king king god heaven hath given thee kingdom power strength glori 2 38 wheresoev children men dwell beast field fowl heaven hath he given thine hand hath made thee ruler them all thou art thi head gold 2 39 thee shall aris anoth kingdom inferior thee anoth third kingdom brass which shall bear rule all earth 2 40 fourth kingdom shall be strong as iron forasmuch as iron breaketh piec subdueth all thing as iron that breaketh all these shall it break piec bruis 2 41 wherea thou sawest feet toe part potter clay part iron kingdom shall be divid but there shall be it strength iron forasmuch as thou sawest iron mix miri clay 2 42 as toe feet were part iron part clay so kingdom shall be partli strong partli broken 2 43 wherea thou sawest iron mix miri clay they shall mingl themselv seed men but they shall not cleav one anoth even as iron is not mix clay 2 44 day these king shall god heaven set kingdom which shall never be destroy kingdom shall not be left other peopl but it shall break piec consum all these kingdom it shall stand ever 2 45 forasmuch as thou sawest that stone wa cut mountain hand that it brake piec iron brass clay silver gold great god hath made known king what shall come pass hereaft dream is certain interpret thereof sure 2 46 then king nebuchadnezzar fell hi face worship daniel command that they should offer oblat sweet odour unto him 2 47 king answer unto daniel said truth it is that your god is god god lord king reveal secret see thou couldest reveal thi secret 2 48 then king made daniel great man gave him mani great gift made him ruler whole provinc babylon chief governor all wise men babylon 2 49 then daniel request king he set shadrach meshach abednego affair provinc babylon but daniel sat gate king 3 1 nebuchadnezzar king made imag gold whose height wa threescor cubit breadth thereof six cubit he set it plain dura provinc babylon 3 2 then nebuchadnezzar king sent gather togeth princ governor captain judg treasur counsellor sheriff all ruler provinc come dedic imag which nebuchadnezzar king had set 3 3 then princ governor captain judg treasur counsellor sheriff all ruler provinc were gather togeth unto dedic imag that nebuchadnezzar king had set they stood imag that nebuchadnezzar had set 3 4 then herald cri aloud you it is command o peopl nation languag 3 5 that what time ye hear sound cornet flute harp sackbut psalteri dulcim all kind musick ye fall down worship golden imag that nebuchadnezzar king hath set 3 6 whoso falleth not down worshippeth shall same hour be cast midst burn fieri furnac 3 7 therefor that time when all peopl heard sound cornet flute harp sackbut psalteri all kind musick all peopl nation languag fell down worship golden imag that nebuchadnezzar king had set 3 8 wherefor that time certain chaldean came near accus jew 3 9 they spake said king nebuchadnezzar o king live ever 3 10 thou o king hast made decre that everi man that shall hear sound cornet flute harp sackbut psalteri dulcim all kind musick shall fall down worship golden imag 3 11 whoso falleth not down worshippeth that he should be cast midst burn fieri furnac 3 12 there are certain jew whom thou hast set affair provinc babylon shadrach meshach abednego these men o king have not regard thee they serv not thi god nor worship golden imag which thou hast set 3 13 then nebuchadnezzar hi rage furi command bring shadrach meshach abednego then they brought these men king 3 14 nebuchadnezzar spake said unto them is it true o shadrach meshach abednego do not ye serv my god nor worship golden imag which i have set 3 15 now if ye be readi that what time ye hear sound cornet flute harp sackbut psalteri dulcim all kind musick ye fall down worship imag which i have made well but if ye worship not ye shall be cast same hour midst burn fieri furnac who is that god that shall deliv you my hand 3 16 shadrach meshach abednego answer said king o nebuchadnezzar we are not care answer thee thi matter 3 17 if it be so our god whom we serv is abl deliv us burn fieri furnac he will deliv us thine hand o king 3 18 but if not be it known unto thee o king that we will not serv thi god nor worship golden imag which thou hast set 3 19 then wa nebuchadnezzar full furi form hi visag wa chang against shadrach meshach abednego therefor he spake command that they should heat furnac one seven time more than it wa wont be heat 3 20 he command most mighti men that were hi armi bind shadrach meshach abednego cast them burn fieri furnac 3 21 then these men were bound their coat their hosen their hat their other garment were cast midst burn fieri furnac 3 22 therefor becaus king s command wa urgent furnac exceed hot flame fire slew those men that took shadrach meshach abednego 3 23 these three men shadrach meshach abednego fell down bound midst burn fieri furnac 3 24 then nebuchadnezzar king wa astoni rose hast spake said unto hi counsellor did not we cast three men bound midst fire they answer said unto king true o king 3 25 he answer said lo i see four men loos walk midst fire they have no hurt form fourth is like son god 3 26 then nebuchadnezzar came near mouth burn fieri furnac spake said shadrach meshach abednego ye servant most high god come forth come hither then shadrach meshach abednego came forth midst fire 3 27 princ governor captain king s counsellor be gather togeth saw these men whose bodi fire had no power nor wa hair their head sing neither were their coat chang nor smell fire had pass them 3 28 then nebuchadnezzar spake said bless be god shadrach meshach abednego who hath sent hi angel deliv hi servant that trust him have chang king s word yield their bodi that they might not serv nor worship ani god their own god 3 29 therefor i make decre that everi peopl nation languag which speak ani thing amiss against god shadrach meshach abednego shall be cut piec their hous shall be made dunghil becaus there is no other god that can deliv thi sort 3 30 then king promot shadrach meshach abednego provinc babylon 4 1 nebuchadnezzar king unto all peopl nation languag that dwell all earth peac be multipli unto you 4 2 i thought it good shew sign wonder that high god hath wrought me 4 3 how great are hi sign how mighti are hi wonder hi kingdom is everlast kingdom hi dominion is gener gener 4 4 i nebuchadnezzar wa rest mine hous flourish my palac 4 5 i saw dream which made me afraid thought my bed vision my head troubl me 4 6 therefor made i decre bring all wise men babylon me that they might make known unto me interpret dream 4 7 then came magician astrolog chaldean soothsay i told dream them but they did not make known unto me interpret thereof 4 8 but last daniel came me whose name wa belteshazzar accord name my god whom is spirit holi god him i told dream say 4 9 o belteshazzar master magician becaus i know that spirit holi god is thee no secret troubleth thee tell me vision my dream that i have seen interpret thereof 4 10 thu were vision mine head my bed i saw behold tree midst earth height thereof wa great 4 11 tree grew wa strong height thereof reach unto heaven sight thereof end all earth 4 12 leav thereof were fair fruit thereof much it wa meat all beast field had shadow it fowl heaven dwelt bough thereof all flesh wa fed it 4 13 i saw vision my head my bed behold watcher holi one came down heaven 4 14 he cri aloud said thu hew down tree cut off hi branch shake off hi leav scatter hi fruit let beast get away it fowl hi branch 4 15 nevertheless leav stump hi root earth even band iron brass tender grass field let it be wet dew heaven let hi portion be beast grass earth 4 16 let hi heart be chang man s let beast s heart be given unto him let seven time pass him 4 17 thi matter is decre watcher demand word holi one intent that live may know that most high ruleth kingdom men giveth it whomsoev he will setteth it basest men 4 18 thi dream i king nebuchadnezzar have seen now thou o belteshazzar declar interpret thereof forasmuch as all wise men my kingdom are not abl make known unto me interpret but thou art abl spirit holi god is thee 4 19 then daniel whose name wa belteshazzar wa astoni one hour hi thought troubl him king spake said belteshazzar let not dream or interpret thereof troubl thee belteshazzar answer said my lord dream be them that hate thee interpret thereof thine enemi 4 20 tree that thou sawest which grew wa strong whose height reach unto heaven sight thereof all earth 4 21 whose leav were fair fruit thereof much it wa meat all which beast field dwelt whose branch fowl heaven had their habit 4 22 it is thou o king that art grown becom strong thi great is grown reacheth unto heaven thi dominion end earth 4 23 wherea king saw watcher holi one come down heaven say hew tree down destroy it yet leav stump root thereof earth even band iron brass tender grass field let it be wet dew heaven let hi portion be beast field till seven time pass him 4 24 thi is interpret o king thi is decre most high which is come my lord king 4 25 that they shall drive thee men thi dwell shall be beast field they shall make thee eat grass as oxen they shall wet thee dew heaven seven time shall pass thee till thou know that most high ruleth kingdom men giveth it whomsoev he will 4 26 wherea they command leav stump tree root thi kingdom shall be sure unto thee that thou shalt have known that heaven do rule 4 27 wherefor o king let my counsel be accept unto thee break off thi sin righteous thine iniqu shew merci poor if it may be lengthen thi tranquil 4 28 all thi came king nebuchadnezzar 4 29 end twelv month he walk palac kingdom babylon 4 30 king spake said is not thi great babylon that i have built hous kingdom might my power honour my majesti 4 31 while word wa king s mouth there fell voic heaven say o king nebuchadnezzar thee it is spoken kingdom is depart thee 4 32 they shall drive thee men thi dwell shall be beast field they shall make thee eat grass as oxen seven time shall pass thee thou know that most high ruleth kingdom men giveth it whomsoev he will 4 33 same hour wa thing fulfil nebuchadnezzar he wa driven men did eat grass as oxen hi bodi wa wet dew heaven till hi hair were grown like eagl feather hi nail like bird claw 4 34 end day i nebuchadnezzar lift mine eye unto heaven mine understand return unto me i bless most high i prais honour him that liveth ever whose dominion is everlast dominion hi kingdom is gener gener 4 35 all inhabit earth are reput as noth he doeth accord hi will armi heaven inhabit earth none can stay hi hand or say unto him what doest thou 4 36 same time my reason return unto me glori my kingdom mine honour bright return unto me my counsellor my lord sought unto me i wa establish my kingdom excel majesti wa ad unto me 4 37 now i nebuchadnezzar prais extol honour king heaven all whose work are truth hi way judgment those that walk pride he is abl abas 5 1 belshazzar king made great feast thousand hi lord drank wine thousand 5 2 belshazzar while he tast wine command bring golden silver vessel which hi father nebuchadnezzar had taken templ which wa jerusalem that king hi princ hi wive hi concubin might drink therein 5 3 then they brought golden vessel that were taken templ hous god which wa jerusalem king hi princ hi wive hi concubin drank them 5 4 they drank wine prais god gold silver brass iron wood stone 5 5 same hour came forth finger man s hand wrote against candlestick plaister wall king s palac king saw part hand that wrote 5 6 then king s counten wa chang hi thought troubl him so that joint hi loin were loos hi knee smote one against anoth 5 7 king cri aloud bring astrolog chaldean soothsay king spake said wise men babylon whosoev shall read thi write shew me interpret thereof shall be cloth scarlet have chain gold hi neck shall be third ruler kingdom 5 8 then came all king s wise men but they could not read write nor make known king interpret thereof 5 9 then wa king belshazzar greatli troubl hi counten wa chang him hi lord were astoni 5 10 now queen reason word king hi lord came banquet hous queen spake said o king live ever let not thi thought troubl thee nor let thi counten be chang 5 11 there is man thi kingdom whom is spirit holi god day thi father light understand wisdom like wisdom god wa found him whom king nebuchadnezzar thi father king i say thi father made master magician astrolog chaldean soothsay 5 12 forasmuch as excel spirit knowledg understand interpret dream shew hard sentenc dissolv doubt were found same daniel whom king name belteshazzar now let daniel be call he will shew interpret 5 13 then wa daniel brought king king spake said unto daniel art thou that daniel which art children captiv judah whom king my father brought jewri 5 14 i have even heard thee that spirit god is thee that light understand excel wisdom is found thee 5 15 now wise men astrolog have been brought me that they should read thi write make known unto me interpret thereof but they could not shew interpret thing 5 16 i have heard thee that thou canst make interpret dissolv doubt now if thou canst read write make known me interpret thereof thou shalt be cloth scarlet have chain gold thi neck shalt be third ruler kingdom 5 17 then daniel answer said king let thi gift be thyself give thi reward anoth yet i will read write unto king make known him interpret 5 18 o thou king most high god gave nebuchadnezzar thi father kingdom majesti glori honour 5 19 majesti that he gave him all peopl nation languag trembl fear him whom he would he slew whom he would he kept aliv whom he would he set whom he would he put down 5 20 but when hi heart wa lift hi mind harden pride he wa depos hi kingli throne they took hi glori him 5 21 he wa driven son men hi heart wa made like beast hi dwell wa wild ass they fed him grass like oxen hi bodi wa wet dew heaven till he knew that most high god rule kingdom men that he appointeth it whomsoev he will 5 22 thou hi son o belshazzar hast not humbl thine heart though thou knewest all thi 5 23 but hast lift thyself against lord heaven they have brought vessel hi hous thee thou thi lord thi wive thi concubin have drunk wine them thou hast prais god silver gold brass iron wood stone which see not nor hear nor know god whose hand thi breath is whose are all thi way hast thou not glorifi 5 24 then wa part hand sent him thi write wa written 5 25 thi is write that wa written mene mene tekel upharsin 5 26 thi is interpret thing mene god hath number thi kingdom finish it 5 27 tekel thou art weigh balanc art found want 5 28 pere thi kingdom is divid given mede persian 5 29 then command belshazzar they cloth daniel scarlet put chain gold hi neck made proclam concern him that he should be third ruler kingdom 5 30 that night wa belshazzar king chaldean slain 5 31 dariu median took kingdom be threescor two year old 6 1 it pleas dariu set kingdom hundr twenti princ which should be whole kingdom 6 2 these three presid whom daniel wa first that princ might give account unto them king should have no damag 6 3 then thi daniel wa prefer presid princ becaus excel spirit wa him king thought set him whole realm 6 4 then presid princ sought find occas against daniel concern kingdom but they could find none occas nor fault forasmuch as he wa faith neither wa there ani error or fault found him 6 5 then said these men we shall not find ani occas against thi daniel we find it against him concern law hi god 6 6 then these presid princ assembl togeth king said thu unto him king dariu live ever 6 7 all presid kingdom governor princ counsellor captain have consult togeth establish royal statut make firm decre that whosoev shall ask petit ani god or man thirti day save thee o king he shall be cast den lion 6 8 now o king establish decre sign write that it be not chang accord law mede persian which altereth not 6 9 wherefor king dariu sign write decre 6 10 now when daniel knew that write wa sign he went hi hous hi window be open hi chamber jerusalem he kneel hi knee three time day pray gave thank hi god as he did aforetim 6 11 then these men assembl found daniel pray make supplic hi god 6 12 then they came near spake king concern king s decre hast thou not sign decre that everi man that shall ask petit ani god or man thirti day save thee o king shall be cast den lion king answer said thing is true accord law mede persian which altereth not 6 13 then answer they said king that daniel which is children captiv judah regardeth not thee o king nor decre that thou hast sign but maketh hi petit three time day 6 14 then king when he heard these word wa sore displeas himself set hi heart daniel deliv him he labour till go down sun deliv him 6 15 then these men assembl unto king said unto king know o king that law mede persian is that no decre nor statut which king establisheth may be chang 6 16 then king command they brought daniel cast him den lion now king spake said unto daniel thi god whom thou servest continu he will deliv thee 6 17 stone wa brought laid mouth den king seal it hi own signet signet hi lord that purpos might not be chang concern daniel 6 18 then king went hi palac pass night fast neither were instrument musick brought him hi sleep went him 6 19 then king aros veri earli morn went hast unto den lion 6 20 when he came den he cri lament voic unto daniel king spake said daniel o daniel servant live god is thi god whom thou servest continu abl deliv thee lion 6 21 then said daniel unto king o king live ever 6 22 my god hath sent hi angel hath shut lion mouth that they have not hurt me forasmuch as him innoc wa found me also thee o king have i done no hurt 6 23 then wa king exceedingli glad him command that they should take daniel den so daniel wa taken den no manner hurt wa found him becaus he believ hi god 6 24 king command they brought those men which had accus daniel they cast them den lion them their children their wive lion had masteri them brake all their bone piec or ever they came bottom den 6 25 then king dariu wrote unto all peopl nation languag that dwell all earth peac be multipli unto you 6 26 i make decre that everi dominion my kingdom men trembl fear god daniel he is live god stedfast ever hi kingdom that which shall not be destroy hi dominion shall be even unto end 6 27 he delivereth rescueth he worketh sign wonder heaven earth who hath deliv daniel power lion 6 28 so thi daniel prosper reign dariu reign cyru persian 7 1 first year belshazzar king babylon daniel had dream vision hi head hi bed then he wrote dream told sum matter 7 2 daniel spake said i saw my vision night behold four wind heaven strove great sea 7 3 four great beast came sea divers one anoth 7 4 first wa like lion had eagl s wing i beheld till wing thereof were pluck it wa lift earth made stand feet as man man s heart wa given it 7 5 behold anoth beast second like bear it rais itself one side it had three rib mouth it teeth it they said thu unto it aris devour much flesh 7 6 thi i beheld lo anoth like leopard which had back it four wing fowl beast had also four head dominion wa given it 7 7 thi i saw night vision behold fourth beast dread terribl strong exceedingli it had great iron teeth it devour brake piec stamp residu feet it it wa divers all beast that were it it had ten horn 7 8 i consid horn behold there came them anoth littl horn whom there were three first horn pluck root behold thi horn were eye like eye man mouth speak great thing 7 9 i beheld till throne were cast down ancient day did sit whose garment wa white as snow hair hi head like pure wool hi throne wa like fieri flame hi wheel as burn fire 7 10 fieri stream issu came forth him thousand thousand minist unto him ten thousand time ten thousand stood him judgment wa set book were open 7 11 i beheld then becaus voic great word which horn spake i beheld even till beast wa slain hi bodi destroy given burn flame 7 12 as concern rest beast they had their dominion taken away yet their live were prolong season time 7 13 i saw night vision behold one like son man came cloud heaven came ancient day they brought him near him 7 14 there wa given him dominion glori kingdom that all peopl nation languag should serv him hi dominion is everlast dominion which shall not pass away hi kingdom that which shall not be destroy 7 15 i daniel wa griev my spirit midst my bodi vision my head troubl me 7 16 i came near unto one them that stood ask him truth all thi so he told me made me know interpret thing 7 17 these great beast which are four are four king which shall aris earth 7 18 but saint most high shall take kingdom possess kingdom ever even ever ever 7 19 then i would know truth fourth beast which wa divers all other exceed dread whose teeth were iron hi nail brass which devour brake piec stamp residu hi feet 7 20 ten horn that were hi head other which came whom three fell even that horn that had eye mouth that spake veri great thing whose look wa more stout than hi fellow 7 21 i beheld same horn made war saint prevail against them 7 22 ancient day came judgment wa given saint most high time came that saint possess kingdom 7 23 thu he said fourth beast shall be fourth kingdom earth which shall be divers all kingdom shall devour whole earth shall tread it down break it piec 7 24 ten horn thi kingdom are ten king that shall aris anoth shall rise them he shall be divers first he shall subdu three king 7 25 he shall speak great word against most high shall wear saint most high think chang time law they shall be given hi hand time time divid time 7 26 but judgment shall sit they shall take away hi dominion consum destroy it unto end 7 27 kingdom dominion great kingdom whole heaven shall be given peopl saint most high whose kingdom is everlast kingdom all dominion shall serv obey him 7 28 hitherto is end matter as me daniel my cogit much troubl me my counten chang me but i kept matter my heart 8 1 third year reign king belshazzar vision appear unto me even unto me daniel that which appear unto me first 8 2 i saw vision it came pass when i saw that i wa shushan palac which is provinc elam i saw vision i wa river ulai 8 3 then i lift mine eye saw behold there stood river ram which had two horn two horn were high but one wa higher than other higher came last 8 4 i saw ram push westward northward southward so that no beast might stand him neither wa there ani that could deliv hi hand but he did accord hi will becam great 8 5 as i wa consid behold he goat came west face whole earth touch not ground goat had notabl horn hi eye 8 6 he came ram that had two horn which i had seen stand river ran unto him furi hi power 8 7 i saw him come close unto ram he wa move choler against him smote ram brake hi two horn there wa no power ram stand him but he cast him down ground stamp him there wa none that could deliv ram hi hand 8 8 therefor he goat wax veri great when he wa strong great horn wa broken it came four notabl one four wind heaven 8 9 one them came forth littl horn which wax exceed great south east pleasant land 8 10 it wax great even host heaven it cast down some host star ground stamp them 8 11 yea he magnifi himself even princ host him said gabriel make thi man understand vision 8 17 so he came near where i stood when he came i wa afraid fell my face but he said unto me understand o son man time end shall be vision 8 18 now as he wa speak me i wa deep sleep my face ground but he touch me set me upright 8 19 he said behold i will make thee know what shall be last end indign time appoint end shall be 8 20 ram which thou sawest have door that post may shake cut them head all them i will slay last them sword he that fleeth them shall not flee away he that escapeth them shall not be deliv 9 2 though they dig hell thenc shall mine
