obadiah 1 1 vision obadiah thu saith lord god concern edom we have heard rumour lord ambassador is sent heathen aris ye let us rise against her battl 1 2 behold i have made thee small heathen thou art greatli despis 1 3 pride thine heart hath deceiv thee thou that dwellest cleft rock whose habit is high that saith hi heart who shall bring me down ground 1 4 though thou exalt thyself as eagl though thou set thi nest star thenc will i bring thee down saith lord 1 5 if thiev came thee if robber night how art thou cut off would they not have stolen till they had enough if grapegather came thee would they not leav some grape 1 6 how are thing esau search how are hi hidden thing sought 1 7 all men thi confederaci have brought thee even border men that were peac thee have deceiv thee prevail against thee that they eat thi bread have laid wound thee there is none understand him 1 8 shall i not that day saith lord even destroy wise men edom understand mount esau 1 9 thi mighti men o teman shall be dismay end that everi one mount esau may be cut off slaughter 1 10 thi violenc against thi brother jacob shame shall cover thee thou shalt be cut off ever 1 11 day that thou stoodest other side day that stranger carri away captiv hi forc foreign enter hi gate cast lot jerusalem even thou wast as one them 1 12 but thou shouldest not have look day thi brother day that he becam stranger neither shouldest thou have rejoic children judah day their destruct neither shouldest thou have spoken proudli day distress 1 13 thou shouldest not have enter gate my peopl day their calam yea thou shouldest not have look their afflict day their calam nor have laid hand their substanc day their calam 1 14 neither shouldest thou have stood crossway cut off those hi that did escap neither shouldest thou have deliv those hi that did remain day distress 1 15 day lord is near all heathen as thou hast done it shall be done unto thee thi reward shall return thine own head 1 16 as ye have drunk my holi mountain so shall all heathen drink continu yea they shall drink they shall swallow down they shall be as though they had not been 1 17 but mount zion shall be deliver there shall be holi hous jacob shall possess their possess 1 18 hous jacob shall be fire hous joseph flame hous esau stubbl they shall kindl them devour them there shall not be ani remain hous esau lord hath spoken it 1 19 they south shall possess mount esau they plain philistin they shall possess field ephraim field samaria benjamin shall possess gilead 1 20 captiv thi host children israel shall possess that canaanit even unto zarephath captiv jerusalem which is sepharad shall possess citi south 1 21 saviour shall come mount zion judg mount esau kingdom shall be lord s jonah 1 1 now word lord came unto jonah son amittai say 1 2 aris go nineveh that great citi cri against it their wicked is come me 1 3 but jonah rose flee unto tarshish presenc lord went down joppa he found ship go tarshish so he paid fare thereof went down it go them unto tarshish presenc lord 1 4 but lord sent great wind sea there wa mighti tempest sea so that ship wa like be broken 1 5 then marin were afraid cri everi man unto hi god cast forth ware that were ship sea lighten it them but jonah wa gone down side ship he lay wa fast asleep 1 6 so shipmast came him said unto him what meanest thou o sleeper aris call thi god if so be that god will think us that we perish not 1 7 they said everi one hi fellow come let us cast lot that we may know whose caus thi evil is us so they cast lot lot fell jonah 1 8 then said they unto him tell us we pray thee whose caus thi evil is us what is thine occup whenc comest thou what is thi countri what peopl art thou 1 9 he said unto them i am hebrew i fear lord god heaven which hath made sea dri land 1 10 then were men exceedingli afraid said unto him whi hast thou done thi men knew that he fled presenc lord becaus he had told them 1 11 then said they unto him what shall we do unto thee that sea may be calm unto us sea wrought wa tempestu 1 12 he said unto them take me cast me forth sea so shall sea be calm unto you i know that my sake thi great tempest is you 1 13 nevertheless men row hard bring it land but they could not sea wrought wa tempestu against them 1 14 wherefor they cri unto lord said we beseech thee o lord we beseech thee let us not perish thi man s life lay not us innoc blood thou o lord hast done as it pleas thee 1 15 so they look jonah cast him forth sea sea ceas her rage 1 16 then men fear lord exceedingli offer sacrific unto lord made vow 1 17 now lord had prepar great fish swallow jonah jonah wa belli fish three day three night 2 1 then jonah pray unto lord hi god fish s belli 2 2 said i cri reason mine afflict unto lord he heard me came pass when sun did aris that god prepar vehement east wind sun beat head jonah that he faint wish himself die said it is better me die than live 4 9 god said jonah doest thou well be angri gourd he said i do well be angri even unto death 4 10 then said lord thou hast had piti gourd which thou hast not labour neither madest it grow which came night perish night 4 11 should not i spare nineveh heart i am there is none besid me how is she becom desol place beast lie down everi one that passeth her shall hiss wag hi hand 3 1 woe her that is filthi pollut oppress citi 3 2 she obey not voic she receiv not correct she trust not lord she drew not near her god 3 3 her princ her are roar lion her judg are even wolv they gnaw not bone till morrow 3 4 her prophet are light treacher person her priest have pollut sanctuari they have done violenc law 3 5 just lord is midst thereof he will not do iniqu everi morn doth he bring hi judgment light he faileth not but unjust knoweth no shame 3 6 i have cut off nation their tower are desol i made their street wast that none passeth their citi are destroy so that there is no man that there is none inhabit 3 7 i said sure thou wilt fear me thou wilt receiv instruct so their dwell should not be cut off howsoev i punish them but they rose earli corrupt all their do 3 8 therefor wait ye me saith lord day that i rise prey my determin is gather nation that i may assembl kingdom pour them mine indign even all my fierc anger all earth shall be devour fire my jealousi 3 9 then will i turn peopl pure languag that they may all call name lord serv him one consent 3 10 river ethiopia my suppliant even daughter my dispers shall bring mine offer 3 11 that day shalt thou not be asham all thi do wherein thou hast transgress against me then i will take away midst thee them that rejoic thi pride thou shalt no more be haughti becaus my holi mountain 3 12 i will also leav midst thee afflict poor peopl they shall trust name lord 3 13 remnant israel shall not do iniqu nor speak lie neither shall deceit tongu be found their mouth they shall feed lie down none shall make them afraid 3 14 sing o daughter zion shout o israel be glad rejoic all heart o daughter jerusalem 3 15 lord hath taken away thi judgment he hath cast thine enemi king israel even lord is midst thee thou shalt not see evil ani more 3 16 that day it shall be said jerusalem fear thou not zion let not thine hand be slack 3 17 lord thi god midst thee is mighti he will save he will rejoic thee joy he will rest hi love he will joy thee sing 3 18 i will gather them that are sorrow solemn assembl who are thee whom reproach it wa burden 3 19 behold that time i will undo all that afflict thee i will save her that halteth gather her that wa driven i will get them prais fame everi land where they have been put shame 3 20 that time will i bring you again even time that i gather you i will make you name prais all peopl earth when i turn back your captiv your eye saith lord haggai 1 1 second year dariu king sixth month first day month came word lord haggai prophet unto zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah joshua son josedech high priest say 1 2 thu speaketh lord host say thi peopl say time is not come time that lord s hous should be built 1 3 then came word lord haggai prophet say 1 4 is it time you o ye dwell your ciel hous thi hous lie wast 1 5 now therefor thu saith lord host consid your way 1 6 ye have sown much bring littl ye eat but ye have not enough ye drink but ye are not fill drink ye cloth you but there is none warm he that earneth wage earneth wage put it bag hole 1 7 thu saith lord host consid your way 1 8 go mountain bring wood build hous i will take pleasur it i will be glorifi saith lord 1 9 ye look much lo it came littl when ye brought it home i did blow it whi saith lord host becaus mine hous that is wast ye run everi man unto hi own hous 1 10 therefor heaven you is stay dew earth is stay her fruit 1 11 i call drought land mountain corn new wine oil that which ground bringeth forth men cattl all labour hand 1 12 then zerubbabel son shealtiel joshua son josedech high priest all remnant peopl obey voic lord their god word haggai prophet as lord their god had sent him peopl did fear lord 1 13 then spake haggai lord s messeng lord s messag unto peopl say i am you saith lord 1 14 lord stir spirit zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah spirit joshua son josedech high priest spirit all remnant peopl they came did work hous lord host their god 1 15 four twentieth day sixth month second year dariu king 2 1 seventh month one twentieth day month came word lord prophet haggai say 2 2 speak now zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah joshua son josedech high priest residu peopl say 2 3 who is left you that saw thi hous her first glori how do ye see it now is it not your eye comparison it as noth 2 4 yet now be strong o zerubbabel saith lord be strong o joshua son josedech high priest be strong all ye peopl land saith lord work i am you saith lord host 2 5 accord word that i coven you when ye came egypt so my spirit remaineth you fear ye not 2 6 thu saith lord host yet onc it is littl while i will shake heaven earth sea dri land 2 7 i will shake all nation desir all nation shall come i will fill thi hous glori saith lord host 2 8 silver is mine gold is mine saith lord host 2 9 glori thi latter hous shall be greater than former saith lord host thi place will i give peac saith lord host 2 10 four twentieth day ninth month second year dariu came word lord haggai prophet say 2 11 thu saith lord host ask now priest concern law say 2 12 if one bear holi flesh skirt hi garment hi skirt do touch bread or pottag or wine or oil or ani meat shall it be holi priest answer said no 2 13 then said haggai if one that is unclean dead bodi touch ani these shall it be unclean priest answer said it shall be unclean 2 14 then answer haggai said so is thi peopl so is thi nation me saith lord so is everi work their hand that which they offer there is unclean 2 15 now i pray you consid thi day upward stone wa laid stone templ lord 2 16 those day were when one came heap twenti measur there were but ten when one came pressfat draw fifti vessel press there were but twenti 2 17 i smote you blast mildew hail all labour your hand yet ye turn not me saith lord 2 18 consid now thi day upward four twentieth day ninth month even day that foundat lord s templ wa laid consid it 2 19 is seed yet barn yea as yet vine fig tree pomegran oliv tree hath not brought forth thi day will i bless you 2 20 again word lord came unto haggai four twentieth day month say 2 21 speak zerubbabel governor judah say i will shake heaven earth 2 22 i will overthrow throne kingdom i will destroy strength kingdom heathen i will overthrow chariot those that ride them hors their rider shall come down everi one sword hi brother 2 23 that day saith lord host will i take thee o zerubbabel my servant son shealtiel saith lord will make thee as signet i have chosen thee saith lord host zechariah 1 1 eighth month second year dariu came word lord unto zechariah son berechiah son iddo prophet say 1 2 lord hath been sore displeas your father 1 3 therefor say thou unto them thu saith lord host turn ye unto me saith lord host i will turn unto you saith lord host 1 4 be ye not as your father unto whom former prophet have cri say thu saith lord host turn ye now your evil way your evil do but they did not hear nor hearken unto me saith lord 1 5 your father where are they prophet do they live ever 1 6 but my word my statut which i command my servant prophet did they not take hold your father they return said like as lord host thought do unto us accord our way accord our do so hath he dealt us 1 7 four twentieth day eleventh month which is month sebat second year dariu came word lord unto zechariah son berechiah son iddo prophet say 1 8 i saw night behold man ride red hors he stood myrtl tree that were bottom behind him were there red hors speckl white 1 9 then said i o my lord what are these angel that talk me said unto me i will shew thee what these be 1 10 man that stood myrtl tree answer said these are they whom lord hath sent walk fro earth 1 11 they answer angel lord that stood myrtl tree said we have walk fro earth behold all earth sitteth still is rest 1 12 then angel lord answer said o lord host how long wilt thou not have merci jerusalem citi judah against which thou hast had indign these threescor ten year 1 13 lord answer angel that talk me good word comfort word 1 14 so angel that commun me said unto me cri thou say thu saith lord host i am jealou jerusalem zion great jealousi 1 15 i am veri sore displeas heathen that are eas i wa but littl displeas they help forward afflict 1 16 therefor thu saith lord i am return jerusalem merci my hous shall be built it saith lord host line shall be stretch forth jerusalem 1 17 cri yet say thu saith lord host my citi prosper shall yet be spread abroad lord shall yet comfort zion shall yet choos jerusalem 1 18 then lift i mine eye saw behold four horn 1 19 i said unto angel that talk me what be these he answer me these are horn which have scatter judah israel jerusalem 1 20 lord shew me four carpent 1 21 then said i what come these do he spake say these are horn which have scatter judah so that no man did lift hi head but these are come fray them cast horn gentil which lift their horn land judah scatter it 2 1 i lift mine eye again look behold man measur line hi hand 2 2 then said i whither goest thou he said unto me measur jerusalem see what is breadth thereof what is length thereof 2 3 behold angel that talk me went forth anoth angel went meet him 2 4 said unto him run speak thi young man say jerusalem shall be inhabit as town wall multitud men cattl therein 2 5 i saith lord will be unto her wall fire round will be glori midst her 2 6 ho ho come forth flee land north saith lord i have spread you abroad as four wind heaven saith lord 2 7 deliv thyself o zion that dwellest daughter babylon 2 8 thu saith lord host glori hath he sent me unto nation which spoil you he that toucheth you toucheth appl hi eye 2 9 behold i will shake hath chosen jerusalem rebuk thee is not thi brand pluck fire 3 3 now joshua wa cloth filthi garment stood angel 3 4 he answer spake unto those that stood him say take away filthi garment him unto him he said behold i have caus thine iniqu pass thee i will cloth thee chang raiment 3 5 i said let them set fair mitr hi head so they set fair mitr hi head cloth him garment angel lord stood 3 6 angel empti golden oil themselv 4 13 he answer me said knowest thou not what these be i said no my lord 4 14 then said he these are two anoint one that stand lord whole earth 5 1 then i turn lift mine eye look behold fli roll 5 2 he said unto me what seest thou i answer i see fli roll length thereof is twenti cubit breadth thereof ten cubit 5 3 then said he unto me thi is curs that goeth forth face whole earth everi one that stealeth shall be cut off as thi side accord it everi one that sweareth shall be cut off as that side accord it 5 4 i will bring it forth saith lord host it shall enter hous fear ye not 8 16 these are thing that ye shall do speak ye everi man truth hi neighbour execut judgment truth peac your gate 8 17 let none you imagin evil your heart against hi neighbour love no fals name i will hear them i will say it is my peopl they shall say lord is my god 14 1 behold day lord cometh thi spoil shall be divid midst thee 14 2 i will gather all nation against jerusalem battl citi day that light shall not be clear nor dark 14 7 but it shall be one day which shall be known lord not day nor night but it shall come pass that even time it shall be light 14 8 it shall be that day that live water shall go jerusalem half them former sea half them hinder sea summer winter shall it be 14 9 lord shall be king all earth that day shall there be one lord hi name one 14 10 all land shall be turn as plain geba rimmon south jerusalem it shall be lift inhabit her place benjamin s gate unto place first gate unto corner gate tower hananeel unto king s winepress 14 11 men shall dwell away while they stand their feet their eye shall consum away their hole their tongu shall consum away their mouth 14 13 it shall come pass that day that great tumult lord shall be them they shall lay hold everi one hand hi neighbour hi hand shall rise against hand hi neighbour 14 14 judah also shall fight jerusalem wealth all heathen round shall be gather togeth gold silver apparel great abund 14 15 so shall be plagu hors mule camel ass all beast that shall be these tent as thi plagu 14 16 it shall come pass that everi one that is left all nation which came against jerusalem shall even go year come take them seeth therein that day there shall be no more canaanit hous lord host malachi 1 1 burden word lord israel malachi 1 2 i have love you saith lord yet ye say wherein hast thou love us wa not esau jacob s brother saith lord yet i love jacob 1 3 i hate esau laid hi mountain hi heritag wast dragon wilder 1 4 wherea edom saith we are impoverish but we will return build desol place thu saith lord host they shall build but i will throw down they shall call them border wicked peopl against whom lord hath indign ever 1 5 your eye shall see ye shall say lord will be magnifi border israel 1 6 son honoureth hi father servant hi master if then i be father where is mine honour if i be master where is my fear saith lord host unto you o priest that despis my name ye say wherein have we despis thi name 1 7 ye offer pollut bread mine altar ye say wherein have we pollut thee that ye say tabl lord is contempt 1 8 if ye offer blind sacrific is it not evil if ye offer lame sick is it not evil offer it now unto thi governor will he be pleas thee or accept thi person saith lord host 1 9 now i pray you beseech god that he will be graciou unto us thi hath been your mean will he regard your person saith lord host 1 10 who is there even you that would shut door nought neither do ye kindl fire mine altar nought i have no pleasur you saith lord host neither will i accept offer your hand 1 11 rise sun even unto go down same my name shall be great gentil everi place incens shall be offer unto my name pure offer my name shall be great heathen saith lord host 1 12 but ye have profan it that ye say tabl lord is pollut fruit thereof even hi meat is contempt 1 13 ye said also behold what weari is it ye have snuf it saith lord host ye brought that which wa torn lame sick thu ye brought offer should i accept thi your hand saith lord 1 14 but curs be deceiv which hath hi flock male voweth sacrificeth unto lord corrupt thing i am great king saith lord host my name is dread heathen 2 1 now o ye priest thi command is you 2 2 if ye will not hear if ye will not lay it heart give glori unto my name saith lord host i will even send curs you i will curs your bless yea i have curs them alreadi becaus ye do not lay it heart 2 3 behold i will corrupt your seed spread dung your face even dung your solemn feast one shall take you away it 2 4 ye shall know that i have sent thi command unto you that my coven might be levi saith lord host 2 5 my coven wa him life peac i gave them him fear wherewith he fear me wa afraid my name 2 6 law truth wa hi mouth iniqu wa not found hi lip he walk me peac equiti did turn mani away iniqu 2 7 priest s lip should keep knowledg they should seek law hi mouth he is messeng lord host 2 8 but ye are depart way ye have caus mani stumbl law ye have corrupt coven levi saith lord host 2 9 therefor have i also made you contempt base all peopl accord as ye have not kept my way but have been partial law 2 10 have we not all one father hath not one god creat us whi do we deal treacher everi man against hi brother profan coven our father 2 11 judah hath dealt treacher abomin is commit israel jerusalem judah hath profan holi lord which he love hath marri daughter strang god 2 12 lord will cut off man that doeth thi master scholar tabernacl jacob him that offereth offer unto lord host 2 13 thi have ye done again cover altar lord tear weep cri insomuch that he regardeth not offer ani more or receiveth it good will your hand 2 14 yet ye say wherefor becaus lord hath been wit thee wife thi youth against whom thou hast dealt treacher yet is she thi companion wife thi coven 2 15 did not he make one yet had he residu spirit wherefor one that he might seek godli seed therefor take heed your spirit let none deal treacher against wife hi youth 2 16 lord god israel saith that he hateth put away one covereth violenc hi garment saith lord host therefor take heed your spirit that ye deal not treacher 2 17 ye have weari lord your word yet ye say wherein have we weari him when ye say everi one that doeth evil is good sight lord he delighteth them or where is god judgment 3 1 behold i will send my messeng he shall prepar way me lord whom ye seek shall suddenli come hi templ even messeng coven whom ye delight behold he shall come saith lord host 3 2 but who may abid day hi come who shall stand when he appeareth he is like refin s fire like fuller soap 3 3 he shall sit as refin purifi silver he shall purifi son levi purg them as gold silver that they may offer unto lord offer righteous 3 4 then shall offer judah jerusalem be pleasant unto lord as day old as former year 3 5 i will come near you judgment i will be swift wit against sorcer against adulter against fals swearer against those that oppress hirel hi wage widow fatherless that turn asid stranger hi right fear not me saith lord host 3 6 i am lord i chang not therefor ye son jacob are not consum 3 7 even day your father ye are gone away mine ordin have not kept them return unto me i will return unto you saith lord host but ye said wherein shall we return 3 8 will man rob god yet ye have rob me but ye say wherein have we rob thee tith offer 3 9 ye are curs curs ye have rob me even thi whole nation 3 10 bring ye all tith storehous that there may be meat mine hous prove me now herewith saith lord host if i will not open you window heaven pour you bless that there shall not be room enough receiv it 3 11 i will rebuk devour your sake he shall not destroy fruit your ground neither shall your vine cast her fruit time field saith lord host 3 12 all nation shall call you bless ye shall be delightsom land saith lord host 3 13 your word have been stout against me saith lord yet ye say what have we spoken so much against thee 3 14 ye have said it is vain serv god what profit is it that we have kept hi ordin that we have walk mourn lord host 3 15 now we call proud happi yea they that work wicked are set yea they that tempt god are even deliv 3 16 then they that fear lord spake often one anoth lord hearken heard it book remembr wa written him them that fear lord that thought hi name 3 17 they shall be mine saith lord host that day when i make my jewel i will spare them as man spareth hi own son that serveth him 3 18 then shall ye return discern righteou wick him that serveth god him that serveth him not 4 1 behold day cometh that shall burn as oven all proud yea all that do wickedli shall be stubbl day that cometh shall burn them saith lord host that it shall leav them neither root nor branch 4 2 but unto you that fear my name shall sun righteous aris heal hi wing ye shall go forth grow as calv stall 4 3 ye shall tread down wick they shall be ash sole your feet day that i shall do thi saith lord host 4 4 rememb ye law mose my servant which i command unto him horeb all israel statut judgment 4 5 behold i will send you elijah prophet come great dread day lord 4 6 he shall turn heart father children heart children their
