fourteen gener david carri away babylon are fourteen gener carri away babylon unto christ are fourteen gener 1 18 now birth jesu christ wa thi wise when as hi mother mari wa espous joseph they came togeth she wa found child holi ghost 1 19 then joseph her husband be just man not will make her publick exampl wa mind put her away privili 1 20 but while he thought these thing behold angel lord appear unto him dream say joseph thou son david fear not take unto thee mari thi wife that which is conceiv her is holi ghost 1 21 she shall bring forth son thou shalt call hi name jesu he shall save hi peopl their sin 1 22 now all thi wa done that it might be fulfil which wa spoken lord prophet say 1 23 behold virgin shall be child shall bring forth son they shall call hi name emmanuel which be interpret is god us 1 24 then joseph be rais sleep did as angel lord had bidden him took unto him hi wife 1 25 knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son he call hi name jesu 2 1 now when jesu wa born bethlehem judaea day herod king behold there came wise men east jerusalem 2 2 say where is he that is born king jew we have seen hi star east are come worship him 2 3 when herod king had heard these thing he wa troubl all jerusalem him 2 4 when he had gather all chief priest scribe peopl togeth he demand them where christ should be born 2 5 they said unto him bethlehem judaea thu it is written prophet 2 6 thou bethlehem land juda art not least princ juda thee shall come governor that shall rule my peopl israel 2 7 then herod when he had privili call wise men enquir them dilig what time star appear 2 8 he sent them bethlehem said go search dilig young child when ye have found him bring me word again that i may come worship him also 2 9 when they had heard king they depart lo star which they saw east went them till it came stood where young child wa 2 10 when they saw star they rejoic exceed great joy 2 11 when they were come hous they saw young child mari hi mother fell down worship him when they had open their treasur they present unto him gift gold frankincens myrrh 2 12 be warn god dream that they should not return herod they depart their own countri anoth way 2 13 when they were depart behold angel lord appeareth joseph dream say aris take young child hi mother flee egypt be thou there i bring thee word herod will seek young child destroy him 2 14 when he aros he took young child hi mother night depart egypt 2 15 wa there death herod that it might be fulfil which wa spoken lord prophet say egypt have i call my son 2 16 then herod when he saw that he wa mock wise men wa exceed wroth sent forth slew all children that were bethlehem all coast thereof two year old accord time which he had dilig enquir wise men 2 17 then wa fulfil that which wa spoken jeremi prophet say 2 18 rama wa there voic heard lament weep great mourn rachel weep her children would not be comfort becaus they are not 2 19 but when herod wa dead behold angel lord appeareth dream joseph egypt 2 20 say aris take young child hi mother go land israel they are dead which sought young child s life 2 21 he aros took young child hi mother came land israel 2 22 but when he heard that archelau did reign judaea room hi father herod he wa afraid go thither notwithstand be warn god dream he turn asid part galile 2 23 he came dwelt citi call nazareth that it might be fulfil which wa spoken prophet he shall be call nazaren 3 1 those day came john baptist preach wilder judaea 3 2 say repent ye kingdom heaven is hand 3 3 thi is he that wa spoken prophet esaia say voic one cri wilder prepar ye way lord make hi path straight 3 4 same john had hi raiment camel s hair leathern girdl hi loin hi meat wa locust wild honey 3 5 then went him jerusalem all judaea all region round jordan 3 6 were baptiz him jordan confess their sin 3 7 but when he saw mani pharise sadduce come hi baptism he said unto them o gener viper who hath warn you flee wrath come 3 8 bring forth therefor fruit meet repent 3 9 think not say yourselv we have abraham our father i say unto you that god is abl these stone rais children unto abraham 3 10 now also axe is laid unto root tree therefor everi tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down cast fire 3 11 i inde baptiz you water unto repent but he that cometh me is mightier than i whose shoe i am not worthi bear he shall baptiz you holi ghost fire 3 12 whose fan is hi hand he will throughli purg hi floor gather hi wheat garner but he will burn chaff unquench fire 3 13 then cometh jesu galile jordan unto john be baptiz him 3 14 but john forbad him say i have need be baptiz thee comest thou me 3 15 jesu answer said unto him suffer it be so now thu it becometh us fulfil all righteous then he suffer him 3 16 jesu when he wa baptiz went straightway water lo heaven were open unto him he saw spirit god descend like dove light him 3 17 lo voic heaven say thi is my belov son whom i am well pleas 4 1 then wa jesu led spirit wilder be tempt devil 4 2 when he had fast forti day forti night he wa afterward hungr 4 3 when tempter came him he said if thou be son god command that these stone be made bread 4 4 but he answer said it is written man shall not live bread alon but everi word that proceedeth mouth god 4 5 then devil taketh him holi citi setteth him pinnacl templ 4 6 saith unto him if thou be son god cast thyself down it is written he shall give hi angel charg concern thee their hand they shall bear thee lest ani time thou dash thi foot against stone 4 7 jesu said unto him it is written again thou shalt not tempt lord thi god 4 8 again devil taketh him exceed high mountain sheweth him all kingdom world glori them 4 9 saith unto him all these thing will i give thee if thou wilt fall down worship me 4 10 then saith jesu unto him get thee henc satan it is written thou shalt worship lord thi god him onli shalt thou serv 4 11 then devil leaveth him behold angel came minist unto him 4 12 now when jesu had heard that john wa cast prison he depart galile 4 13 leav nazareth he came dwelt capernaum which is sea coast border zabulon nephthalim 4 14 that it might be fulfil which wa spoken esaia prophet say 4 15 land zabulon land nephthalim way sea jordan galile gentil 4 16 peopl which sat dark saw great light them which sat region shadow death light is sprung 4 17 that time jesu began preach say repent kingdom heaven is hand 4 18 jesu walk sea galile saw two brethren simon call peter andrew hi brother cast net sea they were fisher 4 19 he saith unto them follow me i will make you fisher men 4 20 they straightway left their net follow him 4 21 go thenc he saw other two brethren jame son zebede john hi brother ship zebede their father mend their net he call them 4 22 they immedi left ship their father follow him 4 23 jesu went all galile teach their synagogu preach gospel kingdom heal all manner sick all manner diseas peopl 4 24 hi fame went all syria they brought unto him all sick peopl that were taken diver diseas torment those which were possess devil those which were lunatick those that had palsi he heal them 4 25 there follow him great multitud peopl galile decapoli jerusalem judaea jordan 5 1 see multitud he went mountain when he wa set hi discipl came unto him 5 2 he open hi mouth taught them say 5 3 bless are poor spirit their is kingdom heaven 5 4 bless are they that mourn they shall be comfort 5 5 bless are meek they shall inherit earth 5 6 bless are they which do hunger thirst righteous they shall be fill 5 7 bless are merci they shall obtain merci 5 8 bless are pure heart they shall see god 5 9 bless are peacemak they shall be call children god 5 10 bless are they which are persecut righteous sake their is kingdom heaven 5 11 bless are ye when men shall revil you persecut you shall say all manner evil against you fals my sake 5 12 rejoic be exceed glad great is your reward heaven so persecut they prophet which were you 5 13 ye are salt earth but if salt have lost hi savour wherewith shall it be salt it is thenceforth good noth but be cast be trodden foot men 5 14 ye are light world citi that is set hill cannot be hid 5 15 neither do men light candl put it bushel but candlestick it giveth light unto all that are hous 5 16 let your light so shine men that they may see your good work glorifi your father which is heaven 5 17 think not that i am come destroy law or prophet i am not come destroy but fulfil 5 18 verili i say unto you till heaven earth pass one jot or one tittl shall no wise pass law till all be fulfil 5 19 whosoev therefor shall break one these least command shall teach men so he shall be call least kingdom heaven but whosoev shall do teach them same shall be call great kingdom heaven 5 20 i say unto you that your righteous shall exceed righteous scribe pharise ye shall no case enter kingdom heaven 5 21 ye have heard that it wa said them old time thou shalt not kill whosoev shall kill shall be danger judgment 5 22 but i say unto you that whosoev is angri hi brother caus shall be danger judgment whosoev shall say hi brother raca shall be danger council but whosoev shall say thou fool shall be danger hell fire 5 23 therefor if thou bring thi gift altar there rememberest that thi brother hath ought against thee 5 24 leav there thi gift altar go thi way first be reconcil thi brother then come offer thi gift 5 25 agre thine adversari quickli while thou art way him lest ani time adversari deliv thee judg judg deliv thee offic thou be cast prison 5 26 verili i say unto thee thou shalt no mean come thenc till thou hast paid uttermost farth 5 27 ye have heard that it wa said them old time thou shalt not commit adulteri 5 28 but i say unto you that whosoev looketh woman lust her hath commit adulteri her alreadi hi heart 5 29 if thi right eye offend thee pluck it cast it thee it is profit thee that one thi member should perish not that thi whole bodi should be cast hell 5 30 if thi right hand offend thee cut it off cast it thee it is profit thee that one thi member should perish not that thi whole bodi should be cast hell 5 31 it hath been said whosoev shall put away hi wife let him give her write divorc 5 32 but i say unto you that whosoev shall put away hi wife save caus fornic causeth her commit adulteri whosoev shall marri her that is divorc committeth adulteri 5 33 again ye have heard that it hath been said them old time thou shalt not forswear thyself but shalt perform unto lord thine oath 5 34 but i say unto you swear not all neither heaven it is god s throne 5 35 nor earth it is hi footstool neither jerusalem it is citi great king 5 36 neither shalt thou swear thi head becaus thou canst not make one hair white or black 5 37 but let your commun be yea yea nay nay whatsoev is more than these cometh evil 5 38 ye have heard that it hath been said eye eye tooth tooth 5 39 but i say unto you that ye resist not evil but whosoev shall smite thee thi right cheek turn him other also 5 40 if ani man will sue thee law take away thi coat let him have thi cloak also 5 41 whosoev shall compel thee go mile go him twain 5 42 give him that asketh thee him that would borrow thee turn not thou away 5 43 ye have heard that it hath been said thou shalt love thi neighbour hate thine enemi 5 44 but i say unto you love your enemi bless them that curs you do good them that hate you pray them which despit use you persecut you 5 45 that ye may be children your father which is heaven he maketh hi sun rise evil good sendeth rain just unjust 5 46 if ye love them which love you what reward have ye do not even publican same 5 47 if ye salut your brethren onli what do ye more than other do not even publican so 5 48 be ye therefor perfect even as your father which is heaven is perfect 6 1 take heed that ye do not your alm men be seen them otherwis ye have no reward your father which is heaven 6 2 therefor when thou doest thine alm do not sound trumpet thee as hypocrit do synagogu street that they may have glori men verili i say unto you they have their reward 6 3 but when thou doest alm let not thi left hand know what thi right hand doeth 6 4 that thine alm may be secret thi father which seeth secret himself shall reward thee openli 6 5 when thou prayest thou shalt not be as hypocrit are they love pray stand synagogu corner street that they may be seen men verili i say unto you they have their reward 6 6 but thou when thou prayest enter thi closet when thou hast shut thi door pray thi father which is secret thi father which seeth secret shall reward thee openli 6 7 but when ye pray use not vain repetit as heathen do they think that they shall be heard their much speak 6 8 be not ye therefor like unto them your father knoweth what thing ye have need ye ask him 6 9 thi manner therefor pray ye our father which art heaven hallow be thi name 6 10 thi kingdom come thi will be done earth as it is heaven 6 11 give us thi day our daili bread 6 12 forgiv us our debt as we forgiv our debtor 6 13 lead us not temptat but deliv us evil thine is kingdom power glori ever amen 6 14 if ye forgiv men their trespass your heavenli father will also forgiv you 6 15 but if ye forgiv not men their trespass neither will your father forgiv your trespass 6 16 moreov when ye fast be not as hypocrit sad counten they disfigur their face that they may appear unto men fast verili i say unto you they have their reward 6 17 but thou when thou fastest anoint thine head wash thi face 6 18 that thou appear not unto men fast but unto thi father which is secret thi father which seeth secret shall reward thee openli 6 19 lay not yourselv treasur earth where moth rust doth corrupt where thiev break steal 6 20 but lay yourselv treasur heaven where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt where thiev do not break nor steal 6 21 where your treasur is there will your heart be also 6 22 light bodi is eye if therefor thine eye be singl thi whole bodi shall be full light 6 23 but if thine eye be evil thi whole bodi shall be full dark if therefor light that is thee be dark how great is that dark 6 24 no man can serv two master either he will hate one love other or els he will hold one despis other ye cannot serv god mammon 6 25 therefor i say unto you take no thought your life what ye shall eat or what ye shall drink nor yet your bodi what ye shall put is not life more than meat bodi than raiment 6 26 behold fowl air they sow not neither do they reap nor gather barn yet your heavenli father feedeth them are ye not much better than they 6 27 which you take thought can add one cubit unto hi statur 6 28 whi take ye thought raiment consid lili field how they grow they toil not neither do they spin 6 29 yet i say unto you that even solomon all hi glori wa not array like one these 6 30 wherefor if god so cloth grass field which day is morrow is cast oven shall he not much more cloth you o ye littl faith 6 31 therefor take no thought say what shall we eat or what shall we drink or wherewith shall we be cloth 6 32 all these thing do gentil seek your heavenli father knoweth that ye have need all these thing 6 33 but seek ye first kingdom god hi righteous all these thing shall be ad unto you 6 34 take therefor no thought morrow morrow shall take thought thing itself suffici unto day is evil thereof 7 1 judg not that ye be not judg 7 2 what judgment ye judg ye shall be judg what measur ye mete it shall be measur you again 7 3 whi beholdest thou mote that is thi brother s eye but considerest not beam that is thine own eye 7 4 or how wilt thou say thi brother let me pull mote thine eye behold beam is thine own eye 7 5 thou hypocrit first cast beam thine own eye then shalt thou see clearli cast mote thi brother s eye 7 6 give not that which is holi unto dog neither cast ye your pearl swine lest they trampl them their feet turn again rend you 7 7 ask it shall be given you seek ye shall find knock it shall be open unto you 7 8 everi one that asketh receiveth he that seeketh findeth him that knocketh it shall be open 7 9 or what man is there you whom if hi son ask bread will he give him stone 7 10 or if he ask fish will he give him serpent 7 11 if ye then be evil know how give good gift unto your children how much more shall your father which is heaven give good thing them that ask him 7 12 therefor all thing whatsoev ye would that men should do you do ye even so them thi is law prophet 7 13 enter ye strait gate wide is gate broad is way that leadeth destruct mani there be which go thereat 7 14 becaus strait is gate narrow is way which leadeth unto life few there be that find it 7 15 bewar fals prophet which come you sheep s cloth but inwardli they are raven wolv 7 16 ye shall know them their fruit do men gather grape thorn or fig thistl 7 17 even so everi good tree bringeth forth good fruit but corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit 7 18 good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit neither can corrupt tree bring forth good fruit 7 19 everi tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down cast fire 7 20 wherefor their fruit ye shall know them 7 21 not everi one that saith unto me lord lord shall enter kingdom heaven but he that doeth will my father which is heaven 7 22 mani will say me that day lord lord have we not prophesi thi name thi name have cast devil thi name done mani wonder work 7 23 then will i profess unto them i never knew you depart me ye that work iniqu 7 24 therefor whosoev heareth these say mine doeth them i will liken him unto wise man which built hi hous rock 7 25 rain descend flood came wind blew beat that hous it fell not it wa found rock 7 26 everi one that heareth these say mine doeth them not shall be liken unto foolish man which built hi hous sand 7 27 rain descend flood came wind blew beat that hous it fell great wa fall it 7 28 it came pass when jesu had end these say peopl were astonish hi doctrin 7 29 he taught them as one have author not as scribe 8 1 when he wa come down mountain great multitud follow him 8 2 behold there came leper worship him say lord if thou wilt thou canst make me clean 8 3 jesu put forth hi hand touch him say i will be thou clean immedi hi leprosi wa cleans 8 4 jesu saith unto him see thou tell no man but go thi way shew thyself priest offer gift that mose command testimoni unto them 8 5 when jesu wa enter capernaum there came unto him centurion beseech him 8 6 say lord my servant lieth home sick palsi grievous torment 8 7 jesu saith unto him i will come heal him 8 8 centurion answer said lord i am not worthi that thou shouldest come my roof but speak word onli my servant shall be heal 8 9 i am man author have soldier me i say thi man go he goeth anoth come he cometh my servant do thi he doeth it 8 10 when jesu heard it he marvel said them that follow verili i say unto you i have not found so great faith no not israel 8 11 i say unto you that mani shall come east west shall sit down abraham isaac jacob kingdom heaven 8 12 but children kingdom shall be cast outer dark there shall be weep gnash teeth 8 13 jesu said unto centurion go thi way as thou hast believ so be it done unto thee hi servant wa heal selfsam hour 8 14 when jesu wa come peter s hous he saw hi wife s mother laid sick fever 8 15 he touch her hand fever left her she aros minist unto them 8 16 when even wa come they brought unto him mani that were possess devil he cast spirit hi word heal all that were sick 8 17 that it might be fulfil which wa spoken esaia prophet say himself took our infirm bare our sick 8 18 now when jesu saw great multitud him he gave command depart unto other side 8 19 certain scribe came said unto him master i will follow thee whithersoev thou goest 8 20 jesu saith unto him fox have hole bird air have nest but son man hath not where lay hi head 8 21 anoth hi discipl said unto him lord suffer me first go buri my father 8 22 but jesu said unto him follow me let dead buri their dead 8 23 when he wa enter ship hi discipl follow him 8 24 behold there aros great tempest sea insomuch that ship wa cover wave but he wa asleep 8 25 hi discipl came him awok him say lord save us we perish 8 26 he saith unto them whi are ye fear o ye littl faith then he aros rebuk wind sea there wa great calm 8 27 but men marvel say what manner man is thi that even wind sea obey him 8 28 when he wa come other side countri gergesen there met him two possess devil come tomb exceed fierc so that no man might pass that way 8 29 behold they cri say what have we do thee jesu thou son god art thou come hither torment us time 8 30 there wa good way off them herd mani swine feed 8 31 so devil besought him say if thou cast us suffer us go away herd swine 8 32 he said unto them go when they were come they went herd swine behold whole herd swine ran violent down steep place sea perish water 8 33 they that kept them fled went their way citi told everi thing what wa befallen possess devil 8 34 behold whole citi came meet jesu when they saw him they besought him that he would depart their coast 9 1 he enter ship pass came hi own citi 9 2 behold they brought him man sick palsi lie bed jesu see their faith said unto sick palsi son be good cheer thi sin be forgiven thee 9 3 behold certain scribe said themselv thi man blasphemeth 9 4 jesu know their thought said wherefor think ye evil your heart 9 5 is easier say thi sin be forgiven thee or say aris walk 9 6 but that ye may know that son man hath power earth forgiv sin then saith he sick palsi aris take thi bed go unto thine hous 9 7 he aros depart hi hous 9 8 but when multitud saw it they marvel glorifi god which had given such power unto men 9 9 as jesu pass forth thenc he saw man name matthew sit receipt custom he saith unto him follow me he aros follow him 9 10 it came pass as jesu sat meat hous behold mani publican sinner came sat down him hi discipl 9 11 when pharise saw it they said unto hi discipl whi eateth your master publican sinner 9 12 but when jesu heard that he said unto them they that be whole need not physician but they that are sick 9 13 but go ye learn what that meaneth i will have merci not sacrific i am not come call righteou but sinner repent 9 14 then came him discipl john say whi do we pharise fast oft but thi discipl fast not 9 15 jesu said unto them can children bridechamb mourn as long as bridegroom is them but day will come when bridegroom shall be taken them then shall they fast 9 16 no man putteth piec new cloth unto old garment that which is put fill it taketh garment rent is made wors 9 17 neither do men put new wine old bottl els bottl break wine runneth bottl perish but they put new wine new bottl both are preserv 9 18 while he spake these thing unto them behold there came certain ruler worship him say my daughter is even now dead but come lay thi hand her she shall live 9 19 jesu aros follow him so did hi discipl 9 20 behold woman which wa diseas issu blood twelv year came behind him touch hem hi garment 9 21 she said herself if i may but touch hi garment i shall be whole 9 22 but jesu turn him when he saw her he said daughter be good comfort thi faith hath made thee whole woman wa made whole that hour 9 23 when jesu came ruler s hous saw minstrel peopl make nois 9 24 he said unto them give place maid is not dead but sleepeth they laugh him scorn 9 25 but when peopl were put forth he went took her hand maid aros 9 26 fame hereof went abroad all that land 9 27 when jesu depart thenc two blind men follow him cri say thou son david have merci us 9 28 when he wa come hous blind men came him jesu saith unto them believ ye that i am abl do thi they said unto him yea lord 9 29 then touch he their eye say accord your faith be it unto you 9 30 their eye were open jesu straitli charg them say see that no man know it 9 31 but they when they were depart spread abroad hi fame all that countri 9 32 as they went behold they brought him dumb man possess devil 9 33 when devil wa cast dumb spake multitud marvel say it wa never so seen israel 9 34 but pharise said he casteth devil princ devil 9 35 jesu went all citi villag teach their synagogu preach gospel kingdom heal everi sick everi diseas peopl 9 36 but when he saw multitud he wa move compass them becaus they faint were scatter abroad as sheep have no shepherd 9 37 then saith he unto hi discipl harvest truli is plenteou but labour are few 9 38 pray ye therefor lord harvest that he will send forth labour hi harvest 10 1 when he had call unto him hi twelv discipl he gave them power against unclean spirit cast them heal all manner sick all manner diseas 10 2 now name twelv apostl are these first simon who is call peter andrew hi brother jame son zebede john hi brother 10 3 philip bartholomew thoma matthew publican jame son alphaeu lebbaeu whose surnam wa thaddaeu 10 4 simon canaanit juda iscariot who also betray him 10 5 these twelv jesu sent forth command them say go not way gentil ani citi samaritan enter ye not 10 6 but go rather lost sheep hous israel 10 7 as ye go preach say kingdom heaven is hand 10 8 heal sick cleans leper rais dead cast devil freeli ye have receiv freeli give 10 9 provid neither gold nor silver nor brass your purs 10 10 nor scrip your journey neither two coat neither shoe nor yet stave workman is worthi hi meat 10 11 whatsoev citi or town ye shall enter enquir who it is worthi there abid till ye go thenc 10 12 when ye come hous salut it 10 13 if hous be worthi let your peac come it but if it be not worthi let your peac return you 10 14 whosoev shall not receiv you nor hear your word when ye depart that hous or citi shake off dust your feet 10 15 verili i say unto you it shall be more toler land sodom gomorrha day judgment than that citi 10 16 behold i send you forth as sheep midst wolv be ye therefor wise as serpent harmless as dove 10 17 but bewar men they will deliv you council they will scourg you their synagogu 10 18 ye shall be brought governor king my sake testimoni against them gentil 10 19 but when they deliv you take no thought how or what ye shall speak it shall be given you that same hour what ye shall speak 10 20 it is not ye that speak but spirit your father which speaketh you 10 21 brother shall deliv brother death father child children shall rise against their parent caus them be put death 10 22 ye shall be hate all men my name s sake but he that endureth end shall be save 10 23 but when they persecut you thi citi flee ye anoth verili i say unto you ye shall not have gone citi israel till son man be come 10 24 discipl is not hi master nor servant hi lord 10 25 it is enough discipl that he be as hi master servant as hi lord if they have call master hous beelzebub how much more shall they call them hi household 10 26 fear them not therefor there is noth cover that shall not be reveal hid that shall not be known 10 27 what i tell you dark that speak ye light what ye hear ear that preach ye housetop 10 28 fear not them which kill bodi but are not abl kill soul but rather fear him which is abl destroy both soul bodi hell 10 29 are not two sparrow sold farth one them shall not fall ground your father 10 30 but veri hair your head are all number 10 31 fear ye not therefor ye are more valu than mani sparrow 10 32 whosoev therefor shall confess me men him will i confess also my father which is heaven 10 33 but whosoev shall deni me men him will i also deni my father which is heaven 10 34 think not that i am come send peac earth i came not send peac but sword 10 35 i am come set man varianc against hi father daughter against her mother daughter law against her mother law 10 36 man s foe shall be they hi own household 10 37 he that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthi me he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthi me 10 38 he that taketh not hi cross followeth me is not worthi me 10 39 he that findeth hi life shall lose it he that loseth hi life my sake shall find it 10 40 he that receiveth you receiveth me he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me 10 41 he that receiveth prophet name prophet shall receiv prophet s reward he that receiveth righteou man name righteou man shall receiv righteou man s reward 10 42 whosoev shall give drink unto one these littl one cup cold water onli name discipl verili i say unto you he shall no wise lose hi reward 11 1 it came pass when jesu had made end command hi twelv discipl he depart thenc teach preach their citi 11 2 now when john had heard prison work christ he sent two hi discipl 11 3 said unto him art thou he that should come or do we look anoth 11 4 jesu answer said unto them go shew john again those thing which ye do hear see 11 5 blind receiv their sight lame walk leper are cleans deaf hear dead are rais poor have gospel preach them 11 6 bless is he whosoev shall not be offend me 11 7 as they depart jesu began say unto multitud concern john what went ye wilder see reed shaken wind 11 8 but what went ye see man cloth soft raiment behold they that wear soft cloth are king hous 11 9 but what went ye see prophet yea i say unto you more than prophet 11 10 thi is he whom it is written behold i send my messeng thi face which shall prepar thi way thee 11 11 verili i say unto you them that are born women there hath not risen greater than john baptist notwithstand he that is least kingdom heaven is greater than he 11 12 day john baptist now kingdom heaven suffereth violenc violent take it forc 11 13 all prophet law prophesi john 11 14 if ye will receiv it thi is elia which wa come 11 15 he that hath ear hear let him hear 11 16 but whereunto shall i liken thi gener it is like unto children sit market call unto their fellow 11 17 say we have pipe unto you ye have not danc we have mourn unto you ye have not lament 11 18 john came neither eat nor drink they say he hath devil 11 19 son man came eat drink they say behold man glutton winebibb friend publican sinner but wisdom is justifi her children 11 20 then began he upbraid citi wherein most hi mighti work were done becaus they repent not 11 21 woe unto thee chorazin woe unto thee bethsaida if mighti work which were done you had been done tyre sidon they would have repent long ago sackcloth ash 11 22 but i say unto you it shall be more toler tyre sidon day judgment than you 11 23 thou capernaum which art exalt unto heaven shalt be brought down hell if mighti work which have been done thee had been done sodom it would have remain thi day 11 24 but i say unto you that it shall be more toler land sodom day judgment than thee 11 25 that time jesu answer said i thank thee o father lord heaven earth becaus thou hast hid these thing wise prudent hast reveal them unto babe 11 26 even so father so it seem good thi sight 11 27 all thing are deliv unto me my father no man knoweth son but father neither knoweth ani man father save son he whomsoev son will reveal him 11 28 come unto me all ye that labour are heavi laden i will give you rest 11 29 take my yoke you learn me i am meek lowli heart ye shall find rest unto your soul 11 30 my yoke is easi my burden is light 12 1 that time jesu went sabbath day corn hi discipl were hungr began pluck ear corn eat 12 2 but when pharise saw it they said unto him behold thi discipl do that which is not law do sabbath day 12 3 but he said unto them have ye not read what david did when he wa hungr they that were him 12 4 how he enter hous god did eat shewbread which wa not law him eat neither them which were him but onli priest 12 5 or have ye not read law how that sabbath day priest templ profan sabbath are blameless 12 6 but i say unto you that thi place is one greater than templ 12 7 but if ye had known what thi meaneth i will have merci not sacrific ye would not have condemn guiltless 12 8 son man is lord even sabbath day 12 9 when he wa depart thenc he went their synagogu 12 10 behold there wa man which had hi hand wither they ask him say is it law heal sabbath day that they might accus him 12 11 he said unto them what man shall there be you that shall have one sheep if it fall pit sabbath day will he not lay hold it lift it 12 12 how much then is man better than sheep wherefor it is law do well sabbath day 12 13 then saith he man stretch forth thine hand he stretch it forth it wa restor whole like as other 12 14 then pharise went held council against him how they might destroy him 12 15 but when jesu knew it he withdrew himself thenc great multitud follow him he heal them all 12 16 charg them that they should not make him known 12 17 that it might be fulfil which wa spoken esaia prophet say 12 18 behold my servant whom i have chosen my belov whom my soul is well pleas i will put my spirit him he shall shew judgment gentil 12 19 he shall not strive nor cri neither shall ani man hear hi voic street 12 20 bruis reed shall he not break smoke flax shall he not quench till he send forth judgment unto victori 12 21 hi name shall gentil trust 12 22 then wa brought unto him one possess devil blind dumb he heal him insomuch that blind dumb both spake saw 12 23 all peopl were amaz said is not thi son david 12 24 but when pharise heard it they said thi fellow doth not cast devil but beelzebub princ devil 12 25 jesu knew their thought said unto them everi kingdom divid against itself is brought desol everi citi or hous divid against itself shall not stand 12 26 if satan cast satan he is divid against himself how shall then hi kingdom stand 12 27 if i beelzebub cast devil whom do your children cast them therefor they shall be your judg 12 28 but if i cast devil spirit god then kingdom god is come unto you 12 29 or els how can one enter strong man s hous spoil hi good he first bind strong man then he will spoil hi hous 12 30 he that is not me is against me he that gathereth not me scattereth abroad 12 31 wherefor i say unto you all manner sin blasphemi shall be forgiven unto men but blasphemi against holi ghost shall not be forgiven unto men 12 32 whosoev speaketh word against son man it shall be forgiven him but whosoev speaketh against holi ghost it shall not be forgiven him neither thi world neither world come 12 33 either make tree good hi fruit good or els make tree corrupt hi fruit corrupt tree is known hi fruit 12 34 o gener viper how can ye be evil speak good thing abund heart mouth speaketh 12 35 good man good treasur heart bringeth forth good thing evil man evil treasur bringeth forth evil thing 12 36 but i say unto you that everi idl word that men shall speak they shall give account thereof day judgment 12 37 thi word thou shalt be justifi thi word thou shalt be condemn 12 38 then certain scribe pharise answer say master we would see sign thee 12 39 but he answer said unto them evil adulter gener seeketh sign there shall no sign be given it but sign prophet jona 12 40 as jona wa three day three night whale s belli so shall son man be three day three night heart earth 12 41 men nineveh shall rise judgment thi gener shall condemn it becaus they repent preach jona behold greater than jona is here 12 42 queen south shall rise judgment thi gener shall condemn it she came uttermost part earth hear wisdom solomon behold greater than solomon is here 12 43 when unclean spirit is gone man he walketh dri place seek rest findeth none 12 44 then he saith i will return my hous whenc i came when he is come he findeth it empti swept garnish 12 45 then goeth he taketh himself seven other spirit more wick than himself they enter dwell there last state that man is wors than first even so shall it be also unto thi wick gener 12 46 while he yet talk peopl behold hi mother hi brethren stood desir speak him 12 47 then one said unto him behold thi mother thi brethren stand desir speak thee 12 48 but he answer said unto him that told him who is my mother who are my brethren 12 49 he stretch forth hi hand hi discipl said behold my mother my brethren 12 50 whosoev shall do will my father which is heaven same is my brother sister mother 13 1 same day went jesu hous sat sea side 13 2 great multitud were gather togeth unto him so that he went ship sat whole multitud stood shore 13 3 he spake mani thing unto them parabl say behold sower went forth sow 13 4 when he sow some seed fell way side fowl came devour them 13 5 some fell stoni place where they had not much earth forthwith they sprung becaus they had no deep earth 13 6 when sun wa they were scorch becaus they had no root they wither away 13 7 some fell thorn thorn sprung choke them 13 8 but other fell good ground brought forth fruit some hundredfold some sixtyfold some thirtyfold 13 9 who hath ear hear let him hear 13 10 discipl came said unto him whi speakest thou unto them parabl 13 11 he answer said unto them becaus it is given unto you know mysteri kingdom heaven but them it is not given 13 12 whosoev hath him shall be given he shall have more abund but whosoev hath not him shall be taken away even that he hath 13 13 therefor speak i them parabl becaus they see see not hear they hear not neither do they understand 13 14 them is fulfil propheci esaia which saith hear ye shall hear shall not understand see ye shall see shall not perceiv 13 15 thi peopl s heart is wax gross their ear are dull hear their eye they have close lest ani time they should see their eye hear their ear should understand their heart should be convert i should heal them 13 16 but bless are your eye they see your ear they hear 13 17 verili i say unto you that mani prophet righteou men have desir see those thing which ye see have not seen them hear those thing which ye hear have not heard them 13 18 hear ye therefor parabl sower 13 19 when ani one heareth word kingdom understandeth it not then cometh wick one catcheth away that which wa sown hi heart thi is he which receiv seed way side 13 20 but he that receiv seed stoni place same is he that heareth word anon joy receiveth it 13 21 yet hath he not root himself but dureth while when tribul or persecut ariseth becaus word he is offend 13 22 he also that receiv seed thorn is he that heareth word care thi world deceit rich choke word he becometh unfruit 13 23 but he that receiv seed good ground is he that heareth word understandeth it which also beareth fruit bringeth forth some hundredfold some sixti some thirti 13 24 anoth parabl put he forth unto them say kingdom heaven is liken unto man which sow good seed hi field 13 25 but while men slept hi enemi came sow tare wheat went hi way 13 26 but when blade wa sprung brought forth fruit then appear tare also 13 27 so servant household came said unto him sir didst not thou sow good seed thi field whenc then hath it tare 13 28 he said unto them enemi hath done thi servant said unto him wilt thou then that we go gather them 13 29 but he said nay lest while ye gather tare ye root also wheat them 13 30 let both grow togeth harvest time harvest i will say reaper gather ye togeth first tare bind them bundl burn them but gather wheat my barn 13 31 anoth parabl put he forth unto them say kingdom heaven is like grain mustard seed which man took sow hi field 13 32 which inde is least all seed but when it is grown it is greatest herb becometh tree so that bird air come lodg branch thereof 13 33 anoth parabl spake he unto them kingdom heaven is like unto leaven which woman took hid three measur meal till whole wa leaven 13 34 all these thing spake jesu unto multitud parabl parabl spake he not unto them 13 35 that it might be fulfil which wa spoken prophet say i will open my mouth parabl i will utter thing which have been kept secret foundat world 13 36 then jesu sent multitud away went hous hi discipl came unto him say declar unto us parabl tare field 13 37 he answer said unto them he that soweth good seed is son man 13 38 field is world good seed are children kingdom but tare are children wick one 13 39 enemi that sow them is devil harvest is end world reaper are angel 13 40 as therefor tare are gather burn fire so shall it be end thi world 13 41 son man shall send forth hi angel they shall gather hi kingdom all thing that offend them which do iniqu 13 42 shall cast them furnac fire there shall be wail gnash teeth 13 43 then shall righteou shine forth as sun kingdom their father who hath ear hear let him hear 13 44 again kingdom heaven is like unto treasur hid field which when man hath found he hideth joy thereof goeth selleth all that he hath buyeth that field 13 45 again kingdom heaven is like unto merchant man seek goodli pearl 13 46 who when he had found one pearl great price went sold all that he had bought it 13 47 again kingdom heaven is like unto net that wa cast sea gather everi kind 13 48 which when it wa full they drew shore sat down gather good vessel but cast bad away 13 49 so shall it be end world angel shall come forth sever wick just 13 50 shall cast them furnac fire there shall be wail gnash teeth 13 51 jesu saith unto them have ye understood all these thing they say unto him yea lord 13 52 then said he unto them therefor everi scribe which is instruct unto kingdom heaven is like unto man that is household which bringeth forth hi treasur thing new old 13 53 it came pass that when jesu had finish these parabl he depart thenc 13 54 when he wa come hi own countri he taught them their synagogu insomuch that they were astonish said whenc hath thi man thi wisdom these mighti work 13 55 is not thi carpent s son is not hi mother call mari hi brethren jame jose simon juda 13 56 hi sister are they not all us whenc then hath thi man all these thing 13 57 they were offend him but jesu said unto them prophet is not honour save hi own countri hi own hous 13 58 he did not mani mighti work there becaus their unbelief 14 1 that time herod tetrarch heard fame jesu 14 2 said unto hi servant thi is john baptist he is risen dead therefor mighti work do shew forth themselv him 14 3 herod had laid hold john bound him put him prison herodia sake hi brother philip s wife 14 4 john said unto him it is not law thee have her 14 5 when he would have put him death he fear multitud becaus they count him as prophet 14 6 but when herod s birthday wa kept daughter herodia danc them pleas herod 14 7 whereupon he promis oath give her whatsoev she would ask 14 8 she be instruct her mother said give me here john baptist s head charger 14 9 king wa sorri nevertheless oath s sake them which sat him meat he command it be given her 14 10 he sent behead john prison 14 11 hi head wa brought charger given damsel she brought it her mother 14 12 hi discipl came took bodi buri it went told jesu 14 13 when jesu heard it he depart thenc ship desert place apart when peopl had heard thereof they follow him foot citi 14 14 jesu went forth saw great multitud wa move compass them he heal their sick 14 15 when it wa even hi discipl came him say thi is desert place time is now past send multitud away that they may go villag buy themselv victual 14 16 but jesu said unto them they need not depart give ye them eat 14 17 they say unto him we have here but five loav two fish 14 18 he said bring them hither me 14 19 he command multitud sit down grass took five loav two fish look heaven he bless brake gave loav hi discipl discipl multitud 14 20 they did all eat were fill they took fragment that remain twelv basket full 14 21 they that had eaten were five thousand men besid women children 14 22 straightway jesu constrain hi discipl get ship go him unto other side while he sent multitud away 14 23 when he had sent multitud away he went mountain apart pray when even wa come he wa there alon 14 24 but ship wa now midst sea toss wave wind wa contrari 14 25 fourth watch night jesu went unto them walk sea 14 26 when discipl saw him walk sea they were troubl say it is spirit they cri fear 14 27 but straightway jesu spake unto them say be good cheer it is i be not afraid 14 28 peter answer him said lord if it be thou bid me come unto thee water 14 29 he said come when peter wa come down ship he walk water go jesu 14 30 but when he saw wind boister he wa afraid begin sink he cri say lord save me 14 31 immedi jesu stretch forth hi hand caught him said unto him o thou littl faith wherefor didst thou doubt 14 32 when they were come ship wind ceas 14 33 then they that were ship came worship him say truth thou art son god 14 34 when they were gone they came land gennesaret 14 35 when men that place had knowledg him they sent all that countri round brought unto him all that were diseas 14 36 besought him that they might onli touch hem hi garment as mani as touch were made perfectli whole 15 1 then came jesu scribe pharise which were jerusalem say 15 2 whi do thi discipl transgress tradit elder they wash not their hand when they eat bread 15 3 but he answer said unto them whi do ye also transgress command god your tradit 15 4 god command say honour thi father mother he that curseth father or mother let him die death 15 5 but ye say whosoev shall say hi father or hi mother it is gift whatsoev thou mightest be profit me 15 6 honour not hi father or hi mother he shall be free thu have ye made command god none effect your tradit 15 7 ye hypocrit well did esaia prophesi you say 15 8 thi peopl draweth nigh unto me their mouth honoureth me their lip but their heart is far me 15 9 but vain they do worship me teach doctrin command men 15 10 he call multitud said unto them hear understand 15 11 not that which goeth mouth defileth man but that which cometh mouth thi defileth man 15 12 then came hi discipl said unto him knowest thou that pharise were offend they heard thi say 15 13 but he answer said everi plant which my heavenli father hath not plant shall be root 15 14 let them alon they be blind leader blind if blind lead blind both shall fall ditch 15 15 then answer peter said unto him declar unto us thi parabl 15 16 jesu said are ye also yet understand 15 17 do not ye yet understand that whatsoev entereth mouth goeth belli is cast draught 15 18 but those thing which proceed mouth come forth heart they defil man 15 19 heart proceed evil thought murder adulteri fornic theft fals wit blasphemi 15 20 these are thing which defil man but eat unwashen hand defileth not man 15 21 then jesu went thenc depart coast tyre sidon 15 22 behold woman canaan came same coast cri unto him say have merci me o lord thou son david my daughter is grievous vex devil 15 23 but he answer her not word hi discipl came besought him say send her away she crieth us 15 24 but he answer said i am not sent but unto lost sheep hous israel 15 25 then came she worship him say lord help me 15 26 but he answer said it is not meet take children s bread cast it dog 15 27 she said truth lord yet dog eat crumb which fall their master tabl 15 28 then jesu answer said unto her o woman great is thi faith be it unto thee even as thou wilt her daughter wa made whole that veri hour 15 29 jesu depart thenc came nigh unto sea galile went mountain sat down there 15 30 great multitud came unto him have them those that were lame blind dumb maim mani other cast them down jesu feet he heal them 15 31 insomuch that multitud wonder when they saw dumb speak maim be whole lame walk blind see they glorifi god israel 15 32 then jesu call hi discipl unto him said i have compass multitud becaus they continu me now three day have noth eat i will not send them away fast lest they faint way 15 33 hi discipl say unto him whenc should we have so much bread wilder as fill so great multitud 15 34 jesu saith unto them how mani loav have ye they said seven few littl fish 15 35 he command multitud sit down ground 15 36 he took seven loav fish gave thank brake them gave hi discipl discipl multitud 15 37 they did all eat were fill they took broken meat that wa left seven basket full 15 38 they that did eat were four thousand men besid women children 15 39 he sent away multitud took ship came coast magdala 16 1 pharise also sadduce came tempt desir him that he would shew them sign heaven 16 2 he answer said unto them when it is even ye say it will be fair weather sky is red 16 3 morn it will be foul weather day sky is red lower o ye hypocrit ye can discern face sky but can ye not discern sign time 16 4 wick adulter gener seeketh sign there shall no sign be given unto it but sign prophet jona he left them depart 16 5 when hi discipl were come other side they had forgotten take bread 16 6 then jesu said unto them take heed bewar leaven pharise sadduce 16 7 they reason themselv say it is becaus we have taken no bread 16 8 which when jesu perceiv he said unto them o ye littl faith whi reason ye yourselv becaus ye have brought no bread 16 9 do ye not yet understand neither rememb five loav five thousand how mani basket ye took 16 10 neither seven loav four thousand how mani basket ye took 16 11 how is it that ye do not understand that i spake it not you concern bread that ye should bewar leaven pharise sadduce 16 12 then understood they how that he bade them not bewar leaven bread but doctrin pharise sadduce 16 13 when jesu came coast caesarea philippi he ask hi discipl say whom do men say that i son man am 16 14 they said some say that thou art john baptist some elia other jeremia or one prophet 16 15 he saith unto them but whom say ye that i am 16 16 simon peter answer said thou art christ son live god 16 17 jesu answer said unto him bless art thou simon barjona flesh blood hath not reveal it unto thee but my father which is heaven 16 18 i say also unto thee that thou art peter thi rock i will build my church gate hell shall not prevail against it 16 19 i will give unto thee key kingdom heaven whatsoev thou shalt bind earth shall be bound heaven whatsoev thou shalt loos earth shall be loos heaven 16 20 then charg he hi discipl that they should tell no man that he wa jesu christ 16 21 that time forth began jesu shew unto hi discipl how that he must go unto jerusalem suffer mani thing elder chief priest scribe be kill be rais again third day 16 22 then peter took him began rebuk him say be it far thee lord thi shall not be unto thee 16 23 but he turn said unto peter get thee behind me satan thou art offenc unto me thou savourest not thing that be god but those that be men 16 24 then said jesu unto hi discipl if ani man will come me let him deni himself take hi cross follow me 16 25 whosoev will save hi life shall lose it whosoev will lose hi life my sake shall find it 16 26 what is man profit if he shall gain whole world lose hi own soul or what shall man give exchang hi soul 16 27 son man shall come glori hi father hi angel then he shall reward everi man accord hi work 16 28 verili i say unto you there be some stand here which shall not tast death till they see son man come hi kingdom 17 1 six day jesu taketh peter jame john hi brother bringeth them high mountain apart 17 2 wa transfigur them hi face did shine as sun hi raiment wa white as light 17 3 behold there appear unto them mose elia talk him 17 4 then answer peter said unto jesu lord it is good us be here if thou wilt let us make here three tabernacl one thee one mose one elia 17 5 while he yet spake behold bright cloud overshadow them behold voic cloud which said thi is my belov son whom i am well pleas hear ye him 17 6 when discipl heard it they fell their face were sore afraid 17 7 jesu came touch them said aris be not afraid 17 8 when they had lift their eye they saw no man save jesu onli 17 9 as they came down mountain jesu charg them say tell vision no man son man be risen again dead 17 10 hi discipl ask him say whi then say scribe that elia must first come 17 11 jesu answer said unto them elia truli shall first come restor all thing 17 12 but i say unto you that elia is come alreadi they knew him not but have done unto him whatsoev they list likewis shall also son man suffer them 17 13 then discipl understood that he spake unto them john baptist 17 14 when they were come multitud there came him certain man kneel down him say 17 15 lord have merci my son he is lunatick sore vex ofttim he falleth fire oft water 17 16 i brought him thi discipl they could not cure him 17 17 then jesu answer said o faithless pervers gener how long shall i be you how long shall i suffer you bring him hither me 17 18 jesu rebuk devil he depart him child wa cure that veri hour 17 19 then came discipl jesu apart said whi could not we cast him 17 20 jesu said unto them becaus your unbelief verili i say unto you if ye have faith as grain mustard seed ye shall say unto thi mountain remov henc yonder place it shall remov noth shall be imposs unto you 17 21 howbeit thi kind goeth not but prayer fast 17 22 while they abod galile jesu said unto them son man shall be betray hand men 17 23 they shall kill him third day he shall be rais again they were exceed sorri 17 24 when they were come capernaum they that receiv tribut money came peter said doth not your master pay tribut 17 25 he saith ye when he wa come hous jesu prevent him say what thinkest thou simon whom do king earth take custom or tribut their own children or stranger 17 26 peter saith unto him stranger jesu saith unto him then are children free 17 27 notwithstand lest we should offend them go thou sea cast hook take fish that first cometh when thou hast open hi mouth thou shalt find piec money that take give unto them me thee 18 1 same time came discipl unto jesu say who is greatest kingdom heaven 18 2 jesu call littl child unto him set him midst them 18 3 said verili i say unto you ye be convert becom as littl children ye shall not enter kingdom heaven 18 4 whosoev therefor shall humbl himself as thi littl child same is greatest kingdom heaven 18 5 whoso shall receiv one such littl child my name receiveth me 18 6 but whoso shall offend one these littl one which believ me it were better him that millston were hang hi neck that he were drown depth sea 18 7 woe unto world becaus offenc it must need be that offenc come but woe that man whom offenc cometh 18 8 wherefor if thi hand or thi foot offend thee cut them off cast them thee it is better thee enter life halt or maim rather than have two hand or two feet be cast everlast fire 18 9 if thine eye offend thee pluck it cast it thee it is better thee enter life one eye rather than have two eye be cast hell fire 18 10 take heed that ye despis not one these littl one i say unto you that heaven their angel do alway behold face my father which is heaven 18 11 son man is come save that which wa lost 18 12 how think ye if man have hundr sheep one them be gone astray doth he not leav nineti nine goeth mountain seeketh that which is gone astray 18 13 if so be that he find it verili i say unto you he rejoiceth more that sheep than nineti nine which went not astray 18 14 even so it is not will your father which is heaven that one these littl one should perish 18 15 moreov if thi brother shall trespass against thee go tell him hi fault thee him alon if he shall hear thee thou hast gain thi brother 18 16 but if he will not hear thee then take thee one or two more that mouth two or three wit everi word may be establish 18 17 if he shall neglect hear them tell it unto church but if he neglect hear church let him be unto thee as heathen man publican 18 18 verili i say unto you whatsoev ye shall bind earth shall be bound heaven whatsoev ye shall loos earth shall be loos heaven 18 19 again i say unto you that if two you shall agre earth as touch ani thing that they shall ask it shall be done them my father which is heaven 18 20 where two or three are gather togeth my name there am i midst them 18 21 then came peter him said lord how oft shall my brother sin against me i forgiv him till seven time 18 22 jesu saith unto him i say not unto thee seven time but seventi time seven 18 23 therefor is kingdom heaven liken unto certain king which would take account hi servant 18 24 when he had begun reckon one wa brought unto him which owe him ten thousand talent 18 25 but forasmuch as he had not pay hi lord command him be sold hi wife children all that he had payment be made 18 26 servant therefor fell down worship him say lord have patienc me i will pay thee all 18 27 then lord that servant wa move compass loos him forgav him debt 18 28 but same servant went found one hi fellowserv which owe him hundr penc he laid hand him took him throat say pay me that thou owest 18 29 hi fellowserv fell down hi feet besought him say have patienc me i will pay thee all 18 30 he would not but went cast him prison till he should pay debt 18 31 so when hi fellowserv saw what wa done they were veri sorri came told unto their lord all that wa done 18 32 then hi lord that he had call him said unto him o thou wick servant i forgav thee all that debt becaus thou desiredst me 18 33 shouldest not thou also have had compass thi fellowserv even as i had piti thee 18 34 hi lord wa wroth deliv him tormentor till he should pay all that wa due unto him 18 35 so likewis shall my heavenli father do also unto you if ye your heart forgiv not everi one hi brother their trespass 19 1 it came pass that when jesu had finish these say he depart galile came coast judaea jordan 19 2 great multitud follow him he heal them there 19 3 pharise also came unto him tempt him say unto him is it law man put away hi wife everi caus 19 4 he answer said unto them have ye not read that he which made them begin made them male femal 19 5 said thi caus shall man leav father mother shall cleav hi wife they twain shall be one flesh 19 6 wherefor they are no more twain but one flesh what therefor god hath join togeth let not man put asund 19 7 they say unto him whi did mose then command give write divorc put her away 19 8 he saith unto them mose becaus hard your heart suffer you put away your wive but begin it wa not so 19 9 i say unto you whosoev shall put away hi wife it be fornic shall marri anoth committeth adulteri whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adulteri 19 10 hi discipl say unto him if case man be so hi wife it is not good marri 19 11 but he said unto them all men cannot receiv thi say save they whom it is given 19 12 there are some eunuch which were so born their mother s womb there are some eunuch which were made eunuch men there be eunuch which have made themselv eunuch kingdom heaven s sake he that is abl receiv it let him receiv it 19 13 then were there brought unto him littl children that he should put hi hand them pray discipl rebuk them 19 14 but jesu said suffer littl children forbid them not come unto me such is kingdom heaven 19 15 he laid hi hand them depart thenc 19 16 behold one came said unto him good master what good thing shall i do that i may have etern life 19 17 he said unto him whi callest thou me good there is none good but one that is god but if thou wilt enter life keep command 19 18 he saith unto him which jesu said thou shalt do no murder thou shalt not commit adulteri thou shalt not steal thou shalt not bear fals wit 19 19 honour thi father thi mother thou shalt love thi neighbour as thyself 19 20 young man saith unto him all these thing have i kept my youth what lack i yet 19 21 jesu said unto him if thou wilt be perfect go sell that thou hast give poor thou shalt have treasur heaven come follow me 19 22 but when young man heard that say he went away sorrow he had great possess 19 23 then said jesu unto hi discipl verili i say unto you that rich man shall hardli enter kingdom heaven 19 24 again i say unto you it is easier camel go eye needl than rich man enter kingdom god 19 25 when hi discipl heard it they were exceedingli amaz say who then can be save 19 26 but jesu beheld them said unto them men thi is imposs but god all thing are possibl 19 27 then answer peter said unto him behold we have forsaken all follow thee what shall we have therefor 19 28 jesu said unto them verili i say unto you that ye which have follow me regener when son man shall sit throne hi glori ye also shall sit twelv throne judg twelv tribe israel 19 29 everi one that hath forsaken hous or brethren or sister or father or mother or wife or children or land my name s sake shall receiv hundredfold shall inherit everlast life 19 30 but mani that are first shall be last last shall be first 20 1 kingdom heaven is like unto man that is household which went earli morn hire labour hi vineyard 20 2 when he had agre labour penni day he sent them hi vineyard 20 3 he went third hour saw other stand idl marketplac 20 4 said unto them go ye also vineyard whatsoev is right i will give you they went their way 20 5 again he went sixth ninth hour did likewis 20 6 eleventh hour he went found other stand idl saith unto them whi stand ye here all day idl 20 7 they say unto him becaus no man hath hire us he saith unto them go ye also vineyard whatsoev is right that shall ye receiv 20 8 so when even wa come lord vineyard saith unto hi steward call labour give them their hire begin last unto first 20 9 when they came that were hire eleventh hour they receiv everi man penni 20 10 but when first came they suppos that they should have receiv more they likewis receiv everi man penni 20 11 when they had receiv it they murmur against goodman hous 20 12 say these last have wrought but one hour thou hast made them equal unto us which have born burden heat day 20 13 but he answer one them said friend i do thee no wrong didst not thou agre me penni 20 14 take that thine is go thi way i will give unto thi last even as unto thee 20 15 is it not law me do what i will mine own is thine eye evil becaus i am good 20 16 so last shall be first first last mani be call but few chosen 20 17 jesu go jerusalem took twelv discipl apart way said unto them 20 18 behold we go jerusalem son man shall be betray unto chief priest unto scribe they shall condemn him death 20 19 shall deliv him gentil mock scourg crucifi him third day he shall rise again 20 20 then came him mother zebede children her son worship him desir certain thing him 20 21 he said unto her what wilt thou she saith unto him grant that these my two son may sit one thi right hand other left thi kingdom 20 22 but jesu answer said ye know not what ye ask are ye abl drink cup that i shall drink be baptiz baptism that i am baptiz they say unto him we are abl 20 23 he saith unto them ye shall drink inde my cup be baptiz baptism that i am baptiz but sit my right hand my left is not mine give but it shall be given them whom it is prepar my father 20 24 when ten heard it they were move indign against two brethren 20 25 but jesu call them unto him said ye know that princ gentil exercis dominion them they that are great exercis author them 20 26 but it shall not be so you but whosoev will be great you let him be your minist 20 27 whosoev will be chief you let him be your servant 20 28 even as son man came not be minist unto but minist give hi life ransom mani 20 29 as they depart jericho great multitud follow him 20 30 behold two blind men sit way side when they heard that jesu pass cri say have merci us o lord thou son david 20 31 multitud rebuk them becaus they should hold their peac but they cri more say have merci us o lord thou son david 20 32 jesu stood still call them said what will ye that i shall do unto you 20 33 they say unto him lord that our eye may be open 20 34 so jesu had compass them touch their eye immedi their eye receiv sight they follow him 21 1 when they drew nigh unto jerusalem were come bethphag unto mount oliv then sent jesu two discipl 21 2 say unto them go villag against you straightway ye shall find ass tie colt her loos them bring them unto me 21 3 if ani man say ought unto you ye shall say lord hath need them straightway he will send them 21 4 all thi wa done that it might be fulfil which wa spoken prophet say 21 5 tell ye daughter sion behold thi king cometh unto thee meek sit ass colt foal ass 21 6 discipl went did as jesu command them 21 7 brought ass colt put them their cloth they set him thereon 21 8 veri great multitud spread their garment way other cut down branch tree straw them way 21 9 multitud that went that follow cri say hosanna son david bless is he that cometh name lord hosanna highest 21 10 when he wa come jerusalem all citi wa move say who is thi 21 11 multitud said thi is jesu prophet nazareth galile 21 12 jesu went templ god cast all them that sold bought templ overthrew tabl moneychang seat them that sold dove 21 13 said unto them it is written my hous shall be call hous prayer but ye have made it den thiev 21 14 blind lame came him templ he heal them 21 15 when chief priest scribe saw wonder thing that he did children cri templ say hosanna son david they were sore displeas 21 16 said unto him hearest thou what these say jesu saith unto them yea have ye never read mouth babe suckl thou hast perfect prais 21 17 he left them went citi bethani he lodg there 21 18 now morn as he return citi he hunger 21 19 when he saw fig tree way he came it found noth thereon but leav onli said unto it let no fruit grow thee henceforward ever present fig tree wither away 21 20 when discipl saw it they marvel say how soon is fig tree wither away 21 21 jesu answer said unto them verili i say unto you if ye have faith doubt not ye shall not onli do thi which is done fig tree but also if ye shall say unto thi mountain be thou remov be thou cast sea it shall be done 21 22 all thing whatsoev ye shall ask prayer believ ye shall receiv 21 23 when he wa come templ chief priest elder peopl came unto him as he wa teach said what author doest thou these thing who gave thee thi author 21 24 jesu answer said unto them i also will ask you one thing which if ye tell me i like wise will tell you what author i do these thing 21 25 baptism john whenc wa it heaven or men they reason themselv say if we shall say heaven he will say unto us whi did ye not then believ him 21 26 but if we shall say men we fear peopl all hold john as prophet 21 27 they answer jesu said we cannot tell he said unto them neither tell i you what author i do these thing 21 28 but what think ye certain man had two son he came first said son go work day my vineyard 21 29 he answer said i will not but afterward he repent went 21 30 he came second said likewis he answer said i go sir went not 21 31 them twain did will hi father they say unto him first jesu saith unto them verili i say unto you that publican harlot go kingdom god you 21 32 john came unto you way righteous ye believ him not but publican harlot believ him ye when ye had seen it repent not afterward that ye might believ him 21 33 hear anoth parabl there wa certain household which plant vineyard hedg it round dig winepress it built tower let it husbandmen went far countri 21 34 when time fruit drew near he sent hi servant husbandmen that they might receiv fruit it 21 35 husbandmen took hi servant beat one kill anoth stone anoth 21 36 again he sent other servant more than first they did unto them likewis 21 37 but last all he sent unto them hi son say they will rever my son 21 38 but when husbandmen saw son they said themselv thi is heir come let us kill him let us seiz hi inherit 21 39 they caught him cast him vineyard slew him 21 40 when lord therefor vineyard cometh what will he do unto those husbandmen 21 41 they say unto him he will miser destroy those wick men will let hi vineyard unto other husbandmen which shall render him fruit their season 21 42 jesu saith unto them did ye never read scriptur stone which builder reject same is becom head corner thi is lord s do it is marvel our eye 21 43 therefor say i unto you kingdom god shall be taken you given nation bring forth fruit thereof 21 44 whosoev shall fall thi stone shall be broken but whomsoev it shall fall it will grind him powder 21 45 when chief priest pharise had heard hi parabl they perceiv that he spake them 21 46 but when they sought lay hand him they fear multitud becaus they took him prophet 22 1 jesu answer spake unto them again parabl said 22 2 kingdom heaven is like unto certain king which made marriag hi son 22 3 sent forth hi servant call them that were bidden wed they would not come 22 4 again he sent forth other servant say tell them which are bidden behold i have prepar my dinner my oxen my fatl are kill all thing are readi come unto marriag 22 5 but they made light it went their way one hi farm anoth hi merchandis 22 6 remnant took hi servant entreat them spite slew them 22 7 but when king heard thereof he wa wroth he sent forth hi armi destroy those murder burn their citi 22 8 then saith he hi servant wed is readi but they which were bidden were not worthi 22 9 go ye therefor highway as mani as ye shall find bid marriag 22 10 so those servant went highway gather togeth all as mani as they found both bad good wed wa furnish guest 22 11 when king came see guest he saw there man which had not wed garment 22 12 he saith unto him friend how camest thou hither not have wed garment he wa speechless 22 13 then said king servant bind him hand foot take him away cast him outer dark there shall be weep gnash teeth 22 14 mani are call but few are chosen 22 15 then went pharise took counsel how they might entangl him hi talk 22 16 they sent unto him their discipl herodian say master we know that thou art true teachest way god truth neither carest thou ani man thou regardest not person men 22 17 tell us therefor what thinkest thou is it law give tribut unto caesar or not 22 18 but jesu perceiv their wicked said whi tempt ye me ye hypocrit 22 19 shew me tribut money they brought unto him penni 22 20 he saith unto them whose is thi imag superscript 22 21 they say unto him caesar s then saith he unto them render therefor unto caesar thing which are caesar s unto god thing that are god s 22 22 when they had heard these word they marvel left him went their way 22 23 same day came him sadduce which say that there is no resurrect ask him 22 24 say master mose said if man die have no children hi brother shall marri hi wife rais seed unto hi brother 22 25 now there were us seven brethren first when he had marri wife deceas have no issu left hi wife unto hi brother 22 26 likewis second also third unto seventh 22 27 last all woman die also 22 28 therefor resurrect whose wife shall she be seven they all had her 22 29 jesu answer said unto them ye do err not know scriptur nor power god 22 30 resurrect they neither marri nor are given marriag but are as angel god heaven 22 31 but as touch resurrect dead have ye not read that which wa spoken unto you god say 22 32 i am god abraham god isaac god jacob god is not god dead but live 22 33 when multitud heard thi they were astonish hi doctrin 22 34 but when pharise had heard that he had put sadduce silenc they were gather togeth 22 35 then one them which wa lawyer ask him question tempt him say 22 36 master which is great command law 22 37 jesu said unto him thou shalt love lord thi god all thi heart all thi soul all thi mind 22 38 thi is first great command 22 39 second is like unto it thou shalt love thi neighbour as thyself 22 40 these two command hang all law prophet 22 41 while pharise were gather togeth jesu ask them 22 42 say what think ye christ whose son is he they say unto him son david 22 43 he saith unto them how then doth david spirit call him lord say 22 44 lord said unto my lord sit thou my right hand till i make thine enemi thi footstool 22 45 if david then call him lord how is he hi son 22 46 no man wa abl answer him word neither durst ani man that day forth ask him ani more question 23 1 then spake jesu multitud hi discipl 23 2 say scribe pharise sit mose seat 23 3 all therefor whatsoev they bid you observ that observ do but do not ye their work they say do not 23 4 they bind heavi burden grievou be born lay them men s shoulder but they themselv will not move them one their finger 23 5 but all their work they do be seen men they make broad their phylacteri enlarg border their garment 23 6 love uppermost room feast chief seat synagogu 23 7 greet market be call men rabbi rabbi 23 8 but be not ye call rabbi one is your master even christ all ye are brethren 23 9 call no man your father earth one is your father which is heaven 23 10 neither be ye call master one is your master even christ 23 11 but he that is greatest you shall be your servant 23 12 whosoev shall exalt himself shall be abas he that shall humbl himself shall be exalt 23 13 but woe unto you scribe pharise hypocrit ye shut kingdom heaven against men ye neither go yourselv neither suffer ye them that are enter go 23 14 woe unto you scribe pharise hypocrit ye devour widow hous pretenc make long prayer therefor ye shall receiv greater damnat 23 15 woe unto you scribe pharise hypocrit ye compass sea land make one proselyt when he is made ye make him twofold more child hell than yourselv 23 16 woe unto you ye blind guid which say whosoev shall swear templ it is noth but whosoev shall swear gold templ he is debtor 23 17 ye fool blind is greater gold or templ that sanctifieth gold 23 18 whosoev shall swear altar it is noth but whosoev sweareth gift that is it he is guilti 23 19 ye fool blind is greater gift or altar that sanctifieth gift 23 20 whoso therefor shall swear altar sweareth it all thing thereon 23 21 whoso shall swear templ sweareth it him that dwelleth therein 23 22 he that shall swear heaven sweareth throne god him that sitteth thereon 23 23 woe unto you scribe pharise hypocrit ye pay tith mint anis cummin have omit weightier matter law judgment merci faith these ought ye have done not leav other undon 23 24 ye blind guid which strain gnat swallow camel 23 25 woe unto you scribe pharise hypocrit ye make clean outsid cup platter but they are full extort excess 23 26 thou blind pharise cleans first that which is cup platter that outsid them may be clean also 23 27 woe unto you scribe pharise hypocrit ye are like unto white sepulchr which inde appear beauti outward but are full dead men s bone all unclean 23 28 even so ye also outwardli appear righteou unto men but ye are full hypocrisi iniqu 23 29 woe unto you scribe pharise hypocrit becaus ye build tomb prophet garnish sepulchr righteou 23 30 say if we had been day our father we would not have been partak them blood prophet 23 31 wherefor ye be wit unto yourselv that ye are children them which kill prophet 23 32 fill ye then measur your father 23 33 ye serpent ye gener viper how can ye escap damnat hell 23 34 wherefor behold i send unto you prophet wise men scribe some them ye shall kill crucifi some lord 24 1 jesu went depart templ hi discipl came him shew him build templ 24 2 jesu said unto them see ye not all these thing verili i say unto you there shall not be left here one stone anoth that shall not be thrown down 24 3 as he sat mount oliv discipl came unto him privat say tell us when shall these thing be what shall be sign thi come end world 24 4 jesu answer said unto them take heed that no man deceiv you 24 5 mani shall come my name say i am christ shall deceiv mani 24 6 ye shall hear war rumour war see that ye be not troubl all these thing must come pass but end is not yet 24 7 nation shall rise against nation kingdom against kingdom there shall be famin pestil earthquak diver place 24 8 all these are begin sorrow 24 9 then shall they deliv you be afflict shall kill you ye shall be hate all nation my name s sake 24 10 then shall mani be offend shall betray one anoth shall hate one anoth 24 11 mani fals prophet shall rise shall deceiv mani 24 12 becaus iniqu shall abound love mani shall wax cold 24 13 but he that shall endur unto end same shall be save 24 14 thi gospel kingdom shall be preach all world wit unto all nation then shall end come 24 15 when ye therefor shall see abomin desol spoken daniel prophet stand holi place whoso readeth let him understand 24 16 then let them which be judaea flee mountain 24 17 let him which is housetop not come down take ani thing hi hous 24 18 neither let him which is field return back take hi cloth 24 19 woe unto them that are child them that give suck those day 24 20 but pray ye that your flight be not winter neither be shorten 24 23 then if ani man shall say unto you lo here is christ or there believ it not 24 24 there shall aris fals christ fals prophet shall shew great sign wonder insomuch that if it were possibl they shall deceiv veri elect 24 25 behold i have told you 24 26 wherefor if they shall say unto you behold he is desert go not forth behold he is secret chamber believ it not 24 27 as lightn cometh east shineth even unto west so shall also come son man be 24 28 wheresoev carcas is there will eagl be gather togeth 24 29 immedi tribul those day shall sun be darken moon shall not give her
