earth shall pass away but my word shall not pass away 24 36 but that day hour knoweth no man no not angel heaven but my father onli 24 37 but as day noe were so shall also come son man be 24 38 as day that were flood they were eat drink marri give marriag day that noe enter ark 24 39 knew not flood came took them all away so shall also come son man be 24 40 then shall two be field one shall be taken other left 24 41 two women shall be grind mill one shall be taken other left 24 42 watch therefor ye know not what hour your lord doth come 24 43 but know thi that if goodman hous had known what watch thief would come he would have watch would not have suffer hi hous be broken 24 44 therefor be ye also readi such hour as ye think not son man cometh 24 45 who then is faith wise servant whom hi lord hath made ruler hi household give them meat due season 24 46 bless is that servant whom hi lord when he cometh shall find so do 24 47 verili i say unto you that he shall make him ruler all hi good 24 48 but if that evil servant shall say hi heart my lord delayeth hi come 24 49 shall begin smite hi fellowserv eat drink drunken 24 50 lord that servant shall come day when he looketh not him hour that he is not awar 24 51 shall cut him asund appoint him hi portion hypocrit there shall be weep gnash teeth 25 1 then shall kingdom heaven be liken unto ten virgin which took their lamp went forth meet bridegroom 25 2 five them were wise five were foolish 25 3 they that were foolish took their lamp took no oil them 25 4 but wise took oil their vessel their lamp 25 5 while bridegroom tarri they all slumber slept 25 6 midnight there wa cri made behold bridegroom cometh go ye meet him 25 7 then all those virgin aros trim their lamp 25 8 foolish said unto wise give us your oil our lamp are gone 25 9 but wise answer say not so lest there be not enough us you but go ye rather them that sell buy yourselv 25 10 while they went buy bridegroom came they that were readi went him marriag door wa shut 25 11 afterward came also other virgin say lord lord open us 25 12 but he answer said verili i say unto you i know you not 25 13 watch therefor ye know neither day nor hour wherein son man cometh 25 14 kingdom heaven is as man travel far countri who call hi own servant deliv unto them hi good 25 15 unto one he gave five talent anoth two anoth one everi man accord hi sever abil straightway took hi journey 25 16 then he that had receiv five talent went trade same made them other five talent 25 17 likewis he that had receiv two he also gain other two 25 18 but he that had receiv one went dig earth hid hi lord s money 25 19 long time lord those servant cometh reckoneth them 25 20 so he that had receiv five talent came brought other five talent say lord thou deliveredst unto me five talent behold i have gain besid them five talent more 25 21 hi lord said unto him well done thou good faith servant thou hast been faith few thing i will make thee ruler mani thing enter thou joy thi lord 25 22 he also that had receiv two talent came said lord thou deliveredst unto me two talent behold i have gain two other talent besid them 25 23 hi lord said unto him well done good faith servant thou hast been faith few thing i will make thee ruler mani thing enter thou joy thi lord 25 24 then he which had receiv one talent came said lord i knew thee that thou art hard man reap where thou hast not sown gather where thou hast not straw 25 25 i wa afraid went hid thi talent earth lo there thou hast that is thine 25 26 hi lord answer said unto him thou wick sloth servant thou knewest that i reap where i sow not gather where i have not straw 25 27 thou oughtest therefor have put my money exchang then my come i should have receiv mine own usuri 25 28 take therefor talent him give it unto him which hath ten talent 25 29 unto everi one that hath shall be given he shall have abund but him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath 25 30 cast ye unprofit servant outer dark there shall be weep gnash teeth 25 31 when son man shall come hi glori all holi angel him then shall he sit throne hi glori 25 32 him shall be gather all nation he shall separ them one anoth as shepherd divideth hi sheep goat 25 33 he shall set sheep hi right hand but goat left 25 34 then shall king say unto them hi right hand come ye bless my father inherit kingdom prepar you foundat world 25 35 i wa hungr ye gave me meat i wa thirsti ye gave me drink i wa stranger ye took me 25 36 nake ye cloth me i wa sick ye visit me i wa prison ye came unto me 25 37 then shall righteou answer him say lord when saw we thee hungr fed thee or thirsti gave thee drink 25 38 when saw we thee stranger took thee or nake cloth thee 25 39 or when saw we thee sick or prison came unto thee 25 40 king shall answer say unto them verili i say unto you inasmuch as ye have done it unto one least these my brethren ye have done it unto me 25 41 then shall he say also unto them left hand depart me ye curs everlast fire prepar devil hi angel 25 42 i wa hungr ye gave me no meat i wa thirsti ye gave me no drink 25 43 i wa stranger ye took me not nake ye cloth me not sick prison ye visit me not 25 44 then shall they also answer him say lord when saw we thee hungr or athirst or stranger or nake or sick or prison did not minist unto thee 25 45 then shall he answer them say verili i say unto you inasmuch as ye did it not one least these ye did it not me 25 46 these shall go away everlast punish but righteou life etern 26 1 it came pass when jesu had finish all these say he said unto hi discipl 26 2 ye know that two day is feast passov son man is betray be crucifi 26 3 then assembl togeth chief priest scribe elder peopl unto palac high priest who wa call caiapha 26 4 consult that they might take jesu subtilti kill him 26 5 but they said not feast day lest there be uproar peopl 26 6 now when jesu wa bethani hous simon leper 26 7 there came unto him woman have alabast box veri preciou ointment pour it hi head as he sat meat 26 8 but when hi discipl saw it they had indign say what purpos is thi wast 26 9 thi ointment might have been sold much given poor 26 10 when jesu understood it he said unto them whi troubl ye woman she hath wrought good work me 26 11 ye have poor alway you but me ye have not alway 26 12 that she hath pour thi ointment my bodi she did it my burial 26 13 verili i say unto you wheresoev thi gospel shall be preach whole world there shall also thi that thi woman hath done be told memori her 26 14 then one twelv call juda iscariot went unto chief priest 26 15 said unto them what will ye give me i will deliv him unto you they coven him thirti piec silver 26 16 that time he sought opportun betray him 26 17 now first day feast unleaven bread discipl came jesu say unto him where wilt thou that we prepar thee eat passov 26 18 he said go citi such man say unto him master saith my time is hand i will keep passov thi hous my discipl 26 19 discipl did as jesu had appoint them they made readi passov 26 20 now when even wa come he sat down twelv 26 21 as they did eat he said verili i say unto you that one you shall betray me 26 22 they were exceed sorrow began everi one them say unto him lord is it i 26 23 he answer said he that dippeth hi hand me dish same shall betray me 26 24 son man goeth as it is written him but woe unto that man whom son man is betray it had been good that man if he had not been born 26 25 then juda which betray him answer said master is it i he said unto him thou hast said 26 26 as they were eat jesu took bread bless it brake it gave it discipl said take eat thi is my bodi 26 27 he took cup gave thank gave it them say drink ye all it 26 28 thi is my blood new testament which is shed mani remiss sin 26 29 but i say unto you i will not drink henceforth thi fruit vine that day when i drink it new you my father s kingdom 26 30 when they had sung hymn they went mount oliv 26 31 then saith jesu unto them all ye shall be offend becaus me thi night it is written i will smite shepherd sheep flock shall be scatter abroad 26 32 but i am risen again i will go you galile 26 33 peter answer said unto him though all men shall be offend becaus thee yet will i never be offend 26 34 jesu said unto him verili i say unto thee that thi night cock crow thou shalt deni me thrice 26 35 peter said unto him though i should die thee yet will i not deni thee likewis also said all discipl 26 36 then cometh jesu them unto place call gethseman saith unto discipl sit ye here while i go pray yonder 26 37 he took him peter two son zebede began be sorrow veri heavi 26 38 then saith he unto them my soul is exceed sorrow even unto death tarri ye here watch me 26 39 he went littl farther fell hi face pray say o my father if it be possibl let thi cup pass me nevertheless not as i will but as thou wilt 26 40 he cometh unto discipl findeth them asleep saith unto peter what could ye not watch me one hour 26 41 watch pray that ye enter not temptat spirit inde is will but flesh is weak 26 42 he went away again second time pray say o my father if thi cup may not pass away me i drink it thi will be done 26 43 he came found them asleep again their eye were heavi 26 44 he left them went away again pray third time say same word 26 45 then cometh he hi discipl saith unto them sleep now take your rest behold hour is hand son man is betray hand sinner 26 46 rise let us be go behold he is hand that doth betray me 26 47 while he yet spake lo juda one twelv came him great multitud sword stave chief priest elder peopl 26 48 now he that betray him gave them sign say whomsoev i shall kiss that same is he hold him fast 26 49 forthwith he came jesu said hail master kiss him 26 50 jesu said unto him friend wherefor art thou come then came they laid hand jesu took him 26 51 behold one them which were jesu stretch hi hand drew hi sword struck servant high priest s smote off hi ear 26 52 then said jesu unto him put again thi sword hi place all they that take sword shall perish sword 26 53 thinkest thou that i cannot now pray my father he shall present give me more than twelv legion angel 26 54 but how then shall scriptur be fulfil that thu it must be 26 55 that same hour said jesu multitud are ye come as against thief sword stave take me i sat daili you teach templ ye laid no hold me 26 56 but all thi wa done that scriptur prophet might be fulfil then all discipl forsook him fled 26 57 they that had laid hold jesu led him away caiapha high priest where scribe elder were assembl 26 58 but peter follow him afar off unto high priest s palac went sat servant see end 26 59 now chief priest elder all council sought fals wit against jesu put him death 26 60 but found none yea though mani fals wit came yet found they none last came two fals wit 26 61 said thi fellow said i am abl destroy templ god build it three day 26 62 high priest aros said unto him answerest thou noth what is it which these wit against thee 26 63 but jesu held hi peac high priest answer said unto him i adjur thee live god that thou tell us thou be christ son god 26 64 jesu saith unto him thou hast said nevertheless i say unto you hereaft shall ye see son man sit right hand power come cloud heaven 26 65 then high priest rent hi cloth say he hath spoken blasphemi what further need have we wit behold now ye have heard hi blasphemi 26 66 what think ye they answer said he is guilti death 26 67 then did they spit hi face buffet him other smote him palm their hand 26 68 say prophesi unto us thou christ who is he that smote thee 26 69 now peter sat palac damsel came unto him say thou also wast jesu galile 26 70 but he deni them all say i know not what thou sayest 26 71 when he wa gone porch anoth maid saw him said unto them that were there thi fellow wa also jesu nazareth 26 72 again he deni oath i do not know man 26 73 while came unto him they that stood said peter sure thou also art one them thi speech bewrayeth thee 26 74 then began he curs swear say i know not man immedi cock crew 26 75 peter rememb word jesu which said unto him cock crow thou shalt deni me thrice he went wept bitterli 27 1 when morn wa come all chief priest elder peopl took counsel against jesu put him death 27 2 when they had bound him they led him away deliv him pontiu pilat governor 27 3 then juda which had betray him when he saw that he wa condemn repent himself brought again thirti piec silver chief priest elder 27 4 say i have sin that i have betray innoc blood they said what is that us see thou that 27 5 he cast down piec silver templ depart went hang himself 27 6 chief priest took silver piec said it is not law put them treasuri becaus it is price blood 27 7 they took counsel bought them potter s field buri stranger 27 8 wherefor that field wa call field blood unto thi day 27 9 then wa fulfil that which wa spoken jeremi prophet say they took thirti piec silver price him that wa valu whom they children israel did valu 27 10 gave them potter s field as lord appoint me 27 11 jesu stood governor governor ask him say art thou king jew jesu said unto him thou sayest 27 12 when he wa accus chief priest elder he answer noth 27 13 then said pilat unto him hearest thou not how mani thing they wit against thee 27 14 he answer him never word insomuch that governor marvel greatli 27 15 now that feast governor wa wont releas unto peopl prison whom they would 27 16 they had then notabl prison call barabba 27 17 therefor when they were gather togeth pilat said unto them whom will ye that i releas unto you barabba or jesu which is call christ 27 18 he knew that envi they had deliv him 27 19 when he wa set down judgment seat hi wife sent unto him say have thou noth do that just man i have suffer mani thing thi day dream becaus him 27 20 but chief priest elder persuad multitud that they should ask barabba destroy jesu 27 21 governor answer said unto them twain will ye that i releas unto you they said barabba 27 22 pilat saith unto them what shall i do then jesu which is call christ they all say unto him let him be crucifi 27 23 governor said whi what evil hath he done but they cri more say let him be crucifi 27 24 when pilat saw that he could prevail noth but that rather tumult wa made he took water wash hi hand multitud say i am innoc blood thi just person see ye it 27 25 then answer all peopl said hi blood be us our children 27 26 then releas he barabba unto them when he had scourg jesu he deliv him be crucifi 27 27 then soldier governor took jesu common hall gather unto him whole band soldier 27 28 they strip him put him scarlet robe 27 29 when they had plat crown thorn they put it hi head reed hi right hand they bow knee him mock him say hail king jew 27 30 they spit him took reed smote him head 27 31 that they had mock him they took robe off him put hi own raiment him led him away crucifi him 27 32 as they came they found man cyren simon name him they compel bear hi cross 27 33 when they were come unto place call golgotha that is say place skull 27 34 they gave him vinegar drink mingl gall when he had tast thereof he would not drink 27 35 they crucifi him part hi garment cast lot that it might be fulfil which wa spoken prophet they part my garment them my vestur did they cast lot 27 36 sit down they watch him there 27 37 set hi head hi accus written thi is jesu king jew 27 38 then were there two thiev crucifi him one right hand anoth left 27 39 they that pass revil him wag their head 27 40 say thou that destroyest templ buildest it three day save thyself if thou be son god come down cross 27 41 likewis also chief priest mock him scribe elder said 27 42 he save other himself he cannot save if he be king israel let him now come down cross we will believ him 27 43 he trust god let him deliv him now if he will have him he said i am son god 27 44 thiev also which were crucifi him cast same hi teeth 27 45 now sixth hour there wa dark all land unto ninth hour 27 46 ninth hour jesu cri loud voic say eli eli lama sabachthani that is say my god my god whi hast thou forsaken me 27 47 some them that stood there when they heard that said thi man calleth elia 27 48 straightway one them ran took spung fill it vinegar put it reed gave him drink 27 49 rest said let be let us see elia will come save him 27 50 jesu when he had cri again loud voic yield ghost 27 51 behold veil templ wa rent twain top bottom earth did quak rock rent 27 52 grave were open mani bodi saint which slept aros 27 53 came grave hi resurrect went holi citi appear unto mani 27 54 now when centurion they that were him watch jesu saw earthquak those thing that were done they fear greatli say truli thi wa son god 27 55 mani women were there behold afar off which follow jesu galile minist unto him 27 56 which wa mari magdalen mari mother jame jose mother zebede children 27 57 when even wa come there came rich man arimathaea name joseph who also himself wa jesu discipl 27 58 he went pilat beg bodi jesu then pilat command bodi be deliv 27 59 when joseph had taken bodi he wrap it clean linen cloth 27 60 laid it hi own new tomb which he had hewn rock he roll great stone door sepulchr depart 27 61 there wa mari magdalen other mari sit against sepulchr 27 62 now next day that follow day prepar chief priest pharise came togeth unto pilat 27 63 say sir we rememb that that deceiv said while he wa yet aliv three day i will rise again 27 64 command therefor that sepulchr be made sure third day lest hi discipl come night steal him away say unto peopl he is risen dead so last error shall be wors than first 27 65 pilat said unto them ye have watch go your way make it as sure as ye can 27 66 so they went made sepulchr sure seal stone set watch 28 1 end sabbath as it began dawn first day week came mari magdalen other mari see sepulchr 28 2 behold there wa great earthquak angel lord descend heaven came roll back stone door sat it 28 3 hi counten wa like lightn hi raiment white as snow 28 4 fear him keeper did shake becam as dead men 28 5 angel answer said unto women fear not ye i know that ye seek jesu which wa crucifi 28 6 he is not here he is risen as he said come see place where lord lay 28 7 go quickli tell hi discipl that he is risen dead behold he goeth you galile there shall ye see him lo i have told you 28 8 they depart quickli sepulchr fear great joy did run bring hi discipl word 28 9 as they went tell hi discipl behold jesu met them say all hail they came held him feet worship him 28 10 then said jesu unto them be not afraid go tell my brethren that they go galile there shall they see me 28 11 now when they were go behold some watch came citi shew unto chief priest all thing that were done 28 12 when they were assembl elder had taken counsel they gave larg money unto soldier 28 13 say say ye hi discipl came night stole him away while we slept 28 14 if thi come governor s ear we will persuad him secur you 28 15 so they took money did as they were taught thi say is commonli report jew thi day 28 16 then eleven discipl went away galile mountain where jesu had appoint them 28 17 when they saw him they worship him but some doubt 28 18 jesu came spake unto them say all power is given unto me heaven earth 28 19 go ye therefor teach all nation baptiz them name father son holi ghost 28 20 teach them observ all thing whatsoev i have command you lo i am you alway even unto end world amen gospel accord saint mark 1 1 begin gospel jesu christ son god 1 2 as it is written prophet behold i send my messeng thi face which shall prepar thi way thee 1 3 voic one cri wilder prepar ye way lord make hi path straight 1 4 john did baptiz wilder preach baptism repent remiss sin 1 5 there went unto him all land judaea they jerusalem were all baptiz him river jordan confess their sin 1 6 john wa cloth camel s hair girdl skin hi loin he did eat locust wild honey 1 7 preach say there cometh one mightier than i me latchet whose shoe i am not worthi stoop down unloos 1 8 i inde have baptiz you water but he shall baptiz you holi ghost 1 9 it came pass those day that jesu came nazareth galile wa baptiz john jordan 1 10 straightway come water he saw heaven open spirit like dove descend him 1 11 there came voic heaven say thou art my belov son whom i am well pleas 1 12 immedi spirit driveth him wilder 1 13 he wa there wilder forti day tempt satan wa wild beast angel minist unto him 1 14 now that john wa put prison jesu came galile preach gospel kingdom god 1 15 say time is fulfil kingdom god is hand repent ye believ gospel 1 16 now as he walk sea galile he saw simon andrew hi brother cast net sea they were fisher 1 17 jesu said unto them come ye me i will make you becom fisher men 1 18 straightway they forsook their net follow him 1 19 when he had gone littl farther thenc he saw jame son zebede john hi brother who also were ship mend their net 1 20 straightway he call them they left their father zebede ship hire servant went him 1 21 they went capernaum straightway sabbath day he enter synagogu taught 1 22 they were astonish hi doctrin he taught them as one that had author not as scribe 1 23 there wa their synagogu man unclean spirit he cri 1 24 say let us alon what have we do thee thou jesu nazareth art thou come destroy us i know thee who thou art holi one god 1 25 jesu rebuk him say hold thi peac come him 1 26 when unclean spirit had torn him cri loud voic he came him 1 27 they were all amaz insomuch that they question themselv say what thing is thi what new doctrin is thi author commandeth he even unclean spirit they do obey him 1 28 immedi hi fame spread abroad all region round galile 1 29 forthwith when they were come synagogu they enter hous simon andrew jame john 1 30 but simon s wife s mother lay sick fever anon they tell him her 1 31 he came took her hand lift her immedi fever left her she minist unto them 1 32 even when sun did set they brought unto him all that were diseas them that were possess devil 1 33 all citi wa gather togeth door 1 34 he heal mani that were sick diver diseas cast mani devil suffer not devil speak becaus they knew him 1 35 morn rise great while day he went depart solitari place there pray 1 36 simon they that were him follow him 1 37 when they had found him they said unto him all men seek thee 1 38 he said unto them let us go next town that i may preach there also therefor came i forth 1 39 he preach their synagogu all galile cast devil 1 40 there came leper him beseech him kneel down him say unto him if thou wilt thou canst make me clean 1 41 jesu move compass put forth hi hand touch him saith unto him i will be thou clean 1 42 as soon as he had spoken immedi leprosi depart him he wa cleans 1 43 he straitli charg him forthwith sent him away 1 44 saith unto him see thou say noth ani man but go thi way shew thyself priest offer thi cleans those thing which mose command testimoni unto them 1 45 but he went began publish it much blaze abroad matter insomuch that jesu could no more openli enter citi but wa desert place they came him everi quarter 2 1 again he enter capernaum some day it wa nois that he wa hous 2 2 straightway mani were gather togeth insomuch that there wa no room receiv them no not so much as door he preach word unto them 2 3 they come unto him bring one sick palsi which wa born four 2 4 when they could not come nigh unto him press they uncov roof where he wa when they had broken it they let down bed wherein sick palsi lay 2 5 when jesu saw their faith he said unto sick palsi son thi sin be forgiven thee 2 6 but there wa certain scribe sit there reason their heart 2 7 whi doth thi man thu speak blasphemi who can forgiv sin but god onli 2 8 immedi when jesu perceiv hi spirit that they so reason themselv he said unto them whi reason ye these thing your heart 2 9 is it easier say sick palsi thi sin be forgiven thee or say aris take thi bed walk 2 10 but that ye may know that son man hath power earth forgiv sin he saith sick palsi 2 11 i say unto thee aris take thi bed go thi way thine hous 2 12 immedi he aros took bed went forth them all insomuch that they were all amaz glorifi god say we never saw it thi fashion 2 13 he went forth again sea side all multitud resort unto him he taught them 2 14 as he pass he saw levi son alphaeu sit receipt custom said unto him follow me he aros follow him 2 15 it came pass that as jesu sat meat hi hous mani publican sinner sat also togeth jesu hi discipl there were mani they follow him 2 16 when scribe pharise saw him eat publican sinner they said unto hi discipl how is it that he eateth drinketh publican sinner 2 17 when jesu heard it he saith unto them they that are whole have no need physician but they that are sick i came not call righteou but sinner repent 2 18 discipl john pharise use fast they come say unto him whi do discipl john pharise fast but thi discipl fast not 2 19 jesu said unto them can children bridechamb fast while bridegroom is them as long as they have bridegroom them they cannot fast 2 20 but day will come when bridegroom shall be taken away them then shall they fast those day 2 21 no man also seweth piec new cloth old garment els new piec that fill it taketh away old rent is made wors 2 22 no man putteth new wine old bottl els new wine doth burst bottl wine is spill bottl will be mar but new wine must be put new bottl 2 23 it came pass that he went corn field sabbath day hi discipl began as they went pluck ear corn 2 24 pharise said unto him behold whi do they sabbath day that which is not law 2 25 he said unto them have ye never read what david did when he had need wa hungr he they that were him 2 26 how he went hous god day abiathar high priest did eat shewbread which is not law eat but priest gave also them which were him 2 27 he said unto them sabbath wa made man not man sabbath 2 28 therefor son man is lord also sabbath 3 1 he enter again synagogu there wa man there which had wither hand 3 2 they watch him he would heal him sabbath day that they might accus him 3 3 he saith unto man which had wither hand stand forth 3 4 he saith unto them is it law do good sabbath day or do evil save life or kill but they held their peac 3 5 when he had look round them anger be griev hard their heart he saith unto man stretch forth thine hand he stretch it hi hand wa restor whole as other 3 6 pharise went forth straightway took counsel herodian against him how they might destroy him 3 7 but jesu withdrew himself hi discipl sea great multitud galile follow him judaea 3 8 jerusalem idumaea jordan they tyre sidon great multitud when they had heard what great thing he did came unto him 3 9 he spake hi discipl that small ship should wait him becaus multitud lest they should throng him 3 10 he had heal mani insomuch that they press him touch him as mani as had plagu 3 11 unclean spirit when they saw him fell down him cri say thou art son god 3 12 he straitli charg them that they should not make him known 3 13 he goeth mountain calleth unto him whom he would they came unto him 3 14 he ordain twelv that they should be him that he might send them forth preach 3 15 have power heal sick cast devil 3 16 simon he surnam peter 3 17 jame son zebede john brother jame he surnam them boanerg which is son thunder 3 18 andrew philip bartholomew matthew thoma jame son alphaeu thaddaeu simon canaanit 3 19 juda iscariot which also betray him they went hous 3 20 multitud cometh togeth again so that they could not so much as eat bread 3 21 when hi friend heard it they went lay hold him they said he is besid himself 3 22 scribe which came down jerusalem said he hath beelzebub princ devil casteth he devil 3 23 he call them unto him said unto them parabl how can satan cast satan 3 24 if kingdom be divid against itself that kingdom cannot stand 3 25 if hous be divid against itself that hous cannot stand 3 26 if satan rise against himself be divid he cannot stand but hath end 3 27 no man can enter strong man s hous spoil hi good he will first bind strong man then he will spoil hi hous 3 28 verili i say unto you all sin shall be forgiven unto son men blasphemi wherewith soever they shall blasphem 3 29 but he that shall blasphem against holi ghost hath never forgiv but is danger etern damnat 3 30 becaus they said he hath unclean spirit 3 31 there came then hi brethren hi mother stand sent unto him call him 3 32 multitud sat him they said unto him behold thi mother thi brethren seek thee 3 33 he answer them say who is my mother or my brethren 3 34 he look round them which sat him said behold my mother my brethren 3 35 whosoev shall do will god same is my brother my sister mother 4 1 he began again teach sea side there wa gather unto him great multitud so that he enter ship sat sea whole multitud wa sea land 4 2 he taught them mani thing parabl said unto them hi doctrin 4 3 hearken behold there went sower sow 4 4 it came pass as he sow some fell way side fowl air came devour it 4 5 some fell stoni ground where it had not much earth immedi it sprang becaus it had no depth earth 4 6 but when sun wa it wa scorch becaus it had no root it wither away 4 7 some fell thorn thorn grew choke it it yield no fruit 4 8 other fell good ground did yield fruit that sprang increas brought forth some thirti some sixti some hundr 4 9 he said unto them he that hath ear hear let him hear 4 10 when he wa alon they that were him twelv ask him parabl 4 11 he said unto them unto you it is given know mysteri kingdom god but unto them that are all these thing are done parabl 4 12 that see they may see not perceiv hear they may hear not understand lest ani time they should be convert their sin should be forgiven them 4 13 he said unto them know ye not thi parabl how then will ye know all parabl 4 14 sower soweth word 4 15 these are they way side where word is sown but when they have heard satan cometh immedi taketh away word that wa sown their heart 4 16 these are they likewis which are sown stoni ground who when they have heard word immedi receiv it glad 4 17 have no root themselv so endur but time afterward when afflict or persecut ariseth word s sake immedi they are offend 4 18 these are they which are sown thorn such as hear word 4 19 care thi world deceit rich lust other thing enter choke word it becometh unfruit 4 20 these are they which are sown good ground such as hear word receiv it bring forth fruit some thirtyfold some sixti some hundr 4 21 he said unto them is candl brought be put bushel or bed not be set candlestick 4 22 there is noth hid which shall not be manifest neither wa ani thing kept secret but that it should come abroad 4 23 if ani man have ear hear let him hear 4 24 he said unto them take heed what ye hear what measur ye mete it shall be measur you unto you that hear shall more be given 4 25 he that hath him shall be given he that hath not him shall be taken even that which he hath 4 26 he said so is kingdom god as if man should cast seed ground 4 27 should sleep rise night day seed should spring grow he knoweth not how 4 28 earth bringeth forth fruit herself first blade then ear that full corn ear 4 29 but when fruit is brought forth immedi he putteth sickl becaus harvest is come 4 30 he said whereunto shall we liken kingdom god or what comparison shall we compar it 4 31 it is like grain mustard seed which when it is sown earth is less than all seed that be earth 4 32 but when it is sown it groweth becometh greater than all herb shooteth great branch so that fowl air may lodg shadow it 4 33 mani such parabl spake he word unto them as they were abl hear it 4 34 but parabl spake he not unto them when they were alon he expound all thing hi discipl 4 35 same day when even wa come he saith unto them let us pass unto other side 4 36 when they had sent away multitud they took him even as he wa ship there were also him other littl ship 4 37 there aros great storm wind wave beat ship so that it wa now full 4 38 he wa hinder part ship asleep pillow they awak him say unto him master carest thou not that we perish 4 39 he aros rebuk wind said unto sea peac be still wind ceas there wa great calm 4 40 he said unto them whi are ye so fear how is it that ye have no faith 4 41 they fear exceedingli said one anoth what manner man is thi that even wind sea obey him 5 1 they came unto other side sea countri gadaren 5 2 when he wa come ship immedi there met him tomb man unclean spirit 5 3 who had hi dwell tomb no man could bind him no not chain 5 4 becaus that he had been often bound fetter chain chain had been pluck asund him fetter broken piec neither could ani man tame him 5 5 alway night day he wa mountain tomb cri cut himself stone 5 6 but when he saw jesu afar off he ran worship him 5 7 cri loud voic said what have i do thee jesu thou son most high god i adjur thee god that thou torment me not 5 8 he said unto him come man thou unclean spirit 5 9 he ask him what is thi name he answer say my name is legion we are mani 5 10 he besought him much that he would not send them away countri 5 11 now there wa there nigh unto mountain great herd swine feed 5 12 all devil besought him say send us swine that we may enter them 5 13 forthwith jesu gave them leav unclean spirit went enter swine herd ran violent down steep place sea they were two thousand were choke sea 5 14 they that fed swine fled told it citi countri they went see what it wa that wa done 5 15 they come jesu see him that wa possess devil had legion sit cloth hi right mind they were afraid 5 16 they that saw it told them how it befel him that wa possess devil also concern swine 5 17 they began pray him depart their coast 5 18 when he wa come ship he that had been possess devil pray him that he might be him 5 19 howbeit jesu suffer him not but saith unto him go home thi friend tell them how great thing lord hath done thee hath had compass thee 5 20 he depart began publish decapoli how great thing jesu had done him all men did marvel 5 21 when jesu wa pass again ship unto other side much peopl gather unto him he wa nigh unto sea 5 22 behold there cometh one ruler synagogu jairu name when he saw him he fell hi feet 5 23 besought him greatli say my littl daughter lieth point death i pray thee come lay thi hand her that she may be heal she shall live 5 24 jesu went him much peopl follow him throng him 5 25 certain woman which had issu blood twelv year 5 26 had suffer mani thing mani physician had spent all that she had wa noth better but rather grew wors 5 27 when she had heard jesu came press behind touch hi garment 5 28 she said if i may touch but hi cloth i shall be whole 5 29 straightway fountain her blood wa dri she felt her bodi that she wa heal that plagu 5 30 jesu immedi know himself that virtu had gone him turn him press said who touch my cloth 5 31 hi discipl said unto him thou seest multitud throng thee sayest thou who touch me 5 32 he look round see her that had done thi thing 5 33 but woman fear trembl know what wa done her came fell down him told him all truth 5 34 he said unto her daughter thi faith hath made thee whole go peac be whole thi plagu 5 35 while he yet spake there came ruler synagogu s hous certain which said thi daughter is dead whi troublest thou master ani further 5 36 as soon as jesu heard word that wa spoken he saith unto ruler synagogu be not afraid onli believ 5 37 he suffer no man follow him save peter jame john brother jame 5 38 he cometh hous ruler synagogu seeth tumult them that wept wail greatli 5 39 when he wa come he saith unto them whi make ye thi ado weep damsel is not dead but sleepeth 5 40 they laugh him scorn but when he had put them all he taketh father mother damsel them that were him entereth where damsel wa lie 5 41 he took damsel hand said unto her talitha cumi which is be interpret damsel i say unto thee aris 5 42 straightway damsel aros walk she wa age twelv year they were astonish great astonish 5 43 he charg them straitli that no man should know it command that someth should be given her eat 6 1 he went thenc came hi own countri hi discipl follow him 6 2 when sabbath day wa come he began teach synagogu mani hear him were astonish say whenc hath thi man these thing what wisdom is thi which is given unto him that even such mighti work are wrought hi hand 6 3 is not thi carpent son mari brother jame jose juda simon are not hi sister here us they were offend him 6 4 but jesu said unto them prophet is not honour but hi own countri hi own kin hi own hous 6 5 he could there do no mighti work save that he laid hi hand few sick folk heal them 6 6 he marvel becaus their unbelief he went round villag teach 6 7 he call unto him twelv began send them forth two two gave them power unclean spirit 6 8 command them that they should take noth their journey save staff onli no scrip no bread no money their purs 6 9 but be shod sandal not put two coat 6 10 he said unto them what place soever ye enter hous there abid till ye depart that place 6 11 whosoev shall not receiv you nor hear you when ye depart thenc shake off dust your feet testimoni against them verili i say unto you it shall be more toler sodom gomorrha day judgment than that citi 6 12 they went preach that men should repent 6 13 they cast mani devil anoint oil mani that were sick heal them 6 14 king herod heard him hi name wa spread abroad he said that john baptist wa risen dead therefor mighti work do shew forth themselv him 6 15 other said that it is elia other said that it is prophet or as one prophet 6 16 but when herod heard thereof he said it is john whom i behead he is risen dead 6 17 herod himself had sent forth laid hold john bound him prison herodia sake hi brother philip s wife he had marri her 6 18 john had said unto herod it is not law thee have thi brother s wife 6 19 therefor herodia had quarrel against him would have kill him but she could not 6 20 herod fear john know that he wa just man holi observ him when he heard him he did mani thing heard him gladli 6 21 when conveni day wa come that herod hi birthday made supper hi lord high captain chief estat galile 6 22 when daughter said herodia came danc pleas herod them that sat him king said unto damsel ask me whatsoev thou wilt i will give it thee 6 23 he sware unto her whatsoev thou shalt ask me i will give it thee unto half my kingdom 6 24 she went forth said unto her mother what shall i ask she said head john baptist 6 25 she came straightway hast unto king ask say i will that thou give me charger head john baptist 6 26 king wa exceed sorri yet hi oath s sake their sake which sat him he would not reject her 6 27 immedi king sent execution command hi head be brought he went behead him prison 6 28 brought hi head charger gave it damsel damsel gave it her mother 6 29 when hi discipl heard it they came took hi corps laid it tomb 6 30 apostl gather themselv togeth unto jesu told him all thing both what they had done what they had taught 6 31 he said unto them come ye yourselv apart desert place rest while there were mani come go they had no leisur so much as eat 6 32 they depart desert place ship privat 6 33 peopl saw them depart mani knew him ran afoot thither all citi outwent them came togeth unto him 6 34 jesu when he came saw much peopl wa move compass them becaus they were as sheep not have shepherd he began teach them mani thing 6 35 when day wa now far spent hi discipl came unto him said thi is desert place now time is far pass 6 36 send them away that they may go countri round villag buy themselv bread they have noth eat 6 37 he answer said unto them give ye them eat they say unto him shall we go buy two hundr pennyworth bread give them eat 6 38 he saith unto them how mani loav have ye go see when they knew they say five two fish 6 39 he command them make all sit down compani green grass 6 40 they sat down rank hundr fifti 6 41 when he had taken five loav two fish he look heaven bless brake loav gave them hi discipl set them two fish divid he them all 6 42 they did all eat were fill 6 43 they took twelv basket full fragment fish 6 44 they that did eat loav were five thousand men 6 45 straightway he constrain hi discipl get ship go other side unto bethsaida while he sent away peopl 6 46 when he had sent them away he depart mountain pray 6 47 when even wa come ship wa midst sea he alon land 6 48 he saw them toil row wind wa contrari unto them fourth watch night he cometh unto them walk sea would have pass them 6 49 but when they saw him walk sea they suppos it had been spirit cri 6 50 they all saw him were troubl immedi he talk them saith unto them be good cheer it is i be not afraid 6 51 he went unto them ship wind ceas they were sore amaz themselv measur wonder 6 52 they consid not miracl loav their heart wa harden 6 53 when they had pass they came land gennesaret drew shore 6 54 when they were come ship straightway they knew him 6 55 ran that whole region round began carri bed those that were sick where they heard he wa 6 56 whithersoev he enter villag or citi or countri they laid sick street besought him that they might touch if it were but border hi garment as mani as touch him were made whole 7 1 then came togeth unto him pharise certain scribe which came jerusalem 7 2 when they saw some hi discipl eat bread defil that is say unwashen hand they found fault 7 3 pharise all jew they wash their hand oft eat not hold tradit elder 7 4 when they come market they wash they eat not mani other thing there be which they have receiv hold as wash cup pot brasen vessel tabl 7 5 then pharise scribe ask him whi walk not thi discipl accord tradit elder but eat bread unwashen hand 7 6 he answer said unto them well hath esaia prophesi you hypocrit as it is written thi peopl honoureth me their lip but their heart is far me 7 7 howbeit vain do they worship me teach doctrin command men 7 8 lay asid command god ye hold tradit men as wash pot cup mani other such like thing ye do 7 9 he said unto them full well ye reject command god that ye may keep your own tradit 7 10 mose said honour thi father thi mother whoso curseth father or mother let him die death 7 11 but ye say if man shall say hi father or mother it is corban that is say gift whatsoev thou mightest be profit me he shall be free 7 12 ye suffer him no more do ought hi father or hi mother 7 13 make word god none effect your tradit which ye have deliv mani such like thing do ye 7 14 when he had call all peopl unto him he said unto them hearken unto me everi one you understand 7 15 there is noth man that enter him can defil him but thing which come him those are they that defil man 7 16 if ani man have ear hear let him hear 7 17 when he wa enter hous peopl hi discipl ask him concern parabl 7 18 he saith unto them are ye so understand also do ye not perceiv that whatsoev thing entereth man it cannot defil him 7 19 becaus it entereth not hi heart but belli goeth draught purg all meat 7 20 he said that which cometh man that defileth man 7 21 heart men proceed evil thought adulteri fornic murder 7 22 theft covet wicked deceit lascivi evil eye blasphemi pride foolish 7 23 all these evil thing come defil man 7 24 thenc he aros went border tyre sidon enter hous would have no man know it but he could not be hid 7 25 certain woman whose young daughter had unclean spirit heard him came fell hi feet 7 26 woman wa greek syrophenician nation she besought him that he would cast forth devil her daughter 7 27 but jesu said unto her let children first be fill it is not meet take children s bread cast it unto dog 7 28 she answer said unto him ye lord yet dog tabl eat children s crumb 7 29 he said unto her thi say go thi way devil is gone thi daughter 7 30 when she wa come her hous she found devil gone her daughter laid bed 7 31 again depart coast tyre sidon he came unto sea galile midst coast decapoli 7 32 they bring unto him one that wa deaf had impedi hi speech they beseech him put hi hand him 7 33 he took him asid multitud put hi finger hi ear he spit touch hi tongu 7 34 look heaven he sigh saith unto him ephphatha that is be open 7 35 straightway hi ear were open string hi tongu wa loos he spake plain 7 36 he charg them that they should tell no man but more he charg them so much more great deal they publish it 7 37 were measur astonish say he hath done all thing well he maketh both deaf hear dumb speak 8 1 those day multitud be veri great have noth eat jesu call hi discipl unto him saith unto them 8 2 i have compass multitud becaus they have now been me three day have noth eat 8 3 if i send them away fast their own hous they will faint way diver them came far 8 4 hi discipl answer him whenc can man satisfi these men bread here wilder 8 5 he ask them how mani loav have ye they said seven 8 6 he command peopl sit down ground he took seven loav gave thank brake gave hi discipl set them they did set them peopl 8 7 they had few small fish he bless command set them also them 8 8 so they did eat were fill they took broken meat that wa left seven basket 8 9 they that had eaten were four thousand he sent them away 8 10 straightway he enter ship hi discipl came part dalmanutha 8 11 pharise came forth began question him seek him sign heaven tempt him 8 12 he sigh deepli hi spirit saith whi doth thi gener seek sign verili i say unto you there shall no sign be given unto thi gener 8 13 he left them enter ship again depart other side 8 14 now discipl had forgotten take bread neither had they ship them more than one loaf 8 15 he charg them say take heed bewar leaven pharise leaven herod 8 16 they reason themselv say it is becaus we have no bread 8 17 when jesu knew it he saith unto them whi reason ye becaus ye have no bread perceiv ye not yet neither understand have ye your heart yet harden 8 18 have eye see ye not have ear hear ye not do ye not rememb 8 19 when i brake five loav five thousand how mani basket full fragment took ye they say unto him twelv 8 20 when seven four thousand how mani basket full fragment took ye they said seven 8 21 he said unto them how is it that ye do not understand 8 22 he cometh bethsaida they bring blind man unto him besought him touch him 8 23 he took blind man hand led him town when he had spit hi eye put hi hand him he ask him if he saw ought 8 24 he look said i see men as tree walk 8 25 that he put hi hand again hi eye made him look he wa restor saw everi man clearli 8 26 he sent him away hi hous say neither go town nor tell it ani town 8 27 jesu went hi discipl town caesarea philippi way he ask hi discipl say unto them whom do men say that i am 8 28 they answer john baptist but some say elia other one prophet 8 29 he saith unto them but whom say ye that i am peter answereth saith unto him thou art christ 8 30 he charg them that they should tell no man him 8 31 he began teach them that son man must suffer mani thing be reject elder chief priest scribe be kill three day rise again 8 32 he spake that say openli peter took him began rebuk him 8 33 but when he had turn look hi discipl he rebuk peter say get thee behind me satan thou savourest not thing that be god but thing that be men 8 34 when he had call peopl unto him hi discipl also he said unto them whosoev will come me let him deni himself take hi cross follow me 8 35 whosoev will save hi life shall lose it but whosoev shall lose hi life my sake gospel s same shall save it 8 36 what shall it profit man if he shall gain whole world lose hi own soul 8 37 or what shall man give exchang hi soul 8 38 whosoev therefor shall be asham me my word thi adulter sin gener him also shall son man be asham when he cometh glori hi father holi angel 9 1 he said unto them verili i say unto you that there be some them that stand here which shall not tast death till they have seen kingdom god come power 9 2 six day jesu taketh him peter jame john leadeth them high mountain apart themselv he wa transfigur them 9 3 hi raiment becam shine exceed white as snow so as no fuller earth can white them 9 4 there appear unto them elia mose they were talk jesu 9 5 peter answer said jesu master it is good us be here let us make three tabernacl one thee one mose one elia 9 6 he wist not what say they were sore afraid 9 7 there wa cloud that overshadow them voic came cloud say thi is my belov son hear him 9 8 suddenli when they had look round they saw no man ani more save jesu onli themselv 9 9 as they came down mountain he charg them that they should tell no man what thing they had seen till son man were risen dead 9 10 they kept that say themselv question one anoth what rise dead should mean 9 11 they ask him say whi say scribe that elia must first come 9 12 he answer told them elia verili cometh first restoreth all thing how it is written son man that he must suffer mani thing be set nought 9 13 but i say unto you that elia is inde come they have done unto him whatsoev they list as it is written him 9 14 when he came hi discipl he saw great multitud them scribe question them 9 15 straightway all peopl when they beheld him were greatli amaz run him salut him 9 16 he ask scribe what question ye them 9 17 one multitud answer said master i have brought unto thee my son which hath dumb spirit 9 18 wheresoev he taketh him he teareth him he foameth gnasheth hi teeth pineth away i spake thi discipl that they should cast him they could not 9 19 he answereth him saith o faithless gener how long shall i be you how long shall i suffer you bring him unto me 9 20 they brought him unto him when he saw him straightway spirit tare him he fell ground wallow foam 9 21 he ask hi father how long is it ago thi came unto him he said child 9 22 ofttim it hath cast him fire water destroy him but if thou canst do ani thing have compass us help us 9 23 jesu said unto him if thou canst believ all thing are possibl him that believeth 9 24 straightway father child cri said tear lord i believ help thou mine unbelief 9 25 when jesu saw that peopl came run togeth he rebuk foul spirit say unto him thou dumb deaf spirit i charg thee come him enter no more him 9 26 spirit cri rent him sore came him he wa as one dead insomuch that mani said he is dead 9 27 but jesu took him hand lift him he aros 9 28 when he wa come hous hi discipl ask him privat whi could not we cast him 9 29 he said unto them thi kind can come forth noth but prayer fast 9 30 they depart thenc pass galile he would not that ani man should know it 9 31 he taught hi discipl said unto them son man is deliv hand men they shall kill him that he is kill he shall rise third day 9 32 but they understood not that say were afraid ask him 9 33 he came capernaum be hous he ask them what wa it that ye disput yourselv way 9 34 but they held their peac way they had disput themselv who should be greatest 9 35 he sat down call twelv saith unto them if ani man desir be first same shall be last all servant all 9 36 he took child set him midst them when he had taken him hi arm he said unto them 9 37 whosoev shall receiv one such children my name receiveth me whosoev shall receiv me receiveth not me but him that sent me 9 38 john answer him say master we saw one cast devil thi name he followeth not us we forbad him becaus he followeth not us 9 39 but jesu said forbid him not there is no man which shall do miracl my name that can lightli speak evil me 9 40 he that is not against us is our part 9 41 whosoev shall give you cup water drink my name becaus ye belong christ verili i say unto you he shall not lose hi reward 9 42 whosoev shall offend one these littl one that believ me it is better him that millston were hang hi neck he were cast sea 9 43 if thi hand offend thee cut it off it is better thee enter life maim than have two hand go hell fire that never shall be quench 9 44 where their worm dieth not fire is not quench 9 45 if thi foot offend thee cut it off it is better thee enter halt life than have two feet be cast hell fire that never shall be quench 9 46 where their worm dieth not fire is not quench 9 47 if thine eye offend thee pluck it it is better thee enter kingdom god one eye than have two eye be cast hell fire 9 48 where their worm dieth not fire is not quench 9 49 everi one shall be salt fire everi sacrific shall be salt salt 9 50 salt is good but if salt have lost hi salt wherewith will ye season it have salt yourselv have peac one anoth 10 1 he aros thenc cometh coast judaea farther side jordan peopl resort unto him again as he wa wont he taught them again 10 2 pharise came him ask him is it law man put away hi wife tempt him 10 3 he answer said unto them what did mose command you 10 4 they said mose suffer write bill divorc put her away 10 5 jesu answer said unto them hard your heart he wrote you thi precept 10 6 but begin creation god made them male femal 10 7 thi caus shall man leav hi father mother cleav hi wife 10 8 they twain shall be one flesh so then they are no more twain but one flesh 10 9 what therefor god hath join togeth let not man put asund 10 10 hous hi discipl ask him again same matter 10 11 he saith unto them whosoev shall put away hi wife marri anoth committeth adulteri against her 10 12 if woman shall put away her husband be marri anoth she committeth adulteri 10 13 they brought young children him that he should touch them hi discipl rebuk those that brought them 10 14 but when jesu saw it he wa much displeas said unto them suffer littl children come unto me forbid them not such is kingdom god 10 15 verili i say unto you whosoev shall not receiv kingdom god as littl child he shall not enter therein 10 16 he took them hi arm put hi hand them bless them 10 17 when he wa gone forth way there came one run kneel him ask him good master what shall i do that i may inherit etern life 10 18 jesu said unto him whi callest thou me good there is none good but one that is god 10 19 thou knowest command do not commit adulteri do not kill do not steal do not bear fals wit defraud not honour thi father mother 10 20 he answer said unto him master all these have i observ my youth 10 21 then jesu behold him love him said unto him one thing thou lackest go thi way sell whatsoev thou hast give poor thou shalt have treasur heaven come take cross follow me 10 22 he wa sad that say went away griev he had great possess 10 23 jesu look round saith unto hi discipl how hardli shall they that have rich enter kingdom god 10 24 discipl were astonish hi word but jesu answereth again saith unto them children how hard is it them that trust rich enter kingdom god 10 25 it is easier camel go eye needl than rich man enter kingdom god 10 26 they were astonish measur say themselv who then can be save 10 27 jesu look them saith men it is imposs but not god god all thing are possibl 10 28 then peter began say unto him lo we have left all have follow thee 10 29 jesu answer said verili i say sister mother children land persecut world come etern life 10 31 but mani that are first shall be last last first 10 32 they were way go jerusalem jesu went them they were amaz as they follow they that i drink baptism that i am baptiz withal shall ye be baptiz 10 40 but sit my right hand my left hand is not mine give but it shall be given them whom it is prepar 10 41 when ten heard it they seed last all woman die also 12 23 resurrect therefor when they shall rise whose wife shall she be them seven had her wife 12 24 jesu answer said unto them do ye not therefor err becaus ye know not scriptur neither power god 12 25 when they shall rise dead they neither marri nor are given marriag but are as angel which are heaven 12 26 as touch dead that they rise have ye not read book mose how bush god spake unto him say i am god abraham god isaac god jacob 12 27 he is not god dead but god live ye therefor do greatli err 12 28 one scribe came have heard them reason togeth perceiv that he had answer them well ask him which is first command all 12 29 jesu answer him first all command is hear o israel lord our god is one lord 12 30 thou shalt love lord thi god all thi heart all thi soul all thi mind all thi strength thi is first command 12 31 second is like name thi thou shalt love thi neighbour as thyself there is none other command greater than these 12 32 scribe said unto him well master thou hast said truth there is one god there is none other but he 12 33 love him all heart all understand all soul all strength love hi neighbour as himself is more than all whole burnt offer sacrific 12 34 when jesu saw that he answer discreetli he said unto him thou art not far kingdom god no man that durst ask him ani question 12 35 jesu answer said while he taught templ how say scribe that christ is son david 12 36 david himself said holi ghost lord said my lord sit thou my right hand till i make thine enemi thi footstool 12 37 david therefor himself calleth him lord whenc is he all they did cast their abund but she her want did cast all that she had even all her live 13 1 as he went templ one hi discipl saith unto him master see what manner stone what build are here 13 2 jesu answer said unto him seest thou these great build there shall not be left one stone anoth that shall not be thrown down 13 3 as he sat mount oliv against templ peter jame john andrew ask him privat 13 4 tell us when shall these thing be what shall be sign when all these thing shall be fulfil 13 5 jesu answer them began say take heed lest ani man deceiv you 13 6 mani shall come my name say there shall be earthquak diver place there shall be famin troubl these are begin sorrow 13 9 but take heed yourselv they shall deliv you council synagogu ye shall be beaten ye shall be brought ruler king my sake testimoni against them 13 10 gospel must first be publish all nation 13 11 but when they shall lead you deliv you take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak neither do ye premedit but whatsoev shall be given you that hour that speak ye it is not ye that speak but holi ghost 13 12 now brother shall betray brother death father son children shall rise against their parent shall caus them be put death 13 13 ye shall be hate all men my name s sake but he that shall endur unto end same shall be save 13 14 but when ye shall see abomin desol spoken daniel prophet stand where it ought not let him that readeth understand then let them that be judaea flee mountain 13 15 let him that is housetop not go down hous neither enter therein take ani thing hi hous 13 16 let him that is field gener shall not pass till all these thing be done 13 31 heaven earth shall pass away but my word shall not pass away 13 32 but that day that hour knoweth no man no not angel which are heaven neither answer said unto them it is one twelv that dippeth me dish 14 21 son man inde goeth as it is written him but woe that man whom son man is betray good were it that man if he had never been born 14 22 blood new testament which is shed mani 14 25 verili i say unto you i will drink no more fruit vine that day that i drink it new kingdom god 14 26 when they had sung hymn they went mount oliv 14 27 him 14 36 he said abba father all thing are possibl unto thee take away thi cup me nevertheless not what i will but what thou wilt 14 37 he cometh findeth them sleep saith unto peter simon sleepest thou couldest not thou watch one hour 14 38 watch ye pray lest ye enter temptat spirit truli is readi but flesh is weak 14 39 again he went away pray spake same word 14 40 when he return he found them she look him said thou also wast jesu nazareth 14 68 but he deni say i know not neither understand i what thou sayest he went porch cock crew 14 69 maid saw him again began say them that stood thi is one them 14 70 he deni it again littl they that stood said again peter sure thou art one them thou art galilaean thi speech agreeth thereto 14 71 but he began curs swear say i know not thi man whom ye speak 14 72 second time cock crew peter call mind word that jesu said unto him cock crow twice thou shalt deni me thrice when he thought thereon he wept 15 1 straightway morn chief priest held consult elder scribe whole council bound jesu carri him away deliv him pilat 15 2 pilat ask him art thou king jew he answer said unto them thou sayest it 15 3 chief priest accus him mani thing but he answer noth 15 4 pilat ask him again say answerest thou noth behold how mani thing they wit against thee 15 5 but jesu yet answer noth so that pilat marvel 15 6 now that feast he releas unto them one prison whomsoev they desir 15 7 there wa one name barabba which lay bound them that had made insurrect him who had commit murder insurrect 15 8 multitud cri aloud began desir him do as he had ever done unto them 15 9 but pilat answer them say will ye that i releas unto you king jew 15 10 he knew that chief priest had deliv him envi 15 11 but chief priest move peopl that he should rather releas barabba unto them 15 12 pilat answer said again unto them what will ye then that i shall do unto him whom ye call king jew 15 13 they cri again crucifi him 15 14 then pilat said unto them whi what evil hath he done they cri more exceedingli crucifi him 15 15 so pilat will content peopl releas barabba unto them deliv jesu when he had scourg him be crucifi 15 16 soldier led him away hall call praetorium they call togeth whole band 15 17 they cloth him purpl plat crown thorn put it hi head 15 18 began salut him hail king jew 15 19 they smote him head reed did spit him bow their knee worship him 15 20 when they had mock him they took off purpl him put hi own cloth him led him crucifi him 15 21 they compel one simon cyrenian who pass come countri father alexand rufu bear hi cross 15 22 they bring him unto place golgotha which is be interpret place skull 15 23 they gave him drink wine mingl myrrh but he receiv it not 15 24 when they had crucifi him they part hi garment cast lot them what everi man should take 15 25 it wa third hour they crucifi him 15 26 superscript hi accus wa written king jew 15 27 him they crucifi two thiev one hi right hand other hi left 15 28 scriptur wa fulfil which saith he wa number transgressor 15 29 they that pass rail him wag their head say ah thou that destroyest templ buildest it three day 15 30 save thyself come down cross 15 31 likewis also chief priest mock said themselv scribe he save other himself he cannot save 15 32 let christ king israel descend now cross that we may see believ they that were crucifi him revil him 15 33 when sixth hour wa come there wa dark whole land ninth hour 15 34 ninth hour jesu cri loud voic say eloi eloi lama sabachthani which is be interpret my god my god whi hast thou forsaken me 15 35 some them that stood when they heard it said behold he calleth elia 15 36 one ran fill spung full vinegar put it reed gave him drink say let alon let us see elia will come take him down 15 37 jesu cri loud voic gave ghost 15 38 veil templ wa rent twain top bottom 15 39 when centurion which stood against him saw that he so cri gave ghost he said truli thi man wa son god 15 40 there were also women look afar off whom wa mari magdalen mari mother jame less jose salom 15 41 who also when he wa galile follow him minist unto him mani other women which came him unto jerusalem 15 42 now when even wa come becaus it wa prepar that is day sabbath 15 43 joseph arimathaea honour counsellor which also wait kingdom god came went boldli unto pilat crave bodi jesu 15 44 pilat marvel if he were alreadi dead call unto him centurion he ask him he had been ani while dead 15 45 when he knew it centurion he gave bodi joseph 15 46 he bought fine linen took him down wrap him linen laid him sepulchr which wa hewn rock roll stone unto door sepulchr 15 47 mari magdalen mari mother jose beheld where he wa laid 16 1 when sabbath wa past mari magdalen mari mother jame salom had bought sweet spice that they might come anoint him 16 2 veri earli morn first day week they came unto sepulchr rise sun 16 3 they said themselv who shall roll us away stone door sepulchr 16 4 when they look they saw that stone wa roll away it wa veri great 16 5 enter sepulchr they saw young man sit right side cloth long white garment they were affright 16 6 he saith unto them be not affright ye seek jesu nazareth which wa crucifi he is risen he is not here behold place where they laid him 16 7 but go your way tell hi discipl peter that he goeth you galile there shall ye see him as he said unto you 16 8 they went quickli fled sepulchr they trembl were amaz neither said they ani thing ani man they were afraid 16 9 now when jesu wa risen earli first day week he appear first mari magdalen whom he had cast seven devil 16 10 she went told them that had been him as they mourn wept 16 11 they when they had heard that he wa aliv had been seen her believ not 16 12 that he appear anoth form unto two them as they walk went countri 16 13 they went told it unto residu neither believ they them 16 14 afterward he appear unto eleven as they sat meat upbraid them their unbelief hard heart becaus they believ not them which had seen him he wa risen 16 15 he said unto them go ye all world preach gospel everi creatur 16 16 he that believeth is baptiz shall be save but he that believeth not shall be damn 16 17 these sign shall follow them that believ my name shall they cast devil they shall speak new tongu 16 18 they shall take serpent if they drink ani deadli thing it shall not hurt them they shall lay hand sick they shall recov 16 19 so then lord had spoken unto them he wa receiv heaven sat right hand god 16 20 they went forth preach everi where lord work them confirm word sign follow amen gospel accord saint luke 1 1 forasmuch as them but hi mother kept all these say her heart 2 52 jesu increas wisdom statur favour god man 3 1 now fifteenth year reign tiberiu caesar pontiu pilat be governor judaea herod be tetrarch galile hi
