as hi custom wa he went synagogu sabbath day stood read 4 17 there wa deliv unto him book prophet esaia when he had open book he found place where it wa written 4 18 spirit lord is me becaus he hath anoint me preach gospel poor he hath sent me heal brokenheart preach deliver captiv recov sight blind set liberti them that are bruis 4 19 preach accept year lord 4 20 he close book he gave it again minist sat down eye all them that were synagogu were fasten him 4 21 he began say unto them thi day is thi scriptur fulfil your ear 4 22 all bare him wit wonder graciou word which proceed hi mouth they said is not thi joseph s son 4 23 he said unto them ye will sure say unto me thi proverb physician heal thyself whatsoev we have heard done capernaum do also here thi countri 4 24 he said verili i say unto you no prophet is accept hi own countri 4 25 but i tell you truth mani widow were israel day elia when heaven wa shut three year six month when great famin wa all land 4 26 but unto none them wa elia sent save unto sarepta citi sidon unto woman that wa widow 4 27 mani leper were israel time eliseu prophet none them wa cleans save naaman syrian 4 28 all they synagogu when they heard these thing were fill wrath 4 29 rose thrust him citi led him unto brow hill whereon their citi wa built that they might cast him down headlong 4 30 but he pass midst them went hi way 4 31 came down capernaum citi galile taught them sabbath day 4 32 they were astonish hi doctrin hi word wa power 4 33 synagogu there wa man which had spirit unclean devil cri loud voic 4 34 say let us alon what have we do thee thou jesu nazareth art thou come destroy us i know thee who thou art holi one god 4 35 jesu rebuk him say hold thi peac come him when devil had thrown him midst he came him hurt him not 4 36 they were all amaz spake themselv say what word is thi author power he commandeth unclean spirit they come 4 37 fame him went everi place countri round 4 38 he aros synagogu enter simon s hous simon s wife s mother wa taken great fever they besought him her 4 39 he stood her rebuk fever it left her immedi she aros minist unto them 4 40 now when sun wa set all they that had ani sick diver diseas brought them unto him he laid hi hand everi one them heal them 4 41 devil also came mani cri say thou art christ son god he rebuk them suffer them not speak they knew that he wa christ 4 42 when it wa day he depart went desert place peopl sought him came unto him stay him that he should not depart them 4 43 he said unto them i must preach kingdom god other citi also therefor am i sent 4 44 he preach synagogu galile 5 1 it came pass that as peopl press him hear word god he stood lake gennesaret 5 2 saw two ship stand lake but fishermen were gone them were wash their net 5 3 he enter one ship which wa simon s pray him that he would thrust littl land he sat down taught peopl ship 5 4 now when he had left speak he said unto simon launch deep let down your net draught 5 5 simon answer said unto him master we have toil all night have taken noth nevertheless thi word i will let down net 5 6 when they had thi done they inclos great multitud fish their net brake 5 7 they beckon unto their partner which were other ship that they should come help them they came fill both ship so that they began sink 5 8 when simon peter saw it he fell down jesu knee say depart me i am sin man o lord 5 9 he wa astonish all that were him draught fish which they had taken 5 10 so wa also jame john son zebede which were partner simon jesu said unto simon fear not henceforth thou shalt catch men 5 11 when they had brought their ship land they forsook all follow him 5 12 it came pass when he wa certain citi behold man full leprosi who see jesu fell hi face besought him say lord if thou wilt thou canst make me clean 5 13 he put forth hi hand touch him say i will be thou clean immedi leprosi depart him 5 14 he charg him tell no man but go shew thyself priest offer thi cleans accord as mose command testimoni unto them 5 15 but so much more went there fame abroad him great multitud came togeth hear be heal him their infirm 5 16 he withdrew himself wilder pray 5 17 it came pass certain day as he wa teach that there were pharise doctor law sit which were come everi town galile judaea jerusalem power lord wa present heal them 5 18 behold men brought bed man which wa taken palsi they sought mean bring him lay him him 5 19 when they could not find what way they might bring him becaus multitud they went housetop let him down tile hi couch midst jesu 5 20 when he saw their faith he said unto him man thi sin are forgiven thee 5 21 scribe pharise began reason say who is thi which speaketh blasphemi who can forgiv sin but god alon 5 22 but when jesu perceiv their thought he answer said unto them what reason ye your heart 5 23 is easier say thi sin be forgiven thee or say rise walk 5 24 but that ye may know that son man hath power earth forgiv sin he said unto sick palsi i say unto thee aris take thi couch go thine hous 5 25 immedi he rose them took that whereon he lay depart hi own hous glorifi god 5 26 they were all amaz they glorifi god were fill fear say we have seen strang thing day 5 27 these thing he went forth saw publican name levi sit receipt custom he said unto him follow me 5 28 he left all rose follow him 5 29 levi made him great feast hi own hous there wa great compani publican other that sat down them 5 30 but their scribe pharise murmur against hi discipl say whi do ye eat drink publican sinner 5 31 jesu answer said unto them they that are whole need not physician but they that are sick 5 32 i came not call righteou but sinner repent 5 33 they said unto him whi do discipl john fast often make prayer likewis discipl pharise but thine eat drink 5 34 he said unto them can ye make children bridechamb fast while bridegroom is them 5 35 but day will come when bridegroom shall be taken away them then shall they fast those day 5 36 he spake also parabl unto them no man putteth piec new garment old if otherwis then both new maketh rent piec that wa taken new agreeth not old 5 37 no man putteth new wine old bottl els new wine will burst bottl be spill bottl shall perish 5 38 but new wine must be put new bottl both are preserv 5 39 no man also have drunk old wine straightway desireth new he saith old is better 6 1 it came pass second sabbath first that he went corn field hi discipl pluck ear corn did eat rub them their hand 6 2 certain pharise said unto them whi do ye that which is not law do sabbath day 6 3 jesu answer them said have ye not read so much as thi what david did when himself wa hungr they which were him 6 4 how he went hous god did take eat shewbread gave also them that were him which it is not law eat but priest alon 6 5 he said unto them that son man is lord also sabbath 6 6 it came pass also anoth sabbath that he enter synagogu taught there wa man whose right hand wa wither 6 7 scribe pharise watch him he would heal sabbath day that they might find accus against him 6 8 but he knew their thought said man which had wither hand rise stand forth midst he aros stood forth 6 9 then said jesu unto them i will ask you one thing is it law sabbath day do good or do evil save life or destroy it 6 10 look round them all he said unto man stretch forth thi hand he did so hi hand wa restor whole as other 6 11 they were fill mad commun one anoth what they might do jesu 6 12 it came pass those day that he went mountain pray continu all night prayer god 6 13 when it wa day he call unto him hi discipl them he chose twelv whom also he name apostl 6 14 simon whom he also name peter andrew hi brother jame john philip bartholomew 6 15 matthew thoma jame son alphaeu simon call zelot 6 16 juda brother jame juda iscariot which also wa traitor 6 17 he came down them stood plain compani hi discipl great multitud peopl all judaea jerusalem sea coast tyre sidon which came hear him be heal their diseas 6 18 they that were vex unclean spirit they were heal 6 19 whole multitud sought touch him there went virtu him heal them all 6 20 he lift hi eye hi discipl said bless be ye poor your is kingdom god 6 21 bless are ye that hunger now ye shall be fill bless are ye that weep now ye shall laugh 6 22 bless are ye when men shall hate you when they shall separ you their compani shall reproach you cast your name as evil son man s sake 6 23 rejoic ye that day leap joy behold your reward is great heaven like manner did their father unto prophet 6 24 but woe unto you that are rich ye have receiv your consol 6 25 woe unto you that are full ye shall hunger woe unto you that laugh now ye shall mourn weep 6 26 woe unto you when all men shall speak well you so did their father fals prophet 6 27 but i say unto you which hear love your enemi do good them which hate you 6 28 bless them that curs you pray them which despit use you 6 29 unto him that smiteth thee one cheek offer also other him that taketh away thi cloak forbid not take thi coat also 6 30 give everi man that asketh thee him that taketh away thi good ask them not again 6 31 as ye would that men should do you do ye also them likewis 6 32 if ye love them which love you what thank have ye sinner also love those that love them 6 33 if ye do good them which do good you what thank have ye sinner also do even same 6 34 if ye lend them whom ye hope receiv what thank have ye sinner also lend sinner receiv as much again 6 35 but love ye your enemi do good lend hope noth again your reward shall be great ye shall be children highest he is kind unto unthank evil 6 36 be ye therefor merci as your father also is merci 6 37 judg not ye shall not be judg condemn not ye shall not be condemn forgiv ye shall be forgiven 6 38 give it shall be given unto you good measur press down shaken togeth run shall men give your bosom same measur that ye mete withal it shall be measur you again 6 39 he spake parabl unto them can blind lead blind shall they not both fall ditch 6 40 discipl is not hi master but everi one that is perfect shall be as hi master 6 41 whi beholdest thou mote that is thi brother s eye but perceivest not beam that is thine own eye 6 42 either how canst thou say thi brother brother let me pull mote that is thine eye when thou thyself beholdest not beam that is thine own eye thou hypocrit cast first beam thine own eye then shalt thou see clearli pull mote that is thi brother s eye 6 43 good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit neither doth corrupt tree bring forth good fruit 6 44 everi tree is known hi own fruit thorn men do not gather fig nor brambl bush gather they grape 6 45 good man good treasur hi heart bringeth forth that which is good evil man evil treasur hi heart bringeth forth that which is evil abund heart hi mouth speaketh 6 46 whi call ye me lord lord do not thing which i say 6 47 whosoev cometh me heareth my say doeth them i will shew you whom he is like 6 48 he is like man which built hous dig deep laid foundat rock when flood aros stream beat vehement that hous could not shake it it wa found rock 6 49 but he that heareth doeth not is like man that foundat built hous earth against which stream did beat vehement immedi it fell ruin that hous wa great 7 1 now when he had end all hi say audienc peopl he enter capernaum 7 2 certain centurion s servant who wa dear unto him wa sick readi die 7 3 when he heard jesu he sent unto him elder jew beseech him that he would come heal hi servant 7 4 when they came jesu they besought him instantli say that he wa worthi whom he should do thi 7 5 he loveth our nation he hath built us synagogu 7 6 then jesu went them when he wa now not far hous centurion sent friend him say unto him lord troubl not thyself i am not worthi that thou shouldest enter my roof 7 7 wherefor neither thought i myself worthi come unto thee but say word my servant shall be heal 7 8 i also am man set author have me soldier i say unto one go he goeth anoth come he cometh my servant do thi he doeth it 7 9 when jesu heard these thing he marvel him turn him said unto peopl that follow him i say unto you i have not found so great faith no not israel 7 10 they that were sent return hous found servant whole that had been sick 7 11 it came pass day that he went citi call nain mani hi discipl went him much peopl 7 12 now when he came nigh gate citi behold there wa dead man carri onli son hi mother she wa widow much peopl citi wa her 7 13 when lord saw her he had compass her said unto her weep not 7 14 he came touch bier they that bare him stood still he said young man i say unto thee aris 7 15 he that wa dead sat began speak he deliv him hi mother 7 16 there came fear all they glorifi god say that great prophet is risen us that god hath visit hi peopl 7 17 thi rumour him went forth all judaea all region round 7 18 discipl john shew him all these thing 7 19 john call unto him two hi discipl sent them jesu say art thou he that should come or look we anoth 7 20 when men were come unto him they said john baptist hath sent us unto thee say art thou he that should come or look we anoth 7 21 that same hour he cure mani their infirm plagu evil spirit unto mani that were blind he gave sight 7 22 then jesu answer said unto them go your way tell john what thing ye have seen heard how that blind see lame walk leper are cleans deaf hear dead are rais poor gospel is preach 7 23 bless is he whosoev shall not be offend me 7 24 when messeng john were depart he began speak unto peopl concern john what went ye wilder see reed shaken wind 7 25 but what went ye see man cloth soft raiment behold they which are gorgeous apparel live delic are king court 7 26 but what went ye see prophet yea i say unto you much more than prophet 7 27 thi is he whom it is written behold i send my messeng thi face which shall prepar thi way thee 7 28 i say unto you those that are born women there is not greater prophet than john baptist but he that is least kingdom god is greater than he 7 29 all peopl that heard him publican justifi god be baptiz baptism john 7 30 but pharise lawyer reject counsel god against themselv be not baptiz him 7 31 lord said whereunto then shall i liken men thi gener what are they like 7 32 they are like unto children sit marketplac call one anoth say we have pipe unto you ye have not danc we have mourn you ye have not wept 7 33 john baptist came neither eat bread nor drink wine ye say he hath devil 7 34 son man is come eat drink ye say behold glutton man winebibb friend publican sinner 7 35 but wisdom is justifi all her children 7 36 one pharise desir him that he would eat him he went pharise s hous sat down meat 7 37 behold woman citi which wa sinner when she knew that jesu sat meat pharise s hous brought alabast box ointment 7 38 stood hi feet behind him weep began wash hi feet tear did wipe them hair her head kiss hi feet anoint them ointment 7 39 now when pharise which had bidden him saw it he spake himself say thi man if he were prophet would have known who what manner woman thi is that toucheth him she is sinner 7 40 jesu answer said unto him simon i have somewhat say unto thee he saith master say 7 41 there wa certain creditor which had two debtor one owe five hundr penc other fifti 7 42 when they had noth pay he frankli forgav them both tell me therefor which them will love him most 7 43 simon answer said i suppos that he whom he forgav most he said unto him thou hast rightli judg 7 44 he turn woman said unto simon seest thou thi woman i enter thine hous thou gavest me no water my feet but she hath wash my feet tear wipe them hair her head 7 45 thou gavest me no kiss but thi woman time i came hath not ceas kiss my feet 7 46 my head oil thou didst not anoint but thi woman hath anoint my feet ointment 7 47 wherefor i say unto thee her sin which are mani are forgiven she love much but whom littl is forgiven same loveth littl 7 48 he said unto her thi sin are forgiven 7 49 they that sat meat him began say themselv who is thi that forgiveth sin also 7 50 he said woman thi faith hath save thee go peac 8 1 it came pass afterward that he went everi citi villag preach shew glad tide kingdom god twelv were him 8 2 certain women which had been heal evil spirit infirm mari call magdalen whom went seven devil 8 3 joanna wife chuza herod s steward susanna mani other which minist unto him their substanc 8 4 when much peopl were gather togeth were come him everi citi he spake parabl 8 5 sower went sow hi seed as he sow some fell way side it wa trodden down fowl air devour it 8 6 some fell rock as soon as it wa sprung it wither away becaus it lack moistur 8 7 some fell thorn thorn sprang it choke it 8 8 other fell good ground sprang bare fruit hundredfold when he had said these thing he cri he that hath ear hear let him hear 8 9 hi discipl ask him say what might thi parabl be 8 10 he said unto you it is given know mysteri kingdom god but other parabl that see they might not see hear they might not understand 8 11 now parabl is thi seed is word god 8 12 those way side are they that hear then cometh devil taketh away word their heart lest they should believ be save 8 13 they rock are they which when they hear receiv word joy these have no root which while believ time temptat fall away 8 14 that which fell thorn are they which when they have heard go forth are choke care rich pleasur thi life bring no fruit perfect 8 15 but that good ground are they which honest good heart have heard word keep it bring forth fruit patienc 8 16 no man when he hath light candl covereth it vessel or putteth it bed but setteth it candlestick that they which enter may see light 8 17 noth is secret that shall not be made manifest neither ani thing hid that shall not be known come abroad 8 18 take heed therefor how ye hear whosoev hath him shall be given whosoev hath not him shall be taken even that which he seemeth have 8 19 then came him hi mother hi brethren could not come him press 8 20 it wa told him certain which said thi mother thi brethren stand desir see thee 8 21 he answer said unto them my mother my brethren are these which hear word god do it 8 22 now it came pass certain day that he went ship hi discipl he said unto them let us go unto other side lake they launch forth 8 23 but as they sail he fell asleep there came down storm wind lake they were fill water were jeopardi 8 24 they came him awok him say master master we perish then he aros rebuk wind rage water they ceas there wa calm 8 25 he said unto them where is your faith they be afraid wonder say one anoth what manner man is thi he commandeth even wind water they obey him 8 26 they arriv countri gadaren which is against galile 8 27 when he went forth land there met him citi certain man which had devil long time ware no cloth neither abod ani hous but tomb 8 28 when he saw jesu he cri fell down him loud voic said what have i do thee jesu thou son god most high i beseech thee torment me not 8 29 he had command unclean spirit come man oftentim it had caught him he wa kept bound chain fetter he brake band wa driven devil wilder 8 30 jesu ask him say what is thi name he said legion becaus mani devil were enter him 8 31 they besought him that he would not command them go deep 8 32 there wa there herd mani swine feed mountain they besought him that he would suffer them enter them he suffer them 8 33 then went devil man enter swine herd ran violent down steep place lake were choke 8 34 when they that fed them saw what wa done they fled went told it citi countri 8 35 then they went see what wa done came jesu found man whom devil were depart sit feet jesu cloth hi right mind they were afraid 8 36 they also which saw it told them what mean he that wa possess devil wa heal 8 37 then whole multitud countri gadaren round besought him depart them they were taken great fear he went ship return back again 8 38 now man whom devil were depart besought him that he might be him but jesu sent him away say 8 39 return thine own hous shew how great thing god hath done unto thee he went hi way publish whole citi how great thing jesu had done unto him 8 40 it came pass that when jesu wa return peopl gladli receiv him they were all wait him 8 41 behold there came man name jairu he wa ruler synagogu he fell down jesu feet besought him that he would come hi hous 8 42 he had one onli daughter twelv year age she lay die but as he went peopl throng him 8 43 woman have issu blood twelv year which had spent all her live physician neither could be heal ani 8 44 came behind him touch border hi garment immedi her issu blood stanch 8 45 jesu said who touch me when all deni peter they that were him said master multitud throng thee press thee sayest thou who touch me 8 46 jesu said somebodi hath touch me i perceiv that virtu is gone me 8 47 when woman saw that she wa not hid she came trembl fall down him she declar unto him all peopl what caus she had touch him how she wa heal immedi 8 48 he said unto her daughter be good comfort thi faith hath made thee whole go peac 8 49 while he yet spake there cometh one ruler synagogu s hous say him thi daughter is dead troubl not master 8 50 but when jesu heard it he answer him say fear not believ onli she shall be made whole 8 51 when he came hous he suffer no man go save peter jame john father mother maiden 8 52 all wept bewail her but he said weep not she is not dead but sleepeth 8 53 they laugh him scorn know that she wa dead 8 54 he put them all took her hand call say maid aris 8 55 her spirit came again she aros straightway he command give her meat 8 56 her parent were astonish but he charg them that they should tell no man what wa done 9 1 then he call hi twelv discipl togeth gave them power author all devil cure diseas 9 2 he sent them preach kingdom god heal sick 9 3 he said unto them take noth your journey neither stave nor scrip neither bread neither money neither have two coat apiec 9 4 whatsoev hous ye enter there abid thenc depart 9 5 whosoev will not receiv you when ye go that citi shake off veri dust your feet testimoni against them 9 6 they depart went town preach gospel heal everi where 9 7 now herod tetrarch heard all that wa done him he wa perplex becaus that it wa said some that john wa risen dead 9 8 some that elia had appear other that one old prophet wa risen again 9 9 herod said john have i behead but who is thi whom i hear such thing he desir see him 9 10 apostl when they were return told him all that they had done he took them went asid privat desert place belong citi call bethsaida 9 11 peopl when they knew it follow him he receiv them spake unto them kingdom god heal them that had need heal 9 12 when day began wear away then came twelv said unto him send multitud away that they may go town countri round lodg get victual we are here desert place 9 13 but he said unto them give ye them eat they said we have no more but five loav two fish we should go buy meat all thi peopl 9 14 they were five thousand men he said hi discipl make them sit down fifti compani 9 15 they did so made them all sit down 9 16 then he took five loav two fish look heaven he bless them brake gave discipl set multitud 9 17 they did eat were all fill there wa taken fragment that remain them twelv basket 9 18 it came pass as he wa alon pray hi discipl were him he ask them say whom say peopl that i am 9 19 they answer said john baptist but some say elia other say that one old prophet is risen again 9 20 he said unto them but whom say ye that i am peter answer said christ god 9 21 he straitli charg them command them tell no man that thing 9 22 say son man must suffer mani thing be reject elder chief priest scribe be slain be rais third day 9 23 he said them all if ani man will come me let him deni himself take hi cross daili follow me 9 24 whosoev will save hi life shall lose it but whosoev will lose hi life my sake same shall save it 9 25 what is man advantag if he gain whole world lose himself or be cast away 9 26 whosoev shall be asham me my word him shall son man be asham when he shall come hi own glori hi father s holi angel 9 27 but i tell you truth there be some stand here which shall not tast death till they see kingdom god 9 28 it came pass eight day these say he took peter john jame went mountain pray 9 29 as he pray fashion hi counten wa alter hi raiment wa white glister 9 30 behold there talk him two men which were mose elia 9 31 who appear glori spake hi deceas which he should accomplish jerusalem 9 32 but peter they that were him were heavi sleep when they were awak they saw hi glori two men that stood him 9 33 it came pass as they depart him peter said unto jesu master it is good us be here let us make three tabernacl one thee one mose one elia not know what he said 9 34 while he thu spake there came cloud overshadow them they fear as they enter cloud 9 35 there came voic cloud say thi is my belov son hear him 9 36 when voic wa past jesu wa found alon they kept it close told no man those day ani those thing which they had seen 9 37 it came pass that next day when they were come down hill much peopl met him 9 38 behold man compani cri say master i beseech thee look my son he is mine onli child 9 39 lo spirit taketh him he suddenli crieth it teareth him that he foameth he wa yet come devil threw him down tare him jesu rebuk unclean spirit heal child deliv him again hi father 9 43 they were all amaz mighti power god but while they wonder everi one all thing which that say 9 46 then there aros reason them which them should be greatest 9 47 jesu perceiv thought their heart took child set him him 9 48 said unto them whosoev shall receiv thi child my name followeth not us 9 50 jesu said unto him forbid him not he that is not against us is us 9 51 it came pass when time wa come that he should be receiv he stedfastli set hi face go jerusalem 9 52 sent them they went anoth villag 9 57 it came pass that as they went way certain man said unto him lord i will follow thee whithersoev thou goest 9 58 jesu said unto him fox have hole bird air have nest but son man hath not where lay hi head 9 59 he said unto anoth follow me but he said lord suffer me first go buri my father 9 60 jesu said unto him let dead buri their dead but go thou preach kingdom these thing lord appoint other seventi also sent them two two hi face everi citi place whither he himself would come 10 2 therefor said he unto them harvest truli is great but labour are few pray ye is full light but when thine eye is evil thi bodi also is full dark 11 35 take heed therefor that light which is thee be not dark 11 36 if thi whole bodi therefor be full light have no part dark whole shall be full light as when bright shine candl doth give thee light 11 37 as he spake certain pharise besought him dine him he went sat down meat 11 38 when pharise saw it he marvel that he had not mother law 12 54 he said also peopl when ye see cloud rise west straightway ye say there cometh shower so it is 12 55 when ye see south wind blow ye say there will be heat it cometh pass 12 56 ye hypocrit ye can discern face sky earth but how is it that ye do not discern thi time 12 57 yea whi even yourselv judg ye not what is right 12 58 when thou goest thine adversari magistr as thou art way were present that season some that told him galilaean whose blood pilat had mingl their sacrific 13 2 jesu answer said unto them suppos ye that these galilaean were sinner all galilaean becaus they suffer such thing 13 3 i tell you nay but ye repent ye shall all likewis perish 13 4 or those eighteen whom tower siloam fell slew them think ye that they were sinner all men that dwelt jerusalem 13 5 i tell you nay but ye repent ye shall all likewis perish 13 6 he spake also thi parabl certain man had fig tree plant hi vineyard he came sought fruit thereon found none 13 7 then said he unto dresser hi vineyard behold these three year i come seek fruit thi fig tree find none cut it down whi cumbereth it ground 13 8 he answer said unto him lord let it alon thi year also till i shall dig it dung it 13 9 if it bear fruit well if not then that thou shalt cut it down 13 10 he wa teach one synagogu sabbath 13 11 behold there wa woman which had spirit infirm eighteen year wa bow togeth could no wise lift herself 13 12 when jesu saw her he call her him said unto her woman thou art loos thine infirm 13 13 he laid hi hand her immedi she wa made straight glorifi god 13 14 ruler synagogu answer indign becaus that jesu had heal sabbath day said unto peopl there are six day which men ought work them therefor come be heal not sabbath day 13 15 lord then answer him said thou hypocrit doth not each one you sabbath loos hi ox or hi ass stall lead him away water 13 16 ought not thi woman be daughter abraham whom satan hath bound lo these eighteen year be loos thi bond sabbath day 13 17 when he had said these thing all hi adversari were asham all peopl rejoic all gloriou thing that were done him 13 18 then said he unto what is kingdom god like whereunto shall i resembl it 13 19 it is like grain mustard seed which man took cast hi garden it grew wax great tree fowl air lodg branch it 13 20 again he said whereunto shall i liken kingdom god 13 21 it is like leaven which woman took hid three measur meal till whole wa leaven 13 22 he went citi villag teach journey jerusalem 13 23 then said one unto him lord are there few that be save he said unto them 13 24 strive enter strait gate mani i say unto you will seek enter shall not be abl 13 25 when onc master hous is risen hath shut door ye begin stand knock door say lord lord open unto us he shall answer say unto you i know you not whenc ye are 13 26 then shall ye begin say we have eaten drunk thi presenc thou hast taught our street 13 27 but he shall say i tell you i know you not whenc ye are depart me all ye worker iniqu 13 28 there shall be weep gnash teeth when ye shall see abraham isaac jacob all prophet kingdom god you yourselv thrust 13 29 they shall come east west north south shall sit down kingdom god 13 30 behold there are last which shall be first there are first which shall be last 13 31 same day there came certain pharise say unto him get thee depart henc herod will kill thee 13 32 he said unto them go ye tell that fox behold i cast devil i do cure day morrow third day i shall be perfect 13 33 nevertheless i must walk day morrow day follow it cannot be that prophet perish jerusalem 13 34 o jerusalem jerusalem which killest prophet stonest them that are sent unto thee how often would i have gather thi children togeth as hen doth gather her brood her wing ye would not 13 35 behold your hous is left unto you desol verili i say unto you ye shall not see me time come when ye shall say bless is he that cometh name lord 14 1 it came pass as he went hous one chief pharise eat bread sabbath day that they watch him 14 2 behold there wa certain man him which had dropsi 14 3 jesu answer spake unto lawyer pharise say is it law heal sabbath day 14 4 they held their peac he took him heal him let him go 14 5 answer them say which you shall have ass or ox fallen pit will not straightway pull him sabbath day 14 6 they could not answer him again these thing 14 7 he put forth parabl those which were bidden when he mark how they chose chief room say unto them 14 8 when thou art bidden ani man wed sit not down highest room lest more honour man than thou be bidden him 14 9 he that bade thee him come say thee give thi man place thou begin shame take lowest room 14 10 but when thou art bidden go sit down lowest room that when he that bade thee cometh he may say unto thee friend go higher then shalt thou have worship presenc them that sit meat thee 14 11 whosoev exalteth himself shall be abas he that humbleth himself shall be exalt 14 12 then said he also him that bade him when thou makest dinner or supper call not thi friend nor thi brethren neither thi kinsmen nor thi rich neighbour lest they also bid thee again recomp be made thee 14 13 but when thou makest feast call poor maim lame blind 14 14 thou shalt be bless they cannot recompens thee thou shalt be recompens resurrect just 14 15 when one them that sat meat him heard these thing he said unto him bless is he that shall eat bread kingdom god 14 16 then said he unto him certain man made great supper bade mani 14 17 sent hi servant supper time say them that were bidden come all thing are now readi 14 18 they all one consent began make excus first said unto him i have bought piec ground i must need go see it i pray thee have me excus 14 19 anoth said i have bought five yoke oxen i go prove them i pray thee have me excus 14 20 anoth said i have marri wife therefor i cannot come 14 21 so that servant came shew hi lord these thing then master hous be angri said hi servant go quickli street lane citi bring hither poor maim halt blind 14 22 servant said lord it is done as thou hast command yet there is room 14 23 lord said unto servant go highway hedg compel them come that my hous may be fill 14 24 i say unto you that none those men which were bidden shall tast my supper 14 25 there went great multitud him he turn said unto them 14 26 if ani man come me hate not hi father mother wife children brethren sister yea hi own life also he cannot be my discipl 14 27 whosoev doth not bear hi cross come me cannot be my discipl 14 28 which you intend build tower sitteth not down first counteth cost he have suffici finish it 14 29 lest hapli he hath laid foundat is not abl finish it all that behold it begin mock him 14 30 say thi man began build wa not abl finish 14 31 or what king go make war against anoth king sitteth not down first consulteth he be abl ten thousand meet him that cometh against him twenti thousand 14 32 or els while other is yet great way off he sendeth ambassag desireth condit peac 14 33 so likewis whosoev he be you that forsaketh not all that he hath he cannot be my discipl 14 34 salt is good but if salt have lost hi savour wherewith shall it be season 14 35 it is neither fit land nor yet dunghil but men cast it he that hath ear hear let him hear 15 1 then drew near unto him all publican sinner hear him 15 2 pharise scribe murmur say thi man receiveth sinner eateth them 15 3 he spake thi parabl unto them say 15 4 what man you have hundr sheep if he lose one them doth not leav nineti nine wilder go that which is lost he find it 15 5 when he hath found it he layeth it hi shoulder rejoic 15 6 when he cometh home he calleth togeth hi friend neighbour say unto them rejoic me i have found my sheep which wa lost 15 7 i say unto you that likewis joy shall be heaven one sinner that repenteth more than nineti nine just person which need no repent 15 8 either what woman have ten piec silver if she lose one piec doth not light candl sweep hous seek dilig till she find it 15 9 when she hath found it she calleth her friend her neighbour togeth say rejoic me i have found piec which i had lost 15 10 likewis i say unto you there is joy presenc angel god one sinner that repenteth 15 11 he said certain man had two son 15 12 younger them said hi father father give me portion good that falleth me he divid unto them hi live 15 13 not mani day younger son gather all togeth took hi journey far countri there wast hi substanc riotou live 15 14 when he had spent all there aros mighti famin that land he began be want 15 15 he went join himself citizen that countri he sent him hi field feed swine 15 16 he would fain have fill hi belli husk that swine did eat no man gave unto him 15 17 when he came himself he said how mani hire servant my father s have bread enough spare i perish hunger 15 18 i will aris go my father will say unto him father i have sin against heaven thee 15 19 am no more worthi be call thi son make me as one thi hire servant 15 20 he aros came hi father but when he wa yet great way off hi father saw him had compass ran fell hi neck kiss him 15 21 son said unto him father i have sin against heaven thi sight am no more worthi be call thi son 15 22 but father said hi servant bring forth best robe put it him put ring hi hand shoe hi feet 15 23 bring hither fat calf kill it let us eat be merri 15 24 thi my son wa dead is aliv again he wa lost is found they began be merri 15 25 now hi elder son wa field as he came drew nigh hous he heard musick danc 15 26 he call one servant ask what these thing meant 15 27 he said unto him thi brother is come thi father hath kill fat calf becaus he hath receiv him safe sound 15 28 he wa angri would not go therefor came hi father intreat him 15 29 he answer said hi father lo these mani year do i serv thee neither transgress i ani time thi command yet thou never gavest me kid that i might make merri my friend 15 30 but as soon as thi thi son wa come which hath devour thi live harlot thou hast kill him fat calf 15 31 he said unto him son thou art ever me all that i have is thine 15 32 it wa meet that we should make merri be glad thi thi brother wa dead is aliv again wa lost is found 16 1 he said also unto hi discipl there wa certain rich man which had steward same wa accus unto him that he had wast hi good 16 2 he call him said unto him how is it that i hear thi thee give account thi stewardship thou mayest be no longer steward 16 3 then steward said himself what shall i do my lord taketh away me stewardship i cannot dig beg i am asham 16 4 i am resolv what do that when i am put stewardship they may receiv me their hous 16 5 so he call everi one hi lord s debtor unto him said unto first how much owest thou unto my lord 16 6 he said hundr measur oil he said unto him take thi bill sit down quickli write fifti 16 7 then said he anoth how much owest thou he said hundr measur wheat he said unto him take thi bill write fourscor 16 8 lord commend unjust steward becaus he had done wise children thi world are their gener wiser than children light 16 9 i say unto you make yourselv friend mammon unright that when ye fail they may receiv you everlast habit 16 10 he that is faith that which is least is faith also much he that is unjust least is unjust also much 16 11 if therefor ye have not been faith unright mammon who will commit your trust true rich 16 12 if ye have not been faith that which is anoth man s who shall give you that which is your own 16 13 no servant can serv two master either he will hate one love other or els he will hold one despis other ye cannot serv god mammon 16 14 pharise also who were covet heard all these thing they derid him 16 15 he said unto them ye are they which justifi yourselv men but god knoweth your heart that which is highli esteem men is abomin sight god 16 16 law prophet were john that time kingdom god is preach everi man presseth it 16 17 it is easier heaven earth pass than one tittl law fail 16 18 whosoev putteth away hi wife marrieth anoth committeth adulteri whosoev marrieth her that is put away her husband committeth adulteri 16 19 there wa certain rich man which wa cloth purpl fine linen fare sumptuous everi day 16 20 there wa certain beggar name lazaru which wa laid hi gate full sore 16 21 desir be fed crumb which fell rich man s tabl moreov dog came lick hi sore 16 22 it came pass that beggar die wa carri angel abraham s bosom rich man also die wa buri 16 23 hell he lift hi eye be torment seeth abraham afar off lazaru hi bosom 16 24 he cri said father abraham have merci me send lazaru that he may dip tip hi finger water cool my tongu i am torment thi flame 16 25 but abraham said son rememb that thou thi lifetim receivedst thi good thing likewis lazaru evil thing but now he is comfort thou art torment 16 26 besid all thi us you there is great gulf fix so that they which would pass henc you cannot neither can they pass us that would come thenc 16 27 then he said i pray thee therefor father that thou wouldest send him my father s hous 16 28 i have five brethren that he may testifi unto them lest they also come thi place torment 16 29 abraham saith unto him they have mose prophet let them hear them 16 30 he said nay father abraham but if one went unto them dead they will repent 16 31 he said unto him if they hear not mose prophet neither will they be persuad though one rose dead 17 1 then said he unto discipl it is imposs but that offenc will come but woe unto him whom they come 17 2 it were better him that millston were hang hi neck he cast sea than that he should offend one these littl one 17 3 take heed yourselv if thi brother trespass against thee rebuk him if he repent forgiv him 17 4 if he trespass against thee seven time day seven time day turn again thee say i repent thou shalt forgiv him 17 5 apostl said unto lord increas our faith 17 6 lord said if ye had faith as grain mustard seed ye might say unto thi sycamin tree be thou pluck root be thou plant sea it should obey you 17 7 but which you have servant plow or feed cattl will say unto him when he is come field go sit down meat 17 8 will not rather say unto him make readi wherewith i may sup gird thyself serv me till i have eaten drunken afterward thou shalt eat drink 17 9 doth he thank that servant becaus he did thing that were command him i trow not 17 10 so likewis ye when ye shall have done all those thing which are command you say we are unprofit servant we have done that which wa our duti do 17 11 it came pass as he went jerusalem that he pass midst samaria galile 17 12 as he enter certain villag there met him ten men that were leper which stood afar off 17 13 they lift their voic said jesu master have merci us 17 14 when he saw them he said unto them go shew yourselv unto priest it came pass that as they went they were cleans 17 15 one them when he saw that he wa heal turn back loud voic glorifi god 17 16 fell down hi face hi feet give him thank he wa samaritan 17 17 jesu answer said were there not ten cleans but where are nine 17 18 there are not found that return give glori god save thi stranger 17 19 he said unto him aris go thi way thi faith hath made thee whole 17 20 when he wa demand pharise when kingdom god should come he answer them said kingdom god cometh not observ 17 21 neither shall they say lo here or lo there behold kingdom god is you 17 22 he said unto discipl day will come when ye shall desir see one day son man ye shall not see it 17 23 they shall say you see here or see there go not them nor follow them 17 24 as lightn that lighteneth one part heaven shineth unto other part heaven so shall also son man be hi day 17 25 but first must he suffer mani thing be reject thi gener 17 26 as it wa day noe so shall it be also day son man 17 27 they did eat they drank they marri wive they were given marriag day that noe enter ark flood came destroy them all 17 28 likewis also as it wa day lot they did eat they drank they bought they sold they plant they build 17 29 but same day that lot went sodom it rain fire brimston heaven destroy them all 17 30 even thu shall it be day when son man is reveal 17 31 that day he which shall be housetop hi stuff hous let him not come down take it away he that is field let him likewis not return back 17 32 rememb lot s wife 17 33 whosoev shall seek save hi life shall lose it whosoev shall lose hi life shall preserv it 17 34 i tell you that night there shall be two men one bed one shall be taken other shall be left 17 35 two women shall be grind togeth one shall be taken other left 17 36 two men shall be field one shall be taken other left 17 37 they answer said unto him where lord he said unto them wheresoev bodi is thither will eagl be gather togeth 18 1 he spake parabl unto them thi end that men ought alway pray not faint 18 2 say there wa citi judg which fear not god neither regard man 18 3 there wa widow that citi she came unto him say aveng me mine adversari 18 4 he would not while but afterward he said himself though i fear not god nor regard man 18 5 yet becaus thi widow troubleth me i will aveng her lest her continu come she weari me 18 6 lord said hear what unjust judg saith 18 7 shall not god aveng hi own elect which cri day night unto him though he bear long them 18 8 i tell you that he will aveng them speedili nevertheless when son man cometh shall he find faith earth 18 9 he spake thi parabl unto certain which trust themselv that they were righteou despis other 18 10 two men went templ pray one pharise other publican 18 11 pharise stood pray thu himself god i thank thee that i am not as other men are extortion unjust adulter or even as thi publican 18 12 i fast twice week i give tith all that i possess 18 13 publican stand afar off would not lift so much as hi eye unto heaven but smote hi breast say god be merci me sinner 18 14 i tell you thi man went down hi hous justifi rather than other everi one that exalteth himself shall be abas he that humbleth himself shall be exalt 18 15 they brought unto him also infant that he would touch them but when hi discipl saw it they rebuk them 18 16 but jesu call them unto him said suffer littl children come unto me forbid them not such is kingdom god 18 17 verili i say unto you whosoev shall not receiv kingdom god as littl child shall no wise enter therein 18 18 certain ruler ask him say good master what shall i do inherit etern life 18 19 jesu said unto him whi callest thou me good none is good save one that is god 18 20 thou knowest command do not commit adulteri do not kill do not steal do not bear fals wit honour thi father thi mother 18 21 he said all these have i kept my youth 18 22 now when jesu heard these thing he said unto him yet lackest thou one thing sell all that thou hast distribut unto poor thou shalt have treasur heaven come follow me 18 23 when he heard thi he wa veri sorrow he wa veri rich 18 24 when jesu saw that he wa veri sorrow he said how hardli shall they that have rich enter kingdom god 18 25 it is easier camel go needl s eye than rich man enter kingdom god 18 26 they that heard it said who then can be save 18 27 he said thing which are imposs men are possibl god 18 28 then peter said lo we have left all follow thee 18 29 he said unto them verili i say unto you there is no man that hath left hous or parent or brethren or wife or children kingdom god s sake 18 30 who shall not receiv manifold more thi present time world come life everlast 18 31 then he took unto him twelv said unto them behold we go jerusalem all thing that are written prophet concern son man shall be accomplish 18 32 he shall be deliv unto gentil shall be mock spite entreat spit 18 33 they shall scourg him put him death third day he shall rise again 18 34 they understood none these thing thi say wa hid them neither knew they thing which were spoken 18 35 it came pass that as he wa come nigh unto jericho certain blind man sat way side beg 18 36 hear multitud pass he ask what it meant 18 37 they told him that jesu nazareth passeth 18 38 he cri say jesu thou son david have merci me 18 39 they which went rebuk him that he should hold hi peac but he cri so much more thou son david have merci me 18 40 jesu stood command him be brought unto him when he wa come near he ask him 18 41 say what wilt thou that i shall do unto thee he said lord that i may receiv my sight 18 42 jesu said unto him receiv thi sight thi faith hath save thee 18 43 immedi he receiv hi sight follow him glorifi god all peopl when they saw it gave prais unto god 19 1 jesu enter pass jericho 19 2 behold there wa man name zacchaeu which wa chief publican he wa rich 19 3 he sought see jesu who he wa could not press becaus he wa littl statur 19 4 he ran climb sycomor tree see him he wa pass that way 19 5 when jesu came place he look saw him said unto him zacchaeu make hast come down day i must abid thi hous 19 6 he made hast came down receiv him joy 19 7 when they saw it they all murmur say that he wa gone be guest man that is sinner 19 8 zacchaeu stood said unto lord behold lord half my good i give poor if i have taken ani thing ani man fals accus i restor him fourfold 19 9 jesu said unto him thi day is salvat come thi hous forsomuch as he also is son abraham 19 10 son man is come seek save that which wa lost 19 11 as they heard these thing he ad spake parabl becaus he wa nigh jerusalem becaus they thought that kingdom god should immedi appear 19 12 he said therefor certain nobleman went far countri receiv himself kingdom return 19 13 he call hi ten servant deliv them ten pound said unto them occupi till i come 19 14 but hi citizen hate him sent messag him say we will not have thi man reign us 19 15 it came pass that when he wa return have receiv kingdom then he command these servant be call unto him whom he had given money that he might know how much everi man had gain trade 19 16 then came first say lord thi pound hath gain ten pound 19 17 he said unto him well thou good servant becaus thou hast been faith veri littl have thou author ten citi 19 18 second came say lord thi pound hath gain five pound 19 19 he said likewis him be thou also five citi 19 20 anoth came say lord behold here is thi pound which i have kept laid napkin 19 21 i fear thee becaus thou art auster man thou takest that thou layedst not down reapest that thou didst not sow 19 22 he saith unto him thine own mouth will i judg thee thou wick servant thou knewest that i wa auster man take that i laid not down reap that i did not sow 19 23 wherefor then gavest not thou my money bank that my come i might have requir mine own usuri 19 24 he said unto them that stood take him pound give it him that hath ten pound 19 25 they said unto him lord he hath ten pound 19 26 i say unto you that unto everi one which hath shall be given him that hath not even that he hath shall be taken away him 19 27 but those mine enemi which would not that i should reign them bring hither slay them me 19 28 when he had thu spoken he went ascend jerusalem 19 29 it came pass when he wa come nigh bethphag bethani mount call mount oliv he sent two hi discipl 19 30 say go ye villag against you which your enter ye shall find colt tie whereon yet never man sat loos him bring him hither 19 31 if ani man ask you whi do ye loos him thu shall ye say unto him becaus lord hath need him 19 32 they that were sent went their way found even as he had said unto them 19 33 as they were loos colt owner thereof said unto them whi loos ye colt 19 34 they said lord hath need him 19 35 they brought him jesu they cast their garment colt they set jesu thereon 19 36 as he went they spread their cloth way 19 37 when he wa come nigh even now descent mount oliv whole multitud discipl began rejoic prais god loud voic all mighti work that they had seen 19 38 say bless be king that cometh name lord peac heaven glori highest 19 39 some pharise multitud said unto him master rebuk thi discipl 19 40 he answer said unto them i tell you that if these should hold their peac stone would immedi cri 19 41 when he wa come near he beheld citi wept it 19 42 say if thou hadst known even thou least thi thi day thing which belong unto thi peac but now they are hid thine eye 19 43 day shall come thee that thine enemi shall cast trench thee compass thee round keep thee everi side 19 44 shall lay thee even ground thi children thee they shall not leav thee one stone anoth becaus thou knewest not time thi visit 19 45 he went templ began cast them that sold therein them that bought 19 46 say unto them it is written my hous is hous prayer but ye have made it den thiev 19 47 he taught daili templ but chief priest scribe chief peopl sought destroy him 19 48 could not find what they might do all peopl were veri attent hear him 20 1 it came pass that one those day as he taught peopl templ preach gospel chief priest scribe came him elder 20 2 spake unto him say tell us what author doest thou these thing or who is he that gave thee thi author 20 3 he answer said unto them i will also ask you one thing answer me 20 4 baptism john wa it heaven or men 20 5 they reason themselv say if we shall say heaven he will say whi then believ ye him not 20 6 but if we say men all peopl will stone us they be persuad that john wa prophet 20 7 they answer that they could not tell whenc it wa 20 8 jesu said unto them neither tell i you what author i do these thing 20 9 then began he speak peopl thi parabl certain man plant vineyard let it forth husbandmen went far countri long time 20 10 season he sent servant husbandmen that they should give him fruit vineyard but husbandmen beat him sent him away empti 20 11 again he sent anoth servant they beat him also entreat him shame sent him away empti 20 12 again he sent third they wound him also cast him 20 13 then said lord vineyard what shall i do i will send my belov son it may be they will rever him when they see him 20 14 but when husbandmen saw him they reason themselv say thi is heir come let us kill him that inherit may be our 20 15 so they cast him vineyard kill him what therefor shall lord vineyard do unto them 20 16 he shall come destroy these husbandmen shall give vineyard other when they heard it they said god forbid 20 17 he beheld them said what is thi then that is written stone which builder reject same is becom head corner 20 18 whosoev shall fall that stone shall be broken but whomsoev it shall fall it will grind him powder 20 19 chief priest scribe same hour sought lay hand him they fear peopl they perceiv that he had spoken thi parabl against them 20 20 they watch him sent forth spi which should feign themselv just men that they might take hold hi word that so they might deliv him unto power author governor 20 21 they ask him say master we know that thou sayest teachest rightli neither acceptest thou person ani but teachest way god truli 20 22 is it law us give tribut unto caesar or no 20 23 but he perceiv their crafti said unto them whi tempt ye me 20 24 shew me penni whose imag superscript hath it they answer said caesar s 20 25 he said unto them render therefor unto caesar thing which be caesar s unto god thing which be god s 20 26 they could not take hold hi word peopl they marvel hi answer held their peac 20 27 then came him certain sadduce which deni that there is ani resurrect they ask him 20 28 say master mose wrote unto us if ani man s brother die have wife he die children that hi brother should take hi wife rais seed unto hi brother 20 29 there were therefor seven brethren first took wife die children 20 30 second took her wife he die childless 20 31 third took her like manner seven also they left no children die 20 32 last all woman die also 20 33 therefor resurrect whose wife them is she seven had her wife 20 34 jesu answer said unto them children thi world marri are given marriag 20 35 but they which shall be account worthi obtain that world resurrect dead neither marri nor are given marriag 20 36 neither can they die ani more they are equal unto angel are children god be children resurrect 20 37 now that dead are rais even mose shew bush when he calleth lord god abraham god isaac god jacob 20 38 he is not god dead but live all live unto him 20 39 then certain scribe answer said master thou hast well said 20 40 that they durst not ask him ani question all 20 41 he said unto them how say they that christ is david s son 20 42 david himself saith book psalm lord said unto my lord sit thou my right hand 20 43 till i make thine enemi thi footstool 20 44 david therefor calleth him lord how is he then hi son 20 45 then audienc all peopl he said unto hi discipl 20 46 bewar scribe which desir walk long robe love greet market highest seat synagogu chief room feast 20 47 which devour widow hous shew make long prayer same shall receiv greater damnat 21 1 he look saw rich men cast their gift treasuri 21 2 he saw also certain poor widow cast thither two mite 21 3 he said truth i say unto you that thi poor widow hath cast more than they all 21 4 all these have their abund cast unto offer god but she her penuri hath cast all live that she had 21 5 as some spake templ how it wa adorn goodli stone gift he said 21 6 as these thing which ye behold day will come which there shall not be left one stone anoth that shall not be thrown down 21 7 they ask him say master but when shall these thing be what sign will there be when these thing shall come pass 21 8 he said take heed that ye be not deceiv mani shall come my name say i am christ time draweth near go ye not therefor them 21 9 but when ye shall hear war commot be not terrifi these thing must first come pass but end is not 21 10 then said he unto them nation shall rise against nation kingdom against kingdom 21 11 great earthquak shall be diver place famin pestil fear sight great sign shall there be heaven 21 12 but all these they shall lay their hand you persecut you deliv you synagogu prison be brought king ruler my name s sake 21 13 it shall turn you testimoni 21 14 settl it therefor your heart not medit what ye shall answer 21 15 i will give you mouth wisdom which all your adversari shall not be abl gainsay nor resist 21 16 ye shall be betray both parent brethren kinsfolk friend some you shall they caus be put death 21 17 ye shall be hate all men my name s sake 21 18 but there shall not hair your head perish 21 19 your patienc possess ye your soul 21 20 when ye shall see jerusalem compass armi then know that desol thereof is nigh 21 21 then let them which are judaea flee mountain let them which are midst it depart let not them that are countri enter thereinto 21 22 these be day vengeanc that all thing which are written may be fulfil 21 23 but woe unto them that are child them that give suck those day there shall be great distress land wrath thi peopl 21 24 they shall fall edg sword shall be led away captiv all nation jerusalem shall be trodden down gentil time gentil be fulfil 21 25 there shall be sign sun moon star earth distress nation perplex sea wave roar 21 26 men s heart fail them fear look those thing which are come earth power heaven shall be shaken 21 27 then shall they see son man come cloud power great glori 21 28 when these thing begin come pass then look lift your head your redempt draweth nigh 21 29 he spake them parabl behold fig tree all tree 21 30 when they now shoot forth ye see know your own selv that summer is now nigh hand 21 31 so likewis ye when ye see these thing come pass know ye that kingdom god is nigh hand 21 32 verili i say unto you thi gener shall not pass away till all be fulfil 21 33 heaven earth shall pass away but my word shall not pass away 21 34 take heed yourselv lest ani time your heart be overcharg surfeit drunken care thi life so that day come you unawar 21 35 as snare shall it come all them that dwell face whole earth 21 36 watch ye therefor pray alway that ye may be account worthi escap all these thing that shall come pass stand son man 21 37 day time he wa teach templ night he went abod mount that is call mount oliv 21 38 all peopl came earli morn him templ hear him 22 1 now feast unleaven bread drew nigh which is call passov 22 2 chief priest scribe sought how they might kill him they fear peopl 22 3 then enter satan juda surnam iscariot be number twelv 22 4 he went hi way commun chief priest captain how he might betray him unto them 22 5 they were glad coven give him money 22 6 he promis sought opportun betray him unto them absenc multitud 22 7 then came day unleaven bread when passov must be kill 22 8 he sent peter john say go prepar us passov that we may eat 22 9 they said unto him where wilt thou that we prepar 22 10 he said unto them behold when ye are enter citi there shall man meet you bear pitcher water follow him hous where he entereth 22 11 ye shall say unto goodman hous master saith unto thee where is guestchamb where i shall eat passov my discipl 22 12 he shall shew you larg upper room furnish there make readi 22 13 they went found as he had said unto them they made readi passov 22 14 when hour wa come he sat down twelv apostl him 22 15 he said unto them desir i have desir eat thi passov you i suffer 22 16 i say unto you i will not ani more eat thereof it be fulfil kingdom god 22 17 he took cup gave thank said take thi divid it yourselv 22 18 i say unto you i will not drink fruit vine kingdom god shall come 22 19 he took bread gave thank brake it gave unto them say thi is my bodi which is given you thi do remembr me 22 20 likewis also cup supper say thi cup is new testament my blood which is shed you 22 21 but behold hand him that betrayeth me is me tabl 22 22 truli son man goeth as it wa determin but woe unto that man whom he is betray 22 23 they began enquir themselv which them it wa that should do thi thing 22 24 there wa also strife them which them should be account greatest 22 25 he said unto them king gentil exercis lordship them they that exercis author them are call benefactor 22 26 but ye shall not be so but he that is greatest you let him be as younger he that is chief as he that doth serv 22 27 is greater he that sitteth meat or he that serveth is not he that sitteth meat but i am you as he that serveth 22 28 ye are they which have continu me my temptat 22 29 i appoint unto you kingdom as my father hath appoint unto me 22 30 that ye may eat drink my tabl my kingdom sit throne judg twelv tribe israel 22 31 lord said simon simon behold satan hath desir have you that he may sift you as wheat 22 32 but i have pray thee that thi faith fail not when thou art convert strengthen thi brethren 22 33 he said unto him lord i am readi go thee both prison death 22 34 he said i tell thee peter cock shall not crow thi day that thou shalt thrice deni that thou knowest me 22 35 he said unto them when i sent you purs scrip shoe lack ye ani thing they said noth 22 36 then said he unto them but now he that hath purs let him take it likewis hi scrip he that hath no sword let him sell hi garment buy one 22 37 i say unto you that thi that is written must yet be accomplish me he wa reckon transgressor thing concern me have end 22 38 they said lord behold here are two sword he said unto them it is enough 22 39 he came went as he wa wont mount oliv hi discipl also follow him 22 40 when he wa place he said unto them pray that ye enter not temptat 22 41 he wa withdrawn them stone s cast kneel down pray 22 42 say father if thou be will remov thi cup me nevertheless not my will but thine be done 22 43 there appear angel unto him heaven strengthen him 22 44 be agoni he pray more earnestli hi sweat wa as it were great drop blood fall down ground 22 45 when he rose prayer wa come hi discipl he found them sleep sorrow 22 46 said unto them whi sleep ye rise pray lest ye enter temptat 22 47 while he yet spake behold multitud he that wa call juda one twelv went them drew near unto jesu kiss him 22 48 but jesu said unto him juda betrayest thou son man kiss 22 49 when they which were him saw what would follow they said unto him lord shall we smite sword 22 50 one them smote servant high priest cut off hi right ear 22 51 jesu answer said suffer ye thu far he touch hi ear heal him 22 52 then jesu said unto chief priest captain templ elder which were come him be ye come as against thief sword stave 22 53 when i wa daili you templ ye stretch forth no hand against me but thi is your hour power dark 22 54 then took they him led him brought him high priest s hous peter follow afar off 22 55 when they had kindl fire midst hall were set down togeth peter sat down them 22 56 but certain maid beheld him as he sat fire earnestli look him said thi man wa also him 22 57 he deni him say woman i know him not 22 58 littl while anoth saw him said thou art also them peter said man i am not 22 59 space one hour anoth confid affirm say truth thi fellow also wa him he is galilaean 22 60 peter said man i know not what thou sayest immedi while he yet spake cock crew 22 61 lord turn look peter peter rememb word lord how he had said unto him cock crow thou shalt deni me thrice 22 62 peter went wept bitterli 22 63 men that held jesu mock him smote him 22 64 when they had blindfold him they struck him face ask him say prophesi who is it that smote thee 22 65 mani other thing blasphem spake they against him 22 66 as soon as it wa day elder peopl chief priest scribe came togeth led him their council say 22 67 art thou christ tell us he said unto them if i tell you ye will not believ 22 68 if i also ask you ye will not answer me nor let me go 22 69 hereaft shall son man sit right hand power god 22 70 then said they all art thou then son god he said unto them ye say that i am 22 71 they said what need we ani further wit we ourselv have heard hi own mouth 23 1 whole multitud them aros led him unto pilat 23 2 they began accus him say we found thi fellow pervert nation forbid give tribut caesar say that he himself is christ king 23 3 pilat ask him say art thou king jew he answer him said thou sayest it 23 4 then said pilat chief priest peopl i find no fault thi man 23 5 they were more fierc say he stirreth peopl teach all jewri begin galile thi place 23 6 when pilat heard galile he ask man were galilaean 23 7 as soon as he knew that he belong unto herod s jurisdict he sent him herod who himself also wa jerusalem that time 23 8 when herod saw jesu he wa exceed glad he wa desir see him long season becaus he had heard mani thing him he hope have seen some miracl done him 23 9 then he question him mani word but he answer him noth 23 10 chief priest scribe stood vehement accus him 23 11 herod hi men war set him nought mock him array him gorgeou robe sent him again pilat 23 12 same day pilat herod were made friend togeth they were enmiti themselv 23 13 pilat when he had call togeth chief priest ruler peopl 23 14 said unto them ye have brought thi man unto me as one that perverteth peopl behold i have examin him you have found no fault thi man touch those thing whereof ye accus him 23 15 no nor yet herod i sent you him lo noth worthi death is done unto him 23 16 i will therefor chastis him releas him 23 17 necess he must releas one unto them feast 23 18 they cri all onc say away thi man releas unto us barabba 23 19 who certain sedit made citi murder wa cast prison 23 20 pilat therefor will releas jesu spake again them 23 21 but they cri say crucifi him crucifi him 23 22 he said unto them third time whi what evil hath he done i have found no caus death him i will therefor chastis him let him go 23 23 they were instant loud voic requir that he might be crucifi voic them chief priest prevail 23 24 pilat gave sentenc that it should be as they requir 23 25 he releas unto them him that sedit murder wa cast prison whom they had desir but he deliv jesu their will 23 26 as they led him away they laid hold one simon cyrenian come countri him they laid cross that he might bear it jesu 23 27 there follow him great compani peopl women which also bewail lament him 23 28 but jesu turn unto them said daughter jerusalem weep not me but weep yourselv your children 23 29 behold day are come which they shall say bless are barren womb that never bare pap which never gave suck 23 30 then shall they begin say mountain fall us hill cover us 23 31 if they do these thing green tree what shall be done dri 23 32 there were also two other malefactor led him be put death 23 33 when they were come place which is call calvari there they crucifi him malefactor one right hand other left 23 34 then said jesu father forgiv them they know not what they do they part hi raiment cast lot 23 35 peopl stood behold ruler also them derid him say he save other let him save himself if he be christ chosen god 23 36 soldier also mock him come him offer him vinegar 23 37 say if thou be king jew save thyself 23 38 superscript also wa written him letter greek latin hebrew thi is king jew 23 39 one malefactor which were hang rail him say if thou be christ save thyself us 23 40 but other answer rebuk him say dost not thou fear god see thou art same condemn 23 41 we inde justli we receiv due reward our deed but thi man hath done noth amiss 23 42 he said unto jesu lord rememb me when thou comest thi kingdom 23 43 jesu said unto him verili i say unto thee day shalt thou be me paradis 23 44 it wa sixth hour there wa dark all earth ninth hour 23 45 sun wa darken veil templ wa rent midst 23 46 when jesu had cri loud voic he said father thi hand i commend my spirit have said thu he gave ghost 23 47 now when centurion saw what wa done he glorifi god say certainli thi wa righteou man 23 48 all peopl that came togeth that sight behold thing which were done smote their breast return 23 49 all hi acquaint women that follow him galile stood afar off behold these thing 23 50 behold there wa man name joseph counsellor he wa good man just 23 51 same had not consent counsel deed them he wa arimathaea citi jew who also himself wait kingdom god 23 52 thi man went unto pilat beg bodi jesu 23 53 he took it down wrap it linen laid it sepulchr that wa hewn stone wherein never man wa laid 23 54 that day wa prepar sabbath drew 23 55 women also which came him galile follow beheld sepulchr how hi bodi wa laid 23 56 they return prepar spice ointment rest sabbath day accord command 24 1 now first day week veri earli morn they came unto sepulchr bring spice which they had prepar certain other them 24 2 they found stone roll away sepulchr 24 3 they enter found not bodi lord jesu 24 4 it came pass as they were much perplex thereabout behold two men stood them shine garment 24 5 as they were afraid bow down their face earth they said unto them whi seek ye live dead 24 6 he is not here but is risen rememb how he spake unto you when he wa yet galile 24 7 say son man must be deliv hand sin men be crucifi third day rise again 24 8 they rememb hi word 24 9 return sepulchr told all these thing unto eleven all rest 24 10 it wa mari magdalen joanna mari mother jame other women that were them which told these thing unto apostl 24 11 their word seem them as idl tale they believ them not 24 12 then aros peter ran unto sepulchr stoop down he beheld linen cloth laid themselv depart wonder himself that which wa come pass 24 13 behold two them went that same day villag call emmau which wa jerusalem threescor furlong 24 14 they talk togeth all these thing which had happen 24 15 it came pass that while they commun togeth reason jesu himself drew near went them 24 16 but their eye were holden that they should not know him 24 17 he said unto them what manner commun are these that ye have one anoth as ye walk are sad 24 18 one them whose name wa cleopa answer said unto him art thou onli stranger jerusalem hast not known thing which are come pass there these day 24 19 he said unto them what thing they said unto him concern jesu nazareth which wa prophet mighti deed word god all peopl 24 20 how chief priest our ruler deliv him be condemn death have crucifi him 24 21 but we trust that it had been he which should have redeem israel besid all thi day is third day these thing were done 24 22 yea certain women also our compani made us astonish which were earli sepulchr 24 23 when they found not hi bodi they came say that they had also seen vision angel which said that he wa aliv 24 24 certain them which were us went sepulchr found it even so as women had said but him they saw not 24 25 then he said unto them o fool slow heart believ all that prophet have spoken 24 26 ought not christ have suffer these thing enter hi glori 24 27 begin mose all prophet he expound unto them all scriptur thing concern himself 24 28 they drew nigh unto villag whither they went he made as though he would have gone further 24 29 but they constrain him say abid us it is even day is far spent he went tarri them 24 30 it came pass as he sat meat them he took bread bless it brake gave them 24 31 their eye were open they knew him he vanish their sight 24 32 they said one anoth did not our heart burn us while he talk us way while he open us scriptur 24 33 they rose same hour return jerusalem found eleven gather togeth them that were them 24 34 say lord is risen inde hath appear simon 24 35 they told what thing were done way how he wa known them break bread 24 36 as they thu spake jesu himself stood midst them saith unto them peac be unto you 24 37 but they were terrifi affright suppos that they had seen spirit 24 38 he said unto them whi are ye troubl whi do thought aris your heart 24 39 behold my hand my feet that it is i myself handl me see spirit hath not flesh bone as ye see me have 24 40 when he had thu spoken he shew them hi hand hi feet 24 41 while they yet believ not joy wonder he said unto them have ye here ani meat 24 42 they gave him piec broil fish honeycomb 24 43 he took it did eat them 24 44 he said unto them these are word which i spake unto you while i wa yet you that all thing must be fulfil which were written law mose prophet psalm concern me 24 45 then open he their understand that they might understand scriptur 24 46 said unto them thu it is written thu it behov christ suffer rise dead third day 24 47 that repent remiss sin should be preach hi name all nation begin jerusalem 24 48 ye are wit these thing 24 49 behold i send promis my father you but tarri ye citi jerusalem ye be endu power high 24 50 he led them as far as bethani he lift hi hand bless them 24 51 it came pass while he bless them man 2 1 third day there wa marriag cana galile mother jesu wa there 2 2 both jesu wa call hi discipl marriag 2 3 when they want wine mother jesu saith unto him they have no wine 2 4 jesu saith unto her woman what have i do thee mine hour is not yet come 2 5 hi mother saith unto servant whatsoev he saith unto you do it 2 6 there were set there six waterpot stone manner purifi jew contain two or three firkin apiec 2 7 jesu saith unto them fill waterpot water they fill them brim 2 8 he saith unto them draw now bear unto governor feast they bare it 2 9 when ruler feast had tast water that wa made wine knew not whenc it wa but servant which drew water knew governor feast call bridegroom 2 10 saith unto him everi man begin doth set forth good wine when men have well drunk then that which is wors but thou hast kept good wine now 2 11 thi begin miracl did jesu cana galile manifest forth hi glori hi discipl believ him 2 12 thi he went down capernaum he hi mother hi brethren hi discipl they continu there not mani day 2 13 jew passov wa hand jesu went jerusalem 2 14 found templ those that sold oxen sheep dove changer money sit 2 15 when he had made scourg small cord he drove them all templ sheep oxen pour changer money overthrew tabl 2 16 said unto them that sold dove take these thing henc make not my father s hous hous merchandis 2 17 hi discipl rememb that it wa written zeal thine hous hath eaten me 2 18 then answer jew said unto him what sign shewest thou unto us see that thou doest these thing 2 19 jesu answer said unto them destroy thi templ three day i will rais it 2 20 then said jew forti six year wa thi templ build wilt thou rear it three day 2 21 but he spake templ hi bodi 2 22 when therefor he wa risen dead hi discipl rememb that he had said thi unto them they knew all men 2 25 need not that ani should testifi man he knew what wa man 3 1 there wa man pharise name nicodemu ruler jew 3 2 same came jesu night said unto him rabbi we know that thou art teacher come god no man can do these miracl that thou doest god be him 3 3 jesu answer said unto him verili verili i say unto thee man be born again he cannot see kingdom god 3 4 nicodemu saith unto him how can man be born when he is old can he enter second time hi mother s womb be born 3 5 jesu answer verili verili i say unto thee man be born water spirit he cannot enter kingdom god 3 6 that which is born flesh is flesh that which is born spirit is spirit 3 7 marvel not that i said unto thee ye must be born again 3 8 wind bloweth where it listeth thou hearest sound thereof but canst not tell whenc it cometh whither it goeth so is everi one that is born spirit 3 9 nicodemu answer said unto him how can these thing be 3 10 jesu answer said unto him art thou master israel knowest not these thing 3 thing 3 13 no man hath ascend heaven but he that came down heaven even son man which is heaven 3 14 as mose lift serpent wilder even so must son man be lift 3 15 that whosoev believeth him should not perish but have etern life 3 16 god so love world that he gave hi onli begotten son that whosoev believeth him should not perish but have everlast life 3 17 god sent not hi son world condemn world but that world him might be save 3 18 he that believeth him is not condemn but he that believeth not is condemn alreadi becaus he hath not believ name onli begotten son god 3 19 thi is condemn that light is come world men love dark rather than light becaus their deed were evil 3 20 everi one that doeth evil hateth light neither cometh light lest hi deed should be reprov 3 21 but he that doeth truth cometh light that hi deed may be made manifest that they are wrought god 3 22 these thing came jesu hi discipl land judaea there he tarri them baptiz 3 23 john also wa baptiz aenon near salim becaus there wa much water there they came were baptiz 3 24 john wa not yet cast prison 3 25 then there aros question some john s discipl jew purifi 3 26 they came unto john said unto him rabbi he that wa that i am sent him 3 29 he that hath bride is bridegroom but friend bridegroom which standeth heareth him rejoiceth greatli becaus bridegroom s voic thi my joy therefor is fulfil 3 30 he must increas but i must decreas 3 31 he that cometh is all he that is earth is earthli speaketh earth he that cometh heaven is all 3 32 what he hath seen heard that he testifieth no man receiveth hi testimoni 3 33 he that hath receiv hi testimoni hath set hi seal that god is true 3 34 he whom god hath sent speaketh word god god giveth not spirit measur unto him 3 35 father loveth son hath given all thing hi hand 3 36 he that believeth son hath everlast life he that believeth not son shall not see life but wrath god abideth him 4 1 when therefor lord knew how pharise had heard that jesu made baptiz more discipl than john 4 2 though jesu himself baptiz not but hi discipl 4 3 he left judaea depart again galile 4 4 he must need go samaria 4 5 then cometh he citi samaria which is call sychar near parcel ground that jacob gave hi son joseph 4 6 now jacob s well wa there jesu therefor be weari hi journey sat thu well it wa sixth hour 4 7 there cometh woman samaria draw water jesu saith unto her give me drink 4 8 hi discipl were gone away unto citi buy meat 4 9 then saith woman samaria unto him how is it that thou be jew askest drink me which am woman samaria jew have no deal samaritan 4 10 jesu answer said unto her if thou knewest gift god who it is that saith thee give me drink thou wouldest have ask him he would have given thee live water 4 11 woman saith unto him sir thou hast noth draw well is deep whenc then hast thou that live water 4 12 art thou greater than our father jacob which gave us well drank thereof himself hi children hi cattl 4 13 jesu answer said unto her whosoev drinketh thi water shall thirst again 4 14 but whosoev drinketh water that i shall give him shall never thirst but water that i shall give him shall be him well water spring everlast life 4 15 woman saith unto him sir give me thi water that i thirst not neither come hither draw 4 16 jesu saith unto her go call thi husband come hither 4 17 woman answer said i have no husband jesu said unto her thou hast well said i have no husband 4 18 thou hast had five husband he whom thou now hast is not thi husband that saidst thou truli 4 19 woman saith unto him sir i perceiv that thou art prophet 4 20 have meat eat that ye know not 4 33 therefor said discipl one anoth hath ani man brought him ought eat 4 34 jesu saith unto them my meat is do will him that sent me finish hi work 4 35 say not ye
