whole whatsoev diseas he had 5 5 certain man wa there which had infirm thirti eight year 5 6 when jesu saw him lie knew that he had been now long time that case he saith unto him wilt thou be made whole 5 7 impot man answer him sir i have no man when water is troubl put me pool but while i am come anoth steppeth down me 5 8 jesu saith unto him rise take thi bed walk 5 9 immedi man wa made whole took hi bed walk same day wa sabbath 5 10 jew therefor said unto him that wa cure it is sabbath day it is not law thee carri thi bed 5 11 he answer them he that made me whole same said unto me take thi bed walk 5 12 then ask they him what man is that which said unto thee take thi bed walk 5 13 he that wa heal wist not who it wa jesu had convey himself away multitud be that place 5 14 afterward jesu findeth him templ said unto him behold thou art made whole sin no more lest wors thing come unto thee 5 15 man depart told jew that it wa jesu which had made him whole 5 16 therefor did jew persecut jesu sought slay him becaus he had done these thing sabbath day 5 17 but jesu answer them my father worketh hitherto i work 5 18 therefor jew sought more kill him becaus he not onli had broken sabbath but said also that god wa hi father make himself equal god 5 19 then answer jesu said unto them verili verili i say unto you son can do noth himself but what he seeth father do what thing soever he doeth these also doeth son likewis 5 20 father loveth son sheweth him all thing that himself doeth he will shew him greater work than these that ye may marvel 5 21 as father raiseth dead quickeneth them even so son quickeneth whom he will 5 22 father judgeth no man but hath commit all judgment unto son 5 23 that all men should honour son even as they honour father he that honoureth not son honoureth not father which hath sent him 5 24 verili verili i say unto you he that heareth my word believeth him that sent me hath everlast life shall not come condemn but is pass death unto life 5 25 verili verili i say unto you hour is come now is when dead shall hear voic son god they that hear shall live 5 26 as father hath life himself so hath he given son have life himself 5 27 hath given him author execut judgment also becaus he is son man 5 28 marvel not thi hour is come which all that are grave shall hear hi voic 5 29 shall come forth they that have done good unto resurrect life they that have done evil unto resurrect damnat 5 30 i can mine own self do noth as i hear i judg my judgment is just becaus i seek not mine own will but will father which hath sent me 5 31 if i bear wit myself my wit is not true 5 32 there is anoth that beareth wit me i know that wit which he witnesseth me is true 5 33 ye sent unto john he bare wit unto truth 5 34 but i receiv honour one anoth seek not honour that cometh god onli 5 45 do not think that i will accus you father there is one that accuseth you even mose whom ye trust 5 46 had ye believ mose ye would have believ me he wrote me 5 47 but if ye believ not hi write how shall ye believ my word 6 1 these thing jesu went sea galile which is sea tiberia 6 2 great multitud follow him becaus they saw hi miracl which he did them that were diseas 6 3 jesu went mountain there he sat hi discipl 6 4 passov feast jew wa nigh 6 5 when jesu then lift hi eye saw great compani come unto him he saith unto philip whenc shall we buy bread that these may eat 6 6 thi he said prove him he himself knew what he would do 6 7 philip answer him two hundr pennyworth bread is not suffici them that everi one them may take littl 6 8 one hi discipl andrew simon peter s brother saith unto him 6 9 there is lad here which hath five barley loav two small fish but what are they so mani 6 10 jesu said make men sit down now there wa much grass place so men sat down number five thousand 6 11 jesu took loav when he had given thank he distribut discipl discipl them that were set down likewis fish as much as they would 6 12 when they were fill he said unto hi discipl gather fragment that remain that noth be lost 6 13 therefor they gather them togeth fill twelv basket fragment five barley loav which remain unto them that had eaten 6 14 then those men when they had seen miracl that jesu did said thi is truth that prophet that should come world 6 15 when jesu therefor perceiv that they would come take him forc make him king he depart again mountain himself alon 6 16 when even wa now come hi discipl went down unto sea 6 17 enter ship went sea capernaum it wa now dark jesu wa not come them 6 18 sea aros reason great wind that blew 6 19 so when they had row five twenti or thirti furlong they see jesu walk sea draw nigh unto ship they were afraid 6 20 but he saith unto them it is i be not afraid 6 21 then they willingli receiv him ship immedi ship wa land whither they went 6 22 day follow when peopl which stood other side sea saw that there wa none other boat there save that one whereinto hi discipl were enter that jesu went not hi discipl boat but that hi discipl were gone away alon 6 23 howbeit there came other boat tiberia nigh unto place where they did eat bread that lord had given thank 6 24 when peopl therefor saw that jesu wa not there neither hi discipl they also took ship came capernaum seek jesu 6 25 when they had found him other side sea they said unto him rabbi when camest thou hither 6 26 jesu answer them said verili verili i say unto you ye seek me not becaus ye saw miracl but becaus ye did eat loav were fill 6 27 labour not meat which perisheth but that meat which endureth unto everlast life which son man shall give unto you him hath god father seal 6 28 then said they unto him what shall we do that we might work work god 6 29 jesu answer said unto them thi is work god that ye believ him whom he hath sent 6 30 they said therefor unto him what sign shewest thou then that we may see believ thee what dost thou work 6 31 our father did eat manna desert as it is written he gave them bread heaven eat 6 32 then jesu said unto them verili verili i say unto you mose gave you not that bread heaven but my father giveth you true bread heaven 6 33 bread god is he which cometh down heaven giveth life unto world 6 34 then said they unto him lord evermor give us thi bread 6 35 jesu said unto them i am bread life he that cometh me shall never hunger he that believeth me shall never thirst 6 36 but i said unto you that ye also have seen me believ not 6 37 all that father giveth me shall come me him that cometh me i will no wise cast 6 38 i came down heaven not do mine own will but will him that sent me 6 39 thi is father s will which hath sent me that all which he hath given me i should lose noth but should rais it again last day 6 40 thi is will him that sent me that everi one which seeth son believeth him may have everlast life i will rais him last day 6 41 jew then murmur him becaus he said i am bread which came down heaven 6 42 they said is not thi jesu son joseph whose father mother we know how is it then that he saith i came down heaven 6 43 jesu therefor answer said unto them murmur not yourselv 6 44 no man can come me father which hath sent me draw him i will rais him last day 6 45 it is written prophet they shall be all taught god everi man therefor that hath heard hath learn father cometh unto me 6 46 not that ani man hath seen father save he which is god he hath seen father 6 47 verili verili i say unto you he that believeth me hath everlast life 6 48 i am that bread life 6 49 your father did eat manna wilder are dead 6 50 thi is bread which cometh down heaven that man may eat thereof not die 6 51 i am live bread which came down heaven if ani man eat thi bread he shall live ever bread that i will give is my flesh which i will give life world 6 52 jew therefor strove themselv say how can thi man give us hi flesh eat 6 53 then jesu said unto them verili verili i say unto you ye eat flesh son man drink hi blood ye have no life you 6 54 whoso eateth my flesh drinketh my blood hath etern life i will rais him last day 6 55 my flesh is meat inde my blood is drink inde 6 56 he that eateth my flesh drinketh my blood dwelleth me i him 6 57 as live father hath sent me i live father so he that eateth me even he shall live me 6 58 thi is that bread which came down heaven not as your father did eat manna are dead he that eateth thi bread shall live ever 6 59 these thing said he synagogu as he taught capernaum 6 60 mani therefor hi discipl when they had heard thi said thi is hard say who can hear it 6 61 when jesu knew himself that hi discipl murmur it he said unto them doth thi offend you 6 62 what if ye shall see son man ascend where he wa 6 63 it is spirit that quickeneth flesh profiteth noth word that i speak unto you they are spirit they are life 6 64 but there are some you that believ not jesu knew begin who they were that believ not who should betray him 6 65 he said therefor said i unto you that no man can come unto me it were given unto him my father 6 66 that time mani hi discipl went back walk no more him 6 67 then said jesu unto twelv will ye also go away 6 68 then simon peter answer him lord whom shall we go thou hast word etern life 6 69 we believ are sure that thou art that christ son live god 6 70 jesu answer them have not i chosen you twelv one you is devil 6 71 he spake juda iscariot son simon he it wa that should betray him be one twelv 7 1 these thing jesu walk galile he would not walk jewri becaus jew sought kill him 7 2 now jew s feast tabernacl wa hand 7 3 hi brethren therefor said unto him depart henc go judaea that thi discipl also may see work that thou doest 7 4 there is no man that doeth ani thing secret he himself seeketh be known openli if thou do these thing shew thyself world 7 5 neither did hi brethren believ him 7 6 then jesu said unto them my time is not yet come but your time is alway readi 7 7 world cannot hate you but me it hateth becaus i testifi it that work thereof are evil 7 8 go ye unto thi feast i go not yet unto thi feast my time is not yet full come 7 9 when he had said these word unto them he abod still galile 7 10 but when hi brethren were gone then went he also unto feast not openli but as it were secret 7 11 then jew sought him feast said where is he 7 12 there wa much murmur peopl concern him some said he is good man other said nay but he deceiveth peopl 7 13 howbeit no man spake openli him fear jew 7 14 now midst feast jesu went templ taught 7 15 jew marvel say how knoweth thi man letter have never learn 7 16 jesu answer them said my doctrin is not mine but hi that sent me 7 17 if ani man will do hi will he shall know doctrin it be god or i speak myself 7 18 he that speaketh himself seeketh hi own glori but he that seeketh hi glori that sent him same is true no unright is him 7 19 did not mose give you law yet none you keepeth law whi go ye kill me 7 20 peopl answer said thou hast devil who goeth kill thee 7 21 jesu answer said unto them i have done one work ye all marvel 7 22 mose therefor gave unto you circumcis not becaus it is mose but father ye sabbath day circumcis man 7 23 if man sabbath day receiv circumcis that law mose should not be broken are ye angri me becaus i have made man everi whit whole sabbath day 7 24 judg not accord appear but judg righteou judgment 7 25 then said some them jerusalem is not thi he whom they seek kill 7 26 but lo he speaketh boldli they say noth unto him do ruler know inde that thi is veri christ 7 27 howbeit we know thi man whenc he is but when christ cometh no man knoweth whenc he is 7 28 then cri jesu templ as he taught say ye both know me ye know whenc i am i am not come myself but he that sent me is true whom ye know not 7 29 but i know him i am him he hath sent me 7 30 then they sought take him but no man laid hand him becaus hi hour wa not yet come 7 31 mani peopl believ him said when christ cometh will he do more miracl than these which thi man hath done 7 32 pharise heard that peopl murmur such thing concern him pharise chief priest sent offic take him 7 33 then said jesu unto them yet littl while am i you then i go unto him that sent me 7 34 ye shall seek me shall not find me where i am thither ye cannot come 7 35 then said jew themselv whither will he go that we shall not find him will he go unto dispers gentil teach gentil 7 36 what manner say is thi that he said ye shall seek me shall not find me where i am thither ye cannot come 7 37 last day that great day feast jesu stood cri say if ani man thirst let him come unto me drink 7 38 he that believeth me as scriptur hath said hi belli shall flow river live water 7 39 but thi spake he spirit which they that believ him should receiv holi ghost wa not yet given becaus that jesu wa not yet glorifi 7 40 mani peopl therefor when they heard thi say said truth thi is prophet 7 41 other said thi is christ but some said shall christ come galile 7 42 hath not scriptur said that christ cometh seed david town bethlehem where david wa 7 43 so there wa divis peopl becaus him 7 44 some them would have taken him but no man laid hand him 7 45 then came offic chief priest pharise they said unto them whi have ye not brought him 7 46 offic answer never man spake like thi man 7 47 then answer them pharise are ye also deceiv 7 48 have ani ruler or pharise believ him 7 49 but thi peopl who knoweth not law are curs 7 50 nicodemu saith unto them he that came jesu night be one them 7 51 doth our law judg ani man it hear him know what he doeth 7 52 they answer said unto him art thou also galile search look galile ariseth no prophet 7 53 everi man went unto hi own hous 8 1 jesu went unto mount oliv 8 2 earli morn he came again templ all peopl came unto him he sat down taught them 8 3 scribe pharise brought unto him woman taken adulteri when they had set her midst 8 4 they say unto him master thi woman wa taken adulteri veri act 8 5 now mose law command us that such should be stone but what sayest thou 8 6 thi they said tempt him that they might have accus him but jesu stoop down hi finger wrote ground as though he heard them not 8 7 so when they continu ask him he lift himself said unto them he that is sin you let him first cast stone her 8 8 again he stoop down wrote ground 8 9 they which heard it be convict their own conscienc went one one begin eldest even unto last jesu wa left alon woman stand midst 8 10 when jesu had lift himself saw none but woman he said unto her woman where are those thine accus hath no man condemn thee 8 11 she said no man lord jesu said unto her neither do i condemn thee go sin no more 8 12 then spake jesu again unto them say i am light world he that followeth me shall not walk dark but shall have light life 8 13 pharise therefor said unto him thou bearest record thyself thi record is not true 8 14 jesu answer said unto them though i bear record myself yet my record is true i know whenc i came whither i go but ye cannot tell whenc i come whither i go 8 15 ye judg flesh i judg no man 8 16 yet if i judg my judgment is true i am not alon but i father that sent me 8 17 it is also written your law that testimoni two men is true 8 18 i am one that bear wit myself father that sent me beareth wit me 8 19 then said they unto him where is thi father jesu answer ye neither know me nor my father if ye had known me ye should have known my father also 8 20 these word spake jesu treasuri as he taught templ no man laid hand him hi hour wa not yet come 8 21 then said jesu again unto them i go my way ye shall seek me shall die your sin whither i go ye cannot come 8 22 then said jew will he kill himself becaus he saith whither i go ye cannot come 8 23 he said unto them ye are beneath i am ye are thi world i am not thi world 8 24 i said therefor unto you that ye shall die your sin if ye believ not that i am he ye shall die your sin 8 25 then said they unto him who art thou jesu saith unto them even same that i said unto you begin 8 26 i have mani thing say judg you but he that sent me is true i speak world those thing which i have heard him 8 27 they understood not that he spake them father 8 28 then said jesu unto them when ye have lift son man then shall ye know that i am he that i do noth myself but as my father hath taught me i speak these thing 8 29 he that sent me is me father hath not left me alon i do alway those thing that pleas him 8 30 as he spake these word mani believ him 8 31 then said jesu those jew which believ him if ye continu my word then are ye my discipl inde 8 32 ye shall know truth truth shall make you free 8 33 they answer him we be abraham s seed were never bondag ani man how sayest thou ye shall be made free 8 34 jesu answer them verili verili i say unto you whosoev committeth sin is servant sin 8 35 servant abideth not hous ever but son abideth ever 8 36 if son therefor shall make you free ye shall be free inde 8 37 i know that ye are abraham s seed but ye seek kill me becaus my word hath no place you 8 38 i speak that which i have seen my father ye do that which ye have seen your father 8 39 they answer said unto him abraham is our father jesu saith unto them if ye were abraham s children ye would do work abraham 8 40 but now ye seek kill me man that hath told you truth which i have heard god thi did not abraham 8 41 ye do deed your father then said they him we be not born fornic we have one father even god 8 42 jesu said unto them if god were your father ye would love me i proceed forth came god neither came i myself but he sent me 8 43 whi do ye not understand my speech even becaus ye cannot hear my word 8 44 ye are your father devil lust your father ye will do he wa murder begin abod not truth becaus there is no truth him when he speaketh lie he speaketh hi own he is liar father it 8 45 becaus i tell you truth ye believ me not 8 46 which you convinceth me sin if i say truth whi do ye not believ me 8 47 he that is god heareth god s word ye therefor hear them not becaus ye are not god 8 48 then answer jew said unto him say we not well that thou art samaritan hast devil 8 49 jesu answer i have not devil but i honour my father ye do dishonour me 8 50 i seek not mine own glori there is one that seeketh judgeth 8 51 verili verili i say unto you if man keep my say he shall never see death 8 52 then said jew unto him now we know that thou hast devil abraham is dead prophet thou sayest if man keep my say he shall never tast death 8 53 art thou greater than our father abraham which is dead prophet are dead whom makest thou thyself 8 54 jesu answer if i honour myself my honour is noth it is my father that honoureth me whom ye say that he is your god 8 55 yet ye have not known him but i know him if i should say i know him not i shall be liar like unto you but i know him keep hi say 8 56 your father abraham rejoic see my day he saw it wa glad 8 57 then said jew unto him thou art not yet fifti year old hast thou seen abraham 8 58 jesu said unto them verili verili i say unto you abraham wa i am 8 59 then took they stone cast him but jesu hid himself went templ go midst them so pass 9 1 as jesu pass he saw man which wa blind hi birth 9 2 hi discipl ask him say master who did sin thi man or hi parent that he wa born blind 9 3 jesu answer neither hath thi man sin nor hi parent but that work god should be made manifest him 9 4 i must work work him that sent me while it is day night cometh when no man can work 9 5 as long as i am world i am light world 9 6 when he had thu spoken he spat ground made clay spittl he anoint eye blind man clay 9 7 said unto him go wash pool siloam which is interpret sent he went hi way therefor wash came see 9 8 neighbour therefor they which had seen him that he wa blind said is not thi he that sat beg 9 9 some said thi is he other said he is like him but he said i am he 9 10 therefor said they unto him how were thine eye open 9 11 he answer said man that is call jesu made clay anoint mine eye said unto me go pool siloam wash i went wash i receiv sight 9 12 then said they unto him where is he he said i know not 9 13 they brought pharise him that aforetim wa blind 9 14 it wa sabbath day when jesu made clay open hi eye 9 15 then again pharise also ask him how he had receiv hi sight he said unto them he put clay mine eye i wash do see 9 16 therefor said some pharise thi man is not god becaus he keepeth not sabbath day other said how can man that is sinner do such miracl there wa divis them 9 17 they say unto blind man again what sayest thou him that he hath open thine eye he said he is prophet 9 18 but jew did not believ concern him that he had been blind receiv hi sight they call parent him that had receiv hi sight 9 19 they ask them say is thi your son who ye say wa born blind how then doth he now see 9 20 hi parent answer them said we know that thi is our son that he wa born blind 9 21 but what mean he now seeth we know not or who hath open hi eye we know not he is age ask him he shall speak himself 9 22 these word spake hi parent becaus they fear jew jew had agre alreadi that if ani man did confess that he wa christ he should be put synagogu 9 23 therefor said hi parent he is age ask him 9 24 then again call they man that wa blind said unto him give god prais we know that thi man is sinner 9 25 he answer said he be sinner or no i know not one thing i know that wherea i wa blind now i see 9 26 then said they him again what did he thee how open he thine eye 9 27 he answer them i have told you alreadi ye did not hear wherefor would ye hear it again will ye also be hi discipl 9 28 then they revil him said thou art hi discipl but we are mose discipl 9 29 we know that god spake unto mose as thi fellow we know not whenc he is 9 30 man answer said unto them whi herein is marvel thing that ye know not whenc he is yet he hath open mine eye 9 31 now we know that god heareth not sinner but if ani man be worshipp god doeth hi will him he heareth 9 32 world began wa it not heard that ani man open eye one that wa born blind 9 33 if thi man were not god he could do noth 9 34 they answer said unto him thou wast altogeth born sin dost thou teach us they cast him 9 35 jesu heard that they had cast him when he had found him he said unto him dost thou believ son god 9 36 he answer said who is he lord that i might believ him 9 37 jesu said unto him thou hast both seen him it is he that talketh thee 9 38 he said lord i believ he worship him 9 39 jesu said judgment i am come thi world that they which see not might see that they which see might be made blind 9 40 some pharise which were him heard these word said unto him are we blind also 9 41 jesu said unto them if ye were blind ye should have no sin but now ye say we see therefor your sin remaineth 10 1 verili verili i say unto you he that entereth not door sheepfold but climbeth some other way same is thief robber 10 2 but he that entereth door is shepherd sheep 10 3 him porter openeth sheep hear hi voic he calleth hi own sheep name leadeth them 10 4 when he putteth forth hi own sheep he goeth them sheep follow him they know hi voic 10 5 stranger will they not follow but will flee him they know not voic stranger 10 6 thi parabl spake jesu unto them but they understood not what thing they were which he spake unto them 10 7 then said jesu unto them again verili verili i say unto you i am door sheep 10 8 all that ever came me are thiev robber but sheep did not hear them 10 9 i am door me if ani man enter he shall be save shall go find pastur 10 10 thief cometh not but steal kill destroy i am come that they might have life that they might have it more abundantli 10 11 i am good shepherd good shepherd giveth hi life sheep 10 12 but he that is hirel not shepherd whose own sheep are not seeth wolf come leaveth sheep fleeth wolf catcheth them scattereth sheep 10 13 hirel fleeth becaus he is hirel careth not sheep 10 14 i am good shepherd know my sheep am known mine 10 15 as father knoweth me even so know i father i lay down my life sheep 10 16 other sheep i have which are not thi fold them also i must bring they shall hear my voic there shall be one fold one shepherd 10 17 therefor doth my father love me becaus i lay down my life that i might take it again 10 18 no man taketh it me but i lay it down myself i have power lay it down i have power take it again thi command have i receiv my father 10 19 there wa divis therefor again jew these say 10 20 mani them said he hath devil is mad whi hear ye him 10 21 other said these are not word him that hath devil can devil open eye blind 10 22 it wa jerusalem feast dedic it wa winter 10 23 jesu walk templ solomon s porch 10 24 then came jew round him said unto him how long dost thou make us doubt if thou be christ tell us plainli 10 25 jesu answer them i told you ye believ not work that i do my father s name they bear wit me 10 26 but ye believ not becaus ye are not my sheep as i said unto you 10 27 my sheep hear my voic i know them they follow me 10 28 i give unto them etern life they shall never perish neither shall ani man pluck them my hand 10 29 my father which gave them me is greater than all no man is abl pluck them my father s hand 10 30 i my father are one 10 31 then jew took stone again stone him 10 32 jesu answer them mani good work have i shew you my father which those work do ye stone me 10 33 jew answer him say good work we stone thee not but blasphemi becaus that thou be man makest thyself god 10 34 jesu answer them is it not written your law i said ye are god 10 35 if he call them god unto whom word god came scriptur cannot be broken 10 36 say ye him whom father hath sanctifi sent world thou blasphemest becaus i said i am son god 10 37 if i do not work my father believ me not 10 38 but if i do though ye believ not me believ work that ye may know believ that father is me i him 10 39 therefor they sought again take him but he escap their hand 10 40 went away again jordan place where john first baptiz there he abod 10 41 mani resort unto him said john did no miracl but all thing that john spake thi man were true 10 42 mani believ him there 11 1 now certain man wa sick name lazaru bethani town mari her sister martha 11 2 it wa that mari which anoint lord ointment wipe hi feet her hair whose brother lazaru wa sick 11 3 therefor hi sister sent unto him say lord behold he whom thou lovest is sick 11 4 when jesu heard that he said thi sick is not unto death but glori god that son god might be glorifi therebi 11 5 now jesu love martha her sister lazaru 11 6 when he had heard therefor that he wa sick he abod two day still same place where he wa 11 7 then that saith he hi discipl let us go judaea again 11 8 hi discipl say unto him master jew late sought stone thee goest thou thither again 11 9 jesu answer are there not twelv hour day if ani man walk day he stumbleth not becaus he seeth light thi world 11 10 but if man walk night he stumbleth becaus there is no light him 11 11 these thing said he that he saith unto them our friend lazaru sleepeth but i go that i may awak him sleep 11 12 then said hi discipl lord if he sleep he shall do well 11 13 howbeit jesu spake hi death but they thought that he had spoken take rest sleep 11 14 then said jesu unto them plainli lazaru is dead 11 15 i am glad your sake that i wa not there intent ye may believ nevertheless let us go unto him 11 16 then said thoma which is call didymu unto hi fellowdiscipl let us also go that we may die him 11 17 then when jesu came he found that he had lain grave four day alreadi 11 18 now bethani wa nigh unto jerusalem fifteen furlong off 11 19 mani jew came martha mari comfort them concern their brother 11 20 then martha as soon as she heard that jesu wa come went met him but mari sat still hous 11 21 then said martha unto jesu lord if thou hadst been here my brother had not die 11 22 but i know that even now whatsoev thou wilt ask god god will give it thee 11 23 jesu saith unto her thi brother shall rise again 11 24 martha saith unto him i know that he shall rise again resurrect last day 11 25 jesu said unto her i am resurrect life he that believeth me though he were dead yet shall he live 11 26 whosoev liveth believeth me shall never die believest thou thi 11 27 she saith unto him yea lord i believ that thou art christ son god which should come world 11 28 when she had so said she went her way call mari her sister secretli say master is come calleth thee 11 29 as soon as she heard that she aros quickli came unto him 11 30 now jesu wa not yet come town but wa that place where martha met him 11 31 jew then which were her hous comfort her when they saw mari that she rose hastili went follow her say she goeth unto grave weep there 11 32 then when mari wa come where jesu wa saw him she fell down hi feet say unto him lord if thou hadst been here my brother had not die 11 33 when jesu therefor saw her weep jew also weep which came her he groan spirit wa troubl 11 34 said where have ye laid him they said unto him lord come see 11 35 jesu wept 11 36 then said jew behold how he love him 11 37 some them said could not thi man which open eye blind have caus that even thi man should not have die 11 38 jesu therefor again groan himself cometh grave it wa cave stone lay it 11 39 jesu said take ye away stone martha sister him that wa dead saith unto him lord thi time he stinketh he hath been dead four day 11 40 jesu saith unto her said i not unto thee that if thou wouldest believ thou shouldest see glori god 11 41 then they took away stone place where dead wa laid jesu lift hi eye said father i thank thee that thou hast heard me 11 42 i knew that thou hearest me alway but becaus peopl which stand i said it that they may believ that thou hast sent me 11 43 when he thu had spoken he cri loud voic lazaru come forth 11 44 he that wa dead came forth bound hand foot gravecloth hi face wa bound napkin jesu saith unto them loos him let him go 11 45 then mani jew which came mari had seen thing which jesu did believ him 11 46 but some them went their way pharise told them what thing jesu had done 11 47 then gather chief priest pharise council said what do we thi man doeth mani miracl 11 48 if we let him thu alon all men will believ him roman shall come take away both our place nation 11 49 one them name caiapha be high priest that same year said unto them ye know noth all 11 50 nor consid that it is expedi us that one man should die peopl that whole nation perish not 11 51 thi spake he not himself but be high priest that year he prophesi that jesu should die that nation 11 52 not that nation onli but that also he should gather togeth one children god that were scatter abroad 11 53 then that day forth they took counsel togeth put him death 11 54 jesu therefor walk no more openli jew but went thenc unto countri near wilder citi call ephraim there continu hi discipl 11 55 jew passov wa nigh hand mani went countri jerusalem passov purifi themselv 11 56 then sought they jesu spake themselv as they stood templ what think ye that he will not come feast 11 57 now both chief priest pharise had given command that if ani man knew where he were he should shew it that they might take him 12 1 then jesu six day passov came bethani where lazaru wa which had been dead whom he rais dead 12 2 there they made him supper martha serv but lazaru wa one them that sat tabl him 12 3 then took mari pound ointment spikenard veri costli anoint feet jesu wipe hi feet her hair hous wa fill odour ointment 12 4 then saith one hi discipl juda iscariot simon s son which should betray him 12 5 whi wa not thi ointment sold three hundr penc given poor 12 6 thi he said not that he care poor but becaus he wa thief had bag bare what wa put therein 12 7 then said jesu let her alon against day my buri hath she kept thi 12 8 poor alway ye have you but me ye have not alway 12 9 much peopl jew therefor knew that he wa there they came not jesu sake onli but that they might see lazaru also whom he had rais dead 12 10 but chief priest consult that they might put lazaru also death 12 11 becaus that reason him mani jew went away believ jesu 12 12 next day much peopl that were come feast when they heard that jesu wa come jerusalem 12 13 took branch palm tree went forth meet him cri hosanna bless is king israel that cometh name lord 12 14 jesu when he had found young ass sat thereon as it is written 12 15 fear not daughter sion behold thi king cometh sit ass s colt 12 16 these thing understood not hi discipl first but when jesu wa glorifi then rememb they that these thing were written him that they had done these thing unto him 12 17 peopl therefor that wa him when he call lazaru hi grave rais him dead bare record 12 18 thi caus peopl also met him that they heard that he had done thi miracl 12 19 pharise therefor said themselv perceiv ye how ye prevail noth behold world is gone him 12 20 there were certain greek them that came worship feast 12 21 same came therefor philip which wa bethsaida galile desir him say sir we would see jesu 12 22 philip cometh telleth andrew again andrew philip tell jesu 12 23 jesu answer them say hour is come that son man should be glorifi 12 24 verili verili i say unto you corn wheat fall ground die it abideth alon but if it die it bringeth forth much fruit 12 25 he that loveth hi life shall lose it he that hateth hi life thi world shall keep it unto life etern 12 26 if ani man serv me let him follow me where i am there shall also my servant be if ani man serv me him will my father honour 12 27 now is my soul troubl what shall i say father save me thi hour but thi caus came i unto thi hour 12 28 father glorifi thi name then came there voic heaven say i have both glorifi it will glorifi it again 12 29 peopl therefor that stood heard it said that it thunder other said angel spake him 12 30 jesu answer said thi voic came not becaus me but your sake 12 31 now is judgment thi world now shall princ thi world be cast 12 32 i if i be lift earth will draw all men unto me 12 33 thi he said signifi what death he should die 12 34 peopl answer him we have heard law that christ abideth ever how sayest thou son man must be lift who is thi son man 12 35 then jesu said unto them yet littl while is light you walk while ye have light lest dark come you he that walketh them yet they believ not him 12 38 that say esaia prophet might be fulfil which he spake lord who hath believ our report whom hath arm lord been reveal 12 39 therefor they could not believ becaus that esaia said again 12 40 he hath blind their eye harden their heart that they should not see their eye nor understand their heart be convert i should heal them 12 41 these thing said esaia when he saw judg him last day 12 49 i have not spoken myself but father which sent me he gave me command what i should say what i should speak 12 50 i know that hi command is life everlast whatsoev i speak therefor even as father said unto me so i speak 13 1 now feast passov when jesu knew that hi hour wa come that he should depart thi world unto father have love hi own which were world he love them unto end 13 2 supper be end devil have now put heart juda iscariot simon s son betray him 13 3 jesu know that father had given all thing hi hand that he wa come god went god 13 4 he riseth supper laid asid hi garment took towel gird himself 13 5 that he poureth water bason began wash discipl feet wipe them towel wherewith he wa gird 13 6 then cometh he simon peter peter saith unto him lord dost thou wash my feet 13 7 jesu answer said unto him what i do thou knowest not now but thou shalt know hereaft 13 8 peter saith unto him thou shalt never wash my feet jesu answer him if i wash thee not thou hast no part me 13 9 simon peter saith unto him lord not my feet onli but also my hand my head 13 10 jesu saith him he that is wash needeth not save wash hi feet but is clean everi whit ye are clean but not all 13 11 he knew who should betray him therefor said he ye are not all clean 13 12 so he had wash their feet had taken hi garment wa set down again he said unto them know ye what i have done you 13 13 ye call me master lord ye say well so i am 13 14 if i then your lord master have wash your feet ye also ought wash one anoth s feet 13 15 i have given you exampl that ye should do as i that i am he 13 20 verili verili i say unto you he that receiveth whomsoev i send receiveth me he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me 13 21 when jesu had thu said he wa troubl spirit testifi said verili verili i say unto you that one you shall betray me 13 22 then discipl look one anoth doubt whom he spake 13 23 now there wa lean jesu bosom one hi discipl whom jesu love 13 24 simon peter jesu lord what shall thi man do 21 22 jesu saith unto him if i will that he tarri till i come what is that thee follow thou me 21 23 then went thi say abroad brethren that that discipl should not die yet jesu said not unto him he shall not die but if i will that he tarri till i come what is that thee 21 24 thi is discipl which testifieth these thing wrote these thing we know that hi testimoni is true 21 25 there are also mani other thing which jesu did which if they should be written everi one i suppos that even world itself could not contain book that should be written amen act apostl 1 1 former treatis have i made o theophilu all that jesu began both do teach 1 2 day which he wa taken that he holi ghost had given command unto apostl whom he had chosen 1 3 whom also he shew himself aliv hi passion mani infal proof be seen them forti day speak thing pertain kingdom god 1 4 be assembl togeth them command them that they should not depart jerusalem but wait promis father which saith he ye have heard me 1 5 john truli baptiz water but ye shall be baptiz holi ghost not mani day henc 1 6 when they therefor were come togeth they ask him say lord wilt thou thi time restor again kingdom israel 1 7 he said unto them it is not you know time or season which father hath put hi own power 1 8 but ye shall receiv power that holi ghost is come you ye shall be wit unto me both jerusalem all judaea samaria unto uttermost part earth 1 9 when he had spoken these thing while they beheld he wa taken cloud receiv him their sight 1 10 while they look stedfastli heaven as he went behold two men stood them white apparel 1 11 which also said ye men galile whi stand ye gaze heaven thi same jesu which is taken you heaven shall so come like manner as ye have seen him go heaven 1 12 then return they unto jerusalem mount call olivet which is jerusalem sabbath day s journey 1 13 when they were come they went upper room where abod both peter jame john andrew philip thoma bartholomew matthew jame son alphaeu simon zelot juda brother jame 1 14 these all continu one accord prayer supplic women mari mother jesu hi brethren 1 15 those day peter stood midst discipl said number name togeth were hundr twenti 1 16 men brethren thi scriptur must need have been fulfil which holi ghost mouth david spake concern juda which wa guid them that took jesu 1 17 he wa number us had obtain part thi ministri 1 18 now thi man purchas field reward iniqu fall headlong he burst asund midst all hi bowel gush 1 19 it wa known unto all dweller jerusalem insomuch as that field is call their proper tongu aceldama that is say field blood 1 20 it is written book psalm let hi habit be desol let no man dwell therein hi bishoprick let anoth take 1 21 wherefor these men which have compani us all time that lord jesu went us 1 22 begin baptism john unto that same day that he wa taken us must one be ordain be wit us hi resurrect 1 23 they appoint two joseph call barsaba who wa surnam justu matthia 1 24 they pray said thou lord which knowest heart all men shew these two thou hast chosen 1 25 that he may take part thi ministri apostleship which juda transgress fell that he might go hi own place 1 26 they gave forth their lot lot fell matthia he wa number eleven apostl 2 1 when day pentecost wa fulli come they were all one accord one place 2 2 suddenli there came sound heaven as rush mighti wind it fill all hous where they were sit 2 3 there appear unto them cloven tongu like as fire it sat each them 2 4 they were all fill holi ghost began speak other tongu as spirit gave them utter 2 5 there were dwell jerusalem jew devout men everi nation heaven 2 6 now when thi wa nois abroad multitud came togeth were confound becaus that everi man heard them speak hi own languag 2 7 they were all amaz marvel say one anoth behold are not all these which speak galilaean 2 8 how hear we everi man our own tongu wherein we were born 2 9 parthian mede elamit dweller mesopotamia judaea cappadocia pontu asia 2 10 phrygia pamphylia egypt part libya cyren stranger rome jew proselyt 2 11 crete arabian we do hear them speak our tongu wonder work god 2 12 they were all amaz were doubt say one anoth what meaneth thi 2 13 other mock said these men are full new wine 2 14 but peter stand eleven lift hi voic said unto them ye men judaea all ye that dwell jerusalem be thi known unto you hearken my word 2 15 these are not drunken as ye suppos see it is but third hour day 2 16 but thi is that which wa spoken prophet joel 2 17 it shall come pass last day saith god i will pour my spirit all flesh your son your daughter shall prophesi your young men shall see vision your old men shall dream dream 2 18 my servant my handmaiden i will pour those day my spirit they shall prophesi 2 19 i will shew wonder heaven sign earth beneath blood fire vapour smoke 2 20 sun shall be turn dark moon blood great notabl day lord come 2 21 it shall come pass that whosoev shall call name lord shall be save 2 22 ye men israel hear these word jesu nazareth man approv god you miracl wonder sign which god did him midst you as ye yourselv also know 2 23 him be deliv determin counsel foreknowledg god ye have taken wick hand have crucifi slain 2 24 whom god hath rais have loos pain death becaus it wa not possibl that he should be holden it 2 25 david speaketh concern him i foresaw lord alway my face he is my right hand that i should not be move 2 26 therefor did my heart rejoic my tongu wa glad moreov also my flesh shall rest hope 2 27 becaus thou wilt not leav my soul hell neither wilt thou suffer thine holi one see corrupt 2 28 thou hast made known me way life thou shalt make me full joy thi counten 2 29 men brethren let me freeli speak unto you patriarch david that he is both dead buri hi sepulchr is us unto thi day 2 30 therefor be prophet know that god had sworn oath him that fruit hi loin accord flesh he would rais christ sit hi throne 2 31 he see thi spake resurrect christ that hi soul wa not left hell neither hi flesh did see corrupt 2 32 thi jesu hath god rais whereof we all are wit 2 33 therefor be right hand god exalt have receiv father promis holi ghost he hath shed forth thi which ye now see hear 2 34 david is not ascend heaven but he saith himself lord said unto my lord sit thou my right hand 2 35 i make thi foe thi footstool 2 36 therefor let all hous israel know assuredli that god hath made same jesu whom ye have crucifi both lord christ 2 37 now when they heard thi they were prick their heart said unto peter rest apostl men brethren what shall we do 2 38 then peter said unto them repent be baptiz everi one you name jesu christ remiss sin ye shall receiv gift holi ghost 2 39 promis is unto you your children all that are afar off even as mani as lord our god shall call 2 40 mani other word did he testifi exhort say save yourselv thi untoward gener 2 41 then they that gladli receiv hi word were baptiz same day there were ad unto them three thousand soul 2 42 they continu stedfastli apostl doctrin fellowship break bread prayer 2 43 fear came everi soul mani wonder sign were done apostl 2 44 all that believ were togeth had all thing common 2 45 sold their possess good part them all men as everi man had need 2 46 they continu daili one accord templ break bread hous hous did eat their meat glad singl heart 2 47 prais god have favour all peopl lord ad church daili such as should be save 3 1 now peter john went togeth templ hour prayer be ninth hour 3 2 certain man lame hi mother s womb wa carri whom they laid daili gate templ which is call beauti ask alm them that enter templ 3 3 who see peter john go templ ask alm 3 4 peter fasten hi eye him john said look us 3 5 he gave heed unto them expect receiv someth them 3 6 then peter said silver gold have i none but such as i have give i thee name jesu christ nazareth rise walk 3 7 he took him right hand lift him immedi hi feet ankl bone receiv strength 3 8 he leap stood walk enter them templ walk leap prais god 3 9 all peopl saw him walk prais god 3 10 they knew that it wa he which sat alm beauti gate templ they were fill wonder amaz that which had happen unto him 3 11 as lame man which wa heal held peter john all peopl ran togeth unto them porch that is call solomon s greatli wonder 3 12 when peter saw it he answer unto peopl ye men israel whi marvel ye thi or whi look ye so earnestli us as though our own power or holi we had made thi man walk 3 13 god abraham isaac jacob god our father hath glorifi hi son jesu whom ye deliv deni him presenc pilat when he wa determin let him go 3 14 but ye deni holi one just desir murder be grant unto you 3 15 kill princ life whom god hath rais dead whereof we are wit 3 16 hi name faith hi name hath made thi man strong whom ye see know yea faith which is him hath given him thi perfect sound presenc you all 3 17 now brethren i wot that ignor ye did it as did also your ruler 3 18 but those thing which god had shew mouth all hi prophet that christ should suffer he hath so fulfil 3 19 repent ye therefor be convert that your sin may be blot when time refresh shall come presenc lord 3 20 he shall send jesu christ which wa preach unto you 3 21 whom heaven must receiv time restitut all thing which god hath spoken mouth all hi holi prophet world began 3 22 mose truli said unto father prophet shall lord your god rais unto you your brethren like unto me him shall ye hear all thing whatsoev he shall say unto you 3 23 it shall come pass that everi soul which will not hear that prophet shall be destroy peopl 3 24 yea all prophet samuel those that follow as mani as have spoken have likewis foretold these day 3 25 ye are children prophet coven which god made our father say unto abraham thi seed shall all kindr earth be bless 3 26 unto you first god have rais hi son jesu sent him bless you turn away everi one you hi iniqu 4 1 as they spake unto peopl priest captain templ sadduce came them 4 2 be griev that they taught peopl preach jesu resurrect dead 4 3 they laid hand them put them hold unto next day it wa now eventid 4 4 howbeit mani them which heard word believ number men wa five thousand 4 5 it came pass morrow that their ruler elder scribe 4 6 anna high priest caiapha john alexand as mani as were kindr high priest were gather togeth jerusalem 4 7 when they had set them midst they ask what power or what name have ye done thi 4 8 then peter fill holi ghost said unto them ye ruler peopl elder israel 4 9 if we thi day be examin good deed done impot man what mean he is made whole 4 10 be it known unto you all all peopl israel that name jesu christ nazareth whom ye crucifi whom god rais dead even him doth thi man stand here you whole 4 11 thi is stone which wa set nought you builder which is becom head corner 4 12 neither is there salvat ani other there is none other name heaven given men wherebi we must be save 4 13 now when they saw bold peter john perceiv that they were unlearn ignor men they marvel they took knowledg them that they had been jesu 4 14 behold man which wa heal stand them they could say noth against it 4 15 but when they had command them go asid council they confer themselv 4 16 say what shall we do these men that inde notabl miracl hath been done them is manifest all them that dwell jerusalem we cannot deni it 4 17 but that it spread no further peopl let us straitli threaten them that they speak henceforth no man thi name 4 18 they call them command them not speak all nor teach name jesu 4 19 but peter john answer said unto them it be right sight god hearken unto you more than unto god judg ye 4 20 we cannot but speak thing which we have seen heard 4 21 so when they had further threaten them they let them go find noth how they might punish them becaus peopl all men glorifi god that which wa done 4 22 man wa forti year old whom thi miracl heal wa shew 4 23 be let go they went their own compani report all that chief priest elder had said unto them 4 24 when they heard that they lift their voic god one accord said lord thou art god which hast made heaven earth sea all that them is 4 25 who mouth thi servant david hast said whi did heathen rage peopl imagin vain thing 4 26 king earth stood ruler were gather togeth against lord against hi christ 4 27 truth against thi holi child jesu whom thou hast anoint both herod pontiu pilat gentil peopl israel were gather togeth 4 28 do whatsoev thi hand thi counsel determin be done 4 29 now lord behold their threaten grant unto thi servant that all bold they may speak thi word 4 30 stretch forth thine hand heal that sign wonder may be done name thi holi child jesu 4 31 when they had pray place wa shaken where they were assembl togeth they were all fill holi ghost they spake word god bold 4 32 multitud them that believ were one heart one soul neither said ani them that ought thing which he possess wa hi own but they had all thing common 4 33 great power gave apostl wit resurrect lord jesu great grace wa them all 4 34 neither wa there ani them that lack as mani as were possessor land or hous sold them brought price thing that were sold 4 35 laid them down apostl feet distribut wa made unto everi man accord as he had need 4 36 jose who apostl wa surnam barnaba which is be interpret son consol levit countri cypru 4 37 have land sold it brought money laid it apostl feet 5 1 but certain man name anania sapphira hi wife sold possess 5 2 kept back part price hi wife also be privi it brought certain part laid it apostl feet 5 3 but peter said anania whi hath satan fill thine heart lie holi ghost keep back part price land 5 4 while it remain wa it not thine own it wa sold wa it not thine own power whi hast thou conceiv thi thing thine heart thou hast not lie unto men but unto god 5 5 anania hear these word fell down gave ghost great fear came all them that heard these thing 5 6 young men aros wound him carri him buri him 5 7 it wa space three hour when hi wife not know what wa done came 5 8 peter answer unto her tell me ye sold land so much she said yea so much 5 9 then peter said unto her how is it that ye have agre togeth tempt spirit lord behold feet them which have buri thi husband are door shall carri thee 5 10 then fell she down straightway hi feet yield ghost young men came found her dead carri her forth buri her her husband 5 11 great fear came all church as mani as heard these thing 5 12 hand apostl were mani sign wonder wrought peopl they were all one accord solomon s porch 5 13 rest durst no man join himself them but peopl magnifi them 5 14 believ were more ad lord multitud both men women 5 15 insomuch that they brought forth sick street laid them bed couch that least shadow peter pass might overshadow some them 5 16 there came also multitud citi round unto jerusalem bring sick folk them which were vex unclean spirit they were heal everi one 5 17 then high priest rose all they that were him which is sect sadduce were fill indign 5 18 laid their hand apostl put them common prison 5 19 but angel lord night open prison door brought them forth said 5 20 go stand speak templ peopl all word thi life 5 21 when they heard that they enter templ earli morn taught but high priest came they that were him call council togeth all senat children israel sent prison have them brought 5 22 but when offic came found them not prison they return told 5 23 say prison truli found we shut all safeti keeper stand door but when we had open we found no man 5 24 now when high priest captain templ chief priest heard these thing they doubt them whereunto thi would grow 5 25 then came one told them say behold men whom ye put prison are stand templ teach peopl 5 26 then went captain offic brought them violenc they fear peopl lest they should have been stone 5 27 when they had brought them they set them council high priest ask them 5 28 say did not we straitli command you that ye should not teach thi name behold ye have fill jerusalem your doctrin intend bring thi man s blood us 5 29 then peter other apostl answer said we ought obey god rather than men 5 30 god our father rais jesu whom ye slew hang tree 5 31 him hath god exalt hi right hand be princ saviour give repent israel forgiv sin 5 32 we are hi wit these thing so is also holi ghost whom god hath given them that obey him 5 33 when they heard that they were cut heart took counsel slay them 5 34 then stood there one council pharise name gamaliel doctor law had reput all peopl command put apostl forth littl space 5 35 said unto them ye men israel take heed yourselv what ye intend do as touch these men 5 36 these day rose theuda boast himself be somebodi whom number men four hundr join themselv who wa slain all as mani as obey him were scatter brought nought 5 37 thi man rose juda galile day tax drew away much peopl him he also perish all even as mani as obey him were dispers 5 38 now i say unto you refrain these men let them alon if thi counsel or thi work be men it will come nought 5 39 but if it be god ye cannot overthrow it lest hapli ye be found even fight against god 5 40 him they agre when they had call apostl beaten them they command that they should not speak name jesu let them go 5 41 they depart presenc council rejoic that they were count worthi suffer shame hi name 5 42 daili templ everi hous they ceas not teach preach jesu christ 6 1 those day when number discipl wa multipli there aros murmur grecian against hebrew becaus their widow were neglect daili ministr 6 2 then twelv call multitud discipl unto them said it is not reason that we should leav word god serv tabl 6 3 wherefor brethren look ye you seven men honest report full holi ghost wisdom whom we may appoint thi busi 6 4 but we will give ourselv continu prayer ministri word 6 5 say pleas whole multitud they chose stephen man full faith holi ghost philip prochoru nicanor timon parmena nicola proselyt antioch 6 6 whom they set apostl when they had pray they laid their hand them 6 7 word god increas number discipl multipli jerusalem greatli great compani priest were obedi faith 6 8 stephen full faith power did great wonder miracl peopl 6 9 then there aros certain synagogu which is call synagogu libertin cyrenian alexandrian them cilicia asia disput stephen 6 10 they were not abl resist wisdom spirit which he spake 6 11 then they suborn men which said we have heard him speak blasphem word against mose against god 6 12 they stir peopl elder scribe came him caught him brought him council 6 13 set fals wit which said thi man ceaseth not speak blasphem word against thi holi place law 6 14 we have heard him say that thi jesu nazareth shall destroy thi place shall chang custom which mose deliv us 6 15 all that sat council look stedfastli him saw hi face as it had been face angel 7 1 then said high priest are these thing so 7 2 he said men brethren father hearken god glori appear unto our father abraham when he wa mesopotamia he dwelt charran 7 3 said unto him get thee thi countri thi kindr come land which i shall shew thee 7 4 then came he land chaldaean dwelt charran thenc when hi father wa dead he remov him thi land wherein ye now dwell 7 5 he gave him none inherit it no not so much as set hi foot yet he promis that he would give it him possess hi seed him when as yet he had no child 7 6 god spake thi wise that hi seed should sojourn strang land that they should bring them bondag entreat them evil four hundr year 7 7 nation whom they shall be bondag will i judg said god that shall they come forth serv me thi place 7 8 he gave him coven circumcis so abraham begat isaac circumcis him eighth day isaac begat jacob jacob begat twelv patriarch 7 9 patriarch move envi sold joseph egypt but god wa him 7 10 deliv him all hi afflict gave him favour wisdom sight pharaoh king egypt he made him governor egypt all hi hous 7 11 now there came dearth all land egypt chanaan great afflict our father found no susten 7 12 but when jacob heard that there wa corn egypt he sent our father first 7 13 second time joseph wa made known hi brethren joseph s kindr wa made known unto pharaoh 7 14 then sent joseph call hi father jacob him all hi kindr threescor fifteen soul 7 15 so jacob went down egypt die he our father 7 16 were carri sychem laid sepulchr that abraham bought sum money son emmor father sychem 7 17 but when time promis drew nigh which god had sworn abraham peopl grew multipli egypt 7 18 till anoth king aros which knew not joseph 7 19 same dealt subtilli our kindr evil entreat our father so that they cast their young children end they might not live 7 20 which time mose wa born wa exceed fair nourish hi father s hous three month 7 21 when he wa cast pharaoh s daughter took him nourish him her own son 7 22 mose wa learn all wisdom egyptian wa mighti word deed 7 23 when he wa full forti year old it came hi heart visit hi brethren children israel 7 24 see one them suffer wrong he defend him aveng him that wa oppress smote egyptian 7 25 he suppos hi brethren would have understood how that god hi hand would deliv them but they understood not 7 26 next day he shew himself unto them as they strove would have set them one again say sir ye are brethren whi do ye wrong one anoth 7 27 but he that did hi neighbour wrong thrust him away say who made thee ruler judg us 7 28 wilt thou kill me as thou diddest egyptian yesterday 7 29 then fled mose thi say wa stranger land madian where he begat two son 7 30 when forti year were expir there appear him wilder mount sina angel lord flame fire bush 7 31 when mose saw it he wonder sight as he drew near behold it voic lord came unto him 7 32 say i am god thi father god abraham god isaac god jacob then mose trembl durst not behold 7 33 then said lord him put off thi shoe thi feet place where thou standest is holi ground 7 34 i have seen i have seen afflict my peopl which is egypt i have heard their groan am come down deliv them now come i will send thee egypt 7 35 thi mose whom they refus say who made thee ruler judg same did god send be ruler deliver hand angel which appear him bush 7 36 he brought them that he had shew wonder sign land egypt red sea wilder forti year 7 37 thi is that mose which said unto children israel prophet shall lord your god rais unto you your brethren like unto me him shall ye hear 7 38 thi is he that wa church wilder angel which spake him mount sina our father who receiv live oracl give unto us 7 39 whom our father would not obey but thrust him them their heart turn back again egypt 7 40 say unto aaron make us god go us as thi mose which brought us land egypt we wot not what is becom him 7 41 they made calf those day offer sacrific unto idol rejoic work their own hand 7 42 then god turn gave them worship host heaven as it is written book prophet o ye hous israel have ye offer me slain beast sacrific space forti year wilder 7 43 yea ye took tabernacl moloch star your god remphan figur which ye made worship them i will carri you away babylon 7 44 our father had tabernacl wit wilder as he had appoint speak unto mose that he should make it accord fashion that he had seen 7 45 which also our father that came brought jesu possess gentil whom god drave face our father unto day david 7 46 who found favour god desir find tabernacl god jacob 7 47 but solomon built him hous 7 48 howbeit most high dwelleth not templ made hand as saith prophet 7 49 heaven is my throne earth is my footstool what hous will ye build me saith lord or what is place my rest 7 50 hath not my hand made all these thing 7 51 ye stiffneck uncircumcis heart ear ye do alway resist holi ghost as your father did so do ye 7 52 which prophet have not your father persecut they have slain them which shew come just one whom ye have been now betray murder 7 53 who have receiv law disposit angel have not kept it 7 54 when they heard these thing they were cut heart they gnash him their teeth 7 55 but he be full holi ghost look stedfastli heaven saw glori god jesu stand right hand god 7 56 said behold i see heaven open son man stand right hand god 7 57 then they cri loud voic stop their ear ran him one accord 7 58 cast him citi stone him wit laid down their cloth young man s feet whose name wa saul 7 59 they stone stephen call god say lord jesu receiv my spirit 7 60 he kneel down cri loud voic lord lay not thi sin their charg when he had said thi he fell asleep 8 1 saul wa consent unto hi death that time there wa great persecut against church which wa jerusalem they were all scatter abroad region judaea samaria apostl 8 2 devout men carri stephen hi burial made great lament him 8 3 as saul he made havock church enter everi hous hale men women commit them prison 8 4 therefor they that were scatter abroad went everi where preach word 8 5 then philip went down citi samaria preach christ unto them 8 6 peopl one accord gave heed unto those thing which philip spake hear see miracl which he did 8 7 unclean spirit cri loud voic came mani that were possess them mani taken palsi that were lame were heal 8 8 there wa great joy that citi 8 9 but there wa certain man call simon which beforetim same citi use sorceri bewitch peopl samaria give that himself wa some great one 8 10 whom they all gave heed least greatest say thi man is great power god 8 11 him they had regard becaus that long time he had bewitch them sorceri 8 12 but when they believ philip preach thing concern kingdom god name jesu christ they were baptiz both men women 8 13 then simon himself believ also when he wa baptiz he continu philip wonder behold miracl sign which were done 8 14 now when apostl which were jerusalem heard that samaria had receiv word god they sent unto them peter john 8 15 who when they were come down pray them that they might receiv holi ghost 8 16 as yet he wa fallen none them onli they were baptiz name lord jesu 8 17 then laid they their hand them they receiv holi ghost 8 18 when simon saw that lay apostl hand holi ghost wa given he offer them money 8 19 say give me also thi power that whomsoev i lay hand he may receiv holi ghost 8 20 but peter said unto him thi money perish thee becaus thou hast thought that gift god may be purchas money 8 21 thou hast neither part nor lot thi matter thi heart is not right sight god 8 22 repent therefor thi thi wicked pray god if perhap thought thine heart may be forgiven thee 8 23 i perceiv that thou art gall bitter bond iniqu 8 24 then answer simon said pray ye lord me that none these thing which ye have spoken come me 8 25 they when they had testifi preach word lord return jerusalem preach gospel mani villag samaritan 8 26 angel lord spake unto philip say aris go south unto way that goeth down jerusalem unto gaza which is desert 8 27 he aros went behold man ethiopia eunuch great author candac queen ethiopian who had charg all her treasur had come jerusalem worship 8 28 wa return sit hi chariot read esaia prophet 8 29 then spirit said unto philip go near join thyself thi chariot 8 30 philip ran thither him heard him read prophet esaia said understandest thou what thou readest 8 31 he said how can i some man should guid me he desir philip that he would come sit him 8 32 place scriptur which he read wa thi he wa led as sheep slaughter like lamb dumb hi shearer so open he not hi mouth 8 33 hi humili hi judgment wa taken away who shall declar hi gener hi life is taken earth 8 34 eunuch answer philip said i pray thee whom speaketh prophet thi himself or some other man 8 35 then philip open hi mouth began same scriptur preach unto him jesu 8 36 as they went their way they came unto certain water eunuch said see here is water what doth hinder me be baptiz 8 37 philip said if thou believest all thine heart thou mayest he answer said i believ that jesu christ is son god 8 38 he command chariot stand still they went down both water both philip eunuch he baptiz him 8 39 when they were come water spirit lord caught away philip that eunuch saw him no more he went hi way rejoic 8 40 but philip wa found azotu pass he preach all citi till he came caesarea 9 1 saul yet breath threaten slaughter against discipl lord went unto high priest 9 2 desir him letter damascu synagogu that if he found ani thi way they were men or women he might bring them bound unto jerusalem 9 3 as he journey he came near damascu suddenli there shine round him light heaven 9 4 he fell earth heard voic say unto him saul saul whi persecutest thou me 9 5 he said who art thou lord lord said i am jesu whom thou persecutest it is hard thee kick against prick 9 6 he trembl astonish said lord what wilt thou have me do lord said unto him aris go citi it shall be told thee what thou must do 9 7 men which journey him stood speechless hear voic but see no man 9 8 saul aros earth when hi eye were open he saw no man but they led him hand brought him damascu 9 9 he wa three day sight neither did eat nor drink 9 10 there wa certain discipl damascu name anania him said lord vision anania he said behold i am here lord 9 11 lord said unto him aris go street which is call straight enquir hous juda one call saul tarsu behold he prayeth 9 12 hath seen vision man name anania come put hi hand him that he might receiv hi sight 9 13 then anania answer lord i have heard mani thi man how much evil he hath done thi saint jerusalem 9 14 here he hath author chief priest bind all that call thi name 9 15 but lord said unto him go thi way he is chosen vessel unto me bear my name gentil king children israel 9 16 i will shew him how great thing he must suffer my name s sake 9 17 anania went hi way enter hous put hi hand him said brother saul lord even jesu that appear unto thee way as thou camest hath sent me that thou mightest receiv thi sight be fill holi ghost 9 18 immedi there fell hi eye as it had been scale he receiv sight forthwith aros wa baptiz 9 19 when he had receiv meat he wa strengthen then wa saul certain day discipl which were damascu 9 20 straightway he preach christ synagogu that he is son god 9 21 but all that heard him were amaz said is not thi he that destroy them which call thi name jerusalem came hither that intent that he might bring them bound unto chief priest 9 22 but saul increas more strength confound jew which dwelt damascu prove that thi is veri christ 9 23 that mani day were fulfil jew took counsel kill him 9 24 but their lay await wa known saul they watch gate day night kill him 9 25 then discipl took him night let him down wall basket 9 26 when saul wa come jerusalem he assay join himself discipl but they were all afraid him believ not that he wa discipl 9 27 but barnaba took him brought him apostl declar unto them how he had seen lord way that he had spoken him how he had preach boldli damascu name jesu 9 28 he wa them come go jerusalem 9 29 he spake boldli name lord jesu disput against grecian but they went slay him 9 30 which when brethren knew they brought him down caesarea sent him forth tarsu 9 31 then had church rest all judaea galile samaria were edifi walk fear lord comfort holi ghost were multipli 9 32 it came pass as peter pass all quarter he came down also saint which dwelt lydda 9 33 there he found certain man name aenea which had kept hi bed eight year wa sick palsi 9 34 peter said unto him aenea jesu christ maketh thee whole aris make thi bed he aros immedi 9 35 all that dwelt lydda saron saw him turn lord 9 36 now there wa joppa certain discipl name tabitha which interpret is call dorca thi woman wa full good work almsde which she did 9 37 it came pass those day that she wa sick die whom when they had wash they laid her upper chamber 9 38 forasmuch as lydda wa nigh joppa discipl had heard that peter wa there they sent unto him two men desir him that he would not delay come them 9 39 then peter aros went them when he wa come they brought him upper chamber all widow stood him weep shew coat garment which dorca made while she wa them 9 40 but peter put them all forth kneel down pray turn him bodi said tabitha aris she open her eye when she saw peter she sat 9 41 he gave her hi hand lift her when he had call saint widow present her aliv 9 42 it wa known all joppa mani believ lord 9 43 it came pass that he tarri mani day joppa one simon tanner 10 1 there wa certain man caesarea call corneliu centurion band call italian band 10 2 devout man one that fear god all hi hous which gave much alm peopl pray god alway 10 3 he saw vision evid ninth hour day angel god come him say unto him corneliu 10 4 when he look him he wa afraid said what is it lord he said unto him thi prayer thine alm are come memori god 10 5 now send men joppa call one simon whose surnam is peter 10 6 he lodgeth one simon tanner whose hous is sea side he shall tell thee what thou oughtest do 10 7 when angel which spake unto corneliu wa depart he call two hi household servant devout soldier them that wait him continu 10 8 when he had declar all these thing unto them he sent them joppa 10 9 morrow as they went their journey drew nigh unto citi peter went housetop pray sixth hour 10 10 he becam veri hungri would have eaten but while they made readi he fell tranc 10 11 saw heaven open certain vessel descend him as it had been great sheet knit four corner let down earth 10 12 wherein were all manner fourfoot beast earth wild beast creep thing fowl air 10 13 there came voic him rise peter kill eat 10 14 but peter said not so lord i have never eaten ani thing that is common or unclean 10 15 voic spake unto him again second time what god hath cleans that call not thou common 10 16 thi wa done thrice vessel wa receiv again heaven 10 17 now while peter doubt himself what thi vision which he had seen should mean behold men which were sent corneliu had made enquiri simon s hous stood gate 10 18 call ask simon which wa surnam peter were lodg there 10 19 while peter thought vision spirit said unto him behold three men seek thee 10 20 aris therefor get thee down go them doubt noth i have sent them 10 21 then peter went down men which were sent unto him corneliu said behold i am he whom ye seek what is caus wherefor ye are come 10 22 they said corneliu centurion just man one that feareth god good report all nation jew wa warn god holi angel send thee hi hous hear word thee 10 23 then call he them lodg them morrow peter went away them certain brethren joppa accompani him 10 24 morrow they enter caesarea corneliu wait them he had call togeth hi kinsmen near friend 10 25 as peter wa come corneliu met him fell down hi feet worship him 10 26 but peter took him say stand i myself also am man 10 27 as he talk him he went found mani that were come togeth 10 28 he said unto them ye know how that it is unlaw thing man that is jew keep compani or come unto one anoth nation but god hath shew me that i should not call ani man common or unclean 10 29 therefor came i unto you gainsay as soon as i wa sent i ask therefor what intent ye have sent me 10 30 corneliu said four day ago i wa fast thi hour ninth hour i pray my hous behold man stood me bright cloth 10 31 said corneliu thi prayer is heard thine alm are had remembr sight god 10 32 send therefor joppa call hither simon whose surnam is peter he is lodg hous one simon tanner sea side who when he cometh shall speak unto thee 10 33 immedi therefor i sent thee thou hast well done that thou art come now therefor are we all here present god hear all thing that are command thee god 10 34 then peter open hi mouth said truth i perceiv that god is no respect person 10 35 but everi nation he that feareth him worketh righteous is accept him 10 36 word which god sent unto children israel preach peac jesu christ he is lord all 10 37 that word i say ye know which wa publish all judaea began galile baptism which john preach 10 38 how god anoint jesu nazareth holi ghost power who went do good heal all that were oppress devil god wa him 10 39 we are wit all thing which he did both land jew jerusalem whom they slew hang tree 10 40 him god rais third day shew him openli 10 41 not all peopl but unto wit chosen god even us who did eat drink him he rose dead 10 42 he command us preach unto peopl testifi that it is he which wa ordain god be judg quick dead 10 43 him give all prophet wit that hi name whosoev believeth him shall receiv remiss sin 10 44 while peter yet spake these word holi ghost fell all them which heard word 10 45 they circumcis which believ were astonish as mani as came peter becaus that gentil also wa pour gift holi ghost 10 46 they heard them speak tongu magnifi god then answer peter 10 47 can ani man forbid water that these should not be baptiz which have receiv holi ghost as well as we 10 48 he command them be baptiz name lord then pray they him tarri certain day 11 1 apostl brethren that were judaea heard that gentil had also receiv word god 11 2 when peter wa come jerusalem they that were circumcis contend him 11 3 say thou wentest men uncircumcis didst eat them 11 4 but peter rehears matter begin expound it order unto them say 11 5 i wa citi joppa pray tranc i saw vision certain vessel descend as it had been great sheet let down heaven four corner it came even me 11 6 which when i had fasten mine eye i consid saw fourfoot beast earth wild beast creep thing fowl air 11 7 i heard voic say unto me aris peter slay eat 11 8 but i said not so lord noth common or unclean hath ani time enter my mouth 11 9 but voic answer me again heaven what god hath cleans that call not thou common 11 10 thi wa done three time all were drawn again heaven 11 11 behold immedi there were three men alreadi come unto hous where i wa sent caesarea unto me 11 12 spirit bade me go them noth doubt moreov these six brethren accompani me we enter man s hous 11 13 he shew us how he had seen angel hi hous which stood said unto him send men joppa call simon whose surnam is peter 11 14 who shall tell thee word wherebi thou all thi hous shall be save 11 15 as i began speak holi ghost fell them as us begin 11 16 then rememb i word lord how that he said john inde baptiz water but ye shall be baptiz holi ghost 11 17 forasmuch then as god gave them like gift as he did unto us who believ lord jesu christ what wa i that i could withstand god 11 18 when they heard these thing they held their peac glorifi god say then hath god also gentil grant repent unto life 11 19 now they which were scatter abroad persecut that aros stephen travel as far as phenic cypru antioch preach word none but unto jew onli 11 20 some them were men cypru cyren which when they were come antioch spake unto grecian preach lord jesu 11 21 hand lord wa them great number believ turn unto lord 11 22 then tide these thing came unto ear church which wa jerusalem they sent forth barnaba that he should go as far as antioch 11 23 who when he came had seen grace god wa glad exhort them all that purpos heart they would cleav unto lord 11 24 he wa good man full holi ghost faith much peopl wa ad unto lord 11 25 then depart barnaba tarsu seek saul 11 26 when he had found him he brought him unto antioch it came pass that whole year they assembl themselv church taught much peopl discipl were call christian first antioch 11 27 these day came prophet jerusalem unto antioch 11 28 there stood one them name agabu signifi spirit that there should be great dearth all world which came pass day claudiu caesar 11 29 then discipl everi man accord hi abil determin send relief unto brethren which dwelt judaea 11 30 which also they did sent it elder hand barnaba saul 12 1 now that time herod king stretch forth hi hand vex certain church 12 2 he kill jame brother john sword 12 3 becaus he saw it pleas jew he proceed further take peter also then were day unleaven bread 12 4 when he had apprehend him he put him prison deliv him four quaternion soldier keep him intend easter bring him forth peopl 12 5 peter therefor wa kept prison but prayer wa made ceas church unto god him 12 6 when herod would have brought him forth same night peter wa sleep two soldier bound two chain keeper door kept prison 12 7 behold angel lord came him light shine prison he smote peter side rais him say aris quickli hi chain fell off hi hand 12 8 angel said unto him gird thyself bind thi sandal so he did he saith unto him cast thi garment thee follow me 12 9 he went follow him wist not that it wa true which wa done angel but thought he saw vision 12 10 when they were past first second ward they came unto iron gate that leadeth unto citi which open them hi own accord they went pass one street forthwith angel depart him 12 11 when peter wa come himself he said now i know sureti that lord hath sent hi angel hath deliv me hand herod all expect peopl jew 12 12 when he had consid thing he came hous mari mother john whose surnam wa mark where mani were gather togeth pray 12 13 as peter knock door gate damsel came hearken name rhoda 12 14 when she knew peter s voic she open not gate glad but ran told how peter stood gate 12 15 they said unto her thou art mad but she constantli affirm that it wa even so then said they it is hi angel 12 16 but peter continu knock when they had open door saw him they were astonish 12 17 but he beckon unto them hand hold their peac declar unto them how lord had brought him prison he said go shew these thing unto jame brethren he depart went anoth place 12 18 now as soon as it wa day there wa no small stir soldier what wa becom peter 12 19 when herod had sought him found him not he examin keeper command that they should be put death he went down judaea caesarea there abod 12 20 herod wa highli displeas them tyre sidon but they came one accord him have made blastu king s chamberlain their friend desir peac becaus their countri wa nourish king s countri 12 21 set day herod array royal apparel sat hi throne made orat unto them 12 22 peopl gave shout say it is voic god not man 12 23 immedi angel lord smote him becaus he gave not god glori he wa eaten worm gave ghost 12 24 but word god grew multipli 12 25 barnaba saul return jerusalem when they had fulfil their ministri took them john whose surnam wa mark 13 1 now there were church that wa antioch certain prophet teacher as barnaba simeon that wa call niger luciu cyren manaen which had been brought herod tetrarch saul 13 2 as they minist lord fast holi ghost said separ me barnaba saul work whereunto i have call them 13 3 when they had fast pray laid their hand them they sent them away 13 4 so they be sent forth holi ghost depart unto seleucia thenc they sail cypru 13 5 when they were salami they preach word god synagogu jew they had also john their minist 13 6 when they had gone isl unto papho they found certain sorcer fals prophet jew whose name wa barjesu 13 7 which wa deputi countri sergiu paulu prudent man who call barnaba saul desir hear word god 13 8 but elyma sorcer so is hi name interpret withstood them seek turn away deputi faith 13 9 then saul who also is call paul fill holi ghost set hi eye him 13 10 said o full all subtilti all mischief thou child devil thou enemi all righteous wilt thou not ceas pervert right way lord 13 11 now behold hand lord is thee thou shalt be blind not see sun season immedi there fell him mist dark he went seek some lead him hand 13 12 then deputi when he saw what wa done believ be astonish doctrin lord 13 13 now when paul hi compani loos papho they came perga pamphylia john depart them return jerusalem 13 14 but when they depart perga they came antioch pisidia went synagogu sabbath day sat down 13 15 read law
