is lord s ful thereof 10 27 if ani them that believ not bid you feast ye be dispos go whatsoev is set you eat ask no question conscienc sake 10 28 but if ani man say unto you thi is offer sacrific unto idol eat not hi sake that shew it conscienc sake earth is lord s ful thereof 10 29 conscienc i say not thine own but other whi is my liberti judg anoth man s conscienc 10 30 if i grace be partak whi am i evil spoken that which i give thank 10 31 therefor ye eat or drink or whatsoev ye do do all glori god 10 32 give none offenc neither jew nor gentil nor church god 10 33 even as i pleas all men all thing not seek mine own profit but profit mani that they may be save 11 1 be ye follow me even as i also am christ 11 2 now i prais you brethren that ye rememb me all thing keep ordin as i deliv them you 11 3 but i would have you know that head everi man is christ head woman is man head christ is god 11 4 everi man pray or prophesi have hi head cover dishonoureth hi head 11 5 but everi woman that prayeth or prophesieth her head uncov dishonoureth her head that is even all one as if she were shaven 11 6 if woman be not cover let her also be shorn but if it be shame woman be shorn or shaven let her be cover 11 7 man inde ought not cover hi head forasmuch as he is imag glori god but woman is glori man 11 8 man is not woman but woman man 11 9 neither wa man creat woman but woman man 11 10 thi caus ought woman have power her head becaus angel 11 11 nevertheless neither is man woman neither woman man lord 11 12 as woman is man even so is man also woman but all thing god 11 13 judg yourselv is it come that woman pray unto god uncov 11 14 doth not even natur itself teach you that if man have long hair it is shame unto him 11 15 but if woman have long hair it is glori her her hair is given her cover 11 16 but if ani man seem be contenti we have no such custom neither church god 11 17 now thi that i declar unto you i prais you not that ye come togeth not better but wors 11 18 first all when ye come togeth church i hear that there be divis you i partli believ it 11 19 there must be also heresi you that they which are approv may be made manifest you 11 20 when ye come togeth therefor one place thi is not eat lord s supper 11 21 eat everi one taketh other hi own supper one is hungri anoth is drunken 11 22 what have ye not hous eat drink or despis ye church god shame them that have not what shall i say you shall i prais you thi i prais you not 11 23 i have receiv lord that which also i deliv unto you that lord jesu same night which he wa betray took bread 11 24 when he had given thank he brake it said take eat thi is my bodi which is broken you thi do remembr me 11 25 same manner also he took cup when he had sup say thi cup is new testament my blood thi do ye as oft as ye drink it remembr me 11 26 as often as ye eat thi bread drink thi cup ye do shew lord s death till he come 11 27 wherefor whosoev shall eat thi bread drink thi cup lord unworthili shall be guilti bodi blood lord 11 28 but let man examin himself so let him eat that bread drink that cup 11 29 he that eateth drinketh unworthili eateth drinketh damnat himself not discern lord s bodi 11 30 thi caus mani are weak sickli you mani sleep 11 31 if we would judg ourselv we should not be judg 11 32 but when we are judg we are chasten lord that we should not be condemn world 11 33 wherefor my brethren when ye come togeth eat tarri one anoth 11 34 if ani man hunger let him eat home that ye come not togeth unto condemn rest will i set order when i come 12 1 now concern spiritu gift brethren i would not have you ignor 12 2 ye know that ye were gentil carri away unto these dumb idol even as ye were led 12 3 wherefor i give you understand that no man speak spirit god calleth jesu accurs that no man can say that jesu is lord but holi ghost 12 4 now there are divers gift but same spirit 12 5 there are differ administr but same lord 12 6 there are divers oper but it is same god which worketh all all 12 7 but manifest spirit is given everi man profit withal 12 8 one is given spirit word wisdom anoth word knowledg same spirit 12 9 anoth faith same spirit anoth gift heal same spirit 12 10 anoth work miracl anoth propheci anoth discern spirit anoth diver kind tongu anoth interpret tongu 12 11 but all these worketh that one selfsam spirit divid everi man sever as he will 12 12 as bodi is one hath mani member all member that one bodi be mani are one bodi so also is christ 12 13 one spirit are we all baptiz one bodi we be jew or gentil we be bond or free have been all made drink one spirit 12 14 bodi is not one member but mani 12 15 if foot shall say becaus i am not hand i am not bodi is it therefor not bodi 12 16 if ear shall say becaus i am not eye i am not bodi is it therefor not bodi 12 17 if whole bodi were eye where were hear if whole were hear where were smell 12 18 but now hath god set member everi one them bodi as it hath pleas him 12 19 if they were all one member where were bodi 12 20 but now are they mani member yet but one bodi 12 21 eye cannot say unto hand i have no need thee nor again head feet i have no need you 12 22 nay much more those member bodi which seem be more feebl are necessari 12 23 those member bodi which we think be less honour these we bestow more abund honour our uncom part have more abund comeli 12 24 our come part have no need but god hath temper bodi togeth have given more abund honour that part which lack 12 25 that there should be no schism bodi but that member should have same care one anoth 12 26 one member suffer all member suffer it or one member be honour all member rejoic it 12 27 now ye are bodi christ member particular 12 28 god hath set some church first apostl secondarili prophet thirdli teacher that miracl then gift heal help govern divers tongu 12 29 are all apostl are all prophet are all teacher are all worker miracl 12 30 have all gift heal do all speak tongu do all interpret 12 31 but covet earnestli best gift yet shew i unto you more excel way 13 1 though i speak tongu men angel have not chariti i am becom as sound brass or tinkl cymbal 13 2 though i have gift propheci understand all mysteri all knowledg though i have all faith so that i could remov mountain have not chariti i am noth 13 3 though i bestow all my good feed poor though i give my bodi be burn have not chariti it profiteth me noth 13 4 chariti suffereth long is kind chariti envieth not chariti vaunteth not itself is not puf 13 5 doth not behav itself unseemli seeketh not her own is not easili provok thinketh no evil 13 6 rejoiceth not iniqu but rejoiceth truth 13 7 beareth all thing believeth all thing hopeth all thing endureth all thing 13 8 chariti never faileth but there be propheci they shall fail there be tongu they shall ceas there be knowledg it shall vanish away 13 9 we know part we prophesi part 13 10 but when that which is perfect is come then that which is part shall be done away 13 11 when i wa child i spake as child i understood as child i thought as child but when i becam man i put away childish thing 13 12 now we see glass darkli but then face face now i know part but then shall i know even as also i am known 13 13 now abideth faith hope chariti these three but greatest these is chariti 14 1 follow chariti desir spiritu gift but rather that ye may prophesi 14 2 he that speaketh unknown tongu speaketh not unto men but unto god no man understandeth him howbeit spirit he speaketh mysteri 14 3 but he that prophesieth speaketh unto men edif exhort comfort 14 4 he that speaketh unknown tongu edifieth himself but he that prophesieth edifieth church 14 5 i would that ye all spake tongu but rather that ye prophesi greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh tongu he interpret that church may receiv edifi 14 6 now brethren if i come unto you speak tongu what shall i profit you i shall speak you either revel or knowledg or prophesi or doctrin 14 7 even thing life give sound pipe or harp they give distinct sound how shall it be known what is pipe or harp 14 8 if trumpet give uncertain sound who shall prepar himself battl 14 9 so likewis ye ye utter tongu word easi be understood how shall it be known what is spoken ye shall speak air 14 10 there are it may be so mani kind voic world none them is signif 14 11 therefor if i know not mean voic i shall be unto him that speaketh barbarian he that speaketh shall be barbarian unto me 14 12 even so ye forasmuch as ye are zealou spiritu gift seek that ye may excel edifi church 14 13 wherefor let him that speaketh unknown tongu pray that he may interpret 14 14 if i pray unknown tongu my spirit prayeth but my understand is unfruit 14 15 what is it then i will pray spirit i will pray understand also i will sing spirit i will sing understand also 14 16 els when thou shalt bless spirit how shall he that occupieth room unlearn say amen thi give thank see he understandeth not what thou sayest 14 17 thou verili givest thank well but other is not edifi 14 18 i thank my god i speak tongu more than ye all 14 19 yet church i had rather speak five word my understand that my voic i might teach other also than ten thousand word unknown tongu 14 20 brethren be not children understand howbeit malic be ye children but understand be men 14 21 law it is written men other tongu other lip will i speak unto thi peopl yet all that will they not hear me saith lord 14 22 wherefor tongu are sign not them that believ but them that believ not but prophesi serveth not them that believ not but them which believ 14 23 if therefor whole church be come togeth one place all speak tongu there come those that are unlearn or unbeliev will they not say that ye are mad 14 24 but if all prophesi there come one that believeth not or one unlearn he is convinc all he is judg all 14 25 thu are secret hi heart made manifest so fall down hi face he will worship god report that god is you truth 14 26 how is it then brethren when ye come togeth everi one you hath psalm hath doctrin hath tongu hath revel hath interpret let all thing be done unto edifi 14 27 if ani man speak unknown tongu let it be two or most three that cours let one interpret 14 28 but if there be no interpret let him keep silenc church let him speak himself god 14 29 let prophet speak two or three let other judg 14 30 if ani thing be reveal anoth that sitteth let first hold hi peac 14 31 ye may all prophesi one one that all may learn all may be comfort 14 32 spirit prophet are subject prophet 14 33 god is not author confus but peac as all church saint 14 34 let your women keep silenc church it is not permit unto them speak but they are command be obedi as also saith law 14 35 if they will learn ani thing let them ask their husband home it is shame women speak church 14 36 what came word god you or came it unto you onli 14 37 if ani man think himself be prophet or spiritu let him acknowledg that thing that i write unto you are command lord 14 38 but if ani man be ignor let him be ignor 14 39 wherefor brethren covet prophesi forbid not speak tongu 14 40 let all thing be done decent order 15 1 moreov brethren i declar unto you gospel which i preach unto you which also ye have receiv wherein ye stand 15 2 which also ye are save if ye keep memori what i preach unto you unless ye have believ vain 15 3 i deliv unto you first all that which i also receiv how that christ die our sin accord scriptur 15 4 that he wa buri that he rose again third day accord scriptur 15 5 that he wa seen cepha then twelv 15 6 that he wa seen five hundr brethren onc whom greater part remain unto thi present but some are fallen asleep 15 7 that he wa seen jame then all apostl 15 8 last all he wa seen me also as one born due time 15 9 i am least apostl that am not meet be call apostl becaus i persecut church god 15 10 but grace god i am what i am hi grace which wa bestow me wa not vain but i labour more abundantli than they all yet not i but grace god which wa me 15 11 therefor it were i or they so we preach so ye believ 15 12 now if christ be preach that he rose dead how say some you that there is no resurrect dead 15 13 but if there be no resurrect dead then is christ not risen 15 14 if christ be not risen then is our preach vain your faith is also vain 15 15 yea we are found fals wit god becaus we have testifi god that he rais christ whom he rais not if so be that dead rise not 15 16 if dead rise not then is not christ rais 15 17 if christ be not rais your faith is vain ye are yet your sin 15 18 then they also which are fallen asleep christ are perish 15 19 if thi life onli we have hope christ we are all men most miser 15 20 but now is christ risen dead becom firstfruit them that slept 15 21 man came death man came also resurrect dead 15 22 as adam all die even so christ shall all be made aliv 15 23 but everi man hi own order christ firstfruit afterward they that are christ s hi come 15 24 then cometh end when he shall have deliv kingdom god even father when he shall have put down all rule all author power 15 25 he must reign till he hath put all enemi hi feet 15 26 last enemi that shall be destroy is death 15 27 he hath put all thing hi feet but when he saith all thing are put him it is manifest that he is except which did put all thing him 15 28 when all thing shall be subdu unto him then shall son also himself be subject unto him that put all thing him that god may be all all 15 29 els what shall they do which are baptiz dead if dead rise not all whi are they then baptiz dead 15 30 whi stand we jeopardi everi hour 15 31 i protest your rejoic which i have christ jesu our lord i die daili 15 32 if manner men i have fought beast ephesu what advantageth it me if dead rise not let us eat drink morrow we die 15 33 be not deceiv evil commun corrupt good manner 15 34 awak righteous sin not some have not knowledg god i speak thi your shame 15 35 but some man will say how are dead rais what bodi do they come 15 36 thou fool that which thou sowest is not quicken it die 15 37 that which thou sowest thou sowest not that bodi that shall be but bare grain it may chanc wheat or some other grain 15 38 but god giveth it bodi as it hath pleas him everi seed hi own bodi 15 39 all flesh is not same flesh but there is one kind flesh men anoth flesh beast anoth fish anoth bird 15 40 there are also celesti bodi bodi terrestri but glori celesti is one glori terrestri is anoth 15 41 there is one glori sun anoth glori moon anoth glori star one star differeth anoth star glori 15 42 so also is resurrect dead it is sown corrupt it is rais incorrupt 15 43 it is sown dishonour it is rais glori it is sown weak it is rais power 15 44 it is sown natur bodi it is rais spiritu bodi there is natur bodi there is spiritu bodi 15 45 so it is written first man adam wa made live soul last adam wa made quicken spirit 15 46 howbeit that wa not first which is spiritu but that which is natur afterward that which is spiritu 15 47 first man is earth earthi second man is lord heaven 15 48 as is earthi such are they also that are earthi as is heavenli such are they also that are heavenli 15 49 as we have born imag earthi we shall also bear imag heavenli 15 50 now thi i say brethren that flesh blood cannot inherit kingdom god neither doth corrupt inherit incorrupt 15 51 behold i shew you mysteri we shall not all sleep but we shall all be chang 15 52 moment twinkl eye last trump trumpet shall sound dead shall be rais incorrupt we shall be chang 15 53 thi corrupt must put incorrupt thi mortal must put immort 15 54 so when thi corrupt shall have put incorrupt thi mortal shall have put immort then shall be brought pass say that is written death is swallow victori 15 55 o death where is thi sting o grave where is thi victori 15 56 sting death is sin strength sin is law 15 57 but thank be god which giveth us victori our lord jesu christ 15 58 therefor my belov brethren be ye stedfast unmov alway abound work lord forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not vain lord 16 1 now concern collect saint as i have given order church galatia even so do ye 16 2 first day week let everi one you lay him store as god hath prosper him that there be no gather when i come 16 3 when i come whomsoev ye shall approv your letter them will i send bring your liber unto jerusalem 16 4 if it be meet that i go also they shall go me 16 5 now i will come unto you when i shall pass macedonia i do pass macedonia 16 6 it may be that i will abid yea winter you that ye may bring me my journey whithersoev i go 16 7 i will not see you now way but i trust tarri while you if lord permit 16 8 but i will tarri ephesu pentecost 16 9 great door effectu is open unto me there are mani adversari 16 10 now if timotheu come see that he may be you fear he worketh work lord as i also do 16 11 let no man therefor despis him but conduct him forth peac that he may come unto me i look him brethren 16 12 as touch our brother apollo i greatli desir him come unto you brethren but hi will wa not all come thi time but he will come when he shall have conveni time 16 13 watch ye stand fast faith quit you like men be strong 16 14 let all your thing be done chariti 16 15 i beseech you brethren ye know hous stephana that it is firstfruit achaia that they have addict themselv ministri saint 16 16 that ye submit yourselv unto such everi one that helpeth us laboureth 16 17 i am glad come stephana fortunatu achaicu that which wa lack your part they have suppli 16 18 they have refresh my spirit your therefor acknowledg ye them that are such 16 19 church asia salut you aquila priscilla salut you much lord church that is their hous 16 20 all brethren greet you greet ye one anoth holi kiss 16 21 salut me paul mine own hand 16 22 if ani man love not lord jesu christ let him be anathema maranatha 16 23 grace our lord jesu christ be you 16 24 my love be you all christ jesu amen second epistl paul apostl corinthian 1 1 paul apostl jesu christ will god timothi our brother unto church god which is corinth all saint which are all achaia 1 2 grace be you peac god our father lord jesu christ 1 3 bless be god even father our lord jesu christ father merci god all comfort 1 4 who comforteth us all our tribul that we may be abl comfort them which are ani troubl comfort wherewith we ourselv are comfort god 1 5 as suffer christ abound us so our consol also aboundeth christ 1 6 we be afflict it is your consol salvat which is effectu endur same suffer which we also suffer or we be comfort it is your consol salvat 1 7 our hope you is stedfast know that as ye are partak suffer so shall ye be also consol 1 8 we would not brethren have you ignor our troubl which came us asia that we were press measur strength insomuch that we despair even life 1 9 but we had sentenc death ourselv that we should not trust ourselv but god which raiseth dead 1 10 who deliv us so great death doth deliv whom we trust that he will yet deliv us 1 11 ye also help togeth prayer us that gift bestow us mean mani person thank may be given mani our behalf 1 12 our rejoic is thi testimoni our conscienc that simplic godli sincer not fleshli wisdom but grace god we have had our convers world more abundantli you ward 1 13 we write none other thing unto you than what ye read or acknowledg i trust ye shall acknowledg even end 1 14 as also ye have acknowledg us part that we are your rejoic even as ye also are our day lord jesu 1 15 thi confid i wa mind come unto you that ye might have second benefit 1 16 pass you macedonia come again macedonia unto you you be brought my way judaea 1 17 when i therefor wa thu mind did i use light or thing that i purpos do i purpos accord flesh that me there should be yea yea nay nay 1 18 but as god is true our word you wa not yea nay 1 19 son god jesu christ who wa preach you us even me silvanu timotheu wa not yea nay but him wa yea 1 20 all promis god him are yea him amen unto glori god us 1 21 now he which stablisheth us you christ hath anoint us is god 1 22 who hath also seal us given earnest spirit our heart 1 23 moreov i call god record my soul that spare you i came not as yet unto corinth 1 24 not that we have dominion your faith but are helper your joy faith ye stand 2 1 but i determin thi myself that i would not come again you heavi 2 2 if i make you sorri who is he then that maketh me glad but same which is made sorri me 2 3 i wrote thi same unto you lest when i came i should have sorrow them whom i ought rejoic have confid you all that my joy is joy you all 2 4 much afflict anguish heart i wrote unto you mani tear not that ye should be griev but that ye might know love which i have more abundantli unto you 2 5 but if ani have caus grief he hath not griev me but part that i may not overcharg you all 2 6 suffici such man is thi punish which wa inflict mani 2 7 so that contrariwis ye ought rather forgiv him comfort him lest perhap such one should be swallow overmuch sorrow 2 8 wherefor i beseech you that ye would confirm your love him 2 9 thi end also did i write that i might know proof you ye be obedi all thing 2 10 whom ye forgiv ani thing i forgiv also if i forgav ani thing whom i forgav it your sake forgav i it person christ 2 11 lest satan should get advantag us we are not ignor hi devic 2 12 furthermor when i came troa preach christ s gospel door wa open unto me lord 2 13 i had no rest my spirit becaus i found not titu my brother but take my leav them i went thenc macedonia 2 14 now thank be unto god which alway causeth us triumph christ maketh manifest savour hi knowledg us everi place 2 15 we are unto god sweet savour christ them that are save them that perish 2 16 one we are savour death unto death other savour life unto life who is suffici these thing 2 17 we are not as mani which corrupt word god but as sincer but as god sight god speak we christ 3 1 do we begin again commend ourselv or need we as some other epistl commend you or letter commend you 3 2 ye are our epistl written our heart known read all men 3 3 forasmuch as ye are manifestli declar be epistl christ minist us written not ink but spirit live god not tabl stone but fleshi tabl heart 3 4 such trust have we christ god ward 3 5 not that we are suffici ourselv think ani thing as ourselv but our suffici is god 3 6 who also hath made us abl minist new testament not letter but spirit letter killeth but spirit giveth life 3 7 but if ministr death written engraven stone wa gloriou so that children israel could not stedfastli behold face mose glori hi counten which glori wa be done away 3 8 how shall not ministr spirit be rather gloriou 3 9 if ministr condemn be glori much more doth ministr righteous exceed glori 3 10 even that which wa made gloriou had no glori thi respect reason glori that excelleth 3 11 if that which is done away wa gloriou much more that which remaineth is gloriou 3 12 see then that we have such hope we use great plain speech 3 13 not as mose which put vail hi face that children israel could not stedfastli look end that which is abolish 3 14 but their mind were blind thi day remaineth same vail untaken away read old testament which vail is done away christ 3 15 but even unto thi day when mose is read vail is their heart 3 16 nevertheless when it shall turn lord vail shall be taken away 3 17 now lord is that spirit where spirit lord is there is liberti 3 18 but we all open face behold as glass glori lord are chang same imag glori glori even as spirit lord 4 1 therefor see we have thi ministri as we have receiv merci we faint not 4 2 but have renounc hidden thing dishonesti not walk crafti nor handl word god deceit but manifest truth commend ourselv everi man s conscienc sight god 4 3 but if our gospel be hid it is hid them that are lost 4 4 whom god thi world hath blind mind them which believ not lest light gloriou gospel christ who is imag god should shine unto them 4 5 we preach not ourselv but christ jesu lord ourselv your servant jesu sake 4 6 god who command light shine dark hath shine our heart give light knowledg glori god face jesu christ 4 7 but we have thi treasur earthen vessel that excel power may be god not us 4 8 we are troubl everi side yet not distress we are perplex but not despair 4 9 persecut but not forsaken cast down but not destroy 4 10 alway bear bodi die lord jesu that life also jesu might be made manifest our bodi 4 11 we which live are alway deliv unto death jesu sake that life also jesu might be made manifest our mortal flesh 4 12 so then death worketh us but life you 4 13 we have same spirit faith accord as it is written i believ therefor have i spoken we also believ therefor speak 4 14 know that he which rais lord jesu shall rais us also jesu shall present us you 4 15 all thing are your sake that abund grace might thanksgiv mani redound glori god 4 16 which caus we faint not but though our outward man perish yet inward man is renew day day 4 17 our light afflict which is but moment worketh us far more exceed etern weight glori 4 18 while we look not thing which are seen but thing which are not seen thing which are seen are tempor but thing which are not seen are etern 5 1 we know that if our earthli hous thi tabernacl were dissolv we have build god hous not made hand etern heaven 5 2 thi we groan earnestli desir be cloth our hous which is heaven 5 3 if so be that be cloth we shall not be found nake 5 4 we that are thi tabernacl do groan be burden not that we would be uncloth but cloth that mortal might be swallow life 5 5 now he that hath wrought us selfsam thing is god who also hath given unto us earnest spirit 5 6 therefor we are alway confid know that whilst we are home bodi we are absent lord 5 7 we walk faith not sight 5 8 we are confid i say will rather be absent bodi be present lord 5 9 wherefor we labour that present or absent we may be accept him 5 10 we must all appear judgment seat christ that everi one may receiv thing done hi bodi accord that he hath done it be good or bad 5 11 know therefor terror lord we persuad men but we are made manifest unto god i trust also are made manifest your conscienc 5 12 we commend not ourselv again unto you but give you occas glori our behalf that ye may have somewhat answer them which glori appear not heart 5 13 we be besid ourselv it is god or we be sober it is your caus 5 14 love christ constraineth us becaus we thu judg that if one die all then were all dead 5 15 that he die all that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselv but unto him which die them rose again 5 16 wherefor henceforth know we no man flesh yea though we have known christ flesh yet now henceforth know we him no more 5 17 therefor if ani man be christ he is new creatur old thing are pass away behold all thing are becom new 5 18 all thing are god who hath reconcil us himself jesu christ hath given us ministri reconcili 5 19 wit that god wa christ reconcil world unto himself not imput their trespass unto them hath commit unto us word reconcili 5 20 now then we are ambassador christ as though god did beseech you us we pray you christ s stead be ye reconcil god 5 21 he hath made him be sin us who knew no sin that we might be made righteous god him 6 1 we then as worker togeth him beseech you also that ye receiv not grace god vain 6 2 he saith i have heard thee time accept day salvat have i succour thee behold now is accept time behold now is day salvat 6 3 give no offenc ani thing that ministri be not blame 6 4 but all thing approv ourselv as minist god much patienc afflict necess distress 6 5 stripe imprison tumult labour watch fast 6 6 pure knowledg longsuff kind holi ghost love unfeign 6 7 word truth power god armour righteous right hand left 6 8 honour dishonour evil report good report as deceiv yet true 6 9 as unknown yet well known as die behold we live as chasten not kill 6 10 as sorrow yet alway rejoic as poor yet make mani rich as have noth yet possess all thing 6 11 o ye corinthian our mouth is open unto you our heart is enlarg 6 12 ye are not straiten us but ye are straiten your own bowel 6 13 now recomp same i speak as unto my children be ye also enlarg 6 14 be ye not unequ yoke togeth unbeliev what fellowship hath righteous unright what communion hath light dark 6 15 what concord hath christ belial or what part hath he that believeth infidel 6 16 what agreement hath templ god idol ye are templ live god as god hath said i will dwell them walk them i will be their god they shall be my peopl 6 17 wherefor come them be ye separ saith lord touch not unclean thing i will receiv you 6 18 will be father unto you ye shall be my son daughter saith lord almighti 7 1 have therefor these promis dearli belov let us cleans ourselv all filthi flesh spirit perfect holi fear god 7 2 receiv us we have wrong no man we have corrupt no man we have defraud no man 7 3 i speak not thi condemn you i have said that ye are our heart die live you 7 4 great is my bold speech you great is my glori you i am fill comfort i am exceed joy all our tribul 7 5 when we were come macedonia our flesh had no rest but we were troubl everi side were fight were fear 7 6 nevertheless god that comforteth those that are cast down comfort us come titu 7 7 not hi come onli but consol wherewith he wa comfort you when he told us your earnest desir your mourn your fervent mind me so that i rejoic more 7 8 though i made you sorri letter i do not repent though i did repent i perceiv that same epistl hath made you sorri though it were but season 7 9 now i rejoic not that ye were made sorri but that ye sorrow repent ye were made sorri godli manner that ye might receiv damag us noth 7 10 godli sorrow worketh repent salvat not be repent but sorrow world worketh death 7 11 behold thi selfsam thing that ye sorrow godli sort what care it wrought you yea what clear yourselv yea what indign yea what fear yea what vehement desir yea what zeal yea what reveng all thing ye have approv yourselv be clear thi matter 7 12 wherefor though i wrote unto you i did it not hi caus that had done wrong nor hi caus that suffer wrong but that our care you sight god might appear unto you 7 13 therefor we were comfort your comfort yea exceedingli more joy we joy titu becaus hi spirit wa refresh you all 7 14 if i have boast ani thing him you i am not asham but as we spake all thing you truth even so our boast which i made titu is found truth 7 15 hi inward affect is more abund you whilst he remembereth obedi you all how fear trembl ye receiv him 7 16 i rejoic therefor that i have confid you all thing 8 1 moreov brethren we do you wit grace god bestow church macedonia 8 2 how that great trial afflict abund their joy their deep poverti abound unto rich their liber 8 3 their power i bear record yea their power they were will themselv 8 4 pray us much intreati that we would receiv gift take us fellowship minist saint 8 5 thi they did not as we hope but first gave their own selv lord unto us will god 8 6 insomuch that we desir titu that as he had begun so he would also finish you same grace also 8 7 therefor as ye abound everi thing faith utter knowledg all dilig your love us see that ye abound thi grace also 8 8 i speak not command but occas forward other prove sincer your love 8 9 ye know grace our lord jesu christ that though he wa rich yet your sake he becam poor that ye hi poverti might be rich 8 10 herein i give my advic thi is expedi you who have begun not onli do but also be forward year ago 8 11 now therefor perform do it that as there wa readi will so there may be perform also that which ye have 8 12 if there be first will mind it is accept accord that man hath not accord that he hath not 8 13 i mean not that other men be eas ye burden 8 14 but equal that now thi time your abund may be suppli their want that their abund also may be suppli your want that there may be equal 8 boast you them macedonia that achaia wa readi year ago your zeal hath provok veri mani 9 3 yet have i sent brethren lest our boast you should be vain thi behalf that as i said ye may be readi 9 4 lest hapli if they macedonia come me find you unprepar we that we say not ye should be asham thi same confid boast 9 5 therefor i thought it necessari exhort brethren that they would go unto you make reap also bounti 9 7 everi man accord as he purposeth hi heart so let him give not grudgingli or necess god loveth cheer giver 9 8 god is abl make all grace abound you that ye alway have all suffici all thing may abound everi good work 9 9 as it is written he hath dispers abroad he hath given poor hi righteous remaineth ever 9 10 now he that ministereth seed sower both minist bread your food multipli your seed sown increas fruit your righteous 9 11 be enrich everi thing all bounti which causeth us thanksgiv god 9 12 administr thi servic not onli supplieth want saint but is abund also mani god you 9 15 thank be unto god hi unspeak gift 10 1 now i paul myself beseech you meek gentl christ who presenc am base you but be absent am bold you 10 2 but i beseech you that i may not be bold when i am present that confid wherewith i think be bold against some which think us as if we walk accord flesh 10 3 though we walk flesh we do not war flesh 10 4 weapon our warfar are not carnal but mighti god pull down strong hold 10 5 cast down imagin everi high thing that exalteth itself against knowledg god bring captiv everi thought obedi christ 10 6 have readi reveng all disobedi when your obedi is fulfil 10 7 do ye look thing outward appear if ani man trust himself that he is christ s let him himself think thi again that as he is christ s even so are we christ s 10 8 though i should boast somewhat more our author which lord hath given us edif not your destruct i should not be asham 10 9 that i may not seem as if i would terrifi you letter 10 10 hi letter say they are weighti power but hi bodili presenc is weak hi speech contempt 10 11 let such one think thi that such as we are word letter when we are absent such will we be also deed when we are present 10 12 we dare not make ourselv number or compar ourselv some that commend themselv but they measur themselv themselv compar themselv themselv are not wise 10 13 but we will not boast thing our measur but accord measur rule which god hath distribut us measur reach even unto you 10 14 we stretch not ourselv our measur as though we reach not unto you we are come as far as you also preach gospel christ 10 15 not boast thing our measur that is other men s labour but have hope when your faith is increas that we shall be enlarg you accord our rule abundantli 10 16 preach gospel region you not boast anoth man s line thing made readi our hand 10 17 but he that glorieth let him glori lord 10 18 not he that commendeth himself is approv but whom lord commendeth 11 1 would god ye could bear me littl my folli inde bear me 11 fals apostl deceit worker transform themselv apostl christ 11 14 no marvel satan himself is transform angel light 11 15 therefor it is no great thing if hi minist also be transform as minist righteous whose end shall be accord their work 11 16 i say again let no man think me fool if otherwis yet as fool receiv me that i may boast myself littl 11 17 that which i speak i speak it not lord but as it were foolishli thi confid boast 11 18 see that mani glori flesh i will glori also 11 19 ye suffer fool gladli see ye yourselv are wise 11 20 ye suffer if man bring you bondag if man devour you if man take you if man exalt himself if man smite you face 11 21 i speak as concern reproach as though we had been weak howbeit whereinsoev ani is bold i speak foolishli i am bold also 11 22 are they hebrew so am i are they israelit so am i are they seed abraham so am i 11 23 are they minist christ i speak as fool i am more labour more abund stripe measur prison more frequent death oft 11 24 jew five bless evermor knoweth that i lie not 11 32 damascu governor areta king kept citi damascen garrison desir apprehend me 11 33 window basket wa i let down wall escap hi hand 12 1 it is not expedi me doubtless glori i will come vision revel lord 12 2 i knew man christ fourteen year ago bodi i cannot tell or bodi i cannot tell god knoweth such one caught third heaven 12 3 i knew such man bodi or bodi i cannot tell god knoweth 12 4 how that he wa caught paradis heard unspeak word which it is not law man utter 12 5 such one will i glori yet myself i will not glori but mine infirm 12 6 though i would desir glori i shall not be fool i will say truth but now i forbear lest ani man should think me that which he seeth me be or that he heareth me 12 7 lest i should be exalt measur abund revel there wa given me thorn flesh messeng satan buffet me lest i should be exalt measur 12 8 thi thing i besought lord thrice that it might depart me 12 9 he said unto me my grace is suffici thee my strength is made perfect weak most gladli therefor will i rather glori my infirm that power christ may rest me 12 10 therefor i take pleasur infirm reproach necess persecut distress christ s sake when i am weak then am i strong 12 11 i am becom fool glori ye have compel me i ought have been commend you noth am i behind veri chiefest apostl though i be noth 12 12 truli sign apostl were wrought you all patienc sign wonder mighti deed 12 13 what is it wherein ye were inferior other church it be that i myself wa not burdensom you forgiv me thi wrong 12 14 behold third time i am readi come you i will not be burdensom you i seek not your but you children ought not lay parent but parent children 12 15 i will veri gladli spend be spent you though more abundantli i love you less i be love 12 16 but be it so i did not burden you nevertheless be crafti i caught you guil 12 17 did i make gain you ani them whom i sent unto you 12 18 i desir titu him i sent brother did titu make gain you walk we not same spirit walk we not same step 12 19 again think ye that we excus ourselv unto you we speak god christ but we do all thing dearli belov your edifi 12 20 i fear lest when i come i shall not find you such as i would that i shall be found unto you such as ye would not lest there be debat envi wrath strife backbit whisper swell tumult 12 21 lest when i come again my god will humbl me you that i shall bewail mani which have sin alreadi have not repent unclean fornic lascivi which they have commit 13 1 thi is third time i am come you mouth two or three wit shall everi word be establish 13 2 i told you foretel you as if i were present second time be absent now i write them which heretofor have sin all other that if i come again i will not spare 13 3 ye seek proof christ speak me which you ward is not weak but is mighti you 13 4 though he wa crucifi weak yet he liveth power god we also are weak him but we shall live him power god you 13 5 examin yourselv ye be faith prove your own selv know ye not your own selv how that jesu christ is you ye be reprob 13 6 but i trust that ye shall know that we are not reprob 13 7 now i pray god that ye do no evil not that we should appear approv but that ye should do that which is honest though we be as reprob 13 8 we can do noth against truth but truth 13 9 we are glad when we are weak ye are strong thi also we wish even your perfect 13 10 therefor i write these thing be absent lest be present i should use sharp accord power which lord hath given me edif not destruct 13 11 final brethren farewel be perfect be good comfort be one mind 1 paul apostl not men neither man but jesu christ god father who rais him dead 1 2 all brethren which are me unto church galatia 1 3 grace be you peac god father our lord jesu christ 1 4 who gave himself our sin that he might deliv us thi present evil world accord will god our father 1 5 whom be glori ever ever amen 1 6 i marvel that ye are so soon remov him that call you grace christ unto anoth gospel 1 7 which is not anoth but there be some that troubl you would pervert gospel christ 1 8 but though we or angel heaven preach ani other gospel unto you than that which we have preach unto you let him be accurs 1 9 as we said so say i now again if ani man preach ani other gospel unto you than that ye have receiv let him be accurs 1 10 do i now persuad men or god or do i seek pleas men if i yet pleas men i should not be servant christ 1 11 but i certifi you brethren that gospel which wa preach me is not man 1 12 i neither receiv it man neither wa i taught it but revel jesu christ 1 13 ye have heard my convers time past jew religion how that measur i persecut church god wast it 1 14 profit jew religion mani my equal mine own nation be more exceedingli zealou tradit my father 1 15 but when it pleas god who separ me my mother s womb call me hi grace 1 16 reveal hi son me that i might preach him heathen immedi i confer not flesh blood 1 17 neither went i jerusalem them which were apostl me but i went arabia return again unto damascu 1 18 then three year i went jerusalem see peter abod him fifteen day 1 19 but other apostl saw i none save jame lord s brother 1 20 now thing which i write unto you behold god i lie not 1 21 afterward i came region syria cilicia 1 22 wa unknown face unto church judaea which were christ 1 23 but they had heard onli that he which persecut us time past now preacheth faith which onc he destroy 1 24 they glorifi god me 2 1 then fourteen year i went again jerusalem barnaba took titu me also 2 2 i went revel commun unto them that gospel which i preach gentil but privat them which were reput lest ani mean i should run or had run vain 2 3 but neither titu who wa me be greek wa compel be circumcis 2 4 that becaus fals brethren unawar brought who came privili spi our liberti which we have christ jesu that they might bring us bondag 2 5 whom we gave place subject no not hour that truth gospel might continu you 2 6 but these who seem be somewhat whatsoev they were it maketh no matter me god accepteth no man s person they who seem be somewhat confer ad noth me 2 7 but contrariwis when they saw that gospel uncircumcis wa commit unto me as gospel circumcis wa unto peter 2 8 he that wrought effectu peter apostleship circumcis same wa mighti me gentil 2 9 when jame cepha john who seem be pillar perceiv grace that wa given unto me they gave me barnaba right hand fellowship that we should go unto heathen they unto circumcis 2 10 onli they would that we should rememb poor same which i also wa forward do 2 11 but when peter wa come antioch i withstood him face becaus he wa be blame 2 12 that certain came jame he did eat gentil but when they were come he withdrew separ himself fear them which were circumcis 2 13 other jew dissembl likewis him insomuch that barnaba also wa carri away their dissimul 2 14 but when i saw that they walk not uprightli accord truth gospel i said unto peter them all if thou be jew livest manner gentil not as do jew whi compellest thou gentil live as do jew 2 15 we who are jew natur not sinner gentil 2 16 know that man is not justifi work law but faith jesu christ even we have believ jesu christ that we might be justifi faith christ not work law work law shall no flesh be justifi 2 17 but if while we seek be justifi christ we ourselv also are found sinner is therefor christ minist sin god forbid 2 18 if i build again thing which i destroy i make myself transgressor 2 19 i law am dead law that i might live unto god 2 20 i am crucifi christ neverthless i live yet not i but christ liveth me life which i now live flesh i live faith son god who love me gave himself me 2 21 i do not frustrat grace god if righteous come law then christ is dead vain 3 1 o foolish galatian who hath bewitch you that ye should not obey truth whose eye jesu christ hath been evid set forth crucifi you 3 2 thi onli would i learn you receiv ye spirit work law or hear faith 3 3 are ye so foolish have begun spirit are ye now made perfect flesh 3 4 have ye suffer so mani thing vain if it be yet vain 3 5 he therefor that ministereth you spirit worketh miracl you doeth he it work law or hear faith 3 6 even as abraham believ god it wa account him righteous 3 7 know ye therefor that they which are faith same are children abraham 3 8 scriptur forese that god would justifi heathen faith preach gospel unto abraham say thee shall all nation be bless 3 9 so then they which be faith are bless faith abraham 3 10 as mani as are work law are curs it is written curs is everi one that continueth not all thing which are written book law do them 3 11 but that no man is justifi law sight god it is evid just shall live faith 3 12 law is not faith but man that doeth them shall live them 3 13 christ hath redeem us curs law be made curs us it is written curs is everi one that hangeth tree 3 14 that bless abraham might come gentil jesu christ that we might receiv promis spirit faith 3 15 brethren i speak manner men though it be but man s coven yet if it be confirm no man disannulleth or addeth thereto 3 16 now abraham hi seed were promis made he saith not seed as mani but as one thi seed which is christ 3 17 thi i say that coven that wa confirm god christ law which wa four hundr thirti year cannot disannul that it should make promis none effect 3 18 if inherit be law it is no more promis but god gave it abraham promis 3 19 wherefor then serveth law it wa ad becaus transgress till seed should come whom promis wa made it wa ordain angel hand mediat 3 20 now mediat is not mediat one but god is one 3 21 is law then against promis god god forbid if there had been law given which could have given life verili righteous should have been law 3 22 but scriptur hath conclud all sin that promis faith jesu christ might be given them that believ 3 23 but faith came we were kept law shut unto faith which should afterward be reveal 3 24 wherefor law wa our schoolmast bring us unto christ that we might be justifi faith 3 25 but that faith is come we are no longer schoolmast 3 26 ye are all children god faith christ jesu 3 27 as mani you as have been baptiz christ have put christ 3 28 there is neither jew nor greek there is neither bond nor free there is neither male nor femal ye are all one christ jesu 3 29 if ye be christ s then are ye abraham s seed heir accord promis 4 1 now i coven one mount sinai which gendereth bondag which is agar 4 25 thi agar is mount sinai arabia answereth jerusalem which now is is bondag her children 4 26 but jerusalem which is is free which is are children promis 4 29 but as then he that wa born flesh persecut him that wa born spirit even so it is now 4 30 nevertheless what saith scriptur cast bondwoman her son son bondwoman shall not be heir son freewoman 4 31 so then brethren we are not children bondwoman but free 5 1 stand fast therefor liberti wherewith christ hath made us free be not entangl again yoke bondag 5 2 behold i paul are contrari one other so that ye cannot do thing that ye would 5 18 but if ye be led spirit ye are not law 5 19 now work flesh are manifest which are these adulteri fornic unclean lascivi 5 20 live spirit let us also walk spirit 5 26 let us not be desir vain glori provok one anoth envi one anoth 6 1 brethren if man be overtaken fault ye which are spiritu restor such one spirit meek consid thyself lest thou also be tempt 6 2 bear ye one anoth s burden so fulfil law christ 6 3 if man think himself be someth when he is noth he deceiveth himself 6 4 but let everi man prove hi own work then shall he have rejoic himself alon not anoth 6 5 everi man shall bear hi own burden 6 6 let him that is taught word commun unto him that teacheth all good thing 6 7 be not deceiv god is not mock shall reap if we faint not 6 10 as we have therefor opportun let us do good unto all men especi unto them who are household faith 6 11 ye see how larg letter i have written unto you mine own hand 6 12 proceed your mouth but that which is good use edifi that it may minist grace unto hearer 4 30 griev not holi spirit god wherebi ye are seal unto day redempt 4 31 let all bitter wrath anger clamour evil speak be put away you all malic 4 32 be ye kind one anoth tenderheart forgiv one anoth even as god christ s sake hath forgiven you 5 1 be ye therefor follow god as dear children 5 2 walk love as christ also hath love us hath given himself us offer sacrific god sweetsmel savour 5 3 but fornic all unclean or covet let it not be onc name you as becometh saint 5 4 neither filthi nor foolish talk nor jest which are not conveni but rather give thank 5 5 thi ye know that no whoremong nor unclean person nor covet man who is idolat hath ani inherit kingdom christ god 5 6 let no man deceiv you vain word becaus these thing cometh wrath god children disobedi 5 7 be not ye therefor partak them 5 8 ye were sometim dark but now are ye light lord walk as children light 5 9 fruit spirit is all good righteous truth 5 10 prove what is accept unto lord 5 11 have no fellowship unfruit work dark but rather reprov them 5 12 it is shame even speak those thing which are done them secret 5 13 but all thing that are reprov are made manifest light whatsoev doth make manifest is light 5 14 wherefor he saith awak thou that sleepest aris dead christ shall give thee light 5 15 see then that ye walk circumspectli not as fool but as wise 5 16 redeem time becaus day are evil 5 17 wherefor be ye not unwis but understand what will lord is 5 18 be not drunk wine wherein is excess but be fill spirit 5 19 speak yourselv psalm hymn spiritu song sing make melodi your heart lord 5 20 give thank alway all thing unto god father name our lord jesu christ 5 21 submit yourselv one anoth fear god 5 22 wive submit yourselv unto your own husband as unto lord 5 23 husband is head wife even as christ is head church he is saviour bodi 5 24 therefor as church is subject unto christ so let wive be their own husband everi thing 5 25 husband love your wive even as christ also love church gave himself it 5 26 that he might sanctifi cleans it wash water word 5 27 that he might present it himself gloriou church not have spot or wrinkl or ani such thing but that it should be holi blemish 5 28 so ought men love their wive as their own bodi he that loveth hi wife loveth himself 5 29 no man ever yet hate hi own flesh but nourisheth cherisheth it even as lord church 5 30 we are member hi bodi hi flesh hi bone 5 31 thi caus shall man leav hi father mother shall be join unto hi wife they two shall be one flesh 5 32 thi is great mysteri but i speak concern christ church 5 33 nevertheless let everi one you particular so love hi wife even as himself wife see that she rever her husband 6 1 children obey your parent lord thi is right 6 2 honour thi father mother which is first command promis 6 3 that it may be well thee thou mayest live long earth 6 4 ye father provok not your children wrath but bring them nurtur admonit lord 6 5 servant be obedi them that are your master accord flesh fear trembl singl your heart as unto christ 6 6 not eyeservic as menpleas but as servant christ do will god heart 6 7 good will do servic as lord not men 6 8 know that whatsoev good thing ani man doeth same shall he receiv lord he be bond or free 6 9 ye master do same thing unto them forbear threaten know that your master also is heaven neither is there respect person him 6 10 final my brethren be strong lord power hi might 6 11 put whole armour god that ye may be abl stand against wile devil 6 12 we wrestl not against flesh blood but against princip against power against ruler dark thi world against spiritu wicked high place 6 13 wherefor take unto you whole armour god that ye may be abl withstand evil day have done all stand 6 14 stand therefor have your loin girt truth have breastplat righteous 6 15 your feet shod prepar gospel peac 6 16 all take shield faith wherewith ye shall be abl quench all fieri dart wick 6 17 take helmet salvat sword spirit which is word god 6 18 pray alway all prayer supplic spirit watch thereunto all persever supplic all saint 6 19 me that utter may be given unto me that i may open my mouth boldli make known mysteri gospel 6 20 which i am ambassador bond that therein i may speak boldli as i ought speak 6 21 but that ye also may know my affair how i do tychicu belov father lord jesu christ 6 24 grace be all them that love our lord jesu christ sincer amen epistl paul apostl philippian 1 1 paul timotheu servant jesu christ all saint christ jesu which are philippi bishop deacon 1 2 grace be unto you peac god our father lord jesu christ 1 3 i thank my god everi remembr you 1 4 alway everi prayer mine you all make request joy 1 5 your fellowship gospel first day now 1 6 be confid thi veri thing that he which hath begun good work you will perform it day jesu christ 1 7 even as it is meet me think thi you all becaus i have you my heart inasmuch as both my bond defenc confirm gospel ye all are partak my grace 1 8 god is my record how greatli i long you all bowel jesu christ 1 9 thi i pray that your love may abound yet more more knowledg all judgment 1 10 that ye may approv thing that are excel that ye may be sincer offenc till day christ 1 11 be fill fruit righteous which are jesu christ unto glori prais god 1 12 but i would ye should understand brethren that thing which happen unto me have fallen rather unto further gospel 1 13 so that my bond christ are manifest all palac all other place 1 14 mani brethren lord wax confid my bond are much more bold speak word fear 1 15 some inde preach christ even envi strife some also good will 1 16 one preach christ content not sincer suppos add afflict my bond 1 17 but other love know that i am set defenc gospel 1 18 what then notwithstand everi way pretenc or truth christ is preach i therein do rejoic yea will rejoic 1 19 i know that thi shall turn my salvat your prayer suppli spirit jesu christ 1 20 accord my earnest expect my hope that noth i shall be asham but that all bold as alway so now also christ shall be magnifi my bodi it be life or death 1 21 me live is christ die is gain 1 22 but if i live flesh thi is fruit my labour yet what i shall choos i wot not 1 23 i am strait betwixt two have desir depart be christ which is far better 1 24 nevertheless abid flesh is more need you 1 25 have thi confid i know that i shall abid continu you all your further joy faith 1 26 that your rejoic may be more abund jesu christ me my come you again 1 27 onli let your convers be as it becometh gospel christ that i come see you or els be absent i may hear your affair that ye stand fast one spirit one mind strive togeth faith gospel 1 28 noth terrifi your adversari which is them evid token perdit but you salvat that god 1 29 unto you it is given behalf christ not onli believ him but also suffer hi sake 1 30 have same conflict which ye saw me now hear be me 2 1 if there be therefor ani consol christ if ani comfort love if ani fellowship spirit if ani bowel merci 2 2 fulfil ye my joy that ye be likemind have same love be one accord one mind 2 3 let noth be done strife or vainglori but lowli mind let each esteem other better than themselv 2 4 look not everi man hi own thing but everi man also thing other 2 5 let thi mind be you which wa also christ jesu 2 6 who be form god thought it not robberi be equal god 2 7 but made himself no reput took him form servant wa made like men 2 8 be found fashion as man he humbl himself becam obedi unto death even death cross 2 9 wherefor god also hath highli exalt him given him name which is everi name 2 10 that name jesu everi knee should bow thing heaven thing earth thing earth 2 11 that everi tongu should confess that jesu christ is lord glori god father 2 12 wherefor my belov as ye have alway obey not as my presenc onli but now much more my absenc work your own salvat fear trembl 2 13 it is god which worketh you both will do hi good pleasur 2 14 do all thing murmur disput 2 15 that ye may be blameless harmless son god rebuk midst crook pervers nation whom ye shine as light world 2 16 hold forth word life that i may rejoic day christ that i have not run vain neither labour vain 2 17 yea if i be offer sacrific servic your faith i joy rejoic you all 2 18 same caus also do ye joy rejoic me 2 19 but i trust lord jesu send timotheu shortli unto you that i also may be good comfort when i know your state 2 20 i have no man likemind who will natur care your state 2 21 all seek their own not thing which are jesu christ s 2 22 but ye know proof him that as son father he hath serv me gospel 2 23 him therefor i hope send present so soon as i shall see how it will go me 2 24 but i trust lord that i also myself shall come shortli 2 25 yet i suppos it necessari send you epaphroditu my brother companion labour fellowsoldi but your messeng he that minist my want 2 26 he long you all wa full heavi becaus that ye had heard that he had been sick 2 27 inde he wa sick nigh unto death but god had merci him not him onli but me also lest i should have sorrow sorrow 2 28 i sent him therefor more care that when ye see him again ye may rejoic that i may be less sorrow 2 29 receiv him therefor lord all glad hold such reput 2 30 becaus work christ he wa nigh unto death not hi life suppli your lack servic me 3 1 final my brethren rejoic lord write same thing you me inde is not grievou but you it is safe 3 2 bewar dog bewar evil worker bewar concis 3 3 we are circumcis which worship god spirit rejoic christ jesu have no confid flesh 3 4 though i might also have confid flesh if ani other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust flesh i more 3 5 circumcis eighth day stock israel tribe benjamin hebrew hebrew as touch law pharise 3 6 concern zeal persecut church touch righteous which is law blameless 3 7 but what thing were gain me those i count loss christ 3 8 yea doubtless i count all thing but loss excel knowledg christ jesu my lord whom i have suffer loss all thing do count them but dung that i may win christ 3 9 be found him not have mine own righteous which is law but that which is faith christ righteous which is god faith 3 10 that i may know him power hi resurrect fellowship hi suffer be made conform unto hi death 3 11 if ani mean i might attain unto resurrect dead 3 12 not as though i had alreadi attain either were alreadi perfect but i follow if that i may apprehend that which also i am apprehend christ jesu 3 13 brethren i count not myself have apprehend but thi one thing i do forget those thing which are behind reach forth unto those thing which are 3 14 i press mark prize high call god christ jesu 3 15 let us therefor as mani as be perfect be thu mind if ani thing ye be otherwis mind god shall reveal even thi unto you 3 16 nevertheless whereto we have alreadi attain let us walk same rule let us mind same thing 3 17 brethren be follow togeth me mark them which walk so as ye have us ensampl 3 18 mani walk whom i have told you often now tell you even weep that they are enemi cross christ 3 19 whose end is destruct whose god is their belli whose glori is their shame who mind earthli thing 3 20 our convers is heaven whenc also we look saviour lord jesu christ 3 21 who shall chang our vile bodi that it may be fashion like unto hi gloriou bodi accord ye turn god idol serv live true god 1 10 wait hi son heaven whom he rais dead even jesu which deliv us wrath come 2 1 yourselv brethren know our entranc unto you that it wa not vain 2 2 but even that we had suffer were shame entreat as ye know philippi we were bold our god speak unto you gospel god much content 2 3 our exhort wa not deceit nor unclean nor guil 2 4 but as we were allow god be put trust gospel even so we speak not as pleas men but god which trieth our heart 2 5 neither ani time use we flatter word as ye know nor cloke covet god is wit 2 6 nor men sought we glori neither you nor yet other when we might have been burdensom as apostl christ 2 7 but we were gentl you even as nurs cherisheth her children 2 8 so be affection desir you we were will have impart unto you not gospel god onli but also our own soul becaus ye were dear unto us 2 9 ye rememb brethren our labour travail labour night day becaus we would not be chargeabl unto ani you we preach unto you gospel god 2 10 ye are wit god also how holili justli unblam we behav ourselv you that believ 2 11 as ye know how we exhort comfort charg everi one you as father doth hi children 2 12 that ye would walk worthi god who hath call you unto hi kingdom glori 2 13 thi caus also thank we god ceas becaus when ye receiv word god which ye heard us ye receiv it not as word men but as it is truth word god which effectu worketh also you that believ 2 14 ye brethren becam follow church god which judaea are christ jesu ye also have suffer like thing your own countrymen even as they have jew 2 15 who both kill lord jesu their own prophet have persecut us they pleas not god are contrari all men 2 16 forbid us speak gentil that they might be save fill their sin alway wrath is come them uttermost 2 17 but we brethren be taken you short time presenc not heart endeavour more abundantli see your face great desir 2 18 wherefor we would have come unto you even i paul onc again but satan hinder us 2 19 what is our hope or joy or crown rejoic are not even ye presenc our lord jesu christ hi come 2 20 ye are our glori joy 3 1 wherefor when we could no longer forbear we thought it good be left athen alon 3 2 sent timotheu travail woman child they shall not escap 5 4 but ye brethren are not dark that that day should overtak you as thief 5 5 ye are all children light children day we are not night nor dark 5 6 therefor
