apostl thessalonian 1 1 paul silvanu timotheu unto church thessalonian god our father lord jesu christ 1 2 grace unto you peac god our father lord jesu christ 1 3 we are bound thank god alway you brethren as it is meet becaus that your faith groweth exceedingli chariti everi one you all each other aboundeth 1 4 so that we ourselv glori you church god your patienc faith all your persecut tribul that ye endur 1 5 which is manifest token righteou judgment god that ye may be count worthi kingdom god which ye also suffer 1 6 see it is righteou thing god recompens tribul them that troubl you 1 7 you who are troubl rest us when lord jesu shall be reveal heaven hi mighti angel 1 8 flame fire take vengeanc them that know not god that obey not gospel our lord jesu christ 1 9 who shall be punish everlast destruct presenc lord glori hi power 1 10 when he shall come be glorifi hi saint be admir all them that believ becaus our testimoni you wa believ that day 1 11 wherefor also we pray alway you that our god would count you worthi thi call fulfil all good pleasur hi good work faith power 1 12 that name our lord jesu christ may be glorifi you ye him accord grace our god lord jesu christ 2 1 now we beseech you brethren come our lord jesu christ our gather togeth unto him 2 2 that ye be not soon shaken mind or be troubl neither spirit nor word nor letter as us as that day christ is hand 2 3 let no man deceiv you ani mean that day shall not come there come fall away first that man sin be reveal son perdit 2 4 who opposeth exalteth himself all that is call god or that is worship so that he as god sitteth templ god shew himself that he is god 2 5 rememb ye not that when i wa yet you i told you these thing 2 6 now ye know what withholdeth that he might be reveal hi time 2 7 mysteri iniqu doth alreadi work onli he who now letteth will let he be taken way 2 8 then shall that wick be reveal whom lord shall consum spirit hi mouth shall destroy bright hi come 2 9 even him whose come is work satan all power sign lie wonder 2 10 all deceiv unright them that perish becaus they receiv not love truth that they might be save 2 11 thi caus god shall send them strong delus that they should believ lie 2 12 that they all might be damn who believ not truth but had pleasur unright 2 13 but we are bound give thank alway god you brethren belov lord becaus god hath begin chosen you salvat sanctif spirit belief truth 2 14 whereunto he call you our gospel obtain glori our lord jesu christ 2 15 therefor brethren stand fast hold tradit which ye have been taught word or our epistl 2 16 now our lord jesu christ himself god even our father which hath love us hath given us everlast consol good hope grace 2 17 comfort your heart stablish you everi good word work 3 1 final brethren pray us that word lord may have free cours be glorifi even as it is you 3 2 that we may be deliv unreason wick men all men have not faith 3 3 but lord is faith who shall stablish you keep you evil 3 4 we have confid lord touch you that ye both do will do thing which we command you 3 5 lord direct your heart love god patient wait christ 3 6 now we command you brethren name our lord jesu christ that ye withdraw yourselv everi brother that walketh disorderli not tradit which he receiv us 3 7 yourselv know how ye ought follow us we behav not ourselv disorderli you 3 8 neither did we eat ani man s bread nought but wrought labour travail night day that we might not be chargeabl ani you 3 9 not becaus we have not power but make ourselv ensampl unto you follow us 3 10 even when we were you thi we command you that if ani would not work neither should he eat 3 11 we hear that there are some which walk you disorderli work not all but are busybodi 3 12 now them that are such we command exhort our lord jesu christ that quiet they work eat their own bread 3 13 but ye brethren be not weari well do 3 14 if ani man obey not our word thi epistl note that man have no compani him that he may be asham 3 15 yet count him not as enemi but admonish him as brother 3 16 now lord peac himself give you peac alway all mean lord be you all 3 17 salut paul mine own hand which is token everi epistl so i write 3 18 grace our lord jesu christ be you all amen first epistl paul apostl timothi 1 1 paul apostl jesu christ command god our saviour lord jesu christ which is our hope 1 2 unto timothi my own son faith grace merci peac god our father jesu christ our lord 1 3 as i besought thee abid still ephesu when i went macedonia that thou mightest charg some that they teach no other doctrin 1 4 neither give heed fabl endless genealog which minist question rather than godli edifi which is faith so do 1 5 now end command is chariti pure heart good conscienc faith unfeign 1 6 which some have swerv have turn asid unto vain jangl 1 7 desir be teacher law understand neither what they say nor whereof they affirm 1 8 but we know that law is good if man use it law 1 9 know thi that law is not made righteou man but lawless disobedi ungodli sinner unholi profan murder father murder mother manslay 1 10 whoremong them that defil themselv mankind mensteal liar perjur person if there be ani other thing that is contrari sound doctrin 1 11 accord gloriou gospel bless god which wa commit my trust 1 12 i thank christ jesu our lord who hath enabl me that he count me faith put me ministri 1 13 who wa blasphem persecutor injuri but i obtain merci becaus i did it ignorantli unbelief 1 14 grace our lord wa exceed abund faith love which is christ jesu 1 15 thi is faith say worthi all accept that christ jesu came world save sinner whom i am chief 1 16 howbeit thi caus i obtain merci that me first jesu christ might shew forth all longsuff pattern them which should hereaft believ him life everlast 1 17 now unto king etern immort invis onli wise god be honour glori ever ever amen 1 18 thi charg i commit unto thee son timothi accord propheci which went thee that thou them mightest war good warfar 1 19 hold faith good conscienc which some have put away concern faith have made shipwreck 1 20 whom is hymenaeu alexand whom i have deliv unto satan that they may learn not blasphem 2 1 i exhort therefor that first all supplic prayer intercess give thank be made all men 2 2 king all that are author that we may lead quiet peaceabl life all godli honesti 2 3 thi is good accept sight god our saviour 2 4 who will have all men be save come unto knowledg truth 2 5 there is one god one mediat god men man christ jesu 2 6 who gave himself ransom all be testifi due time 2 7 whereunto i am ordain preacher apostl i speak truth christ lie not teacher gentil faith veriti 2 8 i will therefor that men pray everi where lift holi hand wrath doubt 2 9 like manner also that women adorn themselv modest apparel shamefaced sobrieti not broid hair or gold or pearl or costli array 2 10 but which becometh women profess godli good work 2 11 let woman learn silenc all subject 2 12 but i suffer not woman teach nor usurp author man but be silenc 2 13 adam wa first form then eve 2 14 adam wa not deceiv but woman be deceiv wa transgress 2 15 notwithstand she shall be save childbear if they continu faith chariti holi sobrieti 3 1 thi is true say if man desir offic bishop he desireth good work 3 2 bishop then must be blameless husband one wife vigil sober good behaviour given hospit apt teach 3 3 not given wine no striker not greedi filthi lucr but patient not brawler not covet 3 4 one that ruleth well hi own hous have hi children subject all graviti 3 5 if man know not how rule hi own hous how shall he take care church god 3 6 not novic lest be lift pride he fall condemn devil 3 7 moreov he must have good report them which are lest he fall reproach snare devil 3 8 likewis must deacon be grave not doubletongu not given much wine not greedi filthi lucr 3 9 hold mysteri faith pure conscienc 3 10 let these also first be prove then let them use offic deacon be found blameless 3 11 even so must their wive be grave not slander sober faith all thing 3 12 let deacon be husband one wife rule their children their own hous well 3 13 they that have use offic deacon well purchas themselv good degre great bold faith which is christ jesu 3 14 these thing write i unto thee hope come unto thee shortli 3 15 but if i tarri long that thou mayest know how thou oughtest behav thyself hous god which is church live god pillar ground truth 3 16 controversi great is mysteri godli god wa manifest flesh justifi spirit seen angel preach unto gentil believ world receiv glori 4 1 now spirit speaketh expressli that latter time some shall depart faith give heed seduc spirit doctrin devil 4 2 speak lie hypocrisi have their conscienc sear hot iron 4 3 forbid marri command abstain meat which god hath creat be receiv thanksgiv them which believ know truth 4 4 everi creatur god is good noth be refus if it be receiv thanksgiv 4 5 it is sanctifi word god prayer 4 6 if thou put brethren remembr these thing thou shalt be good minist jesu christ nourish word faith good doctrin whereunto thou hast attain 4 7 but refus profan old wive fabl exercis thyself rather unto godli 4 8 bodili exercis profiteth littl but godli is profit unto all thing have promis life that now is that which is come 4 9 thi is faith say worthi all accept 4 10 therefor we both labour suffer reproach becaus we trust live god who is saviour all men special those that believ 4 11 these thing command teach 4 12 let no man despis thi youth but be thou exampl believ word convers chariti spirit faith puriti 4 13 till i come give attend read exhort doctrin 4 14 neglect not gift that is thee which wa given thee propheci lay hand presbyteri 4 15 medit these thing give thyself wholli them that thi profit may appear all 4 16 take heed unto thyself unto doctrin continu them do thi thou shalt both save thyself them that hear thee 5 1 rebuk not elder but intreat him as father younger men as brethren 5 2 elder women as mother younger as sister all puriti 5 3 honour widow that are widow inde 5 4 but if ani widow have children or nephew let them learn first shew pieti home requit their parent that is good accept god 5 5 now she that is widow inde desol trusteth god continueth supplic prayer night day 5 6 but she that liveth pleasur is dead while she liveth 5 7 these thing give charg that they may be blameless 5 8 but if ani provid not hi own special those hi own hous he hath deni faith is wors than infidel 5 9 let not widow be taken number threescor year old have been wife one man 5 10 well report good work if she have brought children if she have lodg stranger if she have wash saint feet if she have reliev afflict if she have dilig follow everi good work 5 11 but younger widow refus when they have begun wax wanton against christ they will marri 5 12 have damnat becaus they have cast off their first faith 5 13 withal they learn be idl wander hous hous not onli idl but tattler also busybodi speak thing which they ought not 5 14 i will therefor that younger women marri bear children guid hous give none occas adversari speak reproach 5 15 some are alreadi turn asid satan 5 16 if ani man or woman that believeth have widow let them reliev them let not church be charg that it may reliev them that are widow inde 5 17 let elder that rule well be count worthi doubl honour especi they who labour word doctrin 5 18 scriptur saith thou shalt not muzzl ox that treadeth corn labour is worthi hi reward 5 19 against elder receiv not accus but two or three wit 5 20 them that sin rebuk all that other also may fear 5 21 i charg thee god lord jesu christ elect angel that thou observ these thing prefer one anoth do noth partial 5 22 lay hand suddenli no man neither be partak other men s sin keep thyself pure 5 23 drink no longer water but use littl wine thi stomach s sake thine often infirm 5 24 some men s sin are open beforehand go judgment some men they follow 5 25 likewis also good work some are manifest beforehand they that are otherwis cannot be hid 6 1 let as mani servant as are yoke count their own master worthi all honour that name god hi doctrin be not blasphem 6 2 they that have believ master let them not despis them becaus they are brethren but rather do them servic becaus they are faith belov partak benefit these thing teach exhort 6 3 if ani man teach otherwis consent not wholesom word even word our lord jesu christ doctrin which is accord godli 6 4 he is proud know noth but dote question strife word whereof cometh envi strife rail evil surmis 6 5 pervers disput men corrupt mind destitut truth suppos that gain is godli such withdraw thyself 6 6 but godli content is great gain 6 7 we brought noth thi world it is certain we can carri noth 6 8 have food raiment let us be therewith content 6 9 but they that will be rich fall temptat snare mani foolish hurt lust which drown men destruct perdit 6 10 love money is root all evil which while some covet they have er faith pierc themselv mani sorrow 6 11 but thou o man god flee these thing follow righteous godli faith love patienc meek 6 12 fight good fight faith lay hold etern life whereunto thou art also call hast profess good profess mani wit 6 13 i give thee charg sight god who quickeneth all thing christ jesu who pontiu pilat wit good confess 6 14 that thou keep thi command spot unrebuk appear our lord jesu christ 6 15 which hi time he shall shew who is bless onli potent king king lord lord 6 16 who onli hath immort dwell light which no man can approach unto whom no man hath seen nor can see whom be honour power everlast amen 6 17 charg them that are rich thi world that they be not highmind nor trust uncertain rich but live god who giveth us richli all thing enjoy 6 18 that they do good that they be rich good work readi distribut will commun 6 19 lay store themselv good foundat against time come that they may lay hold etern life 6 20 o timothi keep that which is commit thi trust avoid profan vain babbl opposit scienc fals so call 6 21 which some profess have er concern faith grace be thee amen second epistl paul apostl timothi 1 1 paul apostl jesu christ will god accord promis life which is christ jesu 1 2 timothi my dearli belov son grace merci peac god father christ jesu our lord 1 3 i thank god whom i serv my forefath pure conscienc that ceas i have remembr thee my prayer night day 1 4 greatli desir see thee be mind thi tear that i may be fill joy 1 5 when i call remembr unfeign faith that is thee which dwelt first thi grandmoth loi thi mother eunic i am persuad that thee also 1 6 wherefor i put thee remembr that thou stir gift god which is thee put my hand 1 7 god hath not given us spirit fear but power love sound mind 1 8 be not thou therefor asham testimoni our lord nor me hi prison but be thou partak afflict gospel accord power god 1 9 who hath save us call us holi call not accord our work but accord hi own purpos grace which wa given us christ jesu world began 1 10 but is now made manifest appear our saviour jesu christ who hath abolish death hath brought life immort light gospel 1 11 whereunto i am appoint preacher apostl teacher gentil 1 12 which caus i also suffer these thing nevertheless i am not asham i know whom i have believ am persuad that he is abl keep that which i have commit unto him against that day 1 13 hold fast form sound word which thou hast heard me faith love which is christ jesu 1 14 that good thing which wa commit unto thee keep holi ghost which dwelleth us 1 15 thi thou knowest that all they which are asia be turn away me whom are phygellu hermogen 1 16 lord give merci unto hous onesiphoru he oft refresh me wa not asham my chain 1 17 but when he wa rome he sought me veri dilig found me 1 18 lord grant unto him that he may find merci lord that day how mani thing he minist unto me ephesu thou knowest veri well 2 1 thou therefor my son be strong grace that is christ jesu 2 2 thing that thou hast heard me mani wit same commit thou faith men who shall be abl teach other also 2 3 thou therefor endur hard as good soldier jesu christ 2 4 no man that warreth entangleth himself affair thi life that he may pleas him who hath chosen him be soldier 2 5 if man also strive masteri yet is he not crown he strive law 2 6 husbandman that laboureth must be first partak fruit 2 7 consid what i say lord give thee understand all thing 2 8 rememb that jesu christ seed david wa rais dead accord my gospel 2 9 wherein i suffer troubl as evil doer even unto bond but word god is not bound 2 10 therefor i endur all thing elect s sake that they may also obtain salvat which is christ jesu etern glori 2 11 it is faith say if we be dead him we shall also live him 2 12 if we suffer we shall also reign him if we deni him he also will deni us 2 13 if we believ not yet he abideth faith he cannot deni himself 2 14 these thing put them remembr charg them lord that they strive not word no profit but subvert hearer 2 15 studi shew thyself approv unto god workman that needeth not be asham rightli divid word truth 2 16 but shun profan vain babbl they will increas unto more ungodli 2 17 their word will eat as doth canker whom is hymenaeu philetu 2 18 who concern truth have er say that resurrect is past alreadi overthrow faith some 2 19 nevertheless foundat god standeth sure have thi seal lord knoweth them that are hi let everi one that nameth name christ depart iniqu 2 20 but great hous there are not onli vessel gold silver but also wood earth some honour some dishonour 2 21 if man therefor purg himself these he shall be vessel unto honour sanctifi meet master s use prepar unto everi good work 2 22 flee also youth lust but follow righteous faith chariti peac them that call lord pure heart 2 23 but foolish unlearn question avoid know that they do gender strife 2 24 servant lord must not strive but be gentl unto all men apt teach patient 2 25 meek instruct those that oppos themselv if god peradventur will give them repent acknowledg truth 2 26 that they may recov themselv snare devil who are taken captiv him hi will 3 1 thi know also that last day peril time shall come 3 2 men shall be lover their own selv covet boaster proud blasphem disobedi parent unthank unholi 3 3 natur affect trucebreak fals accus incontin fierc despis those that are good 3 4 traitor headi highmind lover pleasur more than lover god 3 5 have form godli but deni power thereof such turn away 3 6 thi sort are they which creep hous lead captiv silli women laden sin led away diver lust 3 7 ever learn never abl come knowledg truth 3 8 now as jann jambr withstood mose so do these also resist truth men corrupt mind reprob concern faith 3 9 but they shall proceed no further their folli shall be manifest unto all men as their also wa 3 10 but thou hast fulli known my doctrin manner life purpos faith longsuff chariti patienc 3 11 persecut afflict which came unto me antioch iconium lystra what persecut i endur but them all lord deliv me 3 12 yea all that will live godli christ jesu shall suffer persecut 3 13 but evil men seduc shall wax wors wors deceiv be deceiv 3 14 but continu thou thing which thou hast learn hast been assur know whom thou hast learn them 3 15 that child thou hast known holi scriptur which are abl make thee wise unto salvat faith which is christ jesu 3 16 all scriptur is given inspir god is profit doctrin reproof correct instruct righteous 3 17 that man god may be perfect throughli furnish unto all good work 4 1 i charg thee therefor god lord jesu christ who shall judg quick dead hi appear hi kingdom 4 2 preach word be instant season season reprov rebuk exhort all longsuff doctrin 4 3 time will come when they will not endur sound doctrin but their own lust shall they heap themselv teacher have itch ear 4 4 they shall turn away their ear truth shall be turn unto fabl 4 5 but watch thou all thing endur afflict do work evangelist make full proof thi ministri 4 6 i am now readi be offer time my departur is hand 4 7 i have fought good fight i have finish my cours i have kept faith 4 8 henceforth there is laid me crown righteous which lord righteou judg shall give me that day not me onli but unto all them also that love hi appear 4 9 do thi dilig come shortli unto me 4 10 dema hath forsaken me have love thi present world is depart unto thessalonica crescen galatia titu unto dalmatia 4 11 onli luke is me take mark bring him thee he is profit me ministri 4 12 tychicu have i sent ephesu 4 13 cloke that i left troa carpu when thou comest bring thee book but especi parchment 4 14 alexand coppersmith did me much evil lord reward him accord hi work 4 15 whom be thou ware also he hath greatli withstood our word 4 16 my first answer no man stood me but all men forsook me i pray god that it may not be laid their charg 4 17 notwithstand lord stood me strengthen me that me preach might be fulli known that all gentil might hear i wa deliv mouth lion 4 18 lord shall deliv me everi evil work will preserv me unto hi heavenli kingdom whom be glori ever ever amen 4 19 salut prisca aquila household onesiphoru 4 20 erastu abod corinth but trophimu have i left miletum sick 4 21 do thi dilig come winter eubulu greeteth thee puden linu claudia all brethren 4 22 lord jesu christ be thi spirit grace be you amen epistl paul apostl titu 1 1 paul servant god apostl jesu christ accord faith god s elect acknowledg truth which is godli 1 2 hope etern life which god that cannot lie promis world began 1 3 but hath due time manifest hi word preach which is commit unto me accord command god our saviour 1 4 titu mine own son common faith grace merci peac god father lord jesu christ our saviour 1 5 thi caus left i thee crete that thou shouldest set order thing that are want ordain elder everi citi as i had appoint thee 1 6 if ani be blameless husband one wife have faith children not accus riot or unruli 1 7 bishop must be blameless as steward god not selfwil not soon angri not given wine no striker not given filthi lucr 1 8 but lover hospit lover good men sober just holi temper 1 9 hold fast faith word as he hath been taught that he may be abl sound doctrin both exhort convinc gainsay 1 10 there are mani unruli vain talker deceiv special they circumcis 1 11 whose mouth must be stop who subvert whole hous teach thing which they ought not filthi lucr s sake 1 12 one themselv even prophet their own said cretian are alway liar evil beast slow belli 1 13 thi wit is true wherefor rebuk them sharpli that they may be sound faith 1 14 not give heed jewish fabl command men that turn truth 1 15 unto pure all thing are pure but unto them that are defil unbeliev is noth pure but even their mind conscienc is defil 1 16 they profess that they know god but work they deni him be abomin disobedi unto everi good work reprob 2 1 but speak thou thing which becom sound doctrin 2 2 that age men be sober grave temper sound faith chariti patienc 2 3 age women likewis that they be behaviour as becometh holi not fals accus not given much wine teacher good thing 2 4 that they may teach young women be sober love their husband love their children 2 5 be discreet chast keeper home good obedi their own husband that word god be not blasphem 2 6 young men likewis exhort be sober mind 2 7 all thing shew thyself pattern good work doctrin shew uncorrupt graviti sincer 2 8 sound speech that cannot be condemn that he that is contrari part may be asham have no evil thing say you 2 9 exhort servant be obedi unto their own master pleas them well all thing not answer again 2 10 not purloin but shew all good fidel that they may adorn doctrin god our saviour all thing 2 11 grace god that bringeth salvat hath appear all men 2 12 teach us that deni ungodli worldli lust we should live soberli righteous godli thi present world 2 13 look that bless hope gloriou appear great god our saviour jesu christ 2 14 who gave himself us that he might redeem us all iniqu purifi unto himself peculiar peopl zealou good work 2 15 these thing speak exhort rebuk all author let no man despis thee 3 1 put them mind be subject princip power obey magistr be readi everi good work 3 2 speak evil no man be no brawler but gentl shew all meek unto all men 3 3 we ourselv also were sometim foolish disobedi deceiv serv diver lust pleasur live malic envi hate hate one anoth 3 4 but that kind love god our saviour man appear 3 5 not work righteous which we have done but accord hi merci he save us wash regener renew holi ghost 3 6 which he shed us abundantli jesu christ our saviour 3 7 that be justifi hi grace we should be made heir accord hope etern life 3 8 thi is faith say these thing i will that thou affirm constantli that they which have believ god might be care maintain good work these thing are good profit unto men 3 9 but avoid foolish question genealog content strive law they are unprofit vain 3 10 man that is heretick first second admonit reject 3 11 know that he that is such is subvert sinneth be condemn himself 3 12 when i shall send artema unto thee or tychicu be dilig come unto me nicopoli i have determin there winter 3 13 bring zena lawyer apollo their journey dilig that noth be want unto them 3 14 let our also learn maintain good work necessari use that they be not unfruit 3 15 all that are me salut thee greet them that love us faith grace be you all amen epistl paul apostl philemon 1 1 paul prison jesu christ timothi our brother unto philemon our dearli belov fellowlabour 1 2 our belov apphia archippu our fellowsoldi church thi hous 1 3 grace you peac god our father lord jesu christ 1 4 i thank my god make mention thee alway my prayer 1 5 hear thi love faith which thou hast lord jesu all saint 1 6 that commun thi faith may becom effectu acknowledg everi good thing which is you christ jesu 1 7 we have great joy consol thi love becaus bowel saint are refresh thee brother 1 8 wherefor though i might be much bold christ enjoin thee that which is conveni 1 9 yet love s sake i rather beseech thee be such one as paul age now also prison jesu christ 1 10 i beseech thee my son onesimu whom i have begotten my bond 1 11 which time past wa thee unprofit but now profit thee me 1 12 whom i have sent again thou therefor receiv him that is mine own bowel 1 13 whom i would have retain me that thi stead he might have minist unto me bond gospel 1 14 but thi mind would i do noth that thi benefit should not be as it were necess but willingli 1 15 perhap he therefor depart season that thou shouldest receiv him ever 1 16 not now as servant but servant brother belov special me but how much more unto thee both flesh lord 1 17 if thou count me therefor partner receiv him as myself 1 18 if he hath wrong thee or oweth thee ought put that mine account 1 19 i paul have written it mine own hand i will repay it albeit i do not say thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besid 1 20 yea brother let me have joy thee lord refresh my bowel lord 1 21 have confid thi obedi i wrote unto thee know that thou wilt also do more than i say 1 22 but withal prepar me also lodg i trust that your prayer i shall be given unto you 1 23 there salut thee epaphra my fellowprison christ jesu 1 24 marcu aristarchu dema luca my fellowlabour 1 25 grace our lord jesu christ be your spirit amen epistl paul apostl hebrew 1 1 god who sundri time diver manner spake time past unto father prophet 1 2 hath these last day spoken unto us hi son whom he hath appoint heir all thing whom also he made world 1 3 who be bright hi glori express imag hi person uphold all thing word hi power when he had himself purg our sin sat down right hand majesti high 1 4 be made so much better than angel as he hath inherit obtain more excel name than they 1 5 unto which angel said he ani time thou art my son thi day have i begotten thee again i will be him father he shall be me son 1 6 again when he bringeth firstbegotten world he saith let all angel god worship him 1 7 angel he saith who maketh hi angel spirit hi minist flame fire 1 8 but unto son he saith thi throne o god is ever ever sceptr righteous is sceptr thi kingdom 1 9 thou hast love righteous hate iniqu therefor god even thi god hath anoint thee oil glad thi fellow 1 10 thou lord begin hast laid foundat earth heaven are work thine hand 1 11 they shall perish but thou remainest they all shall wax old as doth garment 1 12 as vestur shalt thou fold them they shall be chang but thou art same thi year shall not fail 1 13 but which angel said he ani time sit my right hand i make thine enemi thi footstool 1 14 are they not all minist spirit sent forth minist them who shall be heir salvat 2 1 therefor we ought give more earnest heed thing which we have heard lest ani time we should let them slip 2 2 if word spoken angel wa stedfast everi transgress disobedi receiv just recomp reward 2 3 how shall we escap if we neglect so great salvat which first began be spoken lord wa confirm unto us them that heard him 2 4 god also bear them wit both sign wonder diver miracl gift holi ghost accord hi own will 2 5 unto angel hath he not put subject world come whereof we speak 2 6 but one certain place testifi say what is man that thou art mind him or son man that thou visitest him 2 7 thou madest him littl lower than angel thou crownedst him glori honour didst set him work thi hand 2 8 thou hast put all thing subject hi feet that he put all subject him he left noth that is not put him but now we see not yet all thing put him 2 9 but we see jesu who wa made littl lower than angel suffer death crown glori honour that he grace god should tast death everi man 2 10 it becam him whom are all thing whom are all thing bring mani son unto glori make captain their salvat perfect suffer 2 11 both he that sanctifieth they who are sanctifi are all one which caus he is not asham call them brethren 2 12 say i will declar thi name unto my brethren midst church will i sing prais unto thee 2 13 again i will put my trust him again behold i children which god hath given me 2 14 forasmuch then as children are partak flesh blood he also himself likewis took part same that death he might destroy him that had power death that is devil 2 15 deliv them who fear death were all their lifetim subject bondag 2 16 verili he took not him natur angel but he took him seed abraham 2 17 wherefor all thing it behov him be made like unto hi brethren that he might be merci faith high priest thing pertain god make reconcili sin peopl 2 18 that he himself hath suffer be tempt he is abl succour them that are tempt 3 1 wherefor holi brethren partak heavenli call consid apostl high priest our profess christ jesu 3 2 who wa faith him that appoint him as also mose wa faith all hi hous 3 3 thi man wa count worthi more glori than mose inasmuch as he who hath build hous hath more honour than hous 3 4 everi hous is build some man but he that built all thing is god 3 5 mose verili wa faith all hi hous as servant testimoni those thing which were be spoken 3 6 but christ as son hi own hous whose hous are we if we hold fast confid rejoic hope firm unto end 3 7 wherefor as holi ghost saith day if ye will hear hi voic 3 8 harden not your heart as provoc day temptat wilder 3 9 when your father tempt me prove me saw my work forti year 3 10 wherefor i wa griev that gener said they do alway err their heart they have not known my way 3 11 so i sware my wrath they shall not enter my rest 3 12 take heed brethren lest there be ani you evil heart unbelief depart live god 3 13 but exhort one anoth daili while it is call day lest ani you be harden deceit sin 3 14 we are made partak christ if we hold begin our confid stedfast unto end 3 15 while it is said day if ye will hear hi voic harden not your heart as provoc 3 16 some when they had heard did provok howbeit not all that came egypt mose 3 17 but whom wa he griev forti year wa it not them that had sin whose carcas fell wilder ani you should seem come short it 4 2 unto us wa gospel preach as well as unto them but word preach did not profit them not be mix faith them that heard it 4 3 we which have believ do enter rest as he said as i have sworn my wrath if they shall enter my rest although work were finish foundat world 4 4 he spake certain place seventh day thi wise god did rest seventh day all hi work 4 5 thi place again if they shall enter my rest 4 6 see therefor it remaineth that some must enter therein they whom it wa first preach enter not becaus unbelief 4 7 again he limiteth certain day say david day so ani twoedg sword pierc even divid asund soul spirit joint marrow is discern thought intent heart 4 13 neither is there ani creatur that is not manifest hi sight but all thing are nake open unto eye den cave earth 11 39 these all have obtain good report faith receiv not promis 11 40 god have provid some better thing us that they us should not be made perfect 12 1 wherefor see we also are compass so great cloud wit let us lay asid everi weight sin which doth so easili beset us let us run patienc race that is set us 12 2 look unto jesu author finish our faith who joy that wa set him endur cross we have had father our flesh which correct us we gave them rever shall we not much rather be subject unto father spirit live 12 10 they verili few day chasten us their own pleasur but he our profit thing which cannot be shaken may remain 12 28 wherefor we receiv kingdom which cannot be move let us have grace wherebi we may serv god accept rever godli fear 12 29 our god is consum fire 13 1 let christ twelv tribe which are scatter abroad greet 1 2 my brethren count it all joy when ye fall diver temptat 1 3 know thi that tri your faith worketh patienc 1 4 but let patienc have her perfect work that ye may be perfect entir want noth 1 5 if ani you lack wisdom let him ask god that giveth all men liber upbraideth not it shall be given him 1 6 but let him ask faith noth waver he that wavereth is like wave sea driven wind toss 1 7 let not that man think that he shall receiv ani thing lord 1 8 doubl mind man is unstabl all hi way 1 9 let brother low degre rejoic that he is exalt 1 10 but rich that he is made low becaus as flower grass he shall pass away 1 11 sun is no sooner risen burn heat but it withereth grass flower thereof falleth grace fashion it perisheth so also shall rich man fade away hi way 1 12 bless is man that endureth temptat when he is tri he shall receiv crown life which lord hath promis them that love him 1 13 let no man say when he is tempt i am tempt god god cannot be tempt evil neither tempteth he ani man 1 14 but everi man is tempt when he is drawn away hi own lust entic 1 15 then when lust hath conceiv it bringeth forth sin sin when it is finish bringeth forth death 1 16 do not err my belov brethren 1 17 everi good gift everi perfect gift is cometh down father light whom is no variabl neither shadow turn 1 18 hi own will begat he us word truth that we should be kind firstfruit hi creatur 1 19 wherefor my belov brethren let everi man be swift hear slow speak slow wrath 1 20 wrath man worketh not righteous god 1 21 wherefor lay apart all filthi superflu naughti receiv meek engraft word which is abl save your soul 1 22 but be ye doer word not hearer onli deceiv your own selv 1 23 if ani be hearer word not doer he is like unto man behold hi natur face glass 1 24 he beholdeth himself goeth hi way straightway forgetteth what manner man he wa 1 25 but whoso looketh perfect law liberti continueth therein he be not forget hearer but doer work thi man shall be bless hi deed 1 26 if ani man you seem be religi bridleth not hi tongu but deceiveth hi own heart thi man s religion is vain 1 27 pure religion undefil god father is thi visit fatherless widow their afflict keep himself unspot world 2 1 my brethren have not faith our lord jesu christ lord glori respect person 2 2 if there come unto your assembl man gold ring goodli apparel there come also poor man vile raiment 2 3 ye have respect him that weareth gay cloth say unto him sit thou here good place say poor stand thou there or sit here my footstool 2 4 are ye not then partial yourselv are becom judg evil thought 2 5 hearken my belov brethren hath not god chosen poor thi world rich faith heir kingdom which he hath promis them that love him 2 6 but ye have despis poor do not rich men oppress you draw you judgment seat 2 7 do not they blasphem that worthi name which ye are call 2 8 if ye fulfil royal law accord scriptur thou shalt love thi neighbour as thyself ye do well 2 9 but if ye have respect person ye commit sin are convinc law as transgressor 2 10 whosoev shall keep whole law yet offend one point he is guilti all 2 11 he that said do not commit adulteri said also do not kill now if thou commit no adulteri yet if thou kill thou art becom transgressor law 2 12 so speak ye so do as they that shall be judg law liberti 2 13 he shall have judgment merci that hath shew no merci merci rejoiceth against judgment 2 14 what doth it profit my brethren though man say he hath faith have not work can faith save him 2 15 if brother or sister be nake destitut daili food 2 16 one you say unto them depart peac be ye warm fill notwithstand ye give them not those thing which are need bodi what doth it profit 2 17 even so faith if it hath not work is dead be alon 2 18 yea man may say thou hast faith i have work shew me thi faith thi work i will shew thee my faith my work 2 19 thou believest that there is one god thou doest well devil also believ trembl 2 20 but wilt thou know o vain man that faith work is dead 2 21 wa not abraham our father justifi work when he had offer isaac hi son altar 2 22 seest thou how faith wrought hi work work wa faith made perfect 2 23 scriptur wa fulfil which saith abraham believ god it wa imput unto him righteous he wa call friend god 2 24 ye see then how that work man is justifi not faith onli 2 25 likewis also wa not rahab harlot justifi work when she had receiv messeng had sent them anoth way 2 26 as bodi spirit is dead so faith work is dead also 3 1 my brethren be not mani master know that we shall receiv greater condemn 3 2 mani thing we offend all if ani man offend not word same is perfect man abl also bridl whole bodi 3 3 behold we put bit hors mouth that they may obey us we turn their whole bodi 3 4 behold also ship which though they be so great are driven fierc wind yet are they turn veri small helm whithersoev governor listeth 3 5 even so tongu is littl member boasteth great thing behold how great matter littl fire kindleth 3 6 tongu is fire world iniqu so is tongu our member that it defileth whole bodi setteth fire cours natur it is set fire hell 3 7 everi kind beast bird serpent thing sea is tame hath been tame mankind 3 8 but tongu can no man tame it is unruli evil full deadli poison 3 9 therewith bless we god even father therewith curs we men which are made similitud god 3 10 same mouth proceedeth bless curs my brethren these thing ought not so be 3 11 doth fountain send forth same place sweet water bitter 3 12 can fig tree my brethren bear oliv berri either vine fig so can no fountain both yield salt water fresh 3 13 who is wise man endu knowledg you let him shew good convers hi work meek wisdom 3 14 but if ye have bitter envi strife your heart glori not lie not against truth 3 15 thi wisdom descendeth not but is earthli sensual devilish 3 16 where envi strife is there is confus everi evil work 3 17 but wisdom that is is first pure then peaceabl gentl easi be intreat full merci good fruit partial hypocrisi 3 18 fruit righteous is sown peac them that make peac 4 1 whenc come war fight you come they not henc even your lust that war your member 4 2 ye lust have not ye kill desir have cannot obtain ye fight war yet ye have not becaus ye ask not 4 3 ye ask receiv not becaus ye ask amiss that ye may consum it your lust 4 4 ye adulter adulteress know ye not that friendship world is enmiti god whosoev therefor will be friend world is enemi god 4 5 do ye think that scriptur saith vain spirit that dwelleth us lusteth envi 4 6 but he giveth more grace wherefor he saith god resisteth proud but giveth grace unto humbl 4 7 submit yourselv therefor god resist devil he will flee you 4 8 draw nigh god he will draw nigh you cleans your hand ye sinner purifi your heart ye doubl mind 4 9 be afflict mourn weep let your laughter be turn mourn your joy heavi 4 10 humbl yourselv sight lord he shall lift you 4 11 speak not evil one anoth brethren he that speaketh evil hi brother judgeth hi brother speaketh evil law judgeth law but if thou judg law thou art not doer law but judg 4 12 there is one lawgiv who is abl save destroy who art thou that judgest anoth 4 13 go now ye that say day or morrow we will go such citi continu there year buy sell get gain 4 14 wherea ye know not what shall be morrow what is your life it is even vapour that appeareth littl time then vanisheth away 4 15 that ye ought say if lord will we shall live do thi or that 4 16 but now ye rejoic your boast all such rejoic is evil 4 17 therefor him that knoweth do good doeth it not him it is sin 5 1 go now ye rich men weep howl your miseri that shall come you 5 2 your rich are corrupt your garment are motheaten 5 3 your gold silver is canker rust them shall be wit against you shall eat your flesh as it were fire ye have heap treasur togeth last day 5 4 behold hire labour who have reap down your field which is you kept back fraud crieth cri them which have reap are enter ear lord sabaoth 5 5 ye have live pleasur earth been wanton ye have nourish your heart as day slaughter 5 6 ye have condemn kill just he doth not resist you 5 7 be patient therefor brethren unto come lord behold husbandman waiteth preciou fruit earth hath long patienc it he receiv earli latter rain 5 8 be ye also patient stablish your heart come lord draweth nigh 5 9 grudg not one against anoth brethren lest ye be condemn behold judg standeth door 5 10 take my brethren prophet who have spoken name lord exampl suffer afflict patienc 5 11 behold we count them happi which endur ye have heard patienc job have seen end lord that lord is veri piti tender merci 5 12 but all thing my brethren swear not neither heaven neither earth neither ani other oath but let your yea be yea your nay nay lest ye fall condemn 5 13 is ani you afflict let him pray is ani merri let him sing psalm 5 14 is ani sick you let him call elder church let them pray him anoint him oil name lord 5 15 prayer faith shall save sick lord shall rais him if he have commit sin they shall be forgiven him 5 16 confess your fault one anoth pray one anoth that ye may be heal effectu fervent prayer righteou man availeth much 5 17 elia wa man subject like passion as we are he pray earnestli that it might not rain it rain not earth space three year six month 5 18 he pray again heaven gave rain earth brought forth her fruit 5 19 brethren if ani you do err truth one convert him 5 20 let him know that he which converteth sinner error hi way shall save soul death shall hide blood jesu christ grace unto you peac be multipli 1 3 bless be god father our lord jesu christ which accord hi abund merci hath begotten us again unto live hope resurrect jesu christ dead 1 4 inherit incorrupt undefil that fadeth not away reserv heaven you 1 5 who are kept power god faith unto salvat readi be reveal last time 1 6 wherein ye greatli rejoic though now season if need be ye are heavi manifold temptat 1 7 that trial your faith be much more preciou than gold that perisheth though it be tri fire might be found unto prais honour glori appear jesu christ 1 8 whom have not seen ye love whom though now ye see him not yet believ ye rejoic joy unspeak full glori 1 9 receiv end your faith even salvat your soul 1 10 which salvat prophet have enquir search dilig who prophesi grace that should come unto you 1 11 search what or what manner time spirit christ which wa them did signifi when it testifi beforehand suffer christ glori that should follow 1 12 unto whom it wa reveal that not unto themselv but unto us they did minist thing which are now report unto you them that have preach gospel unto you holi ghost sent down heaven which thing angel desir look 1 13 wherefor gird loin your mind be sober hope end grace that is be brought unto you revel jesu christ 1 14 as obedi children not fashion yourselv accord former lust your ignor 1 15 but as he which hath call you is holi so be ye holi all manner convers 1 16 becaus it is written be ye holi i am holi 1 17 if ye call father who respect person judgeth accord everi man s work pass time your sojourn here fear 1 18 forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeem corrupt thing as silver gold your vain convers receiv tradit your father 1 19 but preciou blood christ as lamb blemish spot 1 20 who verili wa foreordain foundat world but wa manifest these last time you 1 21 who him do believ god that rais him dead gave him glori that your faith hope might be god 1 22 see ye have purifi your soul obey truth spirit unto unfeign love brethren see that ye love one anoth pure heart fervent 1 23 be born again not corrupt seed but incorrupt word god which liveth abideth ever 1 24 all flesh is as grass all glori man as flower grass grass withereth flower thereof falleth away 1 25 but word lord endureth ever thi is word which gospel is preach unto you 2 1 wherefor lay asid all malic all guil hypocrisi envi all evil speak 2 2 as newborn babe desir sincer milk word that ye may grow therebi 2 3 if so be ye have tast that lord is graciou 2 4 whom come as unto live stone disallow inde men but chosen god preciou 2 5 ye also as live stone are built spiritu hous holi priesthood offer spiritu sacrific accept god jesu christ 2 6 wherefor also it is contain scriptur behold i lay sion chief corner stone elect preciou he that believeth him shall not be confound 2 7 unto you therefor which believ he is preciou but unto them which be disobedi stone which builder disallow same is made head corner 2 8 stone stumbl rock offenc even them which stumbl word be disobedi whereunto also they were appoint 2 9 but ye are chosen gener royal priesthood holi nation peculiar peopl that ye should shew forth prais him who hath call you dark hi marvel light 2 10 which time past were not peopl but are now peopl god which had not obtain merci but now have obtain merci 2 11 dearli belov i beseech you as stranger pilgrim abstain fleshli lust which war against soul 2 12 have your convers honest gentil that wherea they speak against you as evildo they may your good work which they shall behold glorifi god day visit 2 13 submit yourselv everi ordin man lord s sake it be king as suprem 2 14 or unto governor as unto them that are sent him punish evildo prais them that do well 2 15 so is will god that well do ye may put silenc gentl but also froward 2 19 thi is thankworthi if man conscienc god endur grief suffer wrong 2 20 what glori is it if when ye be buffet your fault ye shall take it patient but if when ye do well suffer it ye take it patient thi is accept god 2 21 even hereunto were ye call becaus christ also suffer us leav us exampl that ye should follow hi step 2 22 who did no sin neither wa guil found hi mouth 2 23 who when he wa revil revil not again when he suffer he threaten not but commit himself him that judgeth righteous 2 24 who hi own self bare our sin hi own bodi tree that we be dead sin should live unto righteous whose stripe ye were heal 2 25 ye were as sheep go astray but are now return unto shepherd bishop your soul 3 1 likewis ye wive be subject your own husband that if ani obey own husband 3 6 even as sara obey abraham call him lord whose daughter ye are as long as ye do well are not afraid ani amaz 3 7 likewis ye husband dwell them accord knowledg give honour unto wife as unto weaker vessel as be heir togeth grace life that your prayer be not hinder 3 8 final be ye all one mind have compass one anoth love as brethren be piti be courteou 3 9 not render evil evil or rail him eschew evil do good let him seek peac ensu it 3 12 eye lord are righteou hi ear are open unto their prayer but face lord is against them that do evil 3 13 who is he that will harm you if ye be follow that which is good 3 14 but if ye suffer righteous sake happi are ye be not afraid their terror neither be troubl 3 15 but sanctifi lord god your heart be readi alway give answer everi man that asketh you reason hope that is you meek fear 3 16 have good conscienc that wherea they speak evil you as evildo they may be asham that fals accus your good convers christ 3 17 it is better if will god be so that ye suffer well do than evil do 3 18 christ also hath onc suffer sin just unjust that he might bring us god be put death flesh but quicken spirit 3 19 which also he went preach unto spirit us not put away filth flesh but answer good conscienc god resurrect jesu christ 3 22 who is gone heaven is right hand god angel author power be made subject unto him 4 1 forasmuch then as christ hath 1 3 accord as hi divin power hath given unto us all thing that pertain unto life godli knowledg him that hath call us glori virtu 1 4 wherebi are given unto us exceed great preciou promis that these ye might be partak divin natur have escap corrupt that is world lust 1 5 besid thi give all dilig add your faith virtu virtu knowledg 1 6 knowledg temper temper patienc patienc godli 1 7 godli brotherli kind brotherli kind chariti 1 8 if these thing be you abound they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruit knowledg our lord jesu christ 1 9 but he that lacketh these thing is blind cannot see afar off hath forgotten that he wa purg hi old sin 1 10 wherefor rather brethren give dilig make your call elect sure if ye do these thing ye shall never fall 1 11 so entranc shall be minist unto you abundantli everlast kingdom our lord saviour jesu christ 1 12 wherefor i will not be neglig put you alway remembr these thing though ye know them be establish present truth 1 13 yea i think it meet as long as i am thi tabernacl stir you put you remembr 1 14 know that shortli i must put off thi my tabernacl even as our lord jesu christ hath shew me 1 15 moreov i will endeavour that ye may be abl my deceas have these thing alway remembr 1 16 we have not follow cunningli devis fabl when we made known unto you power come our lord jesu christ but were eyewit hi majesti 1 17 he receiv god father honour glori when there came such voic him excel glori thi is my belov son whom i am well pleas 1 18 thi voic which came heaven we heard when we were him holi mount 1 19 we have also more sure word propheci whereunto ye do well that ye take heed as unto light that shineth dark place day dawn day star aris your heart 1 20 know thi first that no propheci scriptur is ani privat shall bring damnabl heresi even deni lord that bought them bring themselv swift destruct 2 2 mani shall follow their pernici way reason whom way truth shall be evil spoken 2 3 covet shall they feign judgment 2 5 spare not old world but save noah eighth person preacher righteous bring flood world ungodli 2 6 turn citi sodom gomorrha ash condemn them overthrow make them ensampl unto those that should live ungodli 2 7 deliv just lot vex filthi convers wick 2 8 that righteou man dwell them see hear vex hi righteou soul day day their unlaw deed 2 9 lord knoweth how deliv godli temptat reserv pollut world knowledg lord saviour jesu christ they are again entangl therein overcom latter end is wors them than begin 2 21 it had been better them not have known way righteous than they have known it turn holi command deliv unto them 2 22 but it is happen unto them accord true proverb dog is turn hi own vomit again sow that wa wash her wallow mire 3 1 thi second epistl belov i now write unto ephesu write these thing saith he that holdeth seven star hi right hand who walketh midst seven golden candlestick 2 2 i know thi work thi labour thi patienc how thou canst not bear them which are evil thou hast tri them which say they are apostl are not hast found them liar 2 3 hast born hast patienc my name s sake hast labour hast not faint 2 4 nevertheless i have somewhat against thee becaus thou hast left thi first love 2 5 rememb therefor whenc thou art fallen repent do first work or els i will come unto thee quickli will remov thi candlestick hi place thou repent 2 6 but thi thou hast that thou hatest deed nicolaitan which i also hate 2 7 he that hath ear let him hear what spirit saith unto church him that overcometh will i give eat tree life which is midst paradis god 2 8 unto satan 2 10 fear none those thing which thou shalt suffer behold devil shall cast some you prison that ye may be tri ye shall have tribul ten day be thou faith unto death i will give thee crown life 2
